#pragma dynamic 200000
#define RandomEx(%0,%1) floatround(random((%1) - (%0)) + (%0))// RandomEx(1, 100); will generate a number between 1 and 1000

#define HOLDING(%0) \
	((newkeys & (%0)) == (%0))

#define PRESSED(%0) \
	(((newkeys & (%0)) == (%0)) && ((oldkeys & (%0)) != (%0)))

#define RELEASED(%0) \
	(((newkeys & (%0)) != (%0)) && ((oldkeys & (%0)) == (%0)))

	fModel,
	fInterior,
	fActive,
	fObjectID,

	Reporter,

	reportExpires,
	reportTimer,
	reportText[256]
}

	PDCaller,
	bool:PDCallUsed,

	PDCallTimer,

	PDCallLocation[128]

	aUsed

	doorVw[2],
	doorInt[2],
	bool:doorUsed

	tObj[10],
	tBone[10]
}

/****** STOCK FUNCTIONS ******/
stock NearAtm(playerid)
{
	new bool:var;
	for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(AtmLocations); i++)
	{
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,AtmLocations[i][0],AtmLocations[i][1],AtmLocations[i][2]))
		{
		    var = true;
		    break;
		}
	}
	return var;
}
stock SaveAtms()
{
	LogCallback("SaveAtms");
	new a;
	new File:atms;
	while(a < sizeof(aInfo))
	{
	    new cordinate[512];
		format(cordinate,sizeof(cordinate),"%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%d|%d|%d\r\n",
		aInfo[a][aPos][0],aInfo[a][aPos][1],aInfo[a][aPos][2],aInfo[a][aRot][0],
		aInfo[a][aRot][1],aInfo[a][aRot][2],aInfo[a][aVw],aInfo[a][aInt],aInfo[a][aUsed]);
		if(a == 0)
		{
		    atms = fopen("atms.cfg",io_write);
		}
		else
		{
			atms = fopen("atms.cfg",io_append);
		}
		fwrite(atms,cordinate);
		a++;
		fclose(atms);
	}
	LogCallback("SaveAtms");
	return 1;
}
stock SaveDoors()
{
	LogCallback("SaveDoors");
	new d;
	new File: df;
	while (d < sizeof(DoorInfo))
	{
		new cordinate[512],used = 0;
		if(DoorInfo[d][doorUsed] == true) { used = 1; }
		format(cordinate,sizeof(cordinate),"%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d\r\n",
		DoorInfo[d][dEnt][0],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][1],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][2],
		DoorInfo[d][dExt][0],DoorInfo[d][dExt][1],DoorInfo[d][dExt][2],
		DoorInfo[d][doorVw][0],DoorInfo[d][doorVw][1],DoorInfo[d][doorInt][0],
		DoorInfo[d][doorInt][1],used);
		if(d == 0)
		{
			df = fopen("doors.cfg", io_write);
		}
		else
		{
			df = fopen("doors.cfg", io_append);
		}
		fwrite(df, cordinate);
		d++;
		fclose(df);
	}
	LogCallback("SaveDoors");
	return 1;
}
stock LoadAtms()
{
	LogCallback("LoadAtms");
	new bc[11][64],str[512];
	new File:atms = fopen("atms.cfg",io_read);
	if(atms)
	{
	    new a;
	    while(a < sizeof(aInfo))
	    {
	        fread(atms,str);
	        split(str, bc, '|');
			aInfo[a][aPos][0] = floatstr(bc[0]);
			aInfo[a][aPos][1] = floatstr(bc[1]);
			aInfo[a][aPos][2] = floatstr(bc[2]);
			aInfo[a][aRot][0] = floatstr(bc[3]);
			aInfo[a][aRot][1] = floatstr(bc[4]);
			aInfo[a][aRot][2] = floatstr(bc[5]);
			aInfo[a][aInt] = strval(bc[6]);
			aInfo[a][aVw] = strval(bc[7]);
			aInfo[a][aUsed] = strval(bc[8]);
			if(aInfo[a][aUsed] == 1)
			{
			    Atm[a] = CreateDynamicObject(2942,aInfo[a][aPos][0],aInfo[a][aPos][1],aInfo[a][aPos][2],aInfo[a][aRot][0],aInfo[a][aRot][1],aInfo[a][aRot][2],
			    aInfo[a][aVw],aInfo[a][aInt],-1,50.0);
			}
			a ++ ;
		}
		fclose(atms);
	}
	LogCallback("LoadAtms");
	return 1;
}
stock IsACop(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("IsACop");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    new member = PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember];
	    switch(member)
		{
			case 1: return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("IsACop");
	return 0;
}
stock LoadDoors()
{
    LogCallback("LoadDoors");
	new arrCoords[11][64];
	new strFromFile2[512];
	new File: file = fopen("doors.cfg", io_read);
	if(file)
	{
		new d;
		while (d < sizeof(DoorInfo))
		{
			fread(file, strFromFile2);
			split(strFromFile2, arrCoords, '|');
			DoorInfo[d][dEnt][0] = floatstr(arrCoords[0]);
			DoorInfo[d][dEnt][1] = floatstr(arrCoords[1]);
			DoorInfo[d][dEnt][2] = floatstr(arrCoords[2]);
			DoorInfo[d][dExt][0] = floatstr(arrCoords[3]);
			DoorInfo[d][dExt][1] = floatstr(arrCoords[4]);
			DoorInfo[d][dExt][2] = floatstr(arrCoords[5]);
			DoorInfo[d][doorVw] [0] =   strval(arrCoords[6]);
			DoorInfo[d][doorVw] [1] =   strval(arrCoords[7]);
			DoorInfo[d][doorInt][0] =   strval(arrCoords[8]);
			DoorInfo[d][doorInt][1] =   strval(arrCoords[9]);
			if(strval(arrCoords[10]) == 1)
			{
			    DoorInfo[d][doorUsed] = true;
			    dPickup[d] = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,DoorInfo[d][dEnt][0],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][1],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][2],DoorInfo[d][doorVw][0],DoorInfo[d][doorInt][0],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50.0);
			}
			d ++;
		}
		fclose(file);
	}
    LogCallback("LoadDoors");
	return 1;
}

stock SendFactionList(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("SendFactionList");
	new string[128];
	format(string,sizeof(string),"Avaliable factions: 1)%s,2)%s",GetFactionName(1),GetFactionName(2));
	SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,string);
	LogCallback("SendFactionList");
	return 1;
}

stock GetFactionName(factionid)
{
    LogCallback("GetFactionName");
	new faction[24];
	switch(factionid)
	{
	    case 1: {faction = "LSPD";}
	    case 2: {faction = "LSFD";}
	}
	LogCallback("GetFactionName");
	return faction;
}

stock GetFactionRank(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("GetFactionRank");
	new rank[30];
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember])
	{
	    case 1://LSPD
	    {
	        switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank])
	        {
	            case 1: rank = "Cadet I";
	            case 2: rank = "Cadet II";
	            case 3: rank = "Police Officer I";
	            case 4: rank = "Police Officer II";
	            case 5: rank = "Police Officer III";
	            case 6: rank = "Senior Lead Officer";
	            case 7: rank = "Sergeant I";
	            case 8: rank = "Sergeant II";
	            case 9: rank = "Sergeant III";
	            case 10: rank = "Lieutenant";
	            case 11: rank = "Captain";
	            case 12: rank = "Commander";
	            case 13: rank = "Assistant Chief";
				case 14: rank = "Chief";
	        }
	    }
	    case 2://LSFD
	    {
	        switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank])
	        {
	            case 1: rank = "Applicant";
	            case 2: rank = "Probationary";
	            case 3: rank = "Firefighter I";
	            case 4: rank = "Firefighter II";
	            case 5: rank = "Firefighter III";
				case 6: rank = "Resident";
				case 7: rank = "Specializing Resident";
				case 8: rank = "Physician";
				case 9: rank = "Lead Physician";
				case 10: rank = "Lieutenant";
				case 11: rank = "Captain";
				case 12: rank = "Battalion Chief";
				case 13: rank = "Deputy Chief";
				case 14: rank = "Fire Chief";
	        }
	    }
	    default:
	    {
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember] != 255)
			{
			    new fam = PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember];
			    new rr = PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank];
			    if(rr >= 1 && rr <= 6) format(rank, sizeof(rank), "%s", FamilyRank[fam][rr-1]);
			    else format(rank, sizeof(rank), "%s", FamilyRank[fam][0]);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("GetFactionRank");
	return rank;
}
stock GetSwatRank(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("GetSwatRank");
	new rank[30];
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSwat])
	{
	    case 1: rank = "Operative";
	    case 2: rank = "Instructor";
	    case 3: rank = "Sub-Commander";
	    case 4: rank = "Commander";
	}
	LogCallback("GetSwatRank");
	return rank;
}

stock GetVipLevel(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("GetVipLevel");
	new level[12];
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
	{
	    case 1: level = "Bronze";
	    case 2: level = "Silver";
	    case 3: level = "Gold";
	    case 4: level = "Diamond";
	}
	LogCallback("GetVipLevel");
	return level;
}
stock SendRadioMessage(member, color, string[])
{
    LogCallback("SendRadioMessage");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] == member)
	        {
	            SCM(i, color, string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("SendRadioMessage");
}

stock SendRadioMessageAll(color, string[])
{
	LogCallback("SendRadioMessageAll");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] >= 1 && PlayerInfo[i][pMember] <=4)
	    {
	        SCM(i, color, string);
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("SendRadioMessageAll");
}

stock SaveTrunkSlot(playerid, slot)
{
	LogCallback("SaveTrunkSlot");
	new sql[128];
	switch(slot)
	{
		case 0:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS1`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 1:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS2`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 2:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS3`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 3:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS4`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 4:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS5`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 5:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS6`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 6:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS7`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 7:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS8`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 8:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS9`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 9:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TS10`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 10: { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TDS1`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 11: { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TDS2`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
		case 12: { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `TDS3`=1 WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
	}
	LogCallback("SaveTrunkSlot");
	return 1;
}

stock SaveTrunk(playerid, trunk, slot)
{
	LogCallback("SaveTrunk");
	new sql[128];
	switch(trunk)
	{
		case 1:
		{
			switch(slot)
			{
				case 0:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `T1G1`='%d', `T1A1`='%d' WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1GunTrunk][0],PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][0],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }
				case 1:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `T1G2`='%d', `T1A2`='%d' WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1GunTrunk][1],PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][1],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }

			}
		}
		case 2:
		{
			switch(slot)
			{
				case 0:  { format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_trunks` SET `T2G1`='%d', `T2A1`='%d' WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2GunTrunk][0],PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][0],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]); mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid); }

			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("SaveTrunk");
	return 1;
}

stock DoTutorial(playerid,step)
{
	LogCallback("DoTutorial");
	ClearChatbox(playerid,20);
	switch(step)
	{
	    case 1:
	    {
			pTut[playerid] = 1;
			TutTimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("Tutorial",10,false,"i",playerid);


		}
 	case 2:
		{
			TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,bckgrndRules);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid,ruleone[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid,ruletwo[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid,rulethree[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid,rulefour[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid,rulefive[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid,rulesix[playerid]);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pTutDone] = 20;
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			TogglePlayerSpectating(playerid,0);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1642.3364,-2239.9351,13.4957);
			SetSpawnInfo(playerid,PlayerInfo[playerid][pTeam], PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel],1642.3364,-2239.9351,13.4957,175.2896,0,0,0,0,0,0);
			SpawnPlayer(playerid);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularCount] -= 500;
   			SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"{FF0000}Tutorial Complete! {FFFFFF}Good luck with your life in Los Santos!");
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"If you require assistance, use /n to ask other players/player helpers.");
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"If you need help getting started go rent a faggio from your right, and use");
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"{FF0000}/GPS {FFFFFF}to set a route for City Hall. There you can get your passport");
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"Credits to Kreyg, Aaron, Martin Josh Quake and Carl for the script");
			OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
			StopAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid);
			ACTIME[playerid] = SetTimerEx("AntiCheat",1000,true,"i",playerid);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("DoTutorial");
	return 1;
}
stock GWN(weaponid)
{
    LogCallback("GWN");
	new weaponname[24];
	if(weaponid == 0)
	{
	    weaponname = "None";
	}
	else
	{
	    GetWeaponName(weaponid,weaponname,sizeof(weaponname));
	}
	LogCallback("GWN");
	return weaponname;
}

stock SafeResetPlayerid(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("SafeResetPlayerid");
	DPCP(playerid);
	stop animreset[playerid];
	stop cutscenetimer[playerid];
	stop TrainTimer[playerid];
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	stop accidenttimer[playerid];
	stop retimer[playerid];
	stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
	stop WaterTimer[playerid];
	stop ClearFall[playerid];
	stop DeathTimer[playerid];
	stop SpeedoTimer[playerid];
//	stop ImpactTimer[playerid];
	KillTimer(ACTIME[playerid]);
	KillTimer(DildoTimerReset);
	KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(StreamTimer[playerid]);
	SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
	Delete3DTextLabel(DutyLabel[playerid]);
	DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, crop[playerid]);
	DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, grassspot[playerid]);
	DestroyDynamicPickup(trashbag[playerid]);
	DestroyDynamicPickup(pizzabox[playerid]);
	DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(Text3D:MaskLabel[playerid]);
	DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, ScrapObject[playerid][0]);
	DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, ScrapObject[playerid][1]);
	DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, DrugPlane[playerid]);
	DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, DrugBag[playerid]);
	Dead[playerid] = -1;
	//DeadDrag[playerid] = -1;
	AcceptDeath[playerid] = -1;
	justdied[playerid] = -1;
	AntiAnimSpam[playerid] = 0;
	BuyingHouse[playerid] = -1;
	HotWired[playerid] = -1;
	ExtraKey[playerid] = -1;
	EngTimer[playerid] = -1;
	HotWireTime[playerid] = -1;
	JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;

	gPlayerAnimLibsPreloaded[playerid] = 0;
	CurrentCar[playerid] = -1;
	DealerCar[playerid] = -1;
	DealerID[playerid] = -1;

	return 1;
}

stock SaveWeed(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("SaveWeed");
	new sql[600];
	format(sql, sizeof(sql), "UPDATE `samp_drugs` SET `pPOS1X`='%f', `pPOS1Y`='%f', `pPOS1Z`='%f', `pPOS2X`='%f', `pPOS2Y`='%f', `pPOS2Z`='%f'", PlantSpots[playerid][0][0], PlantSpots[playerid][0][1], PlantSpots[playerid][0][2], PlantSpots[playerid][1][0], PlantSpots[playerid][1][1], PlantSpots[playerid][1][2]);
	format(sql, sizeof(sql), "%s, `STP1`='%d', `STP2`='%d', `Water`='%d', `Stage`='%d', `Time`='%d', `Growing`='%d' WHERE PlayerID='%d'", sql, SeedToPlant[playerid][0], SeedToPlant[playerid][1], OrigNeWa[playerid], GrowStep[playerid], PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8], PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][7],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
	mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
	LogCallback("SaveWeed");
	return 1;
}

stock WeedGrowth(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("WeedGrowth");
	switch(GrowStep[playerid])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
			{
				if(SeedToPlant[playerid][W] == 2)
				{
					WeedPlant[playerid][W] = CreateDynamicObject(3409, PlantSpots[playerid][W][0], PlantSpots[playerid][W][1], PlantSpots[playerid][W][2]-0.6, -180.0, 0.0, 0.0, -1, -1, -1, 250.0);
				}
			}
			WaterPlants[playerid] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8] = 0;
			NeedsWater[playerid] = OrigNeWa[playerid];
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "[ALARM] You need to water your plants. They have begun to grow. They wont grow more until you water them.");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "[ALARM] You also need to water them in time. If you don't they will die. There is also a chance animals might eat them.");
			WaterTimer[playerid] = defer PlantsFates(playerid);

		}
		case 2:
		{
			for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
			{
				if(SeedToPlant[playerid][W] == 2)
				{
					MoveDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][W], PlantSpots[playerid][W][0], PlantSpots[playerid][W][1], PlantSpots[playerid][W][2]-0.4, 5, -180.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				}
			}
			WaterPlants[playerid] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8] = 0;
			NeedsWater[playerid] = OrigNeWa[playerid];
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "[ALARM] You need to water your plants. A little more TLC is needed for them to reach their max.");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "[ALARM] You also need to water them in time. If you don't they will die. There is also a chance animals might eat them.");
			WaterTimer[playerid] = defer PlantsFates(playerid);
		}
		case 3:
		{
			for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
			{
				if(SeedToPlant[playerid][W] == 2)
				{
					MoveDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][W], PlantSpots[playerid][W][0], PlantSpots[playerid][W][1], PlantSpots[playerid][W][2], 5, -180.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				}
			}
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "[ALARM] Your plants are fully grown. You may now /pickweed");
			WaterPlants[playerid] = 0; NeedsWater[playerid] = -1; OrigNeWa[playerid] = 0;
			PlantFate[playerid] = 0; PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8] = 0;
			GrowStep[playerid] += 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("WeedGrowth");
	return 1;
}

stock WaterWeed(playerid)
{
	if(NeedsWater[playerid] != -1)
	{
		stop WaterTimer[playerid];
		switch(WaterPlants[playerid])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				switch(PlantFate[playerid])
				{
					case 0:
					{
						switch(GrowStep[playerid])
						{
							case 0:
							{
								OrigNeWa[playerid] = NeedsWater[playerid];
								SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][0], PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][1], PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][2], 1.5,46,0);
								WaterPlants[playerid] = 1;
							}
							case 1 .. 3:
							{
								SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][0], PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][1], PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][2], 1.5,46,0);
								WaterPlants[playerid] = 1;
							}
						}
					}
					case 1:
					{
						for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
						{
							if(SeedToPlant[playerid][W] == 2)
							{
								MoveDynamicObject(BabyDeer[playerid][W], PlantSpots[playerid][W][0]+50, PlantSpots[playerid][W][1], PlantSpots[playerid][W][2], 10.0);
								DeerRun[playerid] = defer DeerDestory(playerid);
							}
						}
						PlantFate[playerid] = 0;
						SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][0], PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][1], PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][2], 1.5,46,0);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You scared the deer away and saved the plants! Now water them"); WaterPlants[playerid] = 1;
					}
					case 2:
					{
						PlantFate[playerid] = 0;
						SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][0], PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][1], PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][2], 1.5,46,0);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You reached the plants in time! Now water them"); WaterPlants[playerid] = 1;
					}
				}
			}
			case 1: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You've already begun the watering/growing process. Wait until its time to water again."); }
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "It's not time to water your plants");
	}
	LogCallback("WaterWeed");
	return 1;
}



stock SendGunMsg(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("SendGunMsg");
	new string[128];
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGunSkill])
	{
		case 0 .. 100://Level 1 gun dealer
		{

			format(string, sizeof(string), "Weapons:Knuckles(%d) Bat(%d) Flowers(%d) Cane(%d) Katana(%d) Colt45(%d)", cknucks, cbat, cflowers, ccane, ckatana, ccolt45);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		}
		case 101 .. 200:
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "Weapons:Knuckles(%d) Bat(%d) Flowers(%d) Cane(%d) Katana(%d) Colt45(%d)", cknucks, cbat, cflowers, ccane, ckatana, ccolt45);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "Silenced(%d) Rifle(%d)",csilenced, crifle);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		}
		case 201 .. 300:
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "Weapons:Knuckles(%d) Bat(%d) Flowers(%d) Cane(%d) Katana(%d) Colt45(%d)", cknucks, cbat, cflowers, ccane, ckatana, ccolt45);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "Silenced(%d) Rifle(%d)",csilenced, crifle);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "MAC10(%d) Tec9(%d)", cmac10, ctec9);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		}
		case 301 .. 500:
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "Weapons:Knuckles(%d) Bat(%d) Flowers(%d) Cane(%d) Katana(%d) Colt45(%d)", cknucks, cbat, cflowers, ccane, ckatana, ccolt45);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "Deagle(%d) Silenced(%d) Rifle(%d)", cdeagle, csilenced, crifle);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "MAC10(%d) Tec9(%d)", cmac10, ctec9);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "MP5(%d) Shotgun(%d) Molotovs(%d)", cmp5, cshotgun, cmolotovs);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		}
		default://level five gun dealer
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "Weapons:Knuckles(%d) Bat(%d) Flowers(%d) Cane(%d) Katana(%d) Colt45(%d)", cknucks, cbat, cflowers, ccane, ckatana, ccolt45);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "Deagle(%d) Silenced(%d) Rifle(%d)", cdeagle, csilenced, crifle);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "MAC10(%d) Tec9(%d)", cmac10, ctec9);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "MP5(%d) Shotgun(%d) Molotovs(%d)", cmp5, cshotgun, cmolotovs);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"AK47(%d)", cak47);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		}
	}
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/creategun [playerid] [gun name]");
	LogCallback("SendGunMsg");
	return 1;
}

stock SyncTime()
{
    LogCallback("SyncTime");
	new string[24], tmphour, tmpminute, tmpsecond;
	gettime(tmphour, tmpminute, tmpsecond);
	if((tmphour > ghour) || (tmphour == 0 && ghour == 23))
	{
      	format(string, sizeof(string), "The time is now %d:00",tmphour);
		BroadCast(COLOR_WHITE,string);
		ghour = tmphour;
		PayDay();
		if(realtime)
		{
			SetWorldTime(tmphour);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("SyncTime");
}

stock CommandMsg(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("CommandMsg");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "SERVER: Unknown Command!");
	}
	LogCallback("CommandMsg");
	return 1;
}

stock PlayerName(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("PlayerName");
	new name[24];
	GetPlayerName(playerid, name, 24);
	LogCallback("PlayerName");
	return name;
}

stock DollahScoreUpdate()
{
    LogCallback("DollahScoreUpdate");
	new LevScore;
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
   			LevScore = PlayerInfo[i][pLevel];
			SetPlayerScore(i, LevScore);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("DollahScoreUpdate");
	return 1;
}

stock GetBizz2DZone2(houseid, zone[], len)
{
    LogCallback("GetBizz2DZone2");
	new Float:x22, Float:y22
	x22 = BizzInfo[houseid][bEntranceX]; y22 = BizzInfo[houseid][bEntranceY];
 	for(new i = 0; i != sizeof(gSANZones); i++ )
 	{
		if(x22 >= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][0] && x22 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][3] && y22 >= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][1] && y22 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][4])
		{
		    return format(zone, len, gSANZones[i][SAZONE_NAME], 0);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("GetBizz2DZone2");
	return 0;
}

stock Float:GetDistanceBetweenPlayers(p1,p2)
{
    LogCallback("GetDistanceBetweenPlayers");
	new Float:x1,Float:y1,Float:z1,Float:x2,Float:y2,Float:z2;
	if(!IsPlayerConnected(p1) || !IsPlayerConnected(p2))
	{
		return -1.00;
	}
	GetPlayerPos(p1,x1,y1,z1);
	GetPlayerPos(p2,x2,y2,z2);
    LogCallback("GetDistanceBetweenPlayers");
	return floatsqroot(floatpower(floatabs(floatsub(x2,x1)),2)+floatpower(floatabs(floatsub(y2,y1)),2)+floatpower(floatabs(floatsub(z2,z1)),2));
}

stock ShowCarDialog(playerid)
{
    LogCallback("ShowCarDialog");
	ShowServerDialog(playerid, DCAR_DIALOG, DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Car", "Please type the car id into the box below", "Ok", "Cancel");
	LogCallback("ShowCarDialog");
	return 1;
}

stock GetPlayer2DZone(playerid, zone[], len)
{
    LogCallback("GetPlayer2DZone");
	new Float:x22, Float:y22, Float:z22;
	GetPlayerPos(playerid, x22, y22, z22);
 	for(new i = 0; i != sizeof(gSANZones); i++ )
 	{
		if(x22 >= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][0] && x22 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][3] && y22 >= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][1] && y22 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][4])
		{
		    return format(zone, len, gSANZones[i][SAZONE_NAME], 0);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("GetPlayer2DZone");
	return 0;
}

stock GetPlayer2DRadarZone(playerid, zone[], len)
{
    LogCallback("GetPlayer2DRadarZone");
	new Float:x22, Float:y22, Float:z22;
	GetPlayerPos(playerid, x22, y22, z22);
 	for(new i = 0; i != sizeof(gSAZones); i++ )
 	{
		if(x22 >= gSAZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][0] && x22 <= gSAZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][3] && y22 >= gSAZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][1] && y22 <= gSAZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][4])
		{
		    return format(zone, len, gSAZones[i][SAZONE_NAME], 0);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("GetPlayer2DRadarZone");
	return 0;
}

stock GetVehicle2DZone(vehicleid, zone[], len)
{
	LogCallback("GetVehicle2DZone");
	new Float:x22, Float:y22, Float:z22;
	GetVehiclePos(vehicleid, x22, y22, z22);
 	for(new i = 0; i != sizeof(gSANZones); i++ )
 	{
		if(x22 >= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][0] && x22 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][3] && y22 >= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][1] && y22 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][4])
		{
		    return format(zone, len, gSANZones[i][SAZONE_NAME], 0);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("GetVehicle2DZone");
	return 0;
}

stock GetPlayer3DZone(playerid, zone[], len)
{
	LogCallback("GetPlayer3DZone");
	new Float:x33, Float:y33, Float:z33;
	GetPlayerPos(playerid, x33, y33, z33);
 	for(new i = 0; i != sizeof(gSAZones); i++ )
 	{
		if(x33 >= gSAZones[i][SANZONE_AREA][0] && x33 <= gSAZones[i][SANZONE_AREA][3] && y33 >= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][1] && y33 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][4] && z33 >= gSAZones[i][SANZONE_AREA][2] && z33 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][5])
		{
		    return format(zone, len, gSAZones[i][SAZONE_NAME], 0);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("GetPlayer3DZone");
	return 0;
}

stock IsPlayerInZone(playerid, zone[])
{
	LogCallback("IsPlayerInZone");
	new TmpZone[MAX_ZONE_NAME];
	GetPlayer3DZone(playerid, TmpZone, sizeof(TmpZone));
	for(new i = 0; i != sizeof(gSANZones); i++)
	{
		if(strfind(TmpZone, zone, true) != -1)
			return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsPlayerInZone");
	return 0;
}

stock GetHouse2DZone(houseid, zone[], len)
{
	LogCallback("GetHouse2DZone");
	new Float:x22, Float:y22;
	x22 = HouseInfo[houseid][hEntrancex]; y22 = HouseInfo[houseid][hEntrancey];
 	for(new i = 0; i != sizeof(gSAZones); i++ )
 	{
		if(x22 >= gSAZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][0] && x22 <= gSAZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][3] && y22 >= gSAZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][1] && y22 <= gSAZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][4])
		{
		    return format(zone, len, gSAZones[i][SAZONE_NAME], 0);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("GetHouse2DZone");
	return 0;
}

stock GetHouse2DZone2(houseid, zone[], len)
{
	LogCallback("GetHouse2DZone2");
	new Float:x22, Float:y22
	x22 = HouseInfo[houseid][hEntrancex]; y22 = HouseInfo[houseid][hEntrancey];
 	for(new i = 0; i != sizeof(gSANZones); i++ )
 	{
		if(x22 >= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][0] && x22 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][3] && y22 >= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][1] && y22 <= gSANZones[i][SAZONE_AREA][4])
		{
		    return format(zone, len, gSANZones[i][SAZONE_NAME], 0);
		}
	}
    LogCallback("GetHouse2DZone2");
	return 0;
}



stock dmvquiz(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("dmvquiz");
	new dtext[256], qtext[128];
	if(DMVW_A[playerid] <= 2)
	{
		switch(DMVQ_Q[playerid])
		{
		    case 1:
		    {
				qtext = "How should you drive on the streets of Los Santos";
				dtext = "However I want to drive. On either side.\r\nPut the pedal to the metal, and floor it!\r\nAt a reasonable speed, and on the right side of the road\r\nWithin Reasonable speeds determined by me";
				DMVQ_Q[playerid] = 1;
			}
			case 2:
			{
			    qtext = "Where should one always come to a complete stop?";
			    dtext = "When passing by the police station\r\nAt ANY and ALL Intersections\r\nWhen another car is stopped on the side of the road\r\nIn the middle of the road is fine";
			    DMVQ_Q[playerid] = 2;
			}
			case 3:
			{
				qtext = "What color should you keep the speed on your speedometer";
				dtext = "Green-Custard\r\nGreen-Green\r\nYellow-Red\r\nRed-Yellow";
			    DMVQ_Q[playerid] = 3;
			}
			case 4:
			{

				qtext = "If I crash my car into another person driving";
				dtext = "Keep driving and get the hell out of there\r\nGet out, and address the accident with the other person\r\nGive them lots and lots of money\r\nKill them.";
			    DMVQ_Q[playerid] = 4;
			}
			case 5:
			{
				qtext = "You agree that you will drive properly";
				dtext = "I agree to drive properly\r\nScrew this\r\nI don't agree\r\nI CANT DRIVE...55!!!!";
			    DMVQ_Q[playerid] = 5;
			}
		}
		ShowServerDialog(playerid,DMV_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, qtext, dtext, "Okay", "Cancel");
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "__________________YOU FAILED__________________");
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Sorry, but you are not prepared to drive in Los Santos!!");
		SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
	}
	LogCallback("dmvquiz");
	return 1;
}

stock passportquiz(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("passportquiz");
	new dtext[256], qtext[128];
	if(PPW_A[playerid] <= 2)
	{
		switch(PPQ_Q[playerid])
		{
		    case 1:
		    {
				qtext = "Los Santos City Hall is found in what part of town?";
				dtext = "Idlewood\r\nVinewood\r\nEast Beach\r\nPersing Square";
				PPQ_Q[playerid] = 1;
			}
			case 2:
			{
			    qtext = "When a cop pulls you over, what do you do?";
			    dtext = "Run away as fast as possible\r\nDo whatever I feel is right\r\nStop for the officer and obey the laws\r\nNothing, Im too cool to be pulled over";
			    PPQ_Q[playerid] = 2;
			}
			case 3:
			{
				qtext = "If you need to find your way around the city, what should you do?";
				dtext = "Beg people to show me\r\nWonder aimlessly until I find what I need\r\nBuy and use a /gps\r\nAsk everyone possible until I find what I need";
			    PPQ_Q[playerid] = 3;
			}
			case 4:
			{

				qtext = "If I crash my car into another person driving";
				dtext = "Keep driving and get the hell out of there\r\nGet out, and address the accident with the other person\r\nGive them lots and lots of money\r\nKill them.";
			    PPQ_Q[playerid] = 4;
			}
			case 5:
			{
				qtext = "Violence in the city";
				dtext = "Will not be tolerated\r\nSounds like it's needed\r\nIs withing my rights as a citzen\r\nIS AWESOME!";
			    PPQ_Q[playerid] = 5;
			}
		}
		ShowServerDialog(playerid,PPQ_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, qtext, dtext, "Okay", "Cancel");
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "__________________YOU FAILED__________________");
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Sorry, but you failed the passport test.");
	}
	LogCallback("passportquiz");
	return 1;
}

stock GetPlayerSpeed(playerid,bool:kmh)
{
	LogCallback("GetPlayerSpeed");
    new Float:cPos[4];
    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	GetVehicleVelocity(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),cPos[0],cPos[1],cPos[2]);
	else GetPlayerVelocity(playerid,cPos[0],cPos[1],cPos[2]);
    cPos[3] = floatsqroot(floatabs(floatpower(cPos[0] + cPos[1] + cPos[2],2)));
	LogCallback("GetPlayerSpeed");
    return kmh?floatround(cPos[3] * 100 * 1.61):floatround(cPos[3] * 100);
}

stock right(source[], len)
{
	LogCallback("right");
	new retval[MAX_STRING], srclen;
	srclen = strlen(source);
	strmid(retval, source, srclen - len, srclen, MAX_STRING);
	LogCallback("right");
	return retval;
}

stock HasSeatbelts(carid)//Vehicles that have seatbelts
{
	LogCallback("HasSeatbelts");
	switch(carid)
	{
		case 400 .. 447: return 1;
		case 451: return 1;
		case 455 .. 460: return 1;
		case 466 .. 467: return 1;
		case 469 .. 470: return 1;
		case 474 .. 480: return 1;
		case 482 .. 483: return 1;
		case 489 .. 492: return 1;
		case 494 .. 496: return 1;
		case 498 .. 500: return 1;
		case 502 .. 508: return 1;
		case 514 .. 518: return 1;
		case 524 .. 529: return 1;
		case 533 .. 536: return 1;
		case 540 .. 547: return 1;
		case 549 .. 552: return 1;
		case 554 .. 562: return 1;
		case 565 .. 568: return 1;
		case 573 .. 576: return 1;
		case 578 .. 583: return 1;
		case 585: return 1;
		case 587 .. 589: return 1;
		case 596 .. 605: return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("HasSeatBelts");
	return 0;
}



stock IsARentableVeh(carid)
{
	LogCallback("IsARentableVeh");
	for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(rentveh); i++)
	{
	    if(carid == rentveh[i]) return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsARentableVeh");
	return 0;
}

stock IsAtCandySprunk(playerid)
{
   	LogCallback("IsAtCandySprunk");
	for(new c = 0; c < sizeof(SprunkMachine); c++)
	{
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, SprunkMachine[c][0], SprunkMachine[c][1], SprunkMachine[c][2])) return 1;
		else return 0;
	}
	LogCallback("IsAtCandySprunk");
	return 1;
}

stock IsAtClothShop(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("IsAtClothesShop");
	for(new s = 0; s < sizeof(ClothesShop); s++)
	{
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 50.0, ClothesShop[s][0], ClothesShop[s][1], ClothesShop[s][2])) return 1;
	}
   	LogCallback("IsAtClothesShop");
	return 0;
}

stock IsAtGasStation(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("IsAtGasStation");
	for(new g = 0; g < sizeof(GasStation); g++)
	{
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15.0, GasStation[g][0], GasStation[g][1], GasStation[g][2])) return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsAtGasStation");
	return 0;
}

stock IsAtFishPlace(playerid)
{
   	LogCallback("IsAtFishPlace");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 403.8266,-2088.7598,7.8359) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 398.7553,-2088.7490,7.8359)) return 1;
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 396.2197,-2088.6692,7.8359) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 391.1094,-2088.7976,7.8359)) return 1;
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 383.4157,-2088.7849,7.8359) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 374.9598,-2088.7979,7.8359)) return 1;
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 369.8107,-2088.7927,7.8359) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 367.3637,-2088.7925,7.8359)) return 1;
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 362.2244,-2088.7981,7.8359) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 354.5382,-2088.7979,7.8359)) return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsAtFishPlace");
	return 0;
}

stock IsAtCookPlace(playerid)
{
   	LogCallback("IsAtCookPlace");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.0 ,369.9786,-4.0798,1001.8589)) return 1;
	    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.0 ,376.4466,-60.9574,1001.5078) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.0 ,378.1215,-57.4928,1001.5078)) return 1;
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.0 ,374.1185,-113.6361,1001.4922) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.0 ,377.7971,-113.7668,1001.4922)) return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsAtCookPlace");
	return 0;
}

stock IsAtBar(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("IsAtBar");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 4.0,495.7801,-76.0305,998.7578) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 4.0,499.9654,-20.2515,1000.6797)) return 1;
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 4.0,1215.9480,-13.3519,1000.9219) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10.0,-2658.9749,1407.4136,906.2734)) return 1;
 		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 4.0,968.7739,-46.6145,1001.1172) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10.0,968.7739,-46.6145,1001.1172)) return 1;
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 4.0,-791.016,512.249,1336.41) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10.0,-799.122,520.988,1336.41)) return 1;
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10.0,681.4664,-456.2486,-25.6099)) return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsAtBar");
	return 0;
}

stock IsAEMSHC(playerid)
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
	    switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank])
	    {
	        case 6 .. 7: return 1;
	        case 11 .. 14: return 1;
	    }
	}
	return 0;
}
stock IsACopHC(playerid)
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
	    switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank])
	    {
	        case 10 .. 14: return 1;
	    }
	}
	return 0;
}
stock IsACopCar(carid)
{
	LogCallback("IsACopCar");
	switch(CarInfo[carid][cWcart])
	{
		case 9 .. 10: return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsACopCar");
	return 0;
}
stock IsAEmsCar(carid)
{
	LogCallback("IsAEmsCar");
	switch(CarInfo[carid][cWcart])
	{
	    case 11: return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsAEmsCar");
	return 0;
}
stock IsABike(carid)
{
	LogCallback("IsABike");
	if(IsModelABike(carid))
	{
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsABike");
	return 0;
}
stock MySQLLog(string[])
{
	LogCallback("MySQLLog");
	new entry[2500];
	format(entry, sizeof(entry), "\r\n%s",string);
	new File:hFile;
	hFile = fopen("LARP/Logs/mysql.log", io_append);
	fwrite(hFile, entry);
	fclose(hFile);
	LogCallback("MySQLLog");
}

stock MySQLSaveLog(string[])
{
	LogCallback("MySQLSaveLog");
	new entry[300],y,m,d,h,mi,s;
	getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
	format(entry, sizeof(entry), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s\r\n",d,m,y,h,mi,s,string);
	new File:hFile;
	hFile = fopen("LARP/Logs/mysql-saves.log", io_append);
	fwrite(hFile, entry);
	fclose(hFile);
	LogCallback("MySQLSaveLog");
}

stock PayLog(string[])
{
	LogCallback("PayLog");
	new entry[200];
	format(entry, sizeof(entry), "%s\r\n",string);
	new File:hFile;
	hFile = fopen("LARP/Logs/pay.log", io_append);
	fwrite(hFile, entry);
	fclose(hFile);

stock ReportLog(string[])
{
	LogCallback("ReportLog");
	new entry[200];
	format(entry, sizeof(entry), "%s\r\n",string);
	new File:hFile;
	hFile = fopen("LARP/Logs/reports.log", io_append);
	fwrite(hFile, entry);
	fclose(hFile);
	LogCallback("ReportLog");
}

stock LogCallback(string[])
{
/*	new entry[128];
	new h,m,s,day,month,year;
	gettime(h,m,s);
	getdate(day,month,year);
	format(entry,sizeof(entry),"[%d:%d:%d][%d/%d/%d]:%s",h,m,s,month,day,year,string);
	new File:hFile;
	hFile = fopen("LARP/Logs/callbacks.txt",io_append);
	fwrite(hFile,entry);
	fclose(hFile);
	new h,m,s,day,month,year;
	gettime(h,m,s);
	getdate(day,month,year);
	printf("[%d:%d:%d][%d/%d/%d]:%s",h,m,s,month,day,year,string);*/

}
