stock ClearChatbox(playerid, lines)
{
	LogCallback("ClearChatBox");
	if (IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		for(new i=0; i<lines; i++)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " ");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("ClearChatBox");
	return 1;
}



stock strvalEx( const string[] ) // fix for strval-bug with > 50 letters.
{
	LogCallback("strvalEx");
	// written by mabako in less than a minute :X
	if( strlen( string ) >= 50 ) return 0; // It will just return 0 if the string is too long
	LogCallback("strvalEx");
	return strval(string);
}
stock SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, Float:armour)
{
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerArmour");
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pArmour] = armour;
	SetPlayerArmour(playerid, armour);
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerArmour");
	return 1;
}
stock SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, money)
{
	LogCallback("SafeGivePlayerMoney");
    Cash[playerid] += money;
    ResetMoneyBar(playerid);//Resets the money in the original moneybar, Do not remove!
    UpdateMoneyBar(playerid,Cash[playerid]);//Sets the money in the moneybar to the serverside cash, Do not remove!
	LogCallback("SafeGivePlayerMoney");
    return Cash[playerid];
}
stock SafeSetPlayerMoney(playerid, money)
{
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerMoney");
    Cash[playerid] = money;
    ResetMoneyBar(playerid);//Resets the money in the original moneybar, Do not remove!
    UpdateMoneyBar(playerid,Cash[playerid]);//Sets the money in the moneybar to the serverside cash, Do not remove!
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerMoney");
    return Cash[playerid];
}
stock SafeResetPlayerCash(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("SafeResetPlayerCash");
    Cash[playerid] = 0;
    ResetMoneyBar(playerid);//Resets the money in the original moneybar, Do not remove!
    UpdateMoneyBar(playerid,Cash[playerid]);//Sets the money in the moneybar to the serverside cash, Do not remove!
	LogCallback("SafeResetPlayerCash");
    return Cash[playerid];
}
stock GetPlayerCash(playerid)
{
    return Cash[playerid];
}

stock SafeSetPlayerInterior(plyid, interiorid)
{
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerInterior");
	SetPlayerInterior(plyid, interiorid);
	PlayerInfo[plyid][pInt] = interiorid;

	if(interiorid == 0)
	{
		PlayerInfo[plyid][pInteriorNr] = 0;

		if(HouseEntered[plyid] != 9999)
	 		HouseEntered[plyid] = 9999;

	    if(BizzEntered[plyid] != 9999)
	 		BizzEntered[plyid] = 9999;
	}
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerInterior");
	return 1;
}

stock IsPlayerOnSpecialAction(playerid) // By CuervO
{
	LogCallback("IsPlayerOnSpecialAction");
	if(GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) >= 1 && GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) <= 8 || GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) >= 10 && GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) <= 13 || GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) >= 20 && GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) <= 23)
 	{
 	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("IsPlayerOnSpecialAction");
	return 0;
}

/****** MACRO FUNCTIONS ******/
IsKeyJustDown(key, newkeys, oldkeys)
{
	LogCallback("IsKeyJustDown");
	if((newkeys & key) && !(oldkeys & key)) return 1;
	LogCallback("IsKeyJustDown");
	return 0;
}

OnePlayAnim(playerid,animlib[],animname[], Float:Speed, looping, lockx, locky, lockz, lp)
{
	LogCallback("OnePlayAnim");
	if(Dead[playerid] != -1) return 1;
	if(gPlayerUsingLoopingAnim[playerid] == 1) TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,txtAnimHelper);
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, animlib, animname, Speed, looping, lockx, locky, lockz, lp);
	animation[playerid]++;
	LogCallback("OnePlayAnim");
	return 1;
}

StopLoopingAnim(playerid)
{
	if(Fell[playerid] == -1)
	{
		LogCallback("StopLoopingAnim");
		gPlayerUsingLoopingAnim[playerid] = 0;
	    ApplyAnimation(playerid, "CARRY", "crry_prtial", 4.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
		LogCallback("StopLoopingAnim");
	}
}

PreloadAnimLib(playerid, animlib[])
{
	LogCallback("PreloadAnimLib");
	ApplyAnimation(playerid,animlib,"null",0.0,0,0,0,0,0);
	LogCallback("PreloadAnimLib");
}

LoopingAnim(playerid,animlib[],animname[], Float:Speed, looping, lockx, locky, lockz, lp)
{
	LogCallback("LoopingAnim");
	if(Dead[playerid] != -1) return 1;
	gPlayerUsingLoopingAnim[playerid] = 1;
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, animlib, animname, Speed, looping, lockx, locky, lockz, lp);
	TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,txtAnimHelper);
	LogCallback("LoopingAnim");
	return 1;
}

GPN(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("GPN");
    new sendername[24];
    GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, 24);
	LogCallback("GPN");
    return sendername;

}

/*stock WeaponHackBan(playerid, weaponid)
{
	wSus[playerid] += 1;
	wSusTime[playerid] = repeat ClearSus(playerid);
	switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
	{
		case 1 .. 3:
		{
			switch(weaponid)
			{
				case 9, 16 .. 18, 34..40:
			    {
					new string[128], wname[32];
					GetWeaponName(weaponid, wname,sizeof(wname));
					format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has been banned for Weapon Hacking(%s)", GPN(playerid), wname);
					SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED, string);
					SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
					ClearWepVariables(playerid);
					ScriptBan(playerid, 999, string);
					return 1;
				}
				case 29 .. 31:
			    {
					new string[128], wname[32];
					GetWeaponName(weaponid, wname,sizeof(wname));
					format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has been banned for Weapon Hacking(%s)", GPN(playerid), wname);
					SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED, string);
					SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
					ClearWepVariables(playerid);
					ScriptBan(playerid, 999, string);
					return 1;
				}
			    case 34 .. 40:
			    {
					new string[128], wname[32];
					GetWeaponName(weaponid, wname,sizeof(wname));
					format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has been banned for Weapon Hacking(%s)", GPN(playerid), wname);
					SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED, string);
					SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
					ClearWepVariables(playerid);
					ScriptBan(playerid, 999, string);
					return 1;
				}
				case 44 .. 45:
			    {
					new string[128], wname[32];
					GetWeaponName(weaponid, wname,sizeof(wname));
					format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has been banned for Weapon Hacking(%s)", GPN(playerid), wname);
					SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED, string);
					SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
					ClearWepVariables(playerid);
					ScriptBan(playerid, 999, string);
					return 1;
				}
				default:
				{
					if(wSus[playerid] >= 5)
				    {
						new string[128], wname[32];
						GetWeaponName(weaponid, wname,sizeof(wname));
						format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has been banned for Weapon Hacking(%s)", GPN(playerid), wname);
						SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED, string);
						SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
						ClearWepVariables(playerid);
						ScriptBan(playerid, 999, string);
						return 1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		default: { return 1; }
	}
	return 1;
}*/
stock SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid,weaponid,ammo)
{
	Weapon[playerid][GetWeaponSlot(weaponid)] = weaponid;
	Ammo[playerid][GetWeaponSlot(weaponid)] += ammo;
	GivePlayerWeapon(playerid,weaponid,ammo);
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < 2)
	{
	    SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
	}
	return 1;
}
stock SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("SafeResetPlayerWeapons");
	ResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
	for(new i = 0; i < 13; i++)
	{
		Weapon[playerid][i] = 0;
		Ammo[playerid][i] = 0;
	}
	LogCallback("SafeResetPlayerWeapon");
	return 1;
}
stock ClearWepVariables(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ClearWepVariables");
	for(new i = 0; i < 13; i++)
	{
		Weapon[playerid][i] = 0;
		Ammo[playerid][i] = 0;
	}
	LogCallback("ClearWepVariables");
	return 1;
}

stock SaveGuns(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("SaveGuns");
	new wep[12], ammo[12];
    for(new slot = 0; slot != 12; slot++)
    {
     	GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, slot, wep[slot], ammo[slot]);
      	if(wep[slot] != 0 && ammo[slot] != 0)
       	{
			if(wep[slot] != 46)
			{
			    if(Weapon[playerid][slot] == wep[slot])
	       	    {
	       	        if(ammo[slot] > Ammo[playerid][slot])
	       	        {
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWeapon][slot] == 0)
						{
		       	            PlayerInfo[playerid][pWeapon][slot] = wep[slot];
		       	            PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmo][slot] = Ammo[playerid][slot];
		       	        }
	       	        }
	       	        else
	       	        {
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWeapon][slot] == 0)
						{
		       	            PlayerInfo[playerid][pWeapon][slot] = wep[slot];
		       	            PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmo][slot] = ammo[slot];
		       	        }
	       	        }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("SaveGuns");
	return 1;
}
stock GetWeaponSlot(weaponid)
{
	LogCallback("GetWeaponSlot");
	new slot;
	switch(weaponid)
	{
		case 0,1: slot = 0;
		case 2 .. 9: slot = 1;
		case 10 .. 15: slot = 10;
		case 16 .. 18, 39: slot = 8;
		case 22 .. 24: slot =2;
		case 25 .. 27: slot = 3;
		case 28, 29, 32: slot = 4;
		case 30, 31: slot = 5;
		case 33, 34: slot = 6;
		case 35 .. 38: slot = 7;
		case 40: slot = 12;
		case 41 .. 43: slot = 9;
		case 44 .. 46: slot = 11;
	}
	LogCallback("GetWeaponSlot");
	return slot;
}


GetClosestVehicle(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("GetClosestVehicle");
	new Float:x, Float:y, Float:z;
	new Float:dist, Float:vdist=8, clveh;
	for(new i=1; i < MAX_VEHICLES; i++)
	{
		if(GetVehiclePos(i, x, y, z))
		{
			dist = GetPlayerDistanceFromPoint(playerid, x, y, z);
			if(dist < vdist)
			{
				vdist = dist;
				clveh = i;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("GetClosestVehicle");
	return clveh;
}

ResetJobVehicle(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ResetJobVehicle");
	for(new v; v < MAX_VEHICLES; v++)
	{
		if(CarInfo[v][cWcar] == playerid)
		{
			TruckPackages[v] = 0;
			CarInfo[v][cWcar] = -1;
			CarInfo[v][cWcart] = 0;
			CarInfo[v][cLocked] = 0;
			DestroyVehicle(v);
			break;
		}
	}
	GarbageTruck[playerid] = -1;
	ScrapTruck[playerid] = -1;
	sPWeight[playerid] = 0;
	TruckerVeh[playerid] = -1;
	MechTruck[playerid] = -1;
	PizzaBike[playerid] = -1;
	FarmerVeh[playerid] = -1;
	TaxiCab[playerid] = -1;
	Mower[playerid] = -1;
	LogCallback("ResetJobVehicle");
	return 1;
}

StopWorking(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("StopWorking");
	if(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] != 0)
	{
		JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
	}
	if(ScrapTruck[playerid] != -1)
	{
		DPCP(playerid);
		JobCP[playerid] = 0;
		stop jobtimer[playerid];
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]] = 0;
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your scrapper job was ended.");
		DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, ScrapObject[playerid][0]);
		DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, ScrapObject[playerid][1]);
		JobCP[playerid] = -1;
		Scrapping[playerid] = 0;
		return 1;
	}
	switch(JobCP[playerid])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			DPCP(playerid);
			JobCP[playerid] = -1;
			Scrapping[playerid] = 0;
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]] = 0;
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, ScrapObject[playerid][0]);
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, ScrapObject[playerid][1]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your scrapper job was ended.");
			return 1;
		}
	}
    switch(LawnMower[playerid])
	{
		case 1 .. 15:
        {
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, grassspot[playerid]); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1); DPCP(playerid);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your Lawn Mower job was ended.");
			LawnMower[playerid] = 0;
			return 1;
		}
	}
	if(GarbageMan[playerid] > 0)
	{
	    hasTrash[playerid] = false;
	    GarbageMan[playerid] = 0;
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1); DPCP(playerid);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
		RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,4);
		KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);

	}
	switch(PizzaBoy[playerid])
	{
		case 1 .. 16:
		{
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			SetPlayerSkin(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pChar]);
			PizzaBoy[playerid] = 0; DPCP(playerid); RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,3);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your Pizza Boy job was ended.");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	switch(Farming[playerid])
	{
		case 1 .. 41:
		{
			DPCP(playerid);
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,1);
			DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid);
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, crop[playerid]);
			HasHarvest[playerid] = 0;
			Farming[playerid] = 0;
			FarmSeeds[playerid] = 0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][0] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][1] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][2] = 100.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][0] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][1] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][2] = 100.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][0] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][1] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][2] = 100.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][0] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][1] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][2] = 100.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][0] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][1] = 0.0;
			Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][2] = 100.0;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your Farmer job was ended.");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	switch(Trucking[playerid])
	{
		case 1 .. 30:
		{
			DPCP(playerid);
			HasBox[playerid] = 0;
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			Trucking[playerid] = 0;
			IsTrucking[playerid] = false;
			TruckerType[playerid] = 0;
			LoadingTruck[playerid] = 0;
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
			RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,1);
			RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,4);
			RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,3);
			//TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]] = 0;
			//strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], "Nothing", 0, strlen("Nothing"), 255);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your trucker job was ended.");
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, DrugBag[playerid]);
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, DrugPlane[playerid]);
			return 1;
		}
	}
	if(TaxiDuty[playerid] != 0 || TaxiFare[playerid] != 0)
	{
		DPCP(playerid);
		TakeTaxi[playerid] = 0; TaxiFare[playerid] = 0; TaxiDuty[playerid] = 0;
		TaxiPass[playerid] = -1; FareMeter[playerid] = 0;
		SetPlayerColor(playerid, 0xFFFFFF00);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your taxi job was ended.");
		return 1;
	}
	if(MatRunning[playerid] != -1)
	{
		stop jobtimer[playerid];
		JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
		MatRunning[playerid] = -1; DPCP(playerid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your mat running job was ended.");
		return 1;
	}
	if(MechDuty[playerid] >= 1)
	{
		DPCP(playerid);
		stop jobtimer[playerid];
		JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
		HasParts[playerid] = 0;
		RepairStage[playerid] = 0;
		TakeRepair[playerid] = 999;
		RepairID[playerid] = -1;
		MechPrice[playerid] = -1;
		MechanicID[playerid] = -1;
		MechDuty[playerid] = 0;
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your mechanic job was ended.");
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("StopWorking");
    return 1;
}

FWSelectSkin(playerid, skin)
{
	LogCallback("FWSelectSkin");
	new string[128];
	switch(skin)
	{
		case 1 .. 69,72,75 .. 263, 290 .. 298: skin += 1;
		case 70: skin = 72;
		case 73: skin = 75;
		case 264: skin = 290;
		case 299: skin = 1;
	}
	SetPlayerSkin(playerid, skin);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "SKIN ID: %d", skin);
	PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, SkinSelectTD[playerid], string);
	LogCallback("FWSelectSkin");
	return 1;
}

BWSelectSkin(playerid, skin)
{
	LogCallback("BWSelectSkin");
	new string[128];
	switch(skin)
	{
		case 1: skin = 299;
		case 2 .. 70, 76 .. 264, 291 .. 299: skin -= 1;
		case 73: skin = 70;
		case 75: skin = 73;
		case 290: skin = 264;
	}
	SetPlayerSkin(playerid, skin);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "SKIN ID: %d", skin);
	PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, SkinSelectTD[playerid], string);
	LogCallback("BWSelectSkin");
	return 1;
}

stock SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, Float:X, Float:Y, Float:Z, Float:S, markertype = -1,color = 0)
{
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint");
	PlayerCP[playerid][0] = X;
	PlayerCP[playerid][1] = Y;
	PlayerCP[playerid][2] = Z;
	PlayerCP[playerid][3] = S;
	PlayerCPA[playerid] = 1;
	SetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, X, Y, Z, S);

	if(markertype != 0)
	{
		SetPlayerMapIcon(playerid,87,X,Y,Z,markertype,color,1);
	}
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint");
	return 1;
}

stock DPCP(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("DPCP");
	if(PlayerCPA[playerid] != 1) return 0;
	PlayerCP[playerid][0] = 0.0;
	PlayerCP[playerid][1] = 0.0;
	PlayerCP[playerid][2] = 0.0;
	PlayerCP[playerid][3] = 0.0;
	PlayerCPA[playerid] = 0;
	DisablePlayerCheckpoint(playerid);
	RemovePlayerMapIcon(playerid,87);
	LogCallback("DPCP");
	return 1;
}

/****** PUBLIC FUNCTIONS ******/
public HotwiringVehicle(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("HotwiringVehicle");
	new E,L,A,D,H,T,O,string[128];
	HotWired[playerid] = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s has hotwired the vehicle and turned the engine on.", GPN(playerid));
	ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "* Vehicle engine starts (( %s )).", GPN(playerid));
	ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
	SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
	KillTimer(HotWireTime[playerid]);
	HotWireTime[playerid] = -1;
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pToolKit] -= 1;
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pToolKit])
	{
		case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Your tools are busted, and you must purchase a new tool kit"); }
		case 1 .. 4:
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "You may use this tool kit %d times before the tools are busted", PlayerInfo[playerid][pToolKit]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("HotwiringVehicle");
	return 1;
}

public EngineStart(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("EngineStart");
	new E,L,A,D,H,T,O,string[128];
	GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
	SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "* Vehicle engine starts (( %s )).", GPN(playerid));
	ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	KillTimer(EngTimer[playerid]);
	EngTimer[playerid] = -1;
	LogCallback("EngineStart");
	return 1;
}
public Streamer(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("Streamer");
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	LogCallback("Streamer");
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerClickPlayerTextDraw(playerid, PlayerText:playertextid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerClickPlayerTextDraw");
	if(playertextid == DealerLEFTAR[playerid])
	{
		new string[128];
		switch(DealerID[playerid])
		{
			case 1:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 0) { CurrentCar[playerid] = 64; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][0],-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] -= 1;
			}
			case 2:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 0) { CurrentCar[playerid] = 11; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][0],-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] -= 1;
			}
			case 3:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 0) { CurrentCar[playerid] = 10; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][0],-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] -= 1;
			}
			case 4:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 0) { CurrentCar[playerid] = 7; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][0],-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] -= 1;
			}
			case 5:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 0) {CurrentCar[playerid] = 7; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid] -1][0],2963.2693, -1493.1260, 0.0032,135,1,1,1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid],playerid);
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]-1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] -= 1;
			}
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(playertextid == DealerRIGHTAR[playerid])
	{
		new string[128];
		switch(DealerID[playerid])
		{
			case 1:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 63) { CurrentCar[playerid] = -1; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][0], -1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] += 1;
			}
			case 2:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 10) { CurrentCar[playerid] = -1; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][0], -1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] += 1;
			}
			case 3:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 9) { CurrentCar[playerid] = -1; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][0], -1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] += 1;
			}
			case 4:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 6) { CurrentCar[playerid] = -1; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][0], -1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] += 1;
			}
			case 5:
			{
				DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
				if(CurrentCar[playerid] == 6) { CurrentCar[playerid] = -1; }
				DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][0], 2963.2693, -1493.1260, 0.0032,135,1,1,1);
				SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid],playerid);
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][1]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]+1][2]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
				CurrentCar[playerid] += 1;
			}
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(playertextid == DealerRotL[playerid])
	{
		switch(DSCamMove[playerid])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1941.7969, 265.3750, 41.5000);
				SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173);
				DSCamMove[playerid] = 1;
			}
			case 1:
			{
				SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1943.8018,255.1029,42.0471);
				SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173);
				DSCamMove[playerid] = 2;
			}
			case 2:
			{
				SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1953.6664,255.2928,42.0471);
				SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173);
				DSCamMove[playerid] = 3;
			}
			case 3:
			{
				SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1955.0258,267.1331,42.0471);
				SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173);
				DSCamMove[playerid] = 0;
			}
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(playertextid == DealerRotR[playerid])
	{
		switch(DSCamMove[playerid])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1953.6664,255.2928,42.0471);
				SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173);
				DSCamMove[playerid] = 3;
			}
			case 1:
			{
				SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1955.0258,267.1331,42.0471);
				SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173);
				DSCamMove[playerid] = 0;
			}
			case 2:
			{
				SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1941.7969, 265.3750, 41.5000);
				SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173);
				DSCamMove[playerid] = 1;
			}
			case 3:
			{
				SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1943.8018,255.1029,42.0471);
				SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173);
				DSCamMove[playerid] = 2;
			}
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(playertextid == DealerEXIT[playerid])
	{
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
		SetPlayerPos(playerid, DSIcons[DealerID[playerid]-1][0],DSIcons[DealerID[playerid]-1][1],DSIcons[DealerID[playerid]-1][2]);
		SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
		DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerBGTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerLEFTAR[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRIGHTAR[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerBUY[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerEXIT[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRotate[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRotL[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRotR[playerid]);
		CancelSelectTextDraw(playerid);
		DealerCar[playerid] = -1;
		CurrentCar[playerid] = -1;
		DealerID[playerid] = -1;
		return 1;
	}
	if(playertextid == DealerBUY[playerid])
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] == 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't own a car until level 2. Rent one for now or take a taxi!");

		new price;
		switch(DealerID[playerid])
		{
			case 1: { price = CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]; }
			case 2: { price = GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]; }
			case 3: { price = BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]; }
			case 4: { price = VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]; }
			case 5: { price = BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]; }
		}

		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
		{
			case 0: { if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < price) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You do not have enough money for this car!"); }
			case 1: { if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < price / 100 * 95) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You do not have enough money for this car!"); }
			case 2: { if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < price / 100 * 90) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You do not have enough money for this car!"); }
			case 3: { if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < price / 100 * 85) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You do not have enough money for this car!"); }
			case 4: { if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < price / 100 * 75) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You do not have enough money for this car!"); }
		}

		new
			d = DealerID[playerid]-1,
			L,A,D,H,T,O,
			string[128],
			y,m,da,
			cmodel[128]
		;
		SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] == 0 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] == 9999)
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] = GetVehicleModel(DealerCar[playerid]);
			switch(DealerID[playerid])
			{
				case 1: { pC1[playerid] = CreateVehicle(CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 2: { pC1[playerid] = CreateVehicle(GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 3: { pC1[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 4: { pC1[playerid] = CreateVehicle(VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 5: { pC1[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
			}
			PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, pC1[playerid], 0);
			CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cUid] = playerid;
			for(new i = 0; i < 10; i++)
			{
				CarInfo[pC1[playerid]][cGunTrunk][i]  = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1GunTrunk][i];
				CarInfo[pC1[playerid]][cTrunkAmmo][i] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][i];
			}
			switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
			{
				case 0: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice1] = price; }
				case 1: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 95); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice1] = price / 100 * 95; }
				case 2: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 90); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice1] = price / 100 * 90; }
				case 3: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 85); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice1] = price / 100 * 85; }
				case 4: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 75); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice1] = price / 100 * 75; }
			}
			SetVehicleParamsEx(pC1[playerid],1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			getdate(y,m,d); GetVehicleName(pC1[playerid], cmodel, sizeof(cmodel));
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[%d/%d/%d] %s purchased a %s for $%d", m,da,y,GPN(playerid),cmodel,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice1]);
			CarLog(string);
		}
		else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] == 0 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] == 9999)
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] = GetVehicleModel(DealerCar[playerid]);
			switch(DealerID[playerid])
			{
				case 1: { pC2[playerid] = CreateVehicle(CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 2: { pC2[playerid] = CreateVehicle(GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 3: { pC2[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 4: { pC2[playerid] = CreateVehicle(VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 5: { pC2[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
			}
			PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, pC2[playerid], 0);
			CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cUid] = playerid;
			for(new i = 0; i < 10; i++)
			{
				CarInfo[pC2[playerid]][cGunTrunk][i]  = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2GunTrunk][i];
				CarInfo[pC2[playerid]][cTrunkAmmo][i] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][i];
			}
			switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
			{
				case 0: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice2] = price; }
				case 1: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 95); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice2] = price / 100 * 95; }
				case 2: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 90); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice2] = price / 100 * 90; }
				case 3: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 85); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice2] = price / 100 * 85; }
				case 4: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 75); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice2] = price / 100 * 75; }
			}
			SetVehicleParamsEx(pC2[playerid],1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			getdate(y,m,d); GetVehicleName(pC2[playerid], cmodel, sizeof(cmodel));
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[%d/%d/%d] %s purchased a %s for $%d", m,da,y,GPN(playerid),cmodel,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice2]);
			CarLog(string);
		}
		else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] >= 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar] == 9999)
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar] = GetVehicleModel(DealerCar[playerid]);
			switch(DealerID[playerid])
			{
				case 1: { pC3[playerid] = CreateVehicle(CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 2: { pC3[playerid] = CreateVehicle(GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 3: { pC3[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
				case 4: { pC3[playerid] = CreateVehicle(VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
                case 5: { pC3[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][0],DSSpawns[d][0],DSSpawns[d][1],DSSpawns[d][2],DSSpawns[d][3],1,1,-1); }
			}
			PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, pC3[playerid], 0);
			CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cUid] = playerid;
			for(new i = 0; i < 10; i++)
			{
				CarInfo[pC3[playerid]][cGunTrunk][i]  = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3GunTrunk][i];
				CarInfo[pC3[playerid]][cTrunkAmmo][i] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][i];
			}
			switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
			{
				case 3: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 85); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice3] = price / 100 * 85; }
				case 4: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price / 100 * 75); PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice3] = price / 100 * 75; }
			}
			SetVehicleParamsEx(pC3[playerid],1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			getdate(y,m,d); GetVehicleName(pC3[playerid], cmodel, sizeof(cmodel));
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[%d/%d/%d] %s purchased a %s for $%d", m,da,y,GPN(playerid),cmodel,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPrice3]);
			CarLog(string);
		}
		else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have any car slots available at this time");
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
		DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerBGTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerLEFTAR[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRIGHTAR[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerBUY[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerEXIT[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRotate[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRotL[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRotR[playerid]);
		CancelSelectTextDraw(playerid);
		CurrentCar[playerid] = -1;
		DealerCar[playerid] = -1;
		DealerID[playerid] = -1;
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Congratulations on your purchase! Make sure you /vpark the car to save it's location");
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerClickPlayerTextdraw");
    return 1;
}
public CopCarRemoval(vehicleid)
{
	LogCallback("CopCarRemoval");
	KillTimer(CarTimer[vehicleid]);
	DestroyVehicle(vehicleid);
	strmid(CarInfo[vehicleid][cOwner],"None",0,6);
	CarInfo[vehicleid][cWcart] = 0;
	CarInfo[vehicleid][cOID] = -1;
	LogCallback("CopCarRemoval");
	return 1;
}
public EmsCarRemoval(vehicleid)
{
	LogCallback("EmsCarRemoval");
	KillTimer(CarTimer[vehicleid]);
	DestroyVehicle(vehicleid);
	strmid(CarInfo[vehicleid][cOwner],"None",0,6);
	CarInfo[vehicleid][cWcart] = 0;
	CarInfo[vehicleid][cOID] = -1;
	LogCallback("EmsCarRemoval");
	return 1;
}
public JobBarUpdate(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("JobBarUpdate");
	switch(BarType[playerid])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			switch(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					BarType[playerid] = 0; jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
				}
				case 1 .. 5:
				{
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid], GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) + 20.0);
					UpdatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] -= 1;
				}
			}
		}
		case 2:
		{
			switch(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					BarType[playerid] = 0; jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
				}
				case 1 .. 10:
				{
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid], GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) + 10.0);
					UpdatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] -= 1;
				}
			}
		}
		case 3:
		{
			switch(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					BarType[playerid] = 0; jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
				}
				case 1 .. 25:
				{
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid], GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) + 4.0);
					UpdatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] -= 1;
				}
			}
		}
		case 4:
		{
			switch(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					BarType[playerid] = 0; jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
				}
				case 1 .. 35:
				{
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid], GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) + 2.87);
					UpdatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] -= 1;
				}
			}
		}
		case 5:
		{
			switch(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					BarType[playerid] = 0; jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
				}
				case 1 .. 45:
				{
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid], GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) + 2.22);
					UpdatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] -= 1;
				}
			}
		}
		case 6:
		{
			switch(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					BarType[playerid] = 0; jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
				}
				case 1 .. 3:
				{
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid], GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) + 33.3333);
					UpdatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] -= 1;
				}
			}
		}
		case 7:
		{
			switch(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					BarType[playerid] = 0; jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
				}
				case 1 .. 180:
				{
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid], GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) + 0.5555);
					UpdatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] -= 1;
				}
			}
		}
		case 8:
		{
			switch(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					BarType[playerid] = 0; jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
				}
				case 1 .. 90:
				{
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid], GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) + 1.1111);
					UpdatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] -= 1;
				}
			}
		}
		case 9:
		{
			switch(JobCountdownSeconds[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					BarType[playerid] = 0; jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
				}
				case 1 .. 60:
				{
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid], GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) + 1.6666);
					UpdatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] -= 1;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("JobBarUpdate");
	return 1;
}
public SetSkins(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("SetSkins");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pChar] >= 1)
	{
		SetPlayerSkin(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pChar]);
	}
	else
	{
		if(HasDied[playerid] == 1)
		{
			SetPlayerSkin(playerid, SpawnModelSkin[playerid]);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel] = GetPlayerSkin(playerid);
			HasDied[playerid] = 0;
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
		    SetPlayerSkin(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel]);
            SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("SetSkins");
	return 1;
}
public closepdgate(playerid) //---JOSH PD---//
{
	LogCallback("closepdgate");
	if(pdmainstatus == 1) {
		MoveDynamicObject(pdmaingate,1170.41223, -1349.65405, 10.74350, 0.8);
		pdmainstatus = 0;
		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1851.72, -1722.17, 10.97);
	}
	else if(pdsidestatus == 1) {
		MoveDynamicObject(pdsidegate,  1129.28992, -1294.43860, 8.23530, 0.8);
		pdsidestatus = 0;
		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1862.01, -1624.97, 13.68);
	}
	else if(pdsideparkstatus == 1) {
		MoveDynamicObject(pdsideparkgate,1072.17395, -1340.29358, 14.22520, 0.8);
		pdsideparkstatus = 0;
		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1907.62, -1681.52, 8.51);
	}
	LogCallback("closepdgate");
	return 1;
}
public closeemsgate(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("closeemsgate");
    if(emsfrontstatus == 1)
	{
		MoveDynamicObject(emsfrontgate, 1232.82385, -1366.24414, 12.37280, 0.8);
		emsfrontstatus = 0;
		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1851.72, -1722.17, 10.97);
	}
	else if(emsbackstatus == 1)
	{
	    emsbackstatus = 0;
		MoveDynamicObject(emsbackgate,1228.35510, -1318.34387, 12.37900, 0.8);
		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1862.01, -1624.97, 13.68);
	}
	LogCallback("closeemsgate");
	return 1;
}
public ExtortionBiz(bizid, money)
{
	LogCallback("ExtortionBiz");
    new string[128];
    format(string, sizeof(string), "No-one");
    if(strcmp(BizzInfo[bizid][bExtortion],string, true ) == 0 )
	{
	    return 0;
	}
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
	    {
	        new name[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
			new wstring[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
			GetPlayerName(i, name, sizeof(name));
			format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", name);
			strmid(wstring, string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
			if(strcmp(BizzInfo[bizid][bExtortion] ,wstring, true ) == 0 )
			{
			    new value = money / 100;
			    value = value * 10;
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, value);
			    BizzInfo[bizid][bTill] -= value;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("ExtortionBiz");
	return 1;
}

public ExtortionSBiz(bizid, money)
{
	LogCallback("ExtortionSBiz");
    new string[128];
    format(string, sizeof(string), "No-one");
    if(strcmp(SBizzInfo[bizid][sbExtortion],string, true ) == 0 )
	{
	    return 0;
	}
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
	    {
	        new name[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
			new wstring[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
			GetPlayerName(i, name, sizeof(name));
			format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", name);
			strmid(wstring, string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
			if(strcmp(SBizzInfo[bizid][sbExtortion] ,wstring, true ) == 0 )
			{
			    new value = money / 100;
			    value = value * 10;
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, value);
			    SBizzInfo[bizid][sbTill] -= value;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("ExtortionSBiz");
	return 1;
}

public Encrypt(string[])
{
	LogCallback("Encrypt");
	for(new x=0; x < strlen(string); x++)
	{
		string[x] += (3^x) * (x % 15);
		if(string[x] > (0xff))
		{
			string[x] -= 256;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("Encrypt");
	return 1;
}

//Vehicle Mod Protection
public OnVehicleMod(playerid, vehicleid, componentid)
{
	LogCallback("OnVehicleMod");
    new vehicleide = GetVehicleModel(vehicleid);
    new modok = islegalcarmod(vehicleide, componentid);
    new Name[24], IP[24];
    GetPlayerName(playerid, Name, 24);
    if (!modok)
	{
		new y,m,d,h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
        printf("[invalid_mod] %s %d %d %d %d %d", Name, playerid, vehicleid, vehicleide, componentid);
        GetPlayerIp(playerid,IP,sizeof(IP));
		SetVehicleToRespawn(vehicleide);
		new string[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has Been Banned For Adding Illegal Mods to Their Vehicle", Name, playerid);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Been Added to the Ban List and Vehicle %d has been respawned.", IP, vehicleide);
		SendAdminMessage(COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Been Banned For Adding Illegal Mods to Their Vehicle",d,m,y,h,mi,s,Name);
		BanLog(string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have Been Banned For Adding Illegal Mods to Your Vehicle");
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		ScriptBan(playerid,999,"Adding Illegal Mods to Vehicle");
    }
	UnMod[playerid] = 1;
	LogCallback("OnVehicleMod");
    return 1;
}

public OnPlayerGiveDamage(playerid, damagedid, Float:amount, weaponid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerGiveDamage");
	if(Tazer[playerid] == 1 && GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) == 23)
	{
	    if(GaveUp[damagedid] == 1) return 1;
	    new Float:x, Float:y, Float:z;
	    GetPlayerPos(damagedid, x, y, z);
	    SCM(damagedid, COLOR_NICERED, "YOU ARE BEING TAZED. (( Remember resisting after tazing is considered powergaming ))");
	    TogglePlayerControllable(damagedid, 0);
	    SafeClearAnimations(damagedid);
	    ApplyAnimation(damagedid,"CRACK", "crckdeth2", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
	    GaveUp[damagedid] = 1;
		new string[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s was hit by a tazer and falls to the ground.", GPN(damagedid));
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	    SetTimerEx("Unfreezeply",15000,0,"i",damagedid);
		SetTimerEx("CanCuffUntil",15000,0,"i",damagedid);

	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerGiveDamage");
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerCommandText(playerid, cmdtext[])
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerCommandText");
    return 0;
}

public OnPlayerEnterVehicle(playerid, vehicleid, ispassenger)
{
	if(Fell[playerid] != -1)
	{
		ClearAnimations(playerid);
	    ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK", "crckdeth2", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEnterVehicle");
	new
		string[128],
		vehicle[24]
	;
	GetVehicleName(vehicleid, vehicle, sizeof(vehicle));
	if(IsACopCar(vehicleid))
	{
	    format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d) Owner: Los Santos Police Department",vehicle,vehicleid);
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] != 1 && !ispassenger)
	    {
	        SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	        SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You do not have keys for this vehicle");
	        return 1;
	    }
	}
	if(IsAEmsCar(vehicleid))
	{
	    format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d) Owner: Los Santos Fire and Medical",vehicle,vehicleid);
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] != 2 && !ispassenger)
	    {
	        SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	        SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You do not have keys for this vehicle");
	        return 1;
	    }
	}
	if(DMVTestCars(vehicleid))
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: Los Santos DMV",vehicle, vehicleid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(SurenosCars(vehicleid))
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: Los Surenos Gang",vehicle, vehicleid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(SignatraCars(vehicleid))
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: Le Signatra Mafia",vehicle, vehicleid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(BratvaCars(vehicleid))
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: Chornaya Bratva Mafia",vehicle, vehicleid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(LAViceCars(vehicleid))
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: La Vice Mafia",vehicle, vehicleid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(SOACars(vehicleid))
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: Sons of Anarchy Gang",vehicle, vehicleid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(IsAFiremenCar(vehicleid))
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: LSFD",vehicle, vehicleid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(IsANewsCar(vehicleid))
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: News Corp",vehicle, vehicleid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(CarInfo[vehicleid][cUid] != -1 && CarInfo[vehicleid][cAlarm] == 1)
	{
		new pid = CarInfo[vehicleid][cUid];
		alarmtimer[playerid] = defer StopAlarm(vehicleid, playerid);
		new engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective;
		GetVehicleParamsEx(vehicleid, engine , lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
		SetVehicleParamsEx(vehicleid, engine, lights, VEHICLE_PARAMS_ON, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Entering Vehicle: %s (%d) Owner: %s", vehicle, vehicleid, GPN(pid));
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(CarInfo[vehicleid][cUid] != -1)
	{
		new pid = CarInfo[vehicleid][cUid];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Entering Vehicle: %s (%d) Owner: %s", vehicle, vehicleid, GPN(pid));
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	else if(CarInfo[vehicleid][cWcart] >= 1)
	{
		switch(CarInfo[vehicleid][cWcart])
		{
			case 1:
			{
				format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: LS Trucking Company",vehicle, vehicleid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
			case 2:
			{
				format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: LS Taxi Company",vehicle, vehicleid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
			case 3:
			{
				format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: LS Sanitation",vehicle, vehicleid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
			case 4:
			{
				format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: LS Parks and Rec.",vehicle, vehicleid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
			case 5:
			{
				format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: Well Stacked Pizza",vehicle, vehicleid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
			case 6:
			{
				format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: LS Scrap Metal Inc.",vehicle, vehicleid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
			case 7:
			{
				format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: Blueberry Farms", vehicle, vehicleid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
			case 8:
			{
				format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: LS Mechanic Co.",vehicle, vehicleid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: The State",vehicle, vehicleid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	if(AdminCars(vehicleid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1337)
		{
			format(string,sizeof(string),"Entering Vehicle: %s (%d)  Owner: ADMINS",vehicle, vehicleid);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEnterVehicle");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerConnect(playerid)
{
    editingFurniture[playerid] = false;
    editingFslot[playerid] = 0;
	slots[playerid] = false;
	furnSlot[playerid] = -1;
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] = -1;
	SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
	workingID[playerid] = -1;
	hasTrash[playerid] = false;
	houseStorage[playerid] = 0;
	inHouse[playerid] = -1;
	editingSign[playerid] = -1;
	LogCallback("OnPlayerConnect");
	Fell[playerid] = -1;
	savingPlayer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	cheatWarns[playerid] = 0;
	atalkID[playerid] = -1;
	reportID[playerid] = -1;
	pdcallID[playerid] = -1;
	emscallID[playerid] =-1;
	emergencystep[playerid] = -1;
	KillTimer(sobeitCheck[playerid]);
	mdcStep[playerid] = 0;
	IsTrucking[playerid] = false;
	editingArrest[playerid] = false;
	suIng[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	arrestStep[playerid] = 0;
	arresting[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	actuallyConnected[playerid] = false;
	ACTIME[playerid] = -1;
	new
		string[128],
		string2[128],
		playersip[64],
		zone[MAX_ZONE_NAME],
		y, m, d, h,mi,s
	;
	KillTimer(checkTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(streamTimer[playerid]);
	wSus[playerid] = 0;
	aSus[playerid] = 0;
	idleSeconds[playerid] = 0;
	currentWeapon[playerid] = 0;
	AtmEdit[playerid] = -1;
	getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
	GetPlayer2DZone(playerid, zone, MAX_ZONE_NAME);
	GetPlayerIp(playerid,playersip,sizeof(playersip));
	format(string, sizeof(string),"%s",playersip);
	pTut[playerid] = 0;
	TutTimer[playerid] = INVALID_TIMER_ID;
	pCopCar[playerid] = -1;
	pEmsCar[playerid] = -1;
	BuyingUsedCar[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	BuyingUsedCarPrice[playerid] = 0;
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 0;
	
	PlayAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid, "https://dl.dropbox.com/s/otw0f6mk0w1ouha/GTA%20San%20Andreas%20Theme%20Song%20Full%20%21%20%21.mp3");


	
	for(new i = 0; i < 12; i++)
	{
	    Weapon[playerid][i] = 0;
	    Ammo[playerid][i] = 0;
	}
	if(strfind(GPN(playerid), "0", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "1", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "2", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "3", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "4", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "5", true) != -1
		|| strfind(GPN(playerid), "6", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "7", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "8", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "9", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "[", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "]", true) != -1
		|| strfind(GPN(playerid), "@", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "!", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "#", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "$", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "&", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), "_", true) == -1
		|| strfind(GPN(playerid), "(", true) != -1 || strfind(GPN(playerid), ")", true) != -1)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW2, "Your name is not acceptable for roleplay!");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW2, "Your name must be a proper Firstname_Lastname.");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW2, "You cannot use joke names, famous names, or anything non realistic");
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Anticheat Has Kicked %s for Invalid Name",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
		KickLog(string);
		ServerKick(playerid);
		return 1;
	}

	SafeResetPlayerid(playerid);
	SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
	
	Jailtimetd[playerid] = CreatePlayerTextDraw(playerid, 400.000000, 2.000000, " ");
	PlayerTextDrawAlignment(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid], 2);
	PlayerTextDrawBackgroundColor(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid], 255);
	PlayerTextDrawFont(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid], 1);
	PlayerTextDrawLetterSize(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid], 0.300000, 1.000000);
	PlayerTextDrawColor(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid], -1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetOutline(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid], 1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetProportional(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid], 1);

	Fueltd[playerid] = CreatePlayerTextDraw(playerid, 503.000000, 354.000000, " ");
	PlayerTextDrawBackgroundColor(playerid, Fueltd[playerid], 255);
	PlayerTextDrawFont(playerid, Fueltd[playerid], 2);
	PlayerTextDrawLetterSize(playerid, Fueltd[playerid], 0.149998, 0.799998);
	PlayerTextDrawColor(playerid, Fueltd[playerid], -1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetOutline(playerid, Fueltd[playerid], 0);
	PlayerTextDrawSetProportional(playerid, Fueltd[playerid], 1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetShadow(playerid, Fueltd[playerid], 0);

	Speedometer[playerid] = CreatePlayerTextDraw(playerid, 503.000000, 365.000000, " ");
	PlayerTextDrawBackgroundColor(playerid, Speedometer[playerid], 255);
	PlayerTextDrawFont(playerid, Speedometer[playerid], 2);
	PlayerTextDrawLetterSize(playerid, Speedometer[playerid], 0.149998, 0.799998);
	PlayerTextDrawColor(playerid, Speedometer[playerid], -1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetOutline(playerid, Speedometer[playerid], 0);
	PlayerTextDrawSetProportional(playerid, Speedometer[playerid], 1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetShadow(playerid, Speedometer[playerid], 0);

	VehnameTD[playerid]	= CreatePlayerTextDraw(playerid, 503.000000, 376.000000, " ");
	PlayerTextDrawBackgroundColor(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid], 255);
	PlayerTextDrawFont(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid], 2);
	PlayerTextDrawLetterSize(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid], 0.149998, 0.799998);
	PlayerTextDrawColor(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid], -1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetOutline(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid], 0);
	PlayerTextDrawSetProportional(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid], 1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetShadow(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid], 0);

	CarHealthTD[playerid] = CreatePlayerTextDraw(playerid, 503.000000, 387.000000, " ");
	PlayerTextDrawBackgroundColor(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid], 255);
	PlayerTextDrawFont(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid], 2);
	PlayerTextDrawLetterSize(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid], 0.149998, 0.799998);
	PlayerTextDrawColor(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid], -1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetOutline(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid], 0);
	PlayerTextDrawSetProportional(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid], 1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetShadow(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid], 0);

	SPEEDOBGTD[playerid] = CreatePlayerTextDraw(playerid, 498.000000, 401.000000, "____");
	PlayerTextDrawBackgroundColor(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], 255);
	PlayerTextDrawFont(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], 2);
	PlayerTextDrawLetterSize(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], 0.000000, -5.899986);
	PlayerTextDrawColor(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], -1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetOutline(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], 0);
	PlayerTextDrawSetProportional(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], 0);
	PlayerTextDrawSetShadow(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], 1);
	PlayerTextDrawUseBox(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], 1);
	PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], 0x00000077);
	PlayerTextDrawTextSize(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid], 607.000000, 22.000000);

	MapareaTD[playerid] = CreatePlayerTextDraw(playerid, 86.000000, 428.000000, " "); // area
	PlayerTextDrawAlignment(playerid, MapareaTD[playerid], 2);
	PlayerTextDrawBackgroundColor(playerid, MapareaTD[playerid], 255);
	PlayerTextDrawFont(playerid, MapareaTD[playerid], 3);
	PlayerTextDrawLetterSize(playerid, MapareaTD[playerid],0.280000, 1.100000);
	PlayerTextDrawColor(playerid, MapareaTD[playerid], -1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetOutline(playerid, MapareaTD[playerid], 1);
	PlayerTextDrawSetProportional(playerid, MapareaTD[playerid], 1);

	Moneychangetd[playerid] = TextDrawCreate(494.000000, 81.000000, " "); // money changes
	TextDrawAlignment(Moneychangetd[playerid], 3);
	TextDrawBackgroundColor(Moneychangetd[playerid], 255);

	if(strlen(dini_Get("LARP/Users/Aliases/ips.txt", GPN(playerid))) == 0)
   	{
	   	dini_Set("LARP/Users/Aliases/ips.txt", GPN(playerid), playersip);
	}
	else
	{
		if( strfind( dini_Get("LARP/Users/Aliases/ips.txt", GPN(playerid)), playersip, true) == -1 )
		{
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s, %s", dini_Get("LARP/Users/Aliases/ips.txt",GPN(playerid)), playersip);
			dini_Set("LARP/Users/Aliases/ips.txt", GPN(playerid), string);
		}
	}

	new pAKA[256];
	pAKA = dini_Get("LARP/Users/Aliases/alias.txt",playersip);
	new pIPs[256];
	pIPs = dini_Get("LARP/Users/Aliases/ips.txt",GPN(playerid));

	if(strlen(pAKA) < 3)
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"[INFO]: %s (%d) has joined SA-MP Roleplay (%s)", GPN(playerid), playerid,playersip);
		if (strlen(pIPs) < 3) SendIP = 0;
		else if (!strcmp(pIPs,playersip,true)) SendIP = 0;
		else
		{
		    if(strlen(pIPs) >= 128)
		    {
		        format(string2,sizeof(string2),"* %s (%d)'s Other IPs: -Too Many, Be Careful-", GPN(playerid), playerid);
			}
			else
			{
				format(string2,sizeof(string2),"* %s (%d)'s Other IPs: %s", GPN(playerid), playerid, pIPs);
			}
			SendIP = 1;
		}
	}
	else if (!strcmp(pAKA,GPN(playerid),true))
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"[INFO]: %s (%d) has joined SA-MP Roleplay (%s)", GPN(playerid), playerid,playersip);
		if (strlen(pIPs) < 3) SendIP = 0;
		else if (!strcmp(pIPs,playersip,true)) SendIP = 0;
		else
		{
		    if(strlen(pIPs) >= 128)
		    {
		        format(string2,sizeof(string2),"* %s (%d)'s Other IPs: -Too Many, Be Careful-", GPN(playerid), playerid);
			}
			else
			{
				format(string2,sizeof(string2),"* %s (%d)'s Other IPs: %s", GPN(playerid), playerid, pIPs);
			}
			SendIP = 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"[INFO]: %s (%d) has joined the Server (%s). (Alias: %s)", GPN(playerid), playerid,playersip, pAKA);
		if (strlen(pIPs) < 3) SendIP = 0;
		else if (!strcmp(pIPs,playersip,true)) SendIP = 0;
		else
		{
		    if(strlen(pIPs) >= 128)
		    {
		        format(string2,sizeof(string2),"* %s (%d)'s Other IPs: -Too Many, Be Careful-", GPN(playerid), playerid);
			}
			else
			{
				format(string2,sizeof(string2),"* %s (%d)'s Other IPs: %s", GPN(playerid), playerid, pIPs);
			}
			SendIP = 1;
		}
	}
	new playerserial[128],uid[200];
    gpci(playerid,playerserial,sizeof(playerserial));
    format(uid,sizeof(uid),"* %s (%d) serial(NOT UNIQUE) %s",GPN(playerid),playerserial);
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
	    if(TogConnection[i] == 0)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i) && playerid != i)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[i][pAdmin] > 1)
				{
					SCM(i,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
					if(SendIP == 1)
					{
						SCM(i,COLOR_YELLOW,string2);
						SendIP = 0;
						SendClientMessage(i,0xFF0000FF,uid);
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
