public OnPlayerCleoDetected(playerid, cleoid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerCleoDetected");
    switch(cleoid)
    {
        case CLEO_FAKEKILL:
        {
			new string[128]; format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Has Been Banned by Lorenc_'s FUCKCLEO.inc for Fake kill", GPN(playerid));
            SendAdminMessage(COLOR_NICERED, string);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "Fuck CLEO");
            ScriptBan(playerid,999,"Fake kill");
        }
        case CLEO_CARWARP:
        {
            new string[128]; format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Has Been Banned by Lorenc_'s FUCKCLEO.inc for Car Warping", GPN(playerid));
            SendAdminMessage(COLOR_NICERED, string);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "Fuck CLEO");
            ScriptBan(playerid,999,"Car Warping");
        }
        case CLEO_CARSWING:
        {
            new string[128]; format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Has Been Banned by Lorenc_'s FUCKCLEO.inc for Car Swinging", GPN(playerid));
            SendAdminMessage(COLOR_NICERED, string);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "Fuck CLEO");
            ScriptBan(playerid,999,"Car Swinging");
        }
        case CLEO_CAR_PARTICLE_SPAM:
        {
            new string[128]; format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Has Been Banned by Lorenc_'s FUCKCLEO.inc for Car Particle Spam", GPN(playerid));
            SendAdminMessage(COLOR_NICERED, string);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "Fuck CLEO");
            ScriptBan(playerid,999,"Car Particle Spam");
        }
    }
	LogCallback("OnPlayerCleoDetected");
    return 1;
}

public Tutorial(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("Tutorial");
	pTut[playerid] += 1;
 	KillTimer(TutTimer[playerid]);
	if(pTut[playerid] == 2)
	{
		DoTutorial(playerid, pTut[playerid]);
	}
	else
	{
	    pTut[playerid] = -1;
	}
	LogCallback("Tutorial");
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerDisconnect(playerid, reason)
{

	DestroyDynamicCP(workCP[playerid]);
	if(slots[playerid] == true && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] != 9999)
	{
		for(new f = 0; f < 100; f ++)
		{
			DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(furnInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][f][fTag]);
		}
	}
	if(savingPlayer[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && Fell[playerid] == -1)
	{
		KillTimer(playaDeath[savingPlayer[playerid]]);
		SetPlayerHealth(savingPlayer[playerid],0.0);
		if(savingPlayer[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
  			savingPlayer[savingPlayer[playerid]] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
		}
		savingPlayer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	}
	if(Fell[playerid] != -1)
	{
	    KillTimer(playaDeath[playerid]);
		Fell[playerid] = -1;
		if(savingPlayer[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
  			savingPlayer[savingPlayer[playerid]] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
		}
		savingPlayer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerDisconnect");
 	KillTimer(ACTIME[playerid]);
	IsTrucking[playerid] = false;
	Tazer[playerid] = 0;
	wSus[playerid] = 0;
	aSus[playerid] = 0;
	TogFaction[playerid] = 0;
	TogConnection[playerid] = 0;
	MethadoneTablet[playerid] = 0;
	RequestingFire[playerid] = -1;
	AcceptedFire[playerid] = -1;
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 0;
	if(atalkID[playerid] != -1)
	{
		ClearThisAtalk(atalkID[playerid]);
	}
	if(reportID[playerid] != -1)
	{
	    ClearThisReport(reportID[playerid]);
	}
	if(pdcallID[playerid] != -1)
	{
	    ClearThisPDCall(pdcallID[playerid]);
	}
	if(emscallID[playerid] != -1)
	{
	    ClearThisEMSCall(emscallID[playerid]);
	}
	new
		textreason[64],
		string[24],
		string2[128],
		d,m,y
	;
	KillTimer(streamTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(checkTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(TutTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(pretut[playerid]);
	KillTimer(HotWireTime[playerid]);
	KillTimer(KickTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(StreamTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(sobeitCheck[playerid]);
	KillTimer(ACTIMETWO[playerid]);
	KillTimer(RobBankTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(RobGymTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(RobDonutTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(RobAlhambraTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(RobBarTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(RobBurgerTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(RobCluckinTimer[playerid]);
	KillTimer(RobPizzaTimer[playerid]);
	stop postimer[playerid];
	stop SpeedoTimer[playerid];
	DestroyObject(boombox[playerid]);
	DestroyDynamicArea(boomboxarea[playerid]);
	JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
	{
	    ClearWepVariables(playerid);
		SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
	}
	if(InEvent[playerid] >= 1)
	{
		ClearWepVariables(playerid);
		SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
	}
	if(pCopCar[playerid] != -1)
	{
	    CarTimer[pCopCar[playerid]] = SetTimerEx("CopCarRemoval",300000,false,"d",pCopCar[playerid]);
	}
	if(pEmsCar[playerid] != -1)
	{
	    CarTimer[pEmsCar[playerid]] = SetTimerEx("EmsCarRemoval",300000,false,"d",pEmsCar[playerid]);
	}
	if(eventcar[playerid] != -1)
	{
		DestroyVehicle(eventcar[playerid]);
	}
	getdate(y,m,d); format(string, sizeof(string), "%d/%d/%d", d,m,y);
	strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLastSeen], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
	switch(reason)
	{
		case 0:
		{
			textreason = "Crashed";
			strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWhyLeft], "Crashed", 0, strlen("Crashed"), 255);
			format(string2, sizeof(string2),"[INFO]: %s Has left the Server. [%s]",GPN(playerid), textreason);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_GREEN, string2);
		}
		case 1:
		{
			textreason = "Leaving";
			strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWhyLeft], "Leaving", 0, strlen("Leaving"), 255);
			format(string2, sizeof(string2),"[INFO]: %s Has left the Server. [%s]",GPN(playerid), textreason);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_GREEN, string2);
		}
		case 2:
		{
			strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWhyLeft], "Kicked/Banned", 0, strlen("Kicked/Banned"), 255);
		}
	}

	DPCP(playerid);
	SaveGuns(playerid);
	StopWorking(playerid);
	ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pInt] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
	GetPlayerPos(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pPos_x], PlayerInfo[playerid][pPos_y], PlayerInfo[playerid][pPos_z]);
	GetPlayerHealth(playerid,PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
	GetPlayerArmour(playerid,PlayerInfo[playerid][pArmour]);
	OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
	SafeResetPlayerid(playerid);
	RentalCars(playerid);

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][6] == 1)
	{
		SaveWeed(playerid);
	}

    DestroyPlayerProgressBar(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawDestroy(playerid, Speedometer[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawDestroy(playerid, Fueltd[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawDestroy(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawDestroy(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawDestroy(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawDestroy(playerid, MapareaTD[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawDestroy(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawDestroy(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawDestroy(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid]);
	TextDrawDestroy(Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	TextDrawDestroy(Tutorialtd[playerid]);
	Delete3DTextLabel(DutyLabel[playerid]);
	DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid);
	for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
	{
		DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][W]);
		DestroyDynamicObject(BabyDeer[playerid][W]);
	}
	if(MechanicID[playerid] != -1)
	{
		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]] / RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]]);
		PlayerInfo[MechanicID[playerid]][pPayCheck] += MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]] / RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]];
		RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]] = 6;
		EndMechRepair(playerid);
	}
	if(IsPlayerInEVehicle[playerid] != 9999)
	{
	    new i = IsPlayerInEVehicle[playerid];
		Seats[i] --;
	}
	if(TaxiDriver[playerid] != -1)
	{
		stop TaxiRide[playerid];
		PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiDriver[playerid], JobCDBoxTD[TaxiDriver[playerid]]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiDriver[playerid], TaxiFareCostTD[TaxiDriver[playerid]]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiDriver[playerid], TaxiFareMeterTD[TaxiDriver[playerid]]);
		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -TaxiFare[playerid]);
		PlayerInfo[TaxiDriver[playerid]][pPayCheck] += TaxiFare[playerid];
		TakeTaxi[TaxiDriver[playerid]] = 0;
		TaxiPass[TaxiDriver[playerid]] = -1;
		FareMeter[TaxiDriver[playerid]] = 0;
		TaxiFare[playerid] = 0;
	}
	if(TaxiPass[playerid] != -1)
	{
		stop TaxiRide[TaxiPass[playerid]];
		PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiPass[playerid], JobCDBoxTD[TaxiPass[playerid]]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiPass[playerid], TaxiFareCostTD[TaxiPass[playerid]]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiPass[playerid], TaxiFareMeterTD[TaxiPass[playerid]]);
		TaxiDriver[TaxiPass[playerid]] = -1; FareMeter[playerid] = 1;
	}
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(spectatorid[i] == playerid)
        {
			TogglePlayerSpectating(i,false);
			TogglePlayerControllable(i, 1);
        }
		if(PrisonerID[i] == playerid)
		{
			PrisonerID[i] = -1;
			SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You client has logged out");
		}
	}
	if(PlayersChannel[playerid] < 999)
	{
		IRCInfo[PlayersChannel[playerid]][iPlayers] -= 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRoadblock] != 0)
	{
		RemoveRoadblock(playerid);
	}
	if(CabCall == playerid)
	{
		CabCalls();
	}
	if(MechCall == playerid)
	{
		MechCalls();
	}
	for(new v; v<MAX_VEHICLES; v++)
	{
	    if(CarInfo[v][cUid] == playerid)
	    {
	        DestroyVehicle(v);
			CarInfo[v][cUid] = -1;
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerDisconnect");
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerDeath(playerid, killerid, reason)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerDeath");
	new
		string[128],
		name[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],
		name2[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],
		deathreason[20],
		y,m,d,h,mi,s
	;
	SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
	ClearWepVariables(playerid);
	getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
	GetPlayerName(playerid, name, sizeof(name));
	GetPlayerName(killerid, name2, sizeof(name2));
	SpawnModelSkin[playerid] = GetPlayerSkin(playerid);
	MedicBill[playerid] = 1;
	HasDied[playerid] = 1;
	stop accidenttimer[playerid];
	if(GetPVarInt(playerid, "Streaming") == 1)
	{
		StopAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid);
		SetPVarInt(playerid, "Streaming", 0);
	}
	switch(InEvent[playerid])
	{
		case 10,11,13:
		{
			switch(GetPlayerTeam(playerid))
			{
				case 1: { teama -= 1; }
				case 2: { teamb -= 1; }
			}
			SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 255);
			if(teama == 0 || teamb == 0)
			{
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					switch(InEvent[i])
					{
						case 10,11,13:
						{
							eventactive = 0;
							SetPlayerHealth(i, 0);
							SafeResetPlayerWeapons(i);
							SetPlayerTeam(i, 255);
							teama = 0;
							teamb = 0;
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if(GetPlayerState(playerid) == PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER)
	{
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, Speedometer[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, Fueltd[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid]);
	}
	DPCP(playerid);
	DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid);
	gPlayerSpawned[playerid] = 0;
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
	{
		DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(Text3D:MaskLabel[playerid]);
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] = 0;
	}
	if(killerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	{
	    switch(reason)
		{
			case 0: 		  { deathreason = "Melee"; }
			case 16,35,36,40: { deathreason = "Explosion"; }
			case 18,37: 	  { deathreason = "Fire"; }
			case 51: 		  { deathreason = "Explosion"; }
			case 50: 		  { deathreason = "Heli-Kill"; }
			default: 		  { GetWeaponName(reason, deathreason, sizeof(deathreason)); }
		}
	    format(string, sizeof(string),"[INFO]: %s (%d) has been killed by %s (%d) - %s", name,playerid,name2,killerid,deathreason);
	    SendAdminMessage(COLOR_GREEN, string);
	    KillTimer(playaDeath[playerid]);
		Fell[playerid] = -1;
		if(savingPlayer[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
  			savingPlayer[savingPlayer[playerid]] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
		}
		savingPlayer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
		switch(Dead[playerid])
		{
			case -1:
			{
				if(InEvent[playerid] == 0)
				{
					Dead[playerid] = 1;
					GetPlayerPos(playerid, DeathPOS[playerid][0], DeathPOS[playerid][1], DeathPOS[playerid][2]);
					GetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, DeathPOS[playerid][3]);
				}
			}
			case 1:
			{
				Dead[playerid] = -1;
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		new text[30];
		switch(reason)
		{
			case 51: { text = "Explosion"; }
			case 53: { text = "Drowned"; }
			case 54: { text = "Collision"; }
			default: { text = "Death"; }
		}
		format(string, sizeof(string),"[INFO]: %s (%d) has been killed by Server. (%s)",name,playerid, text);
		SendAdminMessage(COLOR_GREEN, string);
		SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xBBBBBB00);
		if(Dead[playerid] == -1)
		{
			Dead[playerid] = 1;
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] >= 1)
	{
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] = 0;
	}
	if(gPlayerUsingLoopingAnim[playerid])
	{
        gPlayerUsingLoopingAnim[playerid] = 0;
        TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,txtAnimHelper);
	}
	/*if(WantedPoints[playerid] > 0)
	{
		new dstring[128];
		new wanted = WantedPoints[playerid];
		new diecash = 0;
		while(WantedPoints[playerid] > 0)
		{
			diecash += 500;
			WantedPoints[playerid] --;
		}
		format(dstring, sizeof(dstring), "You lost $%d for dieing with %d Wanted Points.", diecash, wanted);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, dstring);
		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - diecash);
	}*/
	WantedPoints[playerid] = 0;
	WantedLevel[playerid] = 0;
	gPlayerSpawned[playerid] = 1;
	Checked[playerid] = 1;
	PlayerGotSpottedRecently[playerid] = 1;
	SetTimerEx("ResetAcWarn",20000,false,"i",playerid);
	if(Mobile[playerid] != 255)
	{
		if(Mobile[playerid] < 255)
		{
			SCM(Mobile[playerid],  COLOR_GRAD2, "** The line just went dead....");
			CellTime[Mobile[playerid]] = 0;
			CellTime[Mobile[playerid]] = 0;
			Mobile[Mobile[playerid]] = 255;
		}
		Mobile[playerid] = 255;
		CellTime[playerid] = 0;
	}
	ClearCrime(playerid);
	if(UsingBelt[playerid] == 1)
	{
		UsingBelt[playerid] = 0;
	}
	killerid = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFFFFFF00);
    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -1000);
	foreach(Player,i)
    {
		if(spectatorid[i] == playerid)
        {
            TogglePlayerSpectating(i,false);
			TogglePlayerControllable(i, 1);
        }
    }
	LogCallback("OnPlayerDeath");
	return 1;
}


stock IsPlayerInWater(playerid)
{
		LogCallback("IsPlayerInWater");
        new Float:Z;
        GetPlayerPos(playerid,Z,Z,Z);
        if(Z < 0.7) switch(GetPlayerAnimationIndex(playerid)) { case 1543,1538,1539: return 1; }
        if(GetPlayerDistanceFromPoint(playerid,-965,2438,42) <= 700 && Z < 45)return 1;
        new Float:water_places[][] =
        {
                {25.0,  2313.0, -1417.0,        23.0},
                {15.0,  1280.0, -773.0,         1082.0},
                {15.0,  1279.0, -804.0,         86.0},
                {20.0,  1094.0, -674.0,         111.0},
                {26.0,  194.0,  -1232.0,        76.0},
                {25.0,  2583.0, 2385.0,         15.0},
                {25.0,  225.0,  -1187.0,        73.0},
                {50.0,  1973.0, -1198.0,        17.0}
        };
        for(new t=0; t < sizeof water_places; t++)
                if(GetPlayerDistanceFromPoint(playerid,water_places[t][1],water_places[t][2],water_places[t][3]) <= water_places[t][0]) return 1;
		LogCallback("IsPlayerInWater");
        return 0;
}
