CMD:vrp(playerid,params[])
 {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
        if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xFFFFFFFF, "You are not in a vehicle!");

        RepairVehicle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));

        SendClientMessage(playerid, 0xFFFFFFFF, "Your vehicle has been repaired!");
		}
        return 1;
    }


CMD:serial(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1)
	{
	    new playa;
	    if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/serial [playerid]");
		if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		{
		    new serial[128],string[200];
		    gpci(playa,serial,sizeof(serial));
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s serial is %s",GPN(playa),serial);
		    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_RED,string);
		    SendClientMessage(playerid,0xFFFF00FF,"If you do not know what you're doing with these please ignore it");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

CMD:arc(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
	    {
	        new playa,string[128];
	        if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/arc [playerid]");
	        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
	        {
	            if(Fell[playa] == 1)
	            {
	                Fell[playa] = 2;
			    	format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has accepted medic call %d",GPN(playerid),playa);
			    	SendRadioMessage(2, COLOR_PINK,string);
			    	new Float:pos[3];
			    	GetPlayerPos(playa,pos[0],pos[1],pos[2]);
					savingPlayer[playerid] = playa;
					savingPlayer[playa] = playerid;
					SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, pos[0],pos[1],pos[2],5.0,19,0);
			    	
	            }
	            else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,"This player does not need assistance");
            } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,"This player is not connected");
	    } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,"You're not on duty you can't do this right now");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not a medic");
	return 1;
}

CMD:loadpt(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
	    {
	        new playa,seat;
	        if(sscanf(params,"ud",playa,seat)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/loadpt [playerid] [seat]");
	        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
	        {
				if(playa == savingPlayer[playerid])
				{
			        if(Fell[playa] == 3)
		            {
						if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) != INVALID_VEHICLE_ID)
						{
							new model = GetVehicleModel(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
							if(model == 416)
							{
      							Fell[playa] = 4;
								SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_PINK,"Take the patient to allsaints then use /unloadpt and get him some medical attention");
								TogglePlayerControllable(playa,0);
							  	switch(seat)
      							{
      							    case 1:
      							    {
      							        PutPlayerInVehicle(playa,GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),2);
      							    }
      							    default:
      							    {
      							        PutPlayerInVehicle(playa,GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),3);
      							    }
      							}
      						} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You must be in an ambulance to load this patient");
      					} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You must be in a vehicle to use this command");
      				} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"This player does not need assistance");
      			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"This patient is not yours to load");
      		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Invalid playerid");
      	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not even on medic duty you can't do this right now");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You are not a medic you can't use this command");
	return 1;
}

CMD:revive(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		new playa;
		if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"/revive [playerid]");
	    if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
	 	{
	        if(Fell[playa] != -1)
	        {
		    	Fell[playa] = -1;
				if(savingPlayer[playa] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
				{
  					savingPlayer[savingPlayer[playa]] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
				}
		    	savingPlayer[playa] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
				KillTimer(playaDeath[playa]);
				ClearAnimations(playa);
				SendClientMessage(playa,-1,"You have been revived by an administrator");
				SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You've revived a player");
	        } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Player is not injured");
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Player is not connected");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not allowed to use this command");
	return 1;
}
CMD:unloadpt(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
	    {
	        new playa;
	        if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/unloadpt [playerid]");
	        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
	        {
				if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == GetPlayerVehicleID(playa))
				{
		            if(Fell[playa] == 4)
		            {
		                RemovePlayerFromVehicle(playa);
		                SendClientMessage(playa,COLOR_PINK,"You have been unloaded the medic is going ot take you inside to roleplay your recovery");
		                SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_PINK,"You have unloaded the patient take them inside and roleplay their recovery now");
		                Fell[playa] = -1;
						savingPlayer[playa] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
						savingPlayer[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
						KillTimer(playaDeath[playerid]);
		            } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Patient doesn't need this kind of help right now");
				} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"This player is not even in your ambulance");
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"This player is not connected");
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not even on duty");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not even a medic");
	return 1;
}

stock GetWeaponDamage(weaponid)
{
	new dmg = 0;
	switch(weaponid)
	{
	    case 22,29:
	    {
	        dmg = 8;
	    }
	    case 23:
	    {
	        dmg = 13;
	    }
	    case 24:
	    {
	        dmg = 46;
	    }
	    case 25:
	    {
	        dmg = 49;
	    }
	    case 26:
	    {
			dmg = 30;
		}
		case 27:
		{
		    dmg = 39;
		}
		case 28,32:
		{
		    dmg = 6;
		}
		case 30,31:
		{
		    dmg = 9;
		}
		case 33:
		{
			dmg = 24;
		}
		default:
		{
		    dmg = 5;
		}
	}
	return dmg;
}

public OnPlayerWeaponShot(playerid, weaponid, hittype, hitid, Float:fX, Float:fY, Float:fZ)
{
	if(Weapon[playerid][GetWeaponSlot(weaponid)] != weaponid || PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < 2)
	{
	    new string[128];
	    format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}Warning{FF0000} %s(%d) just fired a gun that isn't server sided they may have hacked it",GPN(playerid),playerid);
	    SendAdminMessage(-1,string);
	    return 0;
	}
	if(hittype == 1)
	{
		if(ALTTAB[hitid] > 5) return 0;
		else
		{
			new Float:hp,string[128];
		    if(weaponid > 21 && weaponid < 34)
		    {
                GetPlayerHealth(hitid,hp);
				new Float:var,Float:arm;
				GetPlayerArmour(hitid,arm);
				var = hp - GetWeaponDamage(weaponid);
				if(var < 26 && Fell[hitid] == -1 && arm < 1)
				{
					Fell[hitid] = 1;
					SetPlayerHealth(hitid,25.0);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has been injured type /arc %d to accept their call",GPN(hitid),hitid);
					SendRadioMessage(2, COLOR_PINK,string);
					playaDeath[hitid] = SetTimerEx("PlayersDeath",180000,false,"i",hitid);
					ClearAnimations(hitid);
					ApplyAnimation(hitid,"CRACK", "crckdeth2", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
				    return 0;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 1;
}
forward public PlayersDeath(playerid);
public PlayersDeath(playerid)
{
	if(Fell[playerid] != 1)
	{
	    SetPlayerHealth(playerid,0);
	}
	return 1;
}
stock SafeClearAnimations(playerid)
{
	if(Fell[playerid] == -1)
	{
	    ClearAnimations(playerid);
	}
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerTakeDamage(playerid, issuerid, Float: amount, weaponid)
{
if(issuerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	{
		PlayerPlaySound(issuerid, 17802, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		new Float:hp,string[128];
		GetPlayerHealth(playerid,hp);
		if(hp - amount < 26 && Fell[playerid] == -1)
		{
			Fell[playerid] = 1;
			SetPlayerHealth(playerid,25.0);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has been injured type /arc %d to accept their call",GPN(playerid),playerid);
			SendRadioMessage(2, COLOR_PINK,string);
			playaDeath[playerid] = SetTimerEx("PlayersDeath",180000,false,"i",playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
			ClearAnimations(playerid);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK", "crckdeth2", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
			return 0;
		}
	}
			GetPlayerArmour(playerid,PlayerInfo[playerid][pArmour]);
	return 1;
}

public PreTutorial(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("PreTutorial");
//	DoTutorial(playerid,1);
	TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid,bckgrndRules);
	PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid,ruleone[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid,ruletwo[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid,rulethree[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid,rulefour[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid,rulefive[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid,rulesix[playerid]);
    DoTutorial(playerid,1);
	KillTimer(pretut[playerid]);
	LogCallback("PreTutorial");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerSpawn(playerid)
{
	SetTimerEx("welcomespawn", 10, 0, "d",playerid);
	StopAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid);
	if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"GivenVip") == 1)
	{
	    SetPVarInt(playerid,"GivenVip",0);
	    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"You have been given 1 week of vip for free for logging in launch weekend");
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerSpawn");
	new string[128];
	SetTimerEx("SetSkins",100,false,"i",playerid);
	SetPlayerSpawn(playerid);
	SetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
	SetPlayerToTeamColor(playerid);
	PlayerFixRadio(playerid);
 	gTeam[playerid] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pTeam]; //Set the Tteam
	if(InEvent[playerid] >= 1)
	{
		InEvent[playerid] = 0;
		SetPlayerToTeamColor(playerid);
		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, 250);
		SetPlayerPos(playerid, ePos[0][playerid], ePos[1][playerid], ePos[2][playerid]);
		SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld]);
		SetPlayerInterior(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pInt]);
		for(new i = 0; i < 13; i++)
		{
			SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, eWeapons[i][0][playerid], eWeapons[i][1][playerid]);
			eWeapons[i][0][playerid] = 0;
			eWeapons[i][1][playerid] = 0;
			switch(i)
			{
				case 1 .. 3:{ ePos[i][playerid] = 0; }
			}
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(gTeam[playerid] == 4) //medic / criminal reset team
	{
		gTeam[playerid] = 3;
	}
/*	if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
	{
    	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "** This server requires a Login BEFORE spawn (Kicked) **");
        ServerKick(playerid);
        return 1;
 	}*/
    if(IsSpecing[playerid] == 1)
    {
        SetPlayerPos(playerid,SpecX[playerid],SpecY[playerid],SpecZ[playerid]);
        SetPlayerPos(playerid,SpecX[playerid],SpecY[playerid],SpecZ[playerid]);
        SetPlayerInterior(playerid,Inter[playerid]);
        SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,vWorld[playerid]);
        IsSpecing[playerid] = 0;
        IsBeingSpeced[spectatorid[playerid]] = 0;
        return 1;
    }
	if(Dead[playerid] != -1)
	{
		ReleaseFromHospital(playerid);
		Dead[playerid] = -1;
		return 1;
	}
 	if(!gPlayerAnimLibsPreloaded[playerid])
	{
   		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"BOMBER");
   		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"RAPPING");
    	PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"SHOP");
   		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"BEACH");
   		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"SMOKING");
    	PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"FOOD");
    	PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"ON_LOOKERS");
    	PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"DEALER");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"CRACK");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"CARRY");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"COP_AMBIENT");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"PARK");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"INT_HOUSE");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"FOOD");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"PED");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"MISC");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"BLOWJOBZ");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"RIFLE");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"UZI");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"SHOTGUN");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"COLT45");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"SILENCED");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"GYMNASIUM");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"PARK");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"BSKTBALL");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"GANGS");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"FIGHT_D");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"PAULNMAC");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"CASINO");
		PreloadAnimLib(playerid,"OTB");
		gPlayerAnimLibsPreloaded[playerid] = 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularCount] <= 72000 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] == 0)
	{
	    PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] = 1;
	    format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `regularrank` = '%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
	    mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
	    format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Has been Automatically Promoted to Regular Player!", GPN(playerid));
	    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_PINK, string);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_PINK, "PROMOTED: REGULAR PLAYER!!!!!");
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularCount] <= 36000 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] == 1)
	{
	    PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] = 2;
	    format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `regularrank` = '%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
	    mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
	    format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Has been Automatically Promoted to Regular Player Level 2!", GPN(playerid));
	    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_PINK, string);
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_PINK, "PROMOTED: REGULAR PLAYER LEVEL 2!!!!!");
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularCount] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] == 2)
	{
	    PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] = 3;
	    format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `regularrank` = '%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
	    mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
	    format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Has been Automatically Promoted to Regular Player Level 3!", GPN(playerid));
	    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_PINK, string);
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_PINK, "PROMOTED: REGULAR PLAYER LEVEL 3!!!!!");
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerSpawn");
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerEnterCheckpoint(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEnterCheckpoint");
	if(savingPlayer[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
	        {
				if(Fell[savingPlayer[playerid]] == 2)
				{
					KillTimer(playaDeath[savingPlayer[playerid]]);
					ClearAnimations(savingPlayer[playerid]);
					LoopingAnim(savingPlayer[playerid], "SWEET", "Sweet_injuredloop", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					LoopingAnim(savingPlayer[playerid], "SWEET", "Sweet_injuredloop", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					Fell[savingPlayer[playerid]] = 3;
					SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_PINK,"Use /loadpt to load them into the ambulance");
				}
					
	        }
		}
	}
	if(JobCP[playerid] == 1)
	{
		if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to be on foot to salvage scraps");

		DPCP(playerid);
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
		LoopingAnim(playerid, "BOMBER","BOM_Plant_Loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
		SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "Salvaging Scraps");
		JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10; BarType[playerid] = 2;
		jobtimer[playerid] = defer CollectingScraps(playerid);
		jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		return 1;
	}
	if(Scrapping[playerid] >= 1)
	{
		if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == ScrapTruck[playerid])
		{
			new
				string[128],
				subval = sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]] * sPayout,
				Float:subtotal = subval / 4,
				total = floatround(subtotal, floatround_round)
			;
			switch(Scrapping[playerid])
			{
				case 1 .. 4:
				{
					DPCP(playerid);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += total + 175;
					sMetal += sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]];
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10; BarType[playerid] = 2;
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
					ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "DELIVERING SCRAPS");
					jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"Scrap Dropoff\r\nScrap Yards Metal:%d",sMetal);
					UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(ScrapperDropLabel, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string),"Trucker \n[/getprods] \nScrap Yards Metal:%d",sMetal);
					UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(ScrapPartLabel,0x00FF00AA, string);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"You are unloading %d lbs of metal and will earn $%d",sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]],total+75);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"Head out an get more scraps! Remeber you can /stopjob at anytime, or do a few runs");
					new scrap = random(sizeof(ScrapSpawns));
					SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,ScrapSpawns[scrap][0],ScrapSpawns[scrap][1],ScrapSpawns[scrap][2], 2.0,38,0);
					ScrapObject[playerid][0] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 952, ScrapSpawns[scrap][0],ScrapSpawns[scrap][1],ScrapSpawns[scrap][2]-0.3, 0.00, 0.0, 250.0);
					ScrapObject[playerid][1] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 952, ScrapSpawns[scrap][0],ScrapSpawns[scrap][1],ScrapSpawns[scrap][2]-0.5, 0.00, 0.00, 90.00, 250.0);
					sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]] = 0;
					Scrapping[playerid] += 1;
					JobCP[playerid] = 1;
				}
				case 5:
				{
					DPCP(playerid);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 10000;
					sMetal += sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]];
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
					JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10; BarType[playerid] = 2;
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
					ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "DELIVERING SCRAPS");
					jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"Scrap Dropoff\r\nScrap Yards Metal:%d",sMetal);
					UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(ScrapperDropLabel, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Trucker \n[/getprods] \nScrap Yards Metal:%d",sMetal);
					UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(ScrapPartLabel,0x00FF00AA, string);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "You are unloading %d lbs of metal and will earn $%d",sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]],total * 3);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Your shift is now over. Please make sure you /returnveh!");
					sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]] = 0;
					Scrapping[playerid] = 0;
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not in your scrapping truck");
		}
		return 1;
	}
/*
	if(MatRunning[playerid] >= 1)
	{
	    new
			subval = 10 * MatRunning[playerid],
			string[128]
		;

		if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must drop the mats off on foot");

		DPCP(playerid);
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] += subval;
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
		JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10; BarType[playerid] = 2;
		SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "DROPPING METAL");
		jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"/smugglemats\r\nAvailable Mats:%d",gSupply);
		UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(GunSLabel, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You are dropping off %d units of metal, and will receive %d materials as a bonus!",MatRunning[playerid],subval);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
		{
		    case 2:
		    {
		        SCM(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"You have received 75 extra mats for being level 2 VIP");
		        PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] += 75;
		    }
		    case 3:
		    {
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW,"You have received 150 extra mats for being level 3 VIP");
		        PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] += 150;
		    }
		    case 4:
		    {
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW,"You have received 250 extra mats for being level 4 VIP");
		        PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] += 250;
		    }
		}
		new y1,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Finished their mat smuggling run",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
		MatsLog(string);
		MatRunning[playerid] = -1;
		SaveGunDealer();
		return 1;
	}*/
	if(Trucking[playerid] >= 1)
	{
	    new Float:vPos[3];
	    GetVehiclePos(TruckerVeh[playerid],vPos[0],vPos[1],vPos[2]);
	    if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,100.0,vPos[0],vPos[1],vPos[2]))
	    {
	        SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_ORANGE,"You cannot do this if your truck isn't close enough");
	        return 1;
	    }
	}
	if(Trucking[playerid] >= 1)
	{
		switch(TruckerType[playerid])
		{
			case 1:
			{
				switch(Trucking[playerid])
				{
					case 1:
					{
						Trucking[playerid]+=1;
						DPCP(playerid);
						SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "You are now at the scrap metal yard. Use /getprods to load 10 boxes of scrap parts");
						SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "from the shelves. Then you will take them to the factory in exchange for car parts.");
					}
					case 2:
					{
						Trucking[playerid]+=1;
						DPCP(playerid);
						SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "You are now at the factory. Unload the 10 boxes of scrap parts from the truck");
						SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,90.0989,-307.0327,1.5781,1.0,51,0);
					}
					case 3 .. 12:
					{
						if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
						{
							switch(HasBox[playerid])
							{
								case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to /unloadtruck and take box from the truck first"); }
								case 1:
								{
									TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
									jobtimer[playerid] = defer ProdDelivery(playerid);
									BarType[playerid] = 1; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;
									SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
									PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
									PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "Delivering Scraps");
									jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
								}
							}
						}
						else
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to unload a box from the truck on foot!");
						}
					}
					case 13:
					{
						Trucking[playerid]+=1;
						DPCP(playerid);
						SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "You are at the factory load point. Go grab and then load 10 boxes of car parts into your truck");
						SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, -157.2660,-288.2795,3.9053, 2.0,51,0);
					}
					case 14:
					{
						switch(HasBox[playerid])
						{
							case 0:
							{
								AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1220); HasBox[playerid] = 1;
								ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,1,0,0,1,1,1);
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "/loadtruck with this box of parts");
							}
							case 1: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "/loadtruck with the box of car parts you already have!"); }
						}
					}
					case 15 .. 24:
					{
						if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
						{
							switch(HasBox[playerid])
							{
								case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to /unloadtruck and take box from the truck first"); }
								case 1:
								{
									TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
									jobtimer[playerid] = defer ProdDelivery(playerid);
									BarType[playerid] = 1; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;
									SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
									ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
									PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
									PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
									PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "Delivering parts");
									jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
								}
							}
						}
						else
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to unload a box from the truck on foot!");
						}
					}
				}
			}
			case 2:
			{
				if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
				{
					switch(HasBox[playerid])
					{
						case 1:
						{
							DPCP(playerid);
							jobtimer[playerid] = defer ProdDelivery(playerid);
							BarType[playerid] = 1; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;
							SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
							ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "Delivering Products");
							jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
						}
						default: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must /unloadtruck first!"); }
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have to /unloadtruck and deliver it on foot");
				}
			}
			case 3:
			{
				switch(Trucking[playerid])
				{
					case 1:
					{
						if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"Get out of your vehicle");
						if(HasBox[playerid] != 0) return SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"/loadtruck to load the Box into the vehicle first!");
						SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"Type /loadtruck to load the Box into the vehicle!");
						ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,1,0,0,1,1,1);
						AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1220);
						HasBox[playerid] = 1;
					}
					case 2:
					{
						if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
							return SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"Get out of your vehicle and /unloadtruck");

						if(HasBox[playerid] == 0)
							return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need a box of materials. /unloadtruck smart guy!");

						TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
						jobtimer[playerid] = defer ProdDelivery[5000](playerid);
						BarType[playerid] = 2; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;
						SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
						ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], " Delivering Mats");
						jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
					}
				}
			}
			case 4:
			{
				switch(Trucking[playerid])
				{
					case 1:
					{
						DPCP(playerid);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You've arrived at the designated coordiantes. Wait for the drop.");
						jobtimer[playerid] = defer DrugDrop[1000](playerid);
						DropWait[playerid] = 1;
					}
					case 2:
					{
						if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
						{
							if(HasBox[playerid] == 1)
							{
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Load the truck with this one before getting more.");
								return 1;
							}
							TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
							jobtimer[playerid] = defer GettingDrugs(playerid);
							BarType[playerid] = 1; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;
							LoopingAnim(playerid, "BOMBER","BOM_Plant_Loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);

							SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
							ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], " COLLECTING DRUGS");
							jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
						}
						else
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to be on foot");
						}
					}
					case 3 .. 4:
					{
						if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
						{
							if(HasBox[playerid] != 1)
							{
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Take the seeds out of your truck");
								return 1;
							}
							TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
							jobtimer[playerid] = defer ProdDelivery(playerid);
							BarType[playerid] = 1; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;

							SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
							ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], " DELIVERING DRUGS");
							jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
						}
						else
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to be on foot");
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(Farming[playerid] >= 1)
	{
		switch(Farming[playerid])
		{
			case 1 .. 14:
			{
				Farming[playerid] += 1; DPCP(playerid);
				SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, FarmerCP[Farming[playerid]-1][0],FarmerCP[Farming[playerid]-1][1],FarmerCP[Farming[playerid]-1][2], 8.0,19,0);
			}
			case 15:
			{
				Farming[playerid] = 16; DPCP(playerid); CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); DestroyVehicle(FarmerVeh[playerid]); FarmerVeh[playerid] = -1;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "It's now time to /plantseed. Make sure you plant around the soil you cleared");
			}
			case 31 .. 35:
			{
				if(GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must be on foot in order to harvest your crops");
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
					DPCP(playerid);
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
					jobtimer[playerid] = defer EndHarvest(playerid);
					LoopingAnim(playerid, "BOMBER","BOM_Plant_Loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
					BarType[playerid] = 2; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10;
					SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
					ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "Harvesting Crops");
					jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
				}
			}
			case 36 .. 40:
			{
				switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
				{
					case 1:
					{
						switch(HasHarvest[playerid])
						{
							case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have the boxes of your harvest in hand"); }
							case 1:
							{
								jobtimer[playerid] = defer DeliverHarvest(playerid);
								BarType[playerid] = 1; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;
								SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
								ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
								PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
								PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
								PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "DELIVERING HARVEST ");
								jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
							}
						}
					}
					case 2: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to be on foot and /takebox from the truck before delivering your harvest"); }
				}
			}
		}
		return 1;
	}

	if(PizzaBoy[playerid] >=1)
	{
		switch(PizzaBoy[playerid])
		{
			case 1 .. 4, 6 .. 9, 11 .. 14:
			{
				switch(HasPizza[playerid])
				{
					case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't deliver pizza like this! Get off the bike and /getpizza, silly!!"); }
					case 1:
					{
						HasPizza[playerid] = 0;
						DPCP(playerid);
						DestroyDynamicPickup(pizzabox[playerid]);
						BarType[playerid] = 1; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;
						jobtimer[playerid] = defer NextPizzaBoyLocation(playerid);
						SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], " Delivering Pizza");
						jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
						TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
					}
				}
			}
			case 5, 10:
			{
				DPCP(playerid);
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
				jobtimer[playerid] = defer NextPizzaBoyLocation[25000](playerid);
				SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
				ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
				BarType[playerid] = 3; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 25;
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], " RESTOCKING BIKE");
				jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "New Pizza Deliver orders are being sent from the kitchen. Wait until they give them to you.");
			}
			case 15:
			{
				switch(HasPizza[playerid])
				{
					case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't deliver pizza like this! Get off the bike and /getpizza, silly!!"); }
					case 1:
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 7000;
						PizzaBoy[playerid] = 0; HasPizza[playerid] = 0;
						DPCP(playerid); DestroyDynamicPickup(pizzabox[playerid]); RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "* After another long day of work, your shift has ended.");
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "* $7000 was added to your paycheck. Well Stacked Pizza thanks you for your service!");
					}
				}
			}
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(LawnMower[playerid] >= 1)
	{
		switch(LawnMower[playerid])
		{
			case 1 .. 15:
			{
				if(!IsPlayerInVehicle(playerid, Mower[playerid]))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not on a mower");
					return 1;
				}
				LawnMower[playerid] += 1;
				DPCP(playerid); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
				jobtimer[playerid] = defer NextGrassPatch(playerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "This patch needs to be mowed down completely");
				BarType[playerid] = 2; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10;

				SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "MOWING THE GRASS");
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
				jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
			}
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(NeedsWater[playerid] != -1)
	{
		DPCP(playerid);
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
		jobtimer[playerid] = defer WateringWeed(playerid);
		BarType[playerid] = 2; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10;
		ApplyAnimation(playerid, "BOMBER","BOM_Plant_Loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
		SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "Watering Pot Plant");
		jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You are now watering the plants. This will help them grow!");
		return 1;
	}
	DPCP(playerid);
   	LogCallback("OnPlayerEnterCheckpoint");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerEnterDynamicArea(playerid, areaid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEnterDynamicArea");
	foreach(Player,i)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
			if(areaid == boomboxarea[i])
			{
				if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming") != 1)
				{
					SetPVarInt(playerid,"BoomBoxPlaying", 1);
					SetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming", 1);
					PlayAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid,PlayerInfo[i][pBBStation]);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEnterDynamicArea");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerLeaveDynamicArea(playerid, areaid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerLeaveDynamicArea");
	if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"BoomBoxPlaying") == 1)
	{
	    SetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming", 0);
		SetPVarInt(playerid,"BoomBoxPlaying", 0);
	    StopAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid);
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEnterDynamicArea");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerEditObject(playerid, playerobject, objectid, response, Float:fX, Float:fY, Float:fZ, Float:fRotX, Float:fRotY, Float:fRotZ)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEditObject");
	if(EditingBoomBox[playerid] == true)
	{
	    switch(response)
		{
			case 0:
			{
				SCM(playerid, -1, "You have canceled!");
				DestroyObject(boombox[playerid]);
				return 1;
			}
			case 1:
			{
				PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][0] = fX;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][1] = fY;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][2] = fZ;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][3] = fRotX;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][4] = fRotY;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][5] = fRotZ;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pBBVw] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pBBInt] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
				EditingBoomBox[playerid] = false;
				boomboxarea[playerid] = CreateDynamicSphere(fX, fY, fZ, 20.0, GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid),GetPlayerInterior(playerid),INVALID_PLAYER_ID);
				DestroyObject(boombox[playerid]);
				boombox[playerid] = CreateObject(2226,PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][0],PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][1],PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][2],PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][3],PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][4],PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][5],3.9700012207031);
				return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	if(AtmEdit[playerid] != -1)
	{
		switch(response)
		{
			case 0:
			{
				DestroyObject(Atm[AtmEdit[playerid]]);
				AtmEdit[playerid] = -1;
			}
			case 1:
			{
				new i = AtmEdit[playerid];
				aInfo[i][aPos][0] = fX;
				aInfo[i][aPos][1] = fY;
				aInfo[i][aPos][2] = fZ;
				aInfo[i][aRot][0] = fRotX;
				aInfo[i][aRot][1] = fRotY;
				aInfo[i][aRot][2] = fRotZ;
				aInfo[i][aInt] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
				aInfo[i][aVw] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
				aInfo[i][aUsed] = 1;
				SaveAtms();
				DestroyObject(Atm[i]);
				CreateDynamicObject(2942,fX,fY,fZ,fRotX,fRotY,fRotZ,GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid),GetPlayerInterior(playerid),-1,50.0);
				Streamer_UpdateEx(playerid,fX,fY,fZ,GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid),GetPlayerInterior(playerid));
				AtmEdit[playerid] = -1;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEditObject");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerEditAttachedObject(playerid, response, index, modelid, boneid, Float:fOffsetX, Float:fOffsetY, Float:fOffsetZ, Float:fRotX, Float:fRotY, Float:fRotZ, Float:fScaleX, Float:fScaleY, Float:fScaleZ)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEditAttachedObject");
	if(response)
	{
	    if(editing[playerid] == 1)
	    {
        	switch(toyslot[playerid])
        	{
	            case 0://if slot == 1
				{
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][0] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][1] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][2] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][3] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][4] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][5] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][6] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][7] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][8] = fScaleZ;
			        SaveStat(playerid, 1);
			    }
			    case 1:
			    {
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][9] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][10] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][11] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][12] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][13] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][14] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][15] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][16] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][17] = fScaleZ;
			        SaveStat(playerid, 2);
			    }
			    case 2:
			    {
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][18] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][19] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][20] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][21] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][22] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][23] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][24] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][25] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][26] = fScaleZ;
					SaveStat(playerid, 3);
			    }
			    case 3:
			    {
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][27] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][28] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][29] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][30] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][31] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][32] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][33] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][34] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][35] = fScaleZ;
			        SaveStat(playerid, 4);
			    }
				case 4:
				{
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][36] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][37] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][38] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][39] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][40] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][41] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][42] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][43] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][44] = fScaleZ;
			        SaveStat(playerid, 5);
			    }
			    case 5:
			    {
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][45] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][46] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][47] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][48] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][49] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][50] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][51] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][52] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][53] = fScaleZ;
					SaveStat(playerid, 6);
			    }
			    case 6:
				{
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][54] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][55] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][56] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][57] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][58] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][59] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][60] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][61] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][62] = fScaleZ;
			        SaveStat(playerid, 7);
			    }
			    case 7:
			    {
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][63] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][64] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][65] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][66] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][67] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][68] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][69] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][70] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][71] = fScaleZ;
			        SaveStat(playerid, 8);
			    }
			    case 8:
			    {
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][72] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][73] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][74] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][75] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][76] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][77] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][78] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][79] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][80] = fScaleZ;
			        SaveStat(playerid, 9);

			    }
			    case 9:
			    {
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][81] = fOffsetX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][82] = fOffsetY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][83] = fOffsetZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][84] = fRotX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][85] = fRotY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][86] = fRotZ;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][88] = fScaleX;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][88] = fScaleY;
			        ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][89] = fScaleZ;
			        SaveStat(playerid, 10);
			    }
			}
			editing[playerid] = -1;
			toyslot[playerid] = -1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEditAttachedObject");
	return 1;
}
stock ShowServerDialog(playerid, dialogid, style, caption[], info[], button1[], button2[])
{
	LogCallback("ShowServerDialog");
	dialogShown[playerid] = dialogid;
	ShowPlayerDialog(playerid, dialogid, style, caption, info, button1, button2);
	LogCallback("ShowServerDialog");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerModelSelection(playerid, response, listid, modelid)
{
    if(listid == bedroomfurn || listid == kitchenfurn || listid == couchfurn || listid == elecfurn || listid == decourfurn)
	{
        if(response)
        {
            new i = furnSlot[playerid],hid =PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey],sql[256];
            if(i >= 0 || i <= 99)
            {
				furnInfo[hid][i][fUsed] = 1;
				furnInfo[hid][i][fModel] = modelid;
                furnInfo[hid][i][fActive] = 0;
                furnInfo[hid][i][fPos][0] = hInfo[hid][hExitx] + 5.0;
                furnInfo[hid][i][fPos][1] = hInfo[hid][hExity] + 5.0;
                furnInfo[hid][i][fPos][2] = hInfo[hid][hExitz];
                format(sql,sizeof(sql),"INSERT INTO `samp_furn` SET `used`='%d',`model`='%d',`int`='%d'",furnInfo[hid][i][fUsed],furnInfo[hid][i][fModel],hInfo[hid][hInt]);
                format(sql,sizeof(sql),"%s,`posX`='%f',`posY`='%f',`posZ`='%f',`posRX`='%f',`posRY`='%f',`posRZ`='%f',`house`='%d',`slot`='%d'",sql,hInfo[hid][hEnter][0] + 1.0,hInfo[hid][hEnter][1] + 1.0,hInfo[hid][hEnter][2],furnInfo[hid][i][fPos][3],furnInfo[hid][i][fPos][4],furnInfo[hid][i][fPos][5],hid,i);
                mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEFURN,hid);
                furnInfo[hid][i][fObjectID] = CreateDynamicObject(modelid,hInfo[hid][hExitx]+5.0,hInfo[hid][hExity]+5.0,hInfo[hid][hExitz],0,0,0,hid,hInfo[hid][hInt],-1,80.0);
                SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"You have purchased some furniture and it has been shipped to your house");
            }
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

public OnDialogResponse(playerid, dialogid, response, listitem, inputtext[])
{
	LogCallback("OnDialogResponse");
    new string[256];
	if(dialogid != dialogShown[playerid])
	{
		format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}Warning:{AA3333} %s is possibly spoofing dialog ids, if this concontinues to happen kick them",GPN(playerid));
		SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED,string);
		return 1;
	}
	new sendername[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
	GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));

	if(dialogid == HOUSE_FURN)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
			    case 0://edit furniture
			    {
					new varf;
					switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
					{
						case 0: varf = 20;
					    case 1: varf = 40;
					    case 2: varf = 60;
					    case 3: varf = 80;
					    case 4: varf = 100;
					}
					new blist[128],list[1000],hid = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
					for(new i = 0; i < varf; i ++)
					{
					    if(furnInfo[hid][i][fUsed] == 1)
					    {
							if(furnInfo[hid][i][fModel] != 0)
							{
								format(blist,sizeof(blist),"{00FF00}[SLOT:%d]{FFFFFF}OBJECT:%d\r\n",i,furnInfo[hid][i][fModel]);
							}
							else
							{
							    format(blist,sizeof(blist),"{FF0000}[SLOT:%d]{FFFFFF}UNUSED\r\n",i);
							}
							strcat(list,blist,1000);
						}
					}
     				ShowServerDialog(playerid,LIST_FURN_INV,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Select your object",list,"Continue","Cancel");
				}
				case 1://delete furniture
				{
					new varf;
					switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
					{
						case 0: varf = 20;
					    case 1: varf = 40;
					    case 2: varf = 60;
					    case 3: varf = 80;
					    case 4: varf = 100;
					}
					new blist[128],list[1000],hid = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
					for(new i = 0; i < varf; i ++)
					{
					    if(furnInfo[hid][i][fUsed] == 1)
					    {
							if(furnInfo[hid][i][fModel] != 0)
							{
								format(blist,sizeof(blist),"{00FF00}[SLOT:%d]{FFFFFF}OBJECT:%d\r\n",i,furnInfo[hid][i][fModel]);
							}
							else
							{
							    format(blist,sizeof(blist),"{FF0000}[SLOT:%d]{FFFFFF}UNUSED\r\n",i);
							}
							strcat(list,blist,1000);
						}
					}
     				ShowServerDialog(playerid,DELETE_FURN,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Select your object",list,"Continue","Cancel");
				}
			}
		}

	}
	if(dialogid == DELETE_FURN)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
	        new slot = listitem,hid = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
	        if(furnInfo[hid][slot][fUsed] == 1)
	        {
	            DestroyDynamicObject(furnInfo[hid][slot][fObjectID]);
	            DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(furnInfo[hid][slot][fTag]);
	            furnInfo[hid][slot][fUsed] = 0;
	            furnInfo[hid][slot][fModel] = 0;
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][0] = 0;
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][1] = 0;
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][2] = 0;
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][3] = 0;
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][4] = 0;
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][5] = 0;
				new sql[256];
				format(sql,sizeof(sql),"DELETE FROM `samp_furn` WHERE `house`='%d' AND `slot`='%d'",hid,slot);
				mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEFURN,hid);

	        } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You do not have anything in this slot so you cannot edit it");
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == LIST_FURN_INV)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
			new slot = listitem,hid = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			if(furnInfo[hid][slot][fUsed] == 1)
			{
				DestroyDynamicObject(furnInfo[hid][slot][fObjectID]);
	            new Float:furnPos[3];
	            GetPlayerPos(playerid,furnPos[0],furnPos[1],furnPos[2]);
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fObjectID] = CreateDynamicObject(furnInfo[hid][slot][fModel],furnPos[0]+2.0,furnPos[1]+2.0,furnPos[2],0,0,0,hid,hInfo[hid][hInt],-1,80.0);
				EditDynamicObject(playerid,furnInfo[hid][slot][fObjectID]);
			    editingFurniture[playerid] = true;
			    editingFslot[playerid] = slot;
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You do not have anything in this slot so you cannot edit it...");
	    
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_FURNITURE_TYPE)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			new str[12] = "Choose Item";
			switch(listitem)
		    {
		        case 0: ShowModelSelectionMenu(playerid,bedroomfurn,str);
		        case 1: ShowModelSelectionMenu(playerid,couchfurn,str);
		        case 2: ShowModelSelectionMenu(playerid,elecfurn,str);
		        case 3: ShowModelSelectionMenu(playerid,decourfurn,str);
		        case 4: ShowModelSelectionMenu(playerid,kitchenfurn,str);
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_HOUSE_STORAGE)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
			    case 0:
			    {
			        ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_SELECT_STORAGE,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"What would you like to deposit?","Money\r\nMaterials\r\nGuns\r\nDrugs","Continue","Go back");
				}
				case 1:
			    {
		        	ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_SELECT_WITH,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"What would you like to withdraw?","Money\r\nMaterials\r\nGuns\r\nDrugs","Continue","Go back");
	            }
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_SELECT_WITH)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
			switch(listitem)
			{
			    case 0://money
			    {
					format(string,sizeof(string),"How much money do you want to withdraw?\r\n You have $%d in your safe",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeCash]);
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_MONEY_WITH,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Money withdraw",string,"Continue","Cancel");
			    }
			    case 1://mats
			    {
			        format(string,sizeof(string),"How many materials do you want to withdraw?\r\n You have %d in your safe",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeMats]);
			        ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_MATS_WITH,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Materials Withdraw",string,"Continue","Cancel");
			    }
	            case 2://guns
	            {
	                new gunName[24];
	                new weaponid,ammo,blist[128],list[512];
					for(new i = 0; i < 10; i++)
					{
						weaponid = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hGun][i];
						if(weaponid != 0)
					    {
					        GetWeaponName(weaponid,gunName,sizeof(gunName));
					        ammo = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hAmmo][i];
					    }
					    else
					    {
							gunName = "None";
							ammo = 0;
						}
						format(blist,sizeof(blist),"Weapon: %s\tAmmo: %d\r\n",gunName,ammo);
						strcat(list,blist,512);
					}
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_GUNSLOT_WITH,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Which gun slot do you want to withdraw your weapon from?",list,"Continue","Cancel");
	            }
				case 3://drugs
				{
				    ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_DRUG_WITH,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"What do you want to withrdaw?","{00FF00}Weed\r\n{FBFFB8}Crack\r\n{00FF00}Coke","Continue","Cancel");
				}
			}
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_DRUG_WITH)
	{
		if(response)
		{
		    switch(listitem)
		    {
		        case 0:
		        {
					format(string,sizeof(string),"How much weed do you want to withdraw?\r\nYou have {00FF00}%d{FFFFFF} grams inf your safe.",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hPot]);
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_WEED_WITH,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Withdrawing Weed",string,"Continue","Cancel");
		        }
		        
		        case 1:
		        {
		            format(string,sizeof(string),"How much crack do you want to withdraw?\r\nYou have {FBFFB8}%d{FFFFFF} grams left in your safe",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCrack]);
		            ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_CRACK_WITH,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Withdrawing Crack",string,"Continue","Cancel");
     	        }
		        
		        case 2:
		        {
					format(string,sizeof(string),"How much coke do you want to withdraw?\r\nYou have {FBFFB8}%d{FFFFFF} grams left in your safe",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCoke]);
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_COKE_WITH,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Withdrawing Coke",string,"Continue","Cancel");
		        }
		    }
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_COKE_WITH)
	{
	    new amt = strval(inputtext);
	    if(amt > 1 && amt <= hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCoke])
	    {
	        hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCoke] = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCoke] - amt;
	        PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] += amt;
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"You have withdrawn %d grams of coke from your house you have %d grams left",amt,hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCoke]);
	        SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
	        new sql[256];
	        format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeCoke`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCoke],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
	        mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
	        //log this
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_CRACK_WITH)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
			new amt = strval(inputtext);
			if(amt > 1 && amt <= hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCrack])
			{
			    hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCrack] = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCrack] - amt;
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5] += amt;
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have withdrawn %d grams of crack from your house and you got %d grams left",amt,hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCrack]);
				SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
				new sql[256];
				format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeCrack`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCrack],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
				mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
				//log this
			}
			
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_WEED_WITH)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
			new amt = strval(inputtext);
			if(amt > 1 && amt <= hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hPot])
			{
                hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hPot] = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hPot] - amt;
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3] += amt;
                format(string,sizeof(string),"You have withdrew %d grams of weed from your house you have %d left",amt,hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hPot]);
                SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
                new sql[256];
				format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safePot`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hPot],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
				mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
                //log this
			}
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_GUNSLOT_WITH)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			new slot = listitem;
			new weaponid = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hGun][slot];
			new ammo = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hAmmo][slot];
			if(weaponid != 0)
			{
				new weapons[2];
				new bool:allowed;
				allowed = true;
				GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, 2, weapons[0], weapons[1]);
				if(weapons[0] == 22 || weapons[0] == 23 && weaponid == 24)
				{
					allowed = false;
				}
				if(allowed == true)
				{
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid,weaponid,ammo);
					hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hGun][slot] = 0;
					hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hAmmo][slot] = 0;
					new sql[256];
					format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeWeapon[%d]`='%d', `safeAmmo[%d]`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",slot,0,slot,0,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
					mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
				}
				
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_MATS_WITH)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
	        new amt = strval(inputtext);
	        if(amt > 1 && amt <= hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeMats])
	        {
	            hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeMats] = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeMats] - amt;
	            format(string,sizeof(string),"You have withdraw %d materials from your safe you still have %d left",amt,hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeMats]);
	            SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
	            new sql[256];
	            format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeMats`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeMats],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
				mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] += amt;
				//log
	        }
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_MONEY_WITH)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
	        new amt = strval(inputtext);
			if(amt > 1 && amt <= hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeCash])
			{
                hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeCash] = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeCash] - amt;
                format(string,sizeof(string),"You have withdrawn $%d from your safe you still have $%d left",amt,hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeCash]);
                SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
                new sql[256];
                format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeCash`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeCash],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
                mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
                SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,amt);
                //log
                
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_GUNSLOT_DEPT)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
	        new slot = listitem,weaponid = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid),ammo= GetPlayerAmmo(playerid),gunName[24],sql[256];
	        if((hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hGun][slot] == 0 || weaponid == hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hGun][slot]) && weaponid != 0)
	        {
                hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hGun][slot] = weaponid;
				hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hAmmo][slot] += ammo;
				SetPlayerAmmo(playerid,weaponid,0);
				GetWeaponName(weaponid,gunName,sizeof(gunName));
				format(string,sizeof(string),"You have deposited a %s with %d rounds into your house",gunName,ammo);
				SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
				format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeWeapon[%d]`='%d', `safeAmmo[%d]`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",slot,weaponid,slot,ammo,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
				mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
	            if(ammo > 9999)
	            {
			        format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has just deposited %d rounds of %s into their house safe",GPN(playerid),ammo,gunName);
			        SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIMEGREEN,string);
	            }
				//log this
			}
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_SELECT_STORAGE)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 0://Money
			    {
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_MONEY_DEPT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Money deposit","How much money would you like to deposit?","Continue","Go back");
			    }
			    case 1://Mats
			    {
			        ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_MATS_DEPT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Materials deposit","How many materials would you like to deposit","Continue","Cancel");
    		    }
	            case 2://guns
	            {
	                new gunName[24];
	                new weaponid,ammo,blist[128],list[512];
					for(new i = 0; i < 10; i++)
					{
						weaponid = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hGun][i];
						if(weaponid != 0)
					    {
					        GetWeaponName(weaponid,gunName,sizeof(gunName));
					        ammo = hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hAmmo][i];
					    }
					    else
					    {
							gunName = "None";
							ammo = 0;
						}
						format(blist,sizeof(blist),"Weapon: %s\tAmmo: %d\r\n",gunName,ammo);
						strcat(list,blist,512);
					}
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_GUNSLOT_DEPT,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Which gun slot do you want to deposit your weapon into?",list,"Continue","Cancel");
	            }
	            case 3://drugs
	            {
	                ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_DRUGS_SELECT,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"What kind of drugs do you want to deposit?","{00FF00}Weed\r\n{FBFFB8}Crack\r\n{FFFFFF}Coke","Continue","Cancel");
	            }
			}
  	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_DRUGS_SELECT)
	{
		if(response)
		{
		    switch(listitem)
		    {
				case 0://weed
				{
				    ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_WEED_DEPT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"{00FF00}Weed deposit","{00FF00}How much weed do you want to deposit?","Continue","Cancel");
				}
				case 1://crack
				{
				    ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_CRACK_DEPT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"{FBFFB8}Crack Deposit","{FBFFB8}How much crack do you want to deposit?","Continue","Cancel");
				}
				case 2://coke
				{
				    ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_COKE_DEPT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Coke Deposit","How much coke do you want to deposit?","Continue","Cancel");
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_COKE_DEPT)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
			new amt = strval(inputtext);
			if(amt > 1 && amt <= PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4])
			{
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] - amt;
		        hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCoke] += amt;
		        format(string,sizeof(string),"You have deposited %d grams of coke into your safe you now have %d grams in total",amt,hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCoke]);
		        SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
		        new sql[256];
		        format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeCoke`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCoke],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
		        mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
		        //log me
			}
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_CRACK_DEPT)
	{
		if(response)
		{
		    new amt = strval(inputtext);
		    if(amt > 1 && amt <= PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5])
		    {
		        PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5] - amt;
		        hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCrack] += amt;
		        format(string,sizeof(string),"You have deposited %d grams of crack into your safe you now have %d grams in total",amt,hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCrack]);
		        SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
		        new sql[256];
		        format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeCrack`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hCrack],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
		        mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
		        //log me
		    }
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_WEED_DEPT)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
			new amt = strval(inputtext);
			if(amt > 1 && amt <= PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3])
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3] - amt;
			    hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hPot] += amt;
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have added %d grams of weed to your safe you now have %d grams in total",amt,hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hPot]);
			    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
			    new sql[256];
			    format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safePot`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hPot],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
			    mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
			    //log me
			}
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_MATS_DEPT)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
			new amount = strval(inputtext);
			if(amount > 1 && amount <= PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats])
	        {
	            new sql[256];
	            hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeMats] += amount;
	            format(string,sizeof(string),"You have deposited %d materials into your safe, you now have a total of %d materials in your safe",amount,hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeMats]);
	            SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
	            //Log it
	            PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] - amount;
	            format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeMats`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeMats],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
	            mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
	            if(amount > 99999)
	            {
			        format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has just deposited %d materials into their house safe",GPN(playerid),amount);
			        SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIMEGREEN,string);
	            }
	        }
	        
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == HOUSE_MONEY_DEPT)
	{
		if(response)
		{

			if(strval(inputtext) > 1 && strval(inputtext) <= GetPlayerCash(playerid))
			{
			    new sql[256];
				hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeCash] += strval(inputtext);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have deposited $%d dollars into your safe you now have $%d in your safe",strval(inputtext),hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeCash]);
			    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
			    //log it
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,(-strval(inputtext)));
			    format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `safeCash`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][pSafeCash],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);
			    mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]);

			    if(strval(inputtext) > 99999)
			    {
			        format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has just deposited $%d into their house safe",GPN(playerid),strval(inputtext));
			        SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIMEGREEN,string);
			    }
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Stop trying to exploit");
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == CHARGE_DIALOG)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
			if(GetPlayerWantedLevel(suIng[playerid]) <= 5)
			{
		        new sqlQuery[256],felon[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],officer[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],crime[256],date[128];
		        mysql_real_escape_string(GPN(suIng[playerid]),felon);
		        mysql_real_escape_string(GPN(playerid),officer);
		        mysql_real_escape_string(inputtext,crime);
		        new Year, Month, Day;
				getdate(Year, Month, Day);
				NumberOfCharges += 1;
		        format(date,sizeof(date),"%d/%d/%d",Month,Day,Year);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"You have charged %s with %s",GPN(suIng[playerid]),inputtext);
				SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_CHARGED,string);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has just charged you with %s",GPN(playerid),inputtext);
				SendClientMessage(suIng[playerid],COLOR_CHARGED,string);
				new var = GetPlayerWantedLevel(suIng[playerid]);
				var += 1;
				SetPlayerWantedLevel(suIng[playerid],var);
				WantedLevel[suIng[playerid]] += 1;
				PlayerInfo[suIng[playerid]][pWanted] = 1;
				PlayerInfo[suIng[playerid]][pWantedLevel] += 1;
  				PlayerInfo[suIng[playerid]][pCrimes] += 1;
  				SetPlayerColor(suIng[playerid], 0xFFFFFF00);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You've commited a crime: %s. Reporter: %s.",GPN(suIng[playerid]),GPN(playerid));
				SCM(suIng[playerid], COLOR_DNICERED, string);
				PlayCrimeReportForPlayer(suIng[playerid],suIng[playerid],5);
				format(sqlQuery,sizeof(sqlQuery),"INSERT INTO `samp_charges` SET `Felon`='%s',`Officer`='%s',`Crime`='%s',`Date`='%s',`ArrestID`='%d',`Active`='Yes'",felon,officer,crime,date,NumberOfCharges);
				mysql_query(sqlQuery,THREAD_SAVECHARGES,NumberOfCharges);
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"That player has already earned the max jail/prison time just book them");
		}

	}
