					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /whyleft, /aeject, /chechhouse, /mute, /alias, /ips, /apm");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /xp, /unbanip, /togconnection, /agivepassport, /aopen, asellhouse");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /house, /houseo, /resetvip, /setvip, /mole, /setstat, /gotosfdocks");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /gotolvap, /gotoamu, /gotoshop, /goback, /adminarea, /gotolv, /gotodd");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /gotosf, /setdrunk, /countdown, /startevent, /xgoto, /copsuspend");
				 		SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /setmats, /agivemats, /explode, /burn, /createdoor, /asellbiz");
						SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /asellsbiz, /hq, /acnn, /gasplace, /go(PD/EMS Gates), /sethp,");
						SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /setarmour, /setbiz, /sethouse, /reward, /crash, /clearrecord,");
						SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /fly, /left, /right, /forw, /back, /biz, /bizo, /sbiz, /tod, /dealership");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /setfight, /unsetbiz, /unsethouse, /payday, /taxday, /setleader");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /createpickup, /makeircadmin, /ffactiondrugs, /factiongun, /money");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /bankmoney, /bankreward, /tax, /banktax, /makehelper, /makemod, /ajp");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /spayday, /setweapskill, /setadminlevel, /fcrate, /fdelete, cardebug");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /gotorpl, /weaponequip, /moneyall, /fstrike, /fsetstrike, /families, /kickemall");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::STAFF MANAGER:: /acceptfire, /agivemethadone");
					}
					else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 1338)
					{
					    ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN,"____________COMMUNITY DIRECTOR COMMANDS___________");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /goto, /gethere, /getcar, /gotocar, /setint, /setvw");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /atalks, /aa(Accept atalk) /tra(Trash Atalk), /nmute");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /freeze, /setgender, /setage, /sls, /aduty, listnoobs ");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /rtc, /noooc, /nonewbie, /disarm, /check, /ajail, /gotols");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /gotobank, /gotolsch, /mark, /gotomark, /gotopd, /nick");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /kick, /unjail, /unwarn, /warn, /ban, /unban, /getincar");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /carreset, /gotoammu, /oban, /ocs(Offline Check Stats");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /isbanned, /adivorce, /mpm, /spec, /specoff, /agunskill");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /hvwint, /hkey, /slap, /punch, /reports /ar(Accept Report)");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /tr(Trash Report), /down, /up, turn, /notchecked, /checked,");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /whyleft, /aeject, /chechhouse, /mute, /alias, /ips, /apm");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /xp, /unbanip, /togconnection, /agivepassport, /aopen, asellhouse");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /house, /houseo, /resetvip, /setvip, /mole, /setstat, /gotosfdocks");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /gotolvap, /gotoamu, /gotoshop, /goback, /adminarea, /gotolv, /gotodd");
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /gotosf, /setdrunk, /countdown, /startevent, /xgoto, /copsuspend");
				 		SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /setmats, /agivemats, /explode, /burn, /createdoor, /asellbiz");
						SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /asellsbiz, /hq, /acnn, /gasplace, /go(PD/EMS Gates), /sethp,");
						SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /setarmour, /setbiz, /sethouse, /reward, /crash, /clearrecord,");
						SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /fly, /left, /right, /forw, /back, /biz, /bizo, /sbiz, /tod, /dealership");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /setfight, /unsetbiz, /unsethouse, /payday, /taxday, /setleader");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /createpickup, /makeircadmin, /ffactiondrugs, /factiongun, /money");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /bankmoney, /bankreward, /tax, /banktax, /makehelper, /makemod, /ajp");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /spayday, /setweapskill, /setadminlevel, /fcrate, /fdelete, cardebug");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /gotorpl, /weaponequip, /moneyall, /fstrike, /fsetstrike, /families, /kickemall");
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"::COMMUNITY DIRECTOR:: /fuelcars, /acceptfire, /agivemethadone");
					}
				}
		    }
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == SETUNIT_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pUnit],inputtext,0,strlen(inputtext),11);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set your unit number to %s.",inputtext);
			SCM(playerid,-1,string);
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == EMERGENCY_DIALOG)
	{
	    if(response)
		{
        	switch(emergencystep[playerid])
        	{
        		case 1:
        		{
        	        if(strfind(inputtext,"police",true) == 0)
					{
		        		if(PDCall[playerid][PDCallUsed] == false)
		        		{
		        			ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Dispatch","(Cellphone)Dispatch Says: Los Santos Police Department, please state your emergency.","Okay","Cancel");
		        			emergencystep[playerid] = 2;
       		    			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
		        			{
		        			    format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger Says (cellphone): %s",inputtext);
        						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
        						return 1;
		        			}
		        			else
		        			{
		        				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Says (cellphone): %s", GPN(playerid), inputtext);
        						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
        						return 1;
							}
						}
						else if(PDCall[playerid][PDCallUsed] == true)
						{
							SCM(playerid,COLOR_RED,"* You have sent out a emergency already, please wait for your last one to expire!");
							SCM(playerid,TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "They hung up.");
							emergencystep[playerid] = -1;
							return 1;
						}
					}
					if(strfind(inputtext,"paramedic",true) == 0)
					{
					    if(EMSCall[playerid][EMSCallUsed] == false)
	        			{
	        				ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Dispatch","(Cellphone)Dispatch Says: Los Santos Fire and Medical, please state your emergency.","Okay","Cancel");
	        				emergencystep[playerid] = 4;
       		    			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
		        			{
		        			    format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger Says (cellphone): %s",inputtext);
        						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
        						return 1;
		        			}
		        			else
		        			{
		        				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Says (cellphone): %s", GPN(playerid), inputtext);
        						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
        						return 1;
							}
						}
						else if(EMSCall[playerid][EMSCallUsed] == true)
						{
							SCM(playerid,COLOR_RED,"* You have sent out a emergency already, please wait for your last one to expire!");
							SCM(playerid,TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "*They hung up.");
							emergencystep[playerid] = -1;
							return 1;
						}
	    			}
					if(strfind(inputtext,"none",true) == 0)
					{
	       				SCM(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"(Cellphone)Dispatch Says:Please don't call again wasting time, peoples lives could be at risk!");
	        			SCM(playerid,TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "They hung up.");
	        			SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_STOPUSECELLPHONE);
						emergencystep[playerid] = -1;
		    			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
      					{
    			    		format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger Says (cellphone): %s",inputtext);
       						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
       						return 1;
        				}
	        			else
	        			{
        					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Says (cellphone): %s", GPN(playerid), inputtext);
       						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
       						return 1;
						}
	    			}
					else
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
		        		{
		        		    format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger Says (cellphone): %s",inputtext);
        					ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
		       			}
		       			else
		       			{
		       				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Says (cellphone): %s", GPN(playerid), inputtext);
       						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
						}
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Dispatch","(Cellphone)Dispatch Says: Sorry I didn't hear that, can you please say it again.","Okay","Cancel");
					}
				}
				case 2:
				{
	    			if(isnull(inputtext))
					{
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Dispatch","(Cellphone) Dispatch Says: Hello? I don't think I can hear you, please speak again.","Okay","Cancel");
					}
					for(new i = 0; i < MAX_PDCALLS; i++)
					{
	    				if(PDCall[i][PDCallUsed] == false)
	    				{
	        				if(i == MAX_PDCALLS)
	        				{
	            				ClearPDCalls();
	            				i = 0;
	        				}
							if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
		        			{
		        			    format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger Says (cellphone): %s",inputtext);
        						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
		        			}
		        			else
		        			{
		        				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Says (cellphone): %s", GPN(playerid), inputtext);
        						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
							}
							pdcallID[playerid] = i;
							PDCall[i][PDCallUsed] = true;
							PDCall[i][PDCaller] = playerid;
							PDCall[i][PDCallExpires] = 300000;
   							PDCall[i][PDCallTimer] = SetTimerEx("ClearPDCall",PDCall[i][PDCallExpires],false,"i",i);
							format(PDCall[i][PDCallText],128,"Dispatch ID %d has reported %s",i,inputtext);
							ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Dispatch","(Cellphone)Dispatch Says: Thank you, may I also take down the location information if possible please.","Okay","Cancel");
							emergencystep[playerid] = 3;
							break;
						}
					}
				}
				case 3:
				{
				    if(isnull(inputtext))
					{
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Dispatch","(Cellphone) Dispatch Says: Hello? I don't think I can hear you, please speak again.","Okay","Cancel");
					}
					for(new i = 0; i < MAX_PDCALLS; i++)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
   						{
		        		    format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger Says (cellphone): %s",inputtext);
        					ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
		       			}
		       			else
		       			{
		       				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Says (cellphone): %s", GPN(playerid), inputtext);
        					ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
						}
		    			format(PDCall[i][PDCallLocation],128,"Location %s on number: %d.",inputtext,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber]);
		    			format(string,sizeof(string),"Dispatch Says: Emergency in, %s",PDCall[i][PDCallText]);
		    			SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,string);
		    			format(string,sizeof(string),"Dispatch Says: %s",PDCall[i][PDCallLocation]);
						SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,string);
						SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,"Use /respondtocallout(rtco) to respond to the call out.");
						SCM(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"(Cellphone) Disptach Say's: Thank you for reporting this, please expect a unit to be on it's way.");
						SCM(playerid,TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "They hung up.");
						SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_STOPUSECELLPHONE);
						emergencystep[playerid] = -1;
						break;
					}
				}
				case 4:
				{
	    			if(isnull(inputtext))
					{
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Dispatch","(Cellphone) Dispatch Says: Hello? I don't think I can hear you, please speak again.","Okay","Cancel");
					}
					for(new i = 0; i < MAX_EMSCALLS; i++)
					{
	    				if(EMSCall[i][EMSCallUsed] == false)
	    				{
	        				if(i == MAX_EMSCALLS)
	        				{
	            				ClearEMSCalls();
	            				i = 0;
        					}
							if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
		        			{
		        			    format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger Says (cellphone): %s",inputtext);
        						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
		        			}
		        			else
		        			{
		        				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Says (cellphone): %s", GPN(playerid), inputtext);
        						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
							}
							emscallID[playerid] = i;
							EMSCall[i][EMSCallUsed] = true;
							EMSCall[i][EMSCaller] = playerid;
							EMSCall[i][EMSCallExpires] = 300000;
   							EMSCall[i][EMSCallTimer] = SetTimerEx("ClearEMSCall",EMSCall[i][EMSCallExpires],false,"i",i);
							format(EMSCall[i][EMSCallText],128,"Dispatch ID %d has reported emergency %s",i,inputtext);
							emergencystep[playerid] = 5;
							ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Dispatch","(Cellphone)Dispatch Says: Thank you, may I also take down the location information if possible please.","Okay","Cancel");
							break;
						}
					}
				}
				case 5:
				{
					if(isnull(inputtext))
					{
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Dispatch","(Cellphone) Dispatch Says: Hello? I don't think I can hear you, please speak again.","Okay","Cancel");
					}
					for(new i = 0; i < MAX_EMSCALLS; i++)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
  						{
 			    			format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger Says (cellphone): %s",inputtext);
     						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
        				}
	        			else
	        			{
        					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Says (cellphone): %s", GPN(playerid), inputtext);
       						ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
						}
		    			format(EMSCall[i][EMSCallLocation],128,"Location %s on number: %d.",inputtext,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber]);
		    			format(string,sizeof(string),"Dispatch Says: %s",EMSCall[i][EMSCallText]);
		    			SendRadioMessage(2,COLOR_RED,string);
		    			format(string,sizeof(string),"Dispatch Says: %s",EMSCall[i][EMSCallLocation]);
						SendRadioMessage(2,COLOR_RED,string);
						SendRadioMessage(2,COLOR_RED,"Use /respondtocallout(rtco) to respond to the call out.");
						SCM(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"(Cellphone) Disptach Say's: Thank you for reporting this, please expect a ambulance to be on it's way.");
						SCM(playerid,TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "They hung up.");
						SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_STOPUSECELLPHONE);
						emergencystep[playerid] = -1;
						break;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    emergencystep[playerid] = -1;
		    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_STOPUSECELLPHONE);
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_COPCARS)
	{
		new ctype, ccl = RandomEx(0,3), E,L,A,D,H,T,O, dialog[128];
		if(response)
	    {
			switch(listitem)
			{
			    case 0:
			    {
			    	ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_COPCARSNONE,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Select A Vehicle Bellow","Moutain Bike\r\nPatrol Motorbike\r\nLSPD Crusier\r\nSFPD Crusier\r\nLVPD Cruiser\r\nTow Truck","Select Vehicle","Cancel");
			    	return 1;
			    }
				case 1:
				{
	    			pCopCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(596,CopCarPos[ccl][0],CopCarPos[ccl][1],CopCarPos[ccl][2],CopCarPos[ccl][3],252,1,-1); ctype = 9;
				}
			    case 2:
			    {
	                pCopCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(596,CopCarPos[ccl][0],CopCarPos[ccl][1],CopCarPos[ccl][2],CopCarPos[ccl][3],250,1,-1); ctype = 9;
				}
			    case 3:
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSwat] >= 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10)
			        {
			    		ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_COPCARSSWAT,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Select A Vehicle Bellow","SWAT Enforcer\r\nSWAT Tank\r\nFBI Rancher\r\nMaverick","Select Vehicle","Cancel");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are not SWAT or a high enough rank to use this!");
						strmid(dialog,"None\r\nTraffic Division\r\nHighway Division\r\nSWAT Divsion\r\nDetective Bureau\r\nHigh Commissioner",0,sizeof(dialog));
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_COPCARS,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Cop Cars",dialog,"Select Division","Cancel");
					}
			    }
			    case 4:
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank]>= 3)
					{
			    		ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_COPCARSDETECTIVE,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Select A Vehicle Bellow","Premier\r\nMerit","Select Vehicle","Cancel");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, -1, "* You are not a Officer or above!");
						strmid(dialog,"None\r\nTraffic Division\r\nHighway Division\r\nSWAT Divsion\r\nDetective Bureau\r\nHigh Commissioner",0,sizeof(dialog));
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_COPCARS,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Cop Cars",dialog,"Select Division","Cancel");
					}
			    }
			    case 5:
			    {
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10)
					{
					    pCopCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(599,CopCarPos[ccl][0],CopCarPos[ccl][1],CopCarPos[ccl][2],CopCarPos[ccl][3],0,1,-1); ctype = 9;
					}
					else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_ERROR,"You are bellow a high Commissioner!");
					    strmid(dialog,"None\r\nTraffic Division\r\nHighway Division\r\nSWAT Divsion\r\nDetective Bureau\r\nHigh Commissioner",0,sizeof(dialog));
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_COPCARS,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Cop Cars",dialog,"Select Division","Cancel");
					}
			    }
			}
		}
		PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, pCopCar[playerid], 0);
		GetVehicleParamsEx(pCopCar[playerid],E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		SetVehicleParamsEx(pCopCar[playerid],1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		strmid(CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cOwner],GPN(playerid),0,strlen(GPN(playerid)),MAX_PLAYER_NAME);
	    CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cWcart] = ctype;
	    CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cOID] = playerid;
		CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
		CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
		Gas[pCopCar[playerid]] = GasMax;
	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_COPCARSNONE)
	{
		new ctype, ccl = RandomEx(0,3), E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
		if(response)
		{
		    switch(listitem)
		    {
		        case 0:
		        {
		        	pCopCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(510,CopCarPos[ccl][0],CopCarPos[ccl][1],CopCarPos[ccl][2],CopCarPos[ccl][3],201,201,-1); ctype = 9;
		        }
		        case 1:
		        {
		            pCopCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(523,CopCarPos[ccl][0],CopCarPos[ccl][1],CopCarPos[ccl][2],CopCarPos[ccl][3],0,1,-1); ctype = 9;
		        }
		        case 2:
		        {
		            pCopCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(596,CopCarPos[ccl][0],CopCarPos[ccl][1],CopCarPos[ccl][2],CopCarPos[ccl][3],0,1,-1); ctype = 9;
		        }
		        case 3:
		        {
		            pCopCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(597,CopCarPos[ccl][0],CopCarPos[ccl][1],CopCarPos[ccl][2],CopCarPos[ccl][3],0,1,-1); ctype = 9;
		        }
		        case 4:
		        {
		            pCopCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(598,CopCarPos[ccl][0],CopCarPos[ccl][1],CopCarPos[ccl][2],CopCarPos[ccl][3],0,1,-1); ctype = 9;
		        }
		        case 5:
		        {
		            pCopCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(525,CopCarPos[ccl][0],CopCarPos[ccl][1],CopCarPos[ccl][2],CopCarPos[ccl][3],0,1,-1); ctype = 9;
		        }
		    }
		}
		PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, pCopCar[playerid], 0);
		GetVehicleParamsEx(pCopCar[playerid],E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		SetVehicleParamsEx(pCopCar[playerid],1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		strmid(CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cOwner],GPN(playerid),0,strlen(GPN(playerid)),MAX_PLAYER_NAME);
	    CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cWcart] = ctype;
	    CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cOID] = playerid;
		CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
		CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
	}
 	if(dialogid == DIALOG_COPCARSSWAT)
	{
		new ctype, ccl = RandomEx(0,3), E,L,A,D,H,T,O;

		{

		        }
		        case 1:

		        }

		        }
		    }
		}

			        SetPlayerColor(playerid, 0xFF333300);
			        SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 43, 20);
		        	strmid(unilist,"Fire Fighter 1\r\nFire Fighter 2 \r\nFire Fighter 3\r\nMedic 1\r\nMedic 2\r\nMedic 3\r\nFemale Medic",0,sizeof(unilist));
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSDUNI,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"UNIFORMS",unilist,"Select","Cancel");
			    }
			    case 2:
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10)
			        {
			            SetPlayerColor(playerid, 0xFF333300);
			        	SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 43, 20);
		        		strmid(unilist,"Fire Fighter 1\r\nFire Fighter 2 \r\nFire Fighter 3\r\nMedic 1\r\nMedic 2\r\nMedic 3\r\nFemale Medic\r\nDoctor",0,sizeof(unilist));
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSDUNI,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"UNIFORMS",unilist,"Select","Cancel");
					}
					else
					{
					    SetPlayerColor(playerid, 0xFF333300);
					    SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 43, 20);
					    SCM(playerid,-1,"You are not a high enough member to use this!");
					    strmid(emslist,"Firefighter\r\n Medic\r\nHigh Commission\r\nHealth & Armour",0,sizeof(emslist));
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSDEQ,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"LOADOUTS",emslist,"Select","Cancel");
					}
			    }
			    case 3:
			    {
			        SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
			        SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
			        strmid(emslist,"Firefighter\r\nMedic\r\nHigh Commission\r\nHealth & Armour",0,sizeof(emslist));
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSDEQ,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"LOADOUTS",emslist,"Select","Cancel");
			    }
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_EMSDUNI)
	{
	    new unilist[256];
	    if(response)
		{
		    switch(listitem)
		    {
		        case 0:
		        {
		            SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 277);
		            SCM(playerid, -1,"You have suited up in the Fire Fighter's uniform.");
		        }
		        case 1:
		        {
		            SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 278);
		            SCM(playerid, -1,"You have suited up in the Fire Fighter's uniform.");
		        }
		        case 2:
		        {
		            SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 279);
		            SCM(playerid, -1,"You have suited up in the Fire Fighter's uniform.");
		        }
		        case 3:
				{
				    SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 274);
				    SCM(playerid, -1,"You have suited up in the Medic's uniform.");
				}
				case 4:
				{
				    SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 275);
				    SCM(playerid, -1,"You have suited up in the Medic's uniform.");
				}
				case 5:
				{
				    SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 276);
				    SCM(playerid, -1,"You have suited up in the Medic's uniform.");
				}
				case 6:
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 2)
				    {
					    SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 211);
					    SCM(playerid, -1,"You have suited up in the female Medic's uniform.");
				    }
				    else
				    {
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED,"What are you doing, you are not a female!");
				        format(string,sizeof(string),"[OOC NOTE] %s %s has tried to dress up in female clothes!",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid));
	        			SendRadioMessage(2,COLOR_RED,string);
	        			strmid(unilist,"Fire Fighter 1\r\nFire Fighter 2 \r\nFire Fighter 3\r\nMedic 1\r\nMedic 2\r\nMedic 3\r\nFemale Medic\r\nDoctor",0,sizeof(unilist));
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSDUNI,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"UNIFORMS",unilist,"Select","Cancel");
				    }
				}
				case 7:
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10)
				    {
				        SetPlayerSkin(playerid,70);
				        SCM(playerid, -1,"You have suited up in the Doctor's uniform.");
				    }
				    else
				    {
						SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are not a high enough rank to wear this!");
						strmid(unilist,"Fire Fighter 1\r\nFire Fighter 2 \r\nFire Fighter 3\r\nMedic 1\r\nMedic 2\r\nMedic 3\r\nFemale Medic\r\nDoctor",0,sizeof(unilist));
						ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSDUNI,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"UNIFORMS",unilist,"Select","Cancel");
				    }
				}
		    }
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_EMSCARS)
	{
		new
			ctype,
			ccl = RandomEx(0,3),
			E,L,A,D,H,T,O
		;
		if(pEmsCar[playerid] != -1) return SCM(playerid, -1, "You already have a EMS car out!, type /destroyemscar to before you get a new one!");
		switch(listitem)
	    {
	        case 0: { pEmsCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(416,EmsCarPos[ccl][0],EmsCarPos[ccl][1],EmsCarPos[ccl][2],EmsCarPos[ccl][3],1,3,-1); ctype = 11;}//Ambulance
	        case 1: { pEmsCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(490,EmsCarPos[ccl][0],EmsCarPos[ccl][1],EmsCarPos[ccl][2],EmsCarPos[ccl][3],1,3,-1); ctype = 11;}//Ranger
			case 2: { pEmsCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(563,2036.5997,-1381.4506,48.3359,86.8073, 1, 3, -1); ctype = 11;}//Raindance
			case 3: { pEmsCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(407,2027.0111,-1445.7130,16.8882,80.5406,3,3,-1); ctype = 11;}//FireTruck
		}
		PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, pEmsCar[playerid], 0);
		GetVehicleParamsEx(pEmsCar[playerid],E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		SetVehicleParamsEx(pEmsCar[playerid],1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		strmid(CarInfo[pEmsCar[playerid]][cOwner],GPN(playerid),0,strlen(GPN(playerid)),MAX_PLAYER_NAME);
	    CarInfo[pEmsCar[playerid]][cWcart] = ctype;
	    CarInfo[pEmsCar[playerid]][cOID] = playerid;
		CarInfo[pEmsCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
		CarInfo[pEmsCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
		Gas[pEmsCar[playerid]] = GasMax;
	}
	if(dialogid == ARREST_REPORT_INPUT)
	{
        if(response)
	    {
			if(IsPlayerConnected(arresting[playerid]))
			{
				switch(arrestStep[playerid])
	        	{
	        	    case 1://They have filled in their name
	        	    {
						arrestStep[playerid] = 2;
						format(ArrestInfo[playerid][aOfficer],MAX_PLAYER_NAME,"%s",GPN(playerid));
					//	strmid(ArrestInfo[playerid][aOfficer],GPN(playerid),0,MAX_PLAYER_NAME);
						format(string,sizeof(string),"You have filled in %s for your name",GPN(playerid));
						SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
						if(editingArrest[playerid] == true)
						{
							editingArrest[playerid] = false;
							ShowArrestReport(playerid);
						    return 1;
						}
						else
						{
							ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"What is the suspects name?","Please type their full name to continue\r\nIf they refuse to supply a name just put 'John_Doe'","Okay"," ");
						}
				    }
				    case 2:
				    {
						if(strlen(inputtext) > MAX_PLAYER_NAME)
						{
							SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Error name is to long...");
                            ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"What is the suspects name?","Please type their full name to continue","Okay"," ");
                            return 1;
						}
						arrestStep[playerid] = 3;
						new escapedName[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
						mysql_real_escape_string(inputtext,escapedName);
                        format(ArrestInfo[playerid][aSuspect],MAX_PLAYER_NAME,"%s",escapedName);
						//strmid(ArrestInfo[playerid][aSuspect],inputtext,0,MAX_PLAYER_NAME);
				        format(string,sizeof(string),"You have filled in %s for the suspects name",escapedName);
				        SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
				        if(editingArrest[playerid] == true)
				        {
							editingArrest[playerid] = false;
							ShowArrestReport(playerid);
				            return 1;
				        }
				        else
				        {
				        	ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"What are the charges?","Please type all associated charges below.","Continue"," ");
						}
					}
				    case 3:
				    {
				        if(strval(inputtext) >256)
						{
							SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Error, to many charges please reduce them");
							ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"What are the charges?","Please type all associated charges below.","Continue"," ");
							return 1;
						}
				        arrestStep[playerid] = 4;
						new escapedName[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
						mysql_real_escape_string(inputtext,escapedName);
                        format(ArrestInfo[playerid][aCharges],256,"%s",escapedName);
				       // strmid(ArrestInfo[playerid][aCharges],inputtext,0,256);
				        SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"You have just filled in the charges section");
				        if(editingArrest[playerid] == true)
				        {
							editingArrest[playerid] = false;
				            ShowArrestReport(playerid);
				            return 1;
				        }
				        else
				        {
				        	ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Addition Information","Please put any additional info below if none then just type 'none'","Continue", " ");
				        }
					}
					case 4:
					{
					    if(strval(inputtext) > 256)
						{
							SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Error, the addition info section is to long please reduce it.");
							ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Addition Information","Please put any additional info below if none then just type 'none'","Continue", " ");
							return 1;
						}
						arrestStep[playerid] = 5;
						new escapedName[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
						mysql_real_escape_string(inputtext,escapedName);
                        format(ArrestInfo[playerid][adInfo],256,"%s",escapedName);
					//	strmid(ArrestInfo[playerid][adInfo],inputtext,0,256);
						SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"You have just filled in the addition info section");
						ShowArrestReport(playerid);


					}
					case 5:
					{
					    new time = strval(inputtext);
					    if(time > 0 || time < 240)
					    {
							if(GetDistanceBetweenPlayers(playerid,arresting[playerid]) < 5)
							{
								if(WantedLevel[arresting[playerid]] < 1)
								{
								  	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Player must be at least Wanted Level 1!");
								   	return 1;
								}
								if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(arresting[playerid], 10, 1572.1915,-1654.5251,10001.0859))  //LSPD
								{
									PlayerInfo[arresting[playerid]][pJailed] = 2;
									PlayerInfo[arresting[playerid]][pArrested] += 1;
									SafeSetPlayerInterior(arresting[playerid], 10);
									SafeSetPlayerPos(arresting[playerid], 1577.8586,-1656.8254,10001.0859);
									format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have arrested %s for %d.", GPN(arresting[playerid]),time);
									SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
									format(string, sizeof(string), "You have been arrested by %s %s for %d minutes. ",GetFactionRank(playerid), GPN(playerid), time);
									SCM(arresting[playerid], COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
									SafeResetPlayerWeapons(arresting[playerid]);
									RemovePlayerAttachedObject(arresting[playerid],4);
									SetPlayerSpecialAction(arresting[playerid], SPECIAL_ACTION_NONE);
									PlayerInfo[arresting[playerid]][pJailTime][0] = time * 60;
									PlayerInfo[arresting[playerid]][pJailTime][1] = time * 60 / 2;
									SetPlayerFree(arresting[playerid],playerid, "Got Arrested");
//									PlayerTextDrawShow(arresting[playerid], Jailtimetd[arresting[playerid]]);
									WantedPoints[arresting[playerid]] = 0;
									WantedLevel[arresting[playerid]] = 0;
									PlayerCuffed[arresting[playerid]] = 0;
									GaveUp[arresting[playerid]] = 0;
									new y, m, d;
									new h,mi,s;
									getdate(y,m,d);
									gettime(h,mi,s);
									format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has jailed %s for %d Seconds",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(arresting[playerid]), PlayerInfo[arresting[playerid]][pJailTime][0]);
									JailLog(string);
									NumberOfArrests += 1;
									new sqlQuery[256],date[32];
									format(date,sizeof(date),"%d/%d/%d",m,d,y);
									format(sqlQuery,sizeof(sqlQuery),"INSERT INTO `samp_arrests` SET `Felon`='%s',`Officer`='%s',`Charges`='%s',`Date`='%s',`Info`='%s',`ArrestID`='%d'",GPN(arresting[playerid]),GPN(playerid),ArrestInfo[playerid][aCharges],date,ArrestInfo[playerid][adInfo],NumberOfArrests);
									mysql_query(sqlQuery,THREAD_SAVEARRESTS,NumberOfArrests);
									arresting[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
									arrestStep[playerid] = 0;
							    }
							}
						}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"The jail sentance can't be less then zero or more then 240 minutes!");
					}
	        	}
	    	}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_ARREST_REPORT)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
	        switch(listitem)
	        {
	            case 0:
	            {
					editingArrest[playerid] = true;
					arrestStep[playerid] = 1;
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"What is your name?","Please type your full name to continue","Okay"," ");
	            }
	            case 1:
	            {
	                editingArrest[playerid] = true;
	                arrestStep[playerid] = 2;
	                ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"What is the suspects name?","Please type their full name to continue\r\nIf they refuse to supply a name just put 'John_Doe'","Okay"," ");
     			}
     			case 2:
     			{
     			    editingArrest[playerid] = true;
     			    arrestStep[playerid] = 3;
     			    ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"What are the charges?","Please type all associated charges below","Continue"," ");
     			}
     			case 3:
     			{
     			    editingArrest[playerid] = true;
					arrestStep[playerid] = 4;
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Addition Information","Please put any additional info below if none then just type 'none'","Continue", " ");
				}
				case 4:
				{
				    editingArrest[playerid] = false;
					arrestStep[playerid] = 5;
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Time in minutes","How long in minutes do you want to arrest them for?","Continue", " ");
				}
     		}
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        editingArrest[playerid] = false;
	        arrestStep[playerid] = 1;
	        ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"What is your name?","Please type your full name to continue","Okay"," ");
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == MDC_DIALOG)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
			new var = listitem,str1[32],str2[64];
			var = var += 1;
			switch(listitem)
			{
			    case 0,2:
			    {
					mdcStep[playerid] = var;
					if(var == 1)
					{
					    str1 = "Suspect Name";
					    str2 = "Please enter the suspects name to continue";
					}
					else if(var == 3)
					{
					    str1 = "License Search";
					    str2 = "Please enter the persons name to lookup their licenses";
					}
	        		ShowServerDialog(playerid,MDC_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,str1,str2,"Continue","");
	        	}
	        	case 1://show911 calls here ben
	        	{
	        	    SCM(playerid, -1,"|______________DISPATCH CALLOUTS______________|");
	        	    for(new i = 0; i < MAX_PDCALLS; i ++)
	        	    {
	        	        if(PDCall[i][PDCallUsed] == true)
	        	        {
	        	            format(string,sizeof(string),"%s\r\n",PDCall[i][PDCallText]);
							SCM(playerid,-1,string);
							break;
	        	        }

					}
				}
			}
        }
	}
	if(dialogid == MDC_INPUT)
	{
	    if(response)
	    {
	        switch(mdcStep[playerid])
	        {
				case 1:
				{
				    if(strlen(inputtext) > MAX_PLAYER_NAME)
				    {
				        SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Error suspect name is longer then our machines can handle please try again.");
				        ShowServerDialog(playerid,MDC_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Suspect Name","Please enter the suspect name to continue.","Continue", "");
				        return 1;
				    }
				    else
				    {
						new name[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],string2[200];
						mysql_real_escape_string(inputtext,name);
     					format(PlayerInfo[playerid][pActionName],MAX_PLAYER_NAME,"%s",name);
						format(string2,sizeof(string2),"SELECT * FROM `samp_arrests` WHERE `Felon` ='%s' ORDER BY `ArrestID` DESC LIMIT 10",name);
						mysql_query(string2,THREAD_MDCLOAD,playerid);
				    }
				}
				case 3:
				{
				    if(strlen(inputtext) > MAX_PLAYER_NAME)
				    {
				        SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Error suspect name is longer then our machines can handle please try again.");
				        ShowServerDialog(playerid,MDC_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"License Search","Please enter the persons name to search for their valid licenses.","Continue","");
						return 1;
				    }
				    else
				    {
				        new playa = ReturnUser(inputtext);
    				    SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Generating a list of this persons licenses please wait.");
                        format(string,sizeof(string),"Name       {00FF00}%d",GPN(playa));
    				    format(string,sizeof(string),"Age        {00FF00}%d",PlayerInfo[playa][pAge]);
    				    SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,string);
    				    
    					if(PlayerInfo[playa][pPassport] == 1)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Passport        {00FF00}Yes");
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playa][pPassport] == 0)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Passport        {FF0000}No");
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playa][pCarLic] == 1)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Drivers License {00FF00}Yes");
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playa][pCarLic] == 0)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Drivers License {FF0000}No");
						}
    					if(PlayerInfo[playa][pFlyLic] == 1)
    					{
    					    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Flying License  {00FF00}Yes");
    					}
    					if(PlayerInfo[playa][pFlyLic]== 0)
    					{
    					    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Flying License  {FF0000}No");
    					}
						if(PlayerInfo[playa][pBoatLic] == 1)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Marine License  {00FF00}Yes");
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playa][pBoatLic] == 0)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Marine License  {FF0000}No");
						}
   						if(PlayerInfo[playa][pFishLic] == 1)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Fishing Licnese {00FF00}Yes");
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playa][pFishLic] == 0)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Fishing License {FF0000}No");
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playa][pGunLic] == 1)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Gun License     {00FF00}Yes");
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playa][pGunLic] == 0)
						{
						    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Gun License     {FF0000}No");
						}
						return 1;
				    
				    }
				}
				

	        }
	    }
	}
	if(dialogid == ACCENT_DIALOG)
	{
	    if(!response) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You have cancelled!");
	    if(!inputtext[0])
		{
			SCM(playerid,-1,"You have removed your accent!");
			strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccent],"None",0,strlen("None"));
			format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Accent`='None' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
			mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playerid);
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
			new w;
			while(w < sizeof(BadWords))
			{
                if(strfind(inputtext,BadWords[w][0],true,0) != -1) { SCM(playerid, -1, "Stupidity"); ServerKick(playerid);}
			    else
			    {
			        new accent[24];
					format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set your acccent to %s",inputtext);
					SCM(playerid,-1,string);
					strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccent],inputtext,0,strlen(inputtext),32);
					mysql_real_escape_string(inputtext,accent);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Accent`='%s' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",accent,PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
					mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playerid);
					break;
				}
				w ++;
			}
		}

	}
	if(dialogid == DIALOG_FIGHTER)
	{
		if(response)
		{
		    switch(listitem)
		    {
		        case 1:
		        {
		            SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 80);
		        }
		        case 2:
		        {
		            SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 81);
		        }
		    }
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == GPS_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 0:  { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 1462.1023,-1013.2588,26.8438, 5.0,19,0); }
				case 1:  { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 2047.4987,-1908.7512,13.5469, 5.0,19,0); }
				case 2:  { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 1702.0304,-1051.1550,23.9063, 5.0,19,0); }
				case 3:  { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 1480.8540,-1768.9148,18.7958, 5.0,19,0); }
				case 4:  { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, sJPos[0],sJPos[1],sJPos[2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 5:  { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, tJPos[0],tJPos[1],tJPos[2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 6:  { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, JobIcons[0][0],JobIcons[0][1],JobIcons[0][2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 7:  { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, JobIcons[1][0],JobIcons[1][1],JobIcons[1][2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 8:  { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 2104.8748,-1806.5518,13.5547, 5.0,19,0); }
				case 9: { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, JobIcons[3][0],JobIcons[3][1],JobIcons[3][2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 10: { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, JobIcons[4][0],JobIcons[4][1],JobIcons[4][2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 11: { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, JobIcons[5][0],JobIcons[5][1],JobIcons[5][2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 12: { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 1480.8540,-1768.9148,18.7958, 5.0,19,0); }
				case 13: { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, DSIcons[0][0],DSIcons[0][1],DSIcons[0][2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 14: { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, DSIcons[1][0],DSIcons[1][1],DSIcons[1][2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 15: { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, DSIcons[2][0],DSIcons[2][1],DSIcons[2][2], 5.0,19,0); }
				case 16: { SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, DSIcons[3][0],DSIcons[3][1],DSIcons[3][2], 5.0,19,0); }
			}
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "GPS: Destination marked on your map. Enter the checkpoint or use /nocp when it's no longer needed");
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == RADIO_DIALOG)
	{
		if(!response) return 1;
		if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		{
			if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"BoomBoxPlaying") != 1)
			{
				strmid(CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cStation], radiolist[listitem][1],0,strlen(radiolist[listitem][1]),128);
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == GetPlayerVehicleID(i))
					{
						PlayAudioStreamForPlayer(i,radiolist[listitem][1]);
						CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cStreaming] = true;
						SetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming",1);
					}
				}
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s sets the radio to %s",GPN(playerid),radiolist[listitem][0]);
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			}
		}
        else if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) //if they own a mp3 player
  		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] >= 2)
			{
				if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"BoomBoxPlaying") != 1)
				{
					PlayAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid,radiolist[listitem][1]);
					format(string, sizeof(string),"%s pulls out some headphones and sets their mp3 player to %s",GPN(playerid),radiolist[listitem][0]);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
					SetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming",1);
				}
			}
  		}
  	}
	if(dialogid == BBOX_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			if(boombox[playerid] != 0)
			{
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(IsPlayerInDynamicArea(i,boomboxarea[playerid]))
					{
						PlayAudioStreamForPlayer(i,radiolist[listitem][1]);
						SetPVarInt(i,"Streaming",1); SetPVarInt(i,"BoomBoxPlaying",1);
						strmid(PlayerInfo[boomboxstation[playerid]][pBBStation],radiolist[listitem][1],0,strlen(radiolist[listitem][1]),128);
					}
				}
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s sets the Boom Box to %s",GPN(playerid),radiolist[listitem][0]);
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == TRUCKING_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 0: //if they pick legal runs
				{
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,LEGAL_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Legal Runs","Car Parts\r\nBizz Supplies","Ok","Cancel");
				}
				case 1: //if they pick illegal runs
				{
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,ILLEGAL_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Illegal Runs","Materials\r\nDrugs","Ok","Cancel");
				}
			}
		}else SCM(playerid, -1,"You have canceled");
	}
	if(dialogid == ILLEGAL_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 0:
				{
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "You've chosen to pick up and deliver materials for distribution/use. This is");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "an illegal job. If you are caught, you have no knowledge of working for");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "LS Trucking Co. We will not vouch for you with police. Doing this job");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "is at your OWN RISK! Head to the pick up spot");
					SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, sDPos[0], sDPos[1], sDPos[2], 5.0, 42, 0);
					TruckerType[playerid] = 3;
					Trucking[playerid] = 1;
				}
				case 1:
				{
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "You've chosen to pick up and deliver drugs for distribution. This is");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "an illegal job. If you are caught, you have no knowledge of working for");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "LS Trucking Co. We will not vouch for you with police. Doing this job");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "is at your OWN RISK! Head to the pick up spot");
					SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, -1134.1993,358.3881,14.2500,5.0,51,0);
					TruckerType[playerid] = 4;
					Trucking[playerid] = 1;
				}
			}
		}

	}
	if(dialogid == LEGAL_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 0:
				{
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "You've chosen to pick up and deliver car parts for LS Mechanic Co.");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "You'll need to head to the scrap metal yard to pick up the scrap metal.");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "once you're there, you'll need to /getprods. When you're done with that,");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "Head to the factory so the scrap can be turned into parts. They'll have");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "Parts already made for you when you get there. This is for their next batch");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "of parts. Once you have the parts, deliver them to the LS Mechanic Co HQ.");
					SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 2413.4333,-2469.9204,13.6250,3.0,55,0);
					TruckerType[playerid] = 1;
					Trucking[playerid] = 1;
				}
				case 1:
				{
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "You've chosen to deliver products to businesses in Los Santos");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "Hop out of the truck and start to /getprods from the load spot.");
					SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "Your truck can hold up to 10 boxes of products. After that you'll be on your way!");
					TruckerType[playerid] = 2;
					Trucking[playerid] = 1;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == DMV_DIALOG)
	{
		switch(DMVQ_Q[playerid])
		{
			case 1: // C
			{
				switch(listitem)
				{
					case 0:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
					case 1:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
					case 2:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "Correct");   DMVQ_Q[playerid] =  2; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
					case 3:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
				}
			}
			case 2: // B

					case 1:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "Correct");   DMVQ_Q[playerid] =  3; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
					case 2:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
					case 3:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }

					case 2:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
					case 3:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
				}
			}
			case 4: // B
			{
				switch(listitem)
				{
					case 0:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
					case 1:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "Correct");   DMVQ_Q[playerid] =  5; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
					case 2:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
					case 3:{ SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "try again"); DMVW_A[playerid] += 1; dmvquiz(playerid); return 1; }
				}
			}
			case 5: // A
			{
				switch(listitem)
				{
					case 0:
					{
						EngineStart(playerid);
						DMVQ_Q[playerid] = -1; DMVW_A[playerid] = -1;
						OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 1; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 2066.8604,-1913.9341,13.4218,2084.5198,-1881.3688,13.1948,5);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "The Driving Test has begun!");
					}
					case 1:{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Failed The Exam"); DMVQ_Q[playerid] = -1; DMVW_A[playerid] = -1; SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); }
					case 2:{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Failed The Exam"); DMVQ_Q[playerid] = -1; DMVW_A[playerid] = -1; SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); }
					case 3:{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Failed The Exam"); DMVQ_Q[playerid] = -1; DMVW_A[playerid] = -1; SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == PPQ_DIALOG)

						PlayerInfo[playerid][pPassport] = 1;
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You have passed the passport test!!");
					}
					case 1:{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Failed The Exam"); PPQ_Q[playerid] = -1; PPW_A[playerid] = -1; }
					case 2:{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Failed The Exam"); PPQ_Q[playerid] = -1; PPW_A[playerid] = -1; }
					case 3:{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Failed The Exam"); PPQ_Q[playerid] = -1; PPW_A[playerid] = -1; }
				}
			}
		}
	}
 	if(dialogid == DIALOG_RULES)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 0:
				{
				    return 1;
				}
				case 1:
				{
					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "--------------DO NOT METAGAME--------------");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Metagaming is taking OOC (Out Of Character) information and using it IC (In Character)");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "AJAIL 30m - 2h depending on severity");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Example: Rob_Stone reads Wayne_Ross' nametag and decides to use Wayne's name in character, even though they've never met.");
				}
				case 2:
				{
					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "--------------DO NOT POWERGAME--------------");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Powergaming, often abbreviated as PG, is when you either force roleplay onto another player or performing acts that aren't humanly possible.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "AJAIL 30m - 2h depending on severity");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Example: Jason Havier punches Wayne Ross in the face causing him to die.");
				}
				case 3:
				{
					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "--------------DO NOT DEATHMATCH --------------");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Deathmatching, often abbreviated as DM, is when you kill a player without roleplaying or without a valid reason to do so. Deathmatching in Administrative Jail is considered a bannable offense.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "AJAIL 1h - 4h depending on severity");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "*You kill someone over a car accident.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "*You decide to kill somebody for no reason whatsoever.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "Punishments may vary, depending on severity.");
				}
				case 4:
				{
					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "--------------Role-Play at all times--------------");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "A Role-playing game is a game in which the players will assume the roles of fictional characters that they have created");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "The players will have to determine their actions accordingly to their characters characterization and background.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "This does not mean players are allowed to go OOC during a roleplay or in the middle of a highly populated area. Only administrators are allowed to be out of character or to void roleplays.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED,"AJAIL 1h - 4h depending on severity");
				}
				case 5:
				{
					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "------------- Respect your fellow players and staff--------------");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "OOC Insulting and disrespecting other members of the community is strictly forbidden. There is no need to be hurtful or abusive to others, especially towards admins who are here to help you out.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Ex) You get warned/ajailed over a report and you decide to send a disrespectful PM to the administrator, where you call him bias.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "AJAIL 1h - 4h depending on severity");
				}
				case 6:
				{
					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "--------------Do not Revenge-Kill. --------------");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Revenge killing is when you decide to kill or try to kill someone that has recently killed you. Your memory has been wiped and you won't remember anything that led to your murder.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Ex) You kill someone for killing you in a previous role play. (Also known as Deathmatching, see rule #3.)");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "Additionally, when you die you lose memory of the RP arc that caused your death");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "You cannot immediately call 911 and report your murderer etc, nor return to the scene of a roleplay until sufficient time has passed that the RP is deemed finished.");

				}
				case 7:
				{
					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "--------------Do not break the rules because another player is.--------------");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Do not break the rules because another player is.If you see someone breaking the rules, do not imitate them and break the rules as well.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Remember to always report someone if they are breaking the rules so that an administrator can deal with it.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Someone insults you out of character, so you decide to insult him back instead of reporting the player to an administrator.");

				case 8:

					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);

				}
				case 9:

					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "--------------Disgusting, immoral and offensive role play.--------------");
     				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "OOC permission from everyone involved is required for the following:");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "--Rape");

					SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "AJAIL 30m - 2h depending on repeat offender");
				}
				case 13:
				{
					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "-------------- Third party modifications--------------");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Third party modifications can often give you an advantage over other players which isn't fair.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Breaking this rule will result in an indefinite suspension.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Not allowed = CLEO (There are some exceptions, please look below.), S0biet, Scripts to avoid anti-AFK timers,Health hacks,Health hacks,Modified handling scripts and mods.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED,   "Allowed = The ELM CLEO modification is allowed for LSPD and LSFD only, CLEO Stream Memory Fix.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Skin modifications are perfectly fine as long as they do not affect other players - as they are only visual modifications for yourself.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED,"Cheats: Permanent Suspension)(Bad mods: Banned until fixed)");
				}
				case 14:
				{
					ClearChatbox(playerid, 10);

	if(dialogid == DIALOG_TOY)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 0: { toyslot[playerid] = 0; }
				case 1: { toyslot[playerid] = 1; }
				case 2: { toyslot[playerid] = 2; }
				case 3: { toyslot[playerid] = 3; }
				case 4: { toyslot[playerid] = 4; }
				case 5: { toyslot[playerid] = 5; }
				case 6: { toyslot[playerid] = 6; }
				case 7: { toyslot[playerid] = 7; }
				case 8: { toyslot[playerid] = 8; }
				case 9: { toyslot[playerid] = 9; }
			}
			ShowServerDialog(playerid, TOY_TYPE, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Type", "Glasses\r\nWatches\r\nBandanas\r\nHats\r\nMasks\r\nCellphones\r\nMisc", "Okay", "Cancel");
		}
	}

	if(dialogid == 6655 && response)
	{
		if(strlen(inputtext) > 60 && strlen(inputtext) < 6)
			return ShowServerDialog(playerid, 6655,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "House Name","Type the new House name On the box located below\nMinimun Characters = 6, Max Characters = 60\nNo ~ Characters","Ok","Cancel");

		if(strfind(inputtext,"~",true) != -1)
			return ShowServerDialog(playerid, 6655,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Bizz Name","Type the new House name On the box located below\nMinimun Characters = 6, Max Characters = 60\nNo ~ Characters ","Ok","Cancel");

		new house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];

		strmid(HouseInfo[house][hMessage],inputtext,0,strlen(inputtext),255);
		OnPropTextdrawUpdate(1,house);
		SaveHouse(house,25);
	}
	if(dialogid == 6656 && response)
	{
		if(strlen(inputtext) > 60 && strlen(inputtext) < 6)
			return ShowServerDialog(playerid, 6655,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Bizz Name","Type the new House name On the box located below\nMinimun Characters = 6, Max Characters = 60\nNo ~ Characters","Ok","Cancel");

			return ShowServerDialog(playerid, 6655,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Bizz Name","Type the new House name On the box located below\nMinimun Characters = 6, Max Characters = 60\nNo ~ Characters","Ok","Cancel");

		new bizz = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey];

		strmid(BizzInfo[bizz][bMessage],inputtext,0,strlen(inputtext),255);
		OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2,bizz);
	}
	if(dialogid == 3000) {
		new gender;
		new rand;
		new skin;

		if(response) {
			gender = 1;
			rand = random(sizeof(CivMalePeds));
			skin = CivMalePeds[rand][0];
		} else {
			gender = 2;
			rand = random(sizeof(CivFemalePeds));
			skin = CivFemalePeds[rand][0];
		}

		new sqlQuery[300];
		format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE samp_users SET `Sex`='%d', `Model`='%d' WHERE Username='%s'", gender, skin, sendername);
		mysql_query(sqlQuery, THREAD_GENDER_SELECT, playerid);
	}
	if(dialogid == 3001) {
		if(response) {
			new year, month,day;
			getdate(year, month, day);
			new DateInfo[3][20];
			split(inputtext, DateInfo, '/');
			if(year - strvalEx(DateInfo[2]) > 100 || strvalEx(DateInfo[2]) < 1 || strvalEx(DateInfo[2]) >= year)
			{
				ShowServerDialog(playerid, 3001, DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Date of Birth entry", "What is your Birthdate? (dd/mm/yyyy)", "Next", "Prev");
				return 0;
			}
			new check = year - strvalEx(DateInfo[2]);
			if(check == year)
			{
				ShowServerDialog(playerid, 3001, DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Date of Birth entry", "What is your Birthdate? (dd/mm/yyyy)", "Next", "Prev");
				return 0;
			}
			if(strvalEx(DateInfo[1]) > month)
			{
				check -= 1;
			}
			else if(strvalEx(DateInfo[1]) == month && strval(DateInfo[0]) > day)
			{
				check -= 1;
			}
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pAge] = check;

			new sqlQuery[128];
			format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE samp_users SET Age=%d WHERE Username='%s'", check, sendername);
			mysql_query(sqlQuery, THREAD_DOB_ENTRY, playerid);
		} else {
			ShowServerDialog(playerid, 3000, DIALOG_STYLE_MSGBOX, "Gender Selection","You are a male or a female?", "Male", "Female");
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == 300)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			if(listitem == 0)
			{
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pFS] = 0;
				SetPlayerSkills(playerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Selected Normal!");
			}
			else if(listitem == 1)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pBoxiSkill] == 1)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pFS] = 1;
					SetPlayerSkills(playerid);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Selected Boxing!");
				}
			}
			else if(listitem == 2)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pKungSkill] == 1)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pFS] = 2;
					SetPlayerSkills(playerid);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Selected Kung Fu!");
				}
			}

					SetPlayerSkills(playerid);

		}

	{
		if(response)
		{
			if(listitem == 0)
			{
				strmid(Typed[playerid], "None", 0, strlen("None"), 255);
				ShowServerDialog(playerid, 335, DIALOG_STYLE_PASSWORD,"Confirm your Password","Type your current Password Again for security Reasons.","Ok","Cancel");
			}
			else if(listitem == 1)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] >= 0)
				{
					new nxtlevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel]+1;
					new expamount = nxtlevel*levelexp;
					new infostring[128];
					if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] < expamount)
					{
						format(infostring, 128, "** You need %d Respect Points, you curently have [%d] !",expamount,PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, infostring);
						return 1;
					}
					else
					{
						format(string, sizeof(string), "LEVEL UP! You Are Now Level %d", nxtlevel);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
						PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
						PlayerPlayMusic(playerid);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel]++;
						format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `level`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
						mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] > 0)
						{
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] -= expamount;
							new total = PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp];
							if(total > 0)
							{
								PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] = total;
							}
							else
							{
								PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] = 0;
							}
						}
						else
						{
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] = 0;
						}
						PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] = PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade]+2;
						format(infostring,sizeof(infostring),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `upgradepoints`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
						mysql_query(infostring, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
						format(infostring, 128, "* You bought Level %d Type /account then Select upgrades to change your upgrades (/upgrade)", nxtlevel);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, infostring);
						format(infostring, 128, "* You have %d unspent Upgrade Points",PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, infostring);

						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /levelup (%d)",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,nxtlevel);
						CommandLog(string);
					}
				}
			}

			{

				ShowServerDialog(playerid, 338, DIALOG_STYLE_PASSWORD,"Confirm your Password","Type your current Password Again for security Reasons.","Ok","Cancel");

	if(dialogid == 222)
	{
		if(response)

			if(listitem == 0)

				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You will now speak in the local chat!");
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pChatMode] = 0;
			}

			}

	if(dialogid == 3213)
	{

	if(dialogid == 88)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			if (listitem == 0 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > 50)
			{
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -50);
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 10, 1);

				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: Type /usedildo.");
				return 1;
			}

	}
	if(dialogid == TWEN47_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 0:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
					{
						new skill = 150 / 100;
						new price = (skill)*(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk]);
						new payout = 150 - price;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,- payout);
						SBizzInfo[9][sbTill] += payout;
						ExtortionSBiz(9, payout);
					}
					else
					{
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-150);
						SBizzInfo[9][sbTill] += 150;
						ExtortionSBiz(9, 150);
					}
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					new randphone = 100000 + random(899999);//minimum 1000  max 9999
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber] = randphone;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** Mobile Phone Purchased your new Number is %d", randphone);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, string);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, "You can check this anytime by Typing /stats");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: You can now type /help to see your cell phone commands.");
					return 1;
				}
				case 1:
				{
					new win = RandomEx(1,1000);
					switch(win)
					{
						case 1 .. 100, 115 .. 215, 225 .. 435, 450 .. 999:
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You lost. Sorry! Thats just the luck of the draw!");
						}
						case 101 .. 114, 216 .. 224, 436 .. 449, 1000:
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Look at that, you won $50!");
							SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, 50);
						}
					}
     				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -25);
					return 1;
				}
				case 2:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
					{
						new skill = 10 / 100;
						new price = (skill)*(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk]);
