					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: Type /number <id/name>.");
					return 1;
				}
				case 3:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
					{
						new skill = 10 / 100;
						new price = (skill)*(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk]);
						new payout = 10 - price;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,- payout);
						SBizzInfo[9][sbTill] += payout;
						ExtortionSBiz(9, payout);
					}
					else
					{
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-10);
						SBizzInfo[9][sbTill] += 10;
						ExtortionSBiz(9, 10);
					}
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					gDice[playerid] = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "   Dice Purchased you can throw your Dice.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, string);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: Type /dice ");
					return 1;
				}
				case 4:
				{
				    PlayerInfo[playerid][pGasCan] = 1;
				    format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `GasCan`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pGasCan],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
				    mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playerid);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pFuel] = 20;
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "HINT: Walk up to a gas pump and type /get [fuel] to fill your gas can, then /fillcar to fill up your car.");
					return 1;
				}
				case 5:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
					{
						new skill = 1 / 100;
						new price = (skill)*(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk]);
						new payout = 1 - price;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,- payout);
					}
					else
					{
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-1);
					}
					Condom[playerid] ++;
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Condom Purchased.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, string);
					return 1;
				}
				case 6:
				{
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 50);
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Camera Purchased.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, string);
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 43, 20);
					return 1;
				}
				case 7:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < 5)
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You have to be level 5 to buy this");
						return 1;
					}
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMask] != 0)
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You already have one");
						return 1;
					}
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 500);
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, string);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "GUIDE: use /maskon or /maskoff");
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pMask] = 1;
					format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Mask`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pMask],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
					mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playerid);
					return 1;
				}
				case 8:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWatch] != 0)
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You already have one");
						return 1;
					}
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 100);
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Watch Purchased.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "GUIDE: /time");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, string);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pWatch] = 1;
					TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, MinsTD);
					TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, SecsTD);
					TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, HrsTD);
				}
				case 9:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFishTool] != 0)
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You already have one !");
						return 1;
					}
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 150);
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, "Fishing toolbox Purchased.");
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pFishTool] = 1;
				}
				case 10:
				{
					if(Rope[playerid] >= 5)
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You have 5 already !");
						return 1;
					}
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 65);
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, "Rope Purchased.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "HINT: You can /tie now.");
					Rope[playerid]++;
				}
				case 11:
				{
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 50);
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, "Spray can Purchased.");
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 41, 200);
				}
				case 12:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLighter] != 0)
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You already have a lighter ! ");
						return 1;
					}
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 5);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pLighter] = 30;
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, "Lighter Purchased.");
					OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
					return 1;
				}
				case 13:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pCigarettes] != 0)
					{
						format(string, sizeof(string), "   You already have %d cigarettes left .", PlayerInfo[playerid][pCigarettes]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, string);
						return 1;
					}
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 30);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pCigarettes] = 20;
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, "Cigarettes Purchased.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "HINT: You can /smoke now !");
					OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
				}
				case 14:
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
					{
						new skill = 250 / 100;
						new price = (skill)*(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk]);
						new payout = 250 - price;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - payout);
					}
					else
					{
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 250);
					}
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "CD-Player Purchased.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, string);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: Type /music");
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pCD] = 1;
					return 1;
				}
				case 15:
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pGPS] = 1;
					format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `GPS`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pGPS],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
					mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playerid);
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
					{
						new skill = 250 / 100;
						new price = (skill)*(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk]);
						new payout = 250 - price;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,- 250);
						SBizzInfo[9][sbTill] += payout;
						ExtortionSBiz(9, payout);
					}
					else
					{
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-250);
						SBizzInfo[9][sbTill] += 250;
						ExtortionSBiz(9, 250);
					}
					SBizzInfo[9][sbProducts]--;
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, "GPS Add-On Purchased. Use /GPS for trackable locations");
					return 1;
				}
				case 16:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 10000)
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pWt] = 1;
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pWtc] = 0;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -10000);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased a Walkie Talkie for $10,000");
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "HINT: /wtc [number] to set your channel and /wt to speak in your Walkie Talkie");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($10,000)");
					}
				}
				case 17:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 50)
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][0] = 1;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -50);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased a scale");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($50)");
					}
				}
				case 18:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 5)
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][1] += 1;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -5);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased some baking soda");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($5)");
					}
				}
				case 19:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 1)
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][2] += 1;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -1);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased a razor blade");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($5)");
					}
				}
				case 20:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 10)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5] != 0)
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot purchase anymore at this time");
							return 1;
						}
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5] = 5;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -10);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased some bluntwraps");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($10)");
					}
				}
				case 21:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 10)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5] != 0)
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot purchase anymore at this time");
							return 1;
						}
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5] = 10;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -10);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased some rolling papers");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($10)");
					}
				}
				case 22:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 10)
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][4] += 10;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -10);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased 10 baggies for $10");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($10)");
					}
				}
				case 23:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 15)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][3] >= 1)
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot purchase anymore at this time");
							return 1;
						}
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][3] = 1;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -15);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased a pocket mirror");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($15)");
					}
				}
				case 24:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 5)
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][8] += 5;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -5);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased some tin foil");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($5)");
					}
				}
				case 25:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 7)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][0] == 1)
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot purchase anymore at this time");
							return 1;
						}
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][0] += 1;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -7);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased a bag of chips");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($7)");
					}
				}
				case 26:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 7)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][1] == 1)
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot purchase anymore at this time");
							return 1;
						}
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][1] += 1;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -7);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased a candy bar");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($7)");
					}
				}
				case 27:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 7)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][2] == 1)
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot purchase anymore at this time");
							return 1;
						}
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][2] += 1;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -7);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased some beef jerky");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($7)");
					}
				}
				case 28:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 1500)
					{
						switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pToolKit])
						{
							case 0:
							{
								PlayerInfo[playerid][pToolKit] = 5;
								SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-1500);
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have purchased a toolkit");
							}
							case 1 .. 5:
							{
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot purchase anymore at this time");
							}
						}
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't got the cash($1500)");
					}
				}
			}
			new Buyitems[600];
			strcat(Buyitems, "1\tCellphone ($150)\n2\tScratch Card ($10)\n3\tPhone Book ($10)\n4\tDice ($10)\n5\tGas Can ($20)\n6\tCondom ($1)\n7\tCamera ($50)\n8\tMask ($5000)\n9\tWatch ($100)\n10\tFishing Tools ($65)\n11\tRope ($1000)\n12\tSpray Can ($50)\n13\tLighter ($5)\n14\tCigarretes ($30)\n");
			strcat(Buyitems, "15\tCD Player ($250)\n16\tVehicle GPS Add-On ($250)\n17\tWalkie Talkie ($5000)\n18\tScale ($100)\n19\tBakingSoda ($5)\n20\tRazor Blade ($1)\n21\tBlunt Wraps ($10)\n22\tRolling Papers ($10)\n23\tBaggies ($10)\n24\tPocket Mirror ($15)\n25\tTin Foil ($5)\n26\tPotato Chips ($7)\n");
			strcat(Buyitems, "27\tCandy Bar ($7)\n28\tBeef Jerky ($7)\n29\tTool Kit ($1500)");
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,TWEN47_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"24-7 Market",Buyitems,"Select","Cancel");
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == AMMUTRAIN_DIALOG) // Ammunation
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 1:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) > 49)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPistSkill] < 1000)
						{
							Training[playerid] = 0;
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "TRAINER: We are going to Start the Pistol Training in a few Seconds");
							TrainTimer[playerid] = defer TrainPistol[5000](playerid);
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmuTrainTime] = 900;
						}
						else
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "TRAINER: You are already an Expert with this weapon!");
							return 1;
						}
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "TRAINER: You don't have enough money!");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				case 2:
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) > 75)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSilenSkill] < 1000)

							Training[playerid] = 0;

						return 1;
					}
				}

							Training[playerid] = 0;
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "TRAINER: We are going to Start the Deagle Training in a few Seconds");
							TrainTimer[playerid] = defer TrainDeagle[5000](playerid);
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmuTrainTime] = 1800;

			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Your weapon training time has been reduced by half due to your VIP subscription");
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmuTrainTime] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmuTrainTime] / 2;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFFF, "You selected Cancel");
		}
		return 1;
	}
	if(dialogid == 15) // /turn for admins
	{
		if(response)
		{
			if(listitem == 0)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 5)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(ViewAdmin[playerid] == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the Admin Messages!");
					ViewAdmin[playerid] = 0;
					format(string, 128, "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the Admin Messages.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(ViewAdmin[playerid] == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the Admin Messages!");
					ViewAdmin[playerid] = 1;
					format(string, 128, "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the Admin Messages.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			else if(listitem == 1)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pViewPms] == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the PM Messages!");
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pViewPms] = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the PM Messages.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pViewPms] == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the PM Messages!");
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pViewPms] = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the PM Messages.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			else if(listitem == 2)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 4)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAppearList] == 0)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pAppearList] = 1;
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have removed yourself from the Online Admin List!");
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has removed himself from the Online Admin List.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAppearList] == 1)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pAppearList] = 0;
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have added yourself from the Online Admin List!");
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has added himself from the Online Admin List.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}

			}
			else if(listitem == 3)
			{
				if(HelpMessages[playerid] == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the Help Messages!");
					HelpMessages[playerid] = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the Help Messages.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(HelpMessages[playerid] == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the Help Messages!");
					HelpMessages[playerid] = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the Help Messages.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			else if(listitem == 4)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 2)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(noooc == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the OOC Chat!");
					SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTRED, "* OOC Chat has been disabled by an Administrator");
					noooc = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the OOC Chat.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(noooc == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the OOC Chat!");
					SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTRED, "* OOC Chat has been enabled by an Administrator");
					noooc = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the OOC Chat.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			else if(listitem == 5)
			{
				if(Untouchable[playerid] == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the Owner Protection!");
					Untouchable[playerid] = 0;
				}
				else if(Untouchable[playerid] == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the Owner Protection!");
					Untouchable[playerid] = 1;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == 1234) // /turn for admins
	{
		switch(listitem)
		{
			case 0:
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(AntiBunnyJump == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the Bunny jump Detection!");
					AntiBunnyJump = 0;
					format(string, 128, "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the Bunny jump Detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(AntiBunnyJump == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the Bunny jump Detection!");
					AntiBunnyJump = 1;
					format(string, 128, "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the Bunny jump Detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			case 1:
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(AntiInteriorHack == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the Interior hacks detection!");
					AntiInteriorHack = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the Interior hacks detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(AntiInteriorHack == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the Interior hacks detection!");
					AntiInteriorHack = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the Interior hacks detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			case 2:
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(AntiJetpackHack == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the Jetpack hacks detection!");
					AntiJetpackHack = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the Jetpack hacks detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(AntiJetpackHack == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the Jetpack hacks detection!");
					AntiJetpackHack = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the Jetpack hacks detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			case 3:
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(AntiMoneyHack == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the Money hacks detection!");
					AntiMoneyHack = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the Money hacks detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(AntiMoneyHack == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the Money hacks detection!");
					AntiMoneyHack = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the Money hacks detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			case 4:
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(AntiAfk == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the Anti AFK detection!");
					AntiAfk = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the Anti AFK detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(AntiAfk == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the Anti AFK detection!");
					AntiAfk = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the Anti AFK detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			case 5:
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(AntiName == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the Anti Non-RP Names detection!");
					AntiName = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the Anti Non-RP Names detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(AntiName == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the Anti Non-RP Names detection!");
					AntiName = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the Anti Non-RP Names detection.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			case 6:
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
				{

					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the High ping kicker.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
			case 9:
			{
				ShowServerDialog(playerid, 13337,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Max Ping","Insert the max ping here, Must be numeric!","Input","Cancel");
			}
			case 10:
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
					return 1;
				}
				if(AntiSpam == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned off the anti flood kicker!");
					AntiSpam = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned off the anti flood kicker.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
				else if(AntiSpam == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Turned on the anti flood kicker!");
					AntiSpam = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has turned on the anti flood kicker.",sendername);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				}
			}
		}
		SaveAnticheat();
	}
	if(dialogid == 13337)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
				return 1;
			}
			new final = strval(inputtext);
			if(final != 0)
			{
				if (final > 65535 || final < 100)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* Max ping may not go above 65535 or below 100");
					ShowServerDialog(playerid, 13337,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Max Ping (100-65535)","Insert the max ping here, Must be numeric!","Input","Cancel");
					return 1;
				}
				MaxPing = final;
				format(string, sizeof(string),"* Max ping set to %d",final);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"* The max ping has been set to %d by the Developer %s (%d)",final,sendername,playerid);
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_CREAM,string);
				new y, m, d;
				new h,mi,s;
				getdate(y,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s has set the max ping to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername, final);
				AdminLog(string);
			}
			else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Invalid ping, must be numeric and above 100!") && ShowServerDialog(playerid, 13337,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Max Ping (100-65535)","Insert the max ping here, Must be numeric!","Input","Cancel");
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == PLATE_DIALOG)
	{
		if(strval(inputtext) >= 8)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Plate can only be 8 characters!");
		}
		if(strval(inputtext) < 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Plates must be at least 1 character!");
		}
		if(!response) { return 1; }
		else
		{
			new veh = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
			new cm = GetVehicleModel(veh);
			if(CarInfo[veh][cUid] == playerid)
			{
				if(cm == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey])
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 1000)
					{
						new cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 0);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 1);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 2);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 3);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 4);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 5);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 6);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 7);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 8);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 9);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 10);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 11);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 12);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C1] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 13);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C1] = cmod;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -1000);
						SetVehicleNumberPlate(veh, inputtext);
						SetVehicleToRespawn(veh);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C1]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C1]);
						strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPlate1],inputtext,0,strlen(inputtext),255);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You don't have the cash to buy this!");
					}
				}
				if(cm == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2])
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 1000)
					{
						new cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 0);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 1);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 2);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 3);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 4);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 5);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 6);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 7);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 8);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 9);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 10);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 11);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 12);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C2] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 13);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C2] = cmod;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -1000);
						SetVehicleNumberPlate(veh, inputtext);
						SetVehicleToRespawn(veh);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C2]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C2]);
						strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPlate2],inputtext,0,strlen(inputtext),255);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You don't have the cash to buy this!");
					}
				}
				if(cm == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar])
				{
					if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 1000)
					{
						new cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 0);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 1);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 2);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 3);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 4);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 5);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 6);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 7);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 8);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 9);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 10);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 11);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 12);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C3] = cmod;
						cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 13);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C3] = cmod;
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -1000);
						SetVehicleNumberPlate(veh, inputtext);
						SetVehicleToRespawn(veh);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C3]);
						AddVehicleComponent(veh, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C3]);
						strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPlate3],inputtext,0,strlen(inputtext),255);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You don't have the cash to buy this!");
					}
				}
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Remember to park your car once you pick your plate!");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " You arn't in your car...");
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == VIP_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			switch(listitem)
			{
				case 0://if they picked armor
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] >= ARMOR_PRICE)
					{
						new total, amount;
						amount = PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens];
						total = amount - ARMOR_PRICE;
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] = total;
						SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "You have purchased some armor for %d Gold Tokens, you now have %d left", ARMOR_PRICE, PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't have enough gold tokens, you will get more on payday!");
					}
				}
				case 1: //if they pick skins
				{
					ShowServerDialog(playerid, VSKIN_DIALOG, DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Skin Dialog", "Please type your skin id into the box", "Ok", "Cancel");
				}
				case 2: //if they pick PHone Number
				{
					ShowServerDialog(playerid, VNUMBER_DIALOG, DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Phone Number", "Please type your phone number info the box!", "Ok", "Cancel");
				}
				case 3: //if they picked level-up
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] >= LEVEL_PRICE)
					{
						new total, amount;
						new lvlup = PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel]+1;
						amount = PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens];
						total = amount - LEVEL_PRICE;
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] = lvlup;
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] = total;
						format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `level`='%d', `GoldTokens`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel],PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
						mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "You are now level %d for %d Gold Tokens, you now have %d tokens left", PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel], LEVEL_PRICE, PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, " You don't have enough gold tokens, you will get more on payday!");
					}
				}
				case 4://if they picked a deagle
				{
					new price;
					switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
					{
					    case 1: { price = 750; }
					    case 2: { price = 550; }
					    case 3: { price = 350; }
					    case 4: { price = 150; }
					}
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] >= price)
					{
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 24, 30);
						SetPlayerAmmo(playerid,24, 30);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] - price;
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == VNUMBER_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] >= PNUMBER_PRICE)
			{
				if(strval(inputtext) > 0 && strval(inputtext) < 1000000)
				{
					new sqlQuery[36];
					format(sqlQuery, 128, "SELECT * FROM samp_users WHERE `PhoneNr` = '%d'", strval(inputtext));
					mysql_query(sqlQuery);
					mysql_store_result();
					if(mysql_num_rows() == 0)
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] - PNUMBER_PRICE;
						format(string, sizeof(string), " You have purchased a new phone number for %d tokens you now have %d left", PNUMBER_PRICE, PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber] = strval(inputtext);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"That number is already in use! Please try a different number.");
						ShowServerDialog(playerid, VNUMBER_DIALOG, DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Phone Number", "Please type your phone number into the box!", "Ok", "Cancel");
					}
					mysql_free_result();
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Invalid phone number!");
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, " You don't have enough tokens!");
			}
		}
	}
	if(dialogid == VSKIN_DIALOG)
	{
		if(response)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] >= SKIN_PRICE)
			{
				if(IsValidSkin(strval(inputtext)))
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens] - SKIN_PRICE;
					format(string, sizeof(string), " You just purchased skin id %d for %d tokens you now have %d left!", strval(inputtext), SKIN_PRICE, PlayerInfo[playerid][pGoldTokens]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					SetPlayerSkin(playerid, strval(inputtext));
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pChar] = strval(inputtext);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, " You don't have enough tokens!");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("OnDialogResponse");
	return 0;
}

public OnPlayerLeaveCheckpoint(playerid)
{
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerEnterRaceCheckpoint(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEnterRaceCheckpoint");
	new carid = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
	switch(OnDrivingTest[playerid])
	{
		case 1:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 2;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 2084.5198,-1881.3688,13.1948, 2084.1243,-1817.7991,13.2634, 5); }
		case 2:
		{
			new kmh = GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true);
			switch(kmh)
			{
				case 0 .. 70:   { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 3;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 2084.1243,-1817.7991,13.2634, 2037.9457,-1810.3153,13.2578, 5);  }
				case 71 .. 250: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 0; SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); SetVehicleToRespawn(carid); SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "SLOW IT DOWN! YOU HAVE FAILED: You are not ready to drive in Los Santos!!!"); }
			}
		}
		case 3:
		{
			new kmh = GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true);
			switch(kmh)
			{
				case 0 .. 70:   { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 4;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 2037.9457,-1810.3153,13.2578, 1975.3817,-1809.7993,13.2578, 5); }
				case 71 .. 250: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 0; SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); SetVehicleToRespawn(carid); SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "SLOW IT DOWN! YOU HAVE FAILED: You are not ready to drive in Los Santos!!!"); }
			}
		}
		case 4:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 5;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 1975.3817,-1809.7993,13.2578, 1964.8198,-1765.4551,13.2578, 5); }
		case 5:
		{
			hidealltds(playerid); SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 2001.4613,-1835.3933,40.8189); SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 1975.3817,-1809.7993,13.2578);
			DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,0); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen1TD);
			TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen2TD); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, DMVInterTD); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, DMVscgTD);
			OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 6;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 1964.8198,-1765.4551,13.2578, 2009.5354,-1754.0137,13.2578, 5);
			cutscenetimer[playerid] = defer DMVCutsceneEnd1(playerid);
		}
		case 6:
		{
			hidealltds(playerid); SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 1940.9270,-1725.3203,41.6142); SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 1964.8198,-1765.4551,13.2578);
			DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,0); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen1TD);
			TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen2TD); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, DMVrememTD); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, DMVscgTD); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, DMVCorrectTD);
			DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 7;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 2009.5354,-1754.0137,13.2578, 2078.5535,-1755.3325,13.2588, 5);
			cutscenetimer[playerid] = defer DMVCutsceneEnd2(playerid);
		}
		case 7:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 8;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 2078.5535,-1755.3325,13.2588, 2115.0813,-1638.1106,19.1818, 5); }
		case 8:
		{
			hidealltds(playerid); SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 2133.6646,-1731.9072,60.0610); SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 2078.5535,-1755.3325,13.2588);
			DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,0); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen1TD);
			TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen2TD); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, DMVlasttimeTD); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, DMVscgTD); TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, DMVremembitTD);
			DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 9;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 2115.0813,-1638.1106,19.1818, 2114.8774,-1396.7705,23.7030, 5);
			cutscenetimer[playerid] = defer DMVCutsceneEnd3(playerid);
		}
		case 9:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 10; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 2114.8774,-1396.7705,23.7030, 2073.6602,-1341.4047,23.6953, 5); }
		case 10:
		{
			new kmh = GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true);
			switch(kmh)
			{
				case 0 .. 50:   { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 11; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 2073.6602,-1341.4047,23.6953, 1864.1729,-1338.4817,13.2578, 5);  }
				case 51 .. 250: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 0; SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); SetVehicleToRespawn(carid); SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "FAILED: You are not ready to drive in Los Santos!!!"); }
			}
		}
		case 11: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 12; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 1864.1729,-1338.4817,13.2578, 1847.4860,-1467.2788,13.2734, 5); }
		case 12:
		{
			new kmh = GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true);
			switch(kmh)
			{
				case 0 .. 50:   { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 13; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 1847.4860,-1467.2788,13.2734, 1819.9495,-1630.5718,13.2582, 5);  }
				case 51 .. 250: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 0; SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); SetVehicleToRespawn(carid); SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "FAILED: You are not ready to drive in Los Santos!!!"); }
			}
		}
		case 13: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 14; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 1819.9495,-1630.5718,13.2582, 1827.7214,-1753.8918,13.2579, 5); }
		case 14:
		{
			new kmh = GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true);
			switch(kmh)
			{
				case 0 .. 75:   { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 15; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 1827.7214,-1753.8918,13.2579, 1957.2556,-1758.3033,13.2578, 5);  }
				case 76 .. 250: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 0; SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); SetVehicleToRespawn(carid); SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "FAILED: You are not ready to drive in Los Santos!!!"); }
			}
		}
		case 15: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 16; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 1957.2556,-1758.3033,13.2578, 1958.5776,-1924.1395,13.2578, 5); }
		case 16: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 17; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 1958.5776,-1924.1395,13.2578, 1978.8752,-1934.6951,13.2578, 5); }
		case 17:
		{
			new kmh = GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true);
			switch(kmh)
			{
				case 0 .. 45:   { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 18; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, 1978.8752,-1934.6951,13.2578, 2056.9358,-1920.0033,13.4218, 5); }
				case 46 .. 250: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 0; SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); SetVehicleToRespawn(carid); SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "FAILED: You are not ready to drive in Los Santos!!!"); }
			}
		}
		case 18: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 19; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 1, 2056.9358,-1920.0033,13.4218, 2056.9358,-1920.0033,13.4218, 5); }
		case 19:
		{
			new Float:vhealth;
			GetVehicleHealth(carid, vhealth);
			if(vhealth <= 950)
			{
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
				DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have failed your Driving Test. Vehicle Came back TOO Damaged.");
			}
			else
			{
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -750);
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid); DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You have successfully finished your Driving Test!");
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pCarLic] = 1;
				OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
			}
		}
	}
	switch(EventKartRace[playerid])
	{
		case 1:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 2;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1477.4352,-135.4865,1047.2347, -1529.2010,-188.8322,1050.5334,8); }
		case 2:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 3;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1529.2010,-188.8322,1050.5334, -1515.5228,-247.8369,1050.3091,8); }
		case 3:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 4;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1515.5228,-247.8369,1050.3091, -1468.3392,-278.7083,1050.1349,8); }
		case 4:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 5;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1468.3392,-278.7083,1050.1349, -1398.2310,-225.3955,1050.7765,8); }
		case 5:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 6;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1398.2310,-225.3955,1050.7765, -1346.8546,-130.8864,1050.6354,8); }
		case 6:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 7;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1346.8546,-130.8864,1050.6354, -1266.9095,-195.0258,1050.3856,8); }
		case 7:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 8;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1266.9095,-195.0258,1050.3856, -1293.0016,-261.7379,1048.9792,8); }
		case 8:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 9;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1293.0016,-261.7379,1048.9792, -1347.0591,-280.0155,1045.9729,8); }
		case 9:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 10; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1347.0591,-280.0155,1045.9729, -1394.6660,-222.4269,1042.9045,8); }
		case 10: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 11; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1394.6660,-222.4269,1042.9045, -1398.1224,-193.3921,1042.8843,8); }
		case 11: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 12; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1398.1224,-193.3921,1042.8843, -1477.4352,-135.4865,1047.2347,8); }
		case 12: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 13; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1477.4352,-135.4865,1047.2347, -1529.2010,-188.8322,1050.5334,8); }
		case 13: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 14; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1529.2010,-188.8322,1050.5334, -1515.5228,-247.8369,1050.3091,8); }
		case 14: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 15; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1515.5228,-247.8369,1050.3091, -1468.3392,-278.7083,1050.1349,8); }
		case 15: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 16; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1468.3392,-278.7083,1050.1349, -1398.2310,-225.3955,1050.7765,8); }
		case 16: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 17; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1398.2310,-225.3955,1050.7765, -1346.8546,-130.8864,1050.6354,8); }
		case 17: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 18; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1346.8546,-130.8864,1050.6354, -1266.9095,-195.0258,1050.3856,8); }
		case 18: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 19; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1266.9095,-195.0258,1050.3856, -1293.0016,-261.7379,1048.9792,8); }
		case 19: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 20; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1293.0016,-261.7379,1048.9792, -1347.0591,-280.0155,1045.9729,8); }
		case 20: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 21; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1347.0591,-280.0155,1045.9729, -1394.6660,-222.4269,1042.9045,8); }
		case 21: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 22; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1394.6660,-222.4269,1042.9045, -1398.1224,-193.3921,1042.8843,8); }
		case 22: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 23; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1398.1224,-193.3921,1042.8843, -1477.4352,-135.4865,1047.2347,8); }
		case 23: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 24; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1477.4352,-135.4865,1047.2347, -1529.2010,-188.8322,1050.5334,8); }
		case 24: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 25; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1529.2010,-188.8322,1050.5334, -1515.5228,-247.8369,1050.3091,8); }
		case 25: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 26; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1515.5228,-247.8369,1050.3091, -1468.3392,-278.7083,1050.1349,8); }
		case 26: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 27; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1468.3392,-278.7083,1050.1349, -1398.2310,-225.3955,1050.7765,8); }
		case 27: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 28; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1398.2310,-225.3955,1050.7765, -1346.8546,-130.8864,1050.6354,8); }
		case 28: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 29; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1346.8546,-130.8864,1050.6354, -1266.9095,-195.0258,1050.3856,8); }
		case 29: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 30; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1266.9095,-195.0258,1050.3856, -1293.0016,-261.7379,1048.9792,8); }
		case 30: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 31; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1293.0016,-261.7379,1048.9792, -1347.0591,-280.0155,1045.9729,8); }
		case 31: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 32; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1347.0591,-280.0155,1045.9729, -1394.6660,-222.4269,1042.9045,8); }
		case 32: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 33; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1394.6660,-222.4269,1042.9045, -1398.1224,-193.3921,1042.8843,8); }
		case 33: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 34; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 1, -1398.1224,-193.3921,1042.8843, -1398.1224,-193.3921,1042.8843,8); }
		case 34:
		{
			DestroyVehicle(eventcar[playerid]);
			DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventKartRace[playerid] = 0;
			SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 0); SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0); SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 0);
			eventcar[playerid] = -1;
		}
	}
	switch(EventQuadRace[playerid])
	{
		case 1:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 2;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1379.5781,-619.8602,1051.8110, -1323.7621,-642.5669,1054.7852, 8); }
		case 2:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 3;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1323.7621,-642.5669,1054.7852, -1291.9940,-627.0016,1055.7451, 8); }
		case 3:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 4;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1291.9940,-627.0016,1055.7451, -1354.8546,-591.4778,1055.7689, 8); }
		case 4:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 5;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1354.8546,-591.4778,1055.7689, -1438.8013,-586.3688,1055.0531, 8); }
		case 5:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 6;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1438.8013,-586.3688,1055.0531, -1519.5901,-601.8735,1056.1019, 8); }
		case 6:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 7;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1519.5901,-601.8735,1056.1019, -1518.0521,-664.0107,1050.4321, 8); }
		case 7:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 8;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1518.0521,-664.0107,1050.4321, -1491.3412,-722.0255,1051.2563, 8); }
		case 8:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 9;  SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1491.3412,-722.0255,1051.2563, -1404.5146,-742.0764,1049.6853, 8); }
		case 9:  { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 10; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1404.5146,-742.0764,1049.6853, -1347.5049,-741.6671,1054.9452, 8); }
		case 10: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 11; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1347.5049,-741.6671,1054.9452, -1295.5450,-722.3417,1052.9004, 8); }

		case 13: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 14; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1401.0892,-664.2206,1057.4170, -1491.9379,-637.6553,1054.7540, 8); }

		case 18: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 19; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1405.5542,-719.6386,1055.9835, -1342.6566,-717.8626,1055.6395, 8); }
		case 19: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 20; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1342.6566,-717.8626,1055.6395, -1353.4447,-688.0068,1055.0011, 8); }

		case 21: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 22; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1403.5557,-671.3718,1051.9084, -1379.5781,-619.8602,1051.8110, 8); }
		case 22: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 23; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1379.5781,-619.8602,1051.8110, -1323.7621,-642.5669,1054.7852, 8); }

		case 27: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 28; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1519.5901,-601.8735,1056.1019, -1518.0521,-664.0107,1050.4321, 8); }
		case 28: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 29; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1518.0521,-664.0107,1050.4321, -1491.3412,-722.0255,1051.2563, 8); }
		case 29: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 30; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1491.3412,-722.0255,1051.2563, -1404.5146,-742.0764,1049.6853, 8); }

		case 51: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 52; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1404.5146,-742.0764,1049.6853, -1347.5049,-741.6671,1054.9452, 8); }
		case 52: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 53; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1347.5049,-741.6671,1054.9452, -1295.5450,-722.3417,1052.9004, 8); }
		case 53: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 54; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1295.5450,-722.3417,1052.9004, -1300.5392,-698.8234,1056.0905, 8); }
		case 54: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 55; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1300.5392,-698.8234,1056.0905, -1401.0892,-664.2206,1057.4170, 8); }
		case 55: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 56; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1401.0892,-664.2206,1057.4170, -1491.9379,-637.6553,1054.7540, 8); }
		case 56: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 57; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1491.9379,-637.6553,1054.7540, -1435.0514,-611.5952,1054.1932, 8); }
		case 57: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 58; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1435.0514,-611.5952,1054.1932, -1427.6799,-658.2027,1052.9274, 8); }
		case 58: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 59; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1427.6799,-658.2027,1052.9274, -1442.6469,-711.4113,1055.4550, 8); }
		case 59: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 60; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1442.6469,-711.4113,1055.4550, -1405.5542,-719.6386,1055.9835, 8); }
		case 60: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 61; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1405.5542,-719.6386,1055.9835, -1342.6566,-717.8626,1055.6395, 8); }
		case 61: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 62; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1342.6566,-717.8626,1055.6395, -1353.4447,-688.0068,1055.0011, 8); }
		case 62: { DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 63; SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 0, -1353.4447,-688.0068,1055.0011, -1353.4447,-688.0068,1055.0011, 8); }
		case 63:
		{
			DestroyVehicle(eventcar[playerid]);
			DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); EventQuadRace[playerid] = 0;
			SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 0); SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0); SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 0);
			eventcar[playerid] = -1;
		}
	}
	switch(Farming[playerid]) //----JOBS----//
	{
		case 21: { Farming[playerid] = 22; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][2]+30, 15.0); }
		case 22: { Farming[playerid] = 23; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][2]+30, 15.0); }
		case 23: { Farming[playerid] = 24; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][2]+30, 15.0); }
		case 24: { Farming[playerid] = 25; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][2]+30, 15.0); }
		case 25: { Farming[playerid] = 26; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][2]+30, 15.0); }
		case 26: { Farming[playerid] = 27; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][2]+30, 15.0); }
		case 27: { Farming[playerid] = 28; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][2]+30, 15.0); }
		case 28: { Farming[playerid] = 29; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][2]+30, 15.0); }
		case 29: { Farming[playerid] = 30; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][2]+30, 15.0); }
		case 30: { Farming[playerid] = 31; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid); SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Crops dusted! Land the crop duster and /storeduster! **YOU MUST /STOREDUSTER AFTER LANDING TO CONTINUE FARMING**"); }
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerEnterDynamic");
	return 1;
}
