}

public OnPlayerSelectedMenuRow(playerid, row)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerSelectedMenuRow");
    new Menu:Current = GetPlayerMenu(playerid);
   	if(Current == burgermenu || Current == chickenmenu || Current == pizzamenu || Current == donutshop)
	{
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		if (row != 10) // 10 = Leave
		{
			if (GetPlayerCash(playerid) <= 0)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have enough cash");
				return 1;
			}
			new actstring[128];
			new sendername[64];
			new Float:health;
			GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
			if (row == 7 || row == 8) // Drink
			{
				format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s drinks from their cup.", sendername);
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -1);
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 10);
				ApplyAnimation(playerid,"VENDING","VEND_Drink_P",4.1,0,1,1,0,1);
			}
			else // Meal
			{
				switch (row)
				{
					case 1:
					{
					    if(Current == donutshop) format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats a little donut and plays with the little toy that came with it.", sendername);
						else format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats their kids meal and plays with the little toy that came with it.", sendername);
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -2);
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 20);
					}
					case 2:
					{
						if (Current == chickenmenu) format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats the nuggets from their cup.", sendername);
						else if (Current == pizzamenu) format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats their personal pan pizza.", sendername);
						else if (Current == donutshop) format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats their regular size donut.", sendername);
						else format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats their cheeseburger.", sendername);
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -4);
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 50);
					}
					case 3:
					{
						if (Current == pizzamenu) format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats their greasy sheet pizza.", sendername);
						else if (Current == donutshop) format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats their extra large chief donut.", sendername);
						else format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats their greasy sandwich.", sendername);
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -5);
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 80);
					}
					case 4:
					{
					    if (Current == donutshop) format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats their extra large donut.", sendername);
					    else format(actstring, sizeof(actstring), "* %s eats the freshly tossed salad from the bowl (with a fork of course).", sendername);
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -3);
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 35);
					}
				}
				if (Current == burgermenu) ApplyAnimation(playerid,"FOOD","EAT_Burger",4.1,0,1,1,0,1);
				else if (Current == chickenmenu) ApplyAnimation(playerid,"FOOD","EAT_Chicken",4.1,0,1,1,0,1);
				else if (Current == pizzamenu) ApplyAnimation(playerid,"FOOD","EAT_Pizza",4.1,0,1,1,0,1);
				else if (Current == donutshop) ApplyAnimation(playerid,"FOOD","EAT_Pizza",4.1,0,1,1,0,1);
				if (GetPlayerCash(playerid) > 100) SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
				if(Munchies[playerid] != 0)
				{
					Munchies[playerid] = 0;
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You have eaten something and are satisfied. You no longer have the munchies!");
				}
			}
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, actstring, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
	}
	if(Current == Guide)
	{
	    switch(row)
	    {
	        case 0:
	        {
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, "______________Game rules_______________");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, "* Always Roleplay.");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, "* Do not Deathmatch, Revenge Kill, or kill for any vague reason");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, "* Only English (in IC) allowed on this server");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, "* Always Remember to Roleplay your weapons and taking them out");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, "* Drive-by is not allowed (except for cops and passengers)");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, "* Remember to Roleplay your car jacking. DO NOT Ninjajack");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, "* Don't use bunnyhop, it's just not allowed");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, "_______________________________________");
	            TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	        }
	        case 1:
	        {
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, "License center is marked (red) on a map.");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "TIP: type /licensers for a list of licensers online");
	            SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,2048.352,-1900.153,13.5538,5.0,55,0);
	            TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	        }
	        case 2:
	        {
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, "Binco clothes shop is marked tee shirt on your map");
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "TIP: Type /clothes when you're inside clothes shop.");
	            SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,2244.3423,-1665.5542,15.4766,5.0,45,0);
	            TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	        }
	        case 3:
	        {
	            HideMenuForPlayer(Guide, playerid);
	            TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	        }
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerSelectedMenuRow");
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerExitedMenu(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerExitedMenu");
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	new Menu:Current = GetPlayerMenu(playerid);
	if(!IsValidMenu(Current)) return 1;
	ShowMenuForPlayer(Current, playerid);
	LogCallback("OnPlayerExitedMenu");
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerInteriorChange(playerid, newinteriorid, oldinteriorid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerInteriorChange");
    if(IsBeingSpeced[playerid] == 1)
    {
        foreach(Player,i)
        {
            if(spectatorid[i] == playerid)
            {
                SetPlayerInterior(i,GetPlayerInterior(playerid));
                SetPlayerVirtualWorld(i,GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
            }
        }
    }
	LogCallback("OnPlayerInteriorChange");
    return 1;
}
CMD:antiban(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("AntiBan Command");
	new string[128];
	format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has just typed /antiban",GPN(playerid));
	SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED,string);
	LogCallback("AntiBan Command");
	return 1;
}
forward public Testing(playerid);
public Testing(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("Testing");
	GetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,oldCamX[playerid],oldCamY[playerid],oldCamZ[playerid]);
	sobeitCheck[playerid] = SetTimerEx("Sobeit",2000,false,"i",playerid);
	KillTimer(checkTimer[playerid]);
	LogCallback("Testing");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerStateChange(playerid, newstate, oldstate)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerStateChange");
	new
		vehicle = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),
		vehicleid = vehicle,
		string[128]
	;
	/*format(string,sizeof(string),"Newstate:%d, Oldstate:%d",newstate,oldstate);
	SCM(playerid,-1,string);*/
	if(newstate == 1 && oldstate == 0)
	{
		if(actuallyConnected[playerid] != true)
		{
		    SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're desynced please relog");
		    ServerKick(playerid);
		}
		
	}
	if(newstate == 1 && oldstate == 8)
	{
	
		if(actuallyConnected[playerid] != true)
		{
		    SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're desynced please relog");
		    ServerKick(playerid);
		}

		return 1;
	}
    if(newstate == PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER || newstate == PLAYER_STATE_PASSENGER)
    {
        if(IsBeingSpeced[playerid] == 1)
        {
            foreach(Player,i)
            {
                if(spectatorid[i] == playerid)
                {
                    PlayerSpectateVehicle(i, GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
                }
            }
        }
		if(CarInfo[vehicleid][cStreaming] == true)
		{
			PlayAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid,CarInfo[vehicleid][cStation]);
			SetPVarInt(playerid, "Streaming", 1);
		}
		if(MatRunning[playerid] >= 1)
		{
			if(IsAPlane(vehicleid) || IsAHeli(vehicleid))
			{
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Mats can't be transported in an aircraft. Get a car or truck");
			}
		}
    }
    if(newstate == PLAYER_STATE_ONFOOT)
    {
        if(IsBeingSpeced[playerid] == 1)//If the player being spectated, exists a vehicle, then let the spectator spectate the player.
        {
            foreach(Player,i)
            {
                if(spectatorid[i] == playerid)
                {
                    PlayerSpectatePlayer(i, playerid);// Letting the spectator, spectate the player who exited the vehicle.
                }
            }
        }
		if(HotWireTime[playerid] != -1)
		{
			KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
			KillTimer(HotWireTime[playerid]);
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			HotWireTime[playerid] = -1;
			EngTimer[playerid] = -1;
			JobBarUpdate(playerid);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are no longer hot wiring the vehicle");
		}
    }
    if(newstate == PLAYER_STATE_WASTED)
    {
		SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
		ClearWepVariables(playerid);
	}
	if(newstate == PLAYER_STATE_ONFOOT)
	{
		if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming") == 1)
		{
			SetPVarInt(playerid, "Streaming", 0);
			StopAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid);
		}
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, Speedometer[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, Fueltd[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, TaxiFareCostTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, TaxiFareMeterTD[playerid]);
	    TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		if(OnDrivingTest[playerid] >= 1)
        {
			OnDrivingTest[playerid] = 0; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "YOU HAVE FAILED! DO NOT EXIT THE VEHICLE!");
        }
		if(TaxiDriver[playerid] != -1)
		{
			stop TaxiRide[playerid];
			PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiDriver[playerid], JobCDBoxTD[TaxiDriver[playerid]]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiDriver[playerid], TaxiFareCostTD[TaxiDriver[playerid]]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiDriver[playerid], TaxiFareMeterTD[TaxiDriver[playerid]]);
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -TaxiFare[playerid]);
			PlayerInfo[TaxiDriver[playerid]][pPayCheck] += TaxiFare[playerid];
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "[LS TAXI] Thanks for your patronage! Your fare has been paid");
			format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has left your cab and paid the fare of $%d. It's been added to your paycheck", GPN(playerid), TaxiFare[playerid]);
			SCM(TaxiDriver[playerid], COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
			TakeTaxi[TaxiDriver[playerid]] = 0;
			TaxiPass[TaxiDriver[playerid]] = -1;
			FareMeter[TaxiDriver[playerid]] = 0;
			TaxiDriver[playerid] = -1;
			TaxiFare[playerid] = 0;
		}
		if(TaxiDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			if(TaxiPass[playerid] != -1)
			{
				stop TaxiRide[TaxiPass[playerid]];
				PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiPass[playerid], JobCDBoxTD[TaxiPass[playerid]]);
				PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiPass[playerid], TaxiFareCostTD[TaxiPass[playerid]]);
				PlayerTextDrawHide(TaxiPass[playerid], TaxiFareMeterTD[TaxiPass[playerid]]);
				SCM(TaxiPass[playerid], COLOR_LIGHTRED, "The driver left the car mid ride. You will not be charged");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "[LS TAXI] Do not leave the fare!! You won't be paid for this ride.");
				TakeTaxi[playerid] = 0; TaxiFare[playerid] = 0; TaxiDuty[playerid] = 0;
				TaxiPass[playerid] = -1; TaxiDriver[TaxiPass[playerid]] = -1;
				TaxiFare[TaxiPass[playerid]] = 0; FareMeter[playerid] = 0;
			}
			else
			{
				TakeTaxi[playerid] = 0; TaxiFare[playerid] = 0; TaxiDuty[playerid] = 0; TaxiPass[playerid] = -1;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "[LS TAXI] Leaving has taken you off duty. You'll need to /fare in the cab to go on duty again");
			}
			SetPlayerColor(playerid, 0xFFFFFF00);
		}

		foreach(Player,i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(IsPlayerInDynamicArea(playerid,boomboxarea[i]))
				{
					SetPVarInt(playerid,"BoomBoxPlaying", 1);
					SetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming", 1);
					PlayAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid,PlayerInfo[i][pBBStation]);
				}
			}
		}
		TelePos[playerid][0] = 0.0;
		TelePos[playerid][1] = 0.0;
		UsingBelt[playerid] = 0;
	}

	if(newstate == PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER)
	{
		new
			vehname[24],
			nstring[64],
			E,L,A,D,H,T,O,
			newcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)
		;
		SpeedoTimer[playerid] = repeat speedometer(playerid, newcar);
		GetVehicleName(newcar,vehname,sizeof(vehname));
		format(nstring, sizeof(nstring), "VEHICLE:    ~g~~h~%s", vehname);
		PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid], nstring);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, Speedometer[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, Fueltd[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid]);
		if(IsModelABoat(newcar))
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pBoatLic] < 1)
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You don't know how to Sail yet, so you left the Boat !");
			    SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
			    TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			}
		}
		else if(IsAPlane(newcar) || IsAHeli(newcar))
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFlyLic] < 1)
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You don't know how to Fly yet, so you left the Plane !");
			    SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pCarLic] == 0)
		    {
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You don't have a Driver's License yet! Be careful! You can be arrested or fined heavily for this!");
			}
		}
		GetVehicleParamsEx(newcar,E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		if(E == 0)
		{
			if(IsModelABycicle(newcar))
			{
				SetVehicleParamsEx(newcar,1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			}
			else if(IsModelABike(newcar))
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "Remember: Use your /helmet, or else you can get a ticket!");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "TIP: Use /engine to start the engine!");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "TIP: Use /engine to start the engine!");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "Remember: Use your /belt or else you can get a ticket!");
			}
		}
		else if(DMVTestCars(newcar))
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pCarLic] == 1)
			{
				CanTurnEngine[playerid] = 9999;
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already have a drivers license");
			}
			else
			{
				DMVW_A[playerid] = 0;
				DMVQ_Q[playerid] = 1;
				dmvquiz(playerid);
				CanTurnEngine[playerid] = newcar;
				Gas[newcar] = 100;
			}
		}
		else if(IsARentableVeh(newcar))
		{
			if(HireCar[playerid] != newcar)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You can rent this vehicle for the fee of $50. Type /rentveh to rent or /exit to get off");
				CanTurnEngine[playerid] = 9999;
			}
			else
			{
				CanTurnEngine[playerid] = newcar;
			}
		}
		else if(AdminCars(newcar))
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 4)
			{
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
			}
		}
	}
	if(newstate == PLAYER_STATE_PASSENGER) //----JOBS----// TAXI
	{
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(IsPlayerInVehicle(i, vehicleid) && GetPlayerState(i) == 2 && TaxiDuty[i] == 1)
				{
					if(FareMeter[i] == 1)
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "[LS TAXI] This driver is currently driving someone else");
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "[LS TAXI] we apologize, but you'll need to /call 444 for");
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "[LS TAXI] another on duty taxi driver. Thanks!");
						SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
						return 1;
					}
					if(TaxiDuty[i] == 1)
					{
						new
							mtext[64]
						;
						format(mtext, sizeof(mtext), "YOUR TOTAL FARE:     ~g~$%d.00", TaxiFare[i]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(i, TaxiFareCostTD[i], mtext);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(i, JobCDBoxTD[i]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(i, TaxiFareCostTD[i]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(i, TaxiFareMeterTD[i]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, TaxiFareCostTD[playerid], mtext);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, TaxiFareCostTD[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, TaxiFareMeterTD[playerid]);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have entered the Taxi at the fare of $%d + Distance", TaxiFare[i]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* Passenger %s has entered your Taxi.", GPN(playerid));
						SCM(i, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						TaxiPass[i] = playerid;
						TaxiFare[playerid] = TaxiFare[i];
						TaxiDriver[playerid] = i;
						FareMeter[i] = 1;
						TaxiRide[playerid] = repeat TaxiMeter(playerid);
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if(GetVehicleModel(vehicleid) == 508)
		{
			SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,0.0);
			SetPlayerPos(playerid,246.1213,284.3154,1000.7759);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, vehicleid);
			SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
			VehicleInt[playerid][0] = vehicleid;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerStateChange");
	return 1;
}

public OnVehicleSpawn(vehicleid)
{
	return 1;
}

public OnVehicleDeath(vehicleid)
{
	LogCallback("OnVehicleDeath");
	switch(vehicleid)
	{
		case 508, 519:
		{
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
				if(VehicleInt[i][0] == vehicleid)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(i, 0.0);
					SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "The vehicle you were inside exploded");
				}
				if(VehicleInt[i][1] == vehicleid)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(i, 0.0);
					SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "The vehicle you were inside exploded");
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if(CarInfo[vehicleid][cOID] != -1)
	{
	    foreach(Player,i)
	    {
	        if(pCopCar[i] == CarInfo[vehicleid][cOID])
	        {
	            pCopCar[i] = -1;
	        }
	        else if(pEmsCar[i] == CarInfo[vehicleid][cOID])
			{
				pEmsCar[i] = -1;
			}
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("OnVehicleDeath");
	return 1;
}


public OnPlayerUpdate(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerUpdate");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(IsPlayerNPC(playerid)) return 1;
		new currentGun = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid);
	    if(currentGun != currentWeapon[playerid])
	    {
	        currentWeapon[playerid] = currentGun;
	    }

		if(InEvent[playerid] == 0 && IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid) && UsingBelt[playerid] == 0 && HasSeatbelts(GetVehicleModel(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid))))
		{
			new Float:TempCarHealth;
			GetVehicleHealth(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), TempCarHealth);
			new Float:Difference = floatsub(CarHealth[playerid], TempCarHealth);
			if((floatcmp(CarHealth[playerid], TempCarHealth) == 1) && (floatcmp(Difference,100.0) == 1))
			{
			    Difference = floatdiv(Difference, 10.0);
			    if(Difference >= 23)
			    {
			        if(CarVX[playerid] > 0.38 || CarVX[playerid] < -0.38 || CarVY[playerid] > 0.38 || CarVY[playerid] < -0.38 || CarVZ[playerid] > 0.38 || CarVZ[playerid] < -0.38)
			        {
			            new Float:X, Float:Y, Float:Z,Float:A;
				        new car = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
						GetVehiclePos(car, X, Y, Z);
						GetVehicleZAngle(car, A);
						X += (2.0*floatsin(-(A-0.0), degrees)), Y += (2.0*floatcos(-(A-0.0), degrees));
						SetPlayerPos(playerid, X, Y, Z + 4.5);
						SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, A);
						SetPlayerVelocity(playerid, CarVX[playerid], CarVY[playerid], CarVZ[playerid] + 5.5);
						accidenttimer[playerid] = defer accidentroll(playerid);
					}
				}
			    new Float:OldHealth;
			    GetPlayerHealth(playerid, OldHealth);
			    SetPlayerHealth(playerid, floatsub(OldHealth, Difference));
			}
			CarHealth[playerid] = TempCarHealth;
			GetVehicleVelocity(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), CarVX[playerid], CarVY[playerid], CarVZ[playerid]);
		}
		else
		{
			CarHealth[playerid] = 0.0;
		}
		ALTTAB[playerid] = 0;
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerUpdate");
    return 1;
}

public OnPlayerExitVehicle(playerid, vehicleid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerExitVehicle");
    foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
			if(Spectate[i] != 255)
			{
    			PlayerSpectatePlayer(i,playerid);
			}
		}
	}
	if(GetPlayerState(playerid) == 1)
	{
		return 1;
	}
	if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming") == 1)
	{
	    StopAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid);
	}
	if(UsingBelt[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    new string[128];
	    if(!IsModelABike(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))
	    {
			UsingBelt[playerid] = 0;
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s extends their arm unbuckling their seatbelt.", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(10.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
		}
		else
		{
			UsingBelt[playerid] = 0;
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s extends their arms removing the helmet from their head.", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(10.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
		}
	}
	PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, Speedometer[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, SPEEDOBGTD[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, Fueltd[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, VehnameTD[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid]);
	LogCallback("OnPlayerExitVehicle");
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerRequestClass(playerid, classid)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerRequestClass");
	if(RegistrationStep[playerid] == 0 && gPlayerLogged[playerid] != 1)
	{
		ClearChatbox(playerid, 30);
	 	SetPlayerPos(playerid, 1033.3676,-1230.4243,24.6521);
		SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 1033.3676,-1230.4243,24.6521);
		SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 1238.2898,-1443.1581,69.1127);
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
		SCM(playerid, -1, "Welcome to {FF0000}SA-MP Roleplay");
	    SCM(playerid, -1, "{FF0000}Warning{FFFFFF}: Some things on this server (and in GTA in general) can be considered {FF0000}offensive");
		SCM(playerid, -1, "{FF0000}sexual, or violent in nature, {FFFFFF}and are intended for a mature audience. Player discretion is advised.");
		ClearChatbox(playerid, 1);
		SCM(playerid, -1, "{FF0000}IMPORTANT{FFFFFF}: This is a Roleplay server, you must act as a realistic and believable character");
		SCM(playerid, -1, "This means you can't run around killing, trolling, or committing super human acts, other acts that would be considered NON RP.");
		SCM(playerid, -1, "In order to keep things fair there are some rule set in place that you must follow at all times.");
		ClearChatbox(playerid, 1);
		SCM(playerid, -1, "{FF0000}Read the /rules once you have spawned. {FFFFFF}This will tell you what is and is not allowed.");
		SCM(playerid, -1, "Failure to follow rules can result in you being {FF0000}jailed {FFFFFF} or even worse, {FF0000}banned{FFFFFF}!");
		SCM(playerid, -1, "It may seem harsh, but it is needed to maintain a balance, and helps to avoid chaos during roleplay.");
		ShowServerDialog(playerid,1244,DIALOG_STYLE_MSGBOX,"Agreement","You agree to read and follow ALL the rules or be {FF0000}kicked/jailed/banned","I Agree","I Refuse");
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel] = Peds[classid][0];
		SetPlayerTeamFromClass(playerid,classid);
	}
	else
	{
		SpawnPlayer(playerid);
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerRequestClass");
	return false;
}

public RingToner()
{
	LogCallback("RingToner");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
	    {
			if(RingTone[i] != 6 && RingTone[i] != 0 && RingTone[i] < 11)
			{
				RingTone[i] = RingTone[i] -1;
				PlayerPlaySound(i, 1138, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			}
			if(RingTone[i] == 6)
			{
				RingTone[i] = RingTone[i] -1;
			}
			if(RingTone[i] == 20)
			{
				RingTone[i] = RingTone[i] -1;
				PlayerPlaySound(i, 1139, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			}
		}
	}
	SetTimer("RingTonerRev", 1000, 0);
	LogCallback("RingToner");
	return 1;
}

public RingTonerRev()
{
	LogCallback("RingTonerRev");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
	    {
			if(RingTone[i] != 5 && RingTone[i] != 0 && RingTone[i] < 10)
			{
				RingTone[i] = RingTone[i] -1;
				PlayerPlaySound(i, 1137, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			}
			if(RingTone[i] == 5)
			{
				RingTone[i] = RingTone[i] -1;
			}
			if(RingTone[i] == 19)
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(i, 1139, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				RingTone[i] = 0;
			}
		}
	}
	SetTimer("RingToner", 1000, 0);
	LogCallback("RingTonerRev");
	return 1;
}
forward public Logger();
public Logger()
{
	LogCallback("Logger");
	foreach(Player,i)
	{
	    if(gPlayerLogged[i] == 0)
	    {
	        idleSeconds[i] += 1;
	        if(idleSeconds[i] >= 60)
	        {
	            SendClientMessage(i,-1,"You have been kicked from the server for failing to login within 60 seconds");
	            ServerKick(i);
	        }
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("Logger");
	return 1;
}
forward public AntiCheat(playerid);
public AntiCheat(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("AntiCheat");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6) { return 1; }
	if(InEvent[playerid] >= 1) { return 0; }
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid) && GetPlayerVehicleSeat(playerid) == 0)
	{
	    if(GetPlayerSpeed(playerid,true) >= 260.0 && cheatWarns[playerid] < 2)
	    {
			new string[128];
			format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}Warning:{AA3333} %s(%d) is possibly speed hacking please spectate them at once",GPN(playerid),playerid);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED,string);
			cheatWarns[playerid] ++;
	    }
	}
	switch(GetPlayerAnimationIndex(playerid))
	{
	    case 1543,1538,1539:
	    {
	        if(!IsPlayerInWater(playerid) && cheatWarns[playerid] < 2)
			{
				new string[128];
				format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}Warning:{AA3333} %s(%d) is possibly fly hacking please spectate them at once",GPN(playerid),playerid);
				SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED,string);
				cheatWarns[playerid] ++;
			}
	    }
	}
	if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) > GetPlayerCash(playerid))
	{
		ResetMoneyBar(playerid);//Resets the money in the original moneybar, Do not remove!
		UpdateMoneyBar(playerid,GetPlayerCash(playerid));//Sets the money in the moneybar to the serverside cash, Do not remove!
	}
	if(GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) == SPECIAL_ACTION_USEJETPACK)
	{
	    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid,SPECIAL_ACTION_NONE);
		if(admins > 0)
		{
			new string[128];
			format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}Warning:{AA3333} %s(playerid) was just detected with a jetpack, removing it.",GPN(playerid),playerid);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED,string);
		}
		else
		{
		    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_RED,"You have been detected using a jetpack, kicking you from the server.");
		    ServerKick(playerid);
		}
	}
	new Float:arm;
	GetPlayerArmour(playerid,arm);
	if(arm > PlayerInfo[playerid][pArmour])
	{
		new string[128];
		format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}Warning:{AA3333} %s(%d) is possibly hacking armour",GPN(playerid),playerid);
		SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED,string);
		SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid,PlayerInfo[playerid][pArmour]);
	}
	if(GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) != 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < 2)
	{
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 1)
        {
            new s = GetPlayerState(playerid);
            if(s != 0 && s != 7)
            {
				new string[128], wname[32],weaponid = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid);
				GetWeaponName(weaponid, wname,sizeof(wname));
				format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has been banned for Weapon Hacking(%s)", GPN(playerid), wname);
				SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED, string);
				SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
				ClearWepVariables(playerid);
				ScriptBan(playerid, 999, string);
				return 1;
            }
        }
	}
	new s = GetPlayerState(playerid);
	if(s == 1 || s == 2 || s == 3)
	{
		new weaponid = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid);
		if(weaponid == 0 || weaponid == 46) { return 1; }
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && weaponid == 23 || weaponid == 24) { return 1; }
		switch(weaponid)
		{
			case 4, 9, 16 .. 18, 34..40:
		    {
				new string[128], wname[32];
				GetWeaponName(weaponid, wname,sizeof(wname));
				format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has been banned for Weapon Hacking(%s)", GPN(playerid), wname);
				SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED, string);
				SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
				ClearWepVariables(playerid);
				ScriptBan(playerid, 999, string);
				return 1;
			}
		}
		if(Weapon[playerid][GetWeaponSlot(weaponid)] != weaponid)
		{
			wSus[playerid] += 1;
			wSusTime[playerid] = repeat ClearSus(playerid);
			if(wSus[playerid] >= 3)
			{
				new string[128], wname[32];
				GetWeaponName(weaponid, wname,sizeof(wname));
				format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}Admin Alert:{AA3333}%s has been banned for Weapon Hacking(%s)", GPN(playerid), wname);
				SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED, string);
				SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
				ClearWepVariables(playerid);
				ScriptBan(playerid, 999, string);
				return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(Ammo[playerid][GetWeaponSlot(weaponid)] < GetPlayerAmmo(playerid) && GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == INVALID_VEHICLE_ID)
		{
			aSus[playerid] += 1;
			wSusTime[playerid] = repeat ClearSus(playerid);
			if(aSus[playerid] >= 3 && cheatWarns[playerid] < 2)
			{
			    new string[200],wname[32];
			    GetWeaponName(weaponid,wname,sizeof(wname));
				format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}Admin Alert:{AA3333}%s has been detected with suspicious %s ammo levels resetting to appropriate value",GPN(playerid),wname);
				SendAdminMessage(COLOR_RED, string);
				SetPlayerAmmo(playerid,weaponid,Ammo[playerid][GetWeaponSlot(weaponid)]);
				cheatWarns[playerid] ++;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("AntiCheat");
	return 1;
}

forward public ACST(playerid);
public ACST(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ACST");
	cheatWarns[playerid] = 0;
	LogCallback("ACST");
	return 1;
}
stock ServerKick(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ServerKick");
	KickTimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("DelayKick",700,false,"i",playerid);
	LogCallback("ServerKick");
	return 1;
}

forward public DelayKick(playerid);
public DelayKick(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("DelayKick");
	Kick(playerid);
	LogCallback("DelayKick");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerCommandReceived(playerid, cmdtext[])
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerCommandReceived");
	LastTyped[playerid] = 0;
	LogCallback("OnPlayerCommandReceived");
	return 1;
}

public Fillup(playerid, vehicleid)
{
	LogCallback("Fillup");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new
			FillUp = GasMax - Gas[vehicleid],
			string[128]
		;
		if(IsACopCar(vehicleid) || IsAEmsCar(vehicleid) || IsAnFiretruck(vehicleid))
		{
			Gas[vehicleid] += FillUp;
			format(string,sizeof(string),"* Vehicle filled up, for: $%d.",FillUp);
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,string);
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"Government has paid for a gas.");
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		}
		else
		{
			if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= FillUp+4)
			{
				Gas[vehicleid] += FillUp;
				FillUp = FillUp * 1;
				format(string,sizeof(string),"* Vehicle filled up, for: $%d.",FillUp);
				SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,string);
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - FillUp);
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			}
			else
			{
				format(string,sizeof(string),"* Not enough Money to refill, it costs $%d to fill your Vehicle.",FillUp);
				SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,string);
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("Fillup");
	return 1;
}

LoadDrugDealer()//drug
{
	LogCallback("LoadDrugDealer");
	new
		arrCoords[25][64],
		strFromFile2[512],
		string[128],
		File: file = fopen("DrugJob.cfg",io_read)
	;
	if(file)
	{
	    fread(file,strFromFile2);
		split(strFromFile2,arrCoords,'|');
		dJPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[0]);
		dJPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[1]);
		dJPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[2]);
		dPPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[3]);
		dPPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[4]);
		dPPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[5]);
		dCPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[6]);
		dCPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[7]);
		dCPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[8]);
		dUsed[0] = strval(arrCoords[9]);
		dUsed[1] = strval(arrCoords[10]);
		dUsed[2] = strval(arrCoords[11]);
		dTime[0] = strval(arrCoords[12]);
		dTime[1] = strval(arrCoords[13]);
		dSeedPrice = strval(arrCoords[14]);
		dCokePrice = strval(arrCoords[15]);
		dC2CR      = strval(arrCoords[16]);
		dPSupply   = strval(arrCoords[17]);
		dCSupply   = strval(arrCoords[18]);
		dVw[0]     = strval(arrCoords[19]);
		dVw[1]     = strval(arrCoords[20]);
		dVw[2]     = strval(arrCoords[21]);
		dInt[0]    = strval(arrCoords[22]);
		dInt[1]    = strval(arrCoords[23]);
		dInt[2]    = strval(arrCoords[24]);
		if(dUsed[0] == 1)
		{
			DrugJobPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,dJPos[0],dJPos[1],dJPos[2],dVw[0],dInt[0],-1,50);
	        DrugJobLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/join] \n Drug Dealer",COLOR_LIMEGREEN,dJPos[0],dJPos[1],dJPos[2] +0.5,
			20.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,1,dVw[0],dInt[0],-1,20.0);
		}
		if(dUsed[1] == 1)
		{
			SeedsPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,dPPos[0],dPPos[1],dPPos[2],dVw[1],dInt[1],-1,50);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "Drug Dealer \n[/buyseeds]\nSeeds Available: %d",dPSupply);
			SeedsLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(string,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,dPPos[0],dPPos[1],dPPos[2] +0.5,
			50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,1,dVw[1],dInt[1],-1,50.0);
		}
		if(dUsed[2] == 1)
		{
		    CokePickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,dCPos[0],dCPos[1],dCPos[2],dVw[2],dInt[2],-1,50);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "Drug Dealer \n[/buycoke]\nRaw Coke Available: %d",dCSupply);
		    CokeLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(string,-1,dCPos[0],dCPos[1],dCPos[2] +0.5,
		    50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,1,dVw[2],dInt[2],-1,50.0);
		}
	}
	fclose(file);
	LogCallback("LoadDrugDealer");
	return 1;
}
LoadTrucker()
{
	LogCallback("LoadTrucker");
	new arrCoords[16][64];
	new strFromFile2[512];
	new File: file = fopen("TruckerJob.cfg",io_read);
	if(file)
	{
	    fread(file, strFromFile2);
	    split(strFromFile2,arrCoords, '|');
	    tJPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[0]);
	    tJPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[1]);
	    tJPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[2]);
	    tPPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[3]);
	    tPPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[4]);
	    tPPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[5]);
		tUsed[0] = strval  (arrCoords[6]);
		tUsed[1] = strval  (arrCoords[7]);
		tVw[0]   = strval  (arrCoords[8]);
		tVw[1]   = strval  (arrCoords[9]);
		tInt[0]  = strval  (arrCoords[10]);
		tInt[1]  = strval  (arrCoords[11]);
		tPackages = strval (arrCoords[12]);
		tPayout[0]   = strval (arrCoords[13]);
		tPayout[1]  = strval  (arrCoords[14]);
		tCarParts  = strval (arrCoords[15]);
		if(tUsed[0] == 1)
		{
            TruckJoinPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,tJPos[0],tJPos[1],tJPos[2],tVw[0],tInt[0],-1,50);
            TruckJoinLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Trucker Job \n[/join]",TRUCK_COLOR,tJPos[0],tJPos[1],tJPos[2] +0.5,
			50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,tVw[0],tInt[0],-1,50.0);
		}
		if(tUsed[1] == 1)
		{
			TruckPickupPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,tPPos[0],tPPos[1],tPPos[2],tVw[1],tInt[1],-1,50.0);
			TruckLoadLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Trucker \n[/gotrucking] \n[/getprods] \n[/returnveh]",TRUCK_COLOR,tPPos[0],tPPos[1],tPPos[2]+0.7,30,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,-1,-1,-1,30.0);
		}
	}
	fclose(file);
	LogCallback("LoadTrucker");
	return 1;
}
LoadScrapper()
{
	LogCallback("LoadScrapper");
	new arrCoords[14][64];
	new strFromFile2[512];
	new File: file = fopen("ScrapJob.cfg", io_read);
	if(file)
	{
		fread(file, strFromFile2);
		split(strFromFile2, arrCoords, '|');
		sJPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[0]);
		sJPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[1]);
		sJPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[2]);
		sDPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[3]);
		sDPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[4]);
		sDPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[5]);
		sUsed[0] = strval  (arrCoords[6]);
		sUsed[1] = strval  (arrCoords[7]);
		sVw[0]   = strval  (arrCoords[8]);
		sVw[1]   = strval  (arrCoords[9]);
		sInt[0]  = strval  (arrCoords[10]);
		sInt[1]  = strval  (arrCoords[11]);
		sPayout  = strval  (arrCoords[12]);
		sMetal   = strval  (arrCoords[13]);
		if(sUsed[0] != 0)
		{
			ScrapperJobPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,sJPos[0],sJPos[1],sJPos[2],sVw[0],sInt[0],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50);
			ScrapperJobLabel  = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/join]\nScrapper Job\n[/goscrap]",COLOR_LIMEGREEN,sJPos[0],sJPos[1],sJPos[2] +0.5,
			50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,sVw[0],sInt[0],-1,50.0);
		}
		if(sUsed[1] != 0)
		{
		   	ScrapperDropPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,sDPos[0],sDPos[1],sDPos[2],sVw[1],sInt[1],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50);
			new string[128];
			format(string,sizeof(string),"Scrap Dropoff\r\nScrap Yards Metal:%d",sMetal);
			ScrapperDropLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(string,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,sDPos[0],sDPos[1],sDPos[2] +0.5,
			50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,sVw[1],sInt[1],-1,50.0);
		}
	}
	fclose(file);
	LogCallback("LoadScrapper");
	return 1;
}
LoadGunDealer()
{
	LogCallback("LoadGunDealer");
	new arrCoords[22][64];
	new strFromFile2[512];
	new File: file = fopen("GunDealer.cfg", io_read);
	if(file)
	{
		fread(file, strFromFile2);
		split(strFromFile2, arrCoords, '|');
		gJPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[0]);
		gJPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[1]);
		gJPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[2]);
		gPPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[3]);
		gPPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[4]);
		gPPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[5]);
		gDPos[0] = floatstr(arrCoords[6]);
		gDPos[1] = floatstr(arrCoords[7]);
		gDPos[2] = floatstr(arrCoords[8]);
		gUsed[0] = strval  (arrCoords[9]);
		gUsed[1] = strval  (arrCoords[10]);
		gUsed[2] = strval  (arrCoords[11]);
		gVw[0]   = strval  (arrCoords[12]);
		gVw[1]   = strval  (arrCoords[13]);
		gVw[2]   = strval  (arrCoords[14]);
		gInt[0]  = strval  (arrCoords[15]);
		gInt[1]  = strval  (arrCoords[16]);
		gInt[2]  = strval  (arrCoords[17]);
		gPrice   = strval  (arrCoords[18]);
		gMats    = strval  (arrCoords[19]);
		gSupply  = strval  (arrCoords[20]);
		gPayout  = strval  (arrCoords[21]);
		if(gUsed[0] == 1)
		{
			GunJoinPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,gJPos[0],gJPos[1],gJPos[2],gVw[0],gInt[0],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50);
			GunJoinLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/join] \n Gun Dealer Job",COLOR_LIMEGREEN,gJPos[0],gJPos[1],gJPos[2] +0.5,
			50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,gVw[0],gInt[0],-1,50.0);
		}
		if(gUsed[1] == 1)
		{
			new string[128];
			GunSPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,gPPos[0],gPPos[1],gPPos[2],gVw[1],gInt[1],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"/smugglemats\r\nAvailable Mats:%d",gSupply);
			GunSLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(string,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,gPPos[0],gPPos[1],gPPos[2] +0.5,
			50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,gVw[1],gInt[1],-1,50.0);
		}
		if(gUsed[2] == 1)
		{
			GunDropPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,gDPos[0],gDPos[1],gDPos[2],gVw[2],gInt[2],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50.0);
			GunsDOLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Materials Drop-Off",COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,gDPos[0],gDPos[1],gDPos[2]+0.5,
			50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,gVw[1],gInt[1],-1,50.0);
		}
	}
	fclose(file);
	LogCallback("LoadGunDealer");
	return 1;
}
SaveDrugDealer()
{
	LogCallback("SaveDrugDealer");
	new File:file = fopen("DrugJob.cfg",io_write), string[512];
	format(string,sizeof(string),"%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d",dJPos[0],dJPos[1],dJPos[2],
	dPPos[0],dPPos[1],dPPos[2],dCPos[0],dCPos[1],dCPos[2],dUsed[0],dUsed[1],dUsed[2],dTime[0],dTime[1],dSeedPrice,dCokePrice,dC2CR,dPSupply,
	dCSupply,dVw[0],dVw[1],dVw[2],dInt[0],dInt[1],dInt[2]);
	fwrite(file,string);
	fclose(file);
	LogCallback("SaveDrugDealer");
	return 1;
}
SaveTrucker()
{
	LogCallback("SaveTrucker");
	new File:file,string[256];
	format(string,sizeof(string),"%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d",tJPos[0],tJPos[1],tJPos[2],
	tPPos[0],tPPos[1],tPPos[2],tUsed[0],tUsed[1],tVw[0],tVw[1],tInt[0],tInt[1],tPackages,tPayout[0],tPayout[1],tCarParts);
	file = fopen("TruckerJob.cfg",io_write);
	fwrite(file,string);
	fclose(file);
	LogCallback("SaveTrucker");
}
SaveGunDealer()
{
	LogCallback("SaveGunDealer");
	new File:file,string[256];
	format(string,sizeof(string),"%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d",gJPos[0],gJPos[1],gJPos[2],gPPos[0],gPPos[1],gPPos[2],
	gDPos[0],gDPos[1],gDPos[2],gUsed[0],gUsed[1],gUsed[2],gVw[0],gVw[1],gVw[2],gInt[0],gInt[1],gInt[2],gPrice,gMats,gSupply,gPayout);
	file = fopen("GunDealer.cfg", io_write);
	fwrite(file,string);
	fclose(file);
	LogCallback("SaveGunDealer");
}
SaveScrapper()
{
	LogCallback("SaveScrapper");
	new File:file,string[256];
	format(string,sizeof(string),"%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%f|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d|%d",
	sJPos[0],sJPos[1],sJPos[2],sDPos[0],sDPos[1],sDPos[2],sUsed[0],sUsed[1],
	sVw[0],sVw[1],sInt[0],sInt[1],sPayout,sMetal);
	file = fopen("ScrapJob.cfg", io_write);
	fwrite(file,string);
	fclose(file);
	LogCallback("SaveScrapper");
}
public OnGameModeExit()
{
	SaveDrugDealer();
	SaveDoors();
	SaveAtms();
	printf("[MySQL]: Connection closed.", DB_DATABASE);
	mysql_close();
	BUD::Exit();
	return 1;
}

//------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
public OnGameModeInit() // Do not add vehicles Above the next lines. - CuervO
{
	//Steve Mapping
		rlobbydoors = 0;
	llobbydoors = 0;
	maincelldoors = 0;
	pdcelldoor1s = 0;
	pdcelldoor2s = 0;
	pdcelldoor3s = 0;
	pdcelldoor4s = 0;
	pdcelldoor5s = 0;
	evidences = 0;
	lockerdoors = 0;
		lspdg = 0;
	lspdg2 = 0;

	//----Dynamic NEW PDObjects----
	pdgate1 = CreateDynamicObject(971,1589.053344,-1638.123168,14.122960,0.000000,0.000000,180);
	pdgate2 = CreateDynamicObject(971,1545.3225,-1627.8137,14.7720,0.000000,0.000000,90);
	CreateDynamicObject(1500,1582.6205,-1638.0587,12.3776,0.000000,-1.000000,0);
    rlobbydoor = CreateDynamicObject(1569, 1569.0649, -1670.5728, 10000.0596,   0.00000, 0.00000, 180.00000);
	llobbydoor = CreateDynamicObject(1569, 1551.8589, -1670.5685, 10000.0596,   0.00000, 0.00000, 0.00000);
	maincelldoor = CreateDynamicObject(19303, 1574.9009, -1651.8865, 10001.3398,   0.00000, 0.00000, 0.00000);
	pdcelldoor1 = CreateDynamicObject(19303, 1576.4500, -1653.2900, 10001.3398,   0.00000, 0.00000, 90.00000);
	pdcelldoor2 = CreateDynamicObject(19303, 1576.4500, -1656.5800, 10001.3398,   0.00000, 0.00000, 90.00000);
	pdcelldoor3 = CreateDynamicObject(19303, 1576.4500, -1659.7800, 10001.3398,   0.00000, 0.00000, 90.00000);
	pdcelldoor4 = CreateDynamicObject(19303, 1576.4500, -1663.1300, 10001.3398,   0.00000, 0.00000, 90.00000);

			    format(PropertyString,sizeof(PropertyString),"Bizz is Unowned! \n %s \n Bizz ID: %d \n Price: $%d \n Level Needed: %d \n To Buy This, /buybiz",BizzInfo[h][bMessage], BizzInfo[h][bVirWorld], BizzInfo[h][bBuyPrice], BizzInfo[h][bLevelNeeded]);

			BizzPickup[h] = CreateDynamicPickup(1274,1,BizzInfo[h][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[h][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[h][bEntranceZ],-1);

		new label[128];
		switch(j)
		{
			case 0:
			{
				format(label, sizeof(label), "[/join] \nMechanic \n[/towtruck]\n[/buyparts]\n[/returnveh]\n Available Parts:%d",tCarParts);

			}

			case 10: { CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/cookcoke] \nDrug Dealer",0x00FF00AA, JobIcons[j][0],JobIcons[j][1],JobIcons[j][2]+0.4,30,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,2000,5,-1,30.0); }

			case 12: { CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/join] \n Lawyer",0x00FF00AA, JobIcons[j][0],JobIcons[j][1],JobIcons[j][2]+0.4,30,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,-1,-1,-1,30.0); }
			case 13: { CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/takeparts] \n Mechanic",0x00FF00AA, JobIcons[j][0],JobIcons[j][1],JobIcons[j][2]+0.4,30,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,-1,-1,-1,30.0); }
			case 14: { CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/copcar] \n LSPD",0x00FF00AA, JobIcons[j][0],JobIcons[j][1],JobIcons[j][2]+0.4,15,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,1,-1,-1,-1,15.0); }
		}
		CreateDynamicPickup(1239, 1, JobIcons[j][0],JobIcons[j][1],JobIcons[j][2],-1,-1,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50.0);
	}
	/****** DEALERSHIP ENTER SPOTS ******/
	for(new d = 0; d < 4; d++)
	{
		switch(d)
		{
			case 0 .. 2: CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Car Dealership \n[/ENTER]",0x00FF00AA, DSIcons[d][0],DSIcons[d][1],DSIcons[d][2]+0.6,30,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,-1,-1,-1,30.0);
			case 3: CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Car Dealership \n GOLD & DIAMOND VIP ONLY\n [/ENTER]",0x00FF00AA, DSIcons[d][0],DSIcons[d][1],DSIcons[d][2]+0.6,30,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,-1,-1,-1,30.0);
		}
		CreateDynamicPickup(1239, 1, DSIcons[d][0],DSIcons[d][1],DSIcons[d][2],-1,-1,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50.0);
	}
	/****** FAST FOOD BUY SPOTS ******/
	for(new r = 0; r < 4; r++)
	{
		switch(r)
		{
			case 0 .. 3: { CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/buyfood]",0x00FF00AA, FastFood[r][0],FastFood[r][1],FastFood[r][2]+0.4,30,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,-1,-1,-1,30.0); }
		}
		CreateDynamicPickup(1239, 1, FastFood[r][0],FastFood[r][1],FastFood[r][2],-1,-1,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50.0);
	}
	printf("[SCRIPT]: Loaded %d Pickups", CountDynamicPickups());

	/******* VEHICLES *******/



	//------------------------------------- RENTAL VEHICLES  ----------------------------------------------------
	rentveh[0] = AddStaticVehicleEx(547,1681.5526,-1035.9557,23.6389,180,123,92,-1);// Rent car
	rentveh[1] = AddStaticVehicleEx(547,1685.3273,-1035.4058,23.6409,180,101,101,-1); // Rent car
	rentveh[2] = AddStaticVehicleEx(547,1689.9888,-1035.6348,23.6384,180,83,110,-1); // Rent car

	    CarInfo[v][cUid] = -1;
		CarInfo[v][cWcar] = -1;
		CarInfo[v][cOID] = -1;

	Create3DTextLabel("/dlocker", COLOR_YELLOW, -2654.5042,1396.5764,906.4609, 40.0, 20, 0);
	return 1;
}

public PayDay()
{
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
		    if(gPlayerLogged[i] == 1)
		    {
				new
					pb[10],
					b2[10],           /*** 0 = balance, 1 = ebill, 2 = pbill, 3 = car1, 4 = car2, 5 - 7 = Total Bills, 8 = LEO PAY, 9 PLAYER BONUS ***/
					Float:mathz[7],  /*** 0 = pay, 1 = int, 2 = tax, 3 = fint, 4 = ftax, 5 = ipay, 6 = fpay ***/
					string[128]
				;
				if(PlayerInfo[i][pPayDayHad] >= 4)
				{
					switch(PlayerInfo[i][pLevel])
					{
						case 5 .. 999:
						{
							switch(PlayerInfo[i][pVIP])
							{
								case 0 .. 2: { mathz[1] = 0.001; }
								case 3 .. 4: { mathz[1] = 0.005; }
							}
						}
					}
					mathz[2] = 0.0004;
					mathz[0] = PlayerInfo[i][pAccount] + PlayerInfo[i][pPayCheck];
					mathz[3] = mathz[0] * mathz[1];
					mathz[5] = mathz[3] + mathz[0];
					mathz[4] = mathz[5] * mathz[2];
					mathz[6] = mathz[5] - mathz[4];
					mathz[0] = mathz[6] - b2[7];
					PlayerInfo[i][pRaffle] += 1;
					b2[0] = floatround(mathz[0],floatround_round);
					SCM(i, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "|__________ $ PAYDAY $ __________|");
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Bank: $%d      Paycheck: $%d",PlayerInfo[i][pAccount],PlayerInfo[i][pPayCheck]);
					SCM(i, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Taxes: $%.2f       Interest: $%.2f",mathz[4],mathz[3]);
					SCM(i, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					SCM(i, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, "|-----------------------------------------------|");

					if(PlayerInfo[i][pLevel] >= 5)
					{
						switch(PlayerInfo[i][pLevel])
						{
							case 5 .. 15:  { b2[9] = 250; pb = "Regular"; }
							case 16 .. 30: { b2[9] = 350; pb = "Regular"; }
							case 31 .. 70: { b2[9] = 400; pb = "Hardcore";}
						}
						format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Player Bonus: $%d",pb,b2[9]);
						SCM(i, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					}
					if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[i][pDuty] ==1 )
					{
						switch(PlayerInfo[i][pRank])
						{
					    	case 3: { b2[8] = 2500; }
					    	case 4: { b2[8] = 3000; }
					    	case 5: { b2[8] = 3500; }
					    	case 6: { b2[8] = 4000; }
					    	case 7: { b2[8] = 4500; }
					   	 	case 8: { b2[8] = 5000; }
					    	case 9: { b2[8] = 5500; }
					    	case 10: { b2[8] = 6000; }
					    	case 11: { b2[8] = 6500; }
					    	case 12: { b2[8] = 7000; }
					    	case 13: { b2[8] = 7500; }
					    	case 14: { b2[8] = 8000; }
					    }
						format(string,sizeof(string) , "Goverment Pay For Rank %s: $%d",GetFactionRank(i),b2[8]);
						SCM(i,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,string);
					}
					else if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[i][pDuty] == 1)
					{
					    switch(PlayerInfo[i][pRank])
						{
						    case 1: { b2[8] = 1000; }
							case 2: { b2[8] = 1500; }
					    	case 3: { b2[8] = 2000; }
					    	case 4: { b2[8] = 3000; }
					    	case 5: { b2[8] = 4000; }
					    	case 6: { b2[8] = 5000; }
					    	case 7: { b2[8] = 6000; }
					   	 	case 8: { b2[8] = 1000; }
					    	case 9: { b2[8] = 1500; }
					    	case 10: { b2[8] = 2000; }
					    	case 11: { b2[8] = 5000; }
					    	case 12: { b2[8] = 6000; }
					    	case 13: { b2[8] = 7000; }
					    	case 14: { b2[8] = 8000; }
					    }
      					format(string,sizeof(string), "Goverment Pay For Rank %s: $%d",GetFactionRank(i),b2[8]);
						SCM(i,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,string);
					}
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Final Balance: $%d",b2[0]+b2[8]+b2[9]);
					SCM(i, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					switch(PlayerInfo[i][pVIP])
					{
						case 1:
						{
							format(string, sizeof(string), "VIP: %d Gold Tokens Earned", V1_TOKENS);
							SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
							PlayerInfo[i][pGoldTokens] += V1_TOKENS;
						}
						case 2:
						{
							format(string, sizeof(string), "VIP: %d Gold Tokens Earned", V2_TOKENS);
							SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
							PlayerInfo[i][pGoldTokens] += V2_TOKENS;
						}
						case 3:
						{
							format(string, sizeof(string), "VIP: %d Gold Tokens Earned", V3_TOKENS);
							SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
							PlayerInfo[i][pGoldTokens] += V3_TOKENS;
						}
						case 4:
						{
							format(string, sizeof(string), "VIP: %d Gold Tokens Earned", V4_TOKENS);
							SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
							PlayerInfo[i][pGoldTokens] += V4_TOKENS;
						}
					}
					PlayerInfo[i][pAccount] = b2[0]+b2[8]+b2[9];
					PlayerInfo[i][pPayDayHad] = 0;
					PlayerInfo[i][pPayCheck] = 0;
					if(PlayerInfo[i][pAddiction] >= 10)
					{
						SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "_____ YOU ARE ADDICTED TO DRUGS _____");
						SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must either do more drugs to stay alive, or");
						SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "get some methadone to cure your addiction.");
						PlayerInfo[i][pAddictTime] = 300;
					}
					if(DoubleXP == true)
					{
						PlayerInfo[i][pExp] += 2;
						SCM(i,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"You have gained 2 respect points due to Double XP");
					}
					else if(DoubleXP == false)
					{
						PlayerInfo[i][pExp] += 1;
					}
					SendClientMessage(i,COLOR_LIGHTRED,"You have recieved 1 raffle ticket, winner will be drawn sunday evening");
					SendClientMessage(i,COLOR_LIGHTRED,"Type /rafflehelp for more info");
					OnPlayerUpdateEx(i);
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have not played long enough to collect payday");
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 1;
}


CMD:rafflehelp(playerid,params[])
{
	SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"___________| Raffle Help |___________");
	SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"Each payday you will get one raffle ticket When we do the drawing the person who has the most tickets");
	SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"will have the greatest chance however the drawing is still totally random. Winner gets a $100 usd");
	SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"giftcard to store/website of their choice");
	return 1;
}
public StopMusic()
{
	LogCallback("StopMusic");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
			PlayerPlaySound(i, 1069, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("StopMusic");
}

public PlayerFixRadio2()
{
	LogCallback("PlayerFixRadio2");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
			if(Fixr[i])
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(i, 1069, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				Fixr[i] = 0;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("PlayerFixRadio2");
}

public OnRconLoginAttempt(ip[], password[], success)
{
	LogCallback("OnRconLoginAttempt");
    if(!success)
    {
        new pip[16];
        new string[176];
        for(new i=0; i<MAX_PLAYERS; i++)
        {
            if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
            {
	            GetPlayerIp(i, pip, sizeof(pip));
	            if(!strcmp(ip, pip, true))
	            {
	                new sendername[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
					GetPlayerName(i, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
	                if(LogingAttempts[i] != 3)
	                {
						format(string, sizeof(string),"[PETER]: %s (%d) tried to login at RCON and Failed!",sendername,i);
						SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
						LogingAttempts[i] ++;
						PlayerSuspicious[i] = 1;
				    	PlayerFailedToLogin[i] = 1;
						PlayerGotSpottedRecently[i] = 1;
						SetTimerEx("ResetAcWarn", 300000, 0, "i", i);
					}
					else
					{
					    new d,m,y,h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
		        		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has been Kicked by The Anticheat Peter Griffin for Attempting to Hack into RCON.", sendername, i);
						SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string);
						SCM(i,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You have Been Kicked by The Anticheat For Attempting to hack into RCON");
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Anticheat Has Kicked %s for Attempting to hack into RCON",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
						KickLog(string);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Kicked by the Anticheat - Too many Failed Logins at RCON.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
						AddPunishment(i, string);
						ScriptBan(i, 999, "RCON ATTEMPT");
					}
	            }
			}
        }
    }
	LogCallback("OnRCONLoginAttempt");
    return 1;
}

public OnPlayerText(playerid, text[])
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerText");
	new
		sendername[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],
		giveplayer[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],
		string[156],
		y,m,d,h,mi,s
	;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
	LastTyped[playerid] = 0;
	if(Dead[playerid] == 1)
	{
		SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you are dead");
		return 0;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
	{
		SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
		return 0;
	}
	if(text[0] == '@' && (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] == 1 ))
	{
		format(string, sizeof(string), "[%s] %s: %s",GetAdminRank(playerid),GPN(playerid), text[1]);
		SendAdminMessage(0x00FF00FF, string);

		printf("%s %s: %s",GetAdminRank(playerid), GPN(playerid), text[1]);

		format(cstring,sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s %s: %s",GetAdminRank(playerid),d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), text[1]);
		AdminChatLog(cstring);
	    return 0;
	}

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 0) Text[playerid] ++;
	if(Text[playerid] >= 1)
	{
	    KillTimer(TextTimer[playerid]);
		TextTimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("ResetText",1500,false,"i",playerid);
	}
	if(Text[playerid] == 5) SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"* Slow it down or you will be kicked!");
	if(Text[playerid] == 10)
	{
	    GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You have been Kicked by The Anticheat For Flooding the chat.");
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Anticheat Has Kicked %s for: Flooding the chat.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
		KickLog(string);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Kicked by the Anticheat - Flooding the chat.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
		AddPunishment(playerid, string);
		ServerKick(playerid);
		KillTimer(TextTimer[playerid]);
	}
	if(MarriageCeremoney[playerid] > 0)
	{
	    if ((strcmp("yes", text, true, strlen(text)) == 0) && (strlen(text) == strlen("yes")))
		{
		    if(GotProposedBy[playerid] < 999)
		    {
			    if(IsPlayerConnected(GotProposedBy[playerid]))
				{
					GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
					GetPlayerName(GotProposedBy[playerid], giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "Priest: %s do you take %s as your lovely Wife? (type 'yes', anything else will reject the Marriage).", giveplayer,sendername);
					SCM(GotProposedBy[playerid], COLOR_WHITE, string);
					MarriageCeremoney[GotProposedBy[playerid]] = 1;
					MarriageCeremoney[playerid] = 0;
					GotProposedBy[playerid] = 999;
				    return 1;
			    }
			    else
			    {
			        MarriageCeremoney[playerid] = 0;
			        GotProposedBy[playerid] = 999;
			        return 0;
			    }
			}
			else if(ProposedTo[playerid] < 999)
			{

				{

						OOCNews(COLOR_WHITE, string);

			    }

			        ProposedTo[playerid] = 999;
			        return 0;
			    }
			}
		}

	}
	if(WritingPaper[playerid] > 0)
	{
	    new
			line,
			nstring[128],
			idx,
			length = strlen(text)
		;
		while ((idx < length) && (text[idx] <= ' '))
		{
			idx++;
		}
		new offset = idx;
		new result[64];
		while ((idx < length) && ((idx - offset) < (sizeof(result) - 1)))
		{
			result[idx - offset] = text[idx];
			idx++;
		}
		result[idx - offset] = EOS;
		if(!strlen(result))
		{
		    if(WritingLine[playerid] == 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* Please type in the Title of your Newspaper."); }
		    else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "* Please type in a Text Line of your Newspaper."); }
			return 0;
		}
		format(nstring, sizeof(nstring), "%s", text);
		switch(WritingLine[playerid])
		{
		    case 1:
		    {
		        new fstring[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
		        GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
				format(fstring, sizeof(fstring), "%s", sendername);
				strmid(PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperMaker], fstring, 0, strlen(fstring), 255);
		        strmid(PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperTitle], nstring, 0, strlen(nstring), 255);
		        line = 0; WritingLine[playerid] = 2; SavePaper(WritingPaperNumber[playerid], 2);
				SavePaper(WritingPaperNumber[playerid], 3);
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "* Now you can write down the News Lines, 7 remaining.");
		    }
		    case 2:
		    {
		        strmid(PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperText1], nstring, 0, strlen(nstring), 255);
		        line = 1; WritingLine[playerid] = 3; SavePaper(WritingPaperNumber[playerid], 4);
		    }
		    case 3:
		    {
		        strmid(PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperText2], nstring, 0, strlen(nstring), 255);
		        line = 2; WritingLine[playerid] = 4; SavePaper(WritingPaperNumber[playerid], 5);
		    }
		    case 4:
		    {
		        strmid(PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperText3], nstring, 0, strlen(nstring), 255);
		        line = 3; WritingLine[playerid] = 5; SavePaper(WritingPaperNumber[playerid], 6);
		    }
		    case 5:
		    {
		        strmid(PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperText4], nstring, 0, strlen(nstring), 255);
		        line = 4; WritingLine[playerid] = 6; SavePaper(WritingPaperNumber[playerid], 7);
		    }
		    case 6:
		    {
		        strmid(PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperText5], nstring, 0, strlen(nstring), 255);
		        line = 5; WritingLine[playerid] = 7; SavePaper(WritingPaperNumber[playerid], 8);
		    }
		    case 7:
		    {
		        strmid(PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperText6], nstring, 0, strlen(nstring), 255);
		        line = 6; WritingLine[playerid] = 8; SavePaper(WritingPaperNumber[playerid], 9);
		    }
		    case 8:
		    {
		        strmid(PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperText7], nstring, 0, strlen(nstring), 255);
		        PaperInfo[WritingPaperNumber[playerid]][PaperUsed] = 1; SavePaper(WritingPaperNumber[playerid], 10);
		        line = 7; WritingLine[playerid] = 0; WritingPaper[playerid] = 0; WritingPaperNumber[playerid] = 999;
		    }
		}
		if(line > 0)
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* You wrote Line %d of the Newspaper.", line);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			if(line == 7)
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "* Your Newspaper has been added to the News List (for Paper Boys).");
			}
		}
	    return 0;
	}
