					    	format(string, sizeof(string), "Admin Says: %s", text);
					    	SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, COLOR_NICERED, 10.0, 8000);
					    	ProxDetector(10.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
							format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (Admin): %s",d1,m1,y1,h1,mi1,s1, GPN(playerid), text);
							ChatLog(cstring);
						}
						else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
						{
							format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger [%s accent]: %s",PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccent],text);
							SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, COLOR_WHITE, 10.0, 8000);
							foreach(Player,i)
							{
							    if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == GetPlayerVehicleID(i))
							    {
							        SCM(playerid,-1,string);
							    }
							}
							format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (Masked Windows Shut): %s",d1,m1,y1,h1,mi1,s1, GPN(playerid), text);
							ChatLog(cstring);
						}
						else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 0)
						{
			    			format(string, sizeof(string), "%s [%s accent]: %s",GPN(playerid),PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccent],text);
			    			SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, COLOR_WHITE, 10.0, 8000);
			    			ProxDetector(10.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
							format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (Windows Shut): %s",d1,m1,y1,h1,mi1,s1, GPN(playerid), text);
							ChatLog(cstring);
						}
					}
					else
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 1)
						{
					    	format(string, sizeof(string), "Admin Says: %s", text);
					    	SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, COLOR_NICERED, 20.0, 8000);
					    	ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
							format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (Admin Windows Open): %s",d1,m1,y1,h1,mi1,s1, GPN(playerid), text);
							ChatLog(cstring);
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
						{
							format(string, sizeof(string), "Stranger [%s accent]: %s",PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccent],text);
							SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, COLOR_WHITE, 20.0, 8000);
							ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
							format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (Masked Windows Open): %s",d1,m1,y1,h1,mi1,s1, GPN(playerid), text);
							ChatLog(cstring);
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 0)
						{
			    			format(string, sizeof(string), "%s [%s accent]: %s",GPN(playerid),PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccent],text);
			    			SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, COLOR_WHITE, 20.0, 8000);
			    			ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
							format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (Windows Open): %s",d1,m1,y1,h1,mi1,s1, GPN(playerid), text);
							ChatLog(cstring);
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		return 0;
	}
	else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pChatMode] == 1) // By CuervO_NegrO
	{
	    if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
	    {
	        return 0;
      	}
      	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
			return 0;
		}
		if(noooc == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, OOC is turned off");
			return 0;
		}
		GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		new y1,m1,d1;
		new h1,mi1,s1;
		getdate(y1,m1,d1);
		gettime(h1,mi1,s1);
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 0)
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "(( %s ))", text);
		}
		else
		{
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "[[ %s ]]", text);
		}
   		SendPlayerMessageToAll(playerid, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (OOC): %s",d1,m1,y1,h1,mi1,s1, sendername, text);
		PublicLog(string);
		return 0;
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerText");
	return 0;
}
public AddsOn()
{
	LogCallback("AddsOn");
	adds=1;
	LogCallback("AdsOn");
	return 1;
}
public StopTalkinga(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("StopTalkinga");
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, "CARRY", "crry_prtial", 2.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
	KillTimer(TalkTime[playerid]);
	LogCallback("StopTalkinga");
	return 1;
}
TalkingAni(playerid, text[])
{
	LogCallback("TalkingAni");
    if(GetPlayerAnimationIndex(playerid))
    {
        new animlib[32];
        new animname[32];
        GetAnimationName(GetPlayerAnimationIndex(playerid),animlib,32,animname,32);
        if(strcmp(animname,"IDLE_STANCE",true) == 0)
        {
			if(GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) == SPECIAL_ACTION_NONE)
			{
                if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) //CHECKS TO SEE IF IN VEHICLE
                {
					switch(talkstyle[playerid])
					{
						case 1: { ApplyAnimation(playerid,"MISC", "Idle_Chat_02" ,4.0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1);   }
						case 2: { ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GANGS", "PRTIAL_GNGTLKA",4.0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1); }
						case 3: { ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GANGS", "PRTIAL_GNGTLKB",4.0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1); }
						case 4: { ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GANGS", "PRTIAL_GNGTLKC",4.0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1); }
						case 5: { ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GANGS", "PRTIAL_GNGTLKD",4.0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1); }
 	 					case 6:	{ ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GANGS", "PRTIAL_GNGTLKE",4.0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1); }
						case 7: { ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GANGS", "PRTIAL_GNGTLKF",4.0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1); }
						case 8: { ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GANGS", "PRTIAL_GNGTLKG",4.0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1); }
						case 9: { ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GANGS", "PRTIAL_GNGTLKH",4.0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1); }
						default:{ return 1; }
					}
					TalkTime[playerid] = SetTimerEx("StopTalkinga", strlen(text)*200, 0, "i", playerid);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("TalkingAni");
	return 1;
}

public BackupClear(playerid, calledbytimer)
{
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(IsACop(playerid))
		{
			if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pRequestingBackup] == 1)
			{
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
					{
					    if(PlayerInfo[i][pDuty] == 1)
					    {
							if(IsACop(i))
							{
								SetPlayerMarkerForPlayer(i, playerid, TEAM_HIT_COLOR);
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if(calledbytimer != 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, TEAM_BLUE_COLOR, "Your backup request has been cleared.");
				}
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pRequestingBackup] = 0;
				SetPlayerToTeamColor(playerid);
				
			}
			else
			{
				if (calledbytimer != 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_DNICERED, "You don't have an active backup request!");
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if (calledbytimer != 1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not a cop!");
			}
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerKeyStateChange(playerid, newkeys, oldkeys)
{
	LogCallback("OnPlayerKeyStateChange");
    new
		string[128],
		sendername[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],
		gun1 = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid),
		gunname1[24]
	;

	GetWeaponName(gun1,gunname1,sizeof(gunname1));
	if(newkeys == KEY_FIRE)
	{
	    if(GarbageMan[playerid] > 0)
	    {
	        if(hasTrash[playerid])
	        {
				if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) != GarbageTruck[playerid]) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not even near your truck.");
				GarbageMan[playerid] += 1;
				ClearAnimations(playerid);
				OnePlayAnim(playerid,"GRENADE","WEAPON_throwu",4.0,0,0,0,0,0);
	            RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,4);
				format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "%s tosses a bag of trash into the back of the garbage truck", GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, tstring, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				hasTrash[playerid] = false;
				if(GarbageMan[playerid] > 6)
				{
                	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Head back to the yard and empty the truck!");
					workingID[playerid] = JOB_FINISH_GARBAGE;
					workCP[playerid] = CreateDynamicCP(2199.1702,-2018.7848,13.5469,1.5,-1,-1,playerid,9999999999999.0);

				}
				else
				{
					start:
					new b = RandomEx(1,53);
					if(BizzInfo[b][bSetted] == 0)
					{
					    goto start;
					}
					workingID[playerid] = JOB_STARTED_GARBAGE;
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
					printf("%d",b);
					workCP[playerid] = CreateDynamicCP(BizzInfo[b][bEntranceX],BizzInfo[b][bEntranceY],BizzInfo[b][bEntranceZ],1.5,-1,-1,playerid,999999999.0);
				}

	        }
	    }

	}
	if(newkeys & 16 && VehicleInt[playerid][0] > 0)
	{
		new Float:jrPos[4];
		GetVehiclePos(VehicleInt[playerid][0],jrPos[0],jrPos[1],jrPos[2]);
		GetVehicleZAngle(VehicleInt[playerid][0],jrPos[3]);
		jrPos[0]+=(5*floatsin(-floatsub(jrPos[3],45.0),degrees)),
		jrPos[1]+=(5*floatcos(-floatsub(jrPos[3],45.0),degrees));
		SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
		SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,0);
		SetPlayerPos(playerid,jrPos[0],jrPos[1],floatsub(jrPos[2],0.94));
		SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,jrPos[3]);
		SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
		VehicleInt[playerid][0] = 0;
		if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming") == 1)
		{
			StopAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid);
		}
	}
	if(newkeys & 16 && VehicleInt[playerid][1] > 0)
	{
		new Float:ShPOS[4];
		GetVehiclePos(VehicleInt[playerid][1],ShPOS[0],ShPOS[1],ShPOS[2]);
		GetVehicleZAngle(VehicleInt[playerid][1],ShPOS[3]);
		ShPOS[0]+=(5*floatsin(-floatsub(ShPOS[3],45.0),degrees)),
		ShPOS[1]+=(5*floatcos(-floatsub(ShPOS[3],45.0),degrees));
		SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
		SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,0);
		SetPlayerPos(playerid,ShPOS[0],ShPOS[1],floatsub(ShPOS[2],0.94));
		SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,ShPOS[3]);
		SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
		VehicleInt[playerid][1] = 0;
		if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming") == 1)
		{
			StopAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid);
		}
	}

	if(ChoosingSkin[playerid] == 1)
	{
		if(PRESSED(KEY_HANDBRAKE))
		{
			BWSelectSkin(playerid, GetPlayerSkin(playerid));
		}
		else if(PRESSED(KEY_FIRE))
		{
			FWSelectSkin(playerid, GetPlayerSkin(playerid));
		}
		else if(PRESSED(KEY_SPRINT))
		{
			ChoosingSkin[playerid] = 0;
			SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, SkinSelectTD[playerid]);
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 250);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel] = GetPlayerSkin(playerid);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pChar] = GetPlayerSkin(playerid);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = BizzInfo[BizzEntered[playerid]][bInteriorNr];
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,BizzInfo[BizzEntered[playerid]][bVirWorld]);
			SetPlayerInterior(playerid,BizzInfo[BizzEntered[playerid]][bInterior]);
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid,BizzInfo[BizzEntered[playerid]][bExitX],BizzInfo[BizzEntered[playerid]][bExitY],BizzInfo[BizzEntered[playerid]][bExitZ]);
		}
		return 1;
	}
  if ( PRESSED(KEY_NO) )
    {
    	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6) // NEW LSPD DOORS
	    {
  				if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15,1589.053344,-1638.123168,14.122960))
			{
	  			if(lspdg == 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Gate is Already Opened"); return 1; }
	   			MoveDynamicObject(pdgate1,1599.053344,-1638.123168,14.122960, 0.8);
		      	SetTimer("GateClose", 12000, 0);
		     	SCM(playerid, COLOR_BLUE,"A garage is opened and will close in 7 seconds.");
		     	GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		   		format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes his/her remote and opens a garage.", sendername);
		   		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		   		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1589.053344,-1638.123168,14.122960);
		     	lspdg = 1;
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15,1545.3225,-1627.8137,14.7720))
			{
				if(lspdg2 == 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Gate is Already Opened"); return 1; }
		  		MoveDynamicObject(pdgate2,1545.3225,-1635.4897,14.7720, 0.8);
		      	SetTimer("GateClose5", 12000, 0);
		     	SCM(playerid, COLOR_BLUE,"A garage is opened and will close in 7 seconds.");
				GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		   		format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes his/her remote and opens a garage.", sendername);
		   		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		   		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1545.3225,-1627.8137,14.7720);
		     	lspdg2 = 1;
			}
				return 1;
		}
}
	if(newkeys & KEY_JUMP && !(oldkeys & KEY_JUMP) && GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) == SPECIAL_ACTION_CUFFED) ApplyAnimation(playerid, "GYMNASIUM", "gym_jog_falloff",4.1,0,1,1,0,0);

	if(IsKeyJustDown(KEY_HANDBRAKE,newkeys,oldkeys))
	{
		if(Dead[playerid] != -1) return 1;
		if(HasBox[playerid] == 1) return 1;
		if(HasHarvest[playerid] == 1) return 1;
	    StopLoopingAnim(playerid);
        TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,txtAnimHelper);
        animation[playerid] = 0;
    }

    else if (PRESSED(KEY_SPRINT))
    {
		if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
		{
		    if(IsWanking[playerid] == 1)
	        {
	            if(JustWanked[playerid] == 0)
	            {
	                JustWanked[playerid] = 1;
	                ApplyAnimation(playerid,"PAULNMAC","wank_loop",4.1,0,1,1,1,0);
	                TimesWanked[playerid] ++;
	                SetTimerEx("ResetWank",2000,0,"i",playerid);
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You 'touched your tralalalala' recently, please wait a few seconds!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, 1490.3195,1305.6976,1093.2964))
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Type /buyflying or /buysailing to either buy a flying or sailing license.");
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, 349.5560,161.6693,1019.9912))
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Type /healme to cure yourself");
			}
			else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, 358.2374,161.3243,1008.3828))
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Type /taketest to take the passport test. You need one to get licenses!");
			}
			else if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 1 && IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2,383.4235,-2088.2471,7.8359))
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You need a fishing license to Fish. Type /buyfishing if you wish to buy one ($5000)");
			}
  			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1,1834.2576,-1679.5989,1997.6094))
			{
			   SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Weapon License: /buygunlic to buy. It will cost $25,000");
			}
			else if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 1 && IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2,1869.7689,-1688.2777,1997.6094))
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pLeader] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 1)
			    {
			        GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~g~Police Department elevator~n~~w~Type ~r~/pdup ~w~to go up~n~Type ~r~/pddown ~w~to go down", 5000, 3);
			    }
			    else
			    {
			        GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~r~Staff only!", 5000, 3);
			    }
			}
			else if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 1 && IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,25.1811,1968.5167,17.6406))
			{
			    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Welcome,~n~~w~You can fly to ~r~Los Santos. ~n~~w~Type ~y~/flyls ~w~if you wish to Take this Plane. ~g~$250", 5000, 3);
			}
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------





			//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
			//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		}
	}
	else if(PRESSED(KEY_SECONDARY_ATTACK))
	{

		if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	    {
			if(Fell[playerid] != -1)
			{
				ClearAnimations(playerid);
			    ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK", "crckdeth2", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
			    return 1;
			}
	        else if(GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) == 20)
			{
				PlayerDrankBeer[playerid] = 0;
			}
	        else if(GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) == 22)
			{
				PlayerDrankWine[playerid] = 0;
			}
	        else if(GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) == 23)
			{
				PlayerDrankSprunk[playerid] = 0;
			}
	        else if(GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid) == 21)
			{
				PlayerSmokedCig[playerid] = 0;
				IsSmoking[playerid] = 0;
	            GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
	            if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a cigarette from their mouth and drops it on the ground.", sendername); }
	            else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a cigarette from her mouth and drops it on the ground.", sendername); }
	            ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	            if(UsingSmokeAnim[playerid] == 1)
	            {
	                SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	            }
			}
		}
	    if(IsAtCandySprunk(playerid))
        {
			new Float:health;
            GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
            if(health >= 51)
            {
				new Float:Health;
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, Health);
				if(health > 80)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, (Health - 15.0));
				}
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -5);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You paid 5$ to the Machine");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "* You can't use the vending machine at this time");
			}
		}
		//----APT 1----
		else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 1422.1699,-1178.9976,25.9922)) //ENTER APARTMENTS
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = 18;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = 1;
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1726.8639,-1639.0690,20.2235);
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,18);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 1);
			SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, 0);
		}
		else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 1726.8639,-1639.0690,20.2235) && PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] == 1) // EXIT APARTMENTS
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = 0;
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1422.1699,-1178.9976,25.9922);
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, 0);
		}
		//----APT 2----
		else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 1472.0647,-1265.1113,14.5625)) //ENTER APARTMENTS
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = 18;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = 2;
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1726.8639,-1639.0690,20.2235);
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,18);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 2);
			SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, 0);
		}
		else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1, 1726.8639,-1639.0690,20.2235) && PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] == 2) // EXIT APARTMENTS
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = 0;
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1472.0647,-1265.1113,14.5625);
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);

	{

			{
				if(BunnyJump[playerid] == 0)
				{
					BunnyJump[playerid] = 1;
					ResetJumpTimer = SetTimerEx("ResetJump1",2000,0,"i",playerid);
				}
				else if(BunnyJump[playerid] == 1)
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] >= 1) return 1;
					if(PlayerGotSpottedRecently[playerid] == 0)
					{
						PlayerSuspicious[playerid] = 1;
						PlayerBunnyJumping[playerid] = 1;
						PlayerGotSpottedRecently[playerid] = 1;
						format(string, 128, "[PETER]: %s (%d) is possibly bunny jumping, Go check him!!", sendername, playerid);
						SendAdminMessage(COLOR_YELLOW, string);
						SetTimerEx("ResetAcWarn", 600000, 0, "i", playerid);
					}
					PlayerBunnyJumped[playerid] ++;
					KillTimer(ResetJumpTimer);
					ResetJumpTimer = SetTimerEx("ResetJump1",2000,0,"i",playerid);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has been Found Bunny jumping.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
					AdminLog(string);
					return 1;
				}
			}
		}
	}
		if(PRESSED(KEY_LOOK_BEHIND))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
	    {
			if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1567.2563,-1670.1110,10001.0859))//Right PD Main Keypad
			{
			    if(rlobbydoors == 0)
			    {

			    	MoveDynamicObject(rlobbydoor,1570.5449, -1670.5728, 10000.0596,2.5);
			    	rlobbydoors = 1;
			    	SCM(playerid,COLOR_BLUE,"The LSPD lobby door is open, please close it!");
			    	return 1;
			    }
				if(rlobbydoors == 1)
				{
				    MoveDynamicObject(rlobbydoor,1569.0649, -1670.5728, 10000.0596,2.5);
				    rlobbydoors = 0;
				    SCM(playerid,COLOR_BLUE,"The LSPD lobby door has been closed, thank you!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1553.7325,-1671.0472,10001.0859))// Left PD Main Keypad
			{
		 		if(llobbydoors == 0)
	 			{
		    	 	MoveDynamicObject(llobbydoor,1550.3789, -1670.5685, 10000.0596,2.5);
	   			    llobbydoors = 1;
		            SCM(playerid,COLOR_BLUE,"The LSPD lobby door is open, please close it!");
		            return 1;
			    }
				if(llobbydoors == 1)
				{
					MoveDynamicObject(llobbydoor,1551.8589, -1670.5685, 10000.0596,2.5);
					llobbydoors = 0;
		 			SCM(playerid,COLOR_BLUE,"The LSPD lobby door has been closed, thank you!");
		 			return 1;
				}
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1573.7988,-1651.4324,10001.0859))// Main Cell Door Keypad
			{
	  			if(maincelldoors == 0)
			    {
					MoveDynamicObject(maincelldoor,1576.3909, -1651.8865, 10001.3398 ,1);
					maincelldoors = 1;
					return 1;
				}
				if(maincelldoors == 1)
				{
				    MoveDynamicObject(maincelldoor,1574.9009, -1651.8865, 10001.3398 ,1);
				    maincelldoors = 0;
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1575.9823,-1652.6193,10001.0859))// Cell Door 1 Keypad
			{
			    if(pdcelldoor1s == 0)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor1,1576.4500, -1651.7900, 10001.3398,1);
			        pdcelldoor1s = 1;
			        return 1;
			    }
			    if(pdcelldoor1s == 1)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor1,1576.4500, -1653.2900, 10001.3398 ,1);
					pdcelldoor1s = 0;
					return 1;
			    }
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1575.9829,-1655.5785,10001.0859))// Cell Door 2 Keypad
			{
			    if(pdcelldoor2s == 0)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor2,1576.4500, -1655.0800, 10001.3398,1);
			        pdcelldoor2s = 1;
			        return 1;
			    }
			    if(pdcelldoor2s == 1)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor2,1576.4500, -1656.5800, 10001.3398 ,1);
					pdcelldoor2s = 0;
					return 1;
			    }
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1575.9825,-1658.8754,10001.0859))// Cell Door 3 Keypad
			{
			    if(pdcelldoor3s == 0)
			    {
				        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor3,1576.4500, -1658.2800, 10001.3398,1);
				        pdcelldoor3s = 1;
				        return 1;
			    }
			    if(pdcelldoor3s == 1)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor3,1576.4500, -1659.7800, 10001.3398 ,1);
					pdcelldoor3s = 0;
					return 1;
			    }
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1575.9832,-1662.1348,10001.0859))// Cell Door 4 Keypad
			{
			    if(pdcelldoor4s == 0)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor4,1576.4500, -1661.6100, 10001.3398,1);
			        pdcelldoor4s = 1;
			        return 1;
			    }
			    if(pdcelldoor4s == 1)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor4,1576.4500, -1663.1300, 10001.3398,1);
					pdcelldoor4s = 0;
					return 1;
			    }
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1575.9805,-1665.5200,10001.0859))// Cell Door 5 keypad
			{
			    if(pdcelldoor5s == 0)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor5,1576.4500, -1664.8600, 10001.3398,1);
			        pdcelldoor5s = 1;
			        return 1;
			    }
			    if(pdcelldoor5s == 1)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(pdcelldoor5,1576.4500, -1666.3000, 10001.3398 ,1);
					pdcelldoor5s = 0;
					return 1;
			    }
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1561.5776,-1657.4856,10001.0859))//Locker Room Keypad
			{
			    if(lockerdoors == 0)
			    {
			        MoveDynamicObject(lockerdoor,1558.2500, -1657.9600, 10000.0596,1);
			        lockerdoors =1;
			        return 1;
			    }
			    if(lockerdoors == 1)
				{
				    MoveDynamicObject(lockerdoor,1559.7300, -1657.9600, 10000.0596,1);
				    lockerdoors = 0;
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,1424.3260,-1682.1427,10001.0859))// Evidence Room
			{
			    if(evidences == 0)
			    {
	                MoveDynamicObject(evidence,1423.2900, -1682.6200, 10000.0596,1);
			        evidences = 1;
			        return 1;
			    }
			    if(evidences == 1)
				{
				    MoveDynamicObject(evidence,1424.7800, -1682.6200, 10000.0596,1);
				    evidences = 0;
				    return 1;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("OnPlayerKeyStateChange");
    return 1;
}
public UnsetFirstSpawn(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("UnsetFirstSpawn");
	FirstSpawn[playerid] = 0;
	SetPlayerAmmo(playerid,11,0);
	SetPlayerAmmo(playerid,46,0);
	LogCallback("UnsetFirstSpawn");
}
public ResetJump1(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ResetJump1");
	BunnyJump[playerid] = 0;
	LogCallback("ResetJump1");
	return 1;
}
public UsingPurpleDildo(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("UsingPurpleDildo");
	new Float:Health;
	GetPlayerHealth(playerid, Health);
	if(Health > 70) SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
	else SetPlayerHealth(playerid, Health+30);
	UsedDildo[playerid] = 1;
    TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~p~Oh Yee~h~aaaa~h~ahhhh",6000,5);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Got the Orgasm and Took the Dildo back to your Bag");
	DildoTimerReset = SetTimerEx("ResetDildo",600000,false, "i",playerid);
	LogCallback("UsingPurpleDildo");
	return 1;
}

public RobBank(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("RobBank");
	new string[128];
	if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, 2309.6060,-4.0211,26.7422))
	{
		if(RobbingTime[playerid] > 0)
		{
		    RobbingTime[playerid] --;
		    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Remain in the ~r~Pickup ~w~until the time ends!", 1000,4);
		}
		else
		{
		    RobbingTime[playerid] = 0;
		    KillTimer(RobBankTimer[playerid]);
			new money = random(2500);
		    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, money);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"~w~You Robbed ~g~$%d ~w~From the ~y~Bank!", money);
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, string, 6000, 4);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"* You robbed $%d From the Bank!",money);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, string);
		}
	}
	else
	{
        GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~You Left The Checkpoint!", 1000,4);
        RobbingTime[playerid] = 0;
 		KillTimer(RobBankTimer[playerid]);
	}
	LogCallback("RobBank");
}

stock ChangeWeather()
{
	LogCallback("ChangeWeather");
	weather2 = random(17);
	if(weather2 == 1)
	{
	    SetWeather(1);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Sunny Now, Perfect to swim!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 2)
	{
	    SetWeather(2);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be a Heatwave Now, Perfect to stay at home!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 3)
	{
	    SetWeather(3);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Sunny Now, Perfect to Drive!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 4)
	{
	    SetWeather(4);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Foggy with Heat, land at your nearest airport!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 5)
	{
	    SetWeather(5);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be a Heat Wave Now, do not use much clothes!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 6)
	{
	    SetWeather(6);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be a Heat Wave Now, do not use much clothes!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 7)
	{
	    SetWeather(7);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Cloudy Now, watch out for rain!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 8)
	{
	    SetWeather(9);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Foggy Now, land at your nearest airport!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 9)
	{
	    SetWeather(10);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Sunny Now, But watch out for rain!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 10)
	{
	    SetWeather(11);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Sunny Now, Perfect to ride a bicycle!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 11)
	{
	    SetWeather(12);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Cloudy Now, do not leave without your umbrella!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 12)
	{
	    SetWeather(13);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Sunny now, perfect to fly!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 13)
	{
	    SetWeather(14);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Sunny Now, Perfect to walk!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 14)
	{
	    SetWeather(15);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Cloudy now, Watch out!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 15)
	{
	    SetWeather(17);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Sunny with some heat, do not take many clothes!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 16)
	{
	    SetWeather(18);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Sunny with some heat, do not take many clothes!");
	}
	else if(weather2 == 17)
	{
	    SetWeather(20);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA,"[Weather News]: It's Gonna be Heavly Cloudy, Be careful and take your umbrella!");
	}
	LogCallback("ChangeWeather");
	return 1;
}

public SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z)
{
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerPos");
	SetPlayerPos(playerid, x,y,z);
	Streamer_UpdateEx(playerid,x,y,z);
	LogCallback("SafeSetPlayerPos");
	return 1;
}

public GreenMoney(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("GreenMoney");
	if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF00EE);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 2;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 2)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF00DD);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 3;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 3)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF00CC);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 4;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 4)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF00BB);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 5;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 5)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF00AA);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 6;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 6)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF0099);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 7;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 7)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF0088);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 8;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 8)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF0077);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 9;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 9)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF0066);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 10;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 10)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF0055);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 11;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 11)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF0044);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 12;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 12)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0x00FF0033);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 13;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 13)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid], 0xFFFFFFFF);
	}
	LogCallback("GreenMoney");
}

public RedMoney(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("RedMoney");
	if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF0000EE);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 2;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 2)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF0000DD);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 3;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 3)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF0000CC);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 4;
	}
	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 4)
	{
	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF0000BB);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 5;

	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 5)

	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF0000AA);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 6;

	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 6)

	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid,Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF000099);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);

	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);

	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);

	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF000066);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);

	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 10)

	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF000055);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 11;

	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 11)

	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF000044);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);

	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid],0xFF000033);
	    TextDrawShowForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    ReceivedMoney[playerid] = 13;

	else if(ReceivedMoney[playerid] == 13)

	    TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, Moneychangetd[playerid]);
	    TextDrawColor(Moneychangetd[playerid], 0xFFFFFFFF);
	}
	LogCallback("RedMoney");
}

public OnEnterExitModShop(playerid, enterexit, interiorid)
{
	LogCallback("OnEnterExitModShop");
    if(enterexit == 0)
    {
		if(UnMod[playerid] == 1)
		{
			new nos = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),CARMODTYPE_NITRO);
			switch(nos)
			{
				case 1008 .. 1010: { RemoveVehicleComponent(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), nos); }
			}
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have been charged $5,000 dollars for modding your vehicle");
		    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -5000);
		}
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "If you want to save your modifications type /vpark");
        UnMod[playerid] = 0;
    }
    else if(enterexit == 1)
    {
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "NITROUS WILL NOT SAVE! WHEN YOU LEAVE IT WILL BE REMOVED INSTANTLY!!");
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Modifications cost $5,000. Exit now if you don't want to be charged!");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Do not Change your Paintjob, It will get erased and won't save!!!");
        UnMod[playerid] = 0;
    }
    LogCallback("OnEnterExitModShop");
    return 1;
}

public Unfreezeply(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("Unfreezeply");
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	LogCallback("Unfreezeply");
}

public CanCuffUntil(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("CanCuffUntil");
	GaveUp[playerid] = 0;
	LogCallback("CanCuffUntil");
}

public ResetUpgradeUse(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ResetUpgradeUse");
	CanChangeName[playerid] = 0;
	CanUseUpgrade[playerid] = 0;
	CanSellHouse[playerid] = 0;
	CanSellBizz[playerid] = 0;
	LogCallback("ResetUpgradeUse");
}

public CountDown()
{
	LogCallback("CountDown");
	CountdownSeconds --;
	if(CountdownSeconds == -1)
	{
	    KillTimer(CountdownTimer);
	    TextDrawHideForAll(CountdownTD);
	    CountdownRunning = 0;
	}
	else
	{
	    if(CountdownSeconds == 0)
	    {
	        TextDrawSetString(CountdownTD, "~p~Countdown: ~y~GO!");
		}
        else if(CountdownSeconds == 1)
	    {
	        TextDrawSetString(CountdownTD, "~p~Countdown: ~g~1!");
		}
		else if(CountdownSeconds == 2)
	    {
	        TextDrawSetString(CountdownTD, "~p~Countdown: ~b~2!");
		}
		else if(CountdownSeconds == 3)
	    {
	        TextDrawSetString(CountdownTD, "~p~Countdown: ~r~3!");
		}
		else
		{
		    new string[24];
		    format(string, sizeof(string),"~p~Countdown: ~w~%d",CountdownSeconds);
		    TextDrawSetString(CountdownTD, string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("CountDown");
	return 1;
}

public ResetText(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ResetText");
	Text[playerid] = 0;
	LogCallback("ResetText");
	return 1;
}

/**
 * MySQL Related Functions
 */

public ConnectMySQL() {
	LogCallback("ConnectMySQL");
    //mysql_connect("DB_HOST","DB_USER","DB_PASS","DB_"); //LIVE SCRIPT
    //mysql_connect("localhost","root","cgrp","cgrprrrrrrrr2");//TEST SCRIPT
    //mysql_connect("localhost","root","12547_russell","testing");//Carl Test Script
	if(mysql_ping()==1) {
		printf("[MySQL]: Connected successfully to database '%s'", DB_DATABASE);
	} else {
		printf("[MySQL]: Connection failed to database '%s'", DB_DATABASE);
	}
	LogCallback("ConnectMySQL");
	return 1;
}

public OnPlayerEditDynamicObject(playerid, objectid, response, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z, Float:rx, Float:ry, Float:rz)
{
	if(editingSign[playerid] != -1)
	{
		new Float:oldX, Float:oldY, Float:oldZ,
		Float:oldRotX, Float:oldRotY, Float:oldRotZ;
		GetDynamicObjectPos(objectid, oldX, oldY, oldZ);
		GetDynamicObjectRot(objectid, oldRotX, oldRotY, oldRotZ);
	    MoveDynamicObject(objectid, x, y, z, 10.0, rx, ry, rz);
		if(response == EDIT_RESPONSE_FINAL)
		{
			new sql[512];
			hInfo[editingSign[playerid]][hsignPos][0] = x;
			hInfo[editingSign[playerid]][hsignPos][1] = y;
			hInfo[editingSign[playerid]][hsignPos][2] = z;
			hInfo[editingSign[playerid]][hsignPos][3] = rx;
			hInfo[editingSign[playerid]][hsignPos][4] = ry;
			hInfo[editingSign[playerid]][hsignPos][5] = rz;
			//format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UDPATE `samp_housez` SET `signX`='%f',`signY`='%f',`signZ`='%f',`signRX`='%f',`signRY`='%f',`signRZ`='%f' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",x,y,z,rx,ry,rz,editingSign[playerid]);
			format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `signX`='%f',`signY`='%f',`signZ`='%f',`signRX`='%f',`signRY`='%f',`signRZ`='%f' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",x,y,z,rx,ry,rz,editingSign[playerid]);
			mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,editingSign[playerid]);
			editingSign[playerid] = -1;
		}

	}
	else if(editingFurniture[playerid] == true)
	{
		new Float:oldX, Float:oldY, Float:oldZ,
		Float:oldRotX, Float:oldRotY, Float:oldRotZ;
		GetDynamicObjectPos(objectid, oldX, oldY, oldZ);
		GetDynamicObjectRot(objectid, oldRotX, oldRotY, oldRotZ);
	    MoveDynamicObject(objectid, x, y, z, 10.0, rx, ry, rz);
	    if(response == EDIT_RESPONSE_FINAL || response == EDIT_RESPONSE_CANCEL)
	    {
			new hid = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey],sql[256];
			if(hid < 0 || hid >= MAX_HOUSES) return 0;
			if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) != hid || HouseEntered[playerid] != hid || GetPlayerInterior(playerid) == 0) return 0;
			new slot = editingFslot[playerid];
			furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][0] = x;
			furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][1] = y;
			furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][2] = z;
			furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][3] = rx;
			furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][4] = ry;
			furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][5] = rz;
			format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_furn` SET `posX`='%f',`posY`='%f',`posZ`='%f',`posRX`='%f',`posRY`='%f',`posRZ`='%f' WHERE `house`='%d' AND `slot`='%d'",x,y,z,rx,ry,rz,hid,slot);
			mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEFURN,hid);
			
			
			
	    
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

public OnQueryFinish(query[], resultid, extraid, connectionHandle)
{
	LogCallback("OnQueryFinish");
	switch(resultid)
	{
		case THREAD_SAVEFURN: { new string[200]; format(string, sizeof(string), "House: %d |Saved| FURNITURE", extraid);   /*MySQLSaveLog(string);*/ }

		case THREAD_LOADFURN:
		{
		    mysql_store_result();
		    new result[128],hid,slot,interior;

			while(mysql_retrieve_row())
		    {
		        mysql_get_field("house",result);
		        hid = strval(result);

		        mysql_get_field("slot",result);
				slot = strval(result);

				mysql_get_field("used",result);
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fUsed] = strval(result);

				mysql_get_field("model",result);
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fModel] = strval(result);

				mysql_get_field("int",result);
				interior = strval(result);
				
				mysql_get_field("posX",result);
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][0] = floatstr(result);
				
				mysql_get_field("posY",result);
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][1] = floatstr(result);
				
				mysql_get_field("posZ",result);
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][2] = floatstr(result);
				
				mysql_get_field("posRX",result);
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][3] = floatstr(result);
				
				mysql_get_field("posRY",result);
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][4] = floatstr(result);
				
				mysql_get_field("posRZ",result);
				furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][5] = floatstr(result);
				
				if(furnInfo[hid][slot][fUsed] == 1)
				{
                	furnInfo[hid][slot][fObjectID] = CreateDynamicObject(furnInfo[hid][slot][fModel],furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][0],furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][1],furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][2],furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][3],furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][4],furnInfo[hid][slot][fPos][5],hid,interior,-1,80.0);
				}
		    }
		    mysql_free_result();
		}
		case THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ: { new string[200]; format(string, sizeof(string), "House: %d |Saved| Threaded", extraid);   /*MySQLSaveLog(string);*/ }
		case THREAD_LOADHOUSEZ:
		{
		    mysql_store_result();
		    new i,result[256];
		    while(mysql_retrieve_row())
		    {
		        mysql_get_field("houseID",result);
				i = strval(result);

				
		        mysql_get_field("used",result);
		        hInfo[i][hUsed] = strval(result);


				mysql_get_field("price",result);
		        hInfo[i][hPrice] = strval(result);

                
		        mysql_get_field("level",result);
		        hInfo[i][hLevel] = strval(result);
		      
		        mysql_get_field("entVW",result);
		        hInfo[i][hEnterVw] = strval(result);
		       

		        mysql_get_field("entINT",result);
		        hInfo[i][hEnterInt] = strval(result);
		       

		        mysql_get_field("entX",result);
		        hInfo[i][hEnter][0] = floatstr(result);
		       

		        mysql_get_field("entY",result);
		        hInfo[i][hEnter][1] = floatstr(result);
		       

		        mysql_get_field("entZ",result);
		        hInfo[i][hEnter][2] = floatstr(result);
		        

				mysql_get_field("exitX",result);
				hInfo[i][hExitx] = floatstr(result);
				

				mysql_get_field("exitY",result);
				hInfo[i][hExity] = floatstr(result);
		

				mysql_get_field("exitZ",result);
				hInfo[i][hExitz] = floatstr(result);
		

				mysql_get_field("exitInt",result);
				hInfo[i][hInt] = strval(result);
	

				mysql_get_field("owner",hInfo[i][hOwner]);

				mysql_get_field("locked",result);
				hInfo[i][hLocked] = strval(result);
				

				mysql_get_field("signX",result);
				hInfo[i][hsignPos][0] = floatstr(result);
				

				mysql_get_field("signY",result);
				hInfo[i][hsignPos][1] = floatstr(result);
				

				mysql_get_field("signZ",result);
				hInfo[i][hsignPos][2] = floatstr(result);
				

				mysql_get_field("signRX",result);
				hInfo[i][hsignPos][3] = floatstr(result);
				

				mysql_get_field("signRY",result);
				hInfo[i][hsignPos][4] = floatstr(result);
				

				mysql_get_field("signRZ",result);
				hInfo[i][hsignPos][5] = floatstr(result);
				new gstring[32];

				for(new g = 0; g < 10; g ++)
				{
					format(gstring,sizeof(gstring),"safeWeapon[%d]",g);
					mysql_get_field(gstring,result);
					hInfo[i][hGun][g] = strval(result);
					
					format(gstring,sizeof(gstring),"safeAmmo[%d]",g);
					mysql_get_field(gstring,result);
					hInfo[i][hAmmo][g] = strval(result);
				}
				
				mysql_get_field("safePot",result);
				hInfo[i][hPot] = strval(result);
				
				mysql_get_field("safeCrack",result);
				hInfo[i][hCrack] = strval(result);
				
				mysql_get_field("safeCoke",result);
				hInfo[i][hCoke] = strval(result);
				
				if(hInfo[i][hUsed] == 1)//for sale house
				{
     				hInfo[i][hIcon] = CreateDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],31,0,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
                    hInfo[i][hCheckpoint] = CreateDynamicCP(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],1.5,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
                    hInfo[i][hSign] = CreateDynamicObject(19471,hInfo[i][hsignPos][0],hInfo[i][hsignPos][1],hInfo[i][hsignPos][2],hInfo[i][hsignPos][3],hInfo[i][hsignPos][4],hInfo[i][hsignPos][5],-1,-1,-1,50.0);

				}
				else if(hInfo[i][hUsed] == 2)//bought house
				{
     				hInfo[i][hIcon] = CreateDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],32,0,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
                    hInfo[i][hCheckpoint] = CreateDynamicCP(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],1.5,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
					hInfo[i][hSign] = -1;
				}
		    }
		    mysql_free_result();
		}

		case THREAD_RAFFLE:
		{
		    PlayerInfo[extraid][pRaffle] += 1;
		}
	    case THREAD_LOADCHARGES:
	    {
	    	mysql_store_result();
			while(mysql_retrieve_row())
			{
			    NumberOfCharges += 1;
			}
			mysql_free_result();
	    }
		case THREAD_LOADARRESTS:
		{
		    mysql_store_result();
		    while(mysql_retrieve_row())
		    {
		        NumberOfArrests += 1;
		    }
		    mysql_free_result();
		}
	    case THREAD_SAVECHARGES:{ new string[200]; format(string, sizeof(string), "Charge: %d |Saved| Threaded", extraid);   /*MySQLSaveLog(string);*/ }
	    case THREAD_SAVEARRESTS:{ new string[200]; format(string, sizeof(string), "Arrest: %d |Saved| Threaded", extraid);   /*MySQLSaveLog(string);*/ }
	    case THREAD_MDCLOAD:
	    {
			new playerid = extraid,officer[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],charges[256],reportid;
			mysql_store_result();
			new blist[128],result[32];
			while(mysql_retrieve_row())
			{
                mysql_get_field("Officer",officer);
                mysql_get_field("Charges",charges);
				mysql_get_field("ArrestID",result);
				reportid = strval(result);
			    format(blist,sizeof(blist),"Officer:%s Charges:%s ArrestID:%d",officer,charges,reportid);
			    SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,blist);
			}
			mysql_free_result();
	    }
		case THREAD_ISBANNED:
		{
			new playerid = extraid, bannedby[MAX_PLAYER_NAME], banreason[128], string[128];
			mysql_store_result();
			while(mysql_retrieve_row())
			{
			    new existing = mysql_num_rows();
			    mysql_get_field("BanReason", banreason);
			    mysql_get_field("BannedBy", bannedby);
				if(existing == 0)
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE," This player isn't shown as being banned on the database!");
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"This player is banned on the database!");
				    format(string,sizeof(string),"Banned By: %s Reason: %s");
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
				}
		    }
		    mysql_free_result();
		}
		case THREAD_CHECK_NAME:
		{
			mysql_store_result();
			if(mysql_num_rows()==0)
			{
				gPlayerAccount[extraid] = 0;
			}
			else
			{
				gPlayerAccount[extraid] = 1;
			}
			mysql_free_result();
		}
		case THREAD_REGISTER:
		{
			new playername3[MAX_PLAYER_NAME], playersip[24];
			if(!IsPlayerConnected(extraid)) {return 1;}
			GetPlayerName(extraid, playername3, sizeof(playername3));
			GetPlayerIp(extraid, playersip, sizeof(playersip));
			new string[128];
			ShowServerDialog(extraid, 3000, DIALOG_STYLE_MSGBOX, "Gender Selection","You are a male or a female?", "Male", "Female");
			new y,m,d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d) [%d:%d:%d] %s Has registred in under IP %s.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,playername3,playersip);
			PlayerInfo[extraid][pReg] = 0;
			format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Registered`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[extraid][pReg],PlayerInfo[extraid][pDBID]);
			mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,extraid);
			LoginLog(string);
		}
		case THREAD_CHANGE_NAME:
		{
			OnPlayerUpdateEx(extraid);
			ChangedName[extraid] = 1;
			if(PlayerInfo[extraid][pShiftName] == 1)
			{ PlayerInfo[extraid][pShiftName] = 0; SCM(extraid, COLOR_GREY, "* You used your Shiftname Rights!");}
		}
		case THREAD_GENDER_SELECT:
		{
			RegistrationStep[extraid] = 2;
			ShowServerDialog(extraid, 3001, DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Date of Birth entry", "What is your Birthdate? (dd/mm/yyyy)", "Next", "Prev");
		}
		case THREAD_DOB_ENTRY:
		{
			RegistrationStep[extraid] = 0; MedicBill[extraid] = 0;
			ShowServerDialog(extraid, 1245, DIALOG_STYLE_PASSWORD,"Welcome, Please Log-In", "Account Successfuly Registered into the database!\nType your password below to log-in","Log-in","Quit");
		}
		case THREAD_BANCHECK:
		{
			mysql_store_result();
			if(!IsPlayerConnected(extraid)) return mysql_free_result();
			new
				sql[128],
				msg2[128],
				plname[MAX_PLAYER_NAME]
			;
			if(mysql_num_rows() >= 1)
			{
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_NICERED,"=======================================YOU ARE BANNED======================================");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"You are banned from this Server. If you feel this is wrong, or in error,");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"and you wish to be unbanned -- please visit our website at samprp.net");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"Remember to present your case in a cool, calm, and, mature manner. Failure to do");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"so may result in a permaban from SA-MP Roleplay. Ban Evading will result in a Permanent Range Ban.");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"REMEMBER: MINIMUM BAN TIME IS 72HRS. YOU MAYBE BE BANNED LONGER DEPEDNING ON YOUR OFFENSE");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_NICERED,"========================================YOU ARE BANNED=======================================");
				format(msg2,sizeof(msg2),"[ADMIN]: %s (%d), Has been kicked for Possible Ban Evading",plname,extraid);
				SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,msg2);
				mysql_free_result();
				ServerKick(extraid);
			}
			else
			{
				format(sql, sizeof(sql), "SELECT `BanID` FROM `samp_bans` WHERE `BanName`='%s'", GPN(extraid));
				mysql_query(sql, THREAD_BANCHECKN, extraid);
			}
		}
		case THREAD_BANCHECKN:
		{
			mysql_store_result();
			if(!IsPlayerConnected(extraid)) return mysql_free_result();
			new
				msg2[128],
				plname[MAX_PLAYER_NAME]
			;
			if(mysql_num_rows() >= 1)
			{
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_NICERED,"=======================================YOU ARE BANNED======================================");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"You are banned from this Server. If you feel this is wrong, or in error,");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"and you wish to be unbanned -- please visit our website at samprp.net");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"Remember to present your case in a cool, calm, and, mature manner. Failure to do");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"so may result in a permaban from SA-MP Roleplay. Ban Evading will result in a Permanent Range Ban.");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"REMEMBER: MINIMUM BAN TIME IS 72HRS. YOU MAYBE BE BANNED LONGER DEPEDNING ON YOUR OFFENSE");
				SCM(extraid, COLOR_NICERED,"========================================YOU ARE BANNED=======================================");
				format(msg2,sizeof(msg2),"[ADMIN]: %s (%d), has been kicked for Ban Evasion",plname,extraid);
				SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,msg2);
				ServerKick(extraid);
				mysql_free_result();
			}
		}
		case THREAD_SAVEBAN:
		{
			new string[200], sqlQuery[256]; format(string, sizeof(string), "%d Ban Saved", extraid); BanLog(string);
			format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Banned`='1' WHERE Username='%s'", GPN(extraid));
			mysql_query(sqlQuery, THREAD_BANKICK, extraid);
		}
		case THREAD_UNBAN:
		{
			new string[200], sqlQuery[256];
			format(string, sizeof(string), "%s Unban Saved", PlayerName(extraid)); BanLog(string);
			format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Banned`='0' WHERE `Username`='%s'",GPN(extraid)); mysql_query(sqlQuery);
			mysql_store_result(); mysql_free_result();
		}
		case THREAD_BANKICK:    { SafeResetPlayerWeapons(extraid); ClearWepVariables(extraid); ServerKick(extraid); }
		case THREAD_SAVENEWS:   { new string[200]; format(string, sizeof(string), "Newspaper %d |Saved| Threaded", extraid); MySQLSaveLog(string); }
		case THREAD_SAVEHOUSES: { new string[200]; format(string, sizeof(string), "HouseID: %d |Saved| Case Save", extraid); MySQLSaveLog(string); }
		case THREAD_UPDATE:     { new string[200]; format(string, sizeof(string), "Player: %d |Saved| Threaded", extraid);   MySQLSaveLog(string); }
		case THREAD_LOADHOUSES:
		{
			mysql_store_result();
			new x, result[256];
			while(mysql_retrieve_row())
			{
				mysql_get_field("HouseID", result); x = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Entrance_X", result); HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex] = floatstr(result);
				mysql_get_field("Entrance_Y", result); HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey] = floatstr(result);
				mysql_get_field("Entrance_Z", result); HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez] = floatstr(result);
				mysql_get_field("Exit_X", result); HouseInfo[x][hExitx] = floatstr(result);
				mysql_get_field("Exit_Y", result); HouseInfo[x][hExity] = floatstr(result);
				mysql_get_field("Exit_Z", result); HouseInfo[x][hExitz] = floatstr(result);
				mysql_get_field("Owner", result); strmid(HouseInfo[x][hOwner],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Description", result); strmid(HouseInfo[x][hDiscription],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Price", result); HouseInfo[x][hValue] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Health", result); HouseInfo[x][hHel] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Armour", result); HouseInfo[x][hArm] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Interior", result); HouseInfo[x][hInt] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Locked", result); HouseInfo[x][hLock] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Owned", result); HouseInfo[x][hOwned] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("RentPrice", result); HouseInfo[x][hRent] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Rentable", result); HouseInfo[x][hRentabil] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Takings", result); HouseInfo[x][hTakings] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("LevelNeeded", result); HouseInfo[x][hLevel] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("World", result); HouseInfo[x][hWorld] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Setted", result); HouseInfo[x][hSetted] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Materials", result); HouseInfo[x][hMaterials] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Weapon1", result); HouseInfo[x][hWeapon1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Ammo1", result); HouseInfo[x][hAmmo1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Weapon2", result); HouseInfo[x][hWeapon2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Ammo2", result); HouseInfo[x][hAmmo2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Weapon3", result); HouseInfo[x][hWeapon3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Ammo3", result); HouseInfo[x][hAmmo3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Weapon4", result); HouseInfo[x][hWeapon4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Ammo4", result); HouseInfo[x][hAmmo4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Weapon5", result); HouseInfo[x][hWeapon5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Ammo5", result); HouseInfo[x][hAmmo5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Weapon6", result); HouseInfo[x][hWeapon6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Ammo6", result); HouseInfo[x][hAmmo6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Message", result); strmid(HouseInfo[x][hMessage],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("ExVW", result); HouseInfo[x][hExVW] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("ExINT", result); HouseInfo[x][hExINT] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Seeds", result); HouseInfo[x][hDrugs][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("BWeed", result); HouseInfo[x][hDrugs][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Weed", result); HouseInfo[x][hDrugs][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("BCoke", result); HouseInfo[x][hDrugs][3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("CCoke", result); HouseInfo[x][hDrugs][4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Coke", result); HouseInfo[x][hDrugs][5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("BCrack", result); HouseInfo[x][hDrugs][6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Crack", result); HouseInfo[x][hDrugs][7] = strval(result);
				
				switch(HouseInfo[x][hWorld])
				{
					case 0 .. 798:
					{
						if(HouseInfo[x][hOwned] == 0)
						{
							new PropertyString[256];
							format(PropertyString,sizeof(PropertyString),"House is UNOWNED! \n House ID: %d \n Price: $%d \n Description: %s \n Level Needed: %d",HouseInfo[x][hWorld], HouseInfo[x][hValue],HouseInfo[x][hDiscription], HouseInfo[x][hLevel]);
							HouseLabel[x] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(PropertyString , 0x00FF00AA, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 10, INVALID_PLAYER_ID, INVALID_VEHICLE_ID, 0,  -1,  -1, -1, 15.0);
							HousePickup[x] = CreateDynamicPickup(1273, 1, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], -1, -1, -1, 30.0);
						}
						else if(HouseInfo[x][hOwned] == 1)
						{
							new Rents[16], PropertyString[256];
							if(HouseInfo[x][hRentabil] != 0){format(Rents,sizeof(Rents),"$%d", HouseInfo[x][hRent]);}
							else{Rents = "Unrentable";}
							format(PropertyString,sizeof(PropertyString),"%s \n Owner: %s \n House ID: %d \n Rent Price: %s \n Description: %s \n To Rent Type /rentroom",HouseInfo[x][hMessage],HouseInfo[x][hOwner],HouseInfo[x][hWorld], Rents, HouseInfo[x][hDiscription]);
							HouseLabel[x] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(PropertyString , 0x00FFFFAA, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 10, INVALID_PLAYER_ID, INVALID_VEHICLE_ID, 0,  -1,  -1, -1, 15.0);
							HousePickup[x] = CreateDynamicPickup(1272, 1, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], -1, -1, -1, 30.0);
						}
					}
					case 799 .. 816:
					{
						if(HouseInfo[x][hOwned] == 0) // APARTMENT 1
						{
							new PropertyString[256];
							format(PropertyString,sizeof(PropertyString),"House is UNOWNED! \n House ID: %d \n Price: $%d \n Description: %s \n Level Needed: %d",HouseInfo[x][hWorld], HouseInfo[x][hValue],HouseInfo[x][hDiscription], HouseInfo[x][hLevel]);
							HouseLabel[x] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(PropertyString , 0x00FF00AA, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 10, INVALID_PLAYER_ID, INVALID_VEHICLE_ID, 0,  1,  18, -1, 30.0);
							HousePickup[x] = CreateDynamicPickup(1273, 1, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 1, 18, -1, 30.0);
						}
						else if(HouseInfo[x][hOwned] == 1) // APARTMENT 1

							new Rents[16], PropertyString[256];
							if(HouseInfo[x][hRentabil] != 0){format(Rents,sizeof(Rents),"$%d", HouseInfo[x][hRent]);}
							else{Rents = "Unrentable";}
							format(PropertyString,sizeof(PropertyString),"%s \n Owner: %s \n House ID: %d \n Rent Price: %s \n Description: %s \n To Rent Type /rentroom",HouseInfo[x][hMessage],HouseInfo[x][hOwner],HouseInfo[x][hWorld], Rents, HouseInfo[x][hDiscription]);
							HouseLabel[x] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(PropertyString , 0x00FFFFAA, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 10, INVALID_PLAYER_ID, INVALID_VEHICLE_ID, 0,  1,  18, -1, 30.0);
							HousePickup[x] = CreateDynamicPickup(1272, 1, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 1, 18, -1, 30.0);
						}
					}

					{

					case 871 .. 888:
					{
						if(HouseInfo[x][hOwned] == 0) // APARTMENT 5
						{
							new PropertyString[256];
							format(PropertyString,sizeof(PropertyString),"House is UNOWNED! \n House ID: %d \n Price: $%d \n Description: %s \n Level Needed: %d",HouseInfo[x][hWorld], HouseInfo[x][hValue],HouseInfo[x][hDiscription], HouseInfo[x][hLevel]);
							HouseLabel[x] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(PropertyString , 0x00FF00AA, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 10, INVALID_PLAYER_ID, INVALID_VEHICLE_ID, 0,  5,  18, -1, 30.0);
							HousePickup[x] = CreateDynamicPickup(1273, 1, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 5, 18, -1, 30.0);
						}
						else if(HouseInfo[x][hOwned] == 1) // APARTMENT 5
						{
							new Rents[16], PropertyString[256];
							if(HouseInfo[x][hRentabil] != 0){format(Rents,sizeof(Rents),"$%d", HouseInfo[x][hRent]);}
							else{Rents = "Unrentable";}
							format(PropertyString,sizeof(PropertyString),"%s \n Owner: %s \n House ID: %d \n Rent Price: %s \n Description: %s \n To Rent Type /rentroom",HouseInfo[x][hMessage],HouseInfo[x][hOwner],HouseInfo[x][hWorld], Rents, HouseInfo[x][hDiscription]);
							HouseLabel[x] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(PropertyString , 0x00FFFFAA, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 10, INVALID_PLAYER_ID, INVALID_VEHICLE_ID, 0,  5,  18, -1, 30.0);
							HousePickup[x] = CreateDynamicPickup(1272, 1, HouseInfo[x][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[x][hEntrancez], 5, 18, -1, 30.0);
						}
					}

			}
			mysql_free_result();
		}
		case THREAD_LOADNEWS: // MYSQL NEWS
		{
			mysql_store_result();
			new x, result[256];
			while(mysql_retrieve_row())
			{
				mysql_get_field("PaperID", result); x = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Used", result); PaperInfo[x][PaperUsed] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Maker", result); strmid(PaperInfo[x][PaperMaker],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Title", result); strmid(PaperInfo[x][PaperTitle],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Line1", result); strmid(PaperInfo[x][PaperText1],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Line2", result); strmid(PaperInfo[x][PaperText2],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Line3", result); strmid(PaperInfo[x][PaperText3],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Line4", result); strmid(PaperInfo[x][PaperText4],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Line5", result); strmid(PaperInfo[x][PaperText5],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Line6", result); strmid(PaperInfo[x][PaperText6],result,0,strlen(result),255);
				mysql_get_field("Line7", result); strmid(PaperInfo[x][PaperText7],result,0,strlen(result),255);
			}
			mysql_free_result();
		}
		case THREAD_LOGIN:
		{
			mysql_store_result();
			if(!IsPlayerConnected(extraid)) {return mysql_free_result();}
			new result[256];
			if(mysql_num_rows()==1)
			{
				mysql_retrieve_row();
				mysql_get_field("PlayerID", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pDBID] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Password", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pKey] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Level", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pLevel] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TesterLevel", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pTester] = strval(result);

		}
		case THREAD_LOADWEED:
		{
			new result[32];
