				mysql_get_field("Water", result);   OrigNeWa[extraid] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Stage", result);   GrowStep[extraid] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("Time", result);    PlayerInfo[extraid][pDrugs][8] = strval(result);
				for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
				{
					switch(GrowStep[extraid])
					{
						case 2:
						{
							if(SeedToPlant[extraid][W] == 2)
							{
								WeedPlant[extraid][W] = CreateDynamicObject(3409, PlantSpots[extraid][W][0], PlantSpots[extraid][W][1], PlantSpots[extraid][W][2]-0.6, -180.0, 0.0, 0.0, -1, -1, -1, 250.0);
							}
						}
						case 3:
						{
							if(SeedToPlant[extraid][W] == 2)
							{
								WeedPlant[extraid][W] = CreateDynamicObject(3409, PlantSpots[extraid][W][0], PlantSpots[extraid][W][1], PlantSpots[extraid][W][2]-0.3, -180.0, 0.0, 0.0, -1, -1, -1, 250.0);
							}
						}
						case 4:
						{
							if(SeedToPlant[extraid][W] == 2)
							{
								WeedPlant[extraid][W] = CreateDynamicObject(3409, PlantSpots[extraid][W][0], PlantSpots[extraid][W][1], PlantSpots[extraid][W][2], -180.0, 0.0, 0.0, -1, -1, -1, 250.0);
							}
						}
					}
				}
				mysql_free_result();
			}
		}
		case THREAD_LOADTRUNK:
		{
			new
				result[32],
				sql[64]
			;
			mysql_store_result();
			if(mysql_num_rows()==0)
			{
				format(sql, sizeof(sql), "INSERT INTO `samp_trunks` SET PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[extraid][pDBID]);
				mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, extraid);
				mysql_free_result();
			}
			else
			{
				mysql_retrieve_row();
				mysql_get_field("T1G1", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A1", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1G2", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A2", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1G3", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A3", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1G4", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A4", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1G5", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A5", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1G6", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A6", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1G7", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A7", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1G8", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][7] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A8", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][7] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1G9", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][8] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A9", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][8] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1G10", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1GunTrunk][9] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1A10", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][9] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1WEED", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkDrugs][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1COKE", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkDrugs][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T1CRACK", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar1TrunkDrugs][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G1", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A1", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G2", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A2", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G3", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A3", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G4", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A4", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G5", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A5", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G6", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A6", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G7", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A7", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G8", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][7] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A8", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][7] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G9", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][8] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A9", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][8] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2G10", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2GunTrunk][9] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2A10", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][9] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2WEED", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkDrugs][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2COKE", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkDrugs][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T2CRACK", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar2TrunkDrugs][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G1", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A1", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G2", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A2", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G3", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A3", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G4", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A4", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G5", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A5", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G6", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A6", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G7", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A7", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G8", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][7] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A8", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][7] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G9", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][8] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A9", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][8] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3G10", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3GunTrunk][9] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3A10", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][9] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3WEED", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkDrugs][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3COKE", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkDrugs][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("T3CRACK", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pCar3TrunkDrugs][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS1", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS2", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS3", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][2] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS4", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][3] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS5", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][4] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS6", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][5] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS7", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][6] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS8", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][7] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS9", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][8] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TS10", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pGunTrunkSlot][9] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TDS1", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pDrugTrunkSlot][0] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TDS2", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pDrugTrunkSlot][1] = strval(result);
				mysql_get_field("TDS3", result); PlayerInfo[extraid][pDrugTrunkSlot][2] = strval(result);
			}
			mysql_free_result();
		}
	}
	LogCallback("OnQueryFinish");
	return 1;
}

public OnQueryError(errorid, error[], resultid, extraid, callback[], query[], connectionHandle)
{
	LogCallback("OnQueryError");
	new
		string[128],
		y, m, d
	;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d) ErrorID: %d",d,m,y,errorid);
	MySQLLog(string);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d) Error: %s",d,m,y,error);
	MySQLLog(string);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d) Query: %s",d,m,y,query);
	MySQLLog(string);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d) Callback: %s",d,m,y,callback);
	MySQLLog(string);
	LogCallback("OnQueryError");
	return 1;
}

public checkMySQLConnection() {
	LogCallback("checkMySQLConnection");
	pingTick++;
	if(pingTick >= 120) {
		if(mysql_ping() == -1) {
		    printf("[MySQL]: Reconnecting to database '%s'", DB_DATABASE);
			mysql_reconnect(); // After 120 seconds (2 minutes), we need to ensure the connection is still alive. MySQL sometimes plays up and forces the connection to timeout.
		}
		pingTick = 0;
	}
	LogCallback("checkMySQLConnection");
}

/****** COMMANDS ******/
CMD:setfire(playerid,params[])
{
	new firemen;
	if(GetPlayerInterior(playerid) == 0 && GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == 0)
	{
	    foreach(Player,i)
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] == 2)
	        {
	            if(PlayerInfo[i][pDuty] == 1)
	            {
					firemen += 1;
				}
			}
		}
		if(firemen > 2)
		{
		    new string[128];
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has requested to burn the building that is at their location. Type /acceptfire [PlayerID] to accept the request.",GPN(playerid));
		    SendAdminMessage(COLOR_ORANGE,string);
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_ORANGE,"Your fire request has been sent to the admin team and is currently being reviewed, please await a response");
		    RequestingFire[playerid] = 1;
		}else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_ERROR,"[ERROR: There isn't enough LSFD members online to set a fire!]");
	} else SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You cannot use this here...");
	return 1;
}
CMD:acceptfire(playerid,params[])
{
	new string[128], playa;
	if(ModDuty[playerid] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE: /acceptfire [PlayerID/PartOfName]");
		if(RequestingFire[playa] == 1)
		{
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s %s has accepted your fire request.",GetAdminRank(playerid),GPN(playerid));
		    SCM(playa,COLOR_GREEN,string);
		    SCM(playa,COLOR_GREEN,"please use /setfire to start a fire outside of an interior!");
		    SCM(playa,COLOR_RED,"REMEMBER TO ROLEPLAY STARTING THE FIRE OR ELSE RISK BEING AJAILED!");
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s %s has accepted %s's fire request.",GetAdminRank(playerid),GPN(playerid),GPN(playa));
		    SendAdminMessage(COLOR_ORANGE,string);
		    RequestingFire[playa] = -1;
		    AcceptedFire[playa] = 1;
		}else return SCM(playerid,COLOR_ERROR,"[ERROR: This player hasn't sent out a fire request!]");
	}else return SCM(playerid,COLOR_ERROR,"[ERROR: You Cannot use this command!");
	return 1;
}
CMD:startfire(playerid, params[])
{
	new string[128], Float:fx, Float:fy, Float:fz, zone[MAX_ZONE_NAME];
	if(AcceptedFire[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    GetPlayerPos(playerid,fx,fy,fz);
		if(fz >= 800) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED,"[ERROR: You cannot start a fire from here!]");
		if(GetPlayerInterior(playerid) == 0 && GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == 0)
		{
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_RED,"You have now started a fire, a message has been sent around the local area!");
			GetPlayer2DRadarZone(playerid,zone,MAX_ZONE_NAME);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"* Black smoke can be seen forming over the skyline in %s!",zone);
			ProxDetector(500, playerid, string,COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT1);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"Dispatch Says: A fire has been seen around the location of %s, urgent response required", zone);
			SendRadioMessage(2,COLOR_RED,string);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has started a fire in %s.",GPN(playerid),zone);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_ORANGE, string);
			AcceptedFire[playerid] = -1;
		}else return SCM(playerid,COLOR_ERROR,"[ERROR: You cannot start a fire from an interior!]");
	}else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_ERROR,"[ERROR: You cannot start a fire with admin approval!]");
	return 1;
}

		winner[32]

}
CMD:checktrunk(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("checktrunk");
	new v = GetClosestVehicle(playerid);
	if(CarInfo[v][cTrunk] == 0) return SCM(playerid,-1,"This cars trunk is not opened!");
	new string[128];
	SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"........::Trunk Guns::...........");
	for(new i = 0; i < 10; i ++)
	{
		new gunname[24];
		GetWeaponName(CarInfo[v][cGunTrunk][i],gunname,24);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"Gun:%s -- Ammo:%d",gunname,CarInfo[v][cTrunkAmmo][i]);
		SCM(playerid,-1,string);
	}
	SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"..........::Trunk Drugs::.........");
	for(new i = 0; i < 3; i++)
	{
		new drug[6];
		switch(i)
		{
		    case 0:
		    {
		        drug = "Weed";
		    }
		    case 1:
		    {
		        drug = "Coke";
		    }
		    case 2:
		    {
		        drug = "Crack";
		    }
		}
		format(string,sizeof(string),"%d grams of %s",CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][i],drug);
		SCM(playerid,-1,string);
	}
	LogCallback("checktrunk");
	return 1;
}
CMD:trunktake(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("trunktake");
	new slot[3],type[6],string[128];
	if(sscanf(params,"s[6]S[4]",type,slot))
	{
	    SCM(playerid,-1,"Usage:/trunktake [type]");
	    SCM(playerid,-1,"Available types:Gun,weed,coke,crack");
	    return 1;
	}
	new v = GetClosestVehicle(playerid);
	if(CarInfo[v][cTrunk] == 0) return SCM(playerid,-1,"This cars trunk is not opened!");
	if(CarInfo[v][cUid] == playerid)
	{
	    if(strcmp(type,"gun",true) == 0)
	    {
	        if(CarInfo[v][cGunTrunk][strval(slot) -1] == 0) return SCM(playerid, -1,"There is nothing in this slot please try another");
			new gun = CarInfo[v][cGunTrunk][strval(slot) -1];
			new ammo = CarInfo[v][cTrunkAmmo][strval(slot) -1];
			SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, gun, ammo);
			CarInfo[v][cGunTrunk][strval(slot) -1] = 0;
			CarInfo[v][cTrunkAmmo][strval(slot) -1] = 0;
			new weaponname[24];
			GetWeaponName(GetPlayerWeapon(playerid),weaponname,sizeof(weaponname));
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s takes a %s from their trunk",GPN(playerid),weaponname);
			ProxDetector(10.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			if(v == pC1[playerid])
			{
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1GunTrunk][strval(slot) -1] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][strval(slot) -1] = 0;
				SaveTrunk(playerid, 1, strval(slot)-1);
			}
			else if(v == pC2[playerid])
			{
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2GunTrunk][strval(slot) -1] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][strval(slot)-1] = 0;
				SaveTrunk(playerid, 2, strval(slot)-1);
			}
			else if(v == pC3[playerid])
			{
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3GunTrunk][strval(slot) -1] = 0;
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][strval(slot) -1] = 0;
				SaveTrunk(playerid, 3, strval(slot)-1);
            }
		}
		else if(strcmp(type,"weed",true) == 0)
		{
		    if(CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][0] == 0) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You don't even have any weed in your trunk");
		    if(!slot[0]) return SCM(playerid,-1,"Usage:/trunktake weed [amount]");
		    if(strval(slot) > CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][0]) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You do not have that much weed");
		    if(strval(slot) < 0) { SCM(playerid, -1,"Stop Trying to exploit"); ServerKick(playerid); return 1; }
		    CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][0] = CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][0] - strval(slot);
		    PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3] += strval(slot);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s takes a green baggy out of the trunk of their car",GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(10.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			if(v == pC1[playerid]){ PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkDrugs][0] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkDrugs][0] - strval(slot); return 1;}
			else if(v == pC2[playerid]) { PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkDrugs][0] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkDrugs][0] - strval(slot); return 1; }
			else if(v == pC3[playerid]) { PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkDrugs][0] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkDrugs][0] - strval(slot); return 1; }
		}
		else if(strcmp(type,"coke",true) == 0)
		{
		    if(CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][1] == 0) return SCM(playerid, -1,"You don't even have any coke in your trunk");
		    if(!slot[0]) return SCM(playerid,-1,"Usage:/trunktake coke [amount]");
		    if(strval(slot) > CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][1]) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You do not have that much weed");
		    if(strval(slot) < 0) {	SCM(playerid, -1,"Stop Trying to exploit"); ServerKick(playerid); return 1; }
		    CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][1] = CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][1] - strval(slot);
		    PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] += strval(slot);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s takes out a white baggy from the trunk of their car",GPN(playerid));
		    ProxDetector(10.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			if(v == pC1[playerid]){PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkDrugs][1] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkDrugs][1] - strval(slot); return 1; }
			else if(v == pC2[playerid]) { PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkDrugs][1] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkDrugs][1] - strval(slot); return 1;}
			else if(v == pC3[playerid]) { PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkDrugs][1] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkDrugs][1] - strval(slot); return 1;}
		}
		else if(strcmp(type,"crack",true) == 0)
		{
		    if(CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][2] == 0) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You don't even have any coke in your trunk");
		    if(!slot[0]) return SCM(playerid,-1,"Usage:/trunktake crack [amount]");
		    if(strval(slot) > CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][2]) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You don't have that much weed");
		    if(strval(slot) < 0) { SCM(playerid, -1,"Stop Trying to exploit"); ServerKick(playerid); return 1; }
		    CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][2] = CarInfo[v][cTrunkDrugs][2] - strval(slot);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] += strval(slot);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s takes out a white baggy from the trunk of their car",GPN(playerid));
		    ProxDetector(10.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			if(v == pC1[playerid]) { PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkDrugs][2] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkDrugs][2] - strval(slot); return 1; }
			else if(v == pC2[playerid]) { PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkDrugs][2] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkDrugs][2] - strval(slot); return 1; }
			else if(v == pC3[playerid]) { PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkDrugs][2] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkDrugs][2] - strval(slot); return 1; }
		}
		else return SCM(playerid,-1,"Invalid item name");
	}
	LogCallback("trunktake");
	return 1;
}

				PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][strval(slot)-1] += ammo;
				SaveTrunk(playerid, 2, strval(slot)-1);
			}
			else if(v == pC3[playerid])
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3GunTrunk][strval(slot) -1] != 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3GunTrunk][strval(slot) -1] != gun)

                PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3GunTrunk][strval(slot) -1] = gun;
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][strval(slot) -1] += ammo;
				SaveTrunk(playerid, 3, strval(slot)-1);
            }
			new gunname[24];
			GetWeaponName(gun,gunname,sizeof(gunname));
			format(string,sizeof(string),"You have stored a %s, with %d ammo",gunname,ammo);
			SCM(playerid,-1,string);
			CarInfo[v][cGunTrunk][strval(slot) -1] = gun;
			CarInfo[v][cTrunkAmmo][strval(slot) -1] += ammo;
			SetPlayerAmmo(playerid,gun,0);
			return 1;
		}
		else if(strcmp(type,"weed",true) == 0)
		{
			if(!slot[0]) return SCM(playerid,-1,"Usage:/trunkput weed [amount]");

			}

CMD:setmp3(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("setmp3");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] >= 2)
	{
		new blist[1000],list[1000];
		for(new i; i < sizeof(radiolist); i++)
		{
			format(blist,sizeof(blist),"%s\r\n",radiolist[i][0]);
			strcat(list,blist,1000);
		}
		ShowServerDialog(playerid,RADIO_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Radio",list,"Okay","Cancel");
	}
	LogCallback("setmp3");
	return 1;
}
CMD:roff(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("roff");
	if(GetPVarInt(playerid,"Streaming") == 1)
	{
	    StopAudioStreamForPlayer(playerid);
		SetPVarInt(playerid, "Streaming", 0);
	}
	LogCallback("roff");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setradio(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("setradio");
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		if(GetPlayerVehicleSeat(playerid) == 0)
		{
			new blist[128],list[1000];
			for(new i; i < sizeof(radiolist); i++)
			{
				format(blist,sizeof(blist),"%s\r\n",radiolist[i][0]);
				strcat(list,blist,1000);
			}
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,RADIO_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Radio",list,"Okay","Cancel");
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Only the driver can change the radio");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setradio");
 	return 1;
}
CMD:setaccent(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("setaccent");
	ShowServerDialog(playerid,ACCENT_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Accent","Input your accent(Troll ones will get you kicked)","Okay","Cancel");
	SCM(playerid,-1,"If you want to remove your accent leave the box empty and press okay");
	LogCallback("setaccent");
	return 1;
}
CMD:xp(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("xp");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		if(DoubleXP == false)
		{
	    	DoubleXP = true;
	    	SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED,"Double XP has been enabled by an admin");
	    	SendRconCommand("hostname SA-MP Roleplay[Updated to 0.3z] [Double XP]");
		}
		else
		{
		    DoubleXP = false;
		    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED,"Double XP has been disabled by an admin");
		    SendRconCommand("hostname SA-MP Roleplay[Updated to 0.3z]");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("xp");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setboombox(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("setboombox");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pBoomBox] == 1)
		{
			if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][0],PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][1],PlayerInfo[playerid][BBPos][2])) return SCM(playerid, -1,"You are not near a boombox!");
			boomboxstation[playerid] = playerid;
			new blist[1000],list[1000];
			for(new r; r < sizeof(radiolist); r++)
			{
				format(blist,sizeof(blist),"%s\r\n",radiolist[r][0]);
				strcat(list,blist,1000);
			}
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,BBOX_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Radio",list,"Okay","Cancel");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setboombox");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buyboombox(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("buyboombox");
	new string[64];
	if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10.0, -2654.5042,1396.5764,906.4609))return SCM(playerid,-1,"You are not at not at the dlocker!");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] < 3) return SCM(playerid, -1, "You are not a VIP you can't buy a boombox!");
	if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < BOOMBOX_PRICE) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You do not have enough money to buy this!");
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pBoomBox] = 1;
	format(string,sizeof(string),"You have purchased a boombox for $%d",BOOMBOX_PRICE);
	SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -BOOMBOX_PRICE);
	SCM(playerid,-1, string);
	LogCallback("buyboombox");
	return 1;
}
CMD:placeboombox(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("placeboombox");
	if(boombox[playerid] != 0)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You already have a boombox out");

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pBoomBox] != 1)
		return SCM(playerid,-1,"You do not have a boombox!");

	if(IsPlayerInAnyDynamicArea(playerid))
		return SCM(playerid, -1,"Due to server resources you can't put a boombox this close to another please move farther away!");

	new Float:pPos[3];
	GetPlayerPos(playerid, pPos[0], pPos[1], pPos[2]);
	boombox[playerid] = CreateObject(2226,pPos[0],pPos[1],pPos[2],0,0,0,3.9700012207031);
	EditObject(playerid, boombox[playerid]);
	EditingBoomBox[playerid] = true;
	LogCallback("placeboombox");
	return 1;
}


CMD:robbank(playerid, params[])//4
{
	LogCallback("robbank");
    new success = random(2);
    if(BankRobbedRecently == 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This location was robbed recently, try again later");
	    return 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] >= 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You already attempted or robbed a place recently, please wait.");
	    return 1;
	}
    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, 2309.6060,-4.0211,26.7422))
    {
        if(GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) >= 24 && GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) <= 40)
		{
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0)
			{
		        if(success == 1)
				{
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You are now robbing The Bank, please remain in the checkpoint for 95 Seconds!");
                    RobbingTime[playerid] = 95;
					RobBankTimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("RobBank",1000,true,"i",playerid);
		            PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] = 900;
		            BankRobbedRecently = 1;
		            SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,"(Radio)Dispatch Says: Reports of the alarms being heard at the bank, please respond urgently!");
					SetTimer("UnsetBankRob",1500000,false);
					OnePlayAnim(playerid, "SHOP", "ROB_Shifty", 4.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0); // Rob Lookout
				}
				else
				{
				    SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,"(Radio)Dispatch Says: Reports of the alarms being heard at the bank, please respond urgently!");
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You failed to rob the Bank!");
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] = 500;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Go Off duty first!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You need a deadly weapon to perform this Act!");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You're not at the Bank Rob Point!");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("robbank");
	return 1;
}
CMD:robgym(playerid, params[])//5
{
	LogCallback("robgym");
	new success = random(2);
    if(GymRobbedRecently == 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This location was robbed recently, try again later");
	    return 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] >= 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You already attempted or robbed a place recently, please wait.");
	    return 1;
	}
    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, 756.5454,5.4325,1000.6992))
    {
        if(GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) >= 24 && GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) <= 40)
		{
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0)
			{
		        if(success == 1)
				{
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You are now Robbing the Gym, please remain in the checkpoint for 50 Seconds!");
                    RobbingTime[playerid] = 50;
					RobGymTimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("RobGym",1000,true,"i",playerid);
                    SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,"(Radio)Dispatch Says: Reports of the alarms being heard at the Gangton gym, please respond urgently!");
		            PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] = 900;
		            GymRobbedRecently = 1;
					SetTimer("UnsetGymRob",1500000,false);
					OnePlayAnim(playerid, "SHOP", "ROB_Shifty", 4.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0); // Rob Lookout
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You failed to rob the Gym!");
                    SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,"(Radio)Dispatch Says: Reports of the alarms being heard at the Gangton gym, please respond urgently!");
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] = 500;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Go Off duty first!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You need a deadly weapon to perform this Act!");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You're not at the Gym Rob Point!");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("robgym");
	return 1;
}
CMD:robdonut(playerid, params[])//6
{
	LogCallback("robgym");
    new success = random(2);
    if(DonutRobbedRecently == 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This location was robbed recently, try again later");
	    return 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] >= 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You already attempted or robbed a place recently, please wait.");
	    return 1;
	}
    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, 379.1978,-184.1220,1000.6328))
    {
        if(GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) >= 24 && GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) <= 40)
		{
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0)
			{
		        if(success == 1)
				{
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You are now Robbing The Donut Store, please remain in the checkpoint for 55 Seconds!");
                    RobbingTime[playerid] = 55;
					RobDonutTimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("RobDonut",1000,true,"i",playerid);
                    SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,"(Radio)Dispatch Says: Reports of the alarms being heard at the donut store, please respond urgently!");
		            PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] = 900;
		            DonutRobbedRecently = 1;
					SetTimer("UnsetDonutRob",1500000,false);
					OnePlayAnim(playerid, "SHOP", "ROB_Shifty", 4.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0); // Rob Lookout
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You failed to rob The Donut Store!");
				    SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,"(Radio)Dispatch Says: Reports of the alarms being heard at the donut store, please respond urgently!");
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] = 500;
				}
				
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Go Off duty first!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You need a deadly weapon to perform this act!");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You're not at the Donut Store Rob Point!");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("robdonut");
	return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("robalhambra");
    new success = random(2);
    if(AlhambraRobbedRecently == 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This location was robbed recently, try again later");
	    return 1;
	}

	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You already attempted or robbed a place recently, please wait.");
	    return 1;
	}
    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, 499.6341,-20.3592,1000.6797))
    {
        if(GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) >= 24 && GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) <= 40)
		{

			    return 1;
			}

		}
	}
	else

CMD:robburger(playerid, params[])//10 12:22 pm 4/27/2012
{
	LogCallback("robburger");
    new success = random(2);
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] >= 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You already attempted or robbed a place recently, please wait.");
	    return 1;
	}
    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, 373.8943,-67.4481,1001.5078))
    {
        if(GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) >= 24 && GetPlayerWeapon(playerid) <= 40)
		{
	    	if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == 1 && Burger1RobbedRecently == 1)
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This location was robbed recently, try again later");
			    return 1;
			}
			else if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == 2 && Burger2RobbedRecently == 1)
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This location was robbed recently, try again later");
			    return 1;
			}
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0)
			{
		        if(success == 1)
				{
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You are now Robbing the Burger Shot, please remain in the checkpoint for 55 Seconds!");
                    RobbingTime[playerid] = 55;
					RobBurgerTimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("RobBurger",1000,true,"i",playerid);
		            SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,"(Radio)Dispatch Says: Reports of the alarms being heard at Burger Shot, please respond urgently!");
		            PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] = 900;
					if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == 1) { Burger1RobbedRecently = 1; SetTimer("UnsetBurger1Rob",1500000,false); }
					else if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == 2) { Burger2RobbedRecently = 1; SetTimer("UnsetBurger2Rob",1500000,false); }
					OnePlayAnim(playerid, "SHOP", "ROB_Shifty", 4.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0); // Rob Lookout
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You failed to rob the Burger Shot!");
				    SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,"(Radio)Dispatch Says: Reports of the alarms being heard at Burger Shot, please respond urgently!");
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] = 500;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Go Off duty first!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You need a deadly weapon to perform this Act!");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You're not at the Burgershoot Rob Point!");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("robburger");
	return 1;
}

	{

	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are not the correct location!");

}
CMD:wank(playerid, params[]) // 12 , 12:30pm, 4/27/2012---------Holy shit most elaborate /wank cmd ever
{
	LogCallback("wank");
	new Float:Health, string[128], sendername[24];
	GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
	GetPlayerHealth(playerid, Health);
	if(WankedRecently[playerid] == 0)
	{
		if(IsWanking[playerid] == 0)
		{
			ApplyAnimation(playerid, "PAULNMAC","wank_in",4.1,0,1,1,1,0);
			TimesWanked[playerid] = 0;
			SetTimerEx("StartWank",3500,0,"i",playerid);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"* %s Unzips their pants and starts to 'choke the chicken'",sendername);
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
		else
		{
		    ApplyAnimation(playerid, "PAULNMAC","wank_out",4.1,0,1,1,1,0);
		    IsWanking[playerid] = 0;
		    WankedRecently[playerid] = 1;
		    new rand = random(sizeof(RandomWankTime));
			SetTimerEx("CanWankAgain",RandomWankTime[rand][0],0,"i",playerid);
			if(TimesWanked[playerid] > 0 && TimesWanked[playerid] < 10)
			{
            if(Health < 90) { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, Health+10); }
			else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100); }
			}
			else if(TimesWanked[playerid] > 11 && TimesWanked[playerid] < 20)
			{
		    if(Health < 85) { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, Health+15); }
			else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100); }
			}
			else if(TimesWanked[playerid] > 21 && TimesWanked[playerid] < 30)
			{
			    if(Health < 80) { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, Health+20); }
				else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100); }
			}
			else if(TimesWanked[playerid] > 31 && TimesWanked[playerid] < 40)
			{
			    if(Health < 75) { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, Health+25); }
				else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100); }
			}
			else if(TimesWanked[playerid] > 41 && TimesWanked[playerid] < 50)
			{
			    if(Health < 70) { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, Health+30); }
				else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100); }
			}
			new RandomFormat = random(5);
			switch (RandomFormat)
			{
			    case 0: { format(string, sizeof(string),"* %s Finishes and zips up his pants.",sendername); }
			    case 1: { format(string, sizeof(string),"** %s Finishes and cums his hands.",sendername); }
			    case 2: { format(string, sizeof(string),"** %s Finishes and cums all over the floor.",sendername); }
			    case 3: { format(string, sizeof(string),"** %s Finishes and cums all over the place.",sendername); }
			    case 4: { format(string, sizeof(string),"** %s Finishes and cums all over the place and the players.",sendername); }
			}
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			TimesWanked[playerid] = 0;
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Your genitals are red and worn, please wait a few minutes before wanking again");
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("wank");
	return 1;
}
CMD:offerblowjob(playerid, params[])//13 , 12:37, 4/27/2012
{
	LogCallback("offerblowjob");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new giveplayerid;
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /offerblowjob [Playerid/PartOfName]"); //Narcotic
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
				new string[128], sendername[24];
				GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
				format(string, sizeof(string),"* %s Wants to Give you a Blowjob, If you Accept Type /acceptblowjob or /declineblowjob",sendername);
				SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
				OfferedBlowjob[giveplayerid] = playerid;
			}
		}
		else //before if they typed an unused id it woouldn't tell them
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, " That player is not even online ");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("offerblowjob");
	return 1;
}

CMD:acceptblowjob(playerid, params[])//13 12:42 pm , 4/27/2012
{
	LogCallback("acceptblowjob");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(OfferedBlowjob[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
			new string[128], sendername[24];
			GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Has accepted your offer for a blowjob!", sendername);
			SCM(OfferedBlowjob[playerid], COLOR_GREY, string);
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* No one has offered you a blowjob.");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("acceptblowjob");
	return 1;
}
CMD:declineblowjob(playerid, params[])//14 ,12:46pm, 4/27/2012
{
	LogCallback("declineblowjob");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(OfferedBlowjob[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
			new string[128], sendername[24];
			GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Has declined your offer for a blowjob!", sendername);
			SCM(OfferedBlowjob[playerid], COLOR_GREY, string);
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* No one has Offered you a Blowjob.");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("declineblowjob");
	return 1;
}

CMD:blowjob(playerid, params[])//15, 12:47pm, 4/27/2012
{
	LogCallback("blowjob");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new giveplayerid;
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid))return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /blowjob [Playerid/PartOfName]");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
				if (OfferedBlowjob[giveplayerid] != playerid)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This Player Hasn't Accepted a Blowjob from you");
		            return 1;
				}
				if(giveplayerid != playerid)
				{
					if (PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pSex] == 1)
					{
						if (!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid) && !IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(giveplayerid))
						{
							if (ProxDetectorS(1.5, playerid, giveplayerid))
							{
							    if(GivingBlowjob[playerid] == 0)
							    {
							        TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
							        TogglePlayerControllable(giveplayerid, 0);
							        GettingBlowjob[giveplayerid] = 1;
							        ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BLOWJOBZ","BJ_COUCH_START_W",4.1,0,0,0,1,0);
							        ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BLOWJOBZ","BJ_COUCH_START_W",4.1,0,0,0,1,0);
	                                ApplyAnimation(giveplayerid,"BLOWJOBZ","BJ_COUCH_START_P",4.1,0,0,0,1,0);
                                    ApplyAnimation(giveplayerid,"BLOWJOBZ","BJ_COUCH_START_P",4.1,0,0,0,1,0);
									SetTimerEx("BlowJobStart",3500,0,"i",playerid);
								}
								else if(GivingBlowjob[playerid] == 1)
								{
								    TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
							        TogglePlayerControllable(giveplayerid, 1);
							        GivingBlowjob[playerid] = 0;
							        GettingBlowjob[giveplayerid] = 0;
							        ApplyAnimation(giveplayerid,"BLOWJOBZ","BJ_COUCH_END_P",4.1,0,0,0,1,0);
								    ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BLOWJOBZ","BJ_COUCH_END_W",4.1,0,0,0,1,0);
									new Float:Health;
									GetPlayerHealth(giveplayerid, Health);
									OfferedBlowjob[playerid] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
									if(Health <= 70)
									{
									    SetPlayerHealth(giveplayerid, Health+30);
									}
									else
									{
									    SetPlayerHealth(giveplayerid, 100);
									}

								}
							}
							else
							{
							    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not Close Enough to your Boy.");
							    return 1;
							}
						}
						else
						{
						    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You or Your Target are in a Vehicle, Please (Tell Him To) Exit the Vehicle.");
						    return 1;
						}
					}
					else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* The Girls doesn't has a Cock...");
					    return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* OMG You Sick! You cannot Blowjob yourself!!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Invalid Playerid.");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Player Not Connected.");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("blowjob");
	return 1;
}

CMD:knife(playerid, params[])//86
{
	LogCallback("knife");
	new nbr;
	if(sscanf(params, "i", nbr)) return SCM(playerid,0xEFEFF7AA,"USAGE: /knife [1-4]");
    if(nbr < 1 || nbr > 4) return SCM(playerid,0xEFEFF7AA,"USAGE: /knife [1-4]");
	switch(nbr)
	{
		case 1: { LoopingAnim(playerid,"KNIFE","KILL_Knife_Ped_Damage",4.0,0,1,1,1,0); }
		case 2: { LoopingAnim(playerid,"KNIFE","KILL_Knife_Ped_Die",4.0,0,1,1,1,0); }
		case 3: { OnePlayAnim(playerid,"KNIFE","KILL_Knife_Player",4.0,0,0,0,0,0); }
		case 4: { LoopingAnim(playerid,"KNIFE","KILL_Partial",4.0,0,1,1,1,1); }
	}
	LogCallback("knife");
	return 1;
}
CMD:basket(playerid, params[])//87
{
	LogCallback("basket");
	new ddr;
	if (sscanf(params, "i", ddr)) return SCM(playerid,0xEFEFF7AA,"USAGE: /basket [1-6]");
    if(ddr < 1 || ddr > 6) return SCM(playerid,0xEFEFF7AA,"USAGE: /basket [1-6]");
    switch(ddr)
	{
		case 1: { LoopingAnim(playerid,"BSKTBALL","BBALL_idleloop",4.0,1,0,0,0,0); }
		case 2: { OnePlayAnim(playerid,"BSKTBALL","BBALL_Jump_Shot",4.0,0,0,0,0,0); }
		case 3: { OnePlayAnim(playerid,"BSKTBALL","BBALL_pickup",4.0,0,0,0,0,0); }
		case 4: { LoopingAnim(playerid,"BSKTBALL","BBALL_run",4.1,1,1,1,1,1); }
		case 5: { LoopingAnim(playerid,"BSKTBALL","BBALL_def_loop",4.0,1,0,0,0,0); }
		case 6: { LoopingAnim(playerid,"BSKTBALL","BBALL_Dnk",4.0,1,0,0,0,0); }
	}
	LogCallback("basket");
   	return 1;
}
CMD:reload(playerid, params[])//88
{
	LogCallback("reload");
	new result[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "s[24]", result)) return SCM(playerid,0xEFEFF7AA,"USAGE: /reload [deagle/smg/ak/m4]");
    if(strcmp(result,"deagle", true) == 0)
	{
		OnePlayAnim(playerid,"COLT45","colt45_reload",4.0,0,0,0,0,1);
    }
    else if(strcmp(result, "smg", true) || strcmp(result,"ak",true) || strcmp(result, "m4", true) == 0)
    {
		OnePlayAnim(playerid,"UZI","UZI_reload",4.0,0,0,0,0,0);
    }
   	else { SCM(playerid,0xEFEFF7AA,"USAGE: /reload [deagle/smg/ak/m4]"); }
   	LogCallback("relod");
   	return 1;
}

 	if (ssr == 2) { LoopingAnim(playerid,"PED","WALK_gang2",4.1,1,1,1,1,1); }
 	LogCallback("gwalk");

CMD:dance(playerid, params[])//96
{
	LogCallback("dance");
	if(Dead[playerid] != -1) return 1;
	new dancestyle;
	if(sscanf(params, "i", dancestyle)) return SCM(playerid,0xFF0000FF,"USAGE: /dance [style 1-4]");
	if(dancestyle < 1 || dancestyle > 4) { SCM(playerid,0xFF0000FF,"USAGE: /dance [style 1-4]"); }
	if(dancestyle == 1) { SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid,SPECIAL_ACTION_DANCE1); }
	else if(dancestyle == 2) { SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid,SPECIAL_ACTION_DANCE2); }
	else if(dancestyle == 3) { SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid,SPECIAL_ACTION_DANCE3); }
	else if(dancestyle == 4) { SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid,SPECIAL_ACTION_DANCE4); }
	LogCallback("dance");
	return 1;
}
CMD:createpickup(playerid, params[])//97
{
	LogCallback("createpickup");
	new model, type;
	if(sscanf(params, "dd", model, type)) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /createpickup [Model Id] [Type]"); SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "HINT: | 1240 - Health | 1242 - Armour | 1241 - Ad Pill | 1247 - Bribe |"); }
	new Float:X, Float:Y, Float:Z;
	GetPlayerPos(playerid, X,Y,Z);
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
	{
    	if((model >= 1210 && model <= 1325) && (model >= 321 && model <= 372)) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "HINT: Only Models above 1210, and below 1325; above 321 and below 373 are allowed!"); }
    	if(type < 1 || type > 3) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "HINT: Only Types: 1,2,3 Are allowed (Use Type 2 If you don't know them)"); }
		CreateDynamicPickup(model, type, X,Y,Z);
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		new string[256];// using 256 versus 128 so the logs don't get cut short.
		new sendername[24];
		GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s has Created a Pickup at X:%f Y:%f Z:%f [Model: %d - Type: %d]",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,X,Y,Z,model,type);
		AdminLog(string);
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
	}
	LogCallback("createpickup");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setmotd(playerid, params[])//101
{
	LogCallback("setmotd");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
        {
			new result[128], string[128], sendername[24];
			if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /setmotd [text]");
			if(strlen(result) > 32)
            {
            	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Limit for MOTD is 32 Characters!");
                return 1;
            }
			GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s (%d) has set the MOTD to %s", sendername,playerid, result);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"%s",result);
			strmid(Motd,string,0,255,sizeof(string));
			format(string,sizeof(string),result);
			SaveMotd();
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /setmotd %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername, (result));
			AdminLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setmod");
    return 1;
}
CMD:ip(playerid, params[])//105
{
	LogCallback("ip");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2)
	{
		new string[128], sendername[24], giveplayerid, giveplayer[24], playersip[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GRAD1,"USAGE: /ip [Players ID]");
		GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
		GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		GetPlayerIp(giveplayerid,playersip,sizeof(playersip));
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Player: %s IP: %s",giveplayer,playersip);
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,string);
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Checked %s's IP (%s)",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername, giveplayer,playersip);
		AdminLog(string);
	}
	LogCallback("ip");
	return 1;
}
CMD:unbanip(playerid, params[])//106
{
	LogCallback("unbanip");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		new tmp[128], string[128], sendername[24];
		GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", tmp)) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GRAD1,"USAGE: /unbanip [players ip]");
		format(string,sizeof(string),"unbanip %s",tmp);
		SendRconCommand(string);
		SendRconCommand("reloadbans");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has unbanned IP [%s].", sendername,tmp);
		ABroadCast(COLOR_YELLOW,string, 5);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "* Successfuly Unbanned [%s] IP", tmp);
		SCM(playerid,TEAM_GROVE_COLOR,string);
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Unbanned IP [%s]",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,tmp);
		LoginLog(string);
	}
	LogCallback("unbanip");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setmats(playerid, params[])//107
{
	LogCallback("setmats");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
	{
	   	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	   	{
			new playa, giveplayer[24], sendername[24], string[128], mat;
			if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, mat)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /setmats [playerid/PartOfName] [amount]");
	    	PlayerInfo[playa][pMats] = mat;
		    GetPlayerName(playa, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
		    GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		    format(string, sizeof(string),"* Administrator %s has set your materials to %d!",sendername,mat);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		    format(string, sizeof(string),"* Set %s's materials to %d",giveplayer, mat);
		    SCM(playerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string);
			format(string, 256, "[ADMIN]: %s has set %s's materials to %d", sendername,giveplayer,mat);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave %d Materials to %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,mat,giveplayer);
			GiveLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setmats");
	return 1;
}
CMD:agivemats(playerid, params[])//108
{
	LogCallback("agivemats");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
	{
    	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    	{
			new giveplayerid, mat, sendername[24], giveplayer[24], string[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "ud", giveplayerid, mat)) return	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /givemats [playerid/PartOfName] [amount]");
			PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pMats] += mat;
		    GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
		    GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		    format(string, sizeof(string),"* Administrator %s has given you %d materials!",sendername,mat);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		    format(string, sizeof(string),"* %s gave %d materials to %s",sendername,mat,giveplayer);
		    SCM(playerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string);
			format(string, 256, "[ADMIN]: %s has sent %s %d materials", sendername,giveplayer,mat);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave %d Materials to %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,mat,giveplayer);
			GiveLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("agivemats");
	return 1;
}
CMD:crash(playerid, params[])//109
{
	LogCallback("crash");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new giveplayer[24], giveplayerid, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE:/crash [PLAYERID]");
		GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		    {
		        if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
		            if(giveplayerid != playerid && Untouchable[giveplayerid]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "!$$%&'()*+,-./01~!@#$^&*()_-+={[}]:;'<,>.?/", 1000, 0);
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "!$$%&'()*+,-./01~!@#$^&*()_-+={[}]:;'<,>.?/", 2000, 1);
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "!$$%&'()*+,-./01~!@#$^&*()_-+={[}]:;'<,>.?/", 3000, 2);
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "!$$%&'()*+,-./01~!@#$^&*()_-+={[}]:;'<,>.?/", 4000, 3);
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "!$$%&'()*+,-./01~!@#$^&*()_-+={[}]:;'<,>.?/", 5000, 4);
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "!$$%&'()*+,-./01~!@#$^&*()_-+={[}]:;'<,>.?/", 6000, 5);
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "!$$%&'()*+,-./01~!@#$^&*()_-+={[}]:;'<,>.?/", 7000, 6);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have crashed %s (%d)'s game", giveplayer,giveplayerid);
			  		SCM(playerid,COLOR_DBLUE, string);
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "** Unknown Player!", giveplayerid);
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "** You are not Authorized to Use this Command!", giveplayerid);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("crash");
	return 1;
}
CMD:explode(playerid, params[])//110
{
	LogCallback("explode");
	new giveplayerid, giveplayer[24], sendername[24], string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "/explode [Playerid]");
	GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
	GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		    {
		        new targetlevel = PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAdmin];
				new playerlevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin];
				if(targetlevel > playerlevel) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You can not ban People that is higher Than You!");
   				if(giveplayerid != playerid && Untouchable[giveplayerid]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has exploded %s (%d).",sendername,giveplayer,giveplayerid);
				ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You have Successfuly Exploded %s's (%d)",giveplayer,giveplayerid);
				SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Administrator %s Has Exploded You",sendername);
				SCM(giveplayerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string);
				new Float:boomx, Float:boomy, Float:boomz;
				GetPlayerPos(giveplayerid,boomx, boomy, boomz);
				CreateExplosion(boomx, boomy , boomz, 7, 1);
			}
			else
			{
			    format(string, sizeof(string), "%d is not an active player.", giveplayerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, string);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You do not have permission to use that command!");
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You Must be logged in to use this command!");
	}
	LogCallback("explode");
	return 1;
}
CMD:burn(playerid, params[])//111
{
	LogCallback("burn");
	new string[128], giveplayer[24], sendername[24], giveplayerid;
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE:/burn [playrid]");
	GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
	GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		    {
		        new targetlevel = PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAdmin];
				new playerlevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin];
				if(targetlevel > playerlevel) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You can't burn a higher level admin then yourself");
   				if(giveplayerid != playerid && Untouchable[giveplayerid]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You can't burn this player!");
				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s burned %s (%d) down.",sendername,giveplayer,giveplayerid);
				ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You have Successfuly burned %s (%d) down.",giveplayer,giveplayerid);
				SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Administrator %s Has Burned You",sendername);
				SCM(giveplayerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string);
				new Float:boomx, Float:boomy, Float:boomz;
				GetPlayerPos(giveplayerid,boomx, boomy, boomz);
				CreateExplosion(boomx, boomy , boomz, 1, 1);
			}
			else
			{
			    format(string, sizeof(string), "%d is not an active player.", giveplayerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, string);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You do not have permission to use that command!");
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You Must be logged in to use this command!");
	}
	LogCallback("burn");
	return 1;
}

CMD:rtc(playerid, params)//117
{
	LogCallback("rtc");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			{
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cWcar] == i)
					{
						DestroyVehicle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
						return 1;
					}
					if(CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cOID] == i)
					{
						DestroyVehicle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
						CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cWcart] = 0;
						CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cOID] = -1;
						pCopCar[i] = -1;
						pEmsCar[i] = -1;
						return 1;
					}
				}
				new string[128], sendername[24];
				GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
				format(string, 256, "[ADMIN]: %s has just respawned vehicle id %d.",sendername,GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
				ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
				SetVehicleToRespawn(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
				LinkVehicleToInterior(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), 0);
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "** Vehicle Respawned !");
				new y, m, d;
				new h,mi,s;
				getdate(y,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Respawned their Car",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
				AdminLog(string);
				return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("rtc");
	return 1;
}
CMD:rrv(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_respawnrentvehs(playerid, params);
}
CMD:respawnrentvehs(playerid, params[])//119
{
	LogCallback("respawnrentvehs");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		    return 1;
		}
		new bool:unwanted[MAX_VEHICLES];
		for(new player=0; player<MAX_PLAYERS; player++)
   		{
           	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(player)) { unwanted[GetPlayerVehicleID(player)]=true; }
 		}
		for(new v = 0; v < sizeof(rentveh); v++)
		{
			if(!unwanted[v]) SetVehicleToRespawn(v);
		}
		new string[128], sendername[24];
		GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		format(string, sizeof(string), "SERVER: All unused rent cars respawned by %s.", sendername);
		BroadCast(COLOR_WHITE,string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has Respawned Rented Cars.", sendername);
		ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Respawned Rented Cars",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
		AdminLog(string);
	}
	LogCallback("respawnrentvehs");
	return 1;
}

CMD:vslap(playerid, params[])//121
{
	LogCallback("vslap");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new giveplayerid;
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /vslap [playerid/PartOfName]");
		new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >=3)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		    {
		        if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
		            if(GetPlayerState(giveplayerid) == 2)
		            {
						new giveplayer[24], sendername[24], string[128];
						GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
						GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
						GetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(giveplayerid), slx, sly, slz);
						SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(giveplayerid), slx, sly, slz+550);
						PlayerPlaySound(giveplayerid, 1130, slx, sly, slz);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Vehicle-Slapped %s (%d).", sendername, giveplayer, giveplayerid);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have Slapped %s's (%d) Vehicle!", giveplayer, giveplayerid);
						SCM(playerid,COLOR_ORANGE,string);
						SCM(giveplayerid,COLOR_NICERED,"*** You Got Vehicle Slapped!");
						GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "~r~Vehicle Slapped!",5000,3);
					}
					else
					{
					    SCM(playerid,COLOR_NICERED,"** Player is not driving a Vehicle!");
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command.");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("vslap");
	return 1;
}
CMD:supervehslap(playerid, params[])//122
{
	LogCallback("supervehslap");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new giveplayerid, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE:/supervehslap [PLAYERID}");
		new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >=4)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		    {
		        if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
		            if(GetPlayerState(giveplayerid) == 2)
		            {
						new sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
						GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
				        GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
						GetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(giveplayerid), slx, sly, slz);
						SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(giveplayerid), slx, sly, slz+1000);
						PlayerPlaySound(giveplayerid, 1130, slx, sly, slz+5);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Super Vehicle Slapped To %s (%d).",sendername, giveplayer,giveplayerid);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have Been Super Vehicle Slapped By Administrator %s",sendername);
						SCM(giveplayerid,COLOR_ORANGE,string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have Super Vehicle Slapped %s",giveplayer);
						SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
					}
					else
					{
					    SCM(playerid,COLOR_NICERED,"** Player is not driving a Vehicle!");
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command.");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("supervslap");
	return 1;
}
CMD:maskon(playerid, params[]) // by CuervO_NegrO, converted to ZCMD by Narcotic -123
{
	LogCallback("maskon");
	new string[128];
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
    	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMask] == 0)
   	 	{
   		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You don't have a mask");
   		    return 1;
   		}
   		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < 5)
    	{
       		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not able to use it.");
       		return 1;
    	}
  		foreach(Player, i)
		{
	    	if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
   	    	{
				if(PlayerInfo[i][pAdmin] < 1)
				{
					ShowPlayerNameTagForPlayer(i, playerid, 0);
				}
			}
		}
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] = 1;
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "** You have put your mask on [/maskoff to put it away].");
    	format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s puts a mask on.", GPN(playerid));
     	ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Mask ID: %d", playerid);
		MaskLabel[playerid] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(string,0xFFFFFFFF,0.0,0.0,0.0,50.0,playerid,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,1,-1,-1,-1,50.0);
	}
	LogCallback("maskon");
	return 1;
}
CMD:maskoff(playerid, params[]) // by CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 124
{
	LogCallback("maskoff");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
    	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMask] == 0)
    	{
       		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You don't have a mask");
       		return 1;
    	}
    	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < 5)
    	{
        	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not able to use it.");
        	return 1;
    	}
    	foreach(Player, i)
		{
	    	if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
    		{
	   			ShowPlayerNameTagForPlayer(i, playerid, 1);
			}
		}
		new string[128];
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] = 0;
		DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(Text3D:MaskLabel[playerid]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have put your mask off [/maskon to put it on].");
   		format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s puts a mask away.", GPN(playerid));
   		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	}
	LogCallback("maskoff");
	return 1;
}
CMD:hidenumber(playerid, params) // by LordMan converted to zcmd by Narcotic- 125
{
	LogCallback("hidenumber");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber] == 0)
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You don't have phone number to hide.");
	        return 1;
	    }
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] == 0)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You need to be Regular Player atleast lvl 1 to get this feature.");
		    return 1;
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pHideNumber] == 0)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "** Your number is hidden now.");
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pHideNumber] = 1;
			return 1;
		}
		else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pHideNumber] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "** Your number is public now.");
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pHideNumber] = 0;
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("hidenumber");
	return 1;
}
CMD:speaker(playerid, params[]) // by LordMan converted to zcmd by Narcotic-126
{
	LogCallback("speaker");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber] == 0)
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You do not have a phone.");
	        return 1;
	    }
	    if(Mobile[playerid] == 255)
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are not in a phone call.");
	        return 1;
	    }
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpeaker] == 0)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW2, "* Beep * Speaker is on.");
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpeaker] = 1;
			return 1;
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpeaker] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW2, "* Beep * Speaker is off.");
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpeaker] = 0;
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("speaker");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ds(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_doorshout(playerid, params);
}
CMD:doorshout(playerid, params[])// 127
{
	LogCallback("doorshout");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new result[128];
    	if(sscanf(params,"s[128]", result))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: (/ds)hout [local chat]");
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
			for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(HouseInfo); i++)
			{
				if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,HouseInfo[i][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancez]))
				{
        		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 1)
					{

						format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "Admin Shouts: %s !!", result);
						SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, tstring, COLOR_NICERED, 30.0, 8000);
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, tstring,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
					}
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0)
					{

						format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "Stranger Shouts: %s !!", result);
						SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, tstring, COLOR_WHITE, 30.0, 8000);
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, tstring,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
					}
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 0)
					{

						format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "%s Shouts: %s !!", GPN(playerid), result);
						SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, tstring, COLOR_WHITE, 30.0, 8000);
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, tstring,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
					}
				}
				foreach(Player, p)
				{
				    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(p, 60, HouseInfo[i][hExitx], HouseInfo[i][hExity], HouseInfo[i][hExitz]))
				    {
        				SCM(p, COLOR_FADE1,tstring);
						return 1;
				    }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("doorshout");
    return 1;
}
CMD:houseentrance(playerid, params[])//128
{
	LogCallback("houseentrance");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 5)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not Authorized to use this Command!");
			return 1;
		}
		new proplev;
		if(sscanf(params, "d", proplev)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "SYNTAX: /houseentrance [houseid] - Moves a house to you");
		if(proplev > sizeof(HouseInfo) || proplev < 0)
		{
		    SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"House ID must be above 0 and below 500");
		    return 1;
		}
		else
   		{
   		    if(proplev <= 1101)
     		{
				new string[128], sendername[24];
				format(string, sizeof(string),"* Teleported the House Entrance number %d To you. Use /edit and /setdesc to edit It.",proplev);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			    new Float:X,Float:Y,Float:Z;
			    GetPlayerPos(playerid,X,Y,Z);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]: %s Has Moved House: [%d]'s entrance to [%f - %f - %f].",sendername,proplev,X,Y,Z);
			    ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
				HouseInfo[proplev][hEntrancex] = X;
				HouseInfo[proplev][hEntrancey] = Y;
				HouseInfo[proplev][hEntrancez] = Z;
				SaveHouse(proplev, 1);
				OnPropTextdrawUpdate(1, proplev);
				OnHousePickupUpdate(proplev);
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"Cannot use Test Houses.");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("houseentrance");
	return 1;
}
CMD:houseexit(playerid, params[])//129
{
	LogCallback("houseexit");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 5)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not Authorized to use this Command!");
			return 1;
		}
		new proplev;
		if(sscanf(params, "i", proplev)) return	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "SYNTAX: /houseexit [houseid] - Moves a house to you");
		if(proplev > sizeof(HouseInfo) || proplev < 0)
		{
		    SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"House ID must be above 0 and below 500");
		    return 1;
		}
		else
  		{
   			if(proplev <= 500)
      		{
				new string[128], sendername[24];
	            format(string, sizeof(string),"* Teleported the House Exit number %d To you. Use /edit and /setdesc to edit It.",proplev);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			    new Float:X,Float:Y,Float:Z;
			    GetPlayerPos(playerid,X,Y,Z);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]: %s Has Moved House: [%d]'s exit to [%f - %f - %f].",sendername,proplev,X,Y,Z);
			    ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
				HouseInfo[proplev][hExitx] = X;
				HouseInfo[proplev][hExity] = Y;
				HouseInfo[proplev][hExitz] = Z;
				HouseInfo[proplev][hInt] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
				SaveHouse(proplev,2);
				new y, m, d;
				new h,mi,s;
				getdate(y,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername,sizeof(sendername));
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Moved the House: [%d]'s Exit to [%f - %f - %f]",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,proplev,X,Y,Z);
				PlaceLog(string);
				return 1;
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"Cannot use Test Houses.");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("houseexit");
	return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("bizentrance");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 5)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not Authorized to use this Command!");
			return 1;
		}
		new proplev;
		if(sscanf(params, "d", proplev)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "SYNTAX: /bizentrance [bizid] - Moves a biz to you");
		if(proplev > sizeof(HouseInfo) || proplev < 0)
		{
		    SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"Biz ID must be above 0 and below 30");
		    return 1;
		}
		else
		{
		    new Float:X,Float:Y,Float:Z, string[128], sendername[24];
		    GetPlayerPos(playerid,X,Y,Z);
		    GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername,sizeof(sendername));
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]: %s Has Moved Biz [%d] to [%f - %f - %f].",sendername,proplev,X,Y,Z);
		    ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			BizzInfo[proplev][bEntranceX] = X;
			BizzInfo[proplev][bEntranceY] = Y;
			BizzInfo[proplev][bEntranceZ] = Z;
			OnPropUpdate(2,proplev);
			OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, proplev);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Moved Biz [%d] to [%f - %f - %f]",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,proplev,X,Y,Z);
			PlaceLog(string);
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bizentrance");
	return 1;
}

	LogCallback("sbizentrance");
