CMD:use(playerid, params[]) // by Cuervo converted to ZCMD by Narcotic, 138
{
	LogCallback("use");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new x_nr[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", x_nr))
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /use [backpack, briefcase, nothing]");
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "TIP: \"nothing\" will remove the item from your body!");
			return 1;
		}
		if(strcmp(x_nr,"backpack",true) == 0)
		{
  			AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 3026);
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"briefcase",true) == 0)
		{
			AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1210);
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"nothing",true) == 0)
		{
		    RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,3);
		}
		else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Unknown item!");
	}
    LogCallback("use");
	return 1;
}
CMD:atcradio(playerid, params[]) // by Cuervo conveted to zcmd by Narcotic, 139
{
	LogCallback("atcradio");
	new string[128], sendername[24];
	GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername,sizeof(sendername));
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAtc] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2)
    {
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	    {
			new x_nr[24];
			if(sscanf(params, "s[24]", x_nr))
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /atcradio <on/off>");
				return 1;
			}
			if(strcmp(x_nr,"on",true) == 0)
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pAtcRadio] = 1;
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* ATC Radio is now ON");
			    foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
					{
					    new carid = GetPlayerVehicleID(i);
					    if(IsAPlane(carid) || IsAHeli(carid) || PlayerInfo[i][pAtcRadio] == 1)
					    {
	        				format(string, sizeof(string),"* ATC %s Is now on Duty and Ready to Serve You",sendername);
	        				SCM(i, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string);
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"off",true) == 0)
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pAtcRadio] = 0;
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* ATC Radio is now OFF");
			    foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
					{
					    new carid = GetPlayerVehicleID(i);
					    if(IsAPlane(carid) || IsAHeli(carid) || PlayerInfo[i][pAtcRadio] == 1)
					    {
	        				format(string, sizeof(string),"* ATC %s Is now off Duty and can no longer receive pilot messages",sendername);
	        				SCM(i, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string);
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Not authorized to use this command");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("atcradio");
	return 1;
}
CMD:givegun(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("givegun");
	new ammo, string[128], giveplayer[24], giveplayerid, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z;
	if(sscanf(params, "ud", giveplayerid, ammo)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /givegun [playerid/PartOfName] [amount]");
	if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pLevel] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't give weapons to a level 1.");
	if(ammo < 1) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTRED,"You cannot give someone less then 1 bullet.");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
	{
		if(!IsACop(giveplayerid) || PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDuty] == 0 || PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pMember] != 2)
		{
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] == 1)
					{
						format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has been fired for abusing /equip locker weapons", GPN(playerid));
						SCM(i, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
					}
				}
			}
			SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			ClearWepVariables(playerid);
			SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFFFFFF00);
			SetPlayerSkin(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel]);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pLeader] = 0;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have been fired for absuing the system.");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
	{
	    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    {
            GetPlayerPos(giveplayerid,x,y,z);
	        GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
            if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5, x, y, z))
            {
                SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** Player is not near you!");
                return 1;
            }
			new sammo = GetPlayerAmmo(playerid);
			new weapon = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid);
   			if(ammo > sammo)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You don't have so many bullets.");
				return 1;
			}
			if(weapon == 24)
			{
				new weapons[2];
				GetPlayerWeaponData(giveplayerid, 2, weapons[0], weapons[1]);
				if(weapons[0] != 22 && weapons[0] != 23)
				{
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(giveplayerid, weapon, ammo);
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
					new sendername[24];
					GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername,sizeof(sendername));
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1)
					{
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their weapon and hands it to %s with %d bullets.", sendername, giveplayer, ammo);
					}
					else
					{
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her weapon and hands it to %s with %d bullets.", sendername, giveplayer, ammo);
					}
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			        new wname[64],y1,m,d,h,mi,s;
					getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
					GetWeaponName(weapon, wname, sizeof(wname));
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /givegun %s %s %d",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer,wname,ammo);
					WeaponLog(string);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(giveplayerid, weapon, ammo);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
				new sendername[24];
				GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername,sizeof(sendername));
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1)
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their weapon and hands it to %s with %d bullets.", sendername, giveplayer, ammo);
				}
				else
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her weapon and hands it to %s with %d bullets.", sendername, giveplayer, ammo);
				}
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		        new wname[64],y1,m,d,h,mi,s;
				getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
				GetWeaponName(weapon, wname, sizeof(wname));
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /givegun %s %s %d",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer,wname,ammo);
				WeaponLog(string);

			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   Player is Offline!");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("givegun");
	return 1;
}
CMD:giverope(playerid, params[]) // by Cuervo converted to ZCMD by Narcotic, 140
{
	LogCallback("giverope");
	new string[128], giveplayer[24], sendername[24], giveplayerid;
	if(Rope[playerid] == 0)
    {
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "You don't have a rope to give!");
        return 1;
    }
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /give rope [playerid/PartOfName]");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
    {
        if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
        {
            if(ProxDetectorS(5, playerid, giveplayerid))
            {
                if(Rope[giveplayerid] > 4)
                {
                    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Player has enough ropes with him !");
                    return 1;
                }
                Rope[playerid]--;
                Rope[giveplayerid]++;
                GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
				GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername,sizeof(sendername));
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s hands a rope to %s.", sendername ,giveplayer);
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
            }
            else
            {
                SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Player is not near you !");
				return 1;
            }
        }
	}
	LogCallback("giverope");
	return 1;
}
/*
CMD:store(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("store");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new x_nr[24], dammount, string[128],y,m,d,h,mi,s;
		if(sscanf(params, "s[24]d", x_nr, dammount))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /store [name] [amount/ammo]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Available names: money, drugs, materials, weapon, weapon2, weapon3, weapon4, weapon5, weapon6");
			return 1;
		}
		if(dammount < 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "HOLD IT RIGHT THERE MR. THAT DOESNT MAKE ANY SENSE, YOU CAN'T STORE NEGATIVE!!!");
		if(strcmp(x_nr,"money",true) == 0)
		{
			new house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15, HouseInfo[house][hExitx],HouseInfo[house][hExity],HouseInfo[house][hExitz]))
			{
				if(dammount > GetPlayerCash(playerid))
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You don't have that much money on you");

				if(HouseInfo[house][hTakings] >= 100000)
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* The safe can only hold $100,000");

				if(HouseInfo[house][hTakings] + dammount >= 100000)
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* The safe can only hold $100,000");

				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -dammount);
				HouseInfo[house][hTakings] += dammount;
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out some cash and places it in the safe.", GPN(playerid)); }
				else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out some cash and places it in the safe.", GPN(playerid)); }
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /store money %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),dammount);
				CommandLog(string);
				SaveHouse(house,13);
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not in your House!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"materials",true) == 0)
		{
			new house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15, HouseInfo[house][hExitx],HouseInfo[house][hExity],HouseInfo[house][hExitz]))
			{
				if(dammount > PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats])
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You don't have so many Materials.");

				if(HouseInfo[house][hMaterials] >= 35000)
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You cannot exceed the 35000 Limit.");

				if(HouseInfo[house][hMaterials] + dammount >= 35000)
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You cannot exceed the 35000 Limit.");

				PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] -= dammount;
				HouseInfo[house][hMaterials] += dammount;
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their sack with materials and places it on the safe.", GPN(playerid)); }
				else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her sack with materials and places it on the safe.", GPN(playerid)); }
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /store materials %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),dammount);
				CommandLog(string);
				SaveHouse(house,18);
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not on your House!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"weapon",true) == 0)
		{
			new house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			new gunname[24];
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
			{
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] == 1)
						{
							format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has been fired for abusing /equip locker weapons", GPN(playerid));
							SCM(i, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
						}
					}
				}
				SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
				ClearWepVariables(playerid);
				SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 0);
				SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFFFFFF00);
				SetPlayerSkin(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel]);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pLeader] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have been fired for absuing the system.");
				return 1;
			}
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15, HouseInfo[house][hExitx],HouseInfo[house][hExity],HouseInfo[house][hExitz]))
			{
				new ammo = dammount;
				if(ammo > GetPlayerAmmo(playerid))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You don't have that much Ammo.");
					return 1;
				}
				new weapon = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid);
				GetWeaponName(weapon,gunname, sizeof(gunname));
				if(weapon != 0)
				{
					if(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon1] == 0)
					{
					    if(HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1] >= 25000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You cannot exceed the 25000 Limit.");
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						HouseInfo[house][hWeapon1] = weapon;
						HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1] = ammo;
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their %s and places it at their safe.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
						else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her %s and places it at her safe.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else if(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon1] == weapon)
					{
					    if(HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1] >= 25000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You cannot exceed the 25000 Limit.");
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1] += ammo;
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their %s and places it at their safe.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
						else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her %s and places it at her safe.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* This slot is taken by another weapon!");
					    return 1;
					}
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /store %s %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),weapon,ammo);
					WeaponLog(string);
					SaveHouse(house,19);
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* This slot is taken by another weapon!");
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Either deposit more ammo of the same weapon or load it up!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not in your House!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"weapon2",true) == 0)

						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						HouseInfo[house][hWeapon6] = weapon;
						HouseInfo[house][hAmmo6] = ammo;
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their %s and places it at their safe.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
						else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her %s and places it at her safe.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else if(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon6] == weapon)
					{
					    if(HouseInfo[house][hAmmo6] >= 25000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You cannot exceed the 25000 Limit.");
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						HouseInfo[house][hAmmo6] += ammo;
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their %s and places it at their safe.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
						else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her %s and places it at her safe.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* This slot is taken by another weapon!");
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Either deposit more ammo of the same weapon or load it up!");
					    return 1;
					}
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /store %s %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),weapon,ammo);
					WeaponLog(string);
					SaveHouse(house,24);
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You don't have any weapon in your hand!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not on your House!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("store");
    return 1;
}
CMD:load(playerid, params[])//148
{
	LogCallback("load");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new x_nr[24], result[128], string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[24]S[128]", x_nr, result))
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /load [name] [ammount]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Available names: drugs, materials, weapon, weapon2, weapon3, weapon4, weapon5, weapon6");
			return 1;
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"materials",true) == 0)
		{
			new house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15, HouseInfo[house][hExitx],HouseInfo[house][hExity],HouseInfo[house][hExitz]))
			{
			    if(isnull(result))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /load materials [amount]");
					format(string, sizeof(string),"* You have %d Materials at the Storage",HouseInfo[house][hMaterials]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
					return 1;
				}
				new dammount = strval(result);
				if(dammount < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot take less than 1");
				if(dammount > HouseInfo[house][hMaterials]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You don't have so many Materials.");
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] += dammount;
				HouseInfo[house][hMaterials] -= dammount;
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their sack with materials and places it on their backpack.", GPN(playerid)); }
				else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her sack with materials and places it on their backpack.", GPN(playerid)); }
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				new y1, m, d;
				new h,mi,s;
				getdate(y1,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /load materials %d",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), dammount);
				CommandLog(string);
				SaveHouse(house,18);
				return 1;
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not in your House!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"weapon",true) == 0)
		{
			new house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			new gunname[24];
			new weapon = HouseInfo[house][hWeapon1];
			GetWeaponName(weapon,gunname, sizeof(gunname));
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must be level 2 or higher to do this");
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15, HouseInfo[house][hExitx],HouseInfo[house][hExity],HouseInfo[house][hExitz]))
			{
			    if(isnull(result))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /load weapon [ammo]");
					format(string, sizeof(string),"* You have a %s with %d Bullets at the Slot 1",gunname, HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
					return 1;
				}
				new ammo = strval(result);
				if(ammo > HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1])
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " You don't have so much Ammo.");
					return 1;
				}
				if(ammo < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot take less than 1");
				if(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon1] != 0)
				{
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, ammo);
					if(ammo == HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1]) HouseInfo[house][hWeapon1] = 0;
					HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1] -= ammo;
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their %s and places it at their backpack.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
					else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her %s and places it at her backpack.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					new y1, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y1,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /load weapon %d (%s)",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),ammo,gunname);
					WeaponLog(string);
					SaveHouse(house,19);
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* There is nothing on this slot!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not on your House!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"weapon2",true) == 0)
		{
			new house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			new gunname[24];
			new weapon = HouseInfo[house][hWeapon2];
			GetWeaponName(weapon,gunname, sizeof(gunname));
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must be level 2 or higher to do this");
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15, HouseInfo[house][hExitx],HouseInfo[house][hExity],HouseInfo[house][hExitz]))
			{
			    if(isnull(result))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /load weapon2 [ammo]");
					format(string, sizeof(string),"* You have a %s with %d Bullets at the Slot 2",gunname, HouseInfo[house][hAmmo2]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
					return 1;
				}
    			new ammo = strval(result);
				if(ammo > HouseInfo[house][hAmmo2])
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You don't have so many Ammo.");
					return 1;
				}
				if(ammo < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot take less than 1");
				if(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon2] != 0)
				{
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, ammo);
					if(ammo == HouseInfo[house][hAmmo2]) HouseInfo[house][hWeapon2] = 0;
					HouseInfo[house][hAmmo2] -= ammo;
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their %s and places it at their backpack.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
					else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her %s and places it at her backpack.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					new y1, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y1,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /load weapon2 %d (%s)",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), ammo, gunname);
					WeaponLog(string);
					SaveHouse(house,20);
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* There is nothing on this slot!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not on your House!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"weapon3",true) == 0)
		{
			new house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			new gunname[24];
			new weapon = HouseInfo[house][hWeapon3];

					format(string, sizeof(string),"* You have a %s with %d Bullets at the Slot 3",gunname, HouseInfo[house][hAmmo3]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
					return 1;
				}
				new ammo = strval(result);
				if(ammo > HouseInfo[house][hAmmo3])
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You don't have so many Ammo.");
					return 1;
				}
				if(ammo < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot take less than 1");
				if(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon3] != 0)
				{
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, ammo);
					if(ammo == HouseInfo[house][hAmmo3]) HouseInfo[house][hWeapon3] = 0;
					HouseInfo[house][hAmmo3] -= ammo;
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their %s and places it at their backpack.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }

					return 1;

					return 1;

				{

					return 1;

					else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her %s and places it at her backpack.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					new y1, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y1,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /load weapon4 %d (%s)",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), ammo, gunname);
					WeaponLog(string);
					SaveHouse(house,22);
					return 1;

					else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her %s and places it at her backpack.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }

					getdate(y1,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /load weapon5 %d (%s)",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), ammo, gunname);
					WeaponLog(string);
					SaveHouse(house,23);
	                return 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* There is nothing on this slot!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not on your House!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}

		{
			new house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			new gunname[24];
			new weapon = HouseInfo[house][hWeapon6];
			GetWeaponName(weapon,gunname, sizeof(gunname));
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must be level 2 or higher to do this");

			{
			    if(isnull(result))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /load weapon6 [ammo]");
					format(string, sizeof(string),"* You have a %s with %d Bullets at the Slot 6",gunname, HouseInfo[house][hAmmo5]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
					return 1;
				}
				new ammo = strval(result);
				if(ammo > HouseInfo[house][hAmmo6])
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You don't have so many Ammo.");
					return 1;
				}
				if(ammo < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot take less than 1");
				if(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon6] != 0)
				{
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, ammo);
					if(ammo == HouseInfo[house][hAmmo6]) HouseInfo[house][hWeapon6] = 0;
					HouseInfo[house][hAmmo6] -= ammo;
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their %s and places it at their backpack.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
					else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her %s and places it at her backpack.", GPN(playerid),gunname); }
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					new y1,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /load weapon6 %d (%s)",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), ammo, gunname);
					WeaponLog(string);
					SaveHouse(house,24);
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* There is nothing on this slot!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not on your House!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("load");
    return 1;
}
CMD:storedrugs(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("storedrugs");
	if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must be connected to do this");

	new drug[24], amm, string[64];
	if(sscanf(params, "s[24]d", drug, amm)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /storedrugs [name][ammount] Names: seeds, bulkweed, weed, bulkcoke, cutcoke, coke, bulkcrack, crack");
	if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't store less than 1 drug");

	if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 50.0, HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hExitx], HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hExity], HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hExitz]))
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must be at your house in order to do this");

	if(strcmp(drug,"seeds",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7] -= amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][0] += amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have stored %d seeds in your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 27);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"bulkweed",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][0] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][0] -= amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][1] += amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have stored %d grams of bulk weed in your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 28);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"weed",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3] -= amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][2] += amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have stored %d grams of weed in your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 29);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"bulkcoke",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][1] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][1] -= amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][3] += amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have stored %d grams of weed in your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 30);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"cutcoke",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][6] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][6] -= amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][4] += amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have stored %d grams of weed in your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 31);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"coke",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] -= amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][5] += amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have stored %d grams of cut coke in your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 32);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"bulkcrack",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][2] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][2] -= amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][6] += amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have stored %d grams of bulk crack in your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 33);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"crack",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5] -= amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][7] += amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have stored %d grams of crack in your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 34);
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("storedrugs");
	return 1;
}

CMD:takedrugs(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("takedrugs");
	if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must be connected to do this");

	new
		amm,
		drug[24],
		string[64]
	;

	if(sscanf(params, "s[24]d", drug, amm))
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /takedrugs [name][ammount] Names: seeds, bulkweed, weed, bulkcoke, cutcoke, coke, bulkcrack, crack");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "___ DRUG INVENTORY ___");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Weed Seeds:   %d Seeds", HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][0]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Bulk Weed:    %d Grams", HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][1]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Usable Weed:  %d Grams", HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][2]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Raw Coke:     %d Grams", HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][3]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Cut Coke:     %d Grams", HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][4]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Usable Coke:  %d Grams", HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][5]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Bulk Crack:   %d Grams", HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][6]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Usable Crack: %d Grams", HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][7]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	}

	if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 50.0, HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hExitx], HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hExity], HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hExitz]))
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must be at your house in order to do this");


	if(strcmp(drug,"seeds",true) == 0)
	{
		if(HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][0] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't take less than 1 drug");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7] += amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][0] -= amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have taken %d seeds from your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 27);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"bulkweed",true) == 0)
	{
		if(HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][1] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't take less than 1 drug");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][0] += amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][1] -= amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have taken %d grams of bulk weed from your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 28);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"weed",true) == 0)
	{
		if(HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][2] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't take less than 1 drug");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3] += amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][2] -= amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have taken %d grams of weed from your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 29);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"bulkcoke",true) == 0)
	{
		if(HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][3] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't take less than 1 drug");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][1] += amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][3] -= amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have taken %d grams of weed from your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 30);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"cutcoke",true) == 0)
	{
		if(HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][4] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't take less than 1 drug");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][6] += amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][4] -= amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have taken %d grams of weed from your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 31);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"coke",true) == 0)
	{
		if(HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][5] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't take less than 1 drug");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] += amm;
		HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][5] -= amm;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have taken %d grams of cut coke from your safe", amm);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 32);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"bulkcrack",true) == 0)
	{
		if(HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hDrugs][6] < amm)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't take less than 1 drug");

		PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][2] += amm;

		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 33);
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(drug,"crack",true) == 0)
	{

			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much on you");

		if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't take less than 1 drug");

		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		SaveHouse(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], 34);
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("takedrugs");
	return 1;
}*/
CMD:dropdrugs(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("dropdrugs");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new
			drop = RandomEx(1,100),
			string[64]
		;
		switch(drop)
		{
			case 1 .. 25:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has tossed some drugs/or drug items", GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			}
			case 26 .. 50: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You have tossed all your drug and drug items, and were not noticed"); }
			case 51 .. 75:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has tossed some drugs/or drug items", GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			}
			case 76 .. 100: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You have tossed all your drug and drug items, and were not noticed"); }
		}
		for(new d = 0; d < 9; d++)
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][d] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][d] = 0;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("dropdrugs");
	return 1;
}




CMD:shownotes(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan converted to ZCMD by Narcotic, 153
{
	LogCallback("shownotes");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
    	if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
	    {
    	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    You need to login first ! ");
            return 1;
		}
		new string[128], sendername[24];
		GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "_____________Note Book_____________");
        format(string, sizeof(string), "1| %s", PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1]);
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "___________________________________");
        format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s looks at their/her notebook.", sendername);
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	}
	LogCallback("shownotes");
    return 1;
}
CMD:deletenote(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan,  rewrote and converted to ZCMD by Narcotic, 154
{
	LogCallback("deletenote");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
    	{
       		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    You need to login first ! ");
            return 1;
        }
		new nslot;
		if(sscanf(params, "i", nslot)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /deletenote [1]");
		if(nslot < 1 || nslot > 5) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "** Invalid slot id");
		if(nslot == 1)
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1s] == 1)
		    {
		    	strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1], "None", 0, strlen("None"), 255);
		    	PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1s] = 0;
		    	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Note (slot 1) has been deleted successfuly.");
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    You don't have a note in slot 1 ! ");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("deletenote");
    return 1;
}
CMD:createnote(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan converted to ZCMD by Narcotic, 155
{
	LogCallback("createnote");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
  		{
        	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    You need to login first ! ");
            return 1;
        }
		new result[60];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[60]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE:/createnote [TEXT]");
		if(strlen(result) > 60)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    Note is too long ! ");
		    return 1;
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1s] == 0)
		{
		    strmid(PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1], result, 0, strlen(result), 255);
		    PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1s] = 1;
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Note created successfuly.");
		    return 1;
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    You have no free pages left at your notebook ! ");
		    return 1;
		}
    }
	LogCallback("createnote");
	return 1;
}
CMD:givenote(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan converted to ZCMD by Narcotic, 156
{
	LogCallback("givenote");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
    	if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
        	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    You need to login first ! ");
            return 1;
        }
		new giveplayerid;
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/givenote [PLAYERID] [NOTEID]");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
		        new Float:Pos[3];
       			GetPlayerPos(giveplayerid,Pos[0],Pos[1],Pos[2]);
		        if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5, Pos[0], Pos[1], Pos[2]))
		        {
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    Player is not near you ! ");
		            return 1;
		        }
		        new nid, string[128];
				if(sscanf(params, "d", nid)) return	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /givenote [playerid/PartOfName] [note id]");
				if(nid < 1 || nid > 5) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "ERROR: Note ID must not be lower then 1 or greater them 5!");
				new sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
				GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
				if(nid == 1)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1s] == 1)
				    {
				        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pNote1s] == 0)
				        {
				            strmid(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pNote1], PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1], 0, strlen(PlayerInfo[playerid][pNote1]), 255);
				            PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pNote1s] = 1;
				            GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
				            format(string, sizeof(string), "You have send a note to [ID:%d] %s.", giveplayerid, giveplayer);
				            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				            format(string, sizeof(string), "You have received a note from [ID:%d] %s.", playerid, sendername);
				            SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        }
				        else
				        {
				            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    Player's notebook is full ! ");
				            return 1;
				        }
				    }
				    else
				    {
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "    You don't have a note at slot 1 ! ");
				        return 1;
				    }
				}
		    }
		}
	}
	LogCallback("givenote");
	return 1;
}

CMD:knock(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 161
{
	LogCallback("knock");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
    	for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(HouseInfo); i++)
		{
			if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,HouseInfo[i][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancez]))
			{
				new sendername[24], string[128];
				GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s knocks on a house door.", sendername);
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				foreach(Player, p)
				{
				    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(p, 60, HouseInfo[i][hExitx], HouseInfo[i][hExity], HouseInfo[i][hExitz]))
				    {
				        SCM(p, COLOR_PURPLE, "* Someone knocks on a house door.");
				    }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("givenote");
    return 1;
}
CMD:ready(playerid, params[])//175
{
	LogCallback("ready");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new
			weapon = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid),
			pstate = GetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid),
			pname[64], string[128]
		;
		GetPlayerName(playerid, pname, sizeof(pname));
		if(pstate != 1)
		{
			if(weapon != 0)
			{
				if(weapon == 22)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Colt 45 and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"COLT45", "colt45_reload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 23)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Silenced Colt 45 and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"SILENCED", "silence_reload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 24)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Desert Eagle and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"PYTHON", "python_reload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 25)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Shotgun and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BUDDY", "buddy_reload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 26)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Sawnoff Shotgun and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"COLT45", "sawnoff_reload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 27)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Combat Shotgun and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BUDDY", "buddy_reload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 28)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their MAC-10 and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"UZI", "uzi_reload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 29)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their MP5 and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"RIFLE", "RIFLE_load", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 30)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their AK-47 and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"RIFLE", "RIFLE_load", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 31)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their M4 and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"RIFLE", "RIFLE_load", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 32)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Tec-9 and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"TEC", "TEC_reload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 33)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Country Rifle and cocks the lever.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"RIFLE", "RIFLE_load", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 34)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Sniper Rifle and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"RIFLE", "RIFLE_load", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 35)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their RPG and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BUDDY", "buddy_reload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 10)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s strokes their Pleasure Stick.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BUDDY", "buddy_reload", 1.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if(weapon != 0)
			{
				if(weapon == 22)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Colt 45 and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"COLT45", "colt45_crouchreload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);

					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}

				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Desert Eagle and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"PYTHON", "python_crouchreload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 25)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Shotgun and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BUDDY", "buddy_crouchreload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);

					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"TEC", "TEC_crouchreload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);

					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 34)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their Sniper Rifle and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"RIFLE", "RIFLE_crouchload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 35)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s readies their RPG and flicks off the safety.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BUDDY", "buddy_crouchreload", 3.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
				else if(weapon == 10)
				{
					format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s strokes their Pleasure Stick.",pname);
					ApplyAnimation(playerid,"BUDDY", "buddy_reload", 1.0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				}
			}
		}
		new wname[64],y,m,d,h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
		GetWeaponName(weapon, wname, sizeof(wname));
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /ready %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),wname);
		MeDoReady(string);
	}
	LogCallback("ready");
	return 1;
}
CMD:clearrecord(playerid, params[]) // Moddded By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 176
{
	LogCallback("clearrecord");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid))
		{
			new giveplayerid;
			if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /clearrecord [playerid/PartOfName]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					new string[128], giveplayer[24], sendername[24];
					strmid(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPunishment1], "None", 0, strlen("None"), 255);
					GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Cleared %s (%d) Admin Record.", sendername, giveplayer, giveplayerid);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Cleared %s's Admin Record",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer);
					AdminLog(string);
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   No Such Player");
				return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an admin");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("clearrecord");
	return 1;
}
CMD:registered(playerid, params[]) // Edited by LordMan, orginally from CW-RP converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 178
{
	LogCallback("registered");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1)
    {
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not authorized");
	    return 1;
    }
	new giveplayerid;
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /registred [playerid/partOfName]");
	if (giveplayerid == INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
    {
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is offline");
	    return 1;
    }
	new y, m, d;
	new h,mi,s;
	new string[128];
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
	format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Checked %s's Registration Date",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid));
	AdminLog(string);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: Admistrator %s Has Checked %s (%d)'s Registration Date.", GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
	ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
    format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d) registred on %s", GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid, PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pRegistredDate]);
    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
	LogCallback("registered");
	return 1;
}
CMD:checkweapons(playerid, params[]) // Edited by LordMan, orginally from CW-RP converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 179
{
	LogCallback("checkweapons");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] < 1)
    {
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not authorized");
	    return 1;
    }
	new giveplayerid;
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /checkweapons [playerid/partOfName]");
	if (giveplayerid == INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
    {
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is offline");
	    return 1;
    }
	new sweapon, sammo, gunname[100];
	new y, m, d;
	new h,mi,s;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
	new sendername[24], giveplayer[24], string[128];
	GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
	GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
	format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Checked %s's Weapons",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer);
	AdminLog(string);
    GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
	format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: Admistrator %s Has Checked %s (%d)'s Weapons.", sendername,giveplayer, giveplayerid);
	ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
    format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d) has the following weapons:", giveplayer,giveplayerid);
    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
	for (new i=0; i<12; i++)
    {
	    GetPlayerWeaponData(giveplayerid, i, sweapon, sammo);
	    GetWeaponName(sweapon, gunname, sizeof(gunname));
	    if(sweapon != 0)
	    {
	        format(string, sizeof(string), "Slot %d:    %s    [ID: %d    Ammo: %d]", i, gunname,sweapon, sammo);
	    	SCM(playerid, TEAM_AZTE_COLOR, string);
		}
    }
	LogCallback("checkweapons");
	return 1;
}
CMD:resetammutimer(playerid, params[]) // By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 180
{
	LogCallback("resetammutimer");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1337)
    {
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not authorized");
	    return 1;
    }
	new giveplayerid;
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/resetammutimer [PLAYERID]");
	if (giveplayerid == INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
    {
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is offline");
	    return 1;
    }
	new string[128], sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
	GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
	GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
	PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAmmuTrainTime] = 0;
	format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: Admistrator %s Has Reseted %s (%d)'s Ammunation Timer..", sendername,giveplayer, giveplayerid);
	ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
    format(string, sizeof(string), "You have Reseted %s (%d)'s Ammu Waiting Timer.", giveplayer,giveplayerid);
    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
    SCM(giveplayerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, "** An Admin has reseted your Ammunation Training Waiting Time, You can now Train your Weapon Skill!");
	new Float:X, Float:Y, Float:Z;
	GetPlayerPos(giveplayerid, X,Y,Z);
	PlayerPlaySound(giveplayerid, 1056, X, Y, Z);
    new y, m, d;
	new h,mi,s;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
	format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Reseted %s's Ammu Tiemr",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer);
	AdminLog(string);
	LogCallback("resetammutimer");
	return 1;
}

    new y, m, d;

	gettime(h,mi,s);

	AdminLog(string);

	return 1;
