CMD:wi(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_windows(playerid, params);
}
CMD:windows(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 184
{
	LogCallback("windows");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "  You need to login first ! ");
            return 1;
        }
        new playercar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
        new sendername[24], string[128];
        GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
        if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
        {
			if(IsAPlane(playercar) || IsModelABike(playercar) || IsAHeli(playercar) || IsModelABoat(playercar) || IsModelASpecial(playercar))
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "  This vehicle doesn't have the window to roll");
			    return 1;
			}
            if(VehicleWindows[playercar] == 0)
            {
            	VehicleWindows[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)] = 1;
   				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s rolls down the window.", sendername);
   				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
   				return 1;
			}
			else if(VehicleWindows[playercar] == 1)
			{
			    VehicleWindows[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)] = 0;
   				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s rolls up the window.", sendername);
   				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				return 1;
			}
        }
        else
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You need to be in the vehicle to use this function !");
        }
    }
	LogCallback("windows");
    return 1;
}
CMD:engine(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("engine");
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		if(EngTimer[playerid] != -1) return 1;
		if(GetPlayerVehicleSeat(playerid) != 0) return 1;
		new
			Float:CHP,
			string[128],
			E,L,A,D,H,T,O,
			id = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)
		;
		GetVehicleHealth(id, CHP);

		if(CHP <= 350)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You vehicle is busted. /call 555 for a repair or have it towed.");

		if(Gas[id] <= 0)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are out of gas. /call 555 for a refuel or have it towed to a gas station.");

		if(IsModelABycicle(id))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Bicycles do not have engines.");

		GetVehicleParamsEx(id,E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		if(E == 1)
		{
			SetVehicleParamsEx(id,0,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s spins the vehicle key and turns off the engine.", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* Vehicle engine off (( %s )).", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
		else
		{
			if(CarInfo[id][cUid] == playerid || HotWired[playerid] == id || ExtraKey[playerid] == id || CarInfo[id][cWcar] == playerid || CanTurnEngine[playerid] == id || HireCar[playerid] == id || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && IsACopCar(id) || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && IsAEmsCar(id))
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s spins the vehicle key and starts the engine.", GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				EngTimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("EngineStart", 3500, false, "d", playerid);
			}
			else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You do not have the keys to this vehicle. However, you may attempt to /hotwire it");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("engine");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ad(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("ad");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You havent logged in yet !");
            return 1;
        }
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
			return 1;
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailed] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot use this right now. Kappa.");
			return 1;
		}
		new result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: (/ad)vertise [advert text]");
		if ((!adds) && (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1))
		{
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "** Please try again later %d seconds between Advertisements !",  (addtimer/1000));
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, tstring);
			return 1;
		}
		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -50);
		format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "AD: %s, contact %s (Phone: %d)",  result, GPN(playerid) ,PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber]);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_ORANGE,tstring);
		GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Advertisement ~n~~w~Price:~g~$50", 4321,1);
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1){SetTimer("AddsOn", addtimer, 0);adds = 0;}
		new y,m,d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "[%d/%d/%d](%d:%d:%d) %s (Advertisement): %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid), result);
		ChatLog(cstring);
  	}
	LogCallback("ad");
	return 1;
}
CMD:aduty(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_adminduty(playerid, params);
}
CMD:adminduty(playerid, params[]) // shit made by lordman then ruined by curevo and fixed, converted and optimized by Narcotic.
{
	LogCallback("adminduty");
	new string[128], sendername[24];
	if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
	{
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You need to login first !");
        return 1;
    }
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1)
    {
       	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0)
        {
	    	PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] = 1;
			GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
			SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFF66FF00);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]: %s is now on Admin Duty", sendername);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 1);
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
			{
				for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(CarInfo); i++)
				{
					SetVehicleParamsForPlayer(i,playerid,0,0);
               	}
			}
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
			{
				SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFF000000); // Senior Admin Colour (Dark Red)
				new Float:AX,Float:AY,Float:AZ;
				GetPlayerPos(playerid, AX,AY,AZ);
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, AX,AY,AZ+1);
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 99999);
				SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 99999);
			}
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
			{
				SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 42, 10000);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 39, 10000);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 38, 10000);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 34, 10000);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 31, 10000);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 29, 10000);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 27, 10000);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 24, 10000);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 40, 1);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 10, 1);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 9, 1);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_PISTOL, 1000);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_PISTOL_SILENCED, 1000);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_DESERT_EAGLE, 1000);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_SHOTGUN, 1000);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_SAWNOFF_SHOTGUN, 1000);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_SPAS12_SHOTGUN, 1000);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_MICRO_UZI, 1000);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_MP5, 1000);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_AK47, 1000);
				SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_M4, 1000);
			}
			return 1;
      	}
      	else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 1)
	  	{
			SetPlayerHealth(playerid,100);
			SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid,100);
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
			{
       			if(Spectate[playerid] == 255)
			    {
				    SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
				    SetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
				}
			    SetPlayerSkills(playerid);
			}
            GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
			Delete3DTextLabel(DutyLabel[playerid]);
	        PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] = 0;
			new Float:X,Float:Y,Float:Z;
			GetPlayerPos(playerid, X,Y,Z);
			SetPlayerPos(playerid, X,Y,Z+1);
			SetPlayerToTeamColor(playerid);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]: %s is now off Admin Duty", sendername);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 1);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /adminduty",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
			AdminCommandLog(string);
			return 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
	   	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You're not an admin !");
	   	return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("adminduty");
    return 1;
}
CMD:tduty(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_testerduty(playerid, params);
}
CMD:testerduty(playerid, params[])// shit made by lordman then ruined by curevo and fixed, converted and optimized by Narcotic.
{
	LogCallback("testerduty");
	new string[128], sendername[24];
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You need to login first !");
	    }
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTester] >= 1)
	    {
         	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTesterDuty] == 0)
	        {
				GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pTesterDuty] = 1;
				SetPlayerColor(playerid,0x00660000);
				format(string, sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]: %s is now on Tester Duty", sendername);
				SendTesterAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
				DutyLabel[playerid] = Create3DTextLabel("Tester On Duty \n Do NOT Attack",0x00AA0099,0,0,0,50,-1,1);
				Attach3DTextLabelToPlayer(DutyLabel[playerid], playerid, 0,0,0);
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTester] == 2)
				{
				    for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(CarInfo); i++)
					{
						SetVehicleParamsForPlayer(i,playerid,0,0);
                       }
				}
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTester] == 2)
				{
					SetPlayerColor(playerid,0x00880000); // Senior Tester Colour (Dark Red)
				}
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTester] == 3)
				{
					SetPlayerColor(playerid,0x00AA0000); // Dark Green
				}
				return 1;
	        }
	        else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTesterDuty] == 1)
	        {
	            Delete3DTextLabel(DutyLabel[playerid]);
	            PlayerInfo[playerid][pTesterDuty] = 0;
	            SetPlayerToTeamColor(playerid);
				format(string, sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]: %s is now off Tester Duty", sendername);
				SendTesterAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
				new y, m, d;
				new h,mi,s;
				getdate(y,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /testerduty",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
				AdminLog(string);
				return 1;
	        }
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You're not a tester !");
	        return 1;
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("testerduty");
    return 1;
}
CMD:togconnection(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("togconnection");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
	    if(TogConnection[playerid] == 0)
	    {
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"You have toggled off the incoming and outgoing server connection messages!");
			TogConnection[playerid] = 1;
		}
		else if(TogConnection[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"You have toggled on the incoming and outgoing server connection messages!");
			TogConnection[playerid] = 1;
		}
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are not a staff member!");
	LogCallback("togconnection");
	return 1;
}
CMD:searchwallet(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 187
{
	LogCallback("searchwallet");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You need to login first !");
			return 1;
		}
		new giveplayerid;
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: /searchwallet [playerid/PartOfName]");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
		        if(PlayerTied[giveplayerid] != 1)
		        {
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "   Player must be tied to search their wallet ! ");
		            return 1;
		        }
		        else if(ProxDetectorS(5.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
		        {
					new string[128];
		            format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has %d$ at their wallet.", GPN(giveplayerid), GetPlayerCash(giveplayerid));
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, string);
		            return 1;
		        }
		        else
		        {
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Player is not near you !");
		            return 1;
		        }
		    }
		}
    }
	LogCallback("searchwallet");
    return 1;
}
CMD:sid(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 189
{
	LogCallback("sid");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You need to login first !");
        }
		new giveplayerid;
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: /sid [playerid/PartOfName]");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
		        if(ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
		        {
					new string[128], giveplayer[24], sendername[24];
					GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
                    format(string, sizeof(string), "   You have shown your ID to %s.", giveplayer);
            		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
            		SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_GREEN, "_______________________");
            		format(string, sizeof(string), "   Name: %s   Age: %d", sendername, PlayerInfo[playerid][pAge]);
            		SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
            		format(string, sizeof(string), "   Phone: %d  Passport: %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber],PlayerInfo[playerid][pPassport]);
            		SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
            		SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_GREEN, "_______________________");
            		format(string, sizeof(string), "   %s has shown you their ID.", sendername);
            		SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
            		return 1;
		        }
		    }
		}
    }
	LogCallback("sid");
    return 1;
}



CMD:smoke(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 194
{
	LogCallback("smoke");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You need to login first !");
            return 1;
        }
        if(IsSmoking[playerid] == 0)
        {
            if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLighter] == 0)
            {
                SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You don't have a lighter to light up your cigarette ! ");
				return 1;
			}
            if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pCigarettes] == 0)
            {
                SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You don't have a cigarette to smoke ! ");
                return 1;
            }
            new randsmoke = random(2)+1;
			if(randsmoke == 1)
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pLighter] -= 1;
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pCigarettes] -= 1;
			    new sendername[24], string[128];
			    GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1)
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out his lighter and cigarette and lights it up.", sendername);
				}
				else
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her lighter and cigarette and lights it up.", sendername);
				}
			    ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			    IsSmoking[playerid] = 60;
                SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "TIP: You will Loose your Cigarrete after 10 Smokes, You can Drop it by Pressing 'F' or 'Enter' !");
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "TIP: You can use /smokeanim if you want to.");
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_SMOKE_CIGGY);
			}
			else
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pLighter] -= 1;
				new sendername[24], string[128];
			    GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1)
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out their lighter and cigarette and tries to light it up but fails.", sendername);
					new playerState = GetPlayerState(playerid);
    				if (playerState != PLAYER_STATE_PASSENGER || playerState != PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER)
    				{
    					UsingSmokeAnim[playerid] = 1;
	            		ApplyAnimation(playerid,"SMOKING", "M_smklean_loop", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					}
				}
				else
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out her lighter and cigarette and tries to light it up but fails.", sendername);
				}
   				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are already smoking ! ");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("smoke");
	return 1;
}
CMD:dropcigarette(playerid, params[]) // By LordMan converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 195
{
	LogCallback("dropcigarette");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You need to login first !");
            return 1;
        }
        if(IsSmoking[playerid] > 0)
        {
			new string[128], sendername[24];
			GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
			IsSmoking[playerid] = 0;
            if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a cigarette from his mouth and drops it on the ground.", sendername); }
            else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a cigarette from her mouth and drops it on the ground.", sendername); }
            ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
            if(UsingSmokeAnim[playerid] == 1)
            {
                SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
            }
        }
        else
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not even smoking ! ");
            return 1;
        }
	}
	LogCallback("dropciggarette");
	return 1;
}


CMD:o(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_ooc(playerid, params);
}
CMD:ooc(playerid, params[])// By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 210
{
	LogCallback("ooc");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You havent logged in yet !");
            return 1;
        }
		if (
		(noooc) && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] == 0)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "** The OOC channel has been disabled by an Admin !");
			return 1;
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
			return 1;
		}
		new result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: (/o)oc [OOC chat]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] >= 1)
		{
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "[[%s %s: %s ]]", GetAdminRank(playerid),GPN(playerid), result);
		}
		else
		{
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "(( %s: %s ))",GPN(playerid), result);
		}
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(HideOOC[i] != 1)
				{
					SendCustomPlayerMessage(i, COLOR_WHITE, tstring);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("ooc");
	return 1;
}
CMD:noooc(playerid, params[])//211
{
	LogCallback("noooc");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 && (!noooc) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			noooc = 1;
			new string[128], sendername[24];
			GPN(playerid);
			BroadCast(COLOR_NICERED, "** OOC chat channel disabled by an Admin !");
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Disabled the OOC", sendername);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
			return 1;
		}
		else if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 && (noooc))
		{
			noooc = 0;
			new string[128], sendername[24];
			GPN(playerid);
			BroadCast(TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, "** OOC chat channel enabled by an Admin !");
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Enabled the OOC", sendername);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("noooc");
	return 1;
}
CMD:nonewbie(playerid, params[])//212
{
	LogCallback("nonewbie");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 && (!nonewbie) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			nonewbie = 1;
			new string[128], sendername[24];
			GPN(playerid);
			BroadCast(COLOR_NICERED, "** Newbie chat channel disabled by an Admin !");
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Disabled the Newbie Chat", sendername);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
			return 1;
		}
		else if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 && (nonewbie))
		{
			nonewbie = 0;
			new string[128], sendername[24];
			GPN(playerid);
			BroadCast(TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, "** Newbie chat channel enabled by an Admin !");
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Enabled the Newbie Chat", sendername);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("nonewbie");
	return 1;
}
CMD:bk(playerid, params[])//113
{
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1)
			    return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are banned From Cop Duty!");

			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0)
			   return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You aren't on duty!");

			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRequestingBackup] != 1)
			{
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pRequestingBackup] = 1;
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
					{
						if(IsACop(i))
						{
						    if(PlayerInfo[i][pDuty] == 1)
						    {
								new string[128];
								format(string, sizeof(string), "ALL UNITS: %s is requesting immediate assistance, they have been marked on the map (yellow).", GPN(playerid));
								SetPlayerMarkerForPlayer(i, playerid, COLOR_YELLOW);
								SCM(i, TEAM_BLUE_COLOR, string);
								format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s reaches to their radio pressing their beacon.", GPN(playerid));
								SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE, 20.0, 8000);
							}
						}
					}
				}
				SCM(playerid, TEAM_BLUE_COLOR, "Type /bkc to clear your backup request.");
				return 1;
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You already have an active backup request!");
				return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not a cop!");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

CMD:bkc(playerid, params[])//114
{
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are banned From Cop Duty!");
		return 1;
	}
	BackupClear(playerid, 0);
	return 1;
}



//-------------------------------[Pay]--------------------------------------------------------------------------
CMD:pay(playerid, params[])//modified so that level 1 players can't /pay over 1000 dollars(prevents money farming-- Narcotic //118
{
	LogCallback("pay");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new giveplayerid, moneys, playermoney;
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", giveplayerid, moneys)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /pay [playerid/PartOfName] [amount]");
		if (IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
				if (ProxDetectorS(5.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
				{
				    if(giveplayerid == playerid)
				    {
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You can not pay for yourself !");
						return 1;
				    }
				    new y,m,d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					new string[128], sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
					GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
					playermoney = GetPlayerCash(playerid);
					if (moneys > 0 && playermoney >= moneys)
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] >= 2)
						{
							SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, (0 - moneys));
							SafeGivePlayerMoney(giveplayerid, moneys);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have sent %s(player: %d), $%d.", giveplayer,giveplayerid, moneys);
							PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have recieved $%d from %s(player: %d).", moneys, sendername, playerid);
							SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s has paid $%d to %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s, sendername, moneys, giveplayer);
							PayLog(string);
						}
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] == 1 && moneys > 1000)
						{
						    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " Level One Players Can't Pay More then 1000 at a time!");
						}
						if(moneys >= 1000000)
						{
						    format(string, sizeof(string),"[PETER]: %s (%d) Has Paid $%d To %s (%d).", sendername, playerid, moneys, giveplayer, giveplayerid);
							SendAdminMessage(COLOR_YELLOW,string);
						}
						PlayerPlaySound(giveplayerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out some cash, and hands it to %s.", sendername ,giveplayer);
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
						ApplyAnimation(playerid,"DEALER","shop_pay",4.1,0,0,0,0,0);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   Invalid transaction amount.");
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   Your too far away.");
				}
			}//invalid id
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "Not an Active Player");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("pay");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buyflying(playerid, params[])//220
{
	LogCallback("buyflying");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
   	{
   	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPassport] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You need a passport before having any license!!");
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,1490.3195,1305.6976,1093.2964))
       	{
           	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFlyLic] == 0)
			{
			    if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < 10500)
			    {
           		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You don't have enough money for a flying license");
           		}
           		else
           		{
           			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You bought a flying license for $10, 500");
           			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 10500);
           			PlayerInfo[playerid][pFlyLic] = 1;
          			OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
           		}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, " You already own a flying license");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buyflying");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buysailing(playerid, params[])//221
{
	LogCallback("buysailing");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
   	{
   	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPassport] == 0)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You need a passport before having any license!!");

		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,1490.3195,1305.6976,1093.2964))
       	{
           	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pBoatLic] == 0)
			{
			    if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < 5500)
			        return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You don't have enough money for a sailing license");

				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You bought a boat license for $5, 500");
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 5500);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pBoatLic] = 1;
				OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, " You already own a boat license");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buysailing");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buygun(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("buygun");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't own weapons until you are a level 2");
        if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You dont have enough money with you !");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGunLic] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You dont have a Legal Weapon License With you!");
		if(IsACop(playerid) && PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You can't buy weapons while on duty!");
		new gun, gunid[16], melee[128], pistols[128], shotguns[128], rifles[128], infostring[128], guncharge, ammocharge, ammo, string[128];
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10, 314.2548,-133.6627,999.6016) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,311.9589,-166.1407,999.6010))
		{
			new mod2 = 100;
			if(sscanf(params, "s[16]d", gunid, ammo))
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "USAGE: /buygun [gunname] [ammoamount]");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN,"_______________________________________");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE,"*** Guns & Ammo ***");
				SCM(playerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR,string);
   				format(melee, 256, "Melee: parachute ($%d) golfclub ($%d) nightstick ($%d) baseballbat ($%d) shovel ($%d) poolcue ($%d)",
				GunPrice[0][0]/100*mod2,GunPrice[1][0]/100*mod2,GunPrice[2][0]/100*mod2,GunPrice[3][0]/100*mod2,GunPrice[4][0]/100*mod2,GunPrice[5][0]/100*mod2,GunPrice[6][0]/100*mod2);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, melee);
				format(pistols, 256, "Pistols: silenced ($%d) deagle ($%d) colt ($%d)", GunPrice[13][0]/100*mod2,GunPrice[15][0]/100*mod2,GunPrice[14][0]/100*mod2);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, pistols);
				format(shotguns, 256, "Shotguns: shotgun ($%d)", GunPrice[19][0]/100*mod2);
                SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, shotguns);
				format(rifles, 256, "Rifles: country ($%d)", GunPrice[24][0]/100*mod2);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, rifles);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Other: ammo($20-75) || /buyarmour ($1250) || /buyspray ($500)");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN,"_______________________________________");
				return 1;
			}
			new CurrentWeapon = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid);
			if(ammo < 1 || ammo > 250) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Ammo ammount not lower then 1 or higher then 500 !"); return 1;}
			else if (strcmp(gunid, "parachute", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 46;guncharge = GunPrice[0][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = 0;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "golfclub", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 2; guncharge = GunPrice[1][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = 0;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "nightstick", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 3; guncharge = GunPrice[2][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = 0;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "baseballbat", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 5; guncharge = GunPrice[4][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = 0;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "shovel", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 6; guncharge = GunPrice[5][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = 0;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "poolcue", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 7; guncharge = GunPrice[6][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = 0;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "flowers", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 14; guncharge = GunPrice[11][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = 0;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "cane", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 15; guncharge = GunPrice[12][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = 0;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "silenced", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 23; guncharge = GunPrice[13][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = GunPrice[31][0]*ammo;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "deagle", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{
				new weapons[2];
				GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, 2, weapons[0], weapons[1]);
				if(weapons[0] != 22 && weapons[0] != 23)
				{
			        gun = 24; guncharge = GunPrice[15][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = GunPrice[32][0]*ammo;
				}
				else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Stop trying to exploit");
			}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "shotgun", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 25; guncharge = GunPrice[19][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = GunPrice[27][0]*ammo;}

			else if (strcmp(gunid, "country", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{ gun = 33; guncharge = GunPrice[24][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = GunPrice[30][0]*ammo;}


			else if (strcmp(gunid, "colt", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{
				gun = 22; guncharge = GunPrice[14][0]/100*mod2; ammocharge = GunPrice[26][0]*ammo;

			}

			else if(strcmp(gunid, "ammo", true, strlen(gunid)) == 0)
			{
				switch(CurrentWeapon)
				{
					case 1 .. 18:{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"You can't get ammo for that weapon!"); return 1; }
					case 22:{ gun = 0; guncharge = 0; ammocharge = GunPrice[26][0]*ammo;}
					case 23:{ gun = 0; guncharge = 0; ammocharge = GunPrice[31][0]*ammo;}
					case 24:{ gun = 0; guncharge = 0; ammocharge = GunPrice[32][0]*ammo;}
					case 25:{ gun = 0; guncharge = 0; ammocharge = GunPrice[27][0]*ammo;}
					case 26:{ gun = 0; guncharge = 0; ammocharge = GunPrice[33][0]*ammo;}
					case 27 .. 32:{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"You can't get ammo for that weapon!"); return 1; }
					case 33:{ gun = 0; guncharge = 0; ammocharge = GunPrice[30][0]*ammo;}
					case 34 .. 46:{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"You can't get ammo for that weapon!"); return 1; }
				}
			}
			else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "StoreKeeper: Sorry, I've never heard of such an item"); return 1;}
			if((guncharge+ammocharge) > GetPlayerCash(playerid))
			{
				format(infostring, 256, "** You don't have $%d !",guncharge+ammocharge);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, infostring);
				return 1;
			}
			if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < (guncharge+ammocharge))
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Can't afford that !");
			    return 1;
			}
			new payout = guncharge + ammocharge;
			format(infostring, 256, "** You have purchased %s with %d ammo for $%d",gunid,ammo,payout);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, infostring);
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - payout);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			if(gun != 0)
			{
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, gun, ammo);
			}
			else
			{
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, CurrentWeapon, ammo);
			}
			BizzInfo[BizzEntered[playerid]][bTill] += payout / 2;
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /buygun %s %d ($%d)",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), gunid, ammo, payout);
			PayLog(string);
		}
		else{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE,"You are not in a store."); return 1; }
	}
	LogCallback("buygun");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buyfishing(playerid, params[])//223
{
	LogCallback("buyfishing");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
   	{
   	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPassport] == 0)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You need a passport before having any license!!");

		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,3,383.4235,-2088.2471,7.8359))
       	{
           	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFishLic] == 0)
			{
			    if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < 1000)
			    {
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You don't have enough money for a fishing license");
			    }
			    else
			    {
           			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You bought a fishing license for $1,000");
           			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 1000);
           			PlayerInfo[playerid][pFishLic] = 1;
           			OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
           		}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, " You already own a fishing license");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buyfishing");
	return 1;
}
CMD:stats(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("stats");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] != 0)
		{
   			ShowStats(playerid,playerid);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "You are not Logged in!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("stats");
	return 1;
}
CMD:rentveh(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("rentveh");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) <  50)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You dont have that much cash!");

		if(HireCar[playerid] != 299)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You need unrent your current car/bike/boat first !");

		if(!IsARentableVeh(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You can't rent this vehicle.");

		if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_PINK, "Brilliant. You're trying to rent a vehicle, and you're not even in a rental car. BRILLIANT!");

		foreach(Player, i)
		{
		    if(HireCar[i] == GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid))
		        return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Someone already rents this car !");
		}
		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-50);
		HireCar[playerid] = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		rentaltimer[playerid] = defer RentalCars(playerid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "___________.:RENTAL VEHICLE:.___________");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "This vehicle has been rented to you for one hour.");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Remember to /unrentveh if you are done with it before then.");
		EngineStart(playerid);
	}
	LogCallback("rentveh");
	return 1;
}
CMD:attachweapon(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("attachweapon");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		switch(GetPlayerWeapon(playerid))
		{
			case 0,1,6,9,14,36,37,38,39,43,46,40: return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You can't attach this weapon!");
			default: return AttachWeaponCorrectly(playerid, GetPlayerWeapon(playerid));
		}
	}
	LogCallback("attachweapon");
	return 1;
}
CMD:deattachweapon(playerid, params[])//233
{
	LogCallback("deattachweapon");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		AttachWeaponCorrectly(playerid, 99);
	}
	LogCallback("deattachweapon");
	return 1;
}

CMD:checksafe(playerid, params[])//236
{
	LogCallback("checksafe");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new
			string[128],
			house = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey],
			gunname[24],
			gunname1[24],
			gunname2[24],
			gunname3[24],
			gunname4[24],
			gunname5[24]
		;
        GetWeaponName(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon1],gunname, sizeof(gunname));
        GetWeaponName(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon2],gunname1, sizeof(gunname1));
        GetWeaponName(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon3],gunname2, sizeof(gunname2));
        GetWeaponName(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon4],gunname3, sizeof(gunname3));
        GetWeaponName(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon5],gunname4, sizeof(gunname4));
        GetWeaponName(HouseInfo[house][hWeapon6],gunname5, sizeof(gunname5));
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 50, HouseInfo[house][hExitx],HouseInfo[house][hExity],HouseInfo[house][hExitz]))
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string),"-HOUSE STORAGE- You have $%d in your house safe",HouseInfo[house][hTakings]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"-HOUSE STORAGE- You have %d Materials.", HouseInfo[house][hMaterials]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"-HOUSE STORAGE- Weapon 1 - %s Ammo: %d.",gunname,HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"-HOUSE STORAGE- Weapon 2 - %s Ammo: %d.",gunname1,HouseInfo[house][hAmmo2]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"-HOUSE STORAGE- Weapon 3 - %s Ammo: %d.",gunname2,HouseInfo[house][hAmmo3]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"-HOUSE STORAGE- Weapon 4 - %s Ammo: %d.",gunname3,HouseInfo[house][hAmmo4]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"-HOUSE STORAGE- Weapon 5 - %s Ammo: %d.",gunname4,HouseInfo[house][hAmmo5]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"-HOUSE STORAGE- Weapon 6 - %s Ammo: %d.",gunname5,HouseInfo[house][hAmmo6]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not Logged in!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("checksafe");
	return 1;
}
CMD:taketest(playerid, params[])//237
{
	LogCallback("taketest");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3.0, 358.2374,161.3243,1008.3828))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "* You are not in the city hall!");

		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPassport] == 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already have a passport!");

		PPW_A[playerid] = 0;
		PPQ_Q[playerid] = 1;
		passportquiz(playerid);
	}
	LogCallback("taketest");
	return 1;
}
CMD:down(playerid, params[])//240
{
	LogCallback("down");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1)
		{
			new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
			GetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly, slz);
		    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		    {
		        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),slx,sly,slz-2);
			}
			else
			{
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly, slz-2);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an Admin !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("down");
	return 1;
}
CMD:up(playerid, params[])//241
{
	LogCallback("up");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
		    new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
			GetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly, slz);
		    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		    {
		        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),slx,sly,slz+2);
			}
			else
			{
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly, slz+2);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an Admin !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("up");
	return 1;
}
CMD:fly(playerid, params[])//242
{
	LogCallback("fly");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
			new Float:px, Float:py, Float:pz, Float:pa;
			GetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,pa);
			GetPlayerPos(playerid, px, py, pz);
			if(pa >= 0.0 && pa <= 22.5) //n1
			{
			    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			    {
			        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),px,py+30,pz+5);
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, px, py+30, pz+5);
				}
			}
			if(pa >= 332.5 && pa < 0.0) //n2
			{
				if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			    {
			        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),px,py+30,pz+5);
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, px, py+30, pz+5);
				}
			}
			if(pa >= 22.5 && pa <= 67.5) //nw
			{
				if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			    {
			        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),px-15,py+15,pz+5);
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, px-15, py+15, pz+5);
				}
			}
			if(pa >= 67.5 && pa <= 112.5) //w
			{
				if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			    {
			        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),px-30,py,pz+5);
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, px-30, py, pz+5);
				}
			}
			if(pa >= 112.5 && pa <= 157.5) //sw
			{
				if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			    {
			        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),px-15,py-15,pz+5);
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, px-15, py-15, pz+5);
				}
			}
			if(pa >= 157.5 && pa <= 202.5) //s
			{
				if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			    {
			        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),px,py-30,pz+5);
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, px, py-30, pz+5);
				}
			}
			if(pa >= 202.5 && pa <= 247.5)//se
			{
				if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			    {
			        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),px+15,py-15,pz+5);
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, px+15, py-15, pz+5);
				}
			}
			if(pa >= 247.5 && pa <= 292.5)//e
			{
				if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			    {
			        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),px+30,py,pz+5);
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, px+30, py, pz+5);
				}
			}
			if(pa >= 292.5 && pa <= 332.5)//e
			{
				if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
			    {
			        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),px+15,py+15,pz+5);
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, px+15, py+15, pz+5);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an Admin !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("fly");
	return 1;
}
CMD:left(playerid, params[])//243
{
	LogCallback("left");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
			new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
			GetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly, slz);
		    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		    {
		        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),slx,sly+2,slz);
			}
			else
			{
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly+2, slz);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an Admin !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("left");
	return 1;
}
CMD:right(playerid, params[])//244
{
	LogCallback("right");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
			new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
			GetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly, slz);
		    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		    {
		        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),slx,sly-2,slz);
			}
			else
			{
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly-2, slz);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an Admin !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("right");
	return 1;
}
CMD:forw(playerid, params[])//245
{
	LogCallback("forw");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
			new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
			GetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly, slz);
		    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		    {
		        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),slx+2,sly,slz);
			}
			else
			{
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, slx+2,sly, slz);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an Admin !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("forw");
	return 1;
}
CMD:back(playerid, params[])//246
{
	LogCallback("back");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
			new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
			GetPlayerPos(playerid, slx, sly, slz);
		    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		    {
		        SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),slx-2,sly,slz);
			}
			else
			{
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, slx-2, sly, slz);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an Admin !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("back");
	return 1;
}
CMD:changename(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("changename");
	if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3, 358.3578,167.7956,1008.3828))
	{
		if(CanChangeName[playerid] == 0) {
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* For security reasons, you need to authorize the name change first! (/account)");
		}
		new tmp[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
		if(sscanf(params,"s[MAX_PLAYER_NAME]",tmp)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /changename [NEW_NAME]");

		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pShiftName] == 0 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) < 50000) {
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You do not have enough money!");
		}
		if(ChangedName[playerid] == 1) {
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You have Changed Your name, Now Relog if you want to change it again");
		}
		if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3, 358.3578,167.7956,1008.3828) && PlayerInfo[playerid][pShiftName] == 0) {
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not at the City Hall Desk, Nor you have a Free Changename!");
		}
		new sqlQuery[300], string[128], namestring = strfind(tmp, "_", true);
		format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "SELECT Username FROM samp_users WHERE `Username`='%s'", tmp);
		mysql_query(sqlQuery);
		mysql_store_result();
		new rows = mysql_num_rows();
		mysql_free_result();
		if(rows!=0)
		{
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* That name is taken already!");
		}
		if(namestring == -1)
		{
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You ALMOST forgot the UNDERSCORE ( _ ) in your name!");
		}
		if(strlen(tmp) > MAX_PLAYER_NAME) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTRED,"This name is to long.");
		else
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string),"** You have successfuly changed your name to %s", tmp);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_SEA, string);
			new housekey = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
			new bizzkey = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey];

			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pShiftName] == 0)
			{
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -50000);
			}
			format(string, sizeof(string),"%s",tmp);
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] != 9999)
			{
				if(strcmp(GPN(playerid),HouseInfo[housekey][hOwner],true) == 0)//fixes house exploitation
				{
			    	new escaped[24],sql[256];
			    	mysql_real_escape_string(tmp,escaped);
			    	strmid(hInfo[housekey][hOwner],escaped,0,strlen(escaped),255);
			    	format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `owner`='%s' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",escaped,housekey);
			    	mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,housekey);
			    	SCM(playerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR,"* House ownership changed successfuly!");
				}
			}
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] != 9999)
			{
				if(strcmp(GPN(playerid),BizzInfo[bizzkey][bOwner],true) == 0)//fixes biz exploitation
				{
					strmid(BizzInfo[bizzkey][bOwner],string,0,strlen(string),255);
			    	OnPropUpdate(2,bizzkey);
			    	OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, bizzkey);
			    	SCM(playerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR,"* Business ownership changed successfuly!");
				}
			}
			format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Username`='%s' WHERE `Username`='%s'", tmp, GPN(playerid));
			mysql_query(sqlQuery, THREAD_CHANGE_NAME, playerid);
			SetPlayerName(playerid, tmp);
		}
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has changed their name to %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),tmp);
		AdminLog(string); LoginLog(string);
	}
	else return SCM(playerid,-1,"You need to be at City Hall to use this commands!");
	LogCallback("changename");
	return 1;
}
CMD:shiftname(playerid, params[]) // By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic
{
	LogCallback("shiftname");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2)
		{
			new giveplayerid;
			if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /shiftname [playerid/PartOfName]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					new string[128], sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
					GPN(playerid);
					if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pShiftName] == 0)
			        {
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pShiftName] = 1;
						GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Granted a shiftname to %s (%d).", sendername, giveplayer, giveplayerid);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
						GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "~r~Shift Name Rights ~n~~w~Administration has Granted you a free Changename",10000,4);
						SCM(giveplayerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR,"** Administration Has granted you a Free /changename!");
					}
					else
					{
					    PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pShiftName] = 0;
						GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Removed %s (%d)'s Shiftname Rights.", sendername, giveplayer, giveplayerid);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
						GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, "~r~Shift Name Rights ~n~~w~Administration has Removed you a free Changename",10000,4);
						SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_GREY,"** Administration Has Removed your Free /changename!");
					}
					new y,m,d,h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /shiftname %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid));
					AdminCommandLog(string);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** No Such Player");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not an admin");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("shiftname");
	return 1;
}
CMD:disarm(playerid, params[])// Moddded By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 252
{
	LogCallback("disarm");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			new giveplayerid;
			if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /disarm [playerid/PartOfName]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					new sendername[24], giveplayer[24], string[128];
					GPN(playerid);
					SafeResetPlayerWeapons(giveplayerid);
					ClearWepVariables(giveplayerid);
					GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Disarmed %s (%d).", sendername, giveplayer, giveplayerid);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d]ADMCMD: %s Has Disarmed %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer);
					AdminLog(string);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   No Such Player");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an admin");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("disarm");
	return 1;
}
CMD:notchecked(playerid, params[]) // Moddded By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 252
{
	LogCallback("notechecked");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid))
		{
			new giveplayerid;
			if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /NotChecked [playerid/PartOfName]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					new string[128], sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
					GPN(playerid);
                    Checked[giveplayerid] = 0;
   					PlayerGotSpottedRecently[giveplayerid] = 0;
					GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) as Non Checked.", sendername, giveplayer, giveplayerid);
					SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s as Non Checked",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer);
					AdminLog(string);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   No Such Player");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an admin");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("notechecked");
	return 1;
}
CMD:checked(playerid, params[]) // Moddded By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 253
{
	LogCallback("checked");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid))
		{
			new giveplayerid;
			if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /Checked [playerid/PartOfName]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					new string[128], sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
					GPN(playerid);
                    Checked[giveplayerid] = 1;
     				PlayerGotSpottedRecently[giveplayerid] = 1;
					PlayerMoneyHacking[giveplayerid] = 0;
					PlayerSpeedHacking[giveplayerid] = 0;
					PlayerInteriorHacking[giveplayerid] = 0;
					PlayerBunnyJumping[giveplayerid] = 0;
					PlayerOnCashInbalance[giveplayerid] = 0;
					PlayerFailedToLogin[giveplayerid] = 0;
					GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) as Checked.", sendername, giveplayer, giveplayerid);
					SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s as Checked",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer);
					AdminLog(string);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   No Such Player");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an admin");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("checked");
	return 1;
}

			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {

		}

		{
			new houseid;
			if(sscanf(params, "d", houseid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /check [houseid]");
			new zone[24];
			new string[128];
			GetHouse2DZone(houseid, zone, sizeof(zone));
			format(string, sizeof(string),"House ID %d is at %s",houseid, zone);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("checkhouse");
	return 1;
}
CMD:check(playerid, params[]) // Moddded By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 264
{
	LogCallback("check");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			new giveplayerid;
			if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /check [playerid/PartOfName]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					ShowStats(playerid,giveplayerid);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   No Such Player");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not an admin");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("check");
	return 1;
}

CMD:number(playerid, params[])//266
{
	LogCallback("number");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhoneBook] == 1)
		{
			new giveplayerid;
			if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/number [PLAYERID]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					new string[128], sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
					if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pHideNumber] == 1)
			        {
						GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
						format(string, 256, "Name: %s, Ph: HIDDEN",sendername);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
					}
					else
					{
					    GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
						format(string, 256, "Name: %s, Ph: %d",sendername,PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPnumber]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
					}
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /number %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer);
					CommandLog(string);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   No Such Player !");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You do not have a PhoneBook !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("number");
	return 1;
}
//-------------------------------[LevelUp]--------------------------------------------------------------------------
CMD:levelup(playerid, params[])//267
{
	LogCallback("levelup");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (gPlayerLogged[playerid] != 0)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] >= 0)
			{
				new
					nxtlevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel]+1,
					expamount = nxtlevel*levelexp,
					string[128]
				;
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] < expamount)
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** You need %d Respect Points, you curently have [%d] !",expamount,PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
				}
				else
				{
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					PlayerPlayMusic(playerid);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel]++;
					format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `level`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
					mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] > 0)
					{
					    PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] -= expamount;
					    new total = PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp];
					    if(total > 0)
					    {
					        PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] = total;
					    }
					    else
					    {
					        PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] = 0;
					    }
					}
					else
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pExp] = 0;
					}
					PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] = PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade]+2;
					format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `upgradepoints`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
					mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "LEVEL UP: You Are Now Level %d", nxtlevel);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You bought Level %d Type /upgrade", nxtlevel);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string),"You gave %d unspent Upgrade Points",PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You are not Logged in !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("levelup");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buyarmour(playerid, params[])//268
{
	LogCallback("buyarmour");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < 2500)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You dont have enough money with you !");
		}
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,314.2548,-133.6627,999.6016) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,10,311.9589,-166.1407,999.6010))
		{
   			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -2500);
			SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 85);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Bought a Body Armour For $1250!");
			new string[128], sendername[24];
			GPN(playerid);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /buyarmour",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername);
			PayLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buyarmour");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buyspray(playerid, params[])//269
{
	LogCallback("buyspray");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < 1)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You dont have enough money with you !");
		}
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10,314.2548,-133.6627,999.6016) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10,311.9589,-166.1407,999.6010))
		{
   			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -500);
			SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 41, 350);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Bought a Pepper Spray Can for $500!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buyspray");
	return 1;
}
CMD:createatm(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("createatm");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3) return SCM(playerid, -1,"You can't use this command!");
	new i = 0;
	while (i < sizeof(aInfo))
	{
		if(aInfo[i][aUsed] == 0)
		{
			new Float:pPos[3];
			GetPlayerPos(playerid,pPos[0],pPos[1],pPos[2]);
			Atm[i] = CreateObject(2942,pPos[0],pPos[1]+ 1.5,pPos[2],0,0,0,50.0);
			EditObject(playerid,Atm[i]);
			AtmEdit[playerid] = i;
			break;
		}
		i++;
	}
	LogCallback("createatm");
	return 1;
}
CMD:destroyatm(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("destroyatm");
	new i = 0;
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3) return SCM(playerid, -1,"You can't use this command!");
	while(i< sizeof(aInfo))
	{
	    if(aInfo[i][aUsed] == 1)
	    {
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,aInfo[i][aPos][0],aInfo[i][aPos][1],aInfo[i][aPos][2]))
			{
		        aInfo[i][aUsed] = 0;
				aInfo[i][aPos][0] = 0;
				aInfo[i][aPos][1] = 0;
				aInfo[i][aPos][2] = 0;
				aInfo[i][aRot][0] = 0;
				aInfo[i][aRot][1] = 0;
				aInfo[i][aRot][2] = 0;
				DestroyDynamicObject(Atm[i]);
				break;
			}
		}
		i ++;
	}
	LogCallback("destroyatm");
	return 1;
}

CMD:gcdid(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("gcdid");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3) return SCM(playerid, -1,"You can't use this command!");
	new i;
	while(i < sizeof(DoorInfo))
	{
	    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,3.0,DoorInfo[i][dEnt][0],DoorInfo[i][dEnt][1],DoorInfo[i][dEnt][2]))
	    {
			new string[128];
			format(string,sizeof(string),"Your door id is %d",i);
	        SCM(playerid,-1,string);
	    }
	    i ++;
	}
	LogCallback("gcdid");
	return 1;
}
CMD:editdoor(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("editdoor");
	new d, item[10], opt[32];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3) return SCM(playerid, -1,"You can't use this command!");
	if(sscanf(params,"ds[10]S()[32]",d,item,opt))
	{
    	SCM(playerid,-1,"Edits doors to get the door id go to its entrance and type /gcdid");
    	SCM(playerid,-1,"usage /editdoor [doorid][item]");
    	SCM(playerid,-1,"Item names- entrance, exit, vw, int");
	    return 1;
	}
	if(strcmp(item,"entrance",true) == 0)
	{
		GetPlayerPos(playerid,DoorInfo[d][dEnt][0],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][1],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][2]);
		DoorInfo[d][doorVw][0] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
		DoorInfo[d][doorInt][0] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
		dPickup[d] = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,DoorInfo[d][dEnt][0],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][1],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][2],DoorInfo[d][doorVw][0],DoorInfo[d][doorInt][0],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50.0);
	}
	else if(strcmp(item,"exit",true) == 0)
	{
		GetPlayerPos(playerid,DoorInfo[d][dExt][0],DoorInfo[d][dExt][1],DoorInfo[d][dExt][2]);
		DoorInfo[d][doorVw][1] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
		DoorInfo[d][doorInt][1] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
	}
	else if(strcmp(item,"vw",true) == 0)
	{
		if(isnull(opt)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/editdoor doorid vw #");
		DoorInfo[d][doorVw][1] = strval(opt);
	}
	else if(strcmp(item,"int",true) == 0)
	{
	    if(isnull(opt)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/editdoor doorid int #");
	    DoorInfo[d][doorInt][1] = strval(opt);
	}
	LogCallback("editdoor");
	return 1;
}

CMD:createdoor(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("createdoor");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
	{
		new d;
		while(d < sizeof(DoorInfo))
		{
		    if(DoorInfo[d][doorUsed] == false)
		    {

				GetPlayerPos(playerid,DoorInfo[d][dEnt][0],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][1],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][2]);
				DoorInfo[d][doorVw][0] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
				DoorInfo[d][doorInt][0] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
				DoorInfo[d][doorUsed] = true;
				dPickup[d] = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,DoorInfo[d][dEnt][0],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][1],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][2],DoorInfo[d][doorVw][0],DoorInfo[d][doorInt][0],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50.0);
				SCM(playerid,-1,"You have created a door at your location, please use /editdoor at the entrance to edit aspects of this door");
                break;
			}
			d++;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("createdoor");
	return 1;
}
CMD:upgrade(playerid, params[]) // 270
{
	LogCallback("upgrade");
	new gunid[16],string[128],slot[2],upgradepoints = PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade];
	if(sscanf(params, "s[16]S[2]", gunid,slot))
	{
		format(string, sizeof(string), "USAGE: /upgrade [upgradename] (You have %d Upgrade points)",upgradepoints);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN,"_______________________________________");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE,"*** UPGRADES ***");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2,string);
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,"spawnhealth(costs 2 upgrade points)");
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,"spawnarmour(costs 3 upgrade points)");
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,"trunkslot(costs 3 upgrade points)");
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,"DrugSlot(costs 3 upgrade points)");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN,"_______________________________________");
		return 1;
	}
	if(strcmp(gunid,"drugslot",true) == 0)
	{
	    if(isnull(slot)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"usage:/upgrade drugslot type(1 for weed 2 for coke 3 for crack");
	    if(upgradepoints < 3) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You don't have enough upgrade points to do this!");
	    PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugTrunkSlot][strval(slot)-1] = 1;
		PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] = PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] -3 ;
		format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `upgradepoints`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
		mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
		switch(strval(slot))
		{
			case 1: { SaveTrunkSlot(playerid, 10); }
			case 2: { SaveTrunkSlot(playerid, 11); }
			case 3: { SaveTrunkSlot(playerid, 12); }
		}
	}
	else if(strcmp(gunid,"spawnhealth",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpawnHealth] >= 70) return SCM(playerid,-1,"Your spawn health is maxed out already!");
		if(upgradepoints < 2) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You don't have enough upgrade points to do this!");
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpawnHealth] += 1;
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You have upgrded your spawn health, when you spawn at the hospital you will have %f HP",PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpawnHealth]);
		SCM(playerid,-1,string);
		PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] = PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] -2 ;
		format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `upgradepoints`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
		mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);

	}
	else if(strcmp(gunid,"spawnarmour",true) == 0)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpawnArmour] > 100) return SCM(playerid,-1,"Your spawn armour is maxed out already...");
	    if(upgradepoints < 3) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You don't even have enough upgradepoints to do this...");
	    PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpawnArmour] += 1;
	    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have upgraded your spawn armour, you will now spawn with %f armour!",PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpawnArmour]);
	    SCM(playerid,-1,string);
	    PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] = PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] - 3;
		format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `upgradepoints`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
		mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
	}
	else if(strcmp(gunid,"trunkslot",true) == 0)
	{
		if(upgradepoints < 3) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You don't have enough upgrade points to do this!");
		new i = 0;
		while(i < 10)
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGunTrunkSlot][i] == 0)
		    {
				if(i == 9 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pGunTrunkSlot][i] != 0)
					return SCM(playerid,-1, "you have upgraded all trunk slots!");

				PlayerInfo[playerid][pGunTrunkSlot][i] = 1;
				SCM(playerid, -1,"You have upgraded your cars trunk!");
				PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] = PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade] - 3;
				format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `upgradepoints`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][gPupgrade],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
				mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
				SaveTrunkSlot(playerid, i);
				break;
			}
			i++;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("upgrade");
	return 1;
}

CMD:n(playerid, params[])
{
	SCM(playerid,-1,"/n has now become /new(ewbie).");
	return 1;
}
CMD:new(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_newbie(playerid, params);
}
CMD:newbie(playerid, params[])//305
{
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1 || NMuted[playerid] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
			return 1;
		}
	    if(nonewbie == 1)
	    {
            SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "Newbie chat is off.");
            return 1;
		}
		new result[128], ttstring[500];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: (/n)ewbie [newbie chat]");
		if(HideNewb[playerid] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "How are you going to speak in newbie chat when you have it turned off?");
	 	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] >= 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pHelper] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] == 0)
		{
			switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel])
			{
				case 1 .. 2:
				{
					format(ttstring, sizeof(ttstring), "Newbie %s: %s", GPN(playerid), result);
				}
				case 3 .. 15:
				{
					format(ttstring, sizeof(ttstring), "Player %s: %s", GPN(playerid), result);
				}
				default:
				{
					format(ttstring, sizeof(ttstring), "Hardcore Member %s: %s", GPN(playerid), result);
				}
			}
		}
   		else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pHelper] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] == 1 ||PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 )
   		{
		   format(ttstring, sizeof(ttstring), "%s %s: %s",GetAdminRank(playerid), GPN(playerid), result);
   		}
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(HideNewb[i] != 1)
				{
					SCM(i,0x7DAEFFFF, ttstring);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

CMD:agivepassport(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("agivepassport");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
			new giveplayerid;
			if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/agivepassport [playerid]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
 				if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					new giveplayer[24], string[128];
                    GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPassport] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "This player has a passport already!");
					PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPassport] = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string),"You have given a passport to %s.",giveplayer);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string),"%s Has given you a passport, you are now citizen!.",GPN(playerid));
					SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]: %s has given a passport to %s.",GPN(playerid), giveplayer);
					SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("agivepassport");
	return 1;
}

			if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,BizzInfo[i][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceZ]) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,BizzInfo[i][bExitX], BizzInfo[i][bExitY], BizzInfo[i][bExitZ]))
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] == i)
				{
