						GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Bussiness ~g~Open", 5000, 6);
						PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1145, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
						return 1;
					}
					else if(BizzInfo[i][bLocked] == 0)
					{
						BizzInfo[i][bLocked] = 1;
						GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Bussiness ~r~Closed", 5000, 6);
						PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1145, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~r~You Dont Have A Key", 5000, 6);
					return 1;
				}
			}
		}
		return 1;
    }
	LogCallback("open");
    return 1;
}
CMD:aopen(playerid, params[])//312
{
	LogCallback("aopen");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
			for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(HouseInfo); i++)
			{
				if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1,HouseInfo[i][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancez]) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5,HouseInfo[i][hExitx], HouseInfo[i][hExity], HouseInfo[i][hExitz]))
				{
					if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == HouseInfo[i][hExVW])
					{
						if(HouseInfo[i][hLock] == 1)
						{
							HouseInfo[i][hLock] = 0;
							GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Door ~g~Unlocked", 5000, 6);
							PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1145, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
							return 1;
						}
						if(HouseInfo[i][hLock] == 0)
						{
							HouseInfo[i][hLock] = 1;
							GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Door ~r~Locked", 5000, 6);
							PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1145, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
							return 1;
						}
					}
				}
			}
			for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(BizzInfo); i++)
			{
				if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,BizzInfo[i][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceZ]) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,BizzInfo[i][bExitX], BizzInfo[i][bExitY], BizzInfo[i][bExitZ]))
				{
					if(BizzInfo[i][bLocked] == 1)
					{
						BizzInfo[i][bLocked] = 0;
						GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Bussiness ~g~Open", 5000, 6);
						PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1145, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
						return 1;
					}
					if(BizzInfo[i][bLocked] == 0)
					{
						BizzInfo[i][bLocked] = 1;
						GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Bussiness ~r~Closed", 5000, 6);
						PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1145, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
						return 1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
    }
	LogCallback("aopen");
    return 1;
}
CMD:pm(playerid, params[]) // By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 313
{
	LogCallback("pm");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You havent logged in yet!");
            return 1;
        }
		new giveplayerid, result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "us[128]", giveplayerid, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /pm [playerid/PartOfName] [text]");
		if (IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
		        if(HidePM[giveplayerid] > 0)
		        {
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** That player is blocking messages!");
		            return 1;
		        }
       			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
					return 1;
				}
				new Float:x, Float:y, Float:z;
				GetPlayerPos(playerid, x,y,z);
				new h, mi, s;
				new y1, m, d;
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				getdate(y1, m, d);
				format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* PM From %s (%d): %s", GPN(playerid), playerid, result);
				SendCustomPlayerMessage(giveplayerid, 0xE5C43EAA, tstring);
				PlayerPlaySound(giveplayerid, 1055, x,y,z);
				format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* PM Sent to %s (%d): %s", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, result);
				SendCustomPlayerMessage(playerid, 0xBBA033AA, tstring);
				format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [PM] to %s: (%s)",d,m,y1,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid), result);
				PMLog(tstring);
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
					{
						if(PlayerInfo[i][pViewPms] == 1 && PlayerInfo[i][pAdmin] >= 1)
						{
	                        format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "[ADMIN]: %s (%d) Has sent a PM to %s (%d) - (%s)",GPN(playerid), playerid, GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, (result));
	                        SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTRED, tstring);
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
				format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "   %d is not an active player.", giveplayerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, tstring);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("pm");
	return 1;
}
CMD:talk(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_t(playerid, params);
}
CMD:t(playerid, params[])// Modded By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 314
{
	LogCallback("t");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You havent logged in yet!");
        }
		new giveplayerid, result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "us[128]", giveplayerid, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: (/t)alk [playerid/PartOfName] [whisper text]");
		if(IsSpecing[playerid] == 1) return SCM(playerid,  COLOR_GREY, "** Player is not near you !");
		new h,mi,s;
		new y1,m,d;
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		getdate(y1,m,d);
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
		        new Float:x, Float:y, Float:z;
       			GetPlayerPos(giveplayerid,x,y,z);
		        if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5, x, y, z))
		        {
					if(giveplayerid == playerid)
					{
						format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* %s mutters something to himself.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(5.0, playerid, tstring, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else
					{
					    format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "*%s whispers something to %s", GPN(playerid), GPN(giveplayerid));
						ProxDetector(15.0, playerid, tstring, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "%s whispers: %s", GPN(playerid), result);
					SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_YELLOW, tstring);
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "%s whispers: %s", GPN(playerid), result);
					SCM(playerid,  COLOR_YELLOW, tstring);
					format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [Whisper] to %s: (%s)",d,m,y1,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid), result);
					ChatLog(cstring);
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid,  COLOR_GREY, "** Player is not near you !");
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
				format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "** %d is not an active player.", giveplayerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, tstring);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("t");
	return 1;
}
CMD:cw(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_carwhisper(playerid, params);
}
CMD:carwhisper(playerid, params[])//317
{
	LogCallback("carwhisper");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
	    {
	    	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You havent logged in yet!");
			return 1;
     	}
	    if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not in a car!");
	        return 1;
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
		}
		new result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: (/cw)hisper [text]");
		new vehicle = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(i) && IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(i))
		    {
		        if(GetPlayerVehicleID(i) == vehicle)
		        {
		            if(GetPlayerState(playerid) == PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER)
		            {
					  	format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "Driver %s Says: %s", GPN(playerid), result);
     					SendCustomPlayerMessage(i,  0xD7DFF3AA, tstring);
					}
					else
					{
					    format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "Passenger %s Says: %s", GPN(playerid), result);
     					SCM(i,  0xD7DFF3AA, tstring);
					}
				}
		    }
		}
	}
	LogCallback("carwhisper");
	return 1;
}
CMD:atmwithdraw(playerid,params[])
{
	if(NearAtm(playerid))
	{
		new amt,string[128];
		if(sscanf(params,"d",amt)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/atmwithdraw [amount]");
		if(amt < 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount] < amt) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Invalid transaction amount");
		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,amt);
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]=PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]-amt;
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You have withdraw $%d from your bank account new value $%d",amt,PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]);
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /atmwithdraw ($%d)",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), amt);
		PayLog(string);
	} else SendClientMessage(playerid,-1, "You're not even near an atm");
	return 1;
}
CMD:withdraw(playerid, params[])//318
{
	LogCallback("withdraw");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0,2316.6189,-7.3091,26.7422) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.5, 1346.5016,-1758.7649,13.5156) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.5, 1592.7152,-2335.3748,13.5400) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.5, 2308.4612,-1634.4176,14.8270) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.5, 2865.9014,-1415.4203,11.0061) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.5, 2404.5913,-1229.8973,23.8301) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1.5, 1172.5912,-1328.4365,15.4034))
        {
			new cashdeposit, string[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "d", cashdeposit))
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /withdraw [amount]");
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You Have $%d in your account.", PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, string);
				return 1;
			}
			if (cashdeposit > PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount] || cashdeposit < 1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You dont have that much !");
				return 1;
			}
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,cashdeposit);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]=PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]-cashdeposit;
			format(string, sizeof(string), "  You Have Withdrawn $%d from your account Total: $%d ", cashdeposit,PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /withdraw ($%d)",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), cashdeposit);
			PayLog(string);
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not at the Bank !");
            return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("withdraw");
	return 1;
}
CMD:atmdeposit(playerid,params[])
{
	if(NearAtm(playerid))
	{
		new amt;
		if(sscanf(params,"d",amt)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/atmdeposit[amount]");
		if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < amt || amt < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You do not have that much money");
		if(amt < 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"invalid transaction amt");
		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-amt);
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount] += amt;
		new string[128];
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You have deposited $%d into your bank, new balance $%d",amt,PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]);
		SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /atmdeposit ($%d)",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), amt);
		PayLog(string);
		return 1;
	} else SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You are not near an atm");
	return 1;
}
		
CMD:deposit(playerid, params[])//319
{
	LogCallback("deposit");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        new
			y,m,d,h,mi,s,
			cashdeposit,
			string[128]
		;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
        if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0,2316.6189,-7.3091,26.7422))
            return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not at The Bank!");

		if(sscanf(params, "d", cashdeposit))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /bank [amount]");
			format(string, sizeof(string), "  You Have $%d in your account.", PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, string);
			return 1;
		}
		if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < cashdeposit || cashdeposit < 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, " You dont have that much");

		if(cashdeposit < 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, " You dont have that much");

		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-cashdeposit);
		new curfunds = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount];
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]=cashdeposit+PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount];
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|___ BANK STATMENT ___|");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "  Old Balance: $%d", curfunds);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "  Deposit: $%d",cashdeposit);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, string);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD6, "|-----------------------------------------|");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "  New Balance: $%d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		if(cashdeposit >= 100000)
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[PETER]: %s (%d) Has just Deposited $%d !", GPN(playerid), playerid, cashdeposit);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_YELLOW, string);
		}
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /deposit ($%d)",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), cashdeposit);
		PayLog(string);
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("deposit");
	return 1;
}
CMD:dice(playerid, params[])//320
{
	LogCallback("dice");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new dice = random(6)+1;
		if (gDice[playerid] == 1)
		{
			new string[128];
			format(string, sizeof(string), "*** %s throws a Dice that lands on %d", GPN(playerid),dice);
			ProxDetector(10.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You Don't Have A Dice");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("dice");
	return 1;
}
CMD:coin(playerid, params[])//321
{
	LogCallback("coin");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new coin = random(2)+1;
		new coinname[20], string[128];
		if(coin == 1) { coinname = "head"; }
		else { coinname = "tail"; }
		format(string, sizeof(string), "*** %s flips a coin and lands on a %s", GPN(playerid),coinname);
		ProxDetector(10.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	}
	LogCallback("coin");
	return 1;
}
CMD:wiretransfer(playerid, params[])//322
{
	LogCallback("wiretransfer");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < 3)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   You must be level 3 !");
			return 1;
		}
		new giveplayerid, moneys, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", giveplayerid, moneys)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /transfer [playerid/PartOfName] [amount]");
		if (IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
				new giveplayer[24];
				GetPlayerName(giveplayerid, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
				new playermoney = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount] ;
				if(moneys > 1000 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < 3) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "To Prevent Money Farming Players Below Level 3 Can't Wire Transfer Money");
				if (moneys > 0 && playermoney >= moneys)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pAccount] -= moneys;
					PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAccount] += moneys;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "   You have transferd $%d to %s's account", moneys, giveplayer);
					PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "   You have recieved $%d to into your account from %s", moneys, GPN(playerid));
					SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
	                if(moneys >= 200000)
					{
					    format(string, sizeof(string), "[PETER]: %s[%d] transferd $%d to %s[%d]", GPN(playerid),playerid,  moneys, giveplayer, giveplayerid);
						SendAdminMessage(COLOR_YELLOW,string);
					}
					PlayerPlaySound(giveplayerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   Invalid transaction amount.");
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "   %d is not an active player.", giveplayerid);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("wiretransfer");
	return 1;
}
CMD:drinks(playerid , params[])//converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 324
{
	LogCallback("drinks");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
   		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10, -2659.4521, 1409.1227, 906.7237)) //RPC
        {
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularRank] >= 1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "---------------[RPC Bar]---------------");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You Can Buy a Beer - /buybeer - $0");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You Can Buy a Wine - /buywine - $0");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You Can Buy a sprunk - /buysprunk - $0");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You Can Buy a Martini - /buymart - $0");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You Can Buy a Vodkah - /buyvodkah - $0");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You Can Buy a Water - /buywater - $0");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "---------------[RPC Bar]---------------");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("drinks");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buybeer(playerid, params[]) // By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 325
{
	LogCallback("buybeer");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10, -2659.4521, 1409.1227, 906.7237)) //RPC
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "You are not at the Regulars Players Lounge Bar!");
			return 1;
		}
		SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_BEER);
		SCM(playerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, "Bought a Beer For $0, Do not Drink and Drive!");
	}
	LogCallback("buybeer");
	return 1;
}

        if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10, -2659.4521, 1409.1227, 906.7237)) //RPC

            return 1;
		}

		SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayersHealth + 10);
	}

	return 1;

CMD:weapontrain(playerid, params[])//331
{
	LogCallback("weapontrain");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
   	{
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3, 300.5705,-134.0464,1004.0625))
       	{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmuTrainTime] == 0)
			{
	    		new listitems[] = "1\tSelect Your Item\n2\tNormal Pistol\n3\tSilenced Pistol\n4\tDesert Eagle\n5\tPump Shotgun\n6\tSawn off Shotgun\n7\tCombat Shotgun\n8\tTEC9 / MAC 10\n9\tSMG MP5\n10\tAK-47\n11\tM4";
	    		ShowServerDialog(playerid,AMMUTRAIN_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Which weapon would you like to train?",listitems,"Train","Cancel");
			}
			else
			{
				new string[128];
				format(string, sizeof(string), "ERROR: You must wait %d Seconds before you can get a training",PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmuTrainTime]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("weapontrain");
	return 1;
}
CMD:train(playerid, params[])//332
{
	LogCallback("train");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2,767.2731,14.1037,1000.7003))//gym's checkpoint
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "** You are not at LS Gym Training Place!");
			return 1;
		}
		new item, string[128], sendername[24];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", item))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /train [item number]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "|_______ GYM _______|");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "| 1: Boxing ($15000) | 2: Kung Fu ($10000) |");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "| 3: Grab'n'Kick ($13500) | 4: KneeHead ($50000) |");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Type /fightstyle to see your available fight styles!");
		}
		GetPlayerName(playerid, sendername, sizeof(sendername));
		if (item == 1 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > 14999)
		{
			Training[playerid] = 0;
			TrainTimer[playerid] = repeat BoxTrain(playerid);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			SetPlayerFightingStyle (playerid, FIGHT_STYLE_BOXING);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Walks into the Sand bag and starts to punch it...", sendername);
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
		else if (item == 2 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > 9999)
		{
			Training[playerid] = 0;
			TrainTimer[playerid] = repeat KungTrain(playerid);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			SetPlayerFightingStyle (playerid, FIGHT_STYLE_KUNGFU);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Walks into the Platform and starts to do some Taichi...", sendername);
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
		else if (item == 3 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > 13499)
		{
			Training[playerid] = 0;
			TrainTimer[playerid] = repeat GrabTrain(playerid);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			SetPlayerFightingStyle (playerid, FIGHT_STYLE_GRABKICK);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Walks into the Sand bag and starts to kick it...", sendername);
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
		else if (item == 4 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > 49999)
		{
			Training[playerid] = 0;
			TrainTimer[playerid] = repeat KneeTrain(playerid);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			SetPlayerFightingStyle (playerid, FIGHT_STYLE_KNEEHEAD);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Walks into the Platform and starts to Punch the air...", sendername);
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
    }
	LogCallback("train");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buy(playerid, params[])//334
{
	LogCallback("buy");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 50,-30.875, -88.9609, 1004.53))
		{
			new Buyitems[624];
			strcat(Buyitems, "1\tCellphone ($150)\n2\tScratch Card ($25)\n3\tPhone Book ($10)\n4\tDice ($10)\n5\tGas Can ($20)\n6\tCondom ($1)\n7\tCamera ($50)\n8\tMask ($5000)\n9\tWatch ($100)\n10\tFishing Tools ($150)\n11\tRope ($2500)\n12\tSpray Can ($50)\n13\tLighter ($5)\n14\tCigarretes ($30)\n");
			strcat(Buyitems, "15\tCD Player ($250)\n16\tGPS ($250)\n17\tWalkie Talkie ($10,000)\n18\tScale ($100)\n19\tBakingSoda ($5)\n20\tRazor Blade ($1)\n21\tBlunt Wraps ($10)\n22\tRolling Papers ($10)\n23\tBaggies ($10)\n24\tPocket Mirror ($15)\n25\tTin Foil ($5)\n26\tPotato Chips ($7)\n");
			strcat(Buyitems, "27\tCandy Bar ($7)\n28\tBeef Jerky ($7)\n29\tTool Kit ($1500)");
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,TWEN47_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"24-7 Market",Buyitems,"Select","Cancel");
		}
		else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 50, -106.0233,-11.1038,1000.7188))
		{
		    new Buysexitems[] = "1\tPurple Dildo ($50)\n2\tBig white Vibrator ($35)\n3\tSmall White Vibrator($10)\n4\tSilver Vibrator ($15)\n5\tCondom ($1)";
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,88,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Sex Shop",Buysexitems,"Select","Cancel");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buy");
	return 1;
}

CMD:togooc(playerid, params[])//290
{
	LogCallback("togooc");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(HideOOC[playerid] == 0)
        {
            HideOOC[playerid] = 1;
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* OOC has been Disabled !");
            return 1;
		}
		else if(HideOOC[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    HideOOC[playerid] = 0;
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* OOC has been Enabled !");
            return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("togooc");
	return 1;
}
CMD:tognewbie(playerid, params[])//291
{
	LogCallback("tognewbie");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(HideNewb[playerid] == 0)
        {
            HideNewb[playerid] = 1;
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* Newbie has been Disabled !");
            return 1;
		}
		else if(HideNewb[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    HideNewb[playerid] = 0;
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* Newbie has been Enabled !");
            return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("tognewbie");
	return 1;
}
CMD:nmute(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("nmute");
	new id, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", id)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /nmute [playerid/partofname]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pHelper] == 1 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		switch(NMuted[id])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				NMuted[id] = 1;
				SCM(id, COLOR_NICERED, "You have been /n-muted and will not be able to use /n. You must remember");
				SCM(id, COLOR_NICERED, "that /n is for game related questions only. You will be able to use /n");
				SCM(id, COLOR_NICERED, "again in a few moments");
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You have /n muted %s", GPN(id));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
			case 1:
			{
				NMuted[id] = 0;
				SCM(id, COLOR_NICERED, "You have been U/n-muted and will be able to use /n now. You must remember");
				SCM(id, COLOR_NICERED, "that /n is for game related questions only.");
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You have U/n muted %s", GPN(id));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("nmute");
	return 1;
}

CMD:togpm(playerid, params[])//294
{
	LogCallback("togpm");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (!HidePM[playerid])
		{
			HidePM[playerid] = 1;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* Private messages has been Disabled !");
			return 1;
		}
		else if(HidePM[playerid])
		{
			HidePM[playerid] = 0;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* Private messages has been Enabled !");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("togpm");
	return 1;
}
CMD:togphone(playerid, params[])//295
{
	LogCallback("togphone");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (!PhoneOnline[playerid])
		{
			PhoneOnline[playerid] = 1;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* Your Phone is Offline !");
			return 1;
		}
		else if (PhoneOnline[playerid])
		{
			PhoneOnline[playerid] = 0;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* Your Phone is Online !");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("togphone");
	return 1;
}
//----------------------------------[Emote]-----------------------------------------------
CMD:me(playerid, params[])//296
{
	LogCallback("me");
	new string[128];
	if(isnull(params)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /me [action]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
	{
	    format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* Stranger %s", params);
	}
	else
	{
		format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* %s %s", GPN(playerid), params);
	}
	ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, tstring, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
	new y1,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
	format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /me %s",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), params);
	MeDoReady(string);
	LogCallback("me");
	return 1;
}

CMD:ame(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("ame");
	new
		action[128],
		string[128]
	;
	if(sscanf(params, "s[128]",action)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/ame [action]");
	if(strlen(action) > 128) return SCM(playerid, -1, "You have exceeeded the 128 character maximum text");
	format(string,sizeof(string),"%s",action);
	SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE, 20.0, 8000);
	format(string,sizeof(string),"[AME] %s",action);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_PURPLE, string);
	new y1,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
	format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /ame %s",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), string);
	MeDoReady(string);
	LogCallback("ame");
	return 1;
}

CMD:try(playerid, params[])//297
{
	LogCallback("try");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You havent logged in yet !");
            return 1;
        }
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
			return 1;
		}
		new string[128], result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /try [action]");
		new randa = random(100)+1;
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 1)
		{
  			if(randa >= 50) format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "*** Admin tries %s and succeeds", result);
			else format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "*** Admin tries %s, but fails", result);
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0)
		{
		    if(randa >= 50) format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "*** Stranger tries %s and succeeds", result);
			else format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "*** Stranger tries %s, but fails", result);
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 0)
		{
			if(randa <= 49) format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "*** %s tries %s and succeeds", GPN(playerid), result);
			else format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "*** %s tries %s, but fails", GPN(playerid), result);
		}
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, tstring, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		new y1,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /try %s",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), result);
		MeDoReady(string);
	}
	LogCallback("try");
	return 1;
}
CMD:do(playerid, params[])//298
{
	LogCallback("do");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You havent logged in yet !");
            return 1;
        }
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
			return 1;
		}
		new string[128],result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /do [action]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 1)
		{
  			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "%s (( Admin ))", result);
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0)
		{
		    format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* %s (( Stranger ))", result);
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 0)
		{
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* %s (( %s ))", result, GPN(playerid));
		}
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, tstring, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		new y1,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /do %s",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), result);
		MeDoReady(string);
	}
	LogCallback("do");
	return 1;
}
CMD:l(playerid, params[]) // By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 299
{
	LogCallback("l");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You havent logged in yet!");
			return 1;
        }
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
			return 1;
		}
		new result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/local [text]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
		{
		    format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), " Stranger Says:(low) %s ", result);
		    ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, tstring,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
		    SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, tstring, COLOR_WHITE, 20.0, 8000);

		}
		else
		{
		    format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "%s Says:(low) %s", GPN(playerid), result);
		    ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, tstring,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
		    SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, tstring, COLOR_WHITE, 20.0, 8000);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("l");
	return 1;
}
CMD:b(playerid, params[])//local ooc // By CuervO_NegrO converted to ZCMD by Narcotic 300
{
	LogCallback("b");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You havent logged in yet !");
            return 1;
        }
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
			return 1;
		}
		new result[128],y,m,d,h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /b [local ooc chat]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 1)
		{
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "(( Admin Says: %s ))", result);
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] == 1 && ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "(( Moderator Says: %s ))", result);
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 1)
		{
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "(( Stranger Says: %s ))", result);
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMaskuse] == 0)
		{
	   		format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "(( %s Says: %s ))", GPN(playerid), result);
		}
		ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, tstring,COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
  		format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (Local OOC): %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid), result);
		ChatLog(cstring);
	}
	LogCallback("b");
	return 1;
}

	LogCallback("s");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))

	LogCallback("s");
	return 1;

CMD:vehiclehelp(playerid, params[])//335
{
	LogCallback("vehiclehelp");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] != 9999 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] != 9999 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar] != 9999)
        {
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN,"________________Vehicle Help________________");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2,"*** VEHICLE *** /vpark, /vhood, /vtrunk, /vplate, /vcolor, /findcar, /lock, /alarm, /lights");
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,"** You do not currently own a car! **");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("vehiclehelp");
	return 1;
}

CMD:hirecar(playerid, params[])//340 modified by Narcotic
{
	LogCallback("hirecar");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
			new car, string[128];
			if(isnull(params)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /hirecar [key id]");
            if(!IsNumeric(params)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " Key ID must be a number!");// Didn't check to see if the value was an integer before, could of cause lag spots if a lot of ppl used the cmd
			HireCar[playerid] = car;
			format(string, sizeof(string), "Key Fashioned You Can Lock Car %d.",car);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, string);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: Type /lock ");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("hirecar");
	return 1;
}
CMD:switchkey(playerid, params[])//341
{
	LogCallback("switchkey");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(!SwitchKey[playerid])
		{
			if(HireCar[playerid] != 299)
			{
				SwitchKey[playerid] = 1;
				GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~You control now your house car", 5000, 6);
			}
			else
			{
				GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~You do not hire a car", 5000, 6);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SwitchKey[playerid] = 0;
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~You control now your hire car", 5000, 6);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("switchkey");
	return 1;
}
CMD:unrentveh(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("unrentveh");
	RentalCars(playerid);
	LogCallback("unrentveh");
	return 1;
}

CMD:asellbiz(playerid, params[])//344
{
	LogCallback("asellbiz");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new playername[24], string[128], biz;
		GetPlayerName(playerid, playername, sizeof(playername));
		if(sscanf(params, "d", biz)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /asellbiz [bizid]");
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
		{
		    foreach(Player, i)
		    {
				if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[i][pPbiskey] == biz)
					{
						//SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, BizzInfo[biz][bBuyPrice]);
						PlayerInfo[i][pPbiskey] = 9999;
					}
					else
					{
						new sqlQuery[300];
						format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Bizz`=9999 WHERE `Username`='%s'", BizzInfo[biz][bOwner]);
						mysql_query(sqlQuery);
					}
				}
			}
			BizzInfo[biz][bLocked] = 1;
			BizzInfo[biz][bOwned] = 0;
			strmid(BizzInfo[biz][bOwner], "The State", 0, strlen("The State"), 255);
			strmid(BizzInfo[biz][bExtortion], "No-one", 0, strlen("No-one"), 255);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "~w~You have sold the Business");
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, string, 10000, 3);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Admin-Sold The Bizz: [%d].",GPN(playerid), biz);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			OnPropUpdate(2,biz);
			OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2,biz);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Admin Sold the House: [%d]",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),biz);
			PlaceLog(string);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You are not an admin.");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("asellbiz");
	return 1;
}
CMD:asellsbiz(playerid, params[])//345
{
	LogCallback("asellsbiz");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new sbiz, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", sbiz)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /asellsbiz [sbizid]");
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
		{
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
				{
					new name[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
					GetPlayerName(i, name, sizeof(name));
					if(!strcmp(name, SBizzInfo[sbiz][sbOwner]))
					{
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, SBizzInfo[sbiz][sbBuyPrice]);
					}
					else
					{
						new sqlQuery[300];
						format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE samp_users SET Bizz=9999, Money=Money+%d WHERE Username='%s'", SBizzInfo[sbiz][sbBuyPrice], SBizzInfo[sbiz][sbOwner]);
						mysql_query(sqlQuery);
					}
				}
			}
			SBizzInfo[sbiz][sbLocked] = 1;
			SBizzInfo[sbiz][sbOwned] = 0;
			strmid(SBizzInfo[sbiz][sbOwner], "The State", 0, strlen("The State"), 255);
			strmid(SBizzInfo[sbiz][sbExtortion], "No-one", 0, strlen("No-one"), 255);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "~w~You have sold the Business");
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, string, 10000, 3);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Admin-Sold the sBizz: [%d].",GPN(playerid), sbiz);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			OnPropUpdate(3,sbiz);
			OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3,sbiz);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Admin Sold the House: [%d]",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),sbiz);
			PlaceLog(string);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You are not an admin.");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("asellsbiz");
	return 1;
}
CMD:asellhouse(playerid, params[])//346
{
	LogCallback("asellhouse");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new house, playername[24], string[128];
		GetPlayerName(playerid, playername, sizeof(playername));
		if(sscanf(params, "d", house)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /asellhouse [houseid]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
		    new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
		    foreach(Player, i)
		    {
		        if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		        {
		            if(PlayerInfo[i][pPhousekey] == house)
		            {
		                //SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, HouseInfo[house][hValue]);
		                PlayerInfo[i][pPhousekey] = 9999;
					}
					else
					{
						new sqlQuery[300];
						format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE `samp_users` SET `House`='9999' WHERE `Username`='%s'", HouseInfo[house][hOwner]);
						mysql_query(sqlQuery);
					}
				}
			}
			HouseInfo[house][hHel] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hArm] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hLock] = 1;
			HouseInfo[house][hOwned] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hMaterials] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hWeapon1] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hAmmo1] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hWeapon2] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hAmmo2] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hWeapon3] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hAmmo3] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hWeapon4] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hAmmo4] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hWeapon5] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hAmmo5] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hWeapon6] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hAmmo6] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][0] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][1] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][2] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][3] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][4] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][5] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][6] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][7] = 0;
			strmid(HouseInfo[house][hOwner], "The State", 0, strlen("The State"), 255);
            strmid(HouseInfo[house][hMessage],"For Sale",0,strlen("For Sale"),255);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "~w~You have sold this property", HouseInfo[house][hValue]);
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, string, 10000, 3);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Admin-Sold The House: [%d].",GPN(playerid),house);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			FullHouseSave(house);
			OnPropTextdrawUpdate(1,house);
			OnHousePickupUpdate(house);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "[ASELLHOUSE] %s Has Admin Sold the House: [%d]",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),house);
			HouseLog(string);
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You are not an admin.");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("asellhouse");
	return 1;
}
/*
CMD:sellhouse(playerid, params[])//347
{
	LogCallback("sellhouse");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new string[128], playername[24];
		GetPlayerName(playerid, playername, sizeof(playername));

		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] == 9999)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't own a house.");

		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMarried] > 0)
	       return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are Married, can't sell the House !");

	    if(CanSellHouse[playerid] == 0)
	      return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You can't sell the house without first authorizing it at /account panel!");

		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] != 9999 && strcmp(playername, HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hOwner], true) == 0)
		{

			HouseInfo[house][hHel] = 0;

			HouseInfo[house][hAmmo3] = 0;

			HouseInfo[house][hAmmo5] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hWeapon6] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hAmmo6] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][0] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][1] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][2] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][3] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][4] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][5] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][6] = 0;
			HouseInfo[house][hDrugs][7] = 0;
			strmid(HouseInfo[house][hOwner], "The State", 0, strlen("The State"), 255);
            strmid(HouseInfo[house][hMessage],"For Sale",0,strlen("For Sale"),255);
			new housevalue = PlayerInfo[playerid][pHousePrice] / 100 * 75;
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,housevalue);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You have just sold your property and no longer own a place to live");
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] = 9999;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pHousePrice] = 0;
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocal] == house)
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,0);
				SetPlayerPos(playerid,HouseInfo[house][hEntrancex],HouseInfo[house][hEntrancey],HouseInfo[house][hEntrancez]);
			}
			FullHouseSave(house);
			OnPropTextdrawUpdate(1, house);
			OnHousePickupUpdate(house);
			OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[SELLHOUSE] %s Sold House %d for $%d", GPN(playerid), house, housevalue);
			HouseLog(string);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't own a house.");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("sellhouse");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setrent(playerid, params[])//349
{
	LogCallback("setrent");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey], string[128];
		if (bouse != 9999 && strcmp(GPN(playerid), HouseInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey]][hOwner], true) == 0)
		{
			new tmp;
			if(sscanf(params, "d", tmp))
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /setrent [RentFee]");

			if(tmp < 1 || tmp > 1000)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Minimum rent is $1, Maximum rent is $1000.");

			HouseInfo[bouse][hRent] = tmp;
			SaveHouse(bouse,11);
			if(HouseInfo[bouse][hRentabil] != 0)
			{
				OnPropTextdrawUpdate(1, bouse);
			}
			format(string, sizeof(string), "House rent set to $%d", HouseInfo[bouse][hRent]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You don't own a house");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setrent");
	return 1;
}

		{

	}
	LogCallback("setrentable");
	return 1;

CMD:call(playerid, params[])//352
{
	LogCallback("call");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new phonenumb, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", phonenumb))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /call [phonenumber]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "HINT: /calllist (for a list for short numbers)");
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber] == 0)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "** You don't have a cell phone!");
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
		}
		format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out a cellphone.", GPN(playerid));
		SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_USECELLPHONE);
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		if(phonenumb == 115)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, "____________Services number list____________");
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, "444 - taxi, 555 - mechanic, 222 - Lawyer");
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, "____________________________________________");
		}
		if(phonenumb == 911)
		{
   			ShowServerDialog(playerid,EMERGENCY_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"emergency Call","What emergency service do you require?((Police, Paramedic, None))","Okay","Cancel");
			emergencystep[playerid] = 1;
		}
		if(phonenumb == 444) //----JOBS----//
		{
			if(CabCall == -1)
			{
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[i][pJob][0] == 9 || PlayerInfo[i][pJob][1] == 9)
					{
						if(TaxiDuty[i] == 1)
						{
							format(string, sizeof(string), "[TAXI DISPATCH] %s needs a pick up. Use /accept taxi to take the call", GPN(playerid));
							SCM(i, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
						}
					}
				}
				CabCall = playerid;
				CallTimer2 = defer CabCalls();
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "[TAXI DISPATCH] We've informed all on duty drivers. Please wait for one to respond");
			}
			else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "[TAXI DISPATCH] All representatives are busy at the moment. Call back in a few minutes"); }
		}
		if(phonenumb == 555) //----JOBS----//
		{
			if(MechDuty[playerid] == 1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "[LS Mechanic Co.] Stop wasting company time and get back to work!");
				return 1;
			}
			if(MechCall == -1)
			{
				foreach(Player, i)
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[i][pJob][0] == 4 || PlayerInfo[i][pJob][1] == 4)
					{
						if(MechDuty[i] == 1)
						{
							format(string, sizeof(string), "[LS Mechanic Co.] %s needs a repair. Use /accept mechanic to take the call", GPN(playerid));
							SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						}
					}
				}
				MechCall = playerid;
				CallTimer = defer MechCalls();
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "[LS Mechanic Co.] We've informed all on duty Mechanics. Please wait for one to respond");
			}
			else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "[LS Mechanic Co.] All representatives are busy taking other calls. Call back in a few minutes"); }
		}
		if(phonenumb == 222)
		{
			if(AllowedLawyer[playerid] == 0)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not allowed a lawyer");
				return 1;
			}
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0] > PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][1])
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not allowed to call a lawyer just yet. You may call when you've served half your time.");
				return 1;
			}
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[i][pJob][0] == 11 || PlayerInfo[i][pJob][1] == 11)
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[LS Lawyers Association] %s is in need of a lawyer.",GPN(playerid));
					SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					SCM(i, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Use /accept lawyer to accept this prisoner's request");
				}
			}
			LawCall = playerid;
			CallTimer3 = defer LawCalls();
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "[LS Lawyers Association] We've informed all lawyers of your case. Please wait for one to respond");
		}
		if(phonenumb == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber])
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "** You just get a busy tone...");
		}
		if(Mobile[playerid] != 255)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "** You are already on a call...");
		}
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[i][pPnumber] == phonenumb && phonenumb != 0)
				{
					new giveplayerid = i;
					Mobile[playerid] = giveplayerid; //caller connecting
					if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
					{
					    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
					    {
					        if(PhoneOnline[giveplayerid] > 0)
					        {
					            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** That players Phone is Offline!");
					        }
							if (Mobile[giveplayerid] == 255)
							{
								format(string, sizeof(string), "Your Mobile is Ringing Type (/pickup) CallerID: %s", GPN(playerid));
								SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
								RingTone[giveplayerid] = 10;
								format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s's phone begins to ring.", GPN(giveplayerid));
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: You now use T to talk on your cellphone, type /hangup to hang up");
								ProxDetector(30.0, i, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
								CellTime[playerid] = 1;
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		//else { SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "** You just get a Busy tone..."); }
	}
	LogCallback("call");
	return 1;
}
CMD:sms(playerid, params[])//355
{
	LogCallback("sms");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You havent logged in yet!");
            return 1;

        }
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
			return 1;
		}
		new phonenumb, result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ds[128]", phonenumb, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /sms [phonenumber] [text chat]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber] == 0)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "  You don't have a cell phone...");
			return 1;
		}
		new string[128],d,m,y1,h,mi,s;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out a cellphone.", GPN(playerid));
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[i][pPnumber] == phonenumb && phonenumb != 0)
				{
					new giveplayerid = i;
					Mobile[playerid] = giveplayerid; //caller connecting
					if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
					{
					    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
					    {
					        if(PhoneOnline[giveplayerid] > 0)
					        {
					            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That players Phone is Offline!");
					            return 1;
					        }
							format(string, sizeof(string), "[SMS] Sender %s(%d): %s",GPN(playerid),PlayerInfo[playerid][pPnumber],result);
                            SendCustomPlayerMessage(giveplayerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s's phone beeps.", GPN(giveplayerid));
                            SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
							RingTone[giveplayerid] =20;
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Text Message Delivered");
							format(string, sizeof(string), "~r~$-%d", txtcost);
							GameTextForPlayer(playerid, string, 5000, 1);
							SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-txtcost);
							SBizzInfo[2][sbTill] += txtcost;
							ExtortionSBiz(2, txtcost);
				           	PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				           	Mobile[playerid] = 255;
							format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [SMS] to %s: (%s)",d,m,y1,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid), result);
							ChatLog(cstring);
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "  Message Delivery Failed...");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("sms");
	return 1;
}
CMD:p(playerid, params[])//356
{
	LogCallback("p");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(Mobile[playerid] != 255)
		{
			SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "** You are already on a call...");
			return 1;
		}
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(Mobile[i] == playerid)
				{
					new string[128];
					Mobile[playerid] = i; //caller connecting
					SCM(i, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, "They Picked up the call...");
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s answers their cellphone.", GPN(playerid));
					SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_USECELLPHONE);
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					RingTone[playerid] = 0;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("p");
	return 1;
}
CMD:h(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_hangup(playerid, params);
}
CMD:hangup(playerid, params[])//357
{
	LogCallback("hangup");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new caller = Mobile[playerid];
		if(IsPlayerConnected(caller))
		{
		    if(caller != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
				if(caller != 255)
				{
					if(caller < 255)
					{
						SCM(caller,  TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "They hung up...");
						CellTime[caller] = 0;
						CellTime[playerid] = 0;
						SCM(playerid,  TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You hung up....");
						Mobile[caller] = 255;
					}
					Mobile[playerid] = 255;
					CellTime[playerid] = 0;
					RingTone[playerid] = 0;
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pSpeaker] = 0;
					UnidentifedCall[playerid] = 0;
				}
			}
		}
		SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_STOPUSECELLPHONE);
	}
	LogCallback("hangup");
	return 1;
}
CMD:fixr(playerid, params[])//358
{
	LogCallback("fixr");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		PlayerFixRadio(playerid);
	}
	LogCallback("fixr");
	return 1;
}
CMD:time(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("time");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    new
			mtext[20],
			string[128],
			year,month,day,
			hour,minuite,second
		;
		getdate(year, month, day);
		switch(month)
		{
			case 1: { mtext = "January"; }
			case 2: { mtext = "February"; }
			case 3: { mtext = "March"; }
			case 4: { mtext = "April"; }
			case 5: { mtext = "May"; }
			case 6: { mtext = "June"; }
			case 7: { mtext = "July"; }
			case 8: { mtext = "August"; }
			case 9: { mtext = "September"; }
			case 10: { mtext = "October"; }
			case 11: { mtext = "November"; }
			case 12: { mtext = "December"; }
		}
		gettime(hour,minuite,second);
		if (minuite < 10)
		{
			if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0] > 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWatch] == 1)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%d %s| %d:0%d | Jail Time Left: %d sec", day, mtext, hour, minuite, PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0]);
				}
				else
				{
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "Jail Time Left: %d sec", PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0]);
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWatch] == 1)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%d %s | %d:0%d |", day, mtext, hour, minuite);
				}
				else
				{
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "You don't have a watch");
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0] > 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWatch] == 1)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%d %s | %d:%d | Jail Time Left: %d sec", day, mtext, hour, minuite, PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0]);
				}
				else
				{
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "Jail Time Left: %d sec", PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0]);
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWatch] == 1)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%d %s | %d:%d |", day, mtext, hour, minuite);
				}
				else
				{
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "You don't have a watch");
				}
			}
		}
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWatch] == 1)
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 1) { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s raises his hand and looks down at his watch.", GPN(playerid)); }
		    else { format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s raises her hand and looks down at her watch.", GPN(playerid)); }
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
		ApplyAnimation(playerid,"COP_AMBIENT","Coplook_watch",4.1,0,0,0,0,0);
	}
	LogCallback("time");
	return 1;
}

CMD:houseo(playerid, params[])//361
{
	LogCallback("houseo");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	    {
			new housenum,y,m,d,h,mi,s,string[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "d", housenum)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /houseo [housenumber]");
			SetPlayerPos(playerid,HouseInfo[housenum][hEntrancex],HouseInfo[housenum][hEntrancey],HouseInfo[housenum][hEntrancez]);
			SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = 0;
			getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /houseo %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),housenum);
			AdminCommandLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("houseo");
	return 1;
}
CMD:biz(playerid, params[])//362
{
	LogCallback("biz");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
	    {
			new housenum;
			if(sscanf(params, "d", housenum)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /biz [biznumber]");
			SetPlayerInterior(playerid,BizzInfo[housenum][bInterior]);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, BizzInfo[housenum][bVirWorld]);
			SetPlayerPos(playerid,BizzInfo[housenum][bExitX],BizzInfo[housenum][bExitY],BizzInfo[housenum][bExitZ]);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = BizzInfo[housenum][bInteriorNr];
		}
	}
	LogCallback("biz");
	return 1;
}
CMD:bizo(playerid, params[])//363
{
	LogCallback("bizo");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
	    {
			new housenum;
			if(sscanf(params, "d", housenum)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /bizo [housenumber]");
			SetPlayerPos(playerid,BizzInfo[housenum][bEntranceX],BizzInfo[housenum][bEntranceY],BizzInfo[housenum][bEntranceZ]);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = 0;
			SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bizo");
	return 1;
}

						}

				}

				{
			    	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* You are not near your house!");
				}

			{
		    	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* You do not own a house!");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "* You are not a Gold or Diamond Subscriber!");
			return 1;
		}
	}

	return 1;

CMD:enter(playerid, params[])//373
{
	LogCallback("enter");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new d = 0;
		while (d < sizeof(DoorInfo))
		{
		    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,DoorInfo[d][dEnt][0],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][1],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][2]))
		    {
		        SetPlayerPos(playerid,DoorInfo[d][dExt][0],DoorInfo[d][dExt][1],DoorInfo[d][dExt][2] +0.3);
		        SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,DoorInfo[d][doorVw][1]);
		        SetPlayerInterior(playerid, DoorInfo[d][doorInt][1]);
		        break;
			}
			d++;
		}
		for(new g = 0; g < MAX_GARAGES; g++)
		{
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10.0, MechGarage[g][0], MechGarage[g][1], MechGarage[g][2]))
			{
				switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
				{
					case 1:
					{
						GarageID[playerid] = g;
						SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 610.0062, -107.9920, 998.2758);
						SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, TakeRepair[playerid]);
					}
					case 2:
					{
						foreach(Player, i)
						{
							if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == GetPlayerVehicleID(i))
							{
								GarageID[i] = g;
								SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(i),616.1107,-102.2850,998.0022);
								SetVehicleZAngle(GetPlayerVehicleID(i), 270.0);
								SetPlayerVirtualWorld(i, TakeRepair[playerid]);
								SetVehicleVirtualWorld(GetPlayerVehicleID(i), TakeRepair[playerid]);
							}
						}
						GarageID[playerid] = g;
						SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),616.1107,-102.2850,998.0022);
						SetVehicleZAngle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), 270.0);
						SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, TakeRepair[playerid]);
						SetVehicleVirtualWorld(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), TakeRepair[playerid]);
					}
				}
			}
		}
		for(new ds = 0; ds < 5; ds++)
		{
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, DSIcons[ds][0], DSIcons[ds][1], DSIcons[ds][2]))
			{
				DealerID[playerid] = ds + 1;
				new
					vw = RandomEx(1,10000),
					string[128]
				;
				if(DealerID[playerid] == 4)
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] < 3)
						return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "This dealership is for Gold and Diamond VIP only!");
				}
				CurrentCar[playerid] = 0;
				DSCamMove[playerid] = 0;
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
				SetPlayerPos(playerid,-1956.4475,284.4232,32.0471);
				SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1955.0258,267.1331,42.0471);
				SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, vw);
				switch(DealerID[playerid])
				{
					case 1:
					{
						DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(CouttAndSoutz[0][0],-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
						SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], vw);
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",CouttAndSoutz[CurrentCar[playerid]][2]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
					}
					case 2:
					{
						DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(GrottiDealer[0][0],-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
						SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], vw);
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",GrottiDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][2]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
					}
					case 3:
					{
						DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BikeDealer[0][0],-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
						SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], vw);
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",BikeDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][2]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
					}
					case 4:
					{
						DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(VIPDealer[0][0],-1948.4454,260.0867,40.6173,44, 1, 1, 1);
						SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid], vw);
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",VIPDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][2]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
					}
					case 5:
					{
						DealerCar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(BoatDealer[0][0],2963.2693, -1493.1260, 0.0032,135.0,1,1,1);
						SetVehicleVirtualWorld(DealerCar[playerid],playerid);
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
						CarInfo[DealerCar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "PRICE: $%d",BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][1]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid], string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "VEHICLE: %s",BoatDealer[CurrentCar[playerid]][2]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid], string);
						SetPlayerPos(playerid,2953.2026, -1484.4846, 0.0);
						SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 2953.2026, -1484.4846, 4.3308);
						SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 2953.9541, -1485.1584, 3.9011);
					}
				}
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerBGTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerLEFTAR[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerRIGHTAR[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerBUY[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerEXIT[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerRotate[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerRotL[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DealerRotR[playerid]);
				SelectTextDraw(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Welcome to the Dealership! Use the Left and Right arrows to switch cars");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "TIP: If your cursor disappears, use /exit to leave the dealership!");
			}
		}
		/****** AMMU GARAGE ******/
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,1366.8914,-1301.0112,13.5469))
		{
			switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
			{
				case 1:
				{
					SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid,286.6519,-1540.9602,24.4885);
					StreamPlayer(playerid);
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 1);
				}
				case 2:
				{
					foreach(Player, i)
					{
						if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == GetPlayerVehicleID(i))
						{
							SetPlayerVirtualWorld(i, 1);
							SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(i),287.6176,-1539.9041,24.9721);
							StreamPlayer(playerid);
							SetVehicleZAngle(GetPlayerVehicleID(i),-35);
							SetVehicleVirtualWorld(GetPlayerVehicleID(i),1);
						}
					}
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 1);
					SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),287.6176,-1539.9041,24.9721);
					SetVehicleZAngle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),-35);
					StreamPlayer(playerid);
					SetVehicleVirtualWorld(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1);
				}
			}
		}
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,285.1278,-1509.7081,24.9219))
		{
			if(BizzInfo[8][bLocked] == 1)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Closed!");

			if(BizzInfo[8][bProducts] == 0)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Out Of Stock");

			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid,317.0632,-140.2659,999.6016);
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-10);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,BizzInfo[8][bVirWorld]);
			SetPlayerInterior(playerid,BizzInfo[8][bInterior]);
			OnPropUpdate(2,17);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "$10 entry feed paid. Type /exit when you want to leave");
			BizzEntered[playerid] = 8;
		}
		for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(HouseInfo); i++)
		{
			if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2,HouseInfo[i][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancez]))
			{
				if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == HouseInfo[i][hExVW])
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] == i || PlayerInfo[playerid][pRenterKey] == i  || HouseInfo[i][hLock] == 0)
					{
						SetPlayerInterior(playerid,HouseInfo[i][hInt]);
						SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,HouseInfo[i][hWorld]);
						SetPlayerPos(playerid,HouseInfo[i][hExitx],HouseInfo[i][hExity],HouseInfo[i][hExitz]);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocal] = i;
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = HouseInfo[i][hWorld];
						HouseEntered[playerid] = i;
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = HouseInfo[i][hInt];
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "This house is locked");
						return 1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		new v = GetClosestHouse(playerid);
		if(v != -1)
		{
			if(hInfo[v][hLocked] == 0)
			{
			    SetPlayerPos(playerid,hInfo[v][hExitx],hInfo[v][hExity],hInfo[v][hExitz]);
			    SetPlayerInterior(playerid,hInfo[v][hInt]);
			    SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,v);
			    HouseEntered[playerid] = v;
			    return 1;
			}
			else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"{FF0000}Error{FFFFFF} this house is locked");
		}
		for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(BizzInfo); i++)
		{
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, BizzInfo[i][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceZ]))
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] == i || GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= 10)
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] != i)
					{
						if(BizzInfo[i][bLocked] == 1)
							return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Closed!");

						if(BizzInfo[i][bProducts] == 0)
							return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Out Of Stock");

						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-10);
						BizzInfo[i][bProducts] -= 1; OnPropUpdate(2,i);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "$10 entry feed paid. Type /exit when you want to leave");
						BizzInfo[i][bTill] += 10;
						switch(BizzInfo[i][bInterior])
						{
							case 5:  { InAFoodPlace[playerid] = 3; }
							case 9:  { InAFoodPlace[playerid] = 1; }
							case 10: { InAFoodPlace[playerid] = 2; }
							case 17: { InAFoodPlace[playerid] = 1; }
						}
					}
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = BizzInfo[i][bInteriorNr];
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,BizzInfo[i][bVirWorld]);
					SetPlayerInterior(playerid,BizzInfo[i][bInterior]);
					SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid,BizzInfo[i][bExitX],BizzInfo[i][bExitY],BizzInfo[i][bExitZ]);
					BizzEntered[playerid] = i;
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You dont have the cash");
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("enter");
	return 1;
}
CMD:exit(playerid, params[])//374
{
	LogCallback("exit");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(DealerID[playerid] != -1)
		{
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerPos(playerid, DSIcons[DealerID[playerid]-1][0],DSIcons[DealerID[playerid]-1][1],DSIcons[DealerID[playerid]-1][2]);
			SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
			DestroyVehicle(DealerCar[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerBGTD[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerLEFTAR[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRIGHTAR[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerBUY[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerEXIT[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerPrice[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerCARNAME[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRotate[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRotL[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DealerRotR[playerid]);
			CancelSelectTextDraw(playerid);
			DealerCar[playerid] = -1;
			CurrentCar[playerid] = -1;
			DealerID[playerid] = -1;
			return 1;
		}
		new d = 0;
		while (d < sizeof(DoorInfo))
		{
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,DoorInfo[d][dExt][0],DoorInfo[d][dExt][1],DoorInfo[d][dExt][2]))
			{
			    SetPlayerPos(playerid,DoorInfo[d][dEnt][0],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][1],DoorInfo[d][dEnt][2]);
			    SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,DoorInfo[d][doorVw][0]);
			    SetPlayerInterior(playerid,DoorInfo[d][doorInt][0]);
			    break;
			}
			d++;
		}
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 50.0, 610.0062, -107.9920, 998.2758))
		{
			switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
			{
				case 1:
				{
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, MechGarage[GarageID[playerid]][0], MechGarage[GarageID[playerid]][1], MechGarage[GarageID[playerid]][2]);
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,0);
				}
				case 2:
				{
					foreach(Player, i)
					{
						if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == GetPlayerVehicleID(i))
						{
							SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(i), MechGarage[GarageID[i]][0]+3.0, MechGarage[GarageID[i]][1], MechGarage[GarageID[i]][2]);
							SetPlayerVirtualWorld(i,0); SetVehicleVirtualWorld(GetPlayerVehicleID(i), 0);
						}
					}
					SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), MechGarage[GarageID[playerid]][0]+3.0, MechGarage[GarageID[playerid]][1], MechGarage[GarageID[playerid]][2]);
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,0); SetVehicleVirtualWorld(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), 0);
				}
			}
		}
		/****** AMMU GARAGE ******/
		else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,10.0,282.2585,-1540.8058,24.5947))
		{
			switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
			{
				case 1:
				{
					SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid,1363.3424,-1293.9725,13.8082);
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
				}
				case 2:
				{
					foreach(Player, i)
					{
						if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == GetPlayerVehicleID(i))
						{
							SetPlayerVirtualWorld(i, 0);
							SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(i),1363.3424,-1293.9725,13.8082);
							SetVehicleZAngle(GetPlayerVehicleID(i),-90);
							SetVehicleVirtualWorld(GetPlayerVehicleID(i),0);
						}
					}
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
					SetVehiclePos(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1363.3424,-1293.9725,13.8082);
					SetVehicleZAngle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),90);
					SetVehicleVirtualWorld(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),0);
				}
			}
		}
		else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2.0,317.0632,-140.2659,999.6016))
		{
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid,285.1278,-1509.7081,24.9219);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 1);
			SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 0);
		}
	    if(HouseEntered[playerid] != 9999)
	    {
			new i = HouseEntered[playerid];
			if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,HouseInfo[i][hExitx], HouseInfo[i][hExity], HouseInfo[i][hExitz]))
			{
				SetPlayerPos(playerid,HouseInfo[i][hEntrancex],HouseInfo[i][hEntrancey],HouseInfo[i][hEntrancez]);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,HouseInfo[i][hExVW]);
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid,HouseInfo[i][hExINT]);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = HouseInfo[i][hExVW];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = 0;
				HouseEntered[playerid] = 9999;
				return 1;
			}
			else
			{
				if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,7.0,hInfo[i][hExitx],hInfo[i][hExity],hInfo[i][hExitz]))
				{
	   				SetPlayerPos(playerid,hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2]);
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,hInfo[i][hEnterVw]);
					SetPlayerInterior(playerid,hInfo[i][hEnterInt]);
					HouseEntered[playerid] = 9999;
				}
			}
		}
		if(BizzEntered[playerid] != 9999)
	    {
	        new i = enterbizz[playerid] = BizzEntered[playerid];
			if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,BizzInfo[i][bExitX], BizzInfo[i][bExitY], BizzInfo[i][bExitZ]))
			{
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = 0;
			    SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
				SetPlayerPos(playerid,BizzInfo[i][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceZ]);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
				BizzEntered[playerid] = 9999;
				switch(BizzInfo[i][bInterior])
				{
					case 5,9,10,17: { InAFoodPlace[playerid] = 0; }
				}
			}
		}
		else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 6,-1404.5299,-259.0602,1043.6563))
		{
		    SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			SetPlayerPos(playerid,2695.6235,-1704.6960,11.8438);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = 0;
		}
		else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 8,-1443.0554,-581.1879,1055.0472))
		{
		    SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			SetPlayerPos(playerid,-2111.5686,-443.9720,38.7344);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = 0;
		}
		else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 8,-1464.7732,1557.5533,1052.5313))
		{
		    SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			SetPlayerPos(playerid,-2080.3079,-406.0309,38.7344);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = 0;
		}
		else if(NoFuel[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
			NoFuel[playerid] = 0;
		}

	}
	LogCallback("exit");
	return 1;
}
