CMD:buybiz(playerid, params[])//377
{
	LogCallback("buybiz");
	new string[128];
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new Float:oldposx, Float:oldposy, Float:oldposz;
		GetPlayerPos(playerid, oldposx, oldposy, oldposz);
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] != 9999)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "   You already own a business, type /sellbiz if you want to buy this one.");
			return 1;
		}
		for(new b = 0; b < sizeof(SBizzInfo); b++)
		{
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, SBizzInfo[b][sbEntranceX], SBizzInfo[b][sbEntranceY], SBizzInfo[b][sbEntranceZ]) && SBizzInfo[b][sbOwned] == 0)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < SBizzInfo[b][sbLevelNeeded])
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You Must Be Level %d To Purchase This",SBizzInfo[b][sbLevelNeeded]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, string);
					return 1;
				}
				if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) > SBizzInfo[b][sbBuyPrice])
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPassport] == 1)
					{
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] = b+100;
						SBizzInfo[b][sbOwned] = 1;
						strmid(SBizzInfo[b][sbOwner], GPN(playerid), 0, strlen(GPN(playerid)), 255);
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-SBizzInfo[b][sbBuyPrice]);
						PlayerPlayMusic(playerid);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Congratulations, On Your New Purchase.");
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Type /help to review the new business help section.");
						OnPropUpdate(3,b);
						OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
						OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3, b);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "* For security reasons, a passport is needed to buy a business!");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have the cash for that");
					return 1;
				}
			}
		}
		for(new b = 0; b < sizeof(BizzInfo); b++)
		{
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2, BizzInfo[b][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[b][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[b][bEntranceZ]) && BizzInfo[b][bOwned] == 0)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < BizzInfo[b][bLevelNeeded])
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You Must Be Level %d To Purchase This",BizzInfo[b][bLevelNeeded]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, string);
					return 1;
				}
				if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) > BizzInfo[b][bBuyPrice])
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] = b;
					BizzInfo[b][bOwned] = 1;
					strmid(BizzInfo[b][bOwner], GPN(playerid), 0, strlen(GPN(playerid)), 255);
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-BizzInfo[b][bBuyPrice]);
					PlayerPlayMusic(playerid);
					SetPlayerInterior(playerid,BizzInfo[b][bInterior]);
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,BizzInfo[b][bVirWorld]);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr] = BizzInfo[b][bInteriorNr];
					SetPlayerPos(playerid,BizzInfo[b][bExitX],BizzInfo[b][bExitY],BizzInfo[b][bExitZ]);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocal] = b ;
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Congratulations, On Your New Purchase.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Type /help to review the new business help section.");
					OnPropUpdate(2,b);
					OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
					OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, b);
					BizzEntered[playerid] = b;
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have the cash for that");
					return 1;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buybiz");
	return 1;
}

CMD:sellbiz(playerid, params[])//378
{
	LogCallback("sellbiz");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] == 9999)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "* You don't own a bizz.");
			return 1;
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMarried] > 0)
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are Married, can't sell the Bizz !");
	        return 1;
	    }
   		if(CanSellBizz[playerid] == 0)
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You can't sell the bizz without first authorizing it at /account panel!");
	        return 1;
	    }
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] >= 100 && strcmp(GPN(playerid), SBizzInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey]-100][sbOwner], true) == 0)
		{
			new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey]-100;
			new string[128];
			//SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,SBizzInfo[bouse][sbBuyPrice]);
			//SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,SBizzInfo[bouse][sbTill]);
			SBizzInfo[bouse][sbLocked] = 1;
			SBizzInfo[bouse][sbOwned] = 0;
			strmid(SBizzInfo[bouse][sbOwner], "The State", 0, strlen("The State"), 255);
			strmid(SBizzInfo[bouse][sbExtortion], "No-one", 0, strlen("No-one"), 255);
			//ConsumingMoney[playerid] = 1;
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "~w~Congratulations~n~ You have sold your property for ~n~~g~$%d + $%d", SBizzInfo[bouse][sbBuyPrice], SBizzInfo[bouse][sbTill]);
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, string, 10000, 3);
			//SBizzInfo[bouse][sbTill] = 0;
			//PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] = 9999;
			OnPropUpdate(3,bouse);
			OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
			OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3, bouse);
			return 1;
		}
		if(strcmp(GPN(playerid), BizzInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey]][bOwner], true) == 0)
		{
			new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey];
			BizzInfo[bouse][bLocked] = 0;
			BizzInfo[bouse][bOwned] = 0;
			strmid(BizzInfo[bouse][bOwner], "The State", 0, strlen("The State"), 255);
			strmid(BizzInfo[bouse][bExtortion], "No-one", 0, strlen("No-one"), 255);
			//ConsumingMoney[playerid] = 1;
			//SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,BizzInfo[bouse][bBuyPrice]);
			//SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,BizzInfo[bouse][bTill]);
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
			//format(string, sizeof(string), "~w~Congratulations~n~ You have sold your property for ~n~~g~$%d + $%d", BizzInfo[bouse][bBuyPrice], BizzInfo[bouse][bTill]);
			//GameTextForPlayer(playerid, string, 10000, 3);
			BizzInfo[bouse][bTill] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey] = 9999;
			OnPropUpdate(2, bouse);
			OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
			OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, bouse);
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't own a business.");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("sellbiz");
	return 1;
}
CMD:bizinfo(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("bizinfo");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey];
		switch(bouse)
		{
			case 9999:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't own a business.");
			}
			case 100 .. 9998:
			{
				PrintSBizInfo(playerid,bouse-100);
			}
			default:
			{
				PrintBizInfo(playerid,bouse);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bizinfo");
	return 1;
}
CMD:prodprice(playerid, params[])//379
{
	LogCallback("prodprice");
	new string[128];
	new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey];
	if(bouse == 9999)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You don't own a business");
		return 1;
	}
	new tmp;
	if(sscanf(params, "d", tmp)) return	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /prodprice [amount to pay per Product]");
	if(tmp < 1 || tmp > 99999)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Minimum amount is $1, Maximum amount is $99999.");
		return 1;
	}
	if(bouse >= 100)
	{
		if(tmp > SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbTill])
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You dont have that much in your Till.");
			return 1;
		}
		SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbPriceProd] = tmp;
		OnPropUpdate(3, bouse);
		OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3, bouse);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Buying Products for $%d.", SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbPriceProd]);
	}
	else
	{
		if(tmp > BizzInfo[bouse][bTill])
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You dont have that much in your Till.");
			return 1;
		}
		BizzInfo[bouse][bPriceProd] = tmp;
		OnPropUpdate(2, bouse);
		OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, bouse);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Buying Products for $%d.", BizzInfo[bouse][bPriceProd]);
	}
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	LogCallback("prodprice");
	return 1;
}
CMD:bizfee(playerid, params[])//380
{
	LogCallback("bizfee");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new tmp, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", tmp)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /bizfee [EntranceFee]");
		if(tmp < 1 || tmp > 150) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You can't set the fee less than 1 or more than $150");
		new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey];
		switch(bouse)
		{
			case 9999: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You don't own a business !"); }

			case 100 .. 9998:
			{
				switch(tmp)
				{
					case 1 .. 150:
					{
						SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbEntranceCost] = tmp;
						OnPropUpdate(3,bouse);
						OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3, bouse);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "Entrance fee set to $%d.", SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbEntranceCost]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					}
					default: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Minimum entrance is $0, Maximum entrance is $150."); }
				}
			}
			default:
			{
				BizzInfo[bouse][bEntranceCost] = tmp;
				OnPropUpdate(2, bouse);
				OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, bouse);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Entrance fee set to $%d.", BizzInfo[bouse][bEntranceCost]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bizfee");
	return 1;
}
CMD:extortion(playerid, params[])//381
{
	LogCallback("extortion");
	new string[128];
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey];
		if (bouse == 9999)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You don't own a business");
			return 1;
		}
		new giveplayerid;
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /extortion [playerid/PartOfName] (or 555 for No-one)");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
		        format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s is now Extortioning your Business.",GPN(giveplayerid));
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		        format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s has adjusted their Business, you are now Extortioning their Business.",GPN(playerid));
		        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				switch(bouse)
				{
					case 100 .. 9998:
					{
					    format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",GPN(playerid));
						strmid(SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbExtortion], string, 0, sizeof(string), 255);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "Business Extortion Name set to %s",SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbExtortion]);
						OnPropUpdate(3,bouse);
						OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3, bouse);
                        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					}
					default:
					{
					    format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",GPN(giveplayerid));
						strmid(BizzInfo[bouse][bExtortion], string, 0, sizeof(string), 255);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "Business Extortion Name set to %s",BizzInfo[bouse][bExtortion]);
						OnPropUpdate(2,bouse);
						OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, bouse);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					}
				}
		    }
		}
		else if(giveplayerid == 555)
		{
			switch(bouse)
			{
			    case 100 .. 9998:
				{
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "No-one");
					strmid(SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbExtortion], string, 0, sizeof(string), 255);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Business Extortion Name set to %s",SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbExtortion]);
					OnPropUpdate(3, bouse);
					OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3, bouse);
     				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				}
				default:
				{
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "No-one");
					strmid(BizzInfo[bouse][bExtortion], string, 0, sizeof(string), 255);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Business Extortion Name set to %s",BizzInfo[bouse][bExtortion]);
					OnPropUpdate(2,bouse);
					OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, bouse);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("extortion");
	return 1;
}
CMD:bizname(playerid, params[])//382
{
	LogCallback("bizname");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new result[128], string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /bizname [Name]");
		new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey];
		switch(bouse)
		{
			case 9999:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You don't own a business");
				return 1;
			}
			case 100 .. 9998:
			{
				strmid(SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbMessage], result, 0, 64, 255);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Business name set to %s",SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbMessage]);
				OnPropUpdate(3, bouse);
				OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3, bouse);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			}
			default:
			{
				strmid(BizzInfo[bouse][bMessage], result, 0, 64, 255);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Business name set to %s",BizzInfo[bouse][bMessage]);
				OnPropUpdate(2,bouse);
				OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, bouse);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bizname");
	return 1;
}


CMD:bizwithdraw(playerid, params[])//383
{
	LogCallback("bizwithdraw");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey];
		new cashdeposit, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", cashdeposit))
		{
			switch(bouse)
			{
                case 100 .. 9998:
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "  You Have $%d in your till.", SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbTill]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, string);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /bizwithdraw [amount]");
				}
				case 0 .. 99:
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "  You Have $%d in your till.", BizzInfo[bouse][bTill]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, string);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /bizwithdraw [amount]");
				}
				case 9999:
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You don't own a business");
				}
			}
		}
		switch(bouse)
		{
			case 9999:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You don't own a business");
				return 1;
			}
			case 100 .. 9998:
			{
				if(cashdeposit > SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbTill] || cashdeposit < 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You dont have that much");
					return 1;
				}
				if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 100,SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbEntranceX],SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbEntranceY],SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbEntranceZ]))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You are to far from your business");
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,cashdeposit);
					SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbTill] -= cashdeposit;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "  You Have Withdrawn $%d from your till Total: $%d ", cashdeposit,SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbTill]);
					OnPropUpdate(3,bouse);
					OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3, bouse);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
					return 1;
				}
			}
			case 0 .. 99:
			{
				if (cashdeposit > BizzInfo[bouse][bTill] || cashdeposit < 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You dont have that much");
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
					if (!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 100,BizzInfo[bouse][bExitX],BizzInfo[bouse][bExitY],BizzInfo[bouse][bExitZ]))
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You are to far from your business");
						return 1;
					}
					else
					{
						SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,cashdeposit);
						BizzInfo[bouse][bTill] -= cashdeposit;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "  You Have Withdrawn $%d from your till Total: $%d ", cashdeposit,BizzInfo[bouse][bTill]);
						OnPropUpdate(2,bouse);
						OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, bouse);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
						return 1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bizwithdraw");
	return 1;
}
CMD:bizbank(playerid,params[])
{
	new bouse = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPbiskey], string[128], cashdeposit;
	if(sscanf(params, "d", cashdeposit))
	{
		switch(bouse)
		{
			case 9999:
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You don't own a business");
			}
			case 100 .. 9998:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), " You Have $%d in your till.", SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbTill]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, string);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /bizbank [amount]");
			}
			case 0 .. 99:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "  You Have $%d in your till.", BizzInfo[bouse][bTill]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, string);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /bizbank [amount]");
			}
		}
	}
	if (cashdeposit > GetPlayerCash(playerid) || cashdeposit < 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You don't have enough to deposit that!");
    switch(bouse)
	{
		case 9999:
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You don't own a business");
		}
		case 100 .. 9998:
		{
			if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 100,SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbEntranceX],SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbEntranceY],SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbEntranceZ]))
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You are to far from your business");
				return 1;
			}
			else
			{
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-cashdeposit);
				SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbTill] += cashdeposit;
				ExtortionSBiz(bouse-100, cashdeposit);
				format(string, sizeof(string),"  You Have Banked $%d to your till Total: $%d ", cashdeposit,SBizzInfo[bouse-100][sbTill]);
				OnPropUpdate(3,bouse);
				OnPropTextdrawUpdate(3, bouse);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
				return 1;
			}
		}
		case 0 .. 99:
		{
			if (!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 100,BizzInfo[bouse][bExitX],BizzInfo[bouse][bExitY],BizzInfo[bouse][bExitZ]))
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You are to far from your business");
				return 1;
			}
    		else
			{
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-cashdeposit);
				BizzInfo[bouse][bTill] += cashdeposit;
				ExtortionBiz(bouse, cashdeposit);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "  You Have Banked $%d to your till Total: $%d ", cashdeposit,BizzInfo[bouse][bTill]);
				OnPropUpdate(2,bouse);
				OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, bouse);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
				return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bizbank");
	return 1;
}

CMD:agl(playerid, params[])//388
{
	LogCallback("agl");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new string[128];
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2)
        {
            new x_nr[24], giveplayerid;
			if(sscanf(params, "s[24]u", x_nr, giveplayerid))
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /agl [name] [playerid/PartOfName]");
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Available names: Driving, Flying, Sailing, Fishing, Weapon, Police.");
			}
			if(strcmp(x_nr,"flying",true) == 0)
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
				{
				    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
				    {
						if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPassport] == 1)
						{
				            format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've given a Flying License to %s (%d).",GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
					        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					        format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s has given you a Flying License.",GPN(playerid));
					        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pFlyLic] = 1;
  							format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Given a Flying License to %s (%d).",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
							ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
					        return 1;
						}
						else
						{
						    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player doesn't has a passport!");
						    return 1;
						}
					}
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"sailing",true) == 0)
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
				{
				    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
				    {
			            format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've given a Sailing License to %s (%d).",GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Admin %s has given you a Sailing License.",GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pBoatLic] = 1;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Given a Sailing License to %s (%d).",GPN(playerid) ,GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				        return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"driving",true) == 0)
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
				{
				    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
				    {
				        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPassport] == 1)
				        {
				            format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've given a Driving License to %s (%d).",GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
					        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Admin %s has given you a Driving License.",GPN(playerid));
					        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pCarLic] = 1;
  							format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Given a Driving License to %s (%d).",GPN(playerid) ,GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
							ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
					        return 1;
						}
						else
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "This player hasn't a passport!");
							return 1;
						}
					}
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
            else if(strcmp(x_nr,"fishing",true) == 0)
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
				{
				    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
				    {
			            format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've given a Fishing License to %s (%d).",GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Admin %s has given you a Fishing License.",GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pFishLic] = 1;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Given a Fishing License to %s (%d).",GPN(playerid) ,GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"weapon",true) == 0)
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
				{
				    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
				    {
			            format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've given a Weapon License to %s (%d).",GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Admin %s has given you a Weapon License.",GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pGunLic] = 1;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Given a Weapon License to %s (%d).",GPN(playerid) ,GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
				        return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
        }
        else
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not authorised to use this command!");
            return 1;
        }
    }
	LogCallback("agl");
    return 1;
}
CMD:showkeys(playerid, params[])//389
{
	LogCallback("showkeys");
	new para1, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params,"u", para1)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /showkeys [playerid/PartOfName]]");
	format(string,sizeof(string),"carkey: %d | carkey2: %d | vipcar: %d",PlayerInfo[para1][pPcarkey],PlayerInfo[para1][pPcarkey2],PlayerInfo[para1][pPvipcar]);
	SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,string);
	LogCallback("showkeys");
	return 1;
}

CMD:resetvip(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("resetvip");
	new id, level, days, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "udd", id, level, days)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /setvip [playerid/PartOfName] [Number(0-4)][Days (1-30, 92, 185]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(id))
		{
			if(id != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    	{
				new y,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
				PlayerInfo[id][pVIP] = level; PlayerInfo[id][pVIPDays] = days;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have been granted VIP Level %d",level);
				SCM(id, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have granted %s VIP Level %d.", GPN(id),level);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Set VIP Level %d for %d for %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), level, GPN(id), days);
				VIPLog(string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("resetvip");
	return 1;
}

CMD:setvip(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("setvip");
	new id, level, days, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "udd", id, level, days)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /setvip [playerid/PartOfName] [Number(0-4)][Days (1-30, 90, 180)]");
	if(level > 4 || level < 0) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Dont go below number 0, or above number 4!"); return 1; }
	if(days < 0 ) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Do not set the amount of days below 0"); return 1; }
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(id))
		{
			if(id != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    	{
				PlayerInfo[id][pVIP] = level;
				new gtrew = PlayerInfo[id][pGoldTokens]+25,y,m,d,h,mi,s;
				PlayerInfo[id][pVipInvited] = gettime();
				PlayerInfo[id][pVIPDays] = 86400 * days;
				getdate(y,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				new query[128];
				format(query,sizeof(query),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `VIP` = '%d', `VIPDays` = '%d', `VIPInvited` = '%d' WHERE `PlayerID` = '%d'",PlayerInfo[id][pVIP],PlayerInfo[id][pVIPDays],PlayerInfo[id][pVipInvited],PlayerInfo[id][pDBID]);
				mysql_query(query,THREAD_UPDATE,id);
				switch(level)
				{
					case 1: { PlayerInfo[id][pGoldTokens] = gtrew; }
					case 2: { PlayerInfo[id][pGoldTokens] = gtrew; }
					case 3: { PlayerInfo[id][pGoldTokens] = gtrew; PlayerInfo[playerid][pBuddyPass] += 1; }
					case 4: { PlayerInfo[id][pGoldTokens] = gtrew; PlayerInfo[playerid][pBuddyPass] += 2; }
				}
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have been granted VIP Level %d",level);
				SCM(id, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have granted %s VIP Level %d.", GPN(id),level);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Set VIP Level %d for %s for %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), level, GPN(id), days);
				VIPLog(string);
			}
   			else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Invalid ID/Name!"); }
    	}
   	}
	else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "You are not authorized to use that command!"); }
	LogCallback("setvip");
	return 1;
}
CMD:vipinvite(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("vipinvite");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] >= 3)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pBuddyPass] == 0) return SCM(playerid,-1, "You dont have a buddy pass!");
		new playa, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/vipinvite [playerid]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playa][pVIP] >= 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"Player is already a vip!");
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You have gave a trial pass to %s",GPN(playa));
		SCM(playerid,-1,string);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has given you a 1 day trial pass to vip!");
		SCM(playa,-1,string);
		PlayerInfo[playa][pVIPDays] = 86400;
		PlayerInfo[playa][pVipInvited] = gettime();
		PlayerInfo[playa][pVIP] = 1;
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pBuddyPass] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pBuddyPass] - 1;
		return 1;
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid,-1, "You must be a vip to do this!");
	}
	LogCallback("vipinvite");
	return 1;
}

CMD:mole(playerid, params[])//391
{
	LogCallback("mole");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
			new result[128], string[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /mole [mole text]");
			format(string, sizeof(string), "SMS: %s, Sender: MOLE (555)",result);
			if (gTeam[playerid] < 3){SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);}
			SendEnemyMessage(COLOR_YELLOW, string);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Sent a MOLE Message. [Message: %s].", GPN(playerid), result);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
				{
					if(gTeam[i] >= 3 && gPlayerSpawned[i])
					{
						RingTone[i] = 20;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not authorized to use this command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("mole");
	return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("hq");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
		{
		    new result[128], string[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /hq [hq text]");
			format(string, sizeof(string), "HQ: %s, over", result);
			if (gTeam[playerid] != 2 ){SCM(playerid, COLOR_DBLUE, string);}
			SendTeamBeepMessage(2, COLOR_DBLUE, string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("hq");
	return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("bigears");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2)
		{
			if (!BigEar[playerid])
			{
				BigEar[playerid] = 1;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   Your Ears Have Grown");
			}
			else if (BigEar[playerid])
			{
				BigEar[playerid] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   Your Ears Have Shrank");

			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " You are not authorized to use this command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bigears");
	return 1;
}
CMD:id(playerid, params[])//394
{
	LogCallback("id");
	new string[128], giveplayerid;
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /id [playerid]");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
	{
		format(string, sizeof(string), "..:Name: %s  ID:%d   Ping: %d	Level: %d:..", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, GetPlayerPing(giveplayerid), PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pLevel]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Invalid player");
	}
	LogCallback("id");
	return 1;
}
CMD:prison(playerid, params[])//395
{
	LogCallback("prison");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3)
    {
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   you are not authorized to use this command !");
        return 1;
    }
    new giveplayerid, reason[30], string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "us[30]", giveplayerid, reason)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /prison [playerid/PartOfName] [reason]");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid) && giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
    {
		format(string, sizeof(string), "* You placed %s in Fort DeMorgan.", GPN(giveplayerid));
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "* You were placed in Fort DeMorgan by Admin %s for %s.", GPN(playerid), reason);
		SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		WantedPoints[giveplayerid] = 0;
		WantedLevel[giveplayerid] = 0;
		PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pJailed] = 2;
		PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pJailTime][0] = 900;
		PlayerTextDrawShow(giveplayerid, Jailtimetd[giveplayerid]);
        SafeSetPlayerPos(giveplayerid, 107.2300,1920.6311,18.5208);
		SetPlayerWorldBounds(giveplayerid, 337.5694,101.5826,1940.9759,1798.7453); //285.3481,96.9720,1940.9755,1799.0811
		SafeSetPlayerInterior(giveplayerid,0);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s, has been prisoned by %s, for %s", GPN(giveplayerid), GPN(playerid), reason);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED,string);
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Prisoned %s for %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid), reason);
		JailLog(string);
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("prison");
	return 1;
}
CMD:unprison(playerid, params[])//396
{
	LogCallback("unprison");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 2)
    {
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   you are not authorized to use this command!");
        return 1;
    }
    new giveplayerid, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /unprison [playerid/PartOfName]");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
	{
	    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    {
			format(string, sizeof(string), "You unprisoned %s (%d).", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have been unprisoned by %s.", GPN(playerid));
			SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
			PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pJailTime][0] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pJailed] = 0;
			PlayerTextDrawHide(giveplayerid, Jailtimetd[giveplayerid]);
			SetPlayerWorldBounds(giveplayerid, 20000.0000,-20000.0000,20000.0000,-20000.0000);
			SafeSetPlayerPos(giveplayerid, 93.4852,1920.6235,18.0450);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), has been unprisoned by %s.", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, GPN(playerid));
			SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED,string);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Removed %s From Prison.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid));
			JailLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("unprison");
    return 1;
}
CMD:ajail(playerid, params[])//397
{
	LogCallback("ajail");
    new result[128], money, playa, string[128];
    if(sscanf(params, "uds[128]", playa, money, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /ajail [playerid/PartOfName] [time(minutes)] [reason]");
	if(playa == playerid || Untouchable[playa]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
	    {
	        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			{
				SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playa);
				WantedPoints[playa] = 0;
				SetPlayerColor(playa, TEAM_HIT_COLOR);
				PlayerInfo[playa][pJailed] = 1;
				PlayerInfo[playa][pJailTime][0] = money*60;
				SafeSetPlayerInterior(playa, 6);
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playa, 264.6288,77.5742,1001.0391);
				SetPlayerSkin(playa, 252);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You are jailed by %s for %d minutes, for %s", GPN(playerid), money, result);
				SCM(playa, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
                format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has Been Jailed by %s for %d Minute(s) for %s", GPN(playa), playa, GPN(playerid), money, result);
                SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string);
				PlayerInfo[playa][pDuty] = 0;
				new y, m, d;
				new h,mi,s;
				getdate(y,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has been jailed by %s | Reason: %s| Time: %d Mins |.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playa),GPN(playerid),result,money);
				JailLog(string);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Jailed by %s - Reason: %s - Time: %d Mins.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), result, money);
				AddPunishment(playa, string);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playa, Jailtimetd[playa]);
				return 1;
			}

		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " Invalid Player ");
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " You are not authorized to use this command!");
	}
	LogCallback("ajail");
	return 1;
}
CMD:fine(playerid, params[])//398
{
	LogCallback("fine");
    new playa, money, result[128], string[128];
    if(sscanf(params, "uds[128]", playa, money, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /fine [playerid/PartOfName] [money] <reason>");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
	    {
	        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	        {
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playa, - money);
                format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has Been Fined $%d by %s, for %s", GPN(playa), playa, money, GPN(playerid), result);
                SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "~r~~h~-Admin Fined- ~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~n~~y~~n~Money: ~g~$%d", money);
				GameTextForPlayer(playa, string, 7000, 3);
				new y, m, d;
				new h,mi,s;
				getdate(y,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has been fined by %s | Reason: %s | Money: $%d |.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playa),GPN(playerid), result, money);
				PayLog(string);
				AdminLog(string);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Fined by %s - Reason: %s - Money: $%d .",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), result,money);
				AddPunishment(playa, string);
				return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   you are not authorized to use that command!");
	}
	LogCallback("fine");
	return 1;
}
CMD:tod(playerid, params[])//399
{
	LogCallback("tod");
	new hour, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "d", hour)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /tod [timeofday] (0-23)");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
	{
		switch(hour)
		{
			case 0 .. 23:
			{
				SetWorldTime(hour);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "*** Time of the Day Has Been Changed to [%d]", hour);
				SendClientMessageToAll(TEAM_GROVE_COLOR,string);
			}
			default: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Hour Can't go Below 0 or Above 23 !"); return 1; }
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command !");
	}
	LogCallback("tod");
	return 1;
}
CMD:spayday(playerid, params[])//403
{
	LogCallback("spayday");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
    {
    	PayDay();
	}
	LogCallback("spayday");
	return 1;
}
stock ShowArrestReport(playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ShowArrestReport");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(arresting[playerid]))
	{
	    new areport[2012];
	    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"Hit restart to redo the arrest report or highlight the line you wish to edit and click edit");
	    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"when you are finished double click submit");
	    format(areport,sizeof(areport),"Arresting Officer: \t%s\r\nSuspect: \t%s\r\nCharges: \t%s\r\nAddition Info: \t%s\r\n{00FF00}Submit",ArrestInfo[playerid][aOfficer],ArrestInfo[playerid][aSuspect],ArrestInfo[playerid][aCharges],ArrestInfo[playerid][adInfo]);
	    ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_ARREST_REPORT,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Submit your report",areport,"Edit","Restart");
	}
	LogCallback("ShowArrestReport");
	return 1;
}
CMD:acnn(playerid, params[])// 404
{
	LogCallback("acnn");
    if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
	{
		new result[128], string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /acnn [cnn textformat ~n~=Newline ~r~=Red ~g~=Green ~b~=Blue ~w~=White ~y~=Yellow]");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Announced [%s].", GPN(playerid) , result);
		ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "~b~%s: ~w~%s",GPN(playerid),result);
		GameTextForAll(string, 5000, 6);
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
	}
	LogCallback("acnn");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setweapskill(playerid, params[])//406
{
	LogCallback("setweapskill");
	new weapon, string[128], amount, giveplayerid;
	if(sscanf(params, "udd", giveplayerid, weapon, amount))
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /setweapskill [playerid/PartOfName] [weapon] [amount]");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "| 1 Colt45 | 2 Silenced | 3 Deagle | 4 Shotgun | 5 Sawn-Off |");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "| 6 Combat | 7 Tec9/Mac10 | 8 SMG | 9 AK47 | 10 M4 |");
		return 1;
	}
    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
   	{
   	    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
   	    {
			if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
			{
				switch (weapon)
				{
					case 1:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPistSkill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_PISTOL, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's Colt45 Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Colt45 Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					case 2:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pSilenSkill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_PISTOL_SILENCED, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's Silenced Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Silenced Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					case 3:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDesertSkill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_DESERT_EAGLE, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's Deagle Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Deagle Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					case 4:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pShotgSkill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_SHOTGUN, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's Shotgun Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Shotgun Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					case 5:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pSawnSkill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_SAWNOFF_SHOTGUN, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's Sawn-Off Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Sawn-Off Level To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					case 6:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pCombSkill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_SPAS12_SHOTGUN, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's Combat Shotgun Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Combat Shotgun Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					case 7:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pUziSkill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_MICRO_UZI, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's MAC10/TEC9 Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) MAC10/TEC9 Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					case 8:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pSmgSkill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_MP5, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's MP5 Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) MP5 Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					case 9:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAkSkill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_AK47, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's AK47 Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) AK47 Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					case 10:
					{
					    if(amount < 0 || amount > 1000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Skill may not go Above 1000 And Below 0!"); return 1; }
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pM4Skill] = amount;
						SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_M4, amount);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The player's M4A4 Skill was set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) M4A4 Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SetPlayerSkills(giveplayerid);
						return 1;
					}
					default:
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
					}
				}

			}
			else
			{

				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
				return 1;
			}
		}//not valid id
	}//not connected
	LogCallback("SetWeapSkill");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setstat(playerid, params[])//407
{
	LogCallback("setstat");
	new giveplayerid, string[128], stat, amount;
	if(sscanf(params, "udd", giveplayerid, stat, amount))
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /setstat [playerid/PartOfName] [statcode] [amount]");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "|1 Level |2 SpawnHealth |3 UpgradePoints |4 Model |5 BankAccount");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "|6 PhoneNumber |7 RespectPoints |8 HouseKey |9 BizKey |10 RegularRank");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "|11 FMember |12 Det |13 Lawyer |14 Fixer |15 News |16 Jack |17 Drug");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "|18 Sex |19 Box |20 VehKey | 21 VehKey2 | 22 VIP VehKey | 23 Duty | 24 GPS | 25 VIPTime");
		return 1;
 	}
    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
   	{
   	    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
   	    {
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
			{
				switch (stat)
				{
					case 1:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pLevel] = amount;
						format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `level`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pLevel],PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDBID]);
						mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, giveplayerid);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player Was Set To Level %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Level To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Level to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 2:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pSHealth] = amount;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player Was Set To %d Spawnhealth ", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Spawn Health To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Spawn Health to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 3:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][gPupgrade] = amount;
						format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `upgradepoints`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][gPupgrade],PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDBID]);
						mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, giveplayerid);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player Was Set To %d Upgrade Points", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Upgrade Points To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Upgrade Points to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 4:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pModel] = amount;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player Was Set To Model %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Model To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Model to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 5:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAccount] = amount;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player Account Was Set To $%d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Bank Money To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Bank Money to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);

           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Phone Nr. To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);

	    				mysql_query(string, THREAD_UPDATE, giveplayerid);

						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 11:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pFMember] = amount;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player Family Member Was Set To %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
          				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Family Number To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
