						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 15:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pNewsSkill] = amount;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player News Reporter Skill Set To %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Reporter Skill To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Reporter Skill to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 18:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pSex] = amount;
						format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Sex`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pSex],PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDBID]);
						mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,giveplayerid);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player Sex to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Sex To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Reporter Skill to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 20:
					{
						if(amount != 9999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Can only be 9999");
					    PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPcarkey] = amount;
					    format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player VehKey Set To %d", amount);
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Veh Keyl1 To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Vehicle 1 Key to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 21:
					{
						if(amount != 9999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Can only be 9999");
					    PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPcarkey2] = amount;
					    format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player VehKey2 Set To %d", amount);
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Veh Key2 To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string,3);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Vehicle 2 Key to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 22:
					{
						if(amount != 9999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Can only be 9999");
					    PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPvipcar] = amount;
					    format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player VIP CarKey is set to %d", amount);
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) VIP CarKey To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string,3);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Vehicle 2 Key to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 23:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDuty] = amount;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player Duty Status Set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) Duty Status [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Duty Status %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 24:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pGPS] = amount;
						format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `GPS`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pGPS],PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDBID]);
						mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,giveplayerid);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player GPS Own was Set To %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) GPS ownership To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's GPS ownership Time to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					case 25:
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pVIPDays] = amount;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** The Player's VIP car key set to %d", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
           				format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s (%d) VIP Days To [%d].",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid,amount);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's VIP Days to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),amount);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					default:
					{
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** Invalid Stat Code", amount);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
					}
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
			}
		}//not valid id
	}//not connected
	LogCallback("setstat");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setint(playerid, params[])//408
{
	LogCallback("setint");
	new playa, string[128], intid;
	if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, intid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /setint [playerid/PartOfName] [interiorid]");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
	    {
	        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	        {
				new sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
				sendername = GPN(playerid);
				if(GetPlayerState(playa) == 2)
				{
					GetPlayerName(playa, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					SafeSetPlayerInterior(playa, intid);
					new vehicleid = GetPlayerVehicleID(playa);
					LinkVehicleToInterior(vehicleid, GetPlayerInterior(playa));
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have set %s's (%d) Interior to %d.", giveplayer,playa, intid);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "~w~Admin %s ~n~~w~Has Set Your Interior to ~y~(%d)", sendername, intid);
					GameTextForPlayer(playa, string, 4000, 3);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has set %s's (%d) interior to %d.",sendername,giveplayer,playa,intid);
					SendTesterAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Interior to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer,intid);
					GiveLog(string);
				}
				else
				{
	   				GetPlayerName(playa, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					SafeSetPlayerInterior(playa, intid);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have set %s's (%d) interior to %d.", giveplayer,playa, intid);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "~w~Admin %s ~n~~w~Has Set Your Interior to ~y~(%d)", sendername, intid);
					GameTextForPlayer(playa, string, 4000, 3);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has set %s's (%d) interior to %d",sendername,giveplayer,playa,intid);
					SendTesterMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Interior to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,sendername,giveplayer,intid);
					GiveLog(string);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command!");
	}
	LogCallback("setint");
	return 1;
}
CMD:fixvw(playerid, params[])//409
{
	LogCallback("fixvw");
	SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
	LogCallback("fixvw");
	return 1;
}

CMD:setadminlevel(playerid, params[])//413
{
	LogCallback("setadminlevel");
	new para1, level, playerlevel, string[128], sendername[24], giveplayer[24];
	if(sscanf(params, "ud", para1, level)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /[s]et[a]dmin[l]evel [playerid/PartOfName] [level(3-1338)]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid))
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(para1))
	    {
	        if(para1 != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	        {
 				if(level != playerlevel)
				{
					sendername = GPN(playerid);
					if(level >= 7 && level <= 1336) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Only levels 3-6 and 1337-1338 Are allowed!");
					if(level < 3 || level > 1338) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Only levels 3-6 and 1337-1338 Are allowed!");
					if(level > 4 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 1337) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You can only promote admins to lvl 5 or below");
					if(playerlevel >= 6 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 1337) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You can not demote Senior Administrators or Above.");
					GetPlayerName(para1, giveplayer, sizeof(giveplayer));
					format(string, sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]: %s has set %s (%d)'s Level to: [%d]", sendername, giveplayer, para1, level);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** %s Gave You Admin Level: %d",sendername, level);
					SCM(para1, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string);
				}
				if(level > PlayerInfo[para1][pAdmin])
				{
				    PlayerInfo[para1][pAdmin] = level;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Congratulations to %s, he is now a %s!",giveplayer, GetAdminRank(para1));
					SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
                    format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have promoted %s (%d) to %s.", giveplayer, para1,GetAdminRank(para1));
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
					PlayerInfo[para1][pHelper] = 3;
					if(playerlevel == 0 && level >= 1)
					{
					    admins ++;
					}
				}
				else
				{
				    PlayerInfo[para1][pAdmin] = level;
                    format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have demoted %s (%d) to %s.", giveplayer, para1, GetAdminRank(para1));
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string),"You have been demoted by (%d)%s to: %s",playerid, sendername, GetAdminRank(para1));
					SCM(para1, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
					if(level == 0)
					{
						PlayerInfo[para1][pHelper] = 1;
						admins --;
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   you are not authorized to use that command!");
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("setadminlevel");
	return 1;
}
CMD:sethouses(playerid, params[])//414
{
	LogCallback("sethouses");
    for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(BizzInfo); i++)
    {
		new string[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string),"LARP/Bizzes/%d.ini",i);
		if(dini_Exists(string))
		{
		    dini_IntSet(string, "Setted",1);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("sethouses");
	return 1;
}
CMD:v(playerid, params[])//415
{
	LogCallback("v");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] >= 1)
	{
		if(vchat[playerid] == 0)
		{
			new result[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /v [text]");
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "%s VIP %s: %s", GetVipLevel(playerid), GPN(playerid), result);
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[i][pVIP] >= 1)
			    {
					if(vchat[i] == 0)
					{
						SCM(i, COLOR_GREEN, tstring);
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("v");
	return 1;
}
CMD:rules(playerid, params[])
{
	new ruletext[1500];
 	strcat(ruletext, "Click each rule to show extensions\r\n1) Do not Metagame. \r\n2) Do not PowerGame.(DM)\r\n3) Do not Deathmatch.\r\n4) Roleplay at All Times\r\n5) Respect your fellow players and staff. \r\n6) Do not Revenge-Kill.\r\n7) Do not break the rules because other people do.\r\n8) Staff decisions are final\r\n");
	strcat(ruletext, "9) Disgusting, immoral and offensive role play\r\n10) Do not use acronyms in Character.\r\n11) English only.\r\n12) Advertising rules.\r\n13) Third party modifications.\r\n14) Do not Private Message the staff team in-game for\r\n15) No vehicle Surfing.\r\n16) Do not abuse San Andreas physics.\r\n17) Illegal names\r\n18) You need Senior Admin + approval to burn/destroy a property\r\n");
 	strcat(ruletext, "19) You are allowed to give or share your account(s)\r\n20)Bank robberies require admin approval and supervision.\r\n21)Advertising other servers and/or communities\r\n22) You are not allowed to profit by selling/buying SAMP-RP items/services.\r\n23) You must report bugs to the staff team.\r\n24)  Transferring currency, cars, and/or houses\r\n");
  	strcat(ruletext, "25) Weapon rules.\r\n26) Robbing & Scamming rules.\r\n27) Always roleplay fear\r\n28) No Crime Zones.\r\n29) Character Kills.\r\n30) Name Changes.\r\n");
   	strcat(ruletext, "31) Mask Rules.\r\n32) Visible actions.\r\n33) Skins.\r\n34) Lying to staff\r\n35) Baiting\r\n36) Kidnapping / Hostages\r\n37) Starting or encouraging drama.\r\n38) Everyone is expected to follow server rules at all times.\r\n");
    ShowServerDialog(playerid, DIALOG_RULES, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Server Rules", ruletext ,"Okay", "Cancel");
    return 1;
}
CMD:mywtc(playerid,params[])
{
	new string[128];
	format(string,sizeof(string),"Your walkie talkie is set to %dhtz",PlayerInfo[playerid][pWtc]);
	SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
	return 1;
}
	
CMD:wtc(playerid, params[])//417
{
	LogCallback("wtc");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWt] == 1)
	{
		new freq;
		if(sscanf(params, "d", freq)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /wtc [channel]");
		if(freq >= -999999 || freq <= 999999)
		{
			new string[128];
			format(string, sizeof(string), " You have set your walkie to %dhtz", freq);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, string);
		    PlayerInfo[playerid][pWtc] = freq;
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " Invalid channel number!");
		}
  	}
	LogCallback("wtc");
	return 1;
}

CMD:wt(playerid, params[])//418
{
	LogCallback("wt");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWt] == 1)
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pWtc] != 0)
        {
			new result[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE:/wt [text]");
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "**WT %s: %s **", GPN(playerid), result);
			SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, tstring, COLOR_RED, 10, 5000); //added by Narcotic to many people are bitching
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[i][pWtc] == PlayerInfo[playerid][pWtc])
			    {
					if(gPlayerLogged[i] == 1)
					{
				        SCM(i, 0xFFC663AA, tstring);
				        WtLog(tstring);
				    }
			    }
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("wt");
	return 1;
}
CMD:quitfamily(playerid, params[])//419
{
	LogCallback("quitfamily");
    new fid = PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember];
    new member = FamilyInfo[fid][FamilyMembers];
    FamilyInfo[fid][FamilyMembers] = member - 1;
    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You have quit your family");
    PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember] = 255;
	LogCallback("quitfamily");
    return 1;
}
CMD:quitfaction(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("quitfaction");
	new string[128];
	if(CanLeaveFaction[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] >= 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pLeader] >= 1)
	    {
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has left the faction.",GPN(playerid));
	        SendRadioMessage(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember], COLOR_GREY,string);
	        SCM(playerid,-1,"You have left the faction.");
            SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			ClearWepVariables(playerid);
			SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFFFFFF00);
   			SetPlayerSkin(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel]);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pTazerBullets] = 0;
	        PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] = 0;
	        PlayerInfo[playerid][pLeader] = 0;
	        PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pSwat] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 0;
			OnSwatDuty[playerid] = 0;
			AttachWeaponCorrectly(playerid, 99);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Member`='%d', `Leader`='%d', `Rank`='%d', `Swat`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember],PlayerInfo[playerid][pLeader],PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank],PlayerInfo[playerid][pSwat],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
			mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playerid);
		}else return SCM(playerid, -1, "* You are not part of a faction.");
	} else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You need to authorize yourself to quit the faction at /account!");
	LogCallback("quitfaction");
	return 1;
}
CMD:fcreate(playerid, params[])//420
{
	LogCallback("fcreate");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
        {
 			new family, giveplayerid, string[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "du", family, giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /fcreate [family] [playerid/PartOfName]");
			switch(family)
			{
				case 1 .. 14:
				{
					if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
					{
					    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
					    {
					        family -= 1;
					        if(FamilyInfo[family][FamilyTaken] == 1)
					        {
					            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That Family is already taken !" );
					            return 1;
					        }
					        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've made %s the Leader of a Family.",GPN(giveplayerid));
					        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Admin %s has made you the Leader of a Family.",GPN(playerid));
				        	SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					        format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",GPN(giveplayerid));
					        strmid(FamilyInfo[family][FamilyLeader], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        FamilyInfo[family][FamilyMembers] ++;
					        FamilyInfo[family][FamilyTaken] = 1;
					        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pFMember] = family;
					        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pModel] = FamilyInfo[family][FamilySkin1];
					        SetPlayerSkin(giveplayerid, FamilyInfo[family][FamilySkin1]);
					        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pRank] = 6;
					        SaveFamilies();
					        return 1;
					    }

					}
					else
					{
		                   SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is Offline !");
		                   return 1;
					}
				}
				default:
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Family Numbers must be between 1 & 14!");
				}
			}
        }
        else
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not authorized to use that command !");
            return 1;
        }
    }
	LogCallback("fcreate");
    return 1;
}
CMD:fdelete(playerid, params[])//421
{
	LogCallback("fdelete");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
        {
            new family, string[128];
            if(sscanf(params, "d", family)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE:/fdelete [gangslot]");
			switch(family)
			{
			    case 1 .. 14:
			    {
					family -= 1;
					if(FamilyInfo[family][FamilyTaken] != 1)
					{
				    	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That Family isn't taken !");
					    return 1;
					}
					format(string, sizeof(string), "   Family %d has been deleted !", family+1);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, string);
					ClearFamily(family);
				}
				default:
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " Family must be between 1 and 14!");
				}
			}
        }
        else
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not authorized to use that command !");
            return 1;
        }
    }
	LogCallback("fdelete");
    return 1;
}
CMD:togvip(playerid, params[])//422
{
	LogCallback("togvip");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] >= 1)
    {
        if(vchat[playerid] == 0)
        {
            vchat[playerid] = 1;
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, " VIP chat Turned off");
        }
        else
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, " VIP chat turned back on!");
            vchat[playerid] = 0;
        }
    }
	LogCallback("togvip");
    return 1;
}
CMD:dlocker(playerid, params[])//423
{
	LogCallback("dlocker");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] >= 1)
    {
        if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 7.0, -2654.5042,1396.5764,906.4609))
        {
			new string[128];
			switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
			{
			    case 1:
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Armor (%d Tokens)\r\nSkins (%d Tokens)\r\nPhone Number (%d Tokens)\r\n+1 Level Up (%d Tokens)\r\nDeagle(750 Tokens)", ARMOR_PRICE, SKIN_PRICE, PNUMBER_PRICE, LEVEL_PRICE);
            		ShowServerDialog(playerid, VIP_DIALOG, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Donation Locker", string, "Ok", "Cancel");
            	}
            	case 2:
            	{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Armor (%d Tokens)\r\nSkins (%d Tokens)\r\nPhone Number (%d Tokens)\r\n+1 Level Up (%d Tokens)\r\nDeagle(550 Tokens)", ARMOR_PRICE, SKIN_PRICE, PNUMBER_PRICE, LEVEL_PRICE);
            		ShowServerDialog(playerid, VIP_DIALOG, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Donation Locker", string, "Ok", "Cancel");
            	}
            	case 3:
            	{
            		format(string, sizeof(string), "Armor (%d Tokens)\r\nSkins (%d Tokens)\r\nPhone Number (%d Tokens)\r\n+1 Level Up (%d Tokens)\r\nDeagle(350 Tokens)", ARMOR_PRICE, SKIN_PRICE, PNUMBER_PRICE, LEVEL_PRICE);
            		ShowServerDialog(playerid, VIP_DIALOG, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Donation Locker", string, "Ok", "Cancel");
            	}
            	case 4:
            	{
            		format(string, sizeof(string), "Armor (%d Tokens)\r\nSkins (%d Tokens)\r\nPhone Number (%d Tokens)\r\n+1 Level Up (%d Tokens)\r\nDeagle(150 Tokens)", ARMOR_PRICE, SKIN_PRICE, PNUMBER_PRICE, LEVEL_PRICE);
            		ShowServerDialog(playerid, VIP_DIALOG, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Donation Locker", string, "Ok", "Cancel");
				}
			}
        }
    }
	LogCallback("dlocker");
    return 1;
}
CMD:lock(playerid, params[])//424
{
	LogCallback("lock");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] > 399 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] < 612 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] > 399 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] < 612 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar] > 399 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar] < 612)
	{
		for(new v; v<MAX_VEHICLES; v++)
		{
		    if(CarInfo[v][cUid] == playerid || CarInfo[v][cWcar] == playerid || ExtraKey[playerid] == v || HireCar[playerid] == v)
		    {
				new Float:cPos[3],E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
		        GetVehiclePos(v, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2]);
		        if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2]))
		        {
					GetVehicleParamsEx(v,E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		            if(D == 0)//if the car is unlocked
		            {
						SetVehicleParamsEx(v,E,L,A,1,H,T,O);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Car locked!");
						if(v == pC1[playerid])
						{
						    PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocked] = 1;
						    new string[128];
						    format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Locked`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocked],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
						    mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playerid);
						}
						else if(v == pC2[playerid])
						{
						    PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocked2] = 1;
						}
						else if(v == pC3[playerid])
						{
						    PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocked3] = 1;
						}
						return 1;
					}
					else
					{
					    SetVehicleParamsEx(v,E,L,A,0,H,T,O);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Car Unlocked");
						if(v == pC1[playerid])
						{
						    PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocked] = 0;
						    new string[128];
						    format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Locked`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocked],PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
						    mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playerid);
						}
						else if(v == pC2[playerid])
						{
						    PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocked2] = 0;
						}
						else if(v == pC3[playerid])
						{
						    PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocked3] = 0;
						}
						return 1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("lock");
	return 1;
}
CMD:alarm(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("alarm");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] > 399 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] < 612 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] > 399 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] < 612 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar] > 399 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar] < 612)
	{
		for(new v; v<MAX_VEHICLES; v++)
		{
			if(CarInfo[v][cUid] == playerid)
			{
				new Float:cPos[3];
				GetVehiclePos(v, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2]);
				if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2]))
				{
					if(CarInfo[v][cAlarm] == 0)
					{
						CarInfo[v][cAlarm] = 1;
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Alarm Activated");
						return 1;
					}
					else if(CarInfo[v][cAlarm] == 1)
					{
						CarInfo[v][cAlarm] = 0;
						new engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective;
						GetVehicleParamsEx(v, engine , lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
						SetVehicleParamsEx(v, engine, lights, VEHICLE_PARAMS_OFF, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Alarm Deactivated");
						stop alarmtimer[playerid];
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You're not in range of any of your cars...");
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("alarm");
	return 1;
}
CMD:vplate(playerid, params[])//425
{
	LogCallback("vplate");
    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
    {
        new car = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
        if(CarInfo[car][cUid] == playerid)
        {
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, " Custom licence plates cost $1000");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, " /vpark your car before continuing or your car will be tped away");
			ShowServerDialog(playerid, PLATE_DIALOG, DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT, "Vehicle Plates", "Please type your requested plate in the box", "Ok", "Cancel");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("vplate");
	return 1;
}
CMD:lights(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("lights");
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		new vid = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
		if(CarInfo[vid][cLights] == 0)
		{
			new engine, lights, alarm, doors, bonnet, boot, objective;
			GetVehicleParamsEx(vid,engine,lights,alarm,doors,bonnet,boot,objective);
			SetVehicleParamsEx(vid,engine, VEHICLE_PARAMS_ON, alarm,doors,bonnet,boot,objective);
			CarInfo[vid][cLights] = 1;
		}
		else if(CarInfo[vid][cLights] == 1)
		{
			new engine, lights, alarm, doors, bonnet, boot, objective;
			GetVehicleParamsEx(vid,engine,lights,alarm,doors,bonnet,boot,objective);
			SetVehicleParamsEx(vid,engine, VEHICLE_PARAMS_OFF, alarm,doors,bonnet,boot,objective);//turns the headlights on
			CarInfo[vid][cLights] = 0;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You're not in a car silly!");
	}
	LogCallback("lights");
	return 1;
}
CMD:vhood(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("vhood");
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		new veh = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
		new string[128];
		if(CarInfo[veh][cHood] == 0)//if hood is shut
		{
			new engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective;
			GetVehicleParamsEx(veh, engine , lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
			SetVehicleParamsEx(veh, engine, lights, alarm, doors, VEHICLE_PARAMS_ON, trunk, objective);//opens the hood
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s opens the hood of the car.", GPN(playerid));
            ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			CarInfo[veh][cHood] = 1;
		}
		else if(CarInfo[veh][cHood] == 1)
		{
			new engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective;
			GetVehicleParamsEx(veh, engine , lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
			SetVehicleParamsEx(veh, engine, lights, alarm, doors, VEHICLE_PARAMS_OFF, trunk, objective);//opens the hood
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s closes the hood of the car.", GPN(playerid));
            ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			CarInfo[veh][cHood] = 0;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You're not in any vehicle!");
	}
	LogCallback("vhood");
	return 1;
}
CMD:vtrunk(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("vtrunk");
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		new
			veh = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),
			string[128]
		;
		if(IsABike(veh) || IsAHeli(veh) || IsModelABoat(veh) || IsAPlane(veh))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "This vehicle does not have a trunk");

		if(CarInfo[veh][cTrunk] == 0)//if the trunk is closed
		{
			new engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective;
			GetVehicleParamsEx(veh, engine , lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
			SetVehicleParamsEx(veh, engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, VEHICLE_PARAMS_ON, objective);//opens the trunk
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s opens the trunk of the car.", GPN(playerid));
            ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			CarInfo[veh][cTrunk] = 1;
		}
		else if(CarInfo[veh][cTrunk] == 1)//if its opened
		{
			new engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective;
			GetVehicleParamsEx(veh, engine , lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
			SetVehicleParamsEx(veh, engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, VEHICLE_PARAMS_OFF, objective);//opens the hood
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s closes the trunk of the car.", GPN(playerid));
            ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			CarInfo[veh][cTrunk] = 0;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You're not in any vehicle!");
	}
	LogCallback("vtrunk");
	return 1;
}
CMD:vpark(playerid, params[])//426
{
	LogCallback("vpark");
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		new veh = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
		new cm = GetVehicleModel(veh);

		if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) != 0)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't vpark your car here, sorry!");

		if(CarInfo[veh][cUid] == playerid)
		{
			new Float:dPos[4];
			new Float:a, Float:health;
			GetVehiclePos(veh, dPos[0], dPos[1], dPos[2]);
			GetVehicleZAngle(veh, a);
			GetVehicleHealth(veh, health);
			if(cm == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey])
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1X] = dPos[0];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1Y] = dPos[1];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1Z] = dPos[2];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1A] = a;
				new color1, color2;
				GetVehicleColor(veh, color1, color2);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1C1] = color1;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1C2] = color2;
   				new cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 0);
   				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C1] = cmod;
   				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 1);
   				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C1] = cmod;
   				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 2);
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C1] = cmod;
                cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 3);
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 4);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 5);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 6);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 7);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 8);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 9);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 10);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 11);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 12);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C1] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 13);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C1] = cmod;
		    	GetVehicleZAngle(veh, dPos[3]);
				CarInfo[veh][cUid] = -1;
				DestroyVehicle(veh);
				veh = CreateVehicle(cm, dPos[0], dPos[1], dPos[2], dPos[3], PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1C1], PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1C2], -1);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, veh, 0);
				new car = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
				CarInfo[car][cUid] = playerid;
				pC1[playerid] = car;
				SetVehicleNumberPlate(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pPlate1]);
				SetVehicleToRespawn(car);
				AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C1]);
				AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C1]);
       	        AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C1]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C1]);
				AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C1]);
				SetVehicleNumberPlate(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pPlate1]);
				for(new i = 0; i < 10; i++)
				{
					CarInfo[pC1[playerid]][cGunTrunk][i]  = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1GunTrunk][i];
					CarInfo[pC1[playerid]][cTrunkAmmo][i] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar1TrunkAmmo][i];
				}
				OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
				ChangeVehicleColor(car, color1, color2);
				SetVehicleHealth(car, health);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, car, 0);
				if(IsModelABycicle(car))
				{
					new L,A,D,H,T,O;
					SetVehicleParamsEx(car,1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				}
			}
			else if(cm == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2])
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2X] = dPos[0];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2Y] = dPos[1];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2Z] = dPos[2];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2A] = a;
				new color1, color2;
				GetVehicleColor(veh, color1, color2);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2C1] = color1;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2C2] = color2;
				new cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 0);
   				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C2] = cmod;
   				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 1);
   				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C2] = cmod;
   				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 2);
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C2] = cmod;
                cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 3);
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 4);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 5);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 6);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 7);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 8);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 9);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 10);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 11);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 12);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C2] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 13);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C2] = cmod;
		    	GetVehicleZAngle(veh, dPos[3]);
				CarInfo[veh][cUid] = -1;
				DestroyVehicle(veh);
				veh = CreateVehicle(cm, dPos[0], dPos[1], dPos[2], dPos[3], PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2C1], PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2C2], -1);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, veh, 0);
				new car = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
				CarInfo[car][cUid] = playerid;
				pC2[playerid] = car;
				SetVehicleNumberPlate(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pPlate2]);
				SetVehicleToRespawn(car);
				AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C2]);
				AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C2]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C2]);
				AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C2]);
				SetVehicleNumberPlate(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pPlate2]);
				for(new i = 0; i < 10; i++)
				{
					CarInfo[pC2[playerid]][cGunTrunk][i]  = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2GunTrunk][i];
					CarInfo[pC2[playerid]][cTrunkAmmo][i] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar2TrunkAmmo][i];
				}
				OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
				SetVehicleHealth(car, health);
				ChangeVehicleColor(car, color1, color2);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, car, 0);
				if(IsModelABycicle(car))
				{
					new L,A,D,H,T,O;
					SetVehicleParamsEx(car,1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				}
			}
			else if(cm == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar])
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3X] = dPos[0];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3Y] = dPos[1];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3Z] = dPos[2];
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3A] = a;
				new color1, color2;
				GetVehicleColor(veh, color1, color2);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3C1] = color1;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3C2] = color2;
				new cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 0);
   				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C3] = cmod;
   				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 1);
   				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C3] = cmod;
   				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 2);
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C3] = cmod;
                cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 3);
                PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 4);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 5);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 6);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 7);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 8);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 9);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 10);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 11);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 12);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C3] = cmod;
				cmod = GetVehicleComponentInSlot(veh, 13);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C3] = cmod;
		    	GetVehicleZAngle(veh, dPos[3]);
				CarInfo[veh][cUid] = -1;
				DestroyVehicle(veh);
				veh = CreateVehicle(cm, dPos[0], dPos[1], dPos[2], dPos[3], PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3C1], PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3C2], -1);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, veh, 0);
				new car = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
				CarInfo[car][cUid] = playerid;
				pC3[playerid] = car;
				SetVehicleNumberPlate(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pPlate3]);
				SetVehicleToRespawn(car);
				AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM1C3]);
				AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM2C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM3C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM5C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM6C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM7C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM8C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM9C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM10C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM11C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM12C3]);
                AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM13C3]);
				AddVehicleComponent(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pM14C3]);
				SetVehicleNumberPlate(car, PlayerInfo[playerid][pPlate3]);
				for(new i = 0; i < 10; i++)
				{
					CarInfo[pC3[playerid]][cGunTrunk][i]  = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3GunTrunk][i];
					CarInfo[pC3[playerid]][cTrunkAmmo][i] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCar3TrunkAmmo][i];
				}
				OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
				ChangeVehicleColor(car, color1, color2);
				SetVehicleHealth(car, health);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, car, 0);
				if(IsModelABycicle(car))
				{
					new L,A,D,H,T,O;
					SetVehicleParamsEx(car,1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				}
			}
		}
		else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			new
				Float:a,
				Float:dPos[4],
				cowner = CarInfo[veh][cUid]
			;
			GetVehiclePos(veh, dPos[0], dPos[1], dPos[2]);
			GetVehicleZAngle(veh, a);
			if(cm == PlayerInfo[cowner][pPcarkey])
			{
			    PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1X] = dPos[0];
				PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1Y] = dPos[1];
				PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1Z] = dPos[2];
				PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1A] = a;
			}
			else if(cm == PlayerInfo[cowner][pPcarkey2])
			{
			    PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2X] = dPos[0];
				PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2Y] = dPos[1];
				PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2Z] = dPos[2];
				PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2A] = a;
			}
			else if(cm == PlayerInfo[cowner][pPvipcar])
			{
			    PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3X] = dPos[0];
				PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3Y] = dPos[1];
				PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3Z] = dPos[2];
				PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3A] = a;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, " You can only park your own car...");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("vpark");
	return 1;
}
CMD:policepark(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("policepark");
	new Float:x, Float:y, Float:z, Float:a, veh = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), cm = GetVehicleModel(veh), cowner = CarInfo[veh][cUid], string [256];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are duty banned and cannot use this command!");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You need to be on duty to use this command!");
		if(cm == PlayerInfo[cowner][pPcarkey])
		{
		    PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1X] = x;
			PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1Y] = y;
			PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1Z] = z;
			PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1A] = a;
			format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET ,`CarPosX`='%.2f',`CarPosY`='%.2f',`CarPosZ`='%.2f',`CarAngle`='%.2f', WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1X],PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1Y],PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1Z],PlayerInfo[cowner][pC1A],PlayerInfo[cowner][pDBID]);
  			mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,cowner);
		}
		else if(cm == PlayerInfo[cowner][pPcarkey2])
		{
		    PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2X] = x;
			PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2Y] = y;
			PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2Z] = z;
			PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2A] = a;
			format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET ,`2CarPosX`='%.2f',`2CarPosY`='%.2f',`2CarPosZ`='%.2f',`2CarAngle`='%.2f', WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2X],PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2Y],PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2Z],PlayerInfo[cowner][pC2A],PlayerInfo[cowner][pDBID]);
  			mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,cowner);
		}
		else if(cm == PlayerInfo[cowner][pPvipcar])
		{
		    PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3X] = x;
			PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3Y] = y;
			PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3Z] = z;
			PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3A] = a;
			format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET ,`3CarPosX`='%.2f',`3CarPosY`='%.2f',`3CarPosZ`='%.2f',`3CarAngle`='%.2f', WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3X],PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3Y],PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3Z],PlayerInfo[cowner][pC3A],PlayerInfo[cowner][pDBID]);
  			mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,cowner);
		}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You cannot park this vehicle!");
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1," You are not part of a police department!");
	LogCallback("policepark");
	return 1;
}
CMD:deletecar(playerid, params[])//427
{
	LogCallback("deletecar");
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		new
			veh = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)
		;
		if(CarInfo[veh][cUid] == playerid)
		{
			SellPlayerOwnedCar(playerid);
			SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
			OnPlayerUpdateEx(playerid);
			return 1;
   		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not in your vehicle so you can't sell it!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("deletecar");
	return 1;
}
CMD:vcolor(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("vcolor");
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		new veh = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
		new cm = GetVehicleModel(veh);
		if(CarInfo[veh][cUid] == playerid)
		{
			if(cm == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey])
			{
				new color1, color2;
				if(sscanf(params, "dd", color1, color2)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "USAGE: /vcolor [color1][color2]");
				ChangeVehicleColor(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), color1, color2);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1C1] = color1;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC1C2] = color2;
			}
			if(cm == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2])
			{
				new color1, color2;
				if(sscanf(params, "dd", color1, color2)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "USAGE: /vcolor [color1][color2]");
				ChangeVehicleColor(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), color1, color2);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2C1] = color1;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC2C2] = color2;
			}
			if(cm == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar])
			{
				new color1, color2;
				if(sscanf(params, "dd", color1, color2)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "USAGE: /vcolor [color1][color2]");
				ChangeVehicleColor(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), color1, color2);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3C1] = color1;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pC3C2] = color2;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("vcolor");
	return 1;
}
CMD:findcar(playerid, params[])//429
{
	LogCallback("findcar");
	if(PizzaBoy[playerid] >= 1 || GarbageMan[playerid] >= 1 || LawnMower[playerid] >= 1 || MatRunning[playerid] >= 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You'll need to /stopjob and clock out before you do anything personal like this");

	if(Trucking[playerid] >= 1 || JobCP[playerid] >= 1 || Farming[playerid] >= 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You'll need to /stopjob and clock out before you do anything personal like this");

	if(NeedsWater[playerid] != -1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You should probably water your weed plants first");

	new cid;
	if(sscanf(params, "d", cid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE:/findcar [slot 1-3]");
	switch(cid)
	{
	    case 1:
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] > 399 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey] < 612)
	        {
				for(new v; v<MAX_VEHICLES; v++)
				{
				    if(CarInfo[v][cUid] == playerid)
				    {
				        if(pC1[playerid] == v)
				        {
							new Float:cPos[3], string[128];
							new zone[MAX_ZONE_NAME];
							GetVehicle2DZone(v, zone, MAX_ZONE_NAME);
							GetVehiclePos(v, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2]);
							format(string, sizeof(string),"Your car is located in %s",zone);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
							SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2], 3.0,55,0);
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " You don't even have a car in slot 1!");
			}
		}
		case 2:
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] > 399 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPcarkey2] < 612)
		    {
		        for(new v; v<MAX_VEHICLES; v++)
		        {
					if(CarInfo[v][cUid] == playerid)
					{
						if(pC2[playerid] == v)
						{
						    new Float:cPos[3], string[128];
						    new zone[MAX_ZONE_NAME];
							GetVehicle2DZone(v, zone, MAX_ZONE_NAME);
						    GetVehiclePos(v, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2]);
				            format(string, sizeof(string),"Your car is located in %s",zone);
				            SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				            SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2], 3.0,55,0);
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " You don't even have a car in slot 2");
			}
		}
		case 3:
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar] > 399 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pPvipcar] < 612)
			{
		        for(new v; v<MAX_VEHICLES; v++)
		        {
					if(CarInfo[v][cUid] == playerid)
					{
						if(pC3[playerid] == v)
						{
						    new Float:cPos[3], string[128];
						    new zone[MAX_ZONE_NAME];
							GetVehicle2DZone(v, zone, MAX_ZONE_NAME);
						    GetVehiclePos(v, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2]);
				            format(string, sizeof(string),"Your car is located in %s",zone);
				            SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				            SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, cPos[0], cPos[1], cPos[2], 3.0,55,0);
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " You don't even have a vipcar...");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("findcar");
	return 1;
}

    format(string, sizeof(string),"[DEBUG]: Your Virtual World is %d", GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, string);
	LogCallback("world");
	return 1;
}

CMD:cardebug(playerid, params[])//435
{
	LogCallback("cardebug");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
    {
        if(cDebug == 1)
        {
            cDebug = 0;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "[DEBUG]: Car Debug mode is now Off");
		}
		else
		{
		    cDebug = 1;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "[DEBUG]: Car Debug mode is now On");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("cardebug");
	return 1;
}
CMD:makeircadmin(playerid, params[])//439
{
	LogCallback("makeircadmin");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new giveplayerid, string[128], channel;
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", giveplayerid, channel)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " USAGE: /makeircadmin [playerid/PartOfName] [ChannelNr] ");
		if(channel > 10 || channel < 0) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Dont go below number 0, or above number 10!"); return 1; }
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		    {
		        if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(cstring,sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Made %s Admin of IRC Channel %d.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),channel);
					AdminLog(cstring);
					ChatLog(cstring);
					LoginLog(cstring);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've made %s an IRC Admin over Channel %d.", GPN(giveplayerid), channel);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s has made you an IRC Admin over Channel %d.", GPN(playerid), channel);
					SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", GPN(giveplayerid));
					switch(channel)
					{
					    case 1:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[0][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[0][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[0][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					    case 2:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[1][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[1][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[1][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					    case 3:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[2][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[2][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[2][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					    case 4:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[3][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[3][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[3][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					    case 5:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[4][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[4][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[4][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					    case 6:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[5][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[5][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[5][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					    case 7:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[6][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[6][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[6][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					    case 8:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[7][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[7][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[7][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					    case 9:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[8][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[8][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[8][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					    case 10:
					    {
					        strmid(IRCInfo[9][iAdmin], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
					        IRCInfo[9][iNeedPass] = 0; IRCInfo[9][iLock] = 0;
					    }
					}
					SaveIRC();
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   you are not authorized to do that !");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("makeircadmin");
	return 1;
}

CMD:setskin(playerid, params[])//441
{
	LogCallback("setskin");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new para1, level, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", para1, level)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE:/setskin [playerid] [skinid]");
		if(level > 299 || level < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Wrong skin ID!"); return 1; }
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(para1))
		    {
		        if(para1 != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					PlayerInfo[para1][pChar] = level;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** Administrator %s Has Changed Your Skin.", GPN(playerid));
					SCM(para1, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** You Granted %s skin number %d.", GPN(para1),level);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Gave Skin [%d] to %s (%d).",GPN(playerid), level, GPN(para1), para1);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
	    			SetPlayerSkin(para1, PlayerInfo[para1][pChar]);
				}
			}//not connected
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setskin");
	return 1;
}

CMD:nocp(playerid, params[])//448
{
	LogCallback("nocp");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "** Successfuly Cleared Any Open and Unseen Checkpoints");
	DPCP(playerid);
	LogCallback("nocp");
	return 1;
}
CMD:gotosfdocks(playerid, params[])//449
{
	LogCallback("gotosfdocks");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
			if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)
			{
				new tmpcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
				SetVehiclePos(tmpcar, -1589.2644,106.9119,3.5495);
				TelePos[playerid][0] = 0.0;TelePos[playerid][1] = 0.0;
				LinkVehicleToInterior(tmpcar, 0);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);

			}
			else
			{
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, -1589.2644,106.9119,3.5495);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			}
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			DPCP(playerid);

		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command !");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("gotosfdocks");
	return 1;
}

		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
			if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)
			{
				new tmpcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
				SetVehiclePos(tmpcar, 1432.6451,1378.7216,11.5507);
				TelePos[playerid][0] = 0.0;TelePos[playerid][1] = 0.0;
				LinkVehicleToInterior(tmpcar, 0);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);

			}
			else
			{
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1432.6451,1378.7216,11.5507);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			}
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			DPCP(playerid);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command !");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("gotolvap");

			if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)

			}
			else
			{
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1529.6,-1691.2,13.3);

CMD:gotorpl(playerid, params[])//452
{
	LogCallback("gotorpl");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
		{
			if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)
			{
				new tmpcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
				SetVehiclePos(tmpcar, 478.0687,-1498.9708,20.4831);
				TelePos[playerid][0] = 0.0;TelePos[playerid][1] = 0.0;
				LinkVehicleToInterior(tmpcar, 0);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			}
			else
			{
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 478.0687,-1498.9708,20.4831);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			}
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = 0;
			DPCP(playerid);

		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command !");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("gotorpl");
	return 1;
}

				SetVehicleToRespawn(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1352.1194,-1759.2534,13.5078);
			}
			else
			{
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1352.1194,-1759.2534,13.5078);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			}
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			DPCP(playerid);

		}

CMD:goback(playerid, params[])//457
{
	LogCallback("goback");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
            if(AdminPos[playerid][0] != 0.00)
            {
                SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, AdminPos[playerid][0], AdminPos[playerid][1], AdminPos[playerid][2]);
                AdminPos[playerid][0] = 0.00;
			    AdminPos[playerid][1] = 0.00;
			    AdminPos[playerid][2] = 0.00;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("goback");
	return 1;
}
CMD:adminarea(playerid, params[])//458
{
	LogCallback("adminarea");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
		    new Float:X,Float:Y,Float:Z;
		    GetPlayerPos(playerid, X,Y,Z);
		    AdminPos[playerid][0] = X;
		    AdminPos[playerid][1] = Y;
		    AdminPos[playerid][2] = Z;
			if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)
			{
				SetVehicleToRespawn(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 370.6108,-1705.1226,17.03853);
			}
			else
			{
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 370.6108,-1705.1226,17.0385);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			}
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Welcome, Admin.   To go back to your old position type /goback!");
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			DPCP(playerid);

		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command !");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("adminarea");
	return 1;
}

CMD:go(playerid, params[]) // TAKE NOTE
{
    new string[128];
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
	    if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15, 1589.053344,-1638.123168,14.122960))
		{
			if(pdmainstatus == 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Gate is Already Open!"); return 1; }
			MoveDynamicObject(pdmaingate,1844.95, -1718.30, 10.97, 0.8);
	      	SetTimer("closepdgate", 12000, 0);
	     	SCM(playerid, COLOR_BLUE,"The gate is open and will close in 7 seconds.");
	   		format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes his/her remote and opens the gate.", GPN(playerid));
	   		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	   		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1851.72, -1722.17, 10.97);
	     	pdmainstatus = 1;
		}
		else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15,1545.3225,-1627.8137,14.7720))
		{
			if(pdsideparkstatus == 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Gate is Already Open!"); return 1; }
			MoveDynamicObject(pdsideparkgate,1915.50, -1681.52, 8.51, 0.8);
	      	SetTimer("closepdgate", 12000, 0);
	     	SCM(playerid, COLOR_BLUE,"The gate is open and will close in 7 seconds.");
	   		format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes his/her remote and opens the gate.", GPN(playerid));
	   		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	   		PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1907.62, -1681.52, 8.51);
	     	pdsideparkstatus = 1;
		}
    	else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Not near a Gate that you can use.");
		}
	}
	else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 12 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pLeader] == 12)
	{
 		if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15, 1702.8900, -1751.7600, 12.9000))
		{
			if(fdg == 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Gate is Already Opened"); return 1; }
			MoveDynamicObject(fdgate,1702.8900, -1759.3860, 12.9000, 1.5);
	      	SetTimer("GateCloseFD", 9000, 0);
	      	SCM(playerid, COLOR_BLUE,"FD gate is opened and will close in 7 seconds.");
	      	format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes his/her remote and opens FD gate.", GPN(playerid));
	      	ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	      	fdg2 = 1;
		}
		else if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15, 1736.8600, -1742.3600, 12.7200))
		{
			if(fdg2 == 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Gate is Already Opened"); return 1; }
			MoveDynamicObject(fdgate2, 1745.5900, -1742.3600, 12.7200, 1.5);
	      	SetTimer("GateCloseFD", 9000, 0);
	      	SCM(playerid, COLOR_BLUE,"FD gate is opened and will close in 7 seconds.");
	      	format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes his/her remote and opens FD gate.", GPN(playerid));
	      	ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	      	fdg2 = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Not near a Gate that you can use.");
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You don't have a remote control.");
	}
	return 1;
}
CMD:firstfloor(playerid, params[])//152
{
	LogCallback("pdup");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(GetPlayerState(playerid) == 1)
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdminDuty] == 1)
	        {
                if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 1,1425.7352,-1646.4257,10001.1904))
	            {
	            	SetPlayerPos(playerid, 1560.4187,-1646.5631,10001.1904);
	            	GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Welcome To First Floor",5000,1);
					SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,0);
					StreamPlayer(playerid);
				}
	        }
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("pdup");
	return 1;
}

CMD:dealership(playerid, params[])//465
{
	LogCallback("dealership");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
		    new list[] = "1\tSports\n2\tLowriders\n3\tSaloons\n4\tOff Road\n5\tAircrafts\n6\tMotorbikes\n7\tBoats\n8\tTrucks\n9\tVIPCars";
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,123,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Dealerships:",list,"Tele","Cancel");
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,123,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Dealerships:",list,"Tele","Cancel");
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("dealership");
	return 1;

CMD:gotocar(playerid, params[])//466
{
	LogCallback("gotocar");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new testcar, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", testcar)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /gotocar [carid]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			new Float:cwx2,Float:cwy2,Float:cwz2;
			GetVehiclePos(testcar, cwx2, cwy2, cwz2);
			if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)
			{
				SetVehicleToRespawn(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
				SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, cwx2,cwy2,cwz2+2);
			}
			else
			{
			    SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, cwx2,cwy2,cwz2+2);
			}
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "** You have been teleported");
			new y,m,d,h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /gotocar %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),testcar);
			AdminCommandLog(string);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command!");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("gotocar");
	return 1;
}

	LogCallback("mark");

		else

		}

CMD:gotomark(playerid, params[])//468
{
	LogCallback("gotomark");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)
			{
				new tmpcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
				SetVehiclePos(tmpcar, TeleportDest[playerid][0],TeleportDest[playerid][1],TeleportDest[playerid][2]);
				TelePos[playerid][0] = 0.0;TelePos[playerid][1] = 0.0;
				DPCP(playerid);
			}
			else
			{
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, TeleportDest[playerid][0],TeleportDest[playerid][1],TeleportDest[playerid][2]);
			}
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "** You have been teleported");
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command!");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("gotomark");
	return 1;
}
CMD:gotopd(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("gotopd");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
    {
		SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid,1215.3820,-1386.7716,13.4129);
		SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, 91);
		SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
		SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,0);
    }else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are not a staff member!");
	LogCallback("gotopd");
    return 1;
}
CMD:goto(playerid, params[])//471
{
	LogCallback("goto");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new plo, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", plo)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE:/goto [playerid/partofname]");
		new Float:plocx,Float:plocy,Float:plocz;
		if (IsPlayerConnected(plo))
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
			{
				GetPlayerPos(plo, plocx, plocy, plocz);
				switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
				{
					case 1:
					{
						SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy+2, plocz);
						SetPlayerInterior(playerid,GetPlayerInterior(plo));
						SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,GetPlayerVirtualWorld(plo));
					}
					case 2:
					{
						new tmpcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
						SetVehiclePos(tmpcar, plocx, plocy+4, plocz);
						TelePos[playerid][0] = 0.0; TelePos[playerid][1] = 0.0;
						SetPlayerInterior(playerid,GetPlayerInterior(plo));
						SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,GetPlayerVirtualWorld(plo));
					}
				}
				new y,m,d,h,mi,s;
				getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /goto %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(plo));
				AdminCommandLog(string);
			}
			else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command!"); return 1; }
		}
		else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "Invalid Player ID"); return 1; }
	}
	LogCallback("goto");
	return 1;
}
CMD:gethere(playerid, params[])//472
{
	LogCallback("gethere");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new plo, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", plo)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /gethere [playerid/PartOfName]");
		new Float:plocx,Float:plocy,Float:plocz;
		if (IsPlayerConnected(plo))
		{
		    if(plo != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
				if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
				{
					GetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy, plocz);
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pInt] > 0)
					{
						SafeSetPlayerInterior(plo,PlayerInfo[playerid][pInt]);
						PlayerInfo[plo][pLocal] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pLocal];
					}
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pInt] == 0)
					{
						SafeSetPlayerInterior(plo,0);
					}
					if(plocz > 930.0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pInt] == 0) //the highest land point in sa = 526.8
					{
						SafeSetPlayerInterior(plo,1);
						PlayerInfo[plo][pInt] = 1;
					}
					if (GetPlayerState(plo) == 2)
					{
						TelePos[plo][0] = 0.0;
						TelePos[plo][1] = 0.0;
						new tmpcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(plo);
						SetVehiclePos(tmpcar, plocx, plocy+4, plocz);
					}
					else
					{
						SafeSetPlayerPos(plo,plocx,plocy+2, plocz);
					}
					SetPlayerVirtualWorld(plo, PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld]);
					if(BizzEntered[playerid] != 9999)
					{
						BizzEntered[plo] = BizzEntered[playerid] = enterbizz[playerid];
					}
					new y,m,d,h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /gethere %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(plo));
					AdminCommandLog(string);
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "Player Not Connected!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("gethere");
	return 1;
}
CMD:getcar(playerid, params[])//473
{
	LogCallback("getcar");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new plo;
		if(sscanf(params, "d", plo)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /getcar [carid]");
		new Float:plocx,Float:plocy,Float:plocz;
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			GetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy, plocz);
			SetVehiclePos(plo,plocx+8,plocy, plocz);
			LinkVehicleToInterior(plo, GetPlayerInterior(playerid));
			SetVehicleVirtualWorld(plo, GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid));
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "   you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("getcar");
	return 1;
}
CMD:fuelcars(playerid, params[])//474
{
	LogCallback("fuelcars");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1338)
        {
            for(new c=0;c<MAX_VEHICLES;c++)
			{
				Gas[c] = GasMax;
			}
			SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_ORANGE, "** All cars filled with Fuel!");
        }
        else
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not an Admin ! ");
            return 1;
        }
    }
	LogCallback("fuelcars");
    return 1;
}
CMD:issuegunlic(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] > 5)
	        {
				new playa;
				if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/issuegunlic [playerid]");
				if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
				{
					new string[128];
					format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has issued you a weapons license",GPN(playerid));
					SendClientMessage(playa,COLOR_ORANGE,string);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"You have issued %s their weapons license",GPN(playa));
					SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_ORANGE,string);
					PlayerInfo[playa][pGunLic] = 1;
				} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Invalid player id");
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not a high enough rank to do this");
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not on duty");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not even a cop");
	return 1;
}
	        
	        


CMD:weaponequip(playerid, params[])//478
{
	LogCallback("weaponequip");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, gun, ammo, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "udd", playa)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /weaponequip [Player ID / Player Name] [Weapon ID] [Ammo]");
		if(sscanf(params, "d", gun))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /weaponequip [playerid/PartOfName] [weaponid] [ammo]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, "1(Brass) 2(Nite) 3(Club) 4(knife) 5(bat) 6(Shovel) 7(Cue) 8(Katana) 9(Chainsaw) 10-13(Dildo)");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, "14(Flowers) 15(Cane) 16(Grenades) 17(Teargas) 18(Molotovs) 22(Pistol) 23(SPistol) 24(Eagle)");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD4, "25(Shotgun) 26(sawn-off) 27(Combat) 28(TEC9) 29(MP5) 30(AK47) 31(M4) 32(MAC10) 33(Country)");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, "34(Sniper) 35(RPG) 37(Flamethrower) 38(Minigun) 41(spray) 42(exting) 43(Camera) 46(Parachute)");
		}
		if(gun < 1||gun > 46||gun==19||gun==20||gun==21||gun==44||gun==45)
		{ SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** Invalid WeaponID!"); return 1; }
		if(sscanf(params, "d", ammo)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " You must specify how many bullets!");
		if(ammo <1||ammo > 49999){ SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** Dont go below 1 or above 49999 bullets!"); return 1; }
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid))
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playa, gun, ammo);
                    new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave to %s the Weapon Id %d with %d Ammo.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),gun,ammo);
					GiveLog(string);
					AdminLog(string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("weaponequip");
	return 1;
}

		}
