CMD:setfight(playerid, params[])//482
{
	LogCallback("setfight");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, item, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, item))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /setfight [playerid/PartOfName] [fight style]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, "STYLES: | 0: Default | 1: Boxing | 2: Kung Fu | 3: Grab'n'Kick | 4: KneeHead |");
			return 1;
		}
		if(item < 0||item > 5) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Style May Not Go Above 0 And Below 5!"); return 1; }
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					switch(item)
					{
						case 1:
						{
							PlayerPlaySound(playa, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
							PlayerInfo[playa][pFS] = 1;
							SetPlayerFightingStyle (playa, FIGHT_STYLE_BOXING);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "~p~%s ~w~Has Set Your ~y~Fighting Style ~w~to ~g~%d [Boxing] !!", GPN(playerid),item);
							GameTextForPlayer(playa,string,4000,3);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s's Fighting Style to %d [Boxing]",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),item);
							ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
							SetPlayerSkills(playa);
							return 1;
						}
						case 2:
						{
							PlayerPlaySound(playa, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
							PlayerInfo[playa][pFS] = 2;
							SetPlayerFightingStyle (playa, FIGHT_STYLE_KUNGFU);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "~p~%s ~w~Has Set Your ~y~Fighting Style ~w~to ~g~%d [KungFu] !!", GPN(playerid),item);
							GameTextForPlayer(playa,string,4000,3);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s's Fighting Style to %d [KungFu]",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),item);
							ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
                            SetPlayerSkills(playa);
							return 1;
						}
						case 3:
						{
							PlayerPlaySound(playa, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
							PlayerInfo[playa][pFS] = 3;
							SetPlayerFightingStyle (playa, FIGHT_STYLE_GRABKICK);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "~p~%s ~w~Has Set Your ~y~Fighting Style ~w~to ~g~%d [Grab'n'Kick] !!", GPN(playerid),item);
							GameTextForPlayer(playa,string,4000,3);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s's Fighting Style to %d [Grab'n'Kick]",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),item);
							ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
							SetPlayerSkills(playa);
							return 1;
						}
						case 0:
						{
							PlayerPlaySound(playa, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
							PlayerInfo[playa][pFS] = 0;
							SetPlayerFightingStyle (playa, FIGHT_STYLE_NORMAL);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "~p~%s ~w~Has Set Your ~y~Fighting Style ~w~to ~g~%d [Default] !!", GPN(playerid),item);
							GameTextForPlayer(playa,string,4000,3);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s's Fighting Style to %d [Default]",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),item);
							ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
							SetPlayerSkills(playa);
							return 1;
						}
						case 4:
						{
							PlayerPlaySound(playa, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
							PlayerInfo[playa][pFS] = 4;
							SetPlayerFightingStyle (playa, FIGHT_STYLE_KNEEHEAD);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "~p~%s ~w~Has Set Your ~y~Fighting Style ~w~to ~g~%d [KneeHead] !!", GPN(playerid),item);
							GameTextForPlayer(playa,string,4000,3);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set %s's Fighting Style to %d [KneeHead]",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),item);
							ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
							SetPlayerSkills(playa);
							return 1;
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setfight");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setgender(playerid, params[])//483
{
	LogCallback("setgender");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, age, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, age)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /setgender [playerid/PartOfName] [gender] (1 male) (2 female)");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					switch(age)
					{
			            case 1:
			            {
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] = 1;
							format(string, sizeof(string), "** %s (%d) Has Set Your gender to Male !",GPN(playerid),playerid);
							SCM(playa, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						}
						case 2:
						{
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] = 2;
							format(string, sizeof(string), "** %s (%d) Has Set Your gender to Female !",GPN(playerid),playerid);
							SCM(playa, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						}
						default:
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** Only Genders 1 (male) and 2 (female) allowed!");
							return 1;
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setgender");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setage(playerid, params[])//484
{
	LogCallback("setage");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, age, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, age)) return	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /setage [playerid/PartOfName] [age]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					PlayerInfo[playa][pAge] = age;
					format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Age`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playa][pAge],PlayerInfo[playa][pDBID]);
					mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playa);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** %s (%d) Has Set Your Age to %d !",GPN(playerid),playerid,age);
					SCM(playa, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setage");
	return 1;
}
CMD:vr(playerid, params[])//490
{
	LogCallback("vr");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 4)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		    return 1;
		}
		if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		{
		    RepairVehicle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Vehicle Fixed !");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("vr");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setbiz(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("setbiz");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
	{
	    new type,Float:X,Float:Y,Float:Z,string[128],string2[256];
		GetPlayerPos(playerid,X,Y,Z);
		if(sscanf(params, "d", type))
		{
			SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE: /setbizz [type]");
			SCM(playerid, -1, "TYPES: 0 (Cluckin Bell) - 1 (Burger Shot) - 2 (Pizza Stack) - 3 (Donut Shop) - 4 (24-7) - 5 (Strip Club) - 6 (Bar) - 7 (Gym)");
            SCM(playerid, -1, "TYPES: 8 (Sex Shop) - 9 (Binco) - 10 (Ammunation) - 11 (Disco) - 12 (Restaurant) - 13 (ZIP) - 14(Victom) - 15 (Sub Urban)");
			return 1;
		}
		for(new houseid = 0; houseid < sizeof(BizzInfo); houseid++)
		{
		    if(BizzInfo[houseid][bSetted] == 0)
		    {
		        format(string,sizeof(string),"LARP/Bizzes/%d.ini",houseid);
		        dini_Create(string);
				switch(type)
				{
					case 0: // Cluckin
					{
				        BizzInfo[houseid][bExitX] = 365.779296;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bExitY] = -9.169898;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bExitZ] = 1001.851623;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bBuyPrice] = 325000;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bLevelNeeded] = 6;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bInterior] = 9;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bInteriorNr] = 20;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bProducts] = BizzInfo[houseid][bMaxProducts];
						strmid(BizzInfo[houseid][bMessage],"Cluckin' Bell",0,strlen("Cluckin' Bell"),255);
					}
					case 1: // Burger
					{
				        BizzInfo[houseid][bExitX] = 366.032409;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bExitY] = -72.639999;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bExitZ] = 1001.507812;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bBuyPrice] = 325000;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bLevelNeeded] = 6;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bInterior] = 10;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bInteriorNr] = 21;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bProducts] = BizzInfo[houseid][bMaxProducts];
						strmid(BizzInfo[houseid][bMessage],"Burger Shot",0,strlen("Burger Shot"),255);
					}
					case 2: // Pizza
					{
				        BizzInfo[houseid][bExitX] = 372.3918;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bExitY] = -133.1661;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bExitZ] = 1001.4922;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bBuyPrice] = 325000;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bLevelNeeded] = 6;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bInterior] = 5;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bInteriorNr] = 22;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bProducts] = BizzInfo[houseid][bMaxProducts];

						strmid(BizzInfo[houseid][bMessage],"Barber Shop",0,strlen("Barber Shop"),255);
					}
					case 18: // Barber Shops
					{
						BizzInfo[houseid][bExitX] = -2638.7832;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bExitY] = 1403.1351;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bExitZ] = 906.4609;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bBuyPrice] = 350000;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bLevelNeeded] = 10;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bInterior] = 20;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bInteriorNr] = 3;
						BizzInfo[houseid][bProducts] = BizzInfo[houseid][bMaxProducts];
						strmid(BizzInfo[houseid][bMessage],"Alhambra ",0,strlen("Alhambra"),255);
					}
				}
				BizzInfo[houseid][bEntranceX] = X;
				BizzInfo[houseid][bEntranceY] = Y;
				BizzInfo[houseid][bEntranceZ] = Z;
				BizzInfo[houseid][bVirWorld] = houseid;
				BizzInfo[houseid][bSetted] = 1;
				EvaluateBizz(houseid);
				strmid(BizzInfo[houseid][bOwner],"The State",0,strlen("The State"),255);
                strmid(BizzInfo[houseid][bExtortion],"No-One",0,strlen("No-One"),255);
				format(string, sizeof(string),"* Created the bizz number %d. The bizz was set automatically, Use /edit to edit it if you want.",houseid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"[AdmCmd]{dfebff}: %s Has Set Bizz: [%d]'s entrance to [%f - %f - %f].",GPN(playerid),houseid,X,Y,Z);
				ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
				format(string2,sizeof(string2),"Bizz is Unowned! \n %s \n Bizz ID: %d \n Price: $%d \n Level Needed: %d \n To Buy This, /buybiz",BizzInfo[houseid][bMessage],houseid, BizzInfo[houseid][bBuyPrice],BizzInfo[houseid][bLevelNeeded]);
				BizzLabel[houseid] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(string2 ,0x00FF00AA,X,Y,Z,50, 0, 1);
				BizzPickup[houseid] = CreateDynamicPickup(1274,1,X,Y,Z,-1);
				OnPropUpdate(2,houseid);
				OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, houseid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_ERROR,"* The label will appear on next server restart due to limit of labels!");
				new y, m, d;
				new h,mi,s;
				getdate(y,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set the bizz %d.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),houseid);
				AdminLog(string);
				break;
		    }
		}
	}
	else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not a high enough level admin to use this command.");
	LogCallback("setbiz");
	return 1;

}
CMD:factiondrugs(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("factiondrugs");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
	{
		new playa,drug,amount,string[128],str[256];
		if(sscanf(params,"udd",playa,drug,amount))
		{
			SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/factiondrugs [playerid] [drugid] [amount]");
			SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Drug Ids, 1)Pot,2)Crack,3)Coke");
			return 1;
		}
		if(playa == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || !IsPlayerConnected(playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Invalid Player");
		if(drug < 1 || drug > 3) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"invalid drug id");
		if(amount > 1)
		{
		    switch(drug)
		    {
		        case 1://pot
		        {
		            PlayerInfo[playa][pDrugs][3] += amount;
		            format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has just given %d grams of weed to %s",GPN(playerid),amount,GPN(playa));
		        }
		        case 2:
		        {
		            PlayerInfo[playa][pDrugs][5] += amount;
		            format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has just given %d grams of crack to %s",GPN(playerid),amount,GPN(playa));
		        }
		        case 3:
		        {
		            PlayerInfo[playa][pDrugs][4] += amount;
		            format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has just given %d grams of coke to %s",GPN(playerid),amount,GPN(playa));
		        }
			}
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_ORANGE,string);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(str,sizeof(str), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d][FACTION DRUGS] %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,string);
			AdminLog(str);
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Invalid amount");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not an admin you cannot use this command");
	LogCallback("factiondrugs");
	return 1;
}

CMD:factiongun(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("factiongun");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
	{
		new playa,gun,amount,string[128],str[256];
		if(sscanf(params,"udd",playa,gun,amount)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/factiongun [playerid] [weaponid] [amount]");
		if(playa == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || !IsPlayerConnected(playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Invalid playerid");
		if(gun < 0 || gun > 35) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"invalid weapon id");
		if(amount > 0)
		{
		    SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playa,gun,amount);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has just given a faction weapon to %s",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa));
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_ORANGE,string);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(str,sizeof(str), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d][FACTION WEAPON] %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,string);
			AdminLog(str);
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Invalid ammo amount");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not an admin you can't use this command");
	LogCallback("factiongun");
	return 1;
}

CMD:unsetbiz(playerid, params[])//494
{
	LogCallback("unsetbiz");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new houseid, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", houseid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /unsetbizz [bizzid]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
  			if(houseid >= 0 && houseid <= sizeof(BizzInfo))
		    {
    			if(BizzInfo[houseid][bSetted] == 1)
		        {
		            BizzInfo[houseid][bSetted] = 0;
					DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(BizzLabel[houseid]);
					DestroyDynamicPickup(BizzPickup[houseid]);
					OnPropUpdate(2,houseid);
					foreach(Player, i)
				    {
				        if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
				        {
				            if(PlayerInfo[i][pPbiskey] == houseid)
				            {
				                SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, BizzInfo[houseid][bBuyPrice]);
				                PlayerInfo[i][pPbiskey] = 9999;
							}
							else
							{
								new sqlQuery[300];
								format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE samp_users SET Bizz=9999, Money=Money+%d WHERE Username='%s'", BizzInfo[houseid][bBuyPrice], BizzInfo[houseid][bOwner]);
								mysql_query(sqlQuery);
							}
						}
					}
					format(string, sizeof(string),"* Destroyed the bizz number %d. This bizz is now unset.",houseid);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Un-Set the bizzid %s.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),houseid);
					AdminLog(string);
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This bizz isn't setted!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* ID Must not go above 500 and below 0");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("unsetbiz");
	return 1;
}
CMD:unsethouse(playerid, params[])//495
{
	LogCallback("unsethouse");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new houseid, string[128], sqlQuery[300];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", houseid)) return	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /unsethouse [houseid]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
  			if(houseid >= 0 && houseid <= 1100)
		    {
    			if(HouseInfo[houseid][hSetted] == 1)
		        {
					DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(HouseLabel[houseid]);
					DestroyDynamicPickup(HousePickup[houseid]);
					format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "DELETE FROM `samp_houses` WHERE `HouseID`='%d'", houseid);
					mysql_query(sqlQuery);
					foreach(Player, i)
				    {
				        if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
				        {
				            if(PlayerInfo[i][pPhousekey] == houseid)
				            {
				                SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, HouseInfo[houseid][hValue]);
				                PlayerInfo[i][pPhousekey] = 9999;
							}
							else
							{
								format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "UPDATE samp_users SET House=9999, Money=Money+%d WHERE Username='%s'", HouseInfo[houseid][hValue], HouseInfo[houseid][hOwner]);
								mysql_query(sqlQuery);
							}
						}
					}
					format(string, sizeof(string),"* Destroyed the house number %d. This house is now unset.",houseid);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Un-Set the houseid %s.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),houseid);
					AdminLog(string);
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This house isn't setted!");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* ID must not go above 1024 or below 0");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("unsethouse");
	return 1;
}
CMD:weather(playerid, params[])//496
{
	LogCallback("weather");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 5)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		    return 1;
		}
		new weather;
		if(sscanf(params, "d", weather)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /weather [weatherid]");
		switch(weather)
		{
			case -100 .. 9999:
			{
				new string[128];
				SetWeather(weather);
		   		format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN] %s has changed everyone's weather to %d.", GPN(playerid),weather);
				ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "World's Weather Has Been Changed to %d",weather);
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED,string);
			}
			default:
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " Weatherid can't be below -100 or greater than 9999!");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("weather");
	return 1;
}
CMD:money(playerid, params[])//497
{
	LogCallback("money");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, money;
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /money [playerid/PartOfName] [money]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					new string[128];
					SafeResetPlayerCash(playa);
					//ConsumingMoney[playa] = 1;
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playa, money);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has set %s (%d)'s money to $%d.", GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),playa,money);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** Succesfuly Set %s Money to %d", GPN(playa),money);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("money");
	return 1;
}
CMD:bankmoney(playerid, params[])//498
{
	LogCallback("bankmoney");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, money;
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /bankmoney [playerid/PartOfName] [money]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					new string[128];
					PlayerInfo[playa][pAccount] = money;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has set %s (%d)'s money to $%d.", GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),playa,money);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** Succesfuly Set %s Money to %d", GPN(playa),money);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's Money to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),money);
					GiveLog(string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bankmoney");
	return 1;
}
CMD:payday(playerid, params[])//499
{
	LogCallback("payday");
 	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        new money;
        if(sscanf(params, "d", money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /payday [money]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
			if(money < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Payday can't be below 1");
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 5 && money > 10000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $10000");
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 6 && money > 50000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $50000");
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 && money > 999999999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $999999999");
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
			    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			    {
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, money);
				}
			}
			new string[128];
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Given a Payday of $%d",GPN(playerid),money);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "It's Payday! You receive $%d from the government.",money);
			SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave a Payday of %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),money);
			GiveLog(string);
			AdminLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("payday");
	return 1;
}
CMD:moneyall(playerid, params[])//500
{
	LogCallback("moneyall");
 	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new money, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /moneyall [money]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 && money > 999999999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $999999999");
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
			    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			    {
			        SafeResetPlayerCash(i);
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, money);
				}
			}
			format(string, sizeof(string), "It's HippyDay! Your money was set to $%d by the government.",money);
			if(money < 0)
			{
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED,string);
			}
			else
			{
			    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
			}
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set everyone's money to $%d",GPN(playerid),money);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s set everyone's money to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),money);
			GiveLog(string);
			AdminLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("moneyall");
	return 1;
}
CMD:bankmoneyall(playerid, params[])//501
{
	LogCallback("bankmoneyall");
 	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new money, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " USAGE:/bankmoneyall amount");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 && money > 999999999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $999999999");
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
			    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			    {
			        PlayerInfo[i][pAccount] = money;
				}
			}
			format(string, sizeof(string), "It's HippyDay! Your bank money was set to $%d by the government.",money);
			if(money < 0)
			{
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED,string);
			}
			else
			{
			    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
			}
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Set everyone's bank money to $%d",GPN(playerid),money);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s set everyone's money to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),money);
			GiveLog(string);
			AdminLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bankmoneyall");
	return 1;
}
CMD:taxday(playerid, params[])//502
{
	LogCallback("taxday");
 	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new money;
		if(sscanf(params, "d", money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " USAGE:/taxday [taxamount]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
		{
			if(money < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Taxday can't be below 1");
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 5 && money > 10000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $10000");
   			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 6 && money > 50000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $50000");
            if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 && money > 999999999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $999999999");
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
			    if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			    {
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(i, -money);
				}
			}
			new string[128];
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Given a Taxday of $%d",GPN(playerid),money);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "It's Taxday! You pay $%d to the government.",money);
			SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED,string);
			new y, m, d;
			new h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave a Taxday of %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),money);
			GiveLog(string);
			AdminLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("taxday");
	return 1;
}
CMD:reward(playerid, params[])//503
{
	LogCallback("reward");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, money, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /reward [playerid/PartOfName] [money]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 4)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
		            if(money < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Payday can't be below 1");
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 4 && money > 5000000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $5000000");
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 && money > 999999999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $999999999");
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playa, money);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** Received an Special Bonification of $%d !!",money);
					SCM(playa,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has given a reward of $%d to %s",GPN(playerid),money, GPN(playa));
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave to %s's $%d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),money);
					GiveLog(string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("reward");
	return 1;
}

CMD:bankreward(playerid, params[])//504
{
	LogCallback("bankreward");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, money, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /bankreward [playerid/PartOfName] [money]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
		            if(money < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Payday can't be below 1");
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 6 && money > 5000000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $5000000");
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 && money > 999999999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $999999999");
                    PlayerInfo[playa][pAccount] += money;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** Received an Special Interest of $%d !!",money);
					SCM(playa,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has given an Interest of $%d to %s",GPN(playerid),money, GPN(playa));
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave to %s's $%d (bank)",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),money);
					GiveLog(string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("bankreward");
	return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("tax");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, money, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /tax [playerid/PartOfName] [money]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
		            if(money < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Payday can't be below 1");
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 6 && money > 5000000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $5000000");
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 && money > 999999999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $999999999");
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playa, -money);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** Received a Tax of $%d",money);
					SCM(playa,COLOR_NICERED,string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has given a tax of $%d to %s",GPN(playerid),money, GPN(playa));
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;

					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave a tax to %s's of $%d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),money);
					GiveLog(string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("tax");
	return 1;

CMD:banktax(playerid, params[])//506
{
	LogCallback("banktax");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, money, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, money)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /banktax [playerid/PartOfName] [money]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
		            if(money < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Payday can't be below 1");
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] == 6 && money > 5000000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $5000000");
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337 && money > 999999999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your Money limit is $999999999");
					PlayerInfo[playa][pAccount] -= money;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** Received a Bank Tax of $%d",money);
					SCM(playa,COLOR_NICERED,string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has given a tax of $%d to %s",GPN(playerid),money, GPN(playa));
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave a tax to %s's of $%d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),money);
					GiveLog(string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("banktax");
	return 1;
}

CMD:richlist(playerid, params[])//509
{
	LogCallback("richlist");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You're no authorized to use that command . ");
            return 1;
        }
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, "Rich Users online:");
		new string[128];
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
			    if(GetPlayerCash(i) >= 100000 || PlayerInfo[i][pAccount] >= 100000)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d) - In Hand: $%d | In Bank: $%d", GPN(i), i, GetPlayerCash(i), PlayerInfo[i][pAccount]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("richlist");
	return 1;
}
CMD:punch(playerid, params[])//511
{
	LogCallback("punch");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", playa)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE:/punch [playerid]");
		new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1  || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
		            new targetlevel = PlayerInfo[playa][pAdmin];
					new playerlevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin];
					if(targetlevel > playerlevel) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You can not ban People that is higher Than You!");
                    if(playa != playerid && Untouchable[playa]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
					GetPlayerPos(playa, slx, sly, slz);
					SafeSetPlayerPos(playa, slx, sly, slz+20);
					PlayerPlaySound(playa, 1130, slx, sly, slz+20);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has Punched %s (%d).",GPN(playerid), GPN(playa), playa);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have Successfuly Punched %s (%d)", GPN(playa), playa);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("punch");
	return 1;
}
CMD:mute(playerid, params[])//513
{
	LogCallback("mute");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", playa)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /mute [playerid/PartOfName]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
				    if(playa != playerid && Untouchable[playa]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
					if(PlayerInfo[playa][pMuted] == 0)
					{
						PlayerInfo[playa][pMuted] = 1;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Muted %s (%d).",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),playa);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SCM(playa, COLOR_NICERED, "Muted by An Administrator!");
					}
					else
					{
						PlayerInfo[playa][pMuted] = 0;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Un-Muted %s (%d).",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),playa);
						ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
						SCM(playa, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Unmuted by An Administrator!");
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("mute");
	return 1;
}
CMD:nick(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("nick");
	new id,y,m,d,h,mi,s,string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", id)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /nick [playerid/PartOfName]");
	if(PlayerInfo[id][pDBID] == 3003) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has been kicked by %s for: Please use a Proper Firstname_Lastname. Thanks!",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(id),GPN(playerid)); KickLog(string);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Kicked by %s - Please use a Proper Firstname_Lastname. Thanks!",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid)); AddPunishment(id, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has been kicked by Administrator %s for: Please use a Proper Firstname_Lastname. Thanks!", GPN(id), id, GPN(playerid)); SendAdminMessage(COLOR_NICERED, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has kicked you. Please use a Proper Firstname_Lastname. Thanks!", GPN(playerid)); SCM(id,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
		OnPlayerUpdateEx(id);
		ServerKick(id);
	}
	LogCallback("nick");
	return 1;
}
CMD:kick(playerid, params[])//514
{
	LogCallback("kick");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
    	new giveplayerid, string[128], result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "us[128]", giveplayerid, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /kick [playerid/PartOfName] <reason>");
		if(giveplayerid != playerid && Untouchable[giveplayerid]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
   		new targetlevel = PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAdmin]; new playerlevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin];
		if(targetlevel > playerlevel) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You can not Kick People that is higher Than You!");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					new y, m, d, h,mi,s; getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has been kicked by %s for: %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(giveplayerid),GPN(playerid), result); KickLog(string);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Kicked by %s - Reason: %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),result); AddPunishment(giveplayerid, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has been kicked by Administrator %s for: %s", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, GPN(playerid), result); SendAdminMessage(COLOR_NICERED, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have Been Kicked by Administrator %s for: %s", GPN(playerid), result); SCM(giveplayerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "~r~~h~Admin Kicked: ~n~~r~%s",(result));
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, string, 6000, 3);
					OnPlayerUpdateEx(giveplayerid);
					ServerKick(giveplayerid);
					return 1;
				}
			}
		}
		else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "Player not connected");}
	}
	LogCallback("kick");
	return 1;
}
CMD:unjail(playerid, params[])//517
{
	LogCallback("unjail");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
    	new giveplayerid, result[128], string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "us[128]", giveplayerid, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /aunjail [playerid/PartOfName] <reason>");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pJailed] >= 1)
			        {
						new y, m, d, h,mi,s; getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Unjailed %s for: %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),result); JailLog(string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has been unjailed by Administrator %s", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, GPN(playerid), result); SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string);
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pJailTime][0] = 0;
						return 1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1,"user not connected");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("unjail");
	return 1;
}
CMD:write(playerid, params[])//518
{
	LogCallback("write");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3)
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are not Authorised to use this Command!");
            return 1;
		}
    	new colour, result[128], string[128];
    	if(sscanf(params, "ds[128]", colour, result))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "HINT: /write [Colour Number] [text]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, "COLOURS: Red(1) Orange(2) Blue(3) Yellow(4) LightBlue(5) Pink(6) Lime(7) Green(8) White(9) Grey(10) Sea(11) Cream(12)");
			return 1;
		}
		switch(colour)
		{
			case 1:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",result);
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string); //
			}
			case 2:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_ORANGE, string); //
			}
			case 3:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_BLUE, string); //
			}
			case 4:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_YELLOW, string); //
			}
			case 5:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string); //

			}
			case 6:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_PINK, string); //
			}
			case 7:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string); //
			}
			case 8:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_GREEN, string); //
			}
			case 9:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_WHITE, string); //
			}
			case 10:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_GREY, string); //
			}
			case 11:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_SEA, string); //
			}
			case 12:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
				SendClientMessageToAll(TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, string); //
			}
			case 13:
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
					SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string); //
			    }
			    else
			    {
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Only Developoers or Above may use this Command!");
			        return 1;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("write");
	return 1;
}

CMD:countdown(playerid, params[])//520
{
	LogCallback("countdown");
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
    {
        new countdowns, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", countdowns)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /coutdown [seconds(3-60)]");
		if((countdowns > 60 || countdowns < 3) && PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1337) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* Seconds must not go above 60 or below 3!");
        if(CountdownRunning == 0)
        {
   			CountdownRunning = 1;
			CountdownSeconds = countdowns;
			CountdownTimer = SetTimer("CountDown",1000,true);
		    format(string, sizeof(string),"~p~Countdown: ~w~%d",countdowns);
		    TextDrawSetString(CountdownTD, string);
			TextDrawShowForAll(CountdownTD);
		}
		else
		{
		    KillTimer(CountdownTimer);
		    TextDrawHideForAll(CountdownTD);
		    CountdownRunning = 1;
			CountdownSeconds = countdowns;
			CountdownTimer = SetTimer("CountDown",1000,true);
		    format(string, sizeof(string),"~p~Countdown: ~w~%d",countdowns);
		    TextDrawSetString(CountdownTD, string);
			TextDrawShowForAll(CountdownTD);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("countdown");
	return 1;
}
CMD:unwarn(playerid, params[])//521
{
	LogCallback("countdown");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
    	new giveplayerid, result[128], string[128];
    	if(sscanf(params, "us[128]", giveplayerid, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /unwarn [playerid/PartOfName] <reason>");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
   					if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pWarned] != 1 && PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pWarned] != 2)
   					{
   					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_NICERED, "** Player is not Warned!");
   					    return 1;
					}
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Unwarned %s (%d) For: %s.", GPN(playerid), GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, result);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Was UnWarned by %s for: %s.", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, GPN(playerid), result);
					SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "~g~~h~Admin Unwarn: ~n~~g~%s", result);
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, string, 7500, 3);
					PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pWarned] = 0;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "** %d is not an active player.", giveplayerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("unwarn");
	return 1;
}
CMD:warn(playerid, params[])//522
{
	LogCallback("warn");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
    	new giveplayerid, result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "us[128]", giveplayerid, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /warn [playerid/PartOfName] [reason]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					new string[128], y, m, d, h,mi,s;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s",(result));
     				new targetlevel = PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAdmin];
					new playerlevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin];
					if(targetlevel > playerlevel) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You can't warn people higher than you!");
                    if(giveplayerid != playerid && Untouchable[giveplayerid]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
					getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Warned by %s - Reason: %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), result); AddPunishment(giveplayerid, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has been Warned by Administrator %s for %s", GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid, GPN(playerid),result); SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You Have been Warned by Administrator %s for %s",GPN(playerid), result); SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Warned %s (%d) for %s",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid, result); SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
					return 1;
				}
			}
		}
		else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "Player Not Connected"); }
	}
	LogCallback("warn");
	return 1;
}
CMD:skick(playerid, params[])//523
{
	LogCallback("skick");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
    	new giveplayerid, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /skick [playerid/PartOfName]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Secretly Kicked %s (%d) From the Server", GPN(playerid) , GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has been secretely kicked by %s.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(giveplayerid), GPN(playerid));
					KickLog(string);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Secretely Kicked by %s.",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
					AddPunishment(giveplayerid, string);
                    ServerKick(giveplayerid);
			    }
			}
			else
			{
            	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "PlayerNotConnected" );
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("skick");
	return 1;
}

CMD:ban(playerid, params[])//524
{
	LogCallback("ban");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        new playersip[64], giveplayerid, string[128], result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "us[128]", giveplayerid, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /ban [playerid/PartOfName] <reason>");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		    {
		        if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					GetPlayerIp(giveplayerid,playersip,sizeof(playersip));
					if(giveplayerid != playerid && Untouchable[giveplayerid]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
					new targetlevel = PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAdmin];
					new playerlevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin];
					if(targetlevel > playerlevel) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You can not ban People that is higher Than You!");
					new y, m, d, h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has been banned by %s for: %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(giveplayerid),GPN(playerid), result);
					BanLog(string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has been Banned by Administrator %s for %s", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, GPN(playerid),result);
					SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have Been Banned by Administrator %s for %s", GPN(playerid), result);
					SCM(giveplayerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					SCM(giveplayerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "If You Feel that This has Been an Error, Report the Admin to www.samprp.net");
					SCM(giveplayerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "To Get Unbanned Post an Unban Request at Our Forums samprp.net");
					SCM(giveplayerid,COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Don't Evade, Otherwise you wont get unbanned");
   					SafeSetPlayerPos(giveplayerid,264.6288,77.5742,1001.0391);
	                SafeSetPlayerInterior(giveplayerid, 6);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "~r~~h~Admin Ban: ~n~~r~%s",(result));
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, string, 6000, 3);
					PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pBanned] = 1;
					ScriptBan(giveplayerid,playerid,result);
					return 1;
				}
			}//not connected
		}
		else
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "** %d is not an active player.", giveplayerid);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("ban");
	return 1;
}
CMD:fban(playerid, params[])//528
{
	LogCallback("fban");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        new playersip[64], giveplayerid;
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /fban [playerid/PartOfName] <reason>");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid))
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		    {
		        if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					GetPlayerIp(giveplayerid,playersip,sizeof(playersip));
					new result[128], string[128];
					if(sscanf(params, "u", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " You must include a reason!");
					new y, m, d;
					new h,mi,s;
					getdate(y,m,d);
					gettime(h,mi,s);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Fake Banned %s for: %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),result);
					KickLog(string);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Fake Banned by %s - Reason: %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),result);
					AddPunishment(giveplayerid, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Has been Banned by Administrator %s for %s", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, GPN(playerid),result);
					SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Fake-Banned %s (%d) for: %s", GPN(playerid), GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, result);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have Been Banned by Administrator %s for %s", GPN(playerid), result);
					SCM(giveplayerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					SCM(giveplayerid,COLOR_BLUE, "You Just got Banned. OWNED");
					SafeSetPlayerPos(giveplayerid,264.6288,77.5742,1001.0391);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "~r~~h~Admin Ban: ~n~~r~%s",result);
					GameTextForPlayer(giveplayerid, string, 6000, 3);
	                SafeSetPlayerInterior(giveplayerid, 6);
					ServerKick(giveplayerid);
					return 1;
				}
			}//not connected
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "playernotconnected");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("fban");
	return 1;
}
CMD:freeze(playerid, params[])//529
{
	LogCallback("freeze");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", playa)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /freeze [playerid/PartOfName]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
					if(PlayerInfo[playa][pFrozen] == 0)
					{
					    if(playa != playerid && Untouchable[playa]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
   						PlayerInfo[playa][pFrozen] = 1;
						IsFrozen[playa] = true;
   						TogglePlayerControllable(playa, 0);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Frozen %s (%d).",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),playa);
						SendTesterAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
						SCM(playa, COLOR_NICERED, "You have been frozen by an Administrator!");
					}
					else
					{
   						PlayerInfo[playa][pFrozen] = 0;
   						IsFrozen[playa] = false;
   						TogglePlayerControllable(playa, 1);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Un-Frozen %s (%d).",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),playa);
						SendTesterAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
						SCM(playa, COLOR_NICERED, "You have been unfrozen by an Administrator!");
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("freeze");
	return 1;
}
CMD:cam(playerid, params[])//531
{
	LogCallback("cam");
    new cam, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "d", cam)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /cam [1/2/3/4]");
	if(cam > 0 || cam < 5)
	{
		Unspec[playerid][sCam] = cam;
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Switching to cam %d",Unspec[playerid][sCam]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
	}
	LogCallback("cam");
	return 1;
}

CMD:staff(playerid, params[])//532
{
	LogCallback("staff");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "|____ SA-MP Roleplay Online Team Members ____|");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
	/*	if(IsPlayerConnected(i))No need to use this when using foreach.
		{*/
		new string[128], bool:duty;
		if(PlayerInfo[i][pAdminDuty] == 1 || ModDuty[i] == 1){duty = true;}
		else if(PlayerInfo[i][pAdminDuty] == 0 || ModDuty[i] == 0){duty = false;}
		if(PlayerInfo[i][pAdmin] >=3 && PlayerInfo[i][pAppearList] == 0 || PlayerInfo[i][pMod] == 1 && PlayerInfo[i][pAppearList] == 0)
		{
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s | %s | %s",GetAdminRank(i),GPN(i),(duty ? ("On Duty") : ("Off Duty")));
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		}
	//	}
	}
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "IMPORTANT: If an online player not on this claims to be staff");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "report them - /re ID impersonating staff. All online staff members");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "will appear in this list.");
	LogCallback("staff");
	return 1;
}

CMD:admins(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_staff(playerid, params);
}

CMD:masked(playerid, params[])//533
{
	LogCallback("masked");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You're no authorized to use that command . ");
        return 1;
    }
	new string[128];
	format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Checked For Masked Users Online.", GPN(playerid));
	ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, "Masked Users online:");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[i][pMaskuse] == 1)
		    {
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d)", GPN(i), i);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("masked");
	return 1;
}
CMD:suspectlist(playerid, params[])//534
{
	LogCallback("suspectlist");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1)
    {
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You're no authorized to use that command . ");
        return 1;
    }
	new string[128];
	format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Checked For Suspicious Users Online.", GPN(playerid));
	ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Suspicious Users online:");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
		    if(Checked[i] == 0)
		    {
				if(PlayerInteriorHacking[i] == 1)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Is suspected of Interior Switching Hacking. (INT: %d)",GPN(i),i,PlayerSuspiciousInterior[i]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
				}
				if(PlayerSpeedHacking[i] == 1)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Is suspected of Speed Hacking. (SPEED: %d)",GPN(i),i,PlayerSuspiciousSpeed[i]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
				}
				if(PlayerBunnyJumping[i] == 1)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Is suspected of Bunny Jumping. (JUMPS: %d)",GPN(i),i,PlayerBunnyJumped[i]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
				}
				if(PlayerOnCashInbalance[i] == 1)
			    {
 					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Is possibly on a Cash Inbalance. (CASH: %d)",GPN(i),i,(GetPlayerCash(i) - GetPlayerCash(i)));
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
				}
				if(PlayerFailedToLogin[i] == 1)
			    {
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Failed to Login at RCON (ATTEMPTS: %d)",GPN(i),i,LogingAttempts[i]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
				}
				if(PlayerFakeDeathHacking[i] == 1)
				{
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s (%d), Is suspected of fake Death Hacking. (DEATHS: %d)",GPN(i),i,FakeKillWarns[i]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, string);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("suspectlist");
	return 1;
}
CMD:usedildo(playerid, params[])//535
{
	LogCallback("suspectlist");
	if(UsedDildo[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You already used a Dildo Recently, Your Vagina is red and worn, Please wait a bit more before using a dildo, Pervert!");
	    return 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSex] == 2)
	{
		new weap, ammo, string[128];
		GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, 10, weap, ammo);
		if(weap == 10)
		{
		    TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"MISC","Scratchballs_01",4.1,1,1,1,1,15000);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You start to Play with your Dildo and feel Reaaaally Great");
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~p~Playing With your Dildo...",15000,5);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Takes their Purple Dildo and Starts to Play With it", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			SetTimerEx("UsingPurpleDildo",15000,0,"i",playerid);
		}
		else if(weap == 11)
		{
		    TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"MISC","Scratchballs_01",4.1,1,1,1,1,15000);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You start to Play with your Dildo and feel Reaaaally Great");
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~p~Playing With your Dildo...",15000,5);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Takes their Small White Vibrator and Starts to Play With it", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			SetTimerEx("UsingSmallDildo",15000,0,"i",playerid);
		}
		else if(weap == 12)
		{
		    TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"MISC","Scratchballs_01",4.1,1,1,1,1,15000);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You start to Play with your Dildo and feel Reaaaally Great");
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~p~Playing With your Dildo...",15000,5);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Takes their Large White Vibrator and Starts to Play With it", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			SetTimerEx("UsingLargeDildo",15000,0,"i",playerid);
		}
		else if(weap == 13)
		{
		    TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"MISC","Scratchballs_01",4.1,1,1,1,1,15000);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "* You start to Play with your Dildo and feel Reaaaally Great");
			GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~p~Playing With your Dildo...",15000,5);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Takes his Small Black Vibrator and Starts to Play With it", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(20.0, playerid, string,COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			SetTimerEx("UsingBlackDildo",15000,0,"i",playerid);
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are a man, How can you use a Dildo?...");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("suspectlist");
	return 1;
}
CMD:belt(playerid, params[])//536
{
	LogCallback("belt");
	new string[128];
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		if(!IsModelABike(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))
		{
		    if(UsingBelt[playerid] == 0)
		    {
			    format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s ticks on their seat belt", GPN(playerid));
	            ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	            UsingBelt[playerid] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
			    format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes off their seat belt", GPN(playerid));
	            ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	            UsingBelt[playerid] = 0;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You are in a bike, use the Helmet! (/helmet)");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("belt");
	return 1;
}
CMD:helmet(playerid, params[])//537
{
	LogCallback("helmet");
	new string[128];
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
	    if(IsModelABike(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))
	    {
		    if(UsingBelt[playerid] == 0)
		    {
			    SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "* You have put on your helmet");
			    format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Puts on their Helmet that is on the passenger seat", GPN(playerid));
	            ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	            UsingBelt[playerid] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "* You have taken off your helmet");
			    format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s Removes their Helmet and leaves it on the passenger seat", GPN(playerid));
	            ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	            UsingBelt[playerid] = 0;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You are in a car, use the seatbelt! (/belt)");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("helmet");
	return 1;
}
CMD:checkbelt(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("checkbelt");
	new string[128], playa;
	if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/checkbelt [PartOfName/PlayerID]");
	if(!IsModelABike(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))
	{
	    if(UsingBelt[playa] == 1)
		{
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has their belt on.");
		    SCM(playerid,-1,string);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s peers inside the window, glancing at %s's belt",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa));
		    ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
		if(UsingBelt[playa] == 0)
		{
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s is not using their belt.");
		    SCM(playerid,-1,string);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s peers inside the window, glancing at %s's belt",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa));
		    ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
	} else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* This player isn't in their car.");
	LogCallback("checkbelt");
	return 1;
}
CMD:checkhelmet(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("checkhelmet");
	new string[128], playa;
	if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/checkhelmet [PartOfName/PlayerID]");
	if(IsModelABike(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))
	{
	    if(UsingBelt[playa] == 1)
		{
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s is wearing their helmet on.");
		    SCM(playerid,-1,string);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s galnces at %s's head",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa));
		    ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
		if(UsingBelt[playa] == 0)
		{
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s is not wearing their helemt.");
		    SCM(playerid,-1,string);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s galnces at %s's head",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa));
		    ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
	} else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* This player isn't on a bike");
	LogCallback("checkhelmet");
	return 1;
}
CMD:muted(playerid, params[])//539
{
	LogCallback("muted");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1)
    {
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You're no authorized to use that command . ");
        return 1;
    }
	new string[128];
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, "Muted Users online:");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[i][pMuted] == 1)
		    {
				format(string, 256, "** %s (%d)", GPN(i), i);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("muted");
	return 1;
}

	LogCallback("turn");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1)
    {
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not authorized to use that command.");
        return 1;
	}
    new enablelist[] = "1\tView Admin Alerts (6)\n2\tView Private Messages (1)\n3\tAppear in Admin List (4)\n4\tView Help Messages (1)\n5\tOut of Character Chat (2)\n6\tOwner Mode (1338)";
    ShowServerDialog(playerid,15,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Enable/Disable",enablelist,"Continue","Cancel");
	LogCallback("turn");
	return 1;
}
CMD:anticheat(playerid, params[])//541
{
	LogCallback("anticheat");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not authorized to use this option");
		return 1;
	}
	new enablelist[] = "Anti Bunny Jump\r\nAnti Interior Hacks\r\nAnti Jetpack Hacks\r\nAnti Money Hacks\r\nAnti AFK\r\nAnti Non-RP Names\r\nAnti Driver DB\r\nAnti Fake death\r\nHigh Ping Kicker Options\r\nSet Max Ping\r\nSpammers Kicker";
    ShowServerDialog(playerid,1234,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Enable/Disable Anticheat Features:",enablelist,"Select","Cancel");
	new y, m, d;
	new h,mi,s, string[128];
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
	format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /anticheat",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
	AdminLog(string);
	LogCallback("anticheat");
	return 1;
}
CMD:cc(playerid, params[])//542
{
	LogCallback("cc");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3)
   		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not authorized to use that command.");

    foreach(Player, i)
    {
    	ClearChatbox(i, 100);
    }
    new string[128];
    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Chat has been Cleared!");
	format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has Cleared the Chat", GPN(playerid));
	ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
	new y, m, d;
	new h,mi,s;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
	format(cstring,sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Cleared the Chat",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
	ChatLog(cstring);
	AdminLog(cstring);
	LogCallback("cc");
	return 1;
}

CMD:roadblocks(playerid, params[])//549
{
	LogCallback("roadblocks");
    for(new h = 0; h < sizeof(Roadblocks); h++)
	{
	    if(Roadblocks[h][sCreated])
	    {
			new string[128];
			format(string, sizeof(string), "CreateDynamicObject(1238,%f,%f,%f,0,0,0, 1001, -1, -1, 100);",Roadblocks[h][sX],Roadblocks[h][sY],Roadblocks[h][sZ]);
			LoginLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("roadblocks");
	return 1;
}
CMD:pr(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_pilot(playerid, params);
}
CMD:pilot(playerid, params[])//551
{
	LogCallback("pilot");
	if(IsAPlane(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)) || IsAHeli(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))
	{
		new result[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: (/p)ilot [pilot radio]");
	    foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
			    new carid = GetPlayerVehicleID(i);
			    if(IsAPlane(carid) || IsAHeli(carid) || PlayerInfo[i][pAtcRadio] == 1)
			    {
					new string[128];
					format(string, sizeof(string),"Pilot %s: %s, over",GPN(playerid), result);
       				SCM(i, COLOR_GREEN, string);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* This Vehicle Model doesn't has a pilot radio");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("pilot");
	return 1;
}

CMD:makehelper(playerid, params[])//562
{
	LogCallback("makehelper");
    new playa, level, string[128],y,m,d,h,mi,s;
    if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa,level)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /makehelper [playerid/PartOfName] [level](0-1)");
	if(level < 0 || level > 3) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Level May not be below 0 or above 2!");
	if(level == 3 && PlayerInfo[playa][pAdmin] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* This level is reserved for admins!");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
	    {
	        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	        {
				PlayerInfo[playa][pHelper] = level;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "** Gave to %s Server Helper Level [%d]",GPN(playa),level);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "-Administration- You Have Now Level %d on the Official Helpers Team",level);
				SCM(playa, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				getdate(y,m,d);
				gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /makehelper %s %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),level);
				AdminLog(string);
				CommandLog(string);
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
	}
	LogCallback("makehelper");
	return 1;
}

	LogCallback("credits");

	SCM(playerid, COLOR_PINK, "-----------  SA-MP Roleplay Server Mappers -----------");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Jonny, Barry, Katsuo, Yuko, Chrome");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_PINK, "-----------  Gamemode Previous Developers -----------");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Kreyg, Danny, Ben");
    SCM(playerid, COLOR_PINK, "------------------ Special Thanks -------------------"); // DO NOT REMOVE ANY OF THESE, You can only ADD but not REMOVE
    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "LordMan - LA:RP Creator - Thank You!");
    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "CuervO_NegrO - Raven's Roleplay Gamemode Creator.");

CMD:viphelp(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("viphelp");
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			SCM(playerid,-1,"Spend Gold Tokens: /dlocker (Regular Players Lounge).");
			SCM(playerid,-1,"VIP Chat: /v [text]. /togvip to enable/disable it.");
		}
		case 2:
		{
			SCM(playerid,-1,"Spend Gold Tokens: /dlocker (Regular Players Lounge).");
			SCM(playerid,-1,"VIP Chat: /v [text]. /togvip to enable/disable it.");
			SCM(playerid,-1,"MP3 Player: /setmp3.");
		}
		case 3 .. 4:
		{
			SCM(playerid,-1,"Spend Gold Tokens: /dlocker (Regular Players Lounge).");
			SCM(playerid,-1,"VIP Chat: /v [text], /togvip");
			SCM(playerid,-1,"MP3 Player: /setmp3");
			SCM(playerid,-1,"Boombox: /placeboombox, /setboombox, /removeboombox");
			SCM(playerid,-1,"House Interior: /houseint [intid] (stand on the house icon. House IDs found on the forums");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("viphelp");
	return 1;
}
CMD:atalks(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("atalks");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] >= 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid,-1,"|___________ ATALKS ___________|");
		new string[256];
		for(new i = 0; i < MAX_ATALKS; i ++)
		{
		    if(Atalks[i][atalkUsed] == true)
		    {
				format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}[Atalk ID %d]{FFFFFF}: %s(%d): %s",i,GPN(Atalks[i][aTalker]),Atalks[i][aTalker],Atalks[i][atalkText]);
				SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,string);
		    }
		}
	}
	LogCallback("atalks");
	return 1;
}
CMD:reports(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("reports");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] >= 1)
	{
		SCM(playerid,-1,"|___________ REPORTS ___________|");
	    new string[256];
	    for(new i = 0; i < MAX_REPORTS; i ++)
	    {
	        if(Report[i][reportUsed] == true)
	        {
	            format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}[Report ID %d]{FFFFFF}: %s(%d): %s",i,GPN(Report[i][Reporter]),Report[i][Reporter],Report[i][reportText]);
	            SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,string);
	        }
	    }
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not an admin you cannot use this command");
	LogCallback("reports");
	return 1;
}
CMD:tra(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("tra");
	new rid,string[128],reason[128];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] < 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You're not an admin so you cannot use this command");
	if(sscanf(params,"ds[128]",rid,reason)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:ta [atalk id] [reason]");
	if(rid >= 0 && rid < MAX_ATALKS)
	{
		if(Atalks[rid][atalkUsed] == false) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"This atalk has already been accepted or trashed");
		new y, m, d;
		new h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s has just trashed %s report reason %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), GPN(Atalks[rid][aTalker]),reason);
		AdminLog(string);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You have trashed %s atalk reason %s",GPN(Atalks[rid][aTalker]),reason);
		SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_PINK,string);
		SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_PINK,Atalks[rid][atalkText]);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has trashed your atalk reason %s",GPN(playerid),reason);
		SendClientMessage(Atalks[rid][aTalker],COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}%s{FFFFFF} has trashed {FFFF00}%s's{FFFFFF} atalk {FFFF00}reason:{FFFFFF} %s{FFFF00} [ID %d]",GPN(playerid),GPN(Atalks[rid][aTalker]),reason,rid);
		SendTesterAdminMessage(-1,string);
		ClearThisAtalk(rid);
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Invalid atalk id");
	LogCallback("tra");
	return 1;
}
CMD:tr(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("tr");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] >= 1)
	{
		new rid,reason[128],string[256],y, m, d, h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		if(sscanf(params,"ds[128]",rid,reason)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/tr [report id] [reason]");
		if(rid >= 0 && rid < MAX_REPORTS)
		{
		    if(Report[rid][reportUsed] == false) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"This report has already been accepted");
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d][Trashed Report] %s has just trashed %s report reason %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(Report[rid][Reporter]),reason);
			ReportLog(string);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"You have just trashed %s report, sending you the report again to review",GPN(Report[rid][Reporter]));
			SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_ORANGE,string);
			SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREEN,Report[rid][reportText]);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has trashed your report reason %s",GPN(playerid),reason);
			SendClientMessage(Report[rid][Reporter],COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}%s{FFFFFF} has report {FFFF00}%s's{FFFFFF} report {FFFF00}reason{FFFFFF}%s {FFFF00}[ID %d]",GPN(playerid),GPN(Report[rid][Reporter]),reason,rid);
			SendAdminMessage(-1,string);
			ClearThisReport(rid);
		} else return SCM(playerid,-1,"Invalid report id");
	}else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not an admin you can't do this");
	LogCallback("tr");
	return 1;
}


CMD:ar(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("ar");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] >= 1)
	{
		new rid,string[128],y, m, d, h,mi,s;
		getdate(y,m,d);
		gettime(h,mi,s);
		if(sscanf(params,"d",rid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/acceptreport [reportid]");
		if(rid >= 0 && rid < MAX_ATALKS)
		{
		    if(Report[rid][reportUsed] == false) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"This report has already been accepted");
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d][Accepted Report] %s has just accepted %s report",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(Report[rid][Reporter]));
			ReportLog(string);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"You have accepted %s report sending you the report again to review",GPN(Report[rid][Reporter]));
			SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_ORANGE,string);
			SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREEN,Report[rid][reportText]);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has is now reviewing your report please wait",GPN(playerid));
			SendClientMessage(Report[rid][Reporter],COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}%s{FFFFFF} has accepted {FFFF00}%s's{FFFFFF} report {FFFF00}[ID %d]",GPN(playerid),GPN(Report[rid][Reporter]),rid);
			SendAdminMessage(-1,string);
			ClearThisReport(rid);
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"invalid report id");
	
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"you're not an admin you can't do this");
	LogCallback("ar");
	return 1;
}
CMD:aa(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("aa");
	new rid,string[128],y, m, d, h,mi,s;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
 	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] < 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"You're not an admin so you cannot use this command");
	if(sscanf(params,"d",rid)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/aa [atalk id]");
	if(rid >= 0 && rid < MAX_ATALKS)
	{
		if(Atalks[rid][atalkUsed] == false) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"This atalk has already been accepted");
		format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d][Accepted Atalk] %s has just accepted %s atalk",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(Atalks[rid][aTalker]));
		AdminLog(string);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You have accepted %s atalk sending you the atalk again to review",GPN(Atalks[rid][aTalker]));
		SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_PINK,string);
		SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_PINK,Atalks[rid][atalkText]);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has accepted your atalk please wait for them to respond",GPN(playerid));
		SendClientMessage(Atalks[rid][aTalker],COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"{FFFF00}%s{FFFFFF} has accepted {FFFF00}%s's{FFFFFF} atalk {FFFF00}[ID %d]",GPN(playerid),GPN(Atalks[rid][aTalker]),rid);
		SendAdminMessage(-1,string);
		ClearThisAtalk(rid);
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Invalid atalk id");
	LogCallback("aa");
	return 1;
}
stock ClearEMSCalls()
{
	LogCallback("ClearEmsCalls");
