    for(new cid = 0; cid < MAX_EMSCALLS; cid ++)
	{
		EMSCall[cid][EMSCaller] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
		EMSCall[cid][EMSCallUsed] = false;
		EMSCall[cid][EMSCallExpires] = 0;
		KillTimer(EMSCall[cid][EMSCallTimer]);
	}
	LogCallback("ClearEmsCalls");
	return 1;
}
stock ClearThisEMSCall(cid)
{
	LogCallback("ClearThisEmsCall");
	if(cid >= 0 && cid < MAX_EMSCALLS)
	{
		EMSCall[cid][EMSCaller] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
		EMSCall[cid][EMSCallUsed] = false;
		EMSCall[cid][EMSCallExpires] = 0;
		KillTimer(EMSCall[cid][EMSCallTimer]);
	}
	LogCallback("ClearThisEMSCall");
	return 1;
}
stock ClearPDCalls()
{
	LogCallback("ClearPDCalls");
	for(new cid = 0; cid < MAX_PDCALLS; cid ++)
	{
		PDCall[cid][PDCaller] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
		PDCall[cid][PDCallUsed] = false;
		PDCall[cid][PDCallExpires] = 0;
		KillTimer(PDCall[cid][PDCallTimer]);
	}
	LogCallback("ClearPDCalls");
	return 1;
}
stock ClearThisPDCall(cid)
{
	LogCallback("ClearThisPDCall");
	if(cid >= 0 && cid < MAX_PDCALLS)
	{
		PDCall[cid][PDCaller] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
		PDCall[cid][PDCallUsed] = false;
		PDCall[cid][PDCallExpires] = 0;
		KillTimer(PDCall[cid][PDCallTimer]);
	}
	LogCallback("ClearThisPDCall");
	return 1;
}
stock ClearAtalks()
{
	LogCallback("ClearAtalks");
	for(new rid = 0; rid < MAX_ATALKS; rid ++)
	{
        atalkID[Atalks[rid][aTalker]] = -1;
		Atalks[rid][aTalker] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	    Atalks[rid][atalkUsed] = false;
	    Atalks[rid][atalkExpires] = 0;
		KillTimer(Atalks[rid][atalkTimer]);

	}
	LogCallback("ClearAtalks");
	return 1;
}
stock ClearReports()
{
	LogCallback("ClearReports");
	for(new rid = 0; rid < MAX_REPORTS; rid ++)
	{
	    //reportID[Report[rid][Reporter]] = -1;
		reportID[Report[rid][Reporter]] = -1;
		Report[rid][Reporter] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
		Report[rid][reportUsed] = false;
		Report[rid][reportExpires] = 0;
		KillTimer(Report[rid][reportTimer]);
	}
	LogCallback("ClearReports");
	return 1;
}

stock ClearThisReport(rid)
{
	LogCallback("ClearThisReport");
	if(rid >= 0 && rid < MAX_REPORTS)
	{
	    reportID[Report[rid][Reporter]] = -1;
	    Report[rid][Reporter] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	    Report[rid][reportUsed] = false;
	    Report[rid][reportExpires] = 0;
		KillTimer(Report[rid][reportTimer]);
	}
	LogCallback("ClearThisReport");
	return 1;
}
	    
stock ClearThisAtalk(rid)
{
	LogCallback("ClearThisAtalk");
	if(rid >= 0 && rid < MAX_ATALKS)
	{
		atalkID[Atalks[rid][aTalker]] = -1;
	    Atalks[rid][aTalker] = INVALID_PLAYER_ID;
	    Atalks[rid][atalkUsed] = false;
	    Atalks[rid][atalkExpires] = 0;
		KillTimer(Atalks[rid][atalkTimer]);
		return 1;
	} else{ printf("Warning ClearThisAtalk specified an invalid atalkid %d",rid); }
	LogCallback("ClearThisAtalk");
	return 1;
}
CMD:re(playerid,params[])
{
	return cmd_report(playerid, params);
}
CMD:report(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("report");
	new playa,reason[256],string[256];
	if(sscanf(params,"us[256]",playa,reason))
	{
	    SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/report [playerid] [reason]");
	    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"If you just need to ask admin a question or speak with them use /atalk instead");
	    return 1;
	}
	if(playa == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || !IsPlayerConnected(playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"Invalid player id");
	if(reportID[playerid] != -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"You alread have a report submited please wait 5 minutes for it to expire");
	for(new i = 0; i < MAX_REPORTS; i ++)
	{
	    if(Report[i][reportUsed] == false)
	    {
	        if(i == MAX_REPORTS)
	        {
	            ClearReports();
	            i = 0;
	        }
			retimer[playerid] = defer ReportReset(playerid);
			Report[i][reportUsed] = true;
			Report[i][Reporter] = playerid;
			Report[i][reportExpires] = 300000;
			Report[i][reportTimer] = SetTimerEx("ClearReport",Report[i][reportExpires],false,"i",i);
            SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED, "----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
			format(Report[i][reportText],256,"[Report ID %d]: %s(%d) has reported %s(%d) for %s",i,GPN(playerid),playerid,GPN(playa),playa,reason);
            SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,Report[i][reportText]);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED, "----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,"Type /ar [report id]' or '/tr [report id]'");
			JustReported[playerid] = 1; 
			new y, m, d, h,mi,s; getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Reported %s for: %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa), reason);
			ReportLog(string);
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"You have sucessfully submitted your report.");
			break;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("report");
	return 1;
}
CMD:atalk(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("atalk");
    if(isnull(params)) return SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "USAGE: /atalk [text]");
	new string[256],y, m, d, h,mi,s;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
	if(atalkID[playerid] != -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"You already have an atalk submited please wait 5 minutes for it to expire");
	for(new i = 0; i < MAX_ATALKS; i ++)
	{
		if(Atalks[i][atalkUsed] == false)
		{
			if(i == MAX_ATALKS)
			{
			    ClearAtalks();
			    i = 0;
			}
			Atalks[i][atalkUsed] = true;
			Atalks[i][aTalker] = playerid;
			Atalks[i][atalkExpires] = 300000;
			Atalks[i][atalkTimer] = SetTimerEx("ClearAtalk",Atalks[i][atalkExpires],false,"i",i);
			format(Atalks[i][atalkText],256,"[Atalk ID %d]: %s(%d): %s",i,GPN(playerid),playerid,params);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_PINK,Atalks[i][atalkText]);
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_PINK,"Type /aa to accept an atalk or /tra to trash it");
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /atalk %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),params);
			ChatLog(string);
			atalkID[playerid] = i;
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_PINK,"Your atalk has been submitted please wait for a member of staff to assist you");
			break;
		}

	}
	LogCallback("atalk");
	return 1;
}
forward public ClearEMSCall(emscallid);
public ClearEMSCall(emscallid)
{
	LogCallback("ClearEmsCall");
    if(EMSCall[emscallid][EMSCallUsed] == true)
	{
		ClearThisEMSCall(emscallid);
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("ClearEmsCall");
	return 1;
}
forward public ClearPDCall(pdcallid);
public ClearPDCall(pdcallid)
{
	LogCallback("ClearPDCall");
	if(PDCall[pdcallid][PDCallUsed] == true)
	{
		ClearThisPDCall(pdcallid);
		return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("ClearPDCall");
	return 1;
}
forward public ClearAtalk(atalkid);
public ClearAtalk(atalkid)
{
	LogCallback("ClearAtalk");
	if(Atalks[atalkid][atalkUsed] == true)
	{
		SendClientMessage(Atalks[atalkid][aTalker],COLOR_GREY,"Your atalk has expired please resubmit it");
		ClearThisAtalk(atalkid);
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("ClearAalk");
	return 1;
}

CMD:help(playerid,params[])
{
	new helplist[500];
	strcat(helplist, "1) Chat Commands\r\n2) General Commands\r\n3) Animation List\r\n4) Phone Help\r\n5) Money Commands\r\n6) Vehicle Help\r\n7) House Help\r\n8) Business help\r\n9) IRC Help\r\n10) Cop Help\r\n11) Medic Help\r\n12) Staff Help");
	ShowServerDialog(playerid,HELP_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"SAMP-RP HelP List",helplist,"Okay","Cancel");
	return 1;
}
CMD:cophelp(playerid, params[])//565
{
	LogCallback("cophelp");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 0)
	{
	    ClearChatbox(playerid, 20);
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"______________LSPD HELP_______________");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "::LSPD:: (/r)adio, (/dr)epartment radio, (/m)egaphone, /arrest, /duty, /cuff, /frisk, /take, /ticket");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "::LSPD:: (/gov)ernment, (/su)spect, /drag, /mir, /givepassport, /checktrunk, /copchecktruck(cct) /mdc, (/ta)zer");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "::LSPD:: /crb(CreateRoadBlock), /rub(RemoveRoadBlock), /rrball(RemoveroadBlockAll) /drugtest, /go(Gates)");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "::LSPD:: /swat, /policepark, /givepassport, /setunit, /members, /breathtest, /breathtest, /showbadge");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "::LSPD:: /bk(BackUp), /bkc(BackUpClear), /invite(HighRanking), /setrank(HighRanking), /uninvite(HighRanking)");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "::LSPD:: /setleader(HighRanking), /quitfaction");
	}

	return 1;
}
CMD:medichelp(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("medichelp");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
	    ClearChatbox(playerid, 20);
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED,"______________LSFD HELP_______________");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "::LSFD:: (/r)adio, (/dr)epartment, radio, (/m)egaphone, /duty, /equip, /setuniform");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "::LSFD:: /emscar, (/dec)destoryemscar, /emsroof, /emsgarage, /heal, (/f)action");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "::LSFD:: /ed(emergencydispatch), /rtco(respondtocallout), /setunit, /members");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "::LSFD:: /givemethadone(HighRanking), /crb(createroadblock), /rub(removeroadblock)");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "::LSFD:: /rrball(removeroadblockall), /invite(HighRanking), /setrank(HighRanking)");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "::LSFD:: /uninvite(HighRanking), /setleader(HighRanking), /quitfaction");
	}
	LogCallback("medichelp");
	return 1;
}
CMD:stopanim(playerid, params[])//579
{
	LogCallback("stopanim");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(Dead[playerid] != -1) return 1;
		if(HasBox[playerid] == 1) return 1;
		if(HasHarvest[playerid] == 1) return 1;
		if(IsFrozen[playerid] == true) return 1;
       	if(UsingSmokeAnim[playerid] == 1)
        {
			UsingSmokeAnim[playerid] = 0;
        }
		ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
		animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
    }
	LogCallback("stopanim");
    return 1;
}
CMD:fsetstrike(playerid, params[])//582
{
	LogCallback("fsetstrike");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
    {
		new family, strikes, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "dd", family, strikes)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /fsetstrike [FamilyNr] [strikes]");
		if(family < 1 || family > 14) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "FamilyNr can't be below 1 or above 14 !");
		family -= 1;
		if(FamilyInfo[family][FamilyTaken] != 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That FamilyNr isn't taken !");
		if(strikes < 0 || strikes > 2) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Strikes can't go below 1 or above 3 !");
        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Family %d strikes set to %d.",family+1,strikes);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, string);
		FamilyInfo[family][FStrikes] = strikes;
		SaveFamilies();
	}
    else
    {
    	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not authorised to use that command !");
        return 1;
    }
	LogCallback("fsetstrike");
    return 1;
}
CMD:fstrike(playerid, params[])//583
{
	LogCallback("fstrike");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
	{
		new family, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", family)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE:/fstrike [FamilyNr] [reason]");
		if(family < 1 || family > 14) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   FamilyNr can't be below 1 or above 14 !"); return 1; }
		family -= 1;
		if(FamilyInfo[family][FamilyTaken] != 1)
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That FamilyNr isn't taken !");
		    return 1;
		}
	    new result[128];
	    if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /fstrike [FamilyNr] [reason]");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "SERVER: Family '%s' was given a strike, reason: %s",FamilyInfo[family][FamilyName],result);
		SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_ORANGE, string);
		FamilyInfo[family][FStrikes] ++;
		if(FamilyInfo[family][FStrikes] >= 3)
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "SERVER: Family '%s' was disbanded due to having 3 gang strikes.",FamilyInfo[family][FamilyName]);
			SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_ORANGE, string);
			DestroyPickup(FamilyInfo[family][PickupID]);
			ClearFamily(family);
			SaveFamilies();
		}
    }
    else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not authorised to use that command !");
        return 1;
    }
	LogCallback("fstrike");
    return 1;
}
CMD:getincar(playerid, params[])//579
{
	LogCallback("getincar");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new carid, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", carid))
		{
   			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "USAGE: /getincar [carid]");
   			return 1;
        }
  		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] > 2 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
  		{
   			new Float:cwx2,Float:cwy2,Float:cwz2;
   			GetVehiclePos(carid, cwx2, cwy2, cwz2);
   			if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)
   			{
    			SetVehicleToRespawn(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
    			SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
    			PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, carid, 0);
   			}
   			else
   			{
    			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
    			PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, carid, 0);
   			}
   			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "** You have been teleported");
   			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Teleported Himself To Car: [%d].", GPN(playerid), carid);
   			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
   			DPCP(playerid);
  			new y, m, d;
   			new h,mi,s;
   			getdate(y,m,d);
   			gettime(h,mi,s);
   			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Teleported Himself to Car Id: [%d]",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),carid);
   			TelesLog(string);
  		}
  		else
  		{
   			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command!");
   			return 1;
  		}
	}
	LogCallback("getincar");
	return 1;
}
CMD:adjustrankname(playerid, params[])//586
{
	LogCallback("adjustrankname");
	new family = PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember];
	new string[128];
	if(strcmp(FamilyInfo[family][FamilyLeader], GPN(playerid), true) == 0)
	{
		new rank, name[32];
		if(sscanf(params, "ds[32]", rank, name)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/adjustrankname [rank] [name]");
		if(rank > 6 || rank < 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Ranks must be between 1 and 6");
		strmid(FamilyRank[family][rank-1], name, 0, strlen(name), 255);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted the name of Rank %d to \"%s\".",rank,FamilyRank[family][rank-1]);
	 	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
    	SaveFamilies();
    }
    else
    {
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not this families leader, you cannot adjust that!");
        return 1;
    }
	LogCallback("adjustrankname");
    return 1;
}
CMD:adjust(playerid, params[])//585
{
	LogCallback("adjust");
	new
		family = PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember],
		string[128]
	;

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember] == 255)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not authorized to use this command");

    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 5)
	{
		new x_nr[32], result[100],opt[32];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[32]S[100]S[32]", x_nr, result, opt))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /adjust [name]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Available Names: Name, MOTD, Safe, Invite, Uninvite, skin");
			return 1;
		}
	    if(strcmp(x_nr,"Name",true) == 0)
		{
			if(!result[0])
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /adjust name [name]");
				return 1;
			}
            if(strlen(result) >= 40 )
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "This name is to long!");
				return 1;
			}
			strmid(FamilyInfo[family][FamilyName], result, 0, strlen(result), 255);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted your Family's Name to '%s'.",FamilyInfo[family][FamilyName]);
	 		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			SaveFamilies();
			return 1;
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"motd",true) == 0)
		{
			if(!result[0])
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /adjust motd [text]");
				return 1;
			}
			if(strlen(result) > 128)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "MOTD is to long!");
				return 1;
			}
			strmid(FamilyInfo[family][FamilyMOTD], result, 0, strlen(result), 255);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted your Family's MOTD to \"%s\".",FamilyInfo[family][FamilyMOTD]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			SaveFamilies();
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"skin",true) == 0)
		{
		    new slot = strval(result);
		    new skin = strval(opt);
			switch(slot)
			{
				case 1:
			    {
					if(IsValidSkin(skin))
					{
					    FamilyInfo[family][FamilySkin1] = skin;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted family skin %d to skin id %d", slot, skin);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					    SaveFamilies();
					}
				}
				case 2:
				{
				    if(IsValidSkin(skin))
				    {
				        FamilyInfo[family][FamilySkin2] = skin;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted family skin %d to skin id %d", slot, skin);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				        SaveFamilies();
				    }
				}
				case 3:
				{
				    if(IsValidSkin(skin))
				    {
				        FamilyInfo[family][FamilySkin3] = skin;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted family skin %d to skin id %d", slot, skin);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				        SaveFamilies();
				    }
				}
				case 4:
				{
				    if(IsValidSkin(skin))
					{
					    FamilyInfo[family][FamilySkin4] = skin;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted family skin %d to skin id %d", slot, skin);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						SaveFamilies();
					}
				}
				case 5:
				{
					if(IsValidSkin(skin))
					{
				        FamilyInfo[family][FamilySkin5] = skin;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted family skin %d to skin id %d", slot, skin);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						SaveFamilies();
					}
				}
				case 6:
				{
				    if(IsValidSkin(skin))
				    {
				        FamilyInfo[family][FamilySkin6] = skin;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted family skin %d to skin id %d", slot, skin);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				        SaveFamilies();
				    }
				}
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"safe",true) == 0)
		{
			if(!result[0])
			{
				if(FamilyInfo[family][FamilySafe] != 0)
				{
			    	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"Adjusting the position of your Family's Safe will cost $50,000 !");
			    	return 1;
			  	}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"Purchasing a Safe for your Family will cost $50,000 !, please type /adjust safe confirm to confirm!");
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE,"HINT: Purchasing a safe will give your family the ability to store/share drugs, materials, and guns.");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"confirm",true) == 0)
			{
				if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < 49999)
				{
	    			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "You don't have that much money !");
					return 1;
				}
				if(FamilyInfo[family][FamilySafe] != 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "* You have adjusted the position of your Family's Safe.");
					return 1;
         		}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "* You have purchased a Safe.");
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "HINT: Type /safehelp for more information.");
				}
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pCash] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pCash]-50000;
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-50000);
				GetPlayerPos(playerid, FamilyInfo[family][FamilySafePos][0],FamilyInfo[family][FamilySafePos][1],FamilyInfo[family][FamilySafePos][2]);
				DestroyPickup(FamilyInfo[family][PickupID]);
				FamilyInfo[family][PickupID] = CreatePickup(1210, 23, FamilyInfo[family][FamilySafePos][0],FamilyInfo[family][FamilySafePos][1], FamilyInfo[family][FamilySafePos][2]);
				FamilyInfo[family][FamilySafe] = 1;
				SaveFamilies();
				return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"invite",true) == 0)
		{
			new giveplayerid = strval(result);
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pMember] > 0 || PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pLeader] > 0 || PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pFMember] != 255)
			        {
			            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is already in a Faction / Family !");
			            return 1;
			        }
			        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've invited %s to join %s.",GPN(giveplayerid), FamilyInfo[family][FamilyName]);
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			        format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s has invited you to join %s, (type /accept family) to accept.",GPN(playerid), FamilyInfo[family][FamilyName]);
			        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			        FamilyOffer[giveplayerid] = playerid;
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"uninvite",true) == 0)
		{
		    new giveplayerid = strval(result);
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pFMember] != family)
			        {
			            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is not in your Family !");
			            return 1;
			        }
			        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pRank] > PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank])
			        {
			            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is a higher rank !");
			            return 1;
			        }
			        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have kicked %s out of your Family.",GPN(giveplayerid));
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Family Leader %s has kicked you out of the Family.",GPN(playerid));
			        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pFMember] = 255;
			        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pRank] = 0;
			        FamilyInfo[family][FamilyMembers]--;
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
   			}
  		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"rank",true) == 0)
		{
			new rank = strval(result), giveplayerid = strval(opt);
			if(rank < 1 || rank > 6) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Rank can't be below 1 or above 6 !"); return 1; }
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pFMember] != family)
			        {
			            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is not in your family.");
			            return 1;
			        }
			        if(playerid == giveplayerid)
           			{
			       	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You can't adjust your own rank.");
			            return 1;
			        }
			        if(rank < 0 || rank > 4 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] == 5)
			        {
			            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Rank 5 can only give family members ranks ranging from 1 through 4.");
			            return 1;
			        }
			        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have given %s Rank %d.",GPN(giveplayerid),rank);
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Family Leader %s has given you Rank %d.",GPN(playerid),rank);
			        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pRank] = rank;
					switch(rank)
					{
				        case 1:
				        {
				        	ChosenSkin[giveplayerid] = FamilyInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember]][FamilySkin1];
							SetPlayerSkin(giveplayerid, ChosenSkin[giveplayerid]);
						}
						case 2:
						{
				        	ChosenSkin[giveplayerid] = FamilyInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember]][FamilySkin2];
							SetPlayerSkin(giveplayerid, ChosenSkin[giveplayerid]);
						}
						case 3:
						{
				        	ChosenSkin[giveplayerid] = FamilyInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember]][FamilySkin3];
							SetPlayerSkin(giveplayerid, ChosenSkin[giveplayerid]);
						}
						case 4:
						{
				        	ChosenSkin[giveplayerid] = FamilyInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember]][FamilySkin4];
							SetPlayerSkin(giveplayerid, ChosenSkin[giveplayerid]);
						}
						case 5:
						{
				        	ChosenSkin[giveplayerid] = FamilyInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember]][FamilySkin5];
							SetPlayerSkin(giveplayerid, ChosenSkin[giveplayerid]);
						}
						case 6:
						{
				        	ChosenSkin[giveplayerid] = FamilyInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember]][FamilySkin6];
							SetPlayerSkin(giveplayerid, ChosenSkin[giveplayerid]);
						}
						default:
						{
						    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Invalid rank!");
						}
					}
					return 1;
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"rankname",true) == 0)
		{
			if(!isnull(result))
			{
				new rank = strval(result);
				switch(rank)
				{
					case 1 .. 6:
					{
						if(!isnull(opt))
						{
							strmid(FamilyRank[family][rank-1], opt, 0, strlen(opt), 255);
							format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have adjusted the name of Rank %d to \"%s\".",rank,FamilyRank[family][rank-1]);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
							SaveFamilies();
							return 1;
						}
					}
					default: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Ranks must be between 1 and 6"); return 1; }
				}
			}
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/adjust rankname rank name");
    	}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Invalid adjust name !");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Your rank is not high enough !");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("adjust");
    return 1;
}
CMD:families(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("families");
	new
		string[128],
		family
	;
	if(!sscanf(params,"d", family))
	{
		if(family < 1 || family > 14) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Family Number can't be below 1 or above 14!");
		if(FamilyInfo[family][FamilyTaken] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That FamilyNr hasn't been Taken yet !");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember] == family || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "_________ MEMBERS ONLINE _________");
			foreach(Player, i)
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[i][pFMember] == family)
					{
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* Family %d: %s | Rank: %d.",family,GPN(i),PlayerInfo[i][pRank]);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, string);
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else return SCM(playerid, -1,"You can't view members of other families!");
    }
	else
	{
        for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(FamilyInfo); i++)
        {
            format(string, sizeof(string), "Family %d | Name: %s | Leader: %s | Members: %d | Strikes: %d",i+1,FamilyInfo[i][FamilyName],FamilyInfo[i][FamilyLeader],FamilyInfo[i][FamilyMembers],FamilyInfo[i][FStrikes]);
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
        }
	}
	LogCallback("families");
   	return 1;
}
CMD:fsafe(playerid, params[])//587
{
	LogCallback("fsafe");
	new x_nr[32];
	new fam = PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember];
	if (fam == 255) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You aren't in a family.");
	if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilySafe] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "Your family does not own a safe !");
	if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, FamilyInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember]][FamilySafePos][0], FamilyInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember]][FamilySafePos][1], FamilyInfo[PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember]][FamilySafePos][2])) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "   You are not at your Family Safe !"); return 1; }
	if(sscanf(params, "s[32]", x_nr)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /fsafe [put|get]");
    if(strcmp(x_nr,"put",true) == 0)
	{
		new tmp[32];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[32]", tmp)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /fsafe put [mats|gun] [amount|name]");
		if(strcmp(tmp, "mats", true) == 0)
	 	{
			new amount, string[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "d", amount)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " USAGE:/fsafe put mats [amount]");
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] < amount) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You don't have that much materials.");
	      	if(amount < 1 || amount > 50000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Amount must be between 1 and 50000.");
	      	if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyMats] + amount > 200000) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"Family safe can't hold more than 200,000 materials.");
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] -= amount;
			FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyMats] += amount;
			SaveFamilies();
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s deposits materials into a safe.", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			return 1;
		}
  		else if(strcmp(tmp, "gun", true) == 0)
		{
		    new
				stored = 0,
				weapon = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid),
				ammo = GetPlayerAmmo(playerid),
				slot
			;
			if(sscanf(params, "d", slot)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " USAGE:/fsafe put gun [slot] ");
			switch(slot)
			{
				case 1:
			   	{
					if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
				case 2:
				{
				    if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun2] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun2A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
				case 3:
				{
				    if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun3] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun3A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
				case 4:
				{
				    if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun4] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun4A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
				case 5:
				{
				    if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun5] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun5A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
				case 6:
				{
				    if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun6] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun6A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
				case 7:
				{
				    if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun7] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun7A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
				case 8:
				{
				    if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun8] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun8A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
				case 9:
				{
				    if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun9] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun9A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
				case 10:
				{
				    if(weapon >= 1 && weapon <= 33)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, weapon, -ammo);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun10] = weapon;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun10A] = ammo;
						stored = 1;
					}
				}
			}
			if(stored == 1)
			{
				new gn[24], string[128];
				GetWeaponName(weapon,gn,sizeof(gn));
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s places a %s into a safe.", PlayerName(playerid), gn);
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE, COLOR_PURPLE, COLOR_PURPLE, COLOR_PURPLE, COLOR_PURPLE);
				SaveFamilies();
			}
		}
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"get",true) == 0)
	{
		new tmp[20];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[20]", tmp)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /fsafe get [mats|gun] [amount|name]");
		if(strcmp(tmp, "mats", true) == 0)
	 	{
			new amount, string[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "d", amount)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " USAGE:/fsafe get mats [amount]");
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] < 5) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"   Only rank 5+ is allowed to take family materials.");
		    if(amount > FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyMats]) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Family safe doesn't have that much materials."); return 1; }
	      	if(amount < 1 || amount > 50000) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Amount must be between 1 and 50000."); return 1; }
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] += amount;
			FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyMats] -= amount;
			SaveFamilies();
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes some materials from a safe.", PlayerName(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			return 1;
		}
   		else if(strcmp(tmp, "gun", true) == 0)
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] < 4) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"   Only rank 4+ is allowed to take family guns.");
			new got = 0;
	        new slot;
	        if(sscanf(params, "d", slot)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " USAGE:/fsafe get gun [slot] ");
			switch(slot)
			{
				case 1:
				{
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			    case 2:
			    {
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun2] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun2], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun2A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			    case 3:
			    {
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun3] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun3], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun3A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			    case 4:
			    {
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun4] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun4], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun4A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun4] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun4A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			    case 5:
			    {
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun5] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun5], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun5A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun5] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun5A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			    case 6:
			    {
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun6] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun6], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun6A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun6] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun1A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			    case 7:
			    {
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun7] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun7], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun7A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun7] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun7A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			    case 8:
			    {
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun8] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun8], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun8A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun8] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun8A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			    case 9:
			    {
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun9] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun9], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun9A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun9] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun9A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			    case 10:
			    {
				    if(FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun10] != 0)
				    {
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun10], FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun10A]);
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun10] = 0;
						FamilyInfo[fam][FamilyGun10A] = 0;
						got = 1;
					}
				}
			}
			if(got == 1)
			{
				new gn[24], string[128];
				new wpn = GetPlayerWeapon(playerid);
				GetWeaponName(wpn, gn, sizeof(gn));
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a %s from a safe.", GPN(playerid), gn);
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE, COLOR_PURPLE, COLOR_PURPLE, COLOR_PURPLE, COLOR_PURPLE);
				SaveFamilies();
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("fsafe");
	return 1;
}

CMD:divorce(playerid, params[])//589
{
	LogCallback("divorce");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMarried] < 1)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You aren't Married !");
		return 1;
    }
    new giveplayerid, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /divorce [Playerid/PartOfName]");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
	{
	    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    {
	        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid == playerid) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You cannot Divorce yourself!"); return 1; }
			    new dstring[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
				new wstring[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", GPN(giveplayerid));
				strmid(wstring, string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", PlayerInfo[playerid][pMarriedTo]);
				strmid(dstring, string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
				if(strcmp(dstring ,wstring, true ) == 0)
				{
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've sent Divorce Papers to %s.", GPN(giveplayerid));
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s just sent you their Divorce Papers (type /accept divorce) to accept.", GPN(playerid));
					SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			        DivorceOffer[giveplayerid] = playerid;
			        return 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not Married to you !");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not near you !");
				return 1;
			}
	    }
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("divorce");
	return 1;
}
CMD:propose(playerid, params[])//590
{
	LogCallback("propose");
	if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < 20000)
    {
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   The Marriage & Reception costs $20000 !");
        return 1;
    }
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMarried] > 0)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are already Married !");
		return 1;
    }
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] == 9999)
    {
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You don't have a House to let your Wife / Husband live somewhere !");
		return 1;
    }
    new giveplayerid, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /propose [Playerid/PartOfName]");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
	{
	    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pMarried] > 0)
	        {
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is already Married !");
	            return 1;
	        }
	        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPhousekey] != 9999)
	        {
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player has a House, can't be Married !");
	            return 1;
	        }
	        if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPbiskey] != 9999)
	        {
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player has a Business, can't be Married !");
	            return 1;
	        }
	        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid == playerid) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You cannot Propose to yourself!"); return 1; }
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* You proposed to %s.", GPN(giveplayerid));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s just proposed to you (type /accept marriage) to accept.", GPN(playerid));
				SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		        ProposeOffer[giveplayerid] = playerid;
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not near you !");
				return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
		    return 1;
		}
    }
	LogCallback("propose");
    return 1;
}
CMD:witness(playerid, params[])//591
{
	LogCallback("witness");
    new giveplayerid, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /witness [Playerid/PartOfName]");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
	{
	    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    {
	        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid == playerid) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You cannot Propose to yourself!"); return 1; }
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* You requested %s to be your Marriage Witness.", GPN(giveplayerid));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s just requested you to be their Marriage Witness (type /accept witness) to accept.", GPN(playerid));
				SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		        MarryWitnessOffer[giveplayerid] = playerid;
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not near you !");
				return 1;
			}
	    }
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("witness");
	return 1;
}
CMD:irc(playerid, params[])//592
{
	LogCallback("irc");
    new x_nr[24], string[128], result[32], pass[32];
	if(sscanf(params, "s[24]S[32]S[32]()", x_nr, result, pass))
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: (/irc join [channelnr] or /irc join [channelnr] [password])  (/irc Leave)  (/irc Admins)");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /irc [name] [channelnr]");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Available names: MOTD, Password, NeedPass, Lock, Kick, Status");
		return 1;
	}
    if(strcmp(x_nr,"join",true) == 0)
	{
 		new channel = strval(result);
		if(channel < 1 || channel > 10) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Channel Number can't be below 1 or above 10 !"); return 1; }
		channel -= 1;
	    if(IRCInfo[channel][iLock] == 0)
	    {
	        if(IRCInfo[channel][iNeedPass] == 0)
	        {
	            JoinChannelNr(playerid, channel);
	            return 1;
		    }
		    else
		    {
				if(!pass[0])
				{
     				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Password required");

				}
				else
				{
				      JoinChannel(playerid,channel,pass);
				}
		    }
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That Channel is Locked, please choose a different one !");
		    return 1;
	    }
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"status",true) == 0)
	{
	    for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(IRCInfo); i++)
	    {
	        format(string, sizeof(string), "Channel %d: %d Players Connected.",i + 1, IRCInfo[i][iPlayers]);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	    }
	    return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"password",true) == 0)
	{
	    new channel = strval(result);
		if(channel < 1 || channel > 10) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Channel Number can't be below 1 or above 10 !"); return 1; }
		channel -= 1;
		new wstring[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", GPN(playerid));
		strmid(wstring, string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
		if(strcmp(IRCInfo[channel][iAdmin],wstring, true ) == 0 )
		{
			strmid(IRCInfo[channel][iPassword], pass, 0, strlen(pass), 255);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "You've changed the IRC Channel's Password to: %s.",IRCInfo[channel][iPassword]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
			SaveIRC();
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not the Admin of that Channel !");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"needpass",true) == 0)
	{
	    new channel = strval(result);
		if(channel < 1 || channel > 10) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Channel Number can't be below 1 or above 10 !"); return 1; }
		channel -= 1;
		new wstring[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", GPN(playerid));
		strmid(wstring, string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
		if(strcmp(IRCInfo[channel][iAdmin],wstring, true ) == 0 )
		{
		    if(IRCInfo[channel][iNeedPass] != 0)
		    {
		        IRCInfo[channel][iNeedPass] = 0;
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Players won't have to fill in a password in order to join the IRC Channel now.");
		    }
			else
			{
			    IRCInfo[channel][iNeedPass] = 1;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Players must fill in a password in order to join the IRC Channel now.");
			}
			SaveIRC();
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not the Admin of that Channel !");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"lock",true) == 0)
	{
	    new channel = strval(result);
		if(channel < 1 || channel > 10) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Channel Number can't be below 1 or above 10 !"); return 1; }
		channel -= 1;
		new wstring[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", GPN(playerid));
		strmid(wstring, string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
		if(strcmp(IRCInfo[channel][iAdmin],wstring, true ) == 0 )
		{
		    if(IRCInfo[channel][iLock] != 0)
		    {
		        IRCInfo[channel][iLock] = 0;
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You've unlocked the IRC Channel.");
		    }
			else
			{
			    IRCInfo[channel][iLock] = 1;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You've locked the IRC Channel.");
			}
			SaveIRC();
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not the Admin of that Channel !");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"motd",true) == 0)
	{
	    new channel = strval(result);
		if(channel < 1 || channel > 10) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Channel Number can't be below 1 or above 10 !"); return 1; }
		channel -= 1;
		new wstring[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", GPN(playerid));
		strmid(wstring, string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
		if(strcmp(IRCInfo[channel][iAdmin],wstring, true ) == 0 )
		{
			if(!pass[0] || strlen(pass) > 32)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, " IRC MOTD's must be between 1 and 32 characters!");
				return 1;
			}
			else
			{
				strmid(IRCInfo[channel][iMOTD], pass, 0, strlen(pass), 255);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You've adjusted the IRC Channel's MOTD Text.");
				SaveIRC();
				return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not the Admin of that Channel !");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"leave",true) == 0)
	{
	    if(PlayersChannel[playerid] < 999)
	    {
	        format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s has left the Channel.", GPN(playerid));
	        SendIRCMessage(PlayersChannel[playerid], COLOR_GREEN, string);
	        IRCInfo[PlayersChannel[playerid]][iPlayers] -= 1;
	        PlayersChannel[playerid] = 999;
	        return 1;
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not in an IRC Channel !");
	        return 1;
	    }
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"admins",true) == 0)
	{
		for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(IRCInfo); i++)
	    {
		    format(string, sizeof(string), "Channel %d: %s.", i + 1, IRCInfo[i][iAdmin]);
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	    }
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"kick",true) == 0)
	{
	    if(PlayersChannel[playerid] == 999)
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not in an IRC Channel !");
	        return 1;
	    }
	    new wstring[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", GPN(playerid));
		strmid(wstring, string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
		if(strcmp(IRCInfo[PlayersChannel[playerid]][iAdmin],wstring, true ) == 0 )
		{
		    new giveplayerid = strval(result);
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if(PlayersChannel[giveplayerid] == PlayersChannel[playerid])
			        {
			            format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've kicked %s out of your IRC Channel.",GPN(giveplayerid));
			            SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
			            format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've been kicked out of the IRC Channel by Channel Admin: %s.",GPN(playerid));
			            SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
			            format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s has left the Channel (Kicked).", GPN(giveplayerid));
				        SendIRCMessage(PlayersChannel[playerid], COLOR_GREEN, string);
			            IRCInfo[PlayersChannel[giveplayerid]][iPlayers] -= 1;
			            PlayersChannel[giveplayerid] = 999;
			        }
			        else
			        {
			            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not in your IRC Channel !");
					    return 1;
			        }
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
        }
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not the Admin of the Channel !");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Invalid IRC Channel Number ! ");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("irc");
	return 1;
}
CMD:i(playerid, params[])//593
{
	LogCallback("i");
	new result[128], string[255], y,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
	if(PlayersChannel[playerid] == 999) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not in an IRC Channel !");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1) return SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced");
	if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /i [irc chat]");
	format(string, sizeof(string), "** IRC %s: %s. **", GPN(playerid), result);
	SendIRCMessage(PlayersChannel[playerid], COLOR_YELLOW2, string);
	format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] IRC %s: %s.", y,m,d,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid), result);
	IRCLog(string);
	LogCallback("i");
	return 1;
}


CMD:clothes(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("clothes");
   	if(IsAtClothShop(playerid))
    {
		new
			skin,
			string[16],
			vw = RandomEx(1,10000)
		;

		if(ChoosingSkin[playerid] == 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are already choosing a skin.");

		if(!sscanf(params, "d", skin))
		{
			if(skin < 0 || skin > 299) return SCM(playerid , COLOR_GRAD2, "That skin is not allowed !");
			if(!IsValidSkin(skin)) return SCM(playerid , COLOR_GRAD2, "That skin is not allowed !");
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 250);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel] = skin;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pChar] = skin;
			SetPlayerSkin(playerid, skin);
		}
		else
		{
			ChoosingSkin[playerid] = 1;
			SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 1);
			SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 18);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, vw);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerPos(playerid,180.9573,-88.0793,1002.0307);
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,175.3032,-88.1013,1001.8047);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,180.9573,-88.0793,1002.0307);
			SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, 85.8060);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "|_______________ HOW TO BUY CLOTHES _______________|");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Use LMB and RMB to cycle through the different clothes.");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "When you want to purchase an outfit, hit the SPRINT KEY.");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You may still do /clothes ID if you know the skin ID!");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Skins cost $250! Be sure to pick the one you like best!");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "|____________________________________________________|");
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid,SkinSelectTD[playerid]);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "SKIN ID: %d", GetPlayerSkin(playerid));
			PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, SkinSelectTD[playerid], string);
		}
   	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not at a clothes store!!");
	}
	LogCallback("clothes");
    return 1;
}
CMD:drink(playerid, params[])//603
{
	LogCallback("drink");
	if(IsAtBar(playerid))
	{
        if(GetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid) <= 20000)
        {
            new Float:health;
            new x_nr[24], string[128];
			if(sscanf(params, "s[24]", x_nr))
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|____________________ Bar Drinks ______________________|");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /drink [drinkname]");
		  		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Non-Alcoholic: Water ($1), Sprunk($2)");
		  		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Cheap Booze: Pissh ($6), Bourbon($8), Champagne($12)");
		  		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Expensive Drinks: Vodka ($16), Cristal($20)");
		  		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "Warning! Excessive Drinking Causes Liver Damage");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|______________________________________________________|");
				return 1;
			}
		    if(strcmp(x_nr,"pissh",true) == 0 )
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAge] < 16)
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Bartender: Sorry, you need to be 16 years to get this drink.");
				    return 1;
				}
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 6);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_BEER);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
				if(health < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0) { PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1; new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk]; hp += 10; SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp); }
					else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 10.0); }
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"bourbon",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAge] < 18)
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Bartender: Sorry, you need to be 18 years to get this drink.");
				    return 1;
				}
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 8);
                SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_BEER);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
				if(health < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0) { PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1; new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk]; hp += 15; SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp); }
					else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 15.0); }
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"champagne",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAge] < 18)
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Bartender: Sorry, you need to be 18 years to get this drink.");
				    return 1;
				}
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 12);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_WINE);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
				if(health < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0) { PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1; new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk]; hp += 20; SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp); }
					else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 20.0); }
				}
			}
            else if(strcmp(x_nr,"vodka",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAge] < 18)
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Bartender: Sorry, you need to be 18 years to get this drink.");
				    return 1;
				}
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 16);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_WINE);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
				if(health < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0) { PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1; new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk]; hp += 27; SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp); }
					else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 27.0); }
				}
			}
            else if(strcmp(x_nr,"cristal",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAge] < 18)
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Bartender: Sorry, you need to be 18 years to get this drink.");
				    return 1;
				}
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 20);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_WINE);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
				if(health < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0) { PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1; new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk]; hp += 40; SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp); }
					else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 40.0); }
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"water",true) == 0)
			{
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 1);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
				SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_SPRUNK);
				SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, -1000);
			    if(health < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0) { new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk]; hp += 5; SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp); }
					else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 50.0); }
				}
				else if(health > 100)
				{
				    SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"sprunk",true) == 0)
			{
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 2);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
				SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_SPRUNK);
				SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, -1000);
			    if(health < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0) { new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk]; hp += 5; SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp); }
					else { SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 50.0); }
				}
				else if(health > 100)
				{
				    SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Bartender: I don't know that Drink Name.");
			    return 1;
			}
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
			if (health > 100) SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s drinks some %s from the bottle.", GPN(playerid) ,x_nr);
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		}
	    else
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You can't drink anymore, you will throw up!");
            return 1;
        }
    }
    else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5, 1255.9084,-791.8105,1085.3828))
    {
        if(PlayerDrunk[playerid] < 10)
        {
            new Float:health;
            new x_nr[24], string[128];
       		if(sscanf(params, "s[24]", x_nr))
       		{
	       		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|____________________ Bar Drinks ______________________|");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /drink [drinkname]");
		  		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Coffee: Cappuccino ($4), Latte($5), Macchiato($5)");
		  		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Mixes/liqueur: Limoncello($8), Amaretto($7), Martini($12)");
		  		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Wine: Merlot ($15), Sangiovese($18), Frizzante($16)");
		  		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "Warning! Excessive Drinking Causes Liver Damage");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|______________________________________________________|");
				return 1;
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"cappuccino",true) == 0)
			{
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
				if(health < 100)
			    {
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 4);
			        SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 30);
			        SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_SPRUNK);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of Cappuccino from the porcelain cup.", GPN(playerid));
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			    }
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"latte",true) == 0)
			{
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 5);
		        SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 30);
		        SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_SPRUNK);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s drinks from a tall glass of Caffe Latte.", GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_nr,"macchiato",true) == 0)
			{
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 5);
		        SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 30);
		        SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_SPRUNK);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s drinks from a glass mug of Caffe Macchiato.", GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			}
		    else if(strcmp(x_nr,"limoncello",true) == 0)
			{
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 8);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_BEER);
				if(GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health) < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0)
					{
						PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1;
						new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk];
						hp += 30;
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s drinks from a ceramic glass of Limoncello.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else
					{
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 30.0);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s drinks from a ceramic glass of Limoncello.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
				}
			}
		    else if(strcmp(x_nr,"amaretto",true) == 0)
			{
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 7);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_BEER);
				if(GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health) < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0)
					{
						PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1;
						new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk];
						hp += 30;
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of Amaretto from a rocks glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else
					{
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 30.0);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of Amaretto from a rocks glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
				}
			}
		    else if(strcmp(x_nr,"martini",true) == 0)
			{
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 12);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_WINE);
				if(GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health) < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0)
					{
						PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1;
						new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk];
						hp += 30;
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of Martini from the cocktail glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else
					{
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 30.0);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of Martini from the cocktail glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
				}
			}
		    else if(strcmp(x_nr,"merlot",true) == 0)
			{
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 15);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_WINE);
				if(GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health) < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0)
					{
						PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1;
						new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk];
						hp += 30;
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of red wine (Merlot) from the wine glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else
					{
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 30.0);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of red wine (Merlot) from the wine glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
				}
			}
		    else if(strcmp(x_nr,"sangiovese",true) == 0)
			{
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 18);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_BEER);
				if(GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health) < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0)
					{
						PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1;
						new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk];
						hp += 30;
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of red wine (Sangiovese) from the wine glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else
					{
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 30.0);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of red wine (Sangiovese) from the wine glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
				}
			}
		    else if(strcmp(x_nr,"frizzante",true) == 0)
			{
			    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, - 16);
			    SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_DRINK_WINE);
				if(GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health) < 100)
				{
				    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk] > 0)
					{
						PlayerDrunk[playerid] += 1;
						new hp = 2 * PlayerInfo[playerid][pAlcoholPerk];
						hp += 30;
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + hp);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of white wine (Frizzante) from the wine glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
					else
					{
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, health + 30.0);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes a sip of white wine (Frizzante) from the wine glass.", GPN(playerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
					}
				}
			}
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, health);
			if (health > 100)
			{
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
			}
		}
        else
        {
            SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not at a Bar!");
            return 1;
        }
    }
	LogCallback("drink");
    return 1;
}
CMD:calllist(playerid, params[])//612
{
	LogCallback("calllist");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, "____________Services number list____________");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "222 - LS Lawyers Ass., 444 - LS Taxi.");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "103 - Medics, 555 - LS Mechanics");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "151 - Advertisement Agency, 150 - ABC Studios");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREEN, "____________________________________________");
	LogCallback("calllist");
    return 1;
}
CMD:tie(playerid, params[])//613
{
	LogCallback("tie");
	if(Rope[playerid] != 0)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] < 2)
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You need to be atleast level 2 to tie ! ");
	        return 1;
	    }
	    new giveplayerid, string[128];
	    if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /tie [Playerid/PartOfName]");
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
			    if(PlayerTied[giveplayerid] > 0)
			    {
			        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** Player already Tied !");
			        return 1;
			    }
				if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
				{
				    new car = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
				    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid) && GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2 && IsPlayerInVehicle(giveplayerid, car))
				    {
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You were tied up by %s, till untie.", GPN(playerid));
						SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* You tied %s up, till untie.", GPN(giveplayerid));
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s ties %s up, so he wont go anywhere.", GPN(playerid) ,GPN(giveplayerid));
						ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
						TogglePlayerControllable(giveplayerid, 0);
						PlayerTied[giveplayerid] = 1;
						Rope[playerid]--;
				    }
				    else
				    {
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Player not in your Car, or your not the Driver !");
				        return 1;
				    }
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is not near you !");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is Offline !");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You don't have a Rope !");
	}
	LogCallback("tie");
	return 1;
}
CMD:untie(playerid, params[])//614
{
	LogCallback("untie");
	new giveplayerid, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /untie [Playerid/PartOfName]");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
	{
		if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
		    if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid == playerid) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You cannot Untie yourself!"); return 1; }
				if(PlayerTied[giveplayerid])
				{
				    format(string, sizeof(string), "* You were Untied by %s.", GPN(playerid));
					SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* You Untied %s.", GPN(giveplayerid));
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					TogglePlayerControllable(giveplayerid, 1);
					PlayerTied[giveplayerid] = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s unties %s and takes the rope with him/her.", GPN(playerid), GPN(giveplayerid));
					ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
					Rope[playerid]++;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player isn't Tied up !");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is not near you !");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is Offline !");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("untie");
	return 1;
}
CMD:sell(playerid, params[])//615
{
	LogCallback("sell");
	new x_nr[64], string[128], result[32], re[32];
	if(sscanf(params, "s[64]S[32]S[32]", x_nr, result, re))
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|__________________ Selling __________________|");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /sell [name]");
  		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Available names: Fish, Cooked");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|_____________________________________________|");
		return 1;
	}
    if(strcmp(x_nr,"fish",true) == 0)
	{
	    if (!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 100,-30.875, -88.9609, 1004.53))//centerpoint 24-7
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You are not in a 24-7 !");
			return 1;
		}
	    new fishid = strval(result), price;
		if(fishid < 1 || fishid > 5) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Fish number cant be below 1 or above 5 !"); return 1; }
		else if(fishid == 1 && Fishes[playerid][pWeight1] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even catch a Fish at that number(1) !"); return 1; }
		else if(fishid == 2 && Fishes[playerid][pWeight2] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even catch a Fish at that number(2) !"); return 1; }
		else if(fishid == 3 && Fishes[playerid][pWeight3] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even catch a Fish at that number(3) !"); return 1; }
		else if(fishid == 4 && Fishes[playerid][pWeight4] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even catch a Fish at that number(4) !"); return 1; }
		else if(fishid == 5 && Fishes[playerid][pWeight5] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even catch a Fish at that number(5) !"); return 1; }
		switch (fishid)
		{
		    case 1:
		    {
		        if(Fishes[playerid][pWeight1] < 1)
		        {
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "We are only interested in Fishes weighting 20 LBS or more.");
		            return 1;
		        }
                price = FishCost(playerid, Fishes[playerid][pFid1]) / 3;
                price = price * Fishes[playerid][pWeight1] / 3;
                format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have sold your %s that weights %d, for $%d.", Fishes[playerid][pFish1],Fishes[playerid][pWeight1],price);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, price);
				ClearFishID(playerid, 1);
		    }
		    case 2:
		    {
		        if(Fishes[playerid][pWeight2] < 1)
		        {
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "We are only interested in Fishes weighting 20 LBS or more.");
		            return 1;
		        }
      			price = FishCost(playerid, Fishes[playerid][pFid2]) / 3;
                price = price * Fishes[playerid][pWeight2] / 3;
                if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
		        {
		            new skill = price / 800;
		            new payout = (skill)*(1);
		            price += payout;
		        }
                format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have sold your %s that weights %d, for $%d.", Fishes[playerid][pFish2],Fishes[playerid][pWeight2],price);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, price);
				ClearFishID(playerid, 2);
		    }
		    case 3:
		    {
		        if(Fishes[playerid][pWeight3] < 1)
		        {
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "We are only interested in Fishes weighting 20 LBS or more.");
		            return 1;
		        }
      			price = FishCost(playerid, Fishes[playerid][pFid3]) / 3;
                price = price * Fishes[playerid][pWeight3] / 3;
                if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
		        {
		            new skill = price / 800;
		            new payout = (skill)*(1);
		            price += payout;
		        }
                format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have sold your %s that weights %d, for $%d.", Fishes[playerid][pFish3],Fishes[playerid][pWeight3],price);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, price);
				ClearFishID(playerid, 3);
		    }
		    case 4:
		    {
		        if(Fishes[playerid][pWeight4] < 1)
		        {
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "We are only interested in Fishes weighting 20 LBS or more.");
		            return 1;
		        }
       			price = FishCost(playerid, Fishes[playerid][pFid4]) / 3;
                price = price * Fishes[playerid][pWeight4] / 3;
                if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
		        {
		            new skill = price / 800;
		            new payout = (skill)*(1);
		            price += payout;
		        }
                format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have sold your %s that weights %d, for $%d.", Fishes[playerid][pFish4],Fishes[playerid][pWeight4],price);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, price);
				ClearFishID(playerid, 4);
		    }
		    case 5:
		    {
		        if(Fishes[playerid][pWeight5] < 1)
		        {
		            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "We are only interested in Fishes weighting 20 LBS or more.");
		            return 1;
		        }
      			price = FishCost(playerid, Fishes[playerid][pFid5]) / 3;
                price = price * Fishes[playerid][pWeight5] / 3;
                if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pTraderPerk] > 0)
			    {
					new skill = price / 800;
  		            new payout = (skill)*(1);
		            price += payout;
		        }
                format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have sold your %s that weights %d, for $%d.", Fishes[playerid][pFish5],Fishes[playerid][pWeight5],price);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, price);
				ClearFishID(playerid, 5);
		    }
		}
		Fishes[playerid][pLastFish] = 0;
		Fishes[playerid][pFishID] = 0;
		return 1;
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_nr,"cooked",true) == 0)
	{
	    new cookid = strval(result);
		if(cookid < 1 || cookid > 5) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   Cook number cant be below 1 or above 5 !"); return 1; }
		else if(cookid == 1 && Cooking[playerid][pCWeight1] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even Cook something at that number(1) !"); return 1; }
		else if(cookid == 2 && Cooking[playerid][pCWeight2] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even Cook something at that number(2) !"); return 1; }
		else if(cookid == 3 && Cooking[playerid][pCWeight3] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even Cook something at that number(3) !"); return 1; }
		else if(cookid == 4 && Cooking[playerid][pCWeight4] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even Cook something at that number(4) !"); return 1; }
		else if(cookid == 5 && Cooking[playerid][pCWeight5] < 1) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You didnt even Cook something at that number(5) !"); return 1; }
		new giveplayerid = strval(re);
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
		        switch(cookid)
		        {
					case 1:
					{
					    if(Cooking[giveplayerid][pCWeight1] < 1)
					    {
					        format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", Cooking[playerid][pCook1]);
						    strmid(Cooking[giveplayerid][pCook1], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
						    Cooking[giveplayerid][pCWeight1] = Cooking[playerid][pCWeight1];
						    Cooking[giveplayerid][pCookID1] = Cooking[playerid][pCookID1];
						    format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s has given you %s weighting %d (use /cooked to see it).",GPN(playerid),Cooking[giveplayerid][pCook1],Cooking[giveplayerid][pCWeight1]);
						    SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						    format(string, sizeof(string), "* You gave %s weighting %d to %s.",Cooking[playerid][pCook1],Cooking[playerid][pCWeight1],GPN(giveplayerid));
						    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					    }
					    else if(Cooking[giveplayerid][pCWeight2] < 1)
					    {
					        format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", Cooking[playerid][pCook1]);
						    strmid(Cooking[giveplayerid][pCook2], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
						    Cooking[giveplayerid][pCWeight2] = Cooking[playerid][pCWeight1];
						    Cooking[giveplayerid][pCookID2] = Cooking[playerid][pCookID1];
						    format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s has given you %s weighting %d (use /cooked to see it).",GPN(playerid),Cooking[giveplayerid][pCook2],Cooking[giveplayerid][pCWeight2]);
						    SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						    format(string, sizeof(string), "* You gave %s weighting %d to %s.",Cooking[playerid][pCook1],Cooking[playerid][pCWeight1],GPN(giveplayerid));
						    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					    }
					    else if(Cooking[giveplayerid][pCWeight3] < 1)
					    {
					        format(string, sizeof(string), "%s", Cooking[playerid][pCook1]);
						    strmid(Cooking[giveplayerid][pCook3], string, 0, strlen(string), 255);
						    Cooking[giveplayerid][pCWeight3] = Cooking[playerid][pCWeight1];
						    Cooking[giveplayerid][pCookID3] = Cooking[playerid][pCookID1];
