								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Unused Safe House.", i);
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE,string);
							}
							case 41:
							{
								HouseInfo[i][hExitx] = 446.5014; HouseInfo[i][hExity] = 507.0295; HouseInfo[i][hExitz] = 1001.4195;
								HouseInfo[i][hInt] = 12;
								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Budget Inn Motel Room.", i);
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE,string);
							}
							case 42:
							{
								HouseInfo[i][hExitx] = 2216.3398; HouseInfo[i][hExity] = -1150.5099; HouseInfo[i][hExitz] = 1025.7969;
								HouseInfo[i][hInt] = 15;
								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Jefferson Motel. (REALLY EXPENSIVE)", i);
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE,string);
							}
						}
						OnPropTextdrawUpdate(1, i);
						SaveHouse(i,2);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /edit int %d for house %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),proplev, i);
						AdminCommandLog(string);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Unknown Item");
						return 1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		for(new i = 0; i < sizeof(BizzInfo); i++)
		{
			if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 3,BizzInfo[i][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[i][bEntranceZ]))
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Biz: %d", i);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, string);
				if(strcmp(x_job,"level",true) == 0)
				{
                    if(isnull(result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/edit name amount");
					BizzInfo[i][bLevelNeeded] = strval(result);
					OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, i);
					OnPropUpdate(2,i);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /edit name %d for bizz %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),result,i);
					AdminCommandLog(string);
				}
				else if(strcmp(x_job,"price",true) == 0)
				{
                    if(isnull(result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/edit name amount");
					BizzInfo[i][bBuyPrice] = strval(result);
					OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, i);
					OnPropUpdate(2,i);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /edit price %d for bizz %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),result,i);
					AdminCommandLog(string);
				}
				else if(strcmp(x_job,"funds",true) == 0)
			    {
                    if(isnull(result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/edit name amount");
					BizzInfo[i][bTill] = strval(result);
					OnPropUpdate(2,i);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /edit funds %d for bizz %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),result,i);
					AdminCommandLog(string);
				}
				else if(strcmp(x_job,"products",true) == 0)
			    {
					if(isnull(result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/edit name amount");
					BizzInfo[i][bProducts] = strval(result);
					OnPropTextdrawUpdate(2, i);
					OnPropUpdate(2,i);
					format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /edit products %d for bizz %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),result,i);
					AdminCommandLog(string);
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Unknown Item");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
		}
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You've adjusted the: %s to %d.", x_job,strval(result));
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	}
	LogCallback("edit");
	return 1;
}
CMD:unban(playerid, params[])//694
{
	LogCallback("unban");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		new
			acct[24],
			string[128],
			sqlQuery[300],
			y, m, d, h,mi,s
		;
		if(sscanf(params, "s[24]", acct)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Usage: /unban <account name>");

		format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "SELECT * FROM `samp_bans` WHERE `BanName`='%s'", acct);
		mysql_query(sqlQuery); mysql_store_result();

		if(mysql_num_rows()==0)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED,"Error: Does not exist!");
			mysql_free_result();
		}
		else
		{
			format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "DELETE FROM `samp_bans` WHERE `BanName`='%s'", acct);
			mysql_query(sqlQuery, THREAD_UNBAN, playerid);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has unbanned The account of %s.",GPN(playerid),acct);
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* Administrator %s Has Unbanned the account of %s", GPN(playerid),acct);
			SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_NICERED,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* Successfuly Unbanned %s's account", acct);
			SCM(playerid,TEAM_GROVE_COLOR,string);
			getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Unbanned the Account of %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),acct);
			LoginLog(string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("unban");
	return 1;
}
CMD:alias(playerid,params[])//695
{
	LogCallback("alias");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod])
	{
		new player1, playername[MAX_PLAYER_NAME], str[128], tmp3[50];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", player1)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /alias [playerid]");

		if(IsPlayerConnected(player1) && player1 != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
			GetPlayerIp(player1,tmp3,50);
			GetPlayerName(player1, playername, sizeof(playername));
			format(str,sizeof(str),"Aliases for %s (%d) are: %s", playername, player1, dini_Get("LARP/Users/Aliases/alias.txt",tmp3) );
			return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,str);
		}
		else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Player is not connected or is yourself");
	}
	else { SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* ERROR: You are not a high enough level to use this command"); }
	LogCallback("alias");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ips(playerid,params[])//696
{
	LogCallback("ips");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid))
	{
		new player1, playername[MAX_PLAYER_NAME], str[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", player1)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /ips [playerid]");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(player1) && player1 != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
			GetPlayerName(player1, playername, sizeof(playername));
			format(str,sizeof(str),"IPs Used for %s (%d) are: %s", playername, player1, dini_Get("LARP/Users/Aliases/ips.txt",playername) );
			return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,str);
		}
		else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Player is not connected or is yourself");
	}
	else { SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* ERROR: You are not a high enough level to use this command"); }
	LogCallback("ips");
	return 1;
}
CMD:getips(playerid, params[])//697
{
	LogCallback("getips");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] <= 2)
	    return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not authorized to use this command!");

	new name2[24],msg[128];
 	if(sscanf(params, "s[24]", name2))
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Usage: /getips <player name>");

    format(ipFILE, 64, "LARP/Users/Aliases/%s.txt", name2);

    if(!dini_Exists(ipFILE))
        return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Name file not found. (This is Case Sensitive!)");

 	format(msg,sizeof(msg),"IPs Used for name %s are: %s", name2, dini_Get("LARP/Users/Aliases/ips.txt",name2) );
	LogCallback("getips");
	return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,msg);

}
CMD:getaliases(playerid,params[])//698
{
	LogCallback("getaliases");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] <= 2)
	    return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"* You're not authorized to use this command!");

	new tmp3[50],msg[128], name[24];
 	if(sscanf(params, "s[24]", name))
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Usage: /getaliases <player name>");

    format(ipFILE, 64, "LARP/Users/Aliases/%s.txt", name);

    if(!dini_Exists(ipFILE))
        return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Name file not found. (This is Case Sensitive!)");

	strmid(tmp3,dini_Get(ipFILE, "Nameip"),0,50,50);

 	format(msg,sizeof(msg),"Aliases for name %s are: %s", name, dini_Get("LARP/Users/Aliases/alias.txt",tmp3) );
	LogCallback("getaliases");
	return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,msg);

}

CMD:mduty(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("mduty");
	new string[128], y, m, d, h, mi, s;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
	format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /mduty",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
	AdminCommandLog(string);
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] == 1)
	{
	    if(ModDuty[playerid] == -1)
	    {
			ModDuty[playerid] = 1;
			SetPlayerColor(playerid, 0xB300A700);
			SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 99999);
			SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 99999);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"[MODERATOR] %s has gone on duty.",GPN(playerid));
			ABroadCast(COLOR_RED,string, 1);
			return 1;
		}
		else
		{
			ModDuty[playerid] = -1;
			SetPlayerColor(playerid, 0xFFFFFF00);
			SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
			SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
			format(string, sizeof(string),"[MODERATOR] %s has gone off duty.",GPN(playerid));
			ABroadCast(COLOR_RED,string, 1);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("mduty");
	return 1;
}
CMD:makemod(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("makemod");
	new para1, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", para1)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /makemod [playerid]");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
    {
        if(IsPlayerConnected(para1))
        {
            if(para1 != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[para1][pMod] >= 1)
			    {
			        PlayerInfo[para1][pMod] = 0;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has fired you from Moderator", GPN(playerid));
			        SCM(para1, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
				}
				else if(PlayerInfo[para1][pMod] == 0)
				{
					PlayerInfo[para1][pMod] = 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has just made %s a Moderator", GPN(playerid), GPN(para1));
					SendClientMessageToAll(0x61FFDDAA, string);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("makemod");
	return 1;
}
CMD:fightstyle(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("fightstyle");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new string[128];
	    new string1[24];
        new string2[24];
        new string3[24];
        new string4[24];
        new string5[24];
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pBoxiSkill] == 1)
        {
            format(string1,sizeof(string1),"\nBoxing");
		}
		else
		{
		    format(string1,sizeof(string1),"\nNot Trained");
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pKungSkill] == 1)
        {
			format(string2,sizeof(string2),"\nKung Fu");
		}
		else
		{
		    format(string2,sizeof(string2),"\nNot Trained");
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pKneeSkill] == 1)
        {
    		format(string3,sizeof(string3),"\nKnee Head");
		}
		else
		{
		    format(string3,sizeof(string3),"\nNot Trained");
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGrabSkill] == 1)
        {
    		format(string4,sizeof(string4),"\nGrab'n'Kick");
		}
		else
		{
		    format(string4,sizeof(string4),"\nNot Trained");
		}
		format(string, sizeof(string),"Normal%s%s%s%s%s",string1,string2,string3,string4,string5);
        ShowServerDialog(playerid, 300,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Select your Fight Style",string,"Ok","Close");
	}
	LogCallback("fightstyle");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setvw(playerid, params[])//
{
	LogCallback("setvw");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new playa, virid, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", playa, virid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /setvw [playerid/PartOfName] [virworldid]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
  					if(GetPlayerState(playa) == 2)
					{
						SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playa, virid);
						PlayerInfo[playa][pVirWorld] = virid;
						new vehicleid = GetPlayerVehicleID(playa);
						SetVehicleVirtualWorld(vehicleid, GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playa));
						format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have set %s's (%d) virtual world to %d.", GPN(playa),playa, virid);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "Admin %s Has Set Your Virtual World to (%d)", GPN(playerid), virid);
						SCM(playa, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has set %s's (%d) world to %d.",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa), playa,virid);
						SendTesterAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's World to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),virid);
						GiveLog(string);
					}
					else
					{
						SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playa, virid);
						PlayerInfo[playa][pVirWorld] = virid;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "  You have set %s's (%d) virtual world to %d.", GPN(playa),playa, virid);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "Admin %s Has Set Your Virtual World to (%d)", GPN(playerid), virid);
						SCM(playa, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has set %s's (%d) world to %d.",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),playa,virid);
						SendTesterMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
						new y, m, d;
						new h,mi,s;
						getdate(y,m,d);
						gettime(h,mi,s);
						format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Has Set %s's World to %d",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),virid);
						GiveLog(string);
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("setvw");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ann(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("ann");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3)
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "** You are not Authorised to use this command!");
	    return 1;
	}
	new result[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /ann [text]");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
			format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "~y~%s", result);
			GameTextForPlayer(i, tstring, 5000, 3);
		}
	}
	format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Displayed a Message. [Message: %s]", GPN(playerid), result);
	ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,tstring, 5);
	LogCallback("ann");
	return 1;
}
CMD:cancelcountdown(playerid, params[])//
{
	LogCallback("cancelcountdown");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2)
		{
			KillTimer(CountdownTimer);
		    TextDrawHideForAll(CountdownTD);
		    CountdownRunning = 0;
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "* You are not an Admin!");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("cancelcountdown");
	return 1;
}
CMD:carreset(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("carreset");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			new bool:unwanted[MAX_VEHICLES];
			for(new player=0; player<MAX_PLAYERS; player++)
			{
				if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(player)) { unwanted[GetPlayerVehicleID(player)]=true; }
			}
			for(new car = 0; car <MAX_VEHICLES; car++)
			{
				if(!unwanted[car])
				{
					if(CarInfo[car][cUid] == -1 && CarInfo[car][cWcart] == 0) //loop in OnGameModeInit sets all static cars to -1
					{
						SetVehicleToRespawn(car);
					}
				}
			}
			new string[128];
			format(string, sizeof(string), "SERVER: All unused cars respawned by %s.", GPN(playerid));
			BroadCast(COLOR_WHITE,string);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has Respawned All Cars.", GPN(playerid));
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("carreset");
	return 1;
}
CMD:frozen(playerid, params)
{
	LogCallback("frozen");
	new string[128];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1)
    {
        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You're no authorized to use that command . ");
        return 1;
    }
	format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Checked For Muted Users Online.", GPN(playerid));
	ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, string, 5);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD3, "Frozen Users online:");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[i][pFrozen] == 1)
		    {
				format(string, 256, "%s (%d)", GPN(i),i);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("frozen");
	return 1;
}
CMD:gotoammu(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("gotoammu");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			new y,m,d,h,mi,s, string[128];
			if (GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2)
			{
				new tmpcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
				SetVehiclePos(tmpcar, 1366.3837,-1281.2639,13.5469);
				TelePos[playerid][0] = 0.0; TelePos[playerid][1] = 0.0;
				LinkVehicleToInterior(tmpcar, 0);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			}
			else
			{
				SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1366.3837,-1281.2639,13.5469);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			}
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = 0;
			getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /gotoammu",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
			AdminCommandLog(string);
		}
		else
		{

			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command !");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("gotoammu");
	return 1;
}

CMD:buytoys(playerid, params[]) //
{
	LogCallback("buytoys");
	new dtext[128], vip = PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP];
	if(!IsAtClothShop(playerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You are not at a clothes shop!");
	if(BUD::IsNameRegistered(GPN(playerid)))
	{
		switch(vip)
		{
		    case 0: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3"; }
		    case 1: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3\r\nToy Slot4"; }
		    case 2: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3\r\nToy Slot4\r\nToy Slot5"; }
		    case 3: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3\r\nToy Slot4\r\nToy Slot5\r\nToy Slot6\r\nToy Slot7"; }
		    case 4: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3\r\nToy Slot4\r\nToy Slot5\r\nToy Slot6\r\nToy Slot7\r\nToy Slot8\r\nToy Slot9\r\nToy Slot10"; }
		}
    	ShowServerDialog(playerid, DIALOG_TOY, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Toys", dtext ,"Okay", "Cancel");
	}
	else
	{
		BUD::RegisterName(GPN(playerid), "toy");
		switch(vip)
		{
		    case 0: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3"; }
		    case 1: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3\r\nToy Slot4"; }
		    case 2: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3\r\nToy Slot4\r\nToy Slot5"; }
		    case 3: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3\r\nToy Slot4\r\nToy Slot5\r\nToy Slot6\r\nToy Slot7"; }
		    case 4: { dtext = "Toy Slot1\r\nToy Slot2\r\nToy Slot3\r\nToy Slot4\r\nToy Slot5\r\nToy Slot6\r\nToy Slot7\r\nToy Slot8\r\nToy Slot9\r\nToy Slot10"; }
		}
    	ShowServerDialog(playerid, DIALOG_TOY, DIALOG_STYLE_LIST, "Toys", dtext ,"Okay", "Cancel");
	}
	LogCallback("buytoys");
	return 1;
}
CMD:weartoy(playerid, params[])//
{
	LogCallback("weartoy");
	new toy;
	if(sscanf(params, "d", toy)) return SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "USAGE:/weartoy [slot 1-10]");
	if(toy > 10 || toy < 1) return SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "Slot Can't be greater then 10 or less then 1");
    if(ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][toy - 1] == 0) return SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You don't even have a toy in this slot!");
	switch(toy)
	{
	    case 1:
		{
			if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 0) == 0)
			{
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 0, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][0], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][0], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][0],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][1],	ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][2], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][3], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][4], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][5],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][6], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][7], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][8]);
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 1");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 1");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 0);
			}
		}
		case 2:
		{
			if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 1) == 0)
			{
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][1], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][1], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][9],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][10],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][11], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][12], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][13],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][14],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][15], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][16], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][17] );
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 2");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 2");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
			}
		}
		case 3:
		{
		    if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 2) == 0)
		    {
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 2, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][2], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][2], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][18],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][19],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][20], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][21], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][22],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][23],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][24], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][25], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][26] );
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 3");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 3");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 2);
			}
		}
		case 4:
		{
			if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 3) == 0)
		    {
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 3, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][3], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][3], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][27],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][28],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][29], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][30], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][31],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][32],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][33], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][34], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][35] );
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 4");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 4");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 3);
			}
		}
		case 5:
		{
		    if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 4) == 0)
		    {
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 4, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][4], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][4], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][36],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][37],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][38], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][39], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][40],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][41],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][42], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][43], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][44] );
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 5");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 5");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 4);
			}
		}
		case 6:
		{
		    if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 5) == 0)
		    {
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 5, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][5], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][5], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][45],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][46],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][47], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][48], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][49],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][50],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][51], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][52], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][53]);
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 6");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 6");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 5);
			}
		}
		case 7:
		{
		    if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 6) == 0)
		    {
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 6, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][6], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][6], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][54],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][55],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][56], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][57], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][58],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][59],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][60], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][61], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][62]);
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 7");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 7");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 6);
			}
		}
		case 8:
		{
		    if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 7) == 0)
		    {
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 7, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][7], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][7], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][63],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][64],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][65], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][66], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][67],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][68],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][69], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][70], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][71]);
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 8");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 8");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 7);
			}
		}
		case 9:
		{
		    if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 8) == 0)
		    {
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 8, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][8], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][8], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][72],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][73],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][74], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][75], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][76],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][77],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][78], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][79], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][80]);
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 9");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 9");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 8);
			}
		}
		case 10:
		{
		    if(IsPlayerAttachedObjectSlotUsed(playerid, 9) == 0)
		    {
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 9, ToyInfo[playerid][tObj][9], ToyInfo[playerid][tBone][9], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][81],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][82],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][83], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][84], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][85],
				ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][86],ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][87], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][88], ToyInfo[playerid][tPos][89]);
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have attached object 10");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "You have removed object 10");
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 9);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("weartoy");
	return 1;
}
CMD:edittoy(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("edittoy");
	new ts;
	if(sscanf(params, "d", ts)) return SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "USAGE:/edittoy [slot 1-10]");
	if(ts > 10 || ts < 1) return SCM(playerid, 0xFFFFFFAA, "Toy slot must be between 1 and 10");
	toyslot[playerid] = ts -1;
	editing[playerid] = 1;
	EditAttachedObject(playerid, toyslot[playerid]);
	LogCallback("edittoy");
 	return 1;
}
CMD:oban(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("oban");
	new acct[MAX_PLAYER_NAME], string[128], result[128], escreason[128], sqlQuery[612];
	if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		if(sscanf(params, "s[24]s[128]", acct, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /oban [playerid/PartOfName] <reason>");
		format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "SELECT `IP` FROM `samp_users` WHERE `Username`='%s'", acct);
		mysql_query(sqlQuery); mysql_store_result(); new ips[32]; mysql_fetch_row(ips); mysql_real_escape_string(result,escreason);
		format(sqlQuery, sizeof(sqlQuery), "INSERT INTO `samp_bans` SET `IP`=INET_ATON('%s'), `BannedBy`='%s', `BanReason`='%s', `BanName`='%s'", ips, GPN(playerid), escreason, acct);
		mysql_query(sqlQuery); mysql_store_result(); mysql_free_result();
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s offline banned %s for: %s",GPN(playerid),acct,result); BanLog(string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN] %s has offline banned %s for %s",GPN(playerid),acct,result); ABroadCast(COLOR_RED,string,3);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have offline banned %s for %s",acct,result); SCM(playerid,COLOR_RED,string);
		return 1;
	}
	else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "Nope"); }
	LogCallback("oban");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ocs(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("ocs");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    new acct[24], name[24], stat[128], sqlquery[500], string[128], result[128];
	    if(sscanf(params, "s[24],s[128]", acct, stat))
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_ERROR, "USAGE: /ocs (/ocheckstats) [Player_Name] [Stat].");
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_ERROR, "STAT NAMES:[lastlogged, house, ip, whyleft, money, bank, level]");
	    }
	    format(sqlquery, sizeof(sqlquery), "SELECT * FROM samp_users WHERE Username='%s'", acct);
	    mysql_query(sqlquery);
	    mysql_store_result();
	    if(mysql_retrieve_row())
	    {
	        mysql_get_field("PlayerID", name);
	        if(strcmp(stat,"lastlogged",true))
	        {
	            mysql_get_field("LastLogged", result);
		    	format(string, sizeof(string), "%s's last logged date was:[%s]", name, result);
		    	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	        }
	        if(strcmp(stat,"house",true))
	        {
	            mysql_get_field("House", result);
				format(string, sizeof(string),"%s currently owns HouseID:[%d].", name, result);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	        }
	        if(strcmp(stat,"ip",true))
	        {
	            mysql_get_field("IP", result);
	            format(string, sizeof(string), "%s's last logged IP Adress was: [%s].", name, result);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	        }
	        if(strcmp(stat,"whyleft",true))
	        {
	            mysql_get_field("WhyLeft", result);
	            format(string, sizeof(string), "%s's last leaving reason was: '%s'.", name, result);
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	        }
	        if(strcmp(stat,"money", true))
	        {
	            mysql_get_field("Money", result);
			 	format(string, sizeof(string), "%s's current on hand cash is: $%d.", name, result);
			 	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	        }
	        if(strcmp(stat,"bank", true))
	        {
	            mysql_get_field("Bank", result);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "%s's current bank balance is: $%d.", name, result);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	        }
	        if(strcmp(stat,"level", true))
	        {
	            mysql_get_field("Level", result);
	            format(string, sizeof(string), "%s's current level is: [Level %d].", name, result);
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	        }
	        else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_ERROR, "This is not a valid stat name!");
	    }
	 	mysql_free_result();
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_ERROR, "You are not a high enough admin level to use this!");
	}
	LogCallback("ocs");
	return 1;
}
CMD:isbanned(playerid, params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		new acct[MAX_PLAYER_NAME], string[200];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[MAX_PLAYER_NAME]", acct)) return SCM(playerid, -1 ,"USAGE: /isbanned [Player Name]");
		mysql_real_escape_string(params,acct);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"SELECT * FROM `samp_bans` WHERE `BanName`='%s'", acct);
		mysql_query(string,THREAD_ISBANNED,playerid);
	}else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_ERROR,"[ERROR: You cannot use this command!]");
	return 1;
}
CMD:adivorce(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("adivorce");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
    	new giveplayerid; if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /adivorce [playerid/PartOfName]");
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
				{
					new string[128];
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have been divorced Administrator %s",GPN(playerid)); SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s Has Divorced %s (%d)",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid); SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
					PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pMarried] = 0;
					PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pMarriedTo] = 0;
				}
			}
		}
		else {SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Hate to break it to you, but you can't use this command.");}
	}
	else {SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Player is no longer connected. Bummer.");}
	LogCallback("adivorce");
	return 1;
}
CMD:kickemall(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("kickemall");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1337)
	{
		foreach(Player, i) { ServerKick(i); }
	}
	else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Naughty, Naughty, Naughty! Why are you trying?"); }
	LogCallback("kickemall");
	return 1;
}
CMD:apm(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("apm");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1)
		{
			new giveplayerid, result[128];
			if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You havent logged in yet!"); return 1; }
			if(sscanf(params, "us[128]", giveplayerid, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /apm [playerid/PartOfName] [text]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
				if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
				{
					new h,mi,s,y,m,d; gettime(h,mi,s); getdate(y,m,d);
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* PM From Admin: %s", result); SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, tstring);
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* PM Sent to %s (%d): %s", GPN(giveplayerid), giveplayerid, result); SCM(playerid,  COLOR_GREEN, tstring);
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "[ADMIN]: %s HAS ADMIN PMED %s (%d) (Text: %s).",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid, (result)); ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED, tstring, 3);
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [APM] to %s: (%s)",d,m,y,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid), (result)); APMLog(tstring);
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else { format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "%d is not an active player.", giveplayerid); SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, tstring); }
		}
	}
	LogCallback("apm");
	return 1;
}
CMD:mpm(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("mpm");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
			new giveplayerid, result[128];
			if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You havent logged in yet!");
			if(sscanf(params, "us[128]", giveplayerid, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /apm [playerid/PartOfName] [text]");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
				if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
				{
					new h,mi,s,y,m,d; gettime(h,mi,s); getdate(y,m,d);
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* PM From Moderator: %s", result); SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, tstring);
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "* PM Sent to %s (%d): %s", GPN(playerid), giveplayerid, result); SCM(playerid,  COLOR_GREEN, tstring);
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "[ADMIN]: %s HAS ADMIN PMED %s (%d) (Text: %s).",GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid),giveplayerid, (result)); ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,tstring, 3);
					format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [MPM] to %s: (%s)",d,m,y,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid),giveplayerid,(result)); APMLog(tstring);
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else { format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "%d is not an active player.", giveplayerid); SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, tstring); }
		}
	}
	LogCallback("mpm");
	return 1;
}
CMD:spec(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("spec");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		new id, string[64];
	    if(sscanf(params,"u", id)) return SCM(playerid, Grey, "Usage: /spec [id]");
	    if(id == playerid) return SCM(playerid,Grey,"You cannot spec yourself.");
	    if(id == INVALID_PLAYER_ID) return SCM(playerid, Grey, "Player not found!");
	    if(IsSpecing[playerid] == 1) return SCM(playerid,Grey,"You are already specing someone.");
	    GetPlayerPos(playerid,SpecX[playerid],SpecY[playerid],SpecZ[playerid]);
	    Inter[playerid] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
	    vWorld[playerid] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
	    TogglePlayerSpectating(playerid, true);
	    if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(id))
	    {
	        if(GetPlayerInterior(id) > 0)
	        {
	            SetPlayerInterior(playerid,GetPlayerInterior(id));
	        }
	        if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(id) > 0)
	        {
	            SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,GetPlayerVirtualWorld(id));
	        }
	        PlayerSpectateVehicle(playerid,GetPlayerVehicleID(id));
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        if(GetPlayerInterior(id) > 0)
	        {
	            SetPlayerInterior(playerid,GetPlayerInterior(id));
	        }
	        if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(id) > 0)
	        {
	            SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,GetPlayerVirtualWorld(id));
	        }
	        PlayerSpectatePlayer(playerid,id);
	    }
		format(string, sizeof(string),"You have started to spectate %s.",GPN(id));
	    SCM(playerid,0x0080C0FF,string);
		ShowStats(playerid, id);
	    IsSpecing[playerid] = 1;
	    IsBeingSpeced[id] = 1;
	    spectatorid[playerid] = id;
	}
	LogCallback("spec");
    return 1;
}
CMD:specoff(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("specoff");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || ModDuty[playerid] >= 1)
    {
	    if(IsSpecing[playerid] == 0) return SCM(playerid,Grey,"You are not spectating anyone.");
	    TogglePlayerSpectating(playerid, 0);
	    SetPlayerPos(playerid,SpecX[playerid],SpecY[playerid],SpecZ[playerid]);
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] == 1)
	    {
	    	SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xB300A700);
		}
		else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
		    SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFF66FF00);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("specoff");
    return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("sls");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		new playa,string[128]; if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/sls [playerid]");
		SetPlayerPos(playa,1529.6,-1691.2,13.3); SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playa,0); SetPlayerInterior(playa,0);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"[ADMIN]%s has just teleported %s to Los Santos",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa));
		SendTesterAdminMessage(COLOR_RED,string);
	}
	else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "NICE!!! You can't use this command!");}
	LogCallback("sls");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ajp(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("ajp");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 6)
	{ SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid,SPECIAL_ACTION_USEJETPACK); }
	else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must be level 6 admin or higher in order to use this!!"); }
	LogCallback("ajp");
	return 1;
}
CMD:startevent(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("startevent");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		new spot;
		if(sscanf(params, "d",spot))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Usage /startevent [event type]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "1-RC Battleground 2-Area 69 3-Golf Course 4-Baseball field 5-Kart Race 6-Quad Race 7-Dildo Deathmatch 8-MonsterTruck Demo Derby 9-Area-69 Labs");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "10-TDM RC Battleground 11-TDM Area 69 12-Madd Dogg FFA 13 Madd Dog TDM");
			return 1;
		}
	    if(eventactive == 0)
	    {
	        foreach(Player, i)
	        {
	            SCM(i, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "An event has been started by an administrator type /joinevent to join!");
	            eventactive = spot;
			}
			return 1;
		}
		else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "There is already an active event!"); }
	}
	LogCallback("startevent");
	return 1;
}
CMD:joinevent(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("joinevent");
	if(eventactive != 0)
	{
		if(eventactive == 14) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "The event has already begin. You cannot join at this time");
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pInt] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
		GetPlayerPos(playerid, ePos[0][playerid],ePos[1][playerid],ePos[2][playerid]);
		for (new i = 0; i < 13; i++)
		{
    		GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, i, eWeapons[i][0][playerid], eWeapons[i][1][playerid]);
		}
		if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		{
			RemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
		}
		switch(eventactive)
		{
		    case 1:
		    {
				new Random = random(sizeof(EventSpawns));
		    	SetPlayerPos(playerid, EventSpawns[Random][0], EventSpawns[Random][1], EventSpawns[Random][2]);
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 10);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 1);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Wait for the event to begin. This is a FFA Deathmatch!");
				InEvent[playerid] = 1;
			}
			case 2:
			{
				new Random = random(sizeof(EventSpawns2));
		    	SetPlayerPos(playerid, EventSpawns2[Random][0], EventSpawns2[Random][1], EventSpawns2[Random][2]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Wait for the event to begin. This is a FFA Deathmatch!");
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 1);
				InEvent[playerid] = 2;
			}
			case 3:
			{
				new Random = random(sizeof(EventSpawns3));
		    	SetPlayerPos(playerid, EventSpawns3[Random][0], EventSpawns3[Random][1], EventSpawns3[Random][2]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Wait for the event to begin. This is a FFA Deathmatch!");
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 1);
				InEvent[playerid] = 3;
			}
			case 4:
			{
				new Random = random(sizeof(EventSpawns4));
		    	SetPlayerPos(playerid, EventSpawns4[Random][0], EventSpawns4[Random][1], EventSpawns4[Random][2]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Wait for the event to begin. This is a FFA Deathmatch!");
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 1);
				InEvent[playerid] = 4;
			}
			case 5:
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 7);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Wait for the event to start!");
				new Random = random(sizeof(EventSpawns5));
				eventcar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(571, EventSpawns5[Random][0], EventSpawns5[Random][1], EventSpawns5[Random][2], 90, -1, -1, -1);
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cWcart] = 0;
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cOID] = -1;
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				LinkVehicleToInterior(eventcar[playerid], 7);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, eventcar[playerid], 0);
				UsingBelt[playerid] = 1;
				InEvent[playerid] = 5;
			}
			case 6:
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 4);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
				new Random = random(sizeof(EventSpawns6));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Wait for the event to start!");
				eventcar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(471, EventSpawns6[Random][0], EventSpawns6[Random][1], EventSpawns6[Random][2], 90, -1, -1, -1);
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cWcart] = 0;
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cOID] = -1;
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				LinkVehicleToInterior(eventcar[playerid], 4);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, eventcar[playerid], 0);
				UsingBelt[playerid] = 1;
				InEvent[playerid] = 6;
			}
			case 7:
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid,5);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,1);
				new spawn = random(sizeof(EventSpawns7));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Wait for the event to begin. This is a Dildo Deathmatch!");
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, EventSpawns7[spawn][0], EventSpawns7[spawn][1], EventSpawns7[spawn][2]);
				InEvent[playerid] = 7;
			}
			case 8:
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 15);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
				new Random = random(sizeof(EventSpawns8));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "This is a demo derby! Spread out and give yourself some room!");
				eventcar[playerid] = CreateVehicle(556, EventSpawns8[Random][0], EventSpawns8[Random][1], EventSpawns8[Random][2], EventSpawns8[Random][3], -1, -1, -1);
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cWcart] = 0;
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cOID] = -1;
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
				CarInfo[eventcar[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				LinkVehicleToInterior(eventcar[playerid], 15);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, eventcar[playerid], 0);
				UsingBelt[playerid] = 1;
				InEvent[playerid] = 8;
			}
			case 9:
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,1);
				new spawn = random(sizeof(EventSpawns9));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Wait for the event to begin. This is a FFA Deathmatch!");
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, EventSpawns9[spawn][0], EventSpawns9[spawn][1], EventSpawns9[spawn][2]);
				InEvent[playerid] = 9;
			}
			case 10:
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid,10);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,1);
				new bspawn = random(sizeof(BlueTeamE1));
				new rspawn = random(sizeof(RedTeamE1));
		    	InEvent[playerid] = 10;
		    	SCM(playerid,-1,"Wait for the event to begin this is a Team Deathmatch!");
				if(teama == 0 && teamb == 0)
				{
					SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 1);
					SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFF000000);
					SCM(playerid,-1,"You are on the {FF0000}Red Team");
					SetPlayerSkin(playerid,80);
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, RedTeamE1[rspawn][0], RedTeamE1[rspawn][1], RedTeamE1[rspawn][2]);
					teama += 1;
				}
		    	else if(teama > teamb)
		    	{

				    SetPlayerColor(playerid,0x1500FF00);
					SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 2);
				    SCM(playerid,-1,"You are on the {1500FF}Blue Team");
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, BlueTeamE1[bspawn][0], BlueTeamE1[bspawn][1], BlueTeamE1[bspawn][2]);
				    SetPlayerSkin(playerid,81);
				    teamb += 1;
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 1);
					SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFF000000);
					SCM(playerid,-1,"You are on the {FF0000}Red Team");
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, RedTeamE1[rspawn][0], RedTeamE1[rspawn][1], RedTeamE1[rspawn][2]);
					SetPlayerSkin(playerid,80);
					teama += 1;
				}
			}
			case 11:
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid,0);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,1);
				new Random = random(sizeof(EventSpawns2));
		    	SetPlayerPos(playerid, EventSpawns2[Random][0], EventSpawns2[Random][1], EventSpawns2[Random][2]);
		    	InEvent[playerid] = 11;
		    	SCM(playerid,-1,"Wait for the event to begin this is a Team Deathmatch!");
				if(teama == 0 && teamb == 0)
				{
					SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 1);
					SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFF000000);
					SCM(playerid,-1,"You are on the {FF0000}Red Team");
					SetPlayerSkin(playerid,80);
					teama += 1;
				}
		    	else if(teama > teamb)
		    	{

				    SetPlayerColor(playerid,0x1500FF00);
					SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 2);
				    SCM(playerid,-1,"You are on the {1500FF}Blue Team");
				    SetPlayerSkin(playerid,81);
				    teamb += 1;
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 1);
					SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFF000000);
					SCM(playerid,-1,"You are on the {FF0000}Red Team");
					SetPlayerSkin(playerid,80);
					teama += 1;
				}
			}
			case 12:
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid,5);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,1);
				new spawn = random(sizeof(MaddDoggFFA));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Wait for the event to begin. This is a FFA Deathmatch!");
				SetPlayerPos(playerid, MaddDoggFFA[spawn][0], MaddDoggFFA[spawn][1], MaddDoggFFA[spawn][2]);
				InEvent[playerid] = 12;
			}
			case 13:
			{
				SetPlayerInterior(playerid,5);
				SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid,1);
				new bspawn = random(sizeof(MaddDoggRed));
				new rspawn = random(sizeof(MaddDoggBlue));
		    	InEvent[playerid] = 13;
		    	SCM(playerid,-1,"Wait for the event to begin this is a Team Deathmatch!");
				if(teama == 0 && teamb == 0)
				{
					SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 1);
					SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFF000000);
					SCM(playerid,-1,"You are on the {FF0000}Red Team");
					SetPlayerSkin(playerid,80);
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, MaddDoggRed[rspawn][0], MaddDoggRed[rspawn][1], MaddDoggRed[rspawn][2]);
					teama += 1;
				}
		    	else if(teama > teamb)
		    	{

				    SetPlayerColor(playerid,0x1500FF00);
					SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 2);
				    SCM(playerid,-1,"You are on the {1500FF}Blue Team");
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, MaddDoggBlue[bspawn][0], MaddDoggBlue[bspawn][1], MaddDoggBlue[bspawn][2]);
				    SetPlayerSkin(playerid,81);
				    teamb += 1;
				}
				else
				{
					SetPlayerTeam(playerid, 1);
					SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFF000000);
					SCM(playerid,-1,"You are on the {FF0000}Red Team");
					SetPlayerPos(playerid, MaddDoggRed[rspawn][0], MaddDoggRed[rspawn][1], MaddDoggRed[rspawn][2]);
					SetPlayerSkin(playerid,80);
					teama += 1;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "There is no event in progress");
	}
	LogCallback("joinevent");
	return 1;
}
CMD:lockevent(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("lockevent");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		if(eventactive != 0)
		{
		    eventactive = 14;
		    foreach(Player, i)
		    {
				switch(InEvent[i])
				{
					case 1,2,9,10,11,12,13:
					{
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(i, 24, 9999);
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(i, 31, 9999);
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(i, 34, 9999);
						SetPlayerHealth(i, 250);
						SafeSetPlayerArmour(i, 250);
					}
			        case 3:
					{
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(i, 2, 1);
						SetPlayerHealth(i, 100);
						SafeSetPlayerArmour(i, 100);
					}
			        case 4:
					{
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(i, 5, 1);
						SetPlayerHealth(i, 100);
						SafeSetPlayerArmour(i, 100);
					}
					case 5:
					{
						SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(i, 0, -1398.1224,-193.3921,1042.8843, -1477.4352,-135.4865,1047.2347,8);
						EventKartRace[i] = 1;
					}
					case 6:
					{
						SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(i, 0, -1403.5557,-671.3718,1051.9084, -1379.5781,-619.8602,1051.8110, 8);
						EventQuadRace[i] = 1;
					}
					case 7:
					{
						SafeGivePlayerWeapon(i, 10, 1);
						SetPlayerHealth(i, 100);
						SafeSetPlayerArmour(i, 100);
					}
					case 8: { SCM(i, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Let the best driver win!"); }
		        }
		        SCM(i, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "EVENT HAS STARTED! GO!");
			}
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("lockevent");
	return 1;
}
CMD:endevent(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("endevent");
	if(eventactive != 14) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "The event either hasn't started or hasn't been locked!");
	eventactive = 0;
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		switch(InEvent[i])
		{
			case 1 .. 4,7,9,12:
			{
				SetPlayerHealth(i, 0);
				SafeResetPlayerWeapons(i);
			}
			case 5:
			{
				if(eventcar[i] != -1) { DestroyVehicle(eventcar[i]); }
				SetPlayerHealth(i, 0); SafeResetPlayerWeapons(i);
				EventKartRace[i] = 0; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(i);
				eventcar[i] = -1;
			}
			case 6:
			{
				if(eventcar[i] != -1) { DestroyVehicle(eventcar[i]); }
				SetPlayerHealth(i, 0); SafeResetPlayerWeapons(i);
				EventQuadRace[i] = 0; DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint(i);
				eventcar[i] = -1;
			}
			case 8:
			{
				if(eventcar[i] != -1) { DestroyVehicle(eventcar[i]); }
				SetPlayerHealth(i, 0); SafeResetPlayerWeapons(i);
				eventcar[i] = 1;
			}
			case 10 ,11, 13:
			{
				SetPlayerHealth(i, 0);
				SafeResetPlayerWeapons(i);
				SetPlayerTeam(i, 255);
				teama = 0;
				teamb = 0;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("endevent");
	return 1;
}
CMD:rprights(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("rprights");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		new giveplayerid, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params,"u",giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE:/rprights (playerid/partofname)");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
				switch(R_R[giveplayerid])
				{
				    case 0:
				    {
				        format(string, sizeof(string),"You have given %s rights to do RP school!", GPN(giveplayerid));
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						format(string,sizeof(string),"You have been given rights to do RP school by %s",GPN(playerid));
						SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Please see /rpschoolhelp for more details");
						R_R[giveplayerid] = 1;
					}
					case 1:
					{

				        format(string, sizeof(string),"You have taken %s's rights to do RP school!", GPN(giveplayerid));
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has taken your rp school rights!",GPN(playerid));
						SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
						R_R[giveplayerid] = 0;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Player Not Connected!"); }
	}
	else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not authorised to use this CMD!"); }
 	LogCallback("rprights");
	return 1;
}
CMD:srps(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("srps");
	switch(R_R[playerid])
	{
	    case 1:
	    {
			if(rpactive == 0 && eventactive == 0)
			{
			    foreach(Player, i)
			    {
    	            SCM(i, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Rp school in progress please type /rpschool to join!");
					rpactive = 1;
				}
				return 1;
			}
			else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Somebody is already doing an RP school please try again later!"); }
		}
		default: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You have not been given rp school rights!"); }
	}
	LogCallback("srps");
	return 1;
}
CMD:rpschool(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("rpschool");
	if(rpactive != 0)
	{
		GetPlayerPos(playerid, ePos[0][playerid],ePos[1][playerid],ePos[2][playerid]);
		for (new i = 0; i < 13; i++)
		{
    		GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, i, eWeapons[i][0][playerid], eWeapons[i][1][playerid]);
		}
		if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		{
			RemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
		}
		SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
		SetPlayerPos(playerid, -2029.798339,-106.675910,1035.171875);
		SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
		SetPlayerInterior(playerid, 3);
		InEvent[playerid] = 1;
		SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
	}
	LogCallback("rpschool");
	return 1;
}
CMD:endrpschool(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("endrpschool");
	if(rpactive != 0)
	{
	    foreach(Player, i)
	    {
	        if(InEvent[playerid] == 1)
	        {
	            SetPlayerHealth(i, 0);
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "RP school is now over!");
	            rpactive = 0;
	        }
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("endrpschool");
	return 1;
}
CMD:sitf(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("sitf");
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, "BEACH", "ParkSit_W_loop", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
	LogCallback("sitf");
	return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("layf");
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, "CRACK", "crckidle2", 4.0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0);
	LogCallback("layf");
	return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("relaxsit");
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, "CRACK", "crckidle1", 4.0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0);
	LogCallback("relaxsit");
	return 1;
}
CMD:what(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("what");
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, "RIOT", "RIOT_ANGRY", 4.1, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1);
	LogCallback("what");
	return 1;
}
CMD:flag(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("what");
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, "CAR", "FLAG_DROP", 4.1, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1);
	LogCallback("what");
	return 1;
}
CMD:talkstyle(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("talkstyle");
	new talkstyles, talkstylestring[128];
	if(sscanf(params,"i",talkstyles)) return SCM(playerid,-1, "Usage: /talkstyle [1-9] or 0 to clear your talkstyle.");
	if(talkstyles >= 0 && talkstyles <= 9)
	{
		talkstyle[playerid] = talkstyles;
		format(talkstylestring, sizeof(talkstylestring), "You have selected talkstyle #%d.", talkstyles);
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, -1, "You have entered an invalid talkstyle. Please use 1 though 9 to set one, or 0 to clear.");
	}
	if(talkstyles !=0)SCM(playerid, -1, talkstylestring);
	LogCallback("talkstyle");
	return 1;
}
CMD:xgoto(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("xgoto");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new Float:xgPos[3];
		if(sscanf(params, "fff", xgPos[0],xgPos[1],xgPos[2])) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /xgoto X Y Z");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
		{
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, xgPos[0], xgPos[1], xgPos[2]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You've been teleported");
		}
		else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "NOPE!"); }
	}
	LogCallback("xgoto");
	return 1;
}

CMD:agunskill(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("agunskill");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new giveplayerid, gstring[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /gunskill [playerid/PartOfName]");
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
			{
				format(gstring, sizeof(gstring), " %s has a GunSkill of %d ", GPN(giveplayerid), PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pGunSkill]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, gstring);
				return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("agunskill");
	return 1;
}

{

CMD:gunskill(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("gunskill");
	new
		gstring[128],
		level
	;
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "_________ GUN DEALER SKILL _________");
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGunSkill])
	{
		case 1 .. 99: 	  { level = 1; }
		case 100 .. 199:  { level = 2; }
		case 200 .. 299:  { level = 3; }
		case 300 .. 399:  { level = 4; }
		case 400 .. 5000: { level = 5; }
	}
	format(gstring, sizeof(gstring), "Gun Dealer Level: %d", level);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, gstring);
	format(gstring, sizeof(gstring), "You have created %d guns", PlayerInfo[playerid][pGunSkill]);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, gstring);
	return 1;
}

CMD:getprods(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("getprods");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 3 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 3)
	{
		if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		{
			if(Trucking[playerid] == 0)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to /gotrucking before you do anything else");
				return 1;
			}
			switch(TruckerType[playerid])
			{
				case 1:
				{
					if(sMetal < 1)
						return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "There's not enough scrap for to deliver to the factory");

					if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 30.0, JobIcons[6][0],JobIcons[6][1],JobIcons[6][2]))
					{
						switch(TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]])
						{
							case 0 .. 2:
							{
								if(HasBox[playerid] == 1)
								{
									SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already have a box in your hands. /loadtruck to continue");
									return 1;
								}
							}
							case 3:
							{
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Your truck is fully loaded and can't hold anymore");
								return 1;
							}
						}
						ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,1,0,0,1,1,1);
						AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1220); HasBox[playerid] = 1;
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You have a box of scrap parts. Use /loadtruck to load your truck");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near a pick up point");
					}
				}
				case 2:
				{
					if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 30.0, tPPos[0],tPPos[1],tPPos[2]))
					{
						switch(TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]])
						{
							case 0 .. 2:
							{
								if(HasBox[playerid] == 1)
								{
									SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already have a box in your hands. /loadtruck to continue");
									return 1;
								}
							}
							case 3:
							{
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Your truck is fully loaded and can't hold anymore");
								return 1;
							}
						}
						ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,1,0,0,1,1,1);
						AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1220); HasBox[playerid] = 1;
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You have a box of Bizz Products. Use /loadtruck to load your truck");
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near a pick up point");
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot take products the truck from the inside.");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("getprods");
	return 1;
}

CMD:loadtruck(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("loadtruck");
	if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
    	if(Trucking[playerid] >= 1)
	    {
			if(LoadingTruck[playerid] == 1)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are already loading a box");

			if(jobcdtimer[playerid] != -1)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this right now");

			if(HasBox[playerid] == 0)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have any boxes of product to load");

			if(TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]] == 3)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Your truck is already filled!");

			if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) == TruckerVeh[playerid])
			{
				new TDS[32];
				switch(TruckerType[playerid])
				{
					case 1:   TDS = "   LOADING PARTS";
					case 2:  TDS = "LOADING BIZZ GOODS";
					case 3: TDS = "LOADING MATERIALS";
					case 4:  TDS = "   LOADING DRUGS";
				}
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
				jobtimer[playerid] = defer TruckLoad(playerid);
				BarType[playerid] = 1; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;
				SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
				ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], TDS);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
				jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You are now loading the truck");
				LoadingTruck[playerid] = 1;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("loadtruck");
	return 1;
}

CMD:unloadtruck(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("unloadtruck");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 3 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 3)
	{
		if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
		{
			if(Trucking[playerid] >= 1)
			{
				if(HasBox[playerid] == 1)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already have a box in hand. Drop this off first");
					return 1;
				}
				if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) == TruckerVeh[playerid])
				{
					switch(TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]])
					{
						case 1 .. 3:
						{
							switch(TruckerType[playerid])
							{
								case 1 .. 3:
								{
									TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]] = TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]] - 1;
									ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,1,0,0,1,1,1);
									AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1220); HasBox[playerid] = 1;
									SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have taken the box from the truck.");
								}
								case 4:
								{
									TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]] = TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]] - 1;
									AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1575); HasBox[playerid] = 1;
									SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have taken drugs from the truck.");
								}
							}
						}
						default: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "The truck is empty."); }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already have a box in hand. Drop this off first");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("unloadtruck");
	return 1;
}

CMD:editjob(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("editjob");
	new x_job[32],string[128],result[32],number[32];
	if(sscanf(params, "s[32]S()[32]S()[32]",x_job,result,number))
	{
		SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/editjob [jobname]");
		SCM(playerid, -1, "Available Job Names:GunDealer, Scrapper, Trucker,drugdealer");
		return 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 6) return SCM(playerid, -1,"You are not authorized to do this!");
	if(strcmp(x_job,"drugdealer",true) == 0)//drug
	{
	    if(isnull(result))
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/editjob drugdealer [name]");
	        SCM(playerid, -1, "Avalaible Names:JoinSpot,SeedSpot,CokeSpot,SeedPrice,CokePrice,pottime,cracktime,C2CR,PotSupply,CrackSupply");
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        if(strcmp(result,"joinspot",true) == 0)
	        {
				if(dUsed[0] == 1)
				{
				    DestroyDynamicPickup(DrugJobPickup);
				    DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(DrugJobLabel);
				}
				GetPlayerPos(playerid,dJPos[0],dJPos[1],dJPos[2]);
	            dUsed[0] = 1;
	            dVw[0] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
	            dInt[0] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
	            DrugJobPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,dJPos[0],dJPos[1],dJPos[2],dVw[0],dInt[0],-1,50);
	            DrugJobLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/join] \n Drug Dealer",COLOR_LIMEGREEN,dJPos[0],dJPos[1],dJPos[2] +0.5,
				50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,dVw[0],dInt[0],-1,50.0);
	        }
	        else if(strcmp(result,"seedspot",true) == 0)
	        {
				if(dUsed[1] == 1)
				{
				    DestroyDynamicPickup(SeedsPickup);
				    DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(SeedsLabel);
				}
	            GetPlayerPos(playerid,dPPos[0],dPPos[1],dPPos[2]);
	            dUsed[1] = 1;
	            dVw[1] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
	            dInt[1] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
				SeedsPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,dPPos[0],dPPos[1],dPPos[2],dVw[1],dInt[1],-1,50);
				SeedsLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("/getseeds",COLOR_LIMEGREEN,dPPos[0],dPPos[1],dPPos[2] +0.5,
				50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,dVw[1],dInt[1],-1,50.0);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"cokespot",true) == 0)
			{
				if(dUsed[2] == 1)
				{
				    DestroyDynamicPickup(CokePickup);
				    DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(CokeLabel);
				}
			    GetPlayerPos(playerid,dCPos[0],dCPos[1],dCPos[2]);
			    dUsed[2] = 1;
			    dVw[2] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
			    dInt[2] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
			    CokePickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,dCPos[0],dCPos[1],dCPos[2],dVw[2],dInt[2],-1,50);
			    CokeLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("/getcoke",-1,dCPos[0],dCPos[1],dCPos[2] +0.5,
			    50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,dVw[2],dInt[2],-1,50.0);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"seedprice",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "Usage:/editjob drugdealer seedprice (amount)");
			    dSeedPrice = strval(number);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"you have set the seed price to %d",dSeedPrice);
			    SCM(playerid, -1 ,string);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"cokeprice",true) == 0)
			{
				if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "Usage:/editjob drugdealer cokeprice (amount)");
				dCokePrice = strval(number);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set the coke price to %d",dCokePrice);
				SCM(playerid, -1, string);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"pottime",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "Usage:/editjob drugdealer pottime (amount of time to grow a fullsize plant in minutes)");
			    dTime[0] = strval(number) * 60000;
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set the weed growing time to %d",strval(number));
			    SCM(playerid,-1,string);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"cracktime",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1,"Usage:/editjob drugdealer cracktime (amount of time in minutes to cook crack)");
			    dTime[1] = strval(number) * 60000;
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set the crack cooking time to %d",strval(number));
			    SCM(playerid, -1,string);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"C2CR",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1,"Usage:/editjob drugdealer C2CR(amount of crack you get per gram of coke you cook)");
			    dC2CR = strval(number);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set the amount of crack you get per gram of coke you cook to %d",dC2CR);
			    SCM(playerid, -1, string);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"SeedSupply",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "Usage:/editjob drugdealer potsupply (amount of seeds available at the seed bank)");
			    dPSupply = strval(number);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set the seed supply to %d",dPSupply);
				SCM(playerid, -1, string);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"CokeSupply",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1,"Usage:/editjob drugdealer cokesupply (amount of coke available to purchase)");
				dCSupply = strval(number);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set the seed supply to %d",dCSupply);
				SCM(playerid,-1,string);
			}
		}
		SaveDrugDealer();
	}
	if(strcmp(x_job,"Scrapper",true) == 0)
	{
	    if(isnull(result))
		{
			SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/editjob scrapper [name]");
			SCM(playerid, -1, "Available names:JoinSpot,Dropoff,Payout");
		}
		else
		{
		    if(strcmp(result,"JoinSpot",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(sUsed[0] == 1)
			    {
		            DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(ScrapperJobLabel);
		            DestroyDynamicPickup(ScrapperJobPickup);
		        }
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid,sJPos[0],sJPos[1],sJPos[2]);
		        sUsed[0] = 1;
		        sVw[0]   = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
		        sInt[0]  = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
				ScrapperJobPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,sJPos[0],sJPos[1],sJPos[2],sVw[0],sInt[0],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50);
				ScrapperJobLabel  = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Scrapper Job",COLOR_LIMEGREEN,sJPos[0],sJPos[1],sJPos[2] +0.5,
				50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,sVw[0],sInt[0],-1,50.0);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"dropoff",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(sUsed[1] == 1)
			    {
					DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(ScrapperDropLabel);
		            DestroyDynamicPickup(ScrapperDropPickup);
		        }
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid,sDPos[0],sDPos[1],sDPos[2]);
		        sUsed[1] = 1;
		        sVw[1]   = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
		        sInt[1]  = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
		    	ScrapperDropPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,sDPos[0],sDPos[1],sDPos[2],sVw[1],sInt[1],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50);
				ScrapperDropLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Scrapper Dropoff",COLOR_LIMEGREEN,sDPos[0],sDPos[1],sDPos[2] +0.5,
				50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,sVw[1],sInt[1],-1,50.0);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"payout",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number))
				{
					SCM(playerid, -1, "Usage:/editjob scrapper payout [amount]");
			   		SCM(playerid, -1 , "Note:The calculation for payout is as follows");
				    SCM(playerid, -1, "(Weight x Payout) / 4");
			        SCM(playerid,-1,"If the payout is at one and you got 100 lbs of scrap you will get 25 dollars!");
				}
				else
				{
				    sPayout = strval(number);
				    format(string,sizeof(string), "You have adjusted the payout to %d",sPayout);
				    SCM(playerid, -1, string);
				}
			}
			SaveScrapper();
		}
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_job,"trucker",true) == 0)
	{
	    if(isnull(result))
	    {
	        SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/editjob trucker [name]");
	        SCM(playerid, -1, "Avalaible Names:JoinSpot,Pickup,Packages,LegalPay,IllegalPay");
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        if(strcmp(result,"joinspot",true) == 0)
	        {
	            if(tUsed[0] == 1)
	            {
	                DestroyDynamicPickup(TruckJoinPickup);
	                DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(TruckJoinLabel);
	            }
	            GetPlayerPos(playerid, tJPos[0],tJPos[1],tJPos[2]);
	            tUsed[0] = 1;
	            tVw[0] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
	            tInt[0] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
	            TruckJoinPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,tJPos[0],tJPos[1],tJPos[2],tVw[0],tInt[0],-1,50);
	            TruckJoinLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Trucker Job",TRUCK_COLOR,tJPos[0],tJPos[1],tJPos[2] + 0.5,
	            50.0,-1,-1,0,tVw[0],tInt[0],-1,50.0);
	        }
	        else if(strcmp(result,"pickup",true) == 0)
	        {
	            if(tUsed[1] == 1)
	            {
					DestroyDynamicPickup(TruckPickupPickup);
					DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(TruckLoadLabel);
				}
				GetPlayerPos(playerid, tPPos[0],tPPos[1],tPPos[2]);
				tUsed[1] = 1;
				tVw[1] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
				tInt[1] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
				TruckPickupPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,tPPos[0],tPPos[1],tPPos[2],tVw[1],tInt[1],-1,50.0);
				TruckLoadLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Trucker \n[/gotrucking] \n[/getprods]",TRUCK_COLOR,tPPos[0],tPPos[1],tPPos[2]+0.6,30,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,-1,-1,-1,30.0);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"packages",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/editjob trucker packages [amount of packages they can carry per run]");
				tPackages = strval(number);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"you have set the packages per run to %d",tPackages);
				SCM(playerid, -1, string);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"legalpay",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1,"USAGE:/editjob trucker legalpay [amount a player makes per legal truck run]");
			    tPayout[0] = strval(number);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set the legalpay to %d",tPayout[0]);
			    SCM(playerid, -1, string);
			}
			else if(strcmp(result,"illegalpay",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/editjob trucker illegalpay [amount a player makes per illegal truck run]");
			    tPayout[1] = strval(number);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"you have set the illegal pay to %d",tPayout[1]);
			    SCM(playerid, -1,string);

			}
	    }
	    SaveTrucker();
	}
	else if(strcmp(x_job,"gundealer",true) == 0)
	{
	    if(isnull(result))
		{
			SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/editjob gundealer [name]");
			SCM(playerid, -1, "Available names:JoinSpot,Pickup,Dropoff,Cost,Mats,Supply,Payout");
		}
		else
		{
		    if(strcmp(result,"JoinSpot",true) == 0)
		    {
				if(gUsed[0] == 1)
				{
				    DestroyDynamicPickup(GunJoinPickup);
				    DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(GunJoinLabel);
				}
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid,gJPos[0],gJPos[1],gJPos[2]);
		        gUsed[0] = 1;
		        gVw[0]   = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
		        gInt[0]  = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
				GunJoinPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,gJPos[0],gJPos[1],gJPos[2],gVw[0],gInt[0],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50);
				GunJoinLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("[/join] \n Gun Dealer Job",COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,gJPos[0],gJPos[1],gJPos[2] +0.5,
				50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,gVw[0],gInt[0],-1,50.0);

		    }
		    else if(strcmp(result,"Pickup",true) == 0)
		    {
				if(gUsed[1] == 1)
				{
				    DestroyDynamicPickup(GunSPickup);
				    DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(GunSLabel);
				}
				GetPlayerPos(playerid, gPPos[0],gPPos[1],gPPos[2]);
				gUsed[1] = 1;
				gVw[1] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
				gInt[1] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
				GunSPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,gPPos[0],gPPos[1],gPPos[2],gVw[1],gInt[1],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"/smugglemats\r\nAvailable Mats:%d",gSupply);
				GunSLabel  = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(string,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,gPPos[0],gPPos[1],gPPos[2] +0.5,
				50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,gVw[1],gInt[1],-1,50.0);
		    }
		    else if(strcmp(result,"dropoff",true) == 0)
		    {
		        if(gUsed[2] == 1)
		        {
		            DestroyDynamicPickup(GunDropPickup);
					DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(GunsDOLabel);
		        }
	            GetPlayerPos(playerid,gDPos[0],gDPos[1],gDPos[2]);
	            gUsed[2] = 1;
	            gVw[2] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
	            gInt[2] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
	            GunDropPickup = CreateDynamicPickup(1239,1,gDPos[0],gDPos[1],gDPos[2],gVw[2],gInt[2],INVALID_PLAYER_ID,50.0);
				GunsDOLabel = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel("Materials Drop-Off",COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,gDPos[0],gDPos[1],gDPos[2]+0.5,
				50.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,gVw[1],gInt[1],-1,50.0);
		    }
		    else if(strcmp(result,"cost",true) == 0)
		    {
		        if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "Usage:/editjob gundealer cost (amount it charges a player per run)");
		        else
		        {
					gPrice = strval(number);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"You have edited the cost to run mats to %d",gPrice);
					SCM(playerid, -1, string);
				}
		    }
		    else if(strcmp(result,"mats",true) == 0)
		    {
				if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "Usage:/editjob gundealer mats (Units of metal a player gets per run)");
				else
				{
				    gMats = strval(number);
				    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have adjusted the units of metal per run to %d",gMats);
				    SCM(playerid, -1, string);
				}
		    }
		    else if(strcmp(result,"supply",true) == 0)
		    {
		        if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "Usage:/editjob gundealer supply (amount of metal at the /smugglemats point),gSupply)");
				else
				{
					gSupply = strval(number);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"You have edited the supply to %d",gSupply);
		        	SCM(playerid, -1, string);
		        }
		    }
		    else if(strcmp(result,"payout",true) == 0)
		    {
		        if(isnull(number)) return SCM(playerid, -1,"Usage:/editjob gundealer payout (how many mats a player gets per unit of metal)");
				else
				{
					gPayout = strval(number);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"you have adjusted the payout to %d",gPayout);
					SCM(playerid,-1,string);
				}
			}
		}
		SaveGunDealer();
	}
	LogCallback("editjob");
	return 1;
}

CMD:creategun(playerid, params[])//640
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't create weapons until you are a level 2");
	new x_gun[32], giveplayerid, string[128], weapon[MAX_PLAYERS], ammo[MAX_PLAYERS], price[MAX_PLAYERS],y1,m,d,h,mi,s;
	new gLevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pGunSkill];
	if(sscanf(params, "us[32]", giveplayerid, x_gun)) return SendGunMsg(playerid);
	if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pLevel] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't sell weapons to a level 1 player.");
	getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
	if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
	{
	    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    {
		    if(strcmp(x_gun,"knuckles",true) == 0)
		    {
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= cknucks)
				{
                    weapon[playerid] = 1;
					price[playerid] = cknucks;
					ammo[playerid] = 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't got enough materials for this");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "bat", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= cbat)
			    {
					weapon[playerid] = 5;
					price[playerid] = cbat;
					ammo[playerid] = 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't got enough materials for this");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "flowers", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= cflowers)
			    {
			        weapon[playerid] = 14;
			        price[playerid] = cflowers;
			        ammo[playerid] = 1;
			    }
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't got enough materials for this");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "cane", true) == 0)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= ccane)
				{
					weapon[playerid] = 15;
					price[playerid] = ccane;
					ammo[playerid] = 1;
				}
				else
				{
				    SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't got enough materials for this");
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "katana", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= ckatana)
			    {
			        weapon[playerid] = 8;
			        price[playerid] = ckatana;
			        ammo[playerid] = 1;
			    }
			    else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "colt45", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= ccolt45)
			    {
			        weapon[playerid] = 22;
			        price[playerid] = ccolt45;
			        ammo[playerid] = 50;
				}
			    else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
					return 1;
				}
			}
