			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "deagle", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(gLevel >= 301)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= cdeagle)
			        {
		                new weapons[2];

						GetPlayerWeaponData(playerid, 2, weapons[0], weapons[1]);
						if(weapons[0] != 22 && weapons[0] != 23)
						{
						 	weapon[playerid] = 24;
							price[playerid] = cdeagle;
							ammo[playerid] = 50;
						}
						else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Stop trying to exploit");
					}

				    else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You arn't a high enough level gun dealer for that!");
					return 1;
				}

			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun,"silenced", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(gLevel >= 101)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >=  csilenced)
			        {
			            weapon[playerid] = 23;
			            ammo[playerid] = 50;
			            price[playerid] = csilenced;
					}
				    else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You arn't a high enough level gun dealer for that!");
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "rifle", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(gLevel >= 101)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= crifle)
			        {
						weapon[playerid] = 33;
						price[playerid] = crifle;
						ammo[playerid] = 50;
					}
				    else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You arn't a high enough level gun dealer for that!");
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "mac10", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(gLevel >= 201)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= cmac10)
			        {
			            weapon[playerid] = 28;
			            price[playerid] = cmac10;
			            ammo[playerid] = 50;
					}
				    else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You arn't a high enough level gun dealer for that!");
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "tec9", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(gLevel >= 201)
			    {
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= ctec9)
					{
						weapon[playerid] = 32;
						price[playerid] = ctec9;
						ammo[playerid] = 50;
					}
				    else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You arn't a high enough level gun dealer for that!");
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "mp5", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(gLevel >= 301)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= cmp5)
			        {
			            weapon[playerid] = 29;
			            price[playerid] = cmp5;
			            ammo[playerid] = 50;
					}
				    else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You arn't a high enough level gun dealer for that!");
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "shotgun", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(gLevel >= 301)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= cshotgun)
			        {
						weapon[playerid] = 25;
						price[playerid] = cshotgun;
						ammo[playerid] = 20;
					}
				    else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You arn't a high enough level gun dealer for that!");
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "molotovs", true) == 0)
            {
                if(gLevel >= 301)
                {
                    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= cmolotovs)
                    {
                        weapon[playerid] = 18;
                        price[playerid] = cmolotovs;
                        ammo[playerid] = 1;
                    }
                    else {  SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this "); return 1;  }
                }
                else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You arn't a high enough level gun dealer for that!"); return 1; }
            }
			else if(strcmp(x_gun, "ak47", true) == 0)
			{
			    if(gLevel >= 500)
			    {
			        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] >= cak47)
			        {
					    weapon[playerid] = 30;
					    price[playerid] = cak47;
					    ammo[playerid] = 90;
					}
				    else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You don't have enough mats for this ");
						return 1;
					}
				}
				else
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You arn't a high enough level gun dealer for that!");
					return 1;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Unknown weapon name!");
				return 1;
			}
			if (ProxDetectorS(5.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have given %s, a %s with %d ammo, for %d Materials.", GPN(giveplayerid),x_gun, ammo[playerid], price[playerid]);
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have recieved a %s with %d ammo from %s.", x_gun, ammo[playerid], GPN(playerid));
				SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
				PlayerPlaySound(giveplayerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				new gunname[100];
				GetWeaponName(weapon[playerid], gunname, sizeof(gunname));
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s hands a %s to %s.", GPN(playerid), gunname,GPN(giveplayerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				SafeGivePlayerWeapon(giveplayerid,weapon[playerid],ammo[playerid]);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] -= price[playerid];
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /creategun %s -> %s with %d bullets",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid), GPN(giveplayerid), x_gun, ammo[playerid]);
				WeaponLog(string);
				if(weapon[playerid] >= 0)
				{
				    PlayerInfo[playerid][pGunSkill] += 1;
					weapon[playerid] = 0;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** Your too far away.");
				return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
		    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Player Not connected");
		    return 1;
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

CMD:dropmats(playerid,params[])
{
	if(MatRunning[playerid] != -1)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,7.0,-1112.3800,-1620.5386,75.9097))
	    {
			new string[128];
	        PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats] += 250;
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"You have dropped off %d units of metal and recieved 250 materials.",MatRunning[playerid]);
	        SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_BLUE,string);
	        RemovePlayerMapIcon(playerid,69);
	        MatRunning[playerid] = -1;
			new y1,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s has just dropped off mats",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
			MatsLog(string);
	    } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You are not near the material drop off");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You are not even running mats...");
	return 1;
}

CMD:smugglemats(playerid, params[])
{
    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,gPPos[0],gPPos[1],gPPos[2]))
    {
		if(MatRunning[playerid] != -1)
		   return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are already smuggling mats!");
		if(gSupply >= gMats)
		{
			if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) >= gPrice)
			{
			    new string[128];
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have picked up %d units of metal take them to the warehouse to get your bonus!",gMats);
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				gSupply -= gMats;
				MatRunning[playerid] = gMats;
				SetPlayerMapIcon(playerid,69,-1112.3800,-1620.5386,75.9097,6,0,MAPICON_GLOBAL);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"/smugglemats\r\nAvailable Mats:%d",gSupply);
				UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(GunSLabel, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
				SaveGunDealer();
				new y1,m,d,h,mi,s; getdate(y1,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s has just picked up mats",d,m,y1,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
				MatsLog(string);
				return 1;
			}
			else
			{
				new string[128];
				format(string,sizeof(string),"You don't have the %d needed to do this!",gPrice);
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			    return 1;
			}
		}else SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"The factory is out of stock come back later!");
	}else SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You are not at the right location to do this!");
	return 1;
}

CMD:gotrucking(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("gotrucking");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 3 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 3)
	{
		if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, 2475.3149, -2116.1577, 13.5364))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near to the Truck Depot loading point.");
			return 1;
		}
		if(Trucking[playerid] == 0)
		{
			if(TruckerVeh[playerid] == -1)
			{
			    IsTrucking[playerid] = true;
				StopWorking(playerid);
				ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
				new t = RandomEx(0,4),E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
				TruckerVeh[playerid] = CreateVehicle(499,TSpawns[t][0],TSpawns[t][1],TSpawns[t][2],TSpawns[t][3],-1,-1,-1);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, TruckerVeh[playerid], 0);
				GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				CarInfo[TruckerVeh[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
				CarInfo[TruckerVeh[playerid]][cWcart] = 1;
				CarInfo[TruckerVeh[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[TruckerVeh[playerid]][cLocked] = 0;
				TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]] = 0;
				Trucking[playerid] = 1;
				Gas[TruckerVeh[playerid]] = 100;
				ShowServerDialog(playerid, TRUCKING_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Option","Legal Runs\r\nillegal runs","Okay","Cancel");
				SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"Legal runs don't pay as more but you don't risk being arrested!");
				SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"[LS Trucking Company] Remember this is a company owned vehicle. Don't drive like an idiot");
				strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], " ", 0, strlen(" "), 255);
			}
			else
			{
				ShowServerDialog(playerid, TRUCKING_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Option","Legal Runs\r\nillegal runs","Okay","Cancel");
				SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"Legal runs don't pay as more but you don't risk being arrested!");
				TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]] = 0;
			}
		}
		else return SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"You are already trucking...");
	}
	else return SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"You aren't even a trucker!");
	LogCallback("gotrucking");
	return 1;
}
CMD:goscrap(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("goscrap");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 1)
	{
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,sJPos[0],sJPos[1],sJPos[2]))
		{
			if(ScrapTruck[playerid] == -1)
			{
				StopWorking(playerid);
				ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
				ScrapTruck[playerid] = CreateVehicle(554,2420.3557,-2463.5420,13.3476,316.2388,-1,-1,-1);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, ScrapTruck[playerid], 0);
				new E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
				GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				CarInfo[ScrapTruck[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
				CarInfo[ScrapTruck[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[ScrapTruck[playerid]][cWcart] = 6;
				CarInfo[ScrapTruck[playerid]][cLocked] = 0;
				Gas[ScrapTruck[playerid]] = 100;
			}
			Scrapping[playerid] = 1;
			new scrap = random(sizeof(ScrapSpawns));
			SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,ScrapSpawns[scrap][0],ScrapSpawns[scrap][1],ScrapSpawns[scrap][2], 2.0,38,0);
			ScrapObject[playerid][0] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 952, ScrapSpawns[scrap][0],ScrapSpawns[scrap][1],ScrapSpawns[scrap][2]-0.3, 0.00, 0.0, 250.0);
			ScrapObject[playerid][1] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 952, ScrapSpawns[scrap][0],ScrapSpawns[scrap][1],ScrapSpawns[scrap][2]-0.5, 0.00, 0.00, 90.00, 250.0);
			JobCP[playerid] = 1;
		}
		else return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not at the starting point");
	}
	else SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not a scrapper!");
	LogCallback("goscrap");
	return 1;
}
CMD:loadscrap(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("loadscrap");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 1)
	{
		if(sPWeight[playerid] >= 1)
		{
			if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) == ScrapTruck[playerid])
			{
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
				jobtimer[playerid] = defer StoreScraps(playerid);
				BarType[playerid] = 1; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 5;
				SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], " Loading Scraps");
				jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You are now loading the scrap metal you collected");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("loadscrap");
	return 1;
}
CMD:checkscraps(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("checkscraps");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 1)
	{
		new string[128];
		if(ScrapTruck[playerid] != -1)
		{
			if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) == ScrapTruck[playerid])
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You have %d lbs of scrap in your truck at the moment", sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]] );
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near your truck");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("checkscraps");
	return 1;
}

CMD:join(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("join");
	if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,sJPos[0],sJPos[1],sJPos[2]))
	{
		GettingJob[playerid] = 1;
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"................:Scrapper Job:..............");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"As a scrapper you drive around picking up scrap metal");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"The metal is then processed, materials for guns, carparts, and other goods");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"To join this job type /accept job");
		return 1;
	}
	else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,tJPos[0],tJPos[1],tJPos[2]))
	{
	    GettingJob[playerid] = 3;
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"..................................:Trucker Job:..................................");
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"This job has both legal and illegal options, you can ship products to bussiness's,");
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"or you can ship metal to the mat warehouse. Legal doesn't pay as well however, it");
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"you can be arrested by the police for illegal goods. Watch out for truck thiefs");
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"they can jack your truck and makeoff with the goods!");
		SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"Please type /accept job to become a trucker");
	}
	else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,JobIcons[0][0],JobIcons[0][1],JobIcons[0][2]))
	{
	    GettingJob[playerid] = 4;
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"..................................:Mechanic Job:..................................");
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"You have enough knowledge about cars to fix them for the citizens of Los Santos? Well,");
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"if you do you'll need take calls, repair cars, tow cars, the works. Los Santos has some");
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"pretty terrible drivers, so as a mechanic you'll be working round the clock. Remember, though!");
	    SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"In order to fix cars, you need to purchase parts. parts are $10, and 5 parts fix 100 car HP");
		SCM(playerid,TRUCK_COLOR,"Please type /accept job to become a mechanic");
	}
	else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,JobIcons[1][0],JobIcons[1][1],JobIcons[1][2]))
	{
	    GettingJob[playerid] = 5;
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"..................................:Farmer Job:..................................");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"This job is a legal means of making income. However, its tough, and grueling work.");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"You'll need to clear the land, plant seeds, dust your crops, harvest the crops, and");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"then deliver your products for export. However this job requires you to have a pilot's");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"license as one is required to fly the crop duter.");
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Please type /accept job to become a Farmer");
	}
	else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,JobIcons[2][0],JobIcons[2][1],JobIcons[2][2]))
	{
	    GettingJob[playerid] = 6;
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"..................................:PizzaBoy Job:..................................");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Los Santos' Citizens are hungry and its your job to deliver them pizza. They might just");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"want to eat one of their three meals, or have the munchies. It's your duty as a Pizza Boy");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"to deliver them pizza, so they might feed their appetite.");
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Please type /accept job to become a Pizza Boy");
	}
	else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,JobIcons[3][0],JobIcons[3][1],JobIcons[3][2]))
	{
	    GettingJob[playerid] = 7;
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"................................:Garbage Man Job:................................");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"The Garbage Man job is quite a dirty job. Yes, pun intended. Your job is quite simple.");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Head to the many businesses across Los Santos and collect their trash. Simple enough, right?");
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Please type /accept job to become a Garbage Man");
	}
	else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,JobIcons[4][0],JobIcons[4][1],JobIcons[4][2]))
	{
	    GettingJob[playerid] = 8;
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,".................................:Lawn Mower Job:.................................");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Grass grows, and it's your job to mow it! This is quite a simple task. It's not the");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"highest paying job, but you get to keep Los Santos from looking like a jungle.");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Please type /accept job to become a Lawn Mower");
	}
	else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,JobIcons[5][0],JobIcons[5][1],JobIcons[5][2]))
	{
		GettingJob[playerid] = 9;
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,".................................:Taxi Driver Job:.................................");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Some citizens might not own motor vehicles, or know the city too well. It's your job");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"as a taxi cab driver to take them where they need to go. You should probably know the");
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"city like the back of your hand. If not, learn it before you work as a Taxi Driver.");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Please type /accept job to become a Taxi Driver");
	}
	else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,JobIcons[12][0],JobIcons[12][1],JobIcons[12][2]))
	{
		GettingJob[playerid] = 11;
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,".................................:Lawyer Job:.................................");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Some citizens might not be well behaved and will need your help getting released from jail.");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"You'll be able to free the riff-raff of Los Santos once they've served HALF of their jail");
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"time. You may charge them accordingly for their release. However Minimum fee is $200.");
	    SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Please type /accept job to become a Lawyer");
	}
	LogCallback("join");
	return 1;
}
//----JOBS----//
CMD:startfarming(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("startfarming");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 5 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 5)
		{
			if(Farming[playerid] >= 1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You've already started farming.");
				return 1;
			}
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,JobIcons[1][0],JobIcons[1][1],JobIcons[1][2]))
			{
				StopWorking(playerid);
				ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
				FarmerVeh[playerid] = CreateVehicle(532,-83.7453,-17.7952,4.1149,339.9622,16,0,-1);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, FarmerVeh[playerid], 0);
				new E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
				GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
				CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cWcart] = 7;
				Gas[FarmerVeh[playerid]] = 100;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "_____________ ON THE JOB: FARMING _____________");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You must clear the land before you /plantseed to grow crops.");
				SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, FarmerCP[0][0], FarmerCP[0][1], FarmerCP[0][2], 8.0,19,0);
				Farming[playerid] = 1; FarmSeeds[playerid] = 5;
				return 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You need to /join a farm before you can do this");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("startfarming");
	return 1;
}
CMD:plantseed(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("plantseed");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 5 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 5)
	{
		if(jobcdtimer[playerid] != -1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this right now");


		if(Farming[playerid] == 21) return SCM(playerid,-1,"** You can't plant more then five seeds!");
		switch(Farming[playerid])
		{
			case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not on the job"); }
			case 1 .. 15: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You must clear the land before planting seeds"); }
			case 16 .. 21:
			{
				if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,300.0,-207.1335,-3.1693,3.1094))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Plant the crops near, or on the land you've cleared");
					return 1;
				}
				if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15.0, Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][0],Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][1],Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][2]) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15.0, Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][0],Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][1],Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][2]))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Don't plant your crops so close together! It's not good for them!");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "TIP: Try planting them in a row. You still have to dust the crops!");
					return 1;
				}
				if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15.0, Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][0],Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][1],Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][2]) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15.0, Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][0],Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][1],Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][2]))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Don't plant your crops so close together! It's not good for them!");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "TIP: Try planting them in a row. You still have to dust the crops!");
					return 1;
				}
				Farming[playerid] += 1; FarmSeeds[playerid] -= 1;
				jobtimer[playerid] = defer EndPlanting(playerid);
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
				ApplyAnimation(playerid, "BOMBER","BOM_Plant_Loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);

				SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
				ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "PLANTING THE SEED");
				BarType[playerid] = 2; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10;
				jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You are now planting a seed");
				switch(FarmSeeds[playerid])
				{
					case 0:
					{
						GetPlayerPos(playerid,Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][0],Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][1],Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][2]);
					}
					case 1:
					{
						GetPlayerPos(playerid,Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][0],Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][1],Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][2]);
					}
					case 2:
					{
						GetPlayerPos(playerid,Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][0],Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][1],Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][2]);
					}
					case 3:
					{
						GetPlayerPos(playerid,Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][0],Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][1],Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][2]);
					}
					case 4:
					{
						GetPlayerPos(playerid,Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][0],Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][1],Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][2]);
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("plantseed");
	return 1;
}
CMD:getduster(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("getduster");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 5 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 5)
	{
		if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, JobIcons[8][0], JobIcons[8][1], JobIcons[8][2]))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not near the crop duster point.");
			return 1;
		}
		switch(Farming[playerid])
		{
			case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You are not on the job"); return 1; }
			case 1 .. 19: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You've got a lot of work to do before you dust the crops."); return 1; }
			case 21:
			{
				ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
				FarmerVeh[playerid] = CreateVehicle(512,-108.3112,74.2368,3.1137,71.7681,-1,-1,60);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, FarmerVeh[playerid], 0);
				new E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
				GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
				CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cWcart] = 7;
				Gas[FarmerVeh[playerid]] = 100;
				SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint(playerid, 3, Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][2]+30, Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][2]+30, 8.0);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Dust the crops so that they can grow. Press 2 to release your crop dust");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("getduster");
	return 1;
}
CMD:storeduster(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("storeduster");
	switch(Farming[playerid])
	{
		case 31:
		{
			switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
			{
				case 1: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You must be inside the crop duster in order to store it. You can't continue until it's stored."); return 1;}
				case 2:
				{
					CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cWcart] = 0;
					CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cWcar] = -1;
					DestroyVehicle(FarmerVeh[playerid]); FarmerVeh[playerid] = -1;
					crop[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 855, Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][2], 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 250.0);
					SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos1][2], 2.0,19,0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Crop Duster stored away. Now it's time to harvest your crops.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You'll need a Walton to store them. There are a few near the combines.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Go to the starting point and /getwalton so you can begin to collect your harvest.");
					return 1;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("storeduster");
	return 1;
}
CMD:getwalton(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("getwalton");
	if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 15.0, JobIcons[1][0], JobIcons[1][1], JobIcons[1][2]))
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not at the correct spot for this");

	switch(Farming[playerid])
	{
		case 0 .. 30: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this right now"); }
		case 31:
		{
			if(FarmerVeh[playerid] != -1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this right now");
				return 1;
			}
			FarmerVeh[playerid] = CreateVehicle(478,-80.6955,4.7755,3.1032,247.4039,-1,-1,-1);
			PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, FarmerVeh[playerid], 0);
			new E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
			GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
			CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
			CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cWcart] = 7;
			CarInfo[FarmerVeh[playerid]][cLocked] = 0;
			Gas[FarmerVeh[playerid]] = 100;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("getwalton");
	return 1;
}
CMD:loadharvest(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("loadharvest");
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) == FarmerVeh[playerid])
	{
		if(HasHarvest[playerid] != 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot do this right now");

		switch(Farming[playerid])
		{
			case 31:
			{
				Farming[playerid] += 1;
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
				crop[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 855, Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][2],0.0,0.0,0.0,250.0);
				SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos2][2], 2.0,19,0);
				HasHarvest[playerid] = 0;
				ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
				animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
			}
			case 32:
			{
				Farming[playerid] += 1;
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
				crop[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 855, Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][2],0.0,0.0,0.0,250.0);
				SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos3][2], 2.0,19,0);
				HasHarvest[playerid] = 0;
				ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
				animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
			}
			case 33:
			{
				Farming[playerid] += 1;
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
				crop[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 855, Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][2],0.0,0.0,0.0,250.0);
				SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos4][2], 2.0,19,0);
				HasHarvest[playerid] = 0;
				ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
				animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
			}
			case 34:
			{
				Farming[playerid] += 1;
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
				crop[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 855, Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][2],0.0,0.0,0.0,250.0);
				SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][0], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][1], Farmer[playerid][FPpos5][2], 2.0,19,0);
				HasHarvest[playerid] = 0;
				ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
				animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
			}
			case 35:
			{
				Farming[playerid] += 1;
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Your crops are all harvested, and ready for export. Deliver them to the Truck Depot");
				SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, tPPos[0], tPPos[1], tPPos[2], 2.0,19,0);
				HasHarvest[playerid] = 0;
				ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
				animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("loadharvest");
	return 1;
}
CMD:takebox(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("takebox");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 5 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 5)
	{
		switch(Farming[playerid])
		{
			case 36 .. 40:
			{
				if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
				{
					if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) == FarmerVeh[playerid])
					{
						if(HasHarvest[playerid] == 1)
						{
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already have a box in your hand");
							return 1;
						}
						if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 20.0, tPPos[0], tPPos[1], tPPos[2]))
						{
							ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,1,0,0,1,1,1);
							HasHarvest[playerid] = 1; AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1220);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "Drop off the boxes of your harvest for export");
						}
						else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You're not near the drop-off point"); return 1; }
					}
				}
				else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't take boxes off the truck from inside the truck"); }
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("takebox");
	return 1;
}
CMD:startpizza(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("startpizza");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 6 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 6)
	    {
			if(PizzaBoy[playerid] >= 1)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You're on the job already!");

			if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, JobIcons[7][0], JobIcons[7][1], JobIcons[7][2]))
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You can't start the job from here");

			if(PizzaBike[playerid] == -1)
			{
				StopWorking(playerid);
				ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
				PizzaBike[playerid] = CreateVehicle(448,2120.0005,-1784.1722,12.9851,0.8951,3,6,-1);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, PizzaBike[playerid], 0);
				new E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
				GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				CarInfo[PizzaBike[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
				CarInfo[PizzaBike[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[PizzaBike[playerid]][cWcart] = 5;
				CarInfo[PizzaBike[playerid]][cLocked] = 0;
				Gas[PizzaBike[playerid]] = 100;
			}
			new h = RandomEx(1,750);
			PizzaBoy[playerid] = 1; SetPlayerSkin(playerid, 155);
			SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,HouseInfo[h][hEntrancex],HouseInfo[h][hEntrancey],HouseInfo[h][hEntrancez],1.5,19,0);
			pizzabox[playerid] = CreateDynamicPickup(1582,1,HouseInfo[h][hEntrancex],HouseInfo[h][hEntrancey],HouseInfo[h][hEntrancez],-1,-1,playerid,250.0);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "___________ ON THE JOB: PIZZA BOY ___________");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Deliver Pizza to the houses across Los Santos");
		}
		else
		{
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You're not the Delivery Boy!");
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("startpizza");
	return 1;
}
CMD:getpizza(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("getpizza");
	switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
	{
		case 1:
		{
			switch(PizzaBoy[playerid])
			{
				case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You are not a Pizza Boy, near a Pizza Boy bike, or on the job"); }
				case 1 .. 15:
				{
					if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) == PizzaBike[playerid])
					{
						HasPizza[playerid] = 1; AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1582);
						ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,1,0,0,1,1,1);
					}
					else
					{
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You are not near your Pizza Boy bike!"); return 1;
					}
					return 1;
				}
			}
		}
		case 2:
		{
			switch(PizzaBoy[playerid])
			{
				case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You are not a Pizza Boy, near a Pizza Boy bike, or on the job"); return 1; }
				case 1 .. 15: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_RED, "You can't take the pizza's out while driving"); return 1; }
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("getpizza");
	return 1;
}
CMD:startgarbage(playerid,params[])
{
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 7 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 7)
    {
		if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,20.0,JobIcons[3][0],JobIcons[3][1],JobIcons[3][2])) return SendClientMessage (playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Go to the garbage depot to start the job");
		if(GarbageMan[playerid] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You're on the job already!");
		if(GarbageTruck[playerid] != -1) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"You already have a garbage truck.");
		StopWorking(playerid);
		ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
		GarbageTruck[playerid] = CreateVehicle(408,2198.8157,-1976.8638,14.1046,267.6020,-1,-1,-1);
		PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, GarbageTruck[playerid], 0);
		new E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
		GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		CarInfo[GarbageTruck[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
		CarInfo[GarbageTruck[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
		CarInfo[GarbageTruck[playerid]][cWcart] = 3;
		CarInfo[GarbageTruck[playerid]][cLocked] = 0;
		Gas[GarbageTruck[playerid]] = 100;
		start:
		new b = RandomEx(1,53);
		if(BizzInfo[b][bSetted] == 0)
		{
		    goto start;
		}
		GarbageMan[playerid] = 1;
		workingID[playerid] = JOB_STARTED_GARBAGE;
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		printf("%d",b);
		workCP[playerid] = CreateDynamicCP(BizzInfo[b][bEntranceX],BizzInfo[b][bEntranceY],BizzInfo[b][bEntranceZ],1.5,-1,-1,playerid,999999999.0);
	}
	else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"You're not a garbage man...");
	return 1;
}

stock CreateJobProgressBar(playerid,time,title[],jobid)
{
	JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = time;
	PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid],title);
	SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
	ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
	PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
	jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdateEx",1000,true,"iii",playerid,jobid,time);
	return 1;
}

forward JobBarUpdateEx(playerid,jobid,time);
public  JobBarUpdateEx(playerid,jobid,time)
{
	new testing;
	testing = 100 / time;
	new Float:amt;
	HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
	amt = GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]);
    SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],amt += testing);
	ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
    if(GetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid]) <= 100.0)
    {
		KillTimer(jobcdtimer[playerid]);
		JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		HidePlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
		jobcdtimer[playerid] = -1;
		switch(workingID[playerid])
		{
		    case JOB_FINISH_GARBAGE:
		    {
				OnGarbageRunFinish(playerid);
  		    }
		}
    }
}

stock OnGarbageRunFinish(playerid)
{
	GarbageMan[playerid] = 0;
	JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 3000;
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "After another hard day of work, your shift has ended.");
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "* $3000 was added to your paycheck. LS Sanitation thanks you for your work!");
	return 1;
}
public OnPlayerEnterDynamicCP(playerid, checkpointid)
{
	if(checkpointid == workCP[playerid])
	{
	    switch(workingID[playerid])
	    {
			case JOB_STARTED_GARBAGE:
	        {
				if(hasTrash[playerid]) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"You already have a trash bag in your hand");
				hasTrash[playerid] = true;
				AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid,1264);
				SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"{00FF00}Congrats{FFFFFF} you have picked up the trash go to your truck and press KEY_FIRE to load it");
				DestroyDynamicCP(workCP[playerid]);
	        }
	        case JOB_FINISH_GARBAGE:
	        {
	            if(GarbageMan[playerid] >= 6)
	            {
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,0);
					CreateJobProgressBar(playerid,5,"Unloading Garbage",JOB_FINISH_GARBAGE);
	                DestroyDynamicCP(workCP[playerid]);
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}
	return 1;
}



CMD:startmowing(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("startmowing");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 8 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 8)
	    {
			if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,20.0,JobIcons[4][0],JobIcons[4][1],JobIcons[4][2]))
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Head to the park to start mowing");
				return 1;
			}
			if(LawnMower[playerid] >= 1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You're on the job already!");
				return 1;
			}
			if(Mower[playerid] == -1)
			{
				StopWorking(playerid);
				ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
				Mower[playerid] = CreateVehicle(572,2045.7885,-1151.6686,23.2827,98.2013,-1,-1,-1);
				PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, Mower[playerid], 0);
				new E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
				GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
				CarInfo[Mower[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
				CarInfo[Mower[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
				CarInfo[Mower[playerid]][cWcart] = 4;
				CarInfo[Mower[playerid]][cLocked] = 0;
				Gas[Mower[playerid]] = 100;
			}
			new mow = RandomEx(0,15);
			LawnMower[playerid] = 1; TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,MowerPoints[mow][0],MowerPoints[mow][1],MowerPoints[mow][2]+1.2,5.0,19,0);
			grassspot[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 874,MowerPoints[mow][0],MowerPoints[mow][1],MowerPoints[mow][2],0.0,0.0,0.0,100.0);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "________________ ON THE JOB: LAWN MOWER ________________");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Time to mow the grass! Mow the spots that really needs it.");
		}
		else
		{
	        SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You're not a lawn mower!");
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("startmowing");
	return 1;
}
CMD:stopjob(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("stopjob");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 0 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 0)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have any jobs to stop");

	else
	{
		StopWorking(playerid);
	}
	LogCallback("stopjob");
    return 1;
}
CMD:taxicab(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("taxicab");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 9 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 9)
	{
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,10.0,JobIcons[5][0],JobIcons[5][1],JobIcons[5][2]))
		{
			if(TaxiCab[playerid] != -1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already have a cab out");
				return 1;
			}
			StopWorking(playerid);
			ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
			TaxiCab[playerid] = CreateVehicle(420,1743.0822,-1858.8718,13.1941,268.6658,-1,-1,-1);
			PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, TaxiCab[playerid], 0);
			new E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
			GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			CarInfo[TaxiCab[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
			CarInfo[TaxiCab[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
			CarInfo[TaxiCab[playerid]][cWcart] = 2;
			CarInfo[TaxiCab[playerid]][cLocked] = 0;
			Gas[TaxiCab[playerid]] = 100;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "[Los Santos Taxi Co] Remember this is a company owned vehicle. Don't drive like an idiot");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("taxicab");
	return 1;
}
CMD:fare(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("fare");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new farecost, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", farecost)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "USAGE: /fare [1-15]");
		if(farecost < 1 || farecost > 25) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Fare must be no less than $1, but no more than $25");
		if(TaxiFare[playerid] >= 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Whoa there buddy, you're already on the job!");
			return 1;
		}
		if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) != TaxiCab[playerid])
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to be in a taxi. /taxicab at the join spot");
			return 1;
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 9 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 9)
		{
			TaxiFare[playerid] = farecost; TaxiDuty[playerid] = 1; SetPlayerColor(playerid, COLOR_CABBIE);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "[LS TAXI AD] Driver %s is now on duty: FARE: $%d + Distance [/CALL 444]", GPN(playerid), farecost);
			SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_YELLOW, string);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are NOT a Taxi Driver. You must /join at Unity Station");
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("fare");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buyparts(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("buyparts");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 4 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 4)
	{
		new parts, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", parts)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE: /buyparts [ammount (1-10)]");
		if(parts < 0 || parts > 10) return SCM(playerid, -1, "You can't buy that ammount");
		if(tCarParts < parts) return SCM(playerid, -1, "There aren't enough parts. A trucker needs to deliver more!");
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10.0, 2076.5798,-2026.5226,13.5469))
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts] < 10)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts]+parts > 10)
				{
					new remain = 10 - PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts]; PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts] += remain;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have only purchased another %d parts and now have a total of 10 parts", remain);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -10*remain);
				}
				else
				{
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -10*parts);
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts] += parts;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have purchased %d car parts", parts);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				}
				tCarParts -= parts;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "[/join] \nMechanic \n[/towtruck]\n[/buyparts]\n Available Parts:%d",tCarParts);
				UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(mechlabel,0x00FF00AA, string);
				SaveTrucker();
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can only carry up to 10 parts at a time");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buyparts");
	return 1;
}
CMD:mechduty(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("mechduty");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 4 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 4)
	{
		switch(MechDuty[playerid])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				new string[128];
				MechDuty[playerid] = 1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "[LS Mechanic Co.] Mechanic %s is now on the job. If you need car repairs /Call 555!!", GPN(playerid));
				SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
			}
			case 1:
			{
				MechDuty[playerid] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You are no longer on mechanic duty, and will not recieve anymore calls");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("mechduty");
	return 1;
}
CMD:towtruck(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("towtruck");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 4 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 4)
	{
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 10.0, 2076.5798,-2026.5226,13.5469))
		{
			if(MechTruck[playerid] != -1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already have a tow truck out");
				return 1;
			}
			StopWorking(playerid);
			ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
			MechTruck[playerid] = CreateVehicle(525,2079.7703,-2026.2462,13.4262,270.0,-1,-1,-1);
			PutPlayerInVehicle(playerid, MechTruck[playerid], 0);
			new E,L,A,D,H,T,O;
			GetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			SetVehicleParamsEx(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),1,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			CarInfo[MechTruck[playerid]][cWcar] = playerid;
			CarInfo[MechTruck[playerid]][cUid] = -1;
			CarInfo[MechTruck[playerid]][cWcart] = 8;
			CarInfo[MechTruck[playerid]][cLocked] = 0;
			Gas[MechTruck[playerid]] = 100;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "[Los Santos Mechanics] Remember this is a company owned vehicle. Don't drive like an idiot");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("towtruck");
	return 1;
}
CMD:returnveh(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("returnveh");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
	}
	LogCallback("returnveh");
	return 1;
}
CMD:takeparts(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("takeparts");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 4 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 4)
	{
		if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) == MechTruck[playerid])
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts] >= 1)
			{
				HasParts[playerid] = 1;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts] -= 1;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You've taken parts out of the truck for your repair");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need at least 1 part to start the repair");
			}
		}
		else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, JobIcons[13][0],JobIcons[13][1],JobIcons[13][2]))
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts] >= 1)
			{
				HasParts[playerid] = 1;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts] -= 1;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You've taken parts out of the truck for your repair");
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need at least 1 part to start the repair");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near your tow truck");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("takeparts");
	return 1;
}
CMD:refuelcar(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("refuelcar");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 4 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 4)
	{
		new
			id,
			rc,
			Float:pPos[3],
			string[128]
		;
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", id, rc)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /refuelcar [id][cost]");
		if(rc < 1 || rc > 100) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "price must be no less than $1, but less than $100");

		if(GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2 || GetPlayerState(playerid) == PLAYER_STATE_PASSENGER)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "How can you reapair a car from the inside?! ARE YOU NUTS?!");

		if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(id))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "This person is not in a vehicle");

		GetPlayerPos(playerid, pPos[0], pPos[1], pPos[2]);
		if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(id, 10, pPos[0], pPos[1], pPos[2]))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "This person is not near you");

		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has offered to refill your fuel for $%d, use /accept refill to accept", GPN(playerid), rc);
		SCM(id, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "You have offered to refill %s's vehicle for $%d", GPN(id), rc);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		FuelPrice[id] = rc;
		FuelMech[id] = playerid;
	}
	LogCallback("refuelcar");
	return 1;
}
CMD:repair(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("repair");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 4 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 4)
	{
		new
			id,
			rc,
			string[128],
			Float:hp
		;
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", id, rc)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /repair [id][cost]");
		if(rc < 250 || rc > 1500) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "price must be more than $250, but less than $1500");

		if(GetPlayerState(playerid) == 2 || GetPlayerState(playerid) == PLAYER_STATE_PASSENGER)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "How can you reapair a car from the inside?! ARE YOU NUTS?!");

		if(jobcdtimer[playerid] != -1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this right now");

		switch(MechDuty[playerid])
		{
			case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not on the job at the moment [use /mechduty to go on the job]"); }
			case 1:
			{
				if(IsPlayerConnected(id))
				{
					if(id != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
					{
						if(ProxDetectorS(5.0, playerid, id) && IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(id))
						{
							switch(HasParts[playerid])
							{
								case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Don't forget to /takeparts from your tow truck before beginning the repair!!"); }
								case 1:
								{
									GetVehicleHealth(GetPlayerVehicleID(id), hp);
									switch(floatround(hp,floatround_round))
									{
										case 0 .. 999:
										{
											RepairID[playerid] = id; MechanicID[id] = playerid; MechPrice[playerid] = rc;
											format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has offered you a repair for $%d. Use /accept repair to begin repairs", GPN(playerid), rc);
											SCM(id, COLOR_WHITE, string);
											SCM(id, COLOR_WHITE, "Repair times are based on the amount of damage your vehicle has taken");

											format(string, sizeof(string), "You have offered to repair %s for the fee of $%d", GPN(id), rc);
											SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
											SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Repair times are based on the amount of damage your vehicle has taken");
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "Player is not near you or in a vehicle"); }
					}
				}
				else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "Player is not connected"); }
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("repair");
	return 1;
}
CMD:keeprepairing(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("keeprepairing");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 4 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 4)
	{
		if(jobcdtimer[playerid] != -1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this right now");

		if(HasParts[playerid] == 0)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need parts to keep repairing. Go /takeparts from your tow truck");

		new Float:health;
		if(IsPlayerConnected(RepairID[playerid]))
		{
			if(RepairID[playerid] != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			{
				if(ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, RepairID[playerid]) && IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(RepairID[playerid]))
				{
					if(GetPlayerVehicleID(RepairID[playerid]) == RepairVeh[playerid])
					{
						GetVehicleHealth(GetPlayerVehicleID(RepairID[playerid]),health);
						switch(floatround(health,floatround_round))
						{
							case 0 .. 600:   { RepairStage[playerid] = 5; RepairTimer[RepairID[playerid]] = defer EndMechRepair(RepairID[playerid]); }
							case 601 .. 700: { RepairStage[playerid] = 4; RepairTimer[RepairID[playerid]] = defer EndMechRepair(RepairID[playerid]); }
							case 701 .. 800: { RepairStage[playerid] = 3; RepairTimer[RepairID[playerid]] = defer EndMechRepair(RepairID[playerid]); }
							case 801 .. 900: { RepairStage[playerid] = 2; RepairTimer[RepairID[playerid]] = defer EndMechRepair(RepairID[playerid]); }
							case 901 .. 999: { RepairStage[playerid] = 1; RepairTimer[RepairID[playerid]] = defer EndMechRepair(RepairID[playerid]); }
						}
						TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
						TogglePlayerControllable(RepairID[playerid], 0);
						ApplyAnimation(playerid, "BOMBER","BOM_Plant_Loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_PURPLE, "* You are now continuing repairs on the vehicle.");
						SCM(RepairID[playerid], COLOR_PURPLE, "* The mechanic has has resumed repairs on your vehicle.");

						BarType[RepairID[playerid]] = 3; JobCountdownSeconds[RepairID[playerid]] = 25;
						JobBar[RepairID[playerid]] = CreatePlayerProgressBar(playerid,501.00, 157.00, 102.50, 3.50, COLOR_WHITE, 100.0);
						SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[RepairID[playerid]],0.0);
						ShowPlayerProgressBar(RepairID[playerid], JobBar[RepairID[playerid]]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(RepairID[playerid], JobCDTextTD[RepairID[playerid]]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(RepairID[playerid], JobCDBoxTD[RepairID[playerid]]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(RepairID[playerid], JobCDTextTD[RepairID[playerid]], "VEHICLE REPAIRS");
						jobcdtimer[RepairID[playerid]] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", RepairID[playerid]);
						BarType[playerid] = 3; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 25;
						SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
						ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "VEHICLE REPAIRS");
						jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("keeprepairing");
	return 1;
}
CMD:tow(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("tow");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 4 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 4)
		{
	        if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	        {
            	new m = GetVehicleModel(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
             	switch(m)
             	{
			    	case 525:
		     	   	{
		     	   	    if(GetPlayerState(playerid)==2)
		     	   	    {
							new Float:pX,Float:pY,Float:pZ;
							GetPlayerPos(playerid,pX,pY,pZ);
							new Float:vX,Float:vY,Float:vZ;
							new Found=0;
							new vid=0;
							while((vid<MAX_VEHICLES)&&(!Found))
							{
			   					vid++;
			   					GetVehiclePos(vid,vX,vY,vZ);
			   					if ((floatabs(pX-vX)<7.0)&&(floatabs(pY-vY)<7.0)&&(floatabs(pZ-vZ)<7.0)&&(vid!=GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))
								{
			   				    	Found=1;
			   				    	if(IsTrailerAttachedToVehicle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)))
			           				{
			   				        	DetachTrailerFromVehicle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
						           	}
						           	else
						           	{
			    						AttachTrailerToVehicle(vid,GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
									}
			 					}
			     			}
							if(!Found)
				 			{
			   					SCM(playerid,0xFFFF00AA,"There is no car in range.");
			   				}
						}
						else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You need to be the driver!"); return 1;}
					}
					default : { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You need to be in a Tow truck to use this!"); }
				}
			}
			else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You need to be in a vehicle to do this!"); return 1; }
		}
		else { SCM(playerid,COLOR_GRAD2,"You need to be a Mechanic to use this!"); return 1; }
	}
	LogCallback("tow");
	return 1;
}
CMD:endrepair(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("endrepair");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(MechanicID[playerid] != -1)
		{
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]]/ RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]]);
			PlayerInfo[MechanicID[playerid]][pPayCheck] += MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]] / RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]];
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You ended the repair before it was finished. You were charged accordingly");
			SCM(MechanicID[playerid], COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "The customer has ended the repair and you were paid accordingly");
			RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]] = 6;
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			EndMechRepair(playerid);
		}
		if(RepairID[playerid] != -1)
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += MechPrice[playerid] / RepairStage[playerid];
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(RepairID[playerid], -MechPrice[playerid] / RepairStage[playerid]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You ended the repair before it was finished. You were paid accordingly");
			SCM(MechanicID[playerid], COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "The Mechanic has ended the repair, and you were charged accordingly");
			RepairStage[playerid] = 6; JobCountdownSeconds[RepairID[playerid]] = 0;
			EndMechRepair(RepairID[playerid]);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("endrepair");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buyseeds(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("buyseeds");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 10 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 10)
	{
		new seed, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "d", seed)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE: /buyseeds [ammount(1-2)]");
		if(seed < 0 || seed > 2) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot purchase that many seeds (1-2).");
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, dPPos[0],dPPos[1],dPPos[2]))
		{
			if(GetPlayerCash(playerid) < dSeedPrice)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You do not have enough money for this");

			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7] == 2)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't carry more than 2 seeds at a time");

			if(dPSupply < seed)
				return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "There aren't enough seeds to buy that many");

			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7]+seed > 2)
			{
				new
					remain = 2 - PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7],
					price = dSeedPrice*remain
				;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7] += remain;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You have only purchased %d seed(s) and now have a total of 2 seeds", remain);
				SCM(playerid, -1, string);
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price);
			}
			else
			{
				new price = dSeedPrice*seed;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7] += seed;
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -price);
				SCM(playerid, -1, "You've picked up some marijuana seeds. You'll need to plant these in order");
				SCM(playerid, -1, "for them to grow. They will need to be cared for before you can pick them.");
			}
			dPSupply -= seed;
			format(string, sizeof(string), "Drug Dealer \n[/buyseeds]\nSeeds Available: %d",dPSupply);
			UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(SeedsLabel, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
			SaveDrugDealer();
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You're not near the pick up point");
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not a drug dealer");
	}
	LogCallback("buyseeds");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buygrowspot(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("buygrowspot");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 10 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 10)
	{
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][6])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				new
					sql[128],
					Float:sPOS[3]
				;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][6] = 1;
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -50);
				GetPlayerPos(playerid, sPOS[0], sPOS[1], sPOS[2]);
				WeedFarm[playerid][0] = sPOS[0]; WeedFarm[playerid][1] = sPOS[1]; WeedFarm[playerid][2] = sPOS[2];
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Grow spot purchased for $50, you may grow weed in a small radius around this point!");
				format(sql, sizeof(sql), "INSERT INTO `samp_drugs` SET `PlayerID`='%d', `sPOSX`='%f', `sPOSY`='%f', `sPOSZ`='%f'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID], sPOS[0], sPOS[1], sPOS[2]);
				mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
			}
			case 1: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You already own a grow spot for growing weed"); }
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buygrowspot");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ditchgrowspot(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("ditchgrowspot");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 10 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 10)
	{
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][6])
		{
			case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have a grow spot to ditch"); }
			case 1:
			{
				new sql[128];
				PlantFate[playerid] = 3;
				PlantDestroy(playerid);
				WeedFarm[playerid][0] = 0.0;
				WeedFarm[playerid][0] = 0.0;
				WeedFarm[playerid][0] = 100.0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][6] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You've ditched your current grow spot. Don't expect a refund.");
				format(sql, sizeof(sql), "DELETE FROM `samp_drugs` WHERE PlayerID='%d'", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBID]);
				mysql_query(sql, THREAD_UPDATE, playerid);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("ditchgrowspot");
	return 1;
}

	return 1;

CMD:plantweed(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("plantweed");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 10 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 10)
	{
		if(jobcdtimer[playerid] != -1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this right now");

		switch(GrowStep[playerid])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][6])
				{
					case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need to buy a planting spot. use /buygrowspot to buy a spot to grow weed"); }
					case 1:
					{
						if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 50.0, WeedFarm[playerid][0], WeedFarm[playerid][1], WeedFarm[playerid][2]))
							return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near your plot of land to grow");

						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7] == 0)
							return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have any seeds. Buy some before trying to grow.");

						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][7] == 2)
							return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You cannot plant more than two plants at a time. /waterplants to continue");

						if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, PlantSpots[playerid][0][0], PlantSpots[playerid][0][1], PlantSpots[playerid][0][2]))
							return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Don't plant so close together. Let the plants breathe a bit.");

						TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
						jobtimer[playerid] = defer PlantingWeed(playerid);
						BarType[playerid] = 2; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10;
						ApplyAnimation(playerid, "BOMBER","BOM_Plant_Loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);

						SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
						PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], " Planting Marijuana");
						jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Remember, you must /waterplants before they can grow.");
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Once you /waterplants, you won't be able to plant anymore");
					}
				}
			}
			case 1 .. 4: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You're already committed to your current plants. Tend to them first"); }
		}
	}
	LogCallback("plantweed");
	return 1;
}
CMD:pickweed(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("pickweed");
	if(jobcdtimer[playerid] != -1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this right now");

	if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, PlantSpots[playerid][0][0], PlantSpots[playerid][0][1], PlantSpots[playerid][0][2]))
	{
		switch(GrowStep[playerid])
		{
			case 2 .. 4:
			{
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
				jobtimer[playerid] = defer PickingBuds(playerid);
				BarType[playerid] = 2; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid, "BOMBER","BOM_Plant_Loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
				SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "PICKING MARIJUANA");
				jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
				SeedToPlant[playerid][0] = 0;
				PlantSpots[playerid][0][0] = 0.0;
				PlantSpots[playerid][0][1] = 0.0;
				PlantSpots[playerid][0][2] = 100.0;
				stop WaterTimer[playerid];
			}
			default: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "It's not the time to pick plants."); }
		}
	}
	else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, PlantSpots[playerid][1][0], PlantSpots[playerid][1][1], PlantSpots[playerid][1][2]))
	{
		switch(GrowStep[playerid])
		{
			case 2 .. 4:
			{
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
				jobtimer[playerid] = defer PickingBuds(playerid);
				BarType[playerid] = 2; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 10;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid, "BOMBER","BOM_Plant_Loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
				SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "PICKING MARIJUANA");
				jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
				SeedToPlant[playerid][1] = 0;
				PlantSpots[playerid][1][0] = 0.0;
				PlantSpots[playerid][1][1] = 0.0;
				PlantSpots[playerid][1][2] = 100.0;
				stop WaterTimer[playerid];
			}
			default: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "It's not the time to pick plants."); }
		}
	}
	LogCallback("pickweed");
	return 1;
}
CMD:waterplants(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("waterplants");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 10 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 10)
	{
		if(PizzaBoy[playerid] >= 1 || GarbageMan[playerid] >= 1 || LawnMower[playerid] >= 1 || MatRunning[playerid] >= 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this while you're on a job");

		if(Trucking[playerid] >= 1 || JobCP[playerid] >= 1 || Farming[playerid] >= 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't do this while you're on a job");

		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 30.0, PlantSpots[playerid][0][0], PlantSpots[playerid][0][1], PlantSpots[playerid][0][2]))
		{
			WaterWeed(playerid);
		}
		else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 30.0, PlantSpots[playerid][1][0], PlantSpots[playerid][1][1], PlantSpots[playerid][1][2]))
		{
			WaterWeed(playerid);
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near any of your plants");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("waterplants");
	return 1;
}
CMD:smokeweed(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("smokeweed");
	if(Stoned[playerid] == 1 || OnCoke[playerid] == 1 || OnCrack[playerid] == 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You're already high.");

	if(OverDose[playerid] >= 4)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't smoke weed while you're overdosing");

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3] >= 1)
	{
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5])
		{
			case 0: return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have any papers or blunt warps. Buy some at any 24/7");
			case 1:
			{
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have used your last paper. Buy some more at a 24/7");
			}
			case 4 .. 5: { PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5] -= 1; }
			case 6:
			{
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have used your blunt wrap. Buy some more at a 24/7");
			}
			case 7 .. 10: { PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5] -= 1; }
		}
		switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
		{
			case 1:
			{
				SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, SPECIAL_ACTION_SMOKE_CIGGY);
				SCM(playerid, -1, "You roll up a fat one and start smoking. Use LMB[Left Mouse Button] to smoke.");
			}
			case 2:
			{
				SCM(playerid, -1, "You roll up a fat one and start smoking.");
			}
		}
		DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer GetsStoned(playerid);
		Stoned[playerid] = 1;
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have any weed. Find a drug dealer");
	}
	LogCallback("smokeweed");
	return 1;
}

CMD:snortcoke(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("snortcoke");
	if(Stoned[playerid] == 1 || OnCrack[playerid] == 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You're already high.");

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] >= 1)
	{
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][3])
		{
			case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need a small pocket mirror to snort cocaine off of."); return 1; }
			case 1:
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][2] == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need razor blades to cut the coke into lines. Buy one at a 24/7");
					return 1;
				}
				else
				{
					switch(OverDose[playerid])
					{
						case 0:
						{
							OnCoke[playerid] = 1;
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddiction] += 2;
							TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
							DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer CocaineHigh[10000](playerid);
							ApplyAnimation(playerid, "OTB", "betslp_loop",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] -= 1; OverDose[playerid] += 1;
							SCM(playerid, -1, "You take out your mirror, razor blade, and cocaine. You cut a few lines and begin to snort");
							if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] >= 1)
							{
								PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] = 0;
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have satisfied your craving for drugs.");
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "However, you are still addicted to drug.");
							}
						}
						case 1 .. 999:
						{
							SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddiction] += 2;
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] -= 1; OverDose[playerid] += 1;
							ApplyAnimation(playerid, "OTB", "betslp_loop", 4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
							SCM(playerid, -1, "You take out your mirror, razor blade, and cocaine and snort more");
							if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] >= 1)
							{
								PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] = 0;
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have satisfied your craving for drugs.");
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "However, you are still addicted to drug.");
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("snortcoke");
	return 1;
}

CMD:docrack(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("docrack");
	if(Stoned[playerid] == 1 || OnCoke[playerid] == 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You're already high.");

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5] >= 1)
	{
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][8])
		{
			case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You need a small piece of tin foil to make a crack pipe. Buy some from a 24/7."); }
			default:
			{
				switch(OverDose[playerid])
				{
					case 0:
					{
						OnCrack[playerid] = 1;
						TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][8] -= 1;
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddiction] += 4;
						DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer CrackEffects[5000](playerid);
						ApplyAnimation(playerid, "GANGS", "smkcig_prtl_F",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5] -= 1; OverDose[playerid] += 1;
						SCM(playerid, -1, "You take out some crack and a small tin foil pipe and begin smoking it.");
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] >= 1)
						{
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] = 0;
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have satisfied your craving for drugs.");
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "However, you are still addicted to drug.");
						}
					}
					case 1 .. 999:
					{
						SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddiction] += 4;
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5] -= 1; OverDose[playerid] += 1;
						ApplyAnimation(playerid, "GANGS", "smkcig_prtl_F",4.0,1,0,0,1,0);
						SCM(playerid, -1, "You continue smoking crack out of your tin foil pipe.");
						if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] >= 1)
						{
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] = 0;
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have satisfied your craving for drugs.");
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "However, you are still addicted to drug.");
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("docrack");
	return 1;
}
CMD:selldrugs(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("selldrugs");
	new id, drug[12], amm, price, string[128], Float:pos[3];
	if(sscanf(params, "us[12]dd", id, drug, amm, price)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE: /selldrugs [id][drugname][ammount][price] Drug Names: weed, coke, crack");
	if(amm < 1) return SCM(playerid, -1, "ammount cannot be less than 1");
	if(price < 0 || price > 1000) return SCM(playerid, -1, "Price cannot be less than 0 or more than 1000");
	if(GetPlayerCash(id) < price) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "This player does not have enough money");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(id))
	{
		if(id != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
			GetPlayerPos(id, pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]);
			if(strcmp(drug,"weed",true) == 0)
			{
				if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near that person");
					return 1;
				}
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3] >= amm)
				{
					DrugOffer[id] = playerid; DrugSale[id] = amm; DrugPrice[id] = price;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has offered to sell you %d grams of weed for $%d. /accept weed to buy them", GPN(playerid), amm, price);
					SCM(id, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have offered to sell %s %d grams of weed for $%d.", GPN(id), amm, price);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
				}
				else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much weed on you"); }
			}
			else if(strcmp(drug,"coke",true) == 0)
			{
				if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near that person");
					return 1;
				}
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4] >= amm)
				{
					DrugOffer[id] = playerid; DrugSale[id] = amm; DrugPrice[id] = price;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has offered to sell you %d grams of coke for $%d. /accept cocaine to buy them", GPN(playerid), amm, price);
					SCM(id, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have offered to sell %s %d grams of coke for $%d.", GPN(id), amm, price);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
				}
				else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much coke on you"); }
			}
			else if(strcmp(drug,"crack",true) == 0)
			{
				if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]))
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not near that person");
					return 1;
				}
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5] >= amm)
				{
					DrugOffer[id] = playerid; DrugSale[id] = amm; DrugPrice[id] = price;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has offered to sell you %d grams of crack for $%d. /accept crack to buy them", GPN(playerid), amm, price);
					SCM(id, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "You have offered to sell %s %d grams of crack for $%d.", GPN(id), amm, price);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
				}
				else { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have that much crack on you"); }
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("selldrugs");
	return 1;
}
CMD:quitjob(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("quitjob");
	new id;
	if(JobCP[playerid] >= 1 || Scrapping[playerid] >= 1 || MatRunning[playerid] >= 1 || MechDuty[playerid] >= 1 || TaxiDuty[playerid] >= 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must /stopjob before you quit");

	if(Trucking[playerid] >= 1 || Farming[playerid] >= 1 || PizzaBoy[playerid] >= 1 || GarbageMan[playerid] >= 1 || LawnMower[playerid] >= 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You must /stopjob before you quit");

	if(sscanf(params,"d",id))return SCM(playerid, -1,"USAGE:/quitjob [1 or 2]");
	switch(id)
	{
		case 1:
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] = 0;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "** You have quit your first job");
		}
		case 2:
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] = 0;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "** You have quit your second job");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("quitjob");
	return 1;
}

//----JOBS----//
CMD:hvwint(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("quitjob");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] > 2 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
  		{
			for(new i = 0; i < MAX_HOUSES; i++)
			{
				if (IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,1,HouseInfo[i][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[i][hEntrancez]))
				{
					HouseInfo[i][hExVW] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
					HouseInfo[i][hExINT] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "House Exit VW and INT set");
					SaveHouse(i, 26);
				}
			}
		}
  		else
  		{
   			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** You are not authorized to use that command!");
   			return 1;
  		}
	}
	LogCallback("quitjob");
	return 1;
}
CMD:hkey(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("hkey");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new giveplayerid, housekey, hstring[128],y,m,d,h,mi,s;
		if(sscanf(params, "ud", giveplayerid, housekey)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /hkey [playerid/PartOfName] [HouseKey]");
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
