			{
				PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPhousekey] = housekey;
				format(hstring, sizeof(hstring), "Your House Key Has Been Set To %d", housekey); SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_YELLOW, hstring);
				format(hstring, sizeof(hstring), "[HOUSEKEY] %s Set House Key %d For %s", GPN(playerid), housekey, GPN(giveplayerid)); SendAdminMessage(COLOR_LIGHTRED, hstring);
				format(hstring, sizeof(hstring), "[HOUSEKEY] %s Set House Key %d For %s", GPN(playerid), housekey, GPN(giveplayerid)); HouseLog(hstring);
				getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(hstring,sizeof(hstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d][HOUSEKEY] %s Set House Key %d For %s",y,m,d,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),housekey,GPN(giveplayerid));
				HouseLog(hstring);
				return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("hkey");
	return 1;
}
CMD:listnoobs(playerid, params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMod] == 1)
	{
	    foreach(Player, i)
	    {
	        if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
	        {
	            if(PlayerInfo[i][pLevel] <= 1)
	            {
					new string[128], time = PlayerInfo[i][pConnectSeconds];
					format(string, sizeof(string),"Name: %s (%d) Minutes Connected: %d", GPN(i), (time / 60));
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You cannot use this command!");
	return 1;
}
CMD:jailed(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("jailed");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "__________ JAILED LIST __________");
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[i][pJailed] >=1)
				{
					new string[128];
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Name: %s (%d) --- Time Left: %d", GPN(i), i, PlayerInfo[i][pJailTime][0]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("jailed");
	return 1;
}
CMD:afkers(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("afkers");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "__________ CURRENT AFK LIST __________");
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(AFKTimer[i] != 0)
				{
					new string[128];
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Name: %s (%d) -- Time AFK: %d", GPN(i), i, AFKTimer[i]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("afkers");
	return 1;
}
CMD:tabbed(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("tabbed");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "__________ CURRENT ALT-TABBED LIST __________");
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
			{
				if(ALTTAB[i] >= 5)
				{
					new string[128];
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Name: %s (%d) -- Time Tabbed: %d", GPN(i), i, ALTTAB[i]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("tabbed");
	return 1;
}
CMD:slap(playerid, params[])//510
{
	LogCallback("slap");
    if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
    {
		new playa, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "u", playa)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /slap [playerid/PartOfName]");
 		new Float:slx, Float:sly, Float:slz;
		if (PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 1  || IsPlayerAdmin(playerid) || ModDuty[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		    {
		        if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		        {
		            new targetlevel = PlayerInfo[playa][pAdmin];
					new playerlevel = PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin];
					if(targetlevel > playerlevel) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You can not ban People that is higher Than You!");
                    if(playa != playerid && Untouchable[playa]) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You Can't Do this on This player!");
					GetPlayerPos(playa, slx, sly, slz);
					SafeSetPlayerPos(playa, slx, sly, slz+8);
					//PlayerPlaySound(playa, /*1130*/1190, slx, sly, slz+8);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has Slapped %s (%d).",GPN(playerid), GPN(playa), playa);
					ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "** You have Successfuly Slapped %s (%d)", GPN(playa), playa);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "** you are not authorized to use that command!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("slap");
	return 1;
}

CMD:checkmytruck(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("checkmytruck");
	if(GetClosestVehicle(playerid) == TruckerVeh[playerid])
	{
		new string[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has opened the truck and is looking at the contents", GPN(playerid));
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "There are %d boxes of %s in this truck", TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]], tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]]);
		SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, string);
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "There is no truck near you to search");
	}
	LogCallback("checkmytruck");
	return 1;
}

CMD:inv(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("inv");
	new inv[32],string[32];
	if(sscanf(params, "s[32]",inv))
	{
		SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/inv [items]");
		SCM(playerid, -1, "Items:Drugs, Supplies, Snacks");
		return 1;
	}
	if(strcmp(inv,"drugs",true) == 0)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "___ DRUG INVENTORY ___");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Weed Seeds:   %d Seeds", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Bulk Weed:    %d Grams", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][0]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Usable Weed:  %d Grams", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Raw Coke:     %d Grams", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][1]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Cut Coke:     %d Grams", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][6]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Usable Coke:  %d Grams", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][4]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Bulk Crack:   %d Grams", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][2]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Usable Crack: %d Grams", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][5]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	}
	else if(strcmp(inv,"Supplies",true) == 0)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "___ SUPPLY INVENTORY ___");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Car Pars:     %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pMechParts]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Materials:    %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pMats]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Scale:        %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][0]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Baking Soda:  %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][1]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Razor Blades: %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][2]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Mirror:       %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][3]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Baggies:      %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][4]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5])
		{
			case 1 .. 5:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Rolling Papers:  %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			}
			case 6 .. 10:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Blunt Wraps:     %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5] - 5);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			}
		}
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Tin Foil:     %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][8]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	}
	else if(strcmp(inv,"snacks",true) == 0)
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "___ SNACK INVENTORY ___");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Chips:      %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][0]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Candy Bar:  %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][1]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Beef Jerky: %d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][2]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	}
	LogCallback("inv");
	return 1;
}

CMD:ainv(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("ainv");
	new id,inv[32],string[32];

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "You can't use this command");

	if(sscanf(params, "s[32]u",inv, id))
	{
		SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/ainv [items] [playerid/partofname]");
		SCM(playerid, -1, "Items:Drugs, Supplies");
		return 1;
	}
	if(strcmp(inv,"drugs",true) == 0)
	{
		if(!IsPlayerConnected(id)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "Player is not currently logged in");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "___ CHECKING DRUG INVENTORY ___");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Weed Seeds:   %d Seeds", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugGoods][7]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Bulk Weed:    %d Grams", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugs][0]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Usable Weed:  %d Grams", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugs][3]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Raw Coke:     %d Grams", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugs][1]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Cut Coke:     %d Grams", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugs][6]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Usable Coke:  %d Grams", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugs][4]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Bulk Crack:   %d Grams", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugs][2]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Usable Crack: %d Grams", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugs][5]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	}
	else if(strcmp(inv,"Supplies",true) == 0)
	{
		if(!IsPlayerConnected(id)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "Player is not currently logged in");
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "___ CHECKING SUPPLY INVENTORY ___");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Car Pars:     %d", PlayerInfo[id][pMechParts]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Materials:    %d", PlayerInfo[id][pMats]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Scale:        %d", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugGoods][0]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Baking Soda:  %d", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugGoods][1]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Razor Blades: %d", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugGoods][2]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Mirror:       %d", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugGoods][3]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Baggies:      %d", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugGoods][4]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][5])
		{
			case 1 .. 5:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Rolling Papers:  %d", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugGoods][5]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			}
			case 6 .. 10:
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "Blunt Wraps:     %d", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugGoods][5] - 5);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			}
		}
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Tin Foil:     %d", PlayerInfo[id][pDrugGoods][8]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
	}
	LogCallback("ainv");
	return 1;
}

CMD:checkpay(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("checkpay");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		new string[128];
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "_________ CHECK PAYCHECK ________");
		format(string, sizeof(string), "Your next paycheck will be $%d", PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	}
	LogCallback("checkpay");
	return 1;
}

CMD:eatsnack(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("eatsnack");
	new snack[32];
	if(sscanf(params, "s[32]",snack))
	{
		SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE:/eatsnack [snack]");
		SCM(playerid, -1, "Names:chips, candybar, jerky");
		return 1;
	}
	if(strcmp(snack,"chips",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][0] != 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have any chips to eat");

		switch(Munchies[playerid])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] >= 93)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] = 100.0;
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				}
				else
				{
					GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] + 7);
				}
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][0] -= 1;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid, "FOOD", "EAT_Chicken",4.1,0,1,1,0,0);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You ate some chips.");
			}
			case 1:
			{
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] >= 143)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] = 150.0;
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				}
				else
				{
					GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] + 7);
				}
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][0] -= 1;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid, "FOOD", "EAT_Chicken",4.1,0,1,1,0,0); Munchies[playerid] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You ate some chips and are satisfied. You no longer have the munchies!");
			}
		}
	}
	else if(strcmp(snack,"candybar",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][1] != 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have a candy bar eat");

		switch(Munchies[playerid])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] >= 93)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] = 100.0;
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				}
				else
				{
					GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] + 7);
				}
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][1] -= 1;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid, "FOOD", "EAT_Chicken",4.1,0,1,1,0,0);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You ate a candy bar.");
			}
			case 1:
			{
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] >= 143)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] = 150.0;
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				}
				else
				{
					GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] + 7);
				}
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][1] -= 1;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid, "FOOD", "EAT_Chicken",4.1,0,1,1,0,0); Munchies[playerid] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You ate a candy bar and are satisfied. You no longer have the munchies!");
			}
		}
	}
	else if(strcmp(snack,"jerky",true) == 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][2] != 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You don't have any beef jerky to eat");

		switch(Munchies[playerid])
		{
			case 0:
			{
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] >= 93)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] = 100.0;
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				}
				else
				{
					GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] + 7);
				}
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][2] -= 1;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid, "FOOD", "EAT_Chicken",4.1,0,1,1,0,0);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You ate some jerkey. You should have saved it for when you were REALLY hungry");
			}
			case 1:
			{
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] >= 143)
				{
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] = 150.0;
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
				}
				else
				{
					GetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth] + 7);
				}
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pSnacks][2] -= 1;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid, "FOOD", "EAT_Chicken",4.1,0,1,1,0,0); Munchies[playerid] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You ate some beef jerky and are satisfied. You no longer have the munchies!");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("eatsnack");
	return 1;
}
CMD:buyfood(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("buyfood");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		for(new r = 0; r < 4; r++)
		{
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, FastFood[r][0],FastFood[r][1],FastFood[r][2]))
			{
				if(InAFoodPlace[playerid] >= 1)
				{
					switch(InAFoodPlace[playerid])
					{
						case 1: // chicken
						{
							ShowMenuForPlayer(chickenmenu, playerid);
						}
						case 2: // burger
						{
							ShowMenuForPlayer(burgermenu, playerid);
						}
						case 3: // pizza
						{
							ShowMenuForPlayer(pizzamenu, playerid);
						}
						case 4: // donut
						{
							ShowMenuForPlayer(donutshop, playerid);
						}
					}
					TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
					SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("buyfood");
	return 1;
}

CMD:jobhelp(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("buyfood");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0])
		{
			case 0:  { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "No Job For Job 1"); }
			case 1:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ SCRAPPER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/goscrap at the join spot to collect scraps. After collecting /loadscrap into the truck.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "After you've reached 250 LBS of scrap, you'll deliver it, and then need to /goscrap again.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You can /stopjob anytime");
			}
			case 2:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ GUN DEALER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "First you want to /smugglemats at the mats point. You will run the mats to their destination");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "and then be rewarded with some mats of your own for your troubles. You can use the mats to /creategun.");
			}
			case 3:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ TRUCKER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/gotrucking at the join spot to select one of the four types of trucking. Two Legal, Two Illegal.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Car Parts and Bizz Prods require you to /getprods and then /loadtruck. The two illegal trucking types");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "you simply pick up and /loadtruck. You then take the prods to the destination and /unloadtruck");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You can /stopjob anytime");
			}
			case 4:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ MECHANIC ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Go to the join spot and get yourself a /towtruck and then go on /mechduty.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "remember to /buyparts so you can /repair vehicles. You will need to /takeparts");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "from the truck to do the repairs. You can also refuel cars that run out of gas");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "with /refuelcar");
			}
			case 5:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ FARMER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "At the join point, /startfarming to clear the land. Once you're done /plantseed.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "once done with that /getduster at the duster point, dust the crops, and then /storeduster");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/getwalton and harvest your crops. /loadharvest in the truck and take it to the truck depot");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "once you're there /takebox from the truck unload your harvest for export.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You can /stopjob anytime");
			}
			case 6:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ PIZZA BOY ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/startpizza to begin delivering pizzas. Once you arrive at the customer's");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "house, /getpizza from the bike and deliver it! /stopjob any time you want.");
			}
			case 7:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ GARBAGE MAN ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/startgarbage to collect trash from bizzes. Once you have the garbage press KEY_FIRE to put it");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "in your Trashmaster. You may /stopjob anytime.");
			}
			case 8:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ LAWN MOWER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/startmowing to mow the park's grass down to an accept length. /stopjob at any time.");
			}
			case 9:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ TAXI DRIVER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Get yourself a /taxicab at unity station. One in the cab you can set your /fare.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You'll need to wait for calls before you can /accept taxi.");
			}
			case 10:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ DRUG DEALER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You need to /buyseeds or /buycoke. If you have weed seeds, you'll need to plant them");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "In order to plant, you'll need to /buygrowspot. Once the plot of land is purchased, you can");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/plantweed. After it's all planted you'll need to /waterplants. You can let them fully grow or");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "grow to your liking and then /pickweed. If you /buycoke, you'll need to /cutcoke at a drug house.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "To prepare your drugs, you'll /weigh [drug]. Then you can /selldrugs or /cookcoke for crack.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You'll then need to buy supplies at a 24/7 to /weigh, /cutcoke, as well as /smokeweed, and /snortcoke.");
			}
			case 11:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ LAWYER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Your job will be to /free the riff-raff of Los Santos from either Jail, or Prison.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "The prisoner must serve half is time, before you can /accept lawcall and release them.");
			}
		}
		ClearChatbox(playerid, 1);
		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1])
		{
			case 0:  { SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "No Job For Job 2"); }
			case 1:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ SCRAPPER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/goscrap at the join spot to collect scraps. After collecting /loadscrap into the truck.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "After you've reached 250 LBS of scrap, you'll deliver it, and then need to /goscrap again.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You can /stopjob anytime");
			}
			case 2:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ GUN DEALER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "First you want to /smugglemats at the mats point. You will run the mats to their destination");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "and then be rewarded with some mats of your own for your troubles. You can use the mats to /creategun.");
			}
			case 3:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ TRUCKER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/gotrucking at the join spot to select one of the four types of trucking. Two Legal, Two Illegal.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Car Parts and Bizz Prods require you to /getprods and then /loadtruck. The two illegal trucking types");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "you simply pick up and /loadtruck. You then take the prods to the destination and /unloadtruck");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You can /stopjob anytime");
			}
			case 4:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ MECHANIC ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Go to the join spot and get yourself a /towtruck and then go on /mechduty.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "remember to /buyparts so you can /repair vehicles. You will need to /takeparts");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "from the truck to do the repairs. You can also refuel cars that run out of gas");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "with /refuelcar");
			}
			case 5:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ FARMER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "At the join point, /startfarming to clear the land. Once you're done /plantseed.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "once done with that /getduster at the duster point, dust the crops, and then /storeduster");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/getwalton and harvest your crops. /loadharvest in the truck and take it to the truck depot");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "once ou're there /takebox from the truck unload your harvest for export.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You can /stopjob anytime");
			}
			case 6:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ PIZZA BOY ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/startpizza to begin delivering pizzas. Once you arrive at the customer's");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "house, /getpizza from the bike and deliver it! /stopjob any time you want.");
			}
			case 7:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ GARBAGE MAN ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/startgarbage to collect trash from bizzes. Once you have the garbage, /compact it in your.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Trashmaster. You man /stopjob anytime.");
			}
			case 8:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ LAWN MOWER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/startmowing to mow the park's grass down to an accept length. /stopjob at any time.");
			}
			case 9:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ TAXI DRIVER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Get yourself a /taxicab at unity station. One in the cab you can set your /fare.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You'll need to wait for calls before you can /accept taxi.");
			}
			case 10:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ DRUG DEALER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You need to /buyseeds or /buycoke. If you have weed seeds, you'll need to plant them");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "In order to plant, you'll need to /buygrowspot. Once the plot of land is purchased, you can");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "/plantweed. After it's all planted you'll need to /waterplants. You can let them fully grow or");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "grow to your liking and then /pickweed. If you /buycoke, you'll need to /cutcoke at a drug house.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "To prepare your drugs, you'll /weigh [drug]. Then you can /selldrugs or /cookcoke for crack.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You'll then need to buy supplies at a 24/7 to /weigh, /cutcoke, as well as /smokeweed, and /snortcoke.");
			}
			case 11:
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "____________________________ LAWYER ____________________________ ");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Your job will be to /free the riff-raff of Los Santos from either Jail, or Prison.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "The prisoner must serve half is time, before you can /accept lawcall and release them.");
			}
		}
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "REMEMBER: /returnveh when you're done with your work vehicles.");
	}
	LogCallback("buyfood");
	return 1;
}

CMD:free(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("free");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][0] == 11 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pJob][1] == 11)
	{
		new id, pr, Float:lpos[3], string[128];
		if(sscanf(params,"ud",id,pr)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /free [id] [price]");
		if(pr < 0 || pr > 1250) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "Price must be between $1 and $1250");
		{
			GetPlayerPos(id, lpos[0], lpos[1], lpos[2]);
			if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 25.0, lpos[0], lpos[1], lpos[2]))
			{
				if(id == playerid)
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Are you crazy? You can't free yourself.");

				if(AllowedLawyer[id] != 1)
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "This player is not allowed a laywer.");

				if(PlayerInfo[id][pJailTime][0] > PlayerInfo[id][pJailTime][1])
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "This player has not served enough time to be released.");

				if(PrisonerID[playerid] != id)
					return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You didn't accept this prisoner's call");

				switch(PlayerInfo[id][pJailed])
				{
					case 0: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "This person is not in jail at the moment"); }
					case 2 .. 5:
					{
						LawyerFee[playerid] = pr;
						LawyerID[id] = playerid;
						format(string, sizeof(string), "You have offered to free %s for the cost of $%d", GPN(id), pr);
						SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has offered to free you for the price of $%d", GPN(playerid), pr);
						SCM(id, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
						SCM(id, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Use /accept release if you wish to accept the lawyer's release and fee");
					}
				}
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not even near the person");
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not a lawyer. Go to city hall to get this job");
	}
	LogCallback("free");
	return 1;
}

CMD:gps(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("freeze");
	if(IsTrucking[playerid] == true) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_RED,"[ERROR: You cannot use your GPS while trucking!]");
	if(PizzaBoy[playerid] >= 1 || GarbageMan[playerid] >= 1 || LawnMower[playerid] >= 1 || MatRunning[playerid] >= 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You'll need to /stopjob before you can use your GPS");

	if(Trucking[playerid] >= 1 || JobCP[playerid] >= 1 || Farming[playerid] >= 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You'll need to /stopjob before you can use your GPS");

	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pGPS])
	{
		case 0:
		{
			new gpstext[64];
			strcat(gpstext, "Bank\r\nDMV\r\nRental Cars\r\nCity Hall");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Purchase the full GPS with job locations and more from a 24/7.");
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,GPS_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"GPS LITE",gpstext,"Select","Cancel");
		}
		case 1:
		{
			new gpstext[1200];
			strcat(gpstext, "Bank\r\nDMV\r\nRental Cars\r\nCity Hall\r\nScrapper Job\r\nTrucker Job\r\nMechanic Job\r\nFarmer Job\n");
			strcat(gpstext, "Pizza Boy Job\r\nGarbage Man Job\r\nLawn Mower Job\r\nTaxi Driver Job\r\nLawyer Job\r\nCoutz And Shoutz Dealership\r\nGrotti Dealership\r\nBike Dealership\r\nVIP Dealership(Gold/Diamond ONLY!)");
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,GPS_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"GPS",gpstext,"Select","Cancel");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("gps");
	return 1;
}


CMD:hotwire(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("hotwire");
	if(IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid))
	{
		new
			time,
			Float:CHP,
			string[128],
			E,L,A,D,H,T,O,
			id = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)
		;
		GetVehicleParamsEx(id,E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
		GetVehicleHealth(id, CHP);

		if(E == 1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "The engine is already on!");

		if(IsARentableVeh(id))
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Rental Cars can't be hotwired");

		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pToolKit] == 0)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You do not have a toolkit available");

		if(HotWireTime[playerid] != -1)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are already hotwiring a vehicle");

		if(CHP <= 350)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You vehicle is busted. /call 555 for a repair or have it towed.");

		if(Gas[id] <= 0)
			return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are out of gas. /call 555 for a refuel or have it towed to a gas station.");

		switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pLevel])
		{
			case 1 .. 2: { time = 180000; BarType[playerid] = 7; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 180; }
			case 3 .. 5: { time = 90000;  BarType[playerid] = 8; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 90;  }
			default:     { time = 60000;  BarType[playerid] = 9; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 60;  }
		}
		SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
		ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
		PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "HOTWIRING VEHICLE");
		jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		HotWireTime[playerid] = SetTimerEx("HotwiringVehicle", time, false, "i", playerid);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out some tools and begins to hotwire the vehicle", GPN(playerid));
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "* Vehicle is being hotwired (( %s )).", GPN(playerid));
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
	}
	LogCallback("hotwire");
	return 1;
}

CMD:acam(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("acam");
	new cam;
	if(sscanf(params,"d",cam)) return SCM(playerid, -1, "USAGE: /acam [camid]");
	if(cam < 1 || cam > 8) return SCM(playerid, -1, "Cam must be no less than 1, and no more than 8");
	GetPlayerPos(playerid,SpecX[playerid],SpecY[playerid],SpecZ[playerid]);
	TogglePlayerSpectating(playerid, true);
	IsSpecing[playerid] = 1;
	switch(cam)
	{
		case 1:
		{
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,2177.8276,-171.7209,40.1786);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,2157.8972,-103.9748,2.7190);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are now specing the mats bank pickup");
		}
		case 2:
		{
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-2158.2991,-2243.7498,60.4183);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-2090.7380,-2248.6895,30.8130);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are now specing the mats dropoff");
		}
		case 3:
		{
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,1976.6604,-1741.8862,18.2497);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,1943.0460,-1773.0142,13.3906);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are now specing the Idlewood Gas station");
		}
		case 4:
		{
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,2048.8308,-1836.6052,66.4715);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,2130.9941,-1751.6650,13.4001);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are now specing the Idlewood Pizza Stack");
		}
		case 5:
		{
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,2438.8611,-2081.6707,20.7877);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,2474.8250,-2118.5259,13.5469);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are now specing the Truck Depot");
		}
		case 6:
		{
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,2736.6646,-2468.3760,13.6484);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,2772.5713,-2455.5347,13.6374);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are now specing the cocaine drop-off");
		}
		case 7:
		{
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,2448.2332,-584.8349,172.0103);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,2358.4170,-652.7408,128.0920);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are now specing the seed drop-off");
		}
		case 8:
		{
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid,-1044.7275,448.0930,51.6170);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid,-1115.3024,377.0068,13.6872);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are now specing the drug drop pick up");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("acam");
	return 1;
}
CMD:agivemethadone(playerid, params[])
{
	new string[128], playa;
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
	    if(sscanf(params,"ud",playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE: /agivemethadone [PlayerID/PartOfName]");
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa) || playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    {
	        MethadoneTablet[playa] = 1;
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"%s %s has given you a methadone tablet. use /take methadone to cure your addiction.");
	        SCM(playa,-1,string);
	        SCM(playa,COLOR_RED,"You will lose your tablet if you log out so take your tabelt quickly!");
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s %s has given %s a methadone tablet to cure their addiction.");
			SendAdminMessage(COLOR_ORANGE,string);
	    }else return SCM(playerid,-1,"** This player isn't connected or is a invalid ID!");
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"** You cannot use this command!");
	return 1;
}
CMD:givemethadone(playerid, params[])
{
	new string[128], playa, price;
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] == 6 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] == 7 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 11)
	{
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You cannot use this command you're not on duty");
	    if(sscanf(params,"ud",playa,price)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE: /givemethadone [PlayerID/PartOfName] [Price]");
	    if(playerid == playa) return SCM(playerid,-1,"** You can't give methadone to yourself!");
	    if(price < 1 || price > 1000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Price not lower then 1, or above 1000!");
	    if(IsPlayerConnected(playa) || playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    {
            if(ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, playa))
			{
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s reaches into their pocket taking out a box of tablets, offering a tablet to %s.",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa));
			    ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
   				format(string,sizeof(string),"You have offered %s a methadone tablet to cure their addiction for $%d.",GPN(playerid),price);
   				SCM(playerid,-1,string);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has offered you a methadone tablet to cure your addiction for $%d.",GPN(playerid),price);
   				SCM(playa,-1,string);
   				SCM(playa,COLOR_RED,"Use /accept [methadone] to buy the tablet.");
   				MethadoneOffer[playa] = playerid;
   				MethadonePrice[playa] = price;
			}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"**You are too far away from this player!");
	    }else return SCM(playerid,-1,"**The player isn't connected or invalid player ID!");
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"** You are not in the correct faction or a high enough rank to use this command");
	return 1;
}
CMD:takemethadone(playerid,params[])
{
	new string[128];
	if(MethadoneTablet[playerid] == 1)
	{
	    SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	    PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddiction] = 0;
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] = 0;
		MethadoneTablet[playerid] = 0;
		stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
		SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid,0);
		DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
		OnCrack[playerid] = 0;
		OnCoke[playerid] = 0;
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 1);
		PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
		SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 50);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"%s takes a tablet from their pocket, putting the tablet inside of their mouth.",GPN(playerid));
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIMEGREEN,"You have now cured your addiction to drugs. use this as a chance to clean your life up!");
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"You don't have a methadone tablet to take!");
	return 1;
}
CMD:heal(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("heal");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] != 2) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You cannot use this command you're not a medic");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You cannot use this command you're not on duty");
	if(IsAEmsCar(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)) || GetPlayerInterior(playerid) == 3)
	{
	    new playa,price;
	    if(sscanf(params,"ud",playa,price)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/heal [playerID/PartOfName] [Price]");
		if(price < 1 || price > 1000) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Price not lower then 1, or above 1000!");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		{
    		if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
    		{
        		if(ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, playa))
				{
		    		if(playa == playerid)return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "You cant heal yourself !");
					new string[128];
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* You offerd to heal %s for $%d.", GPN(playa), price);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "* Medic %s wants to heal you for $%d, (type /accept heal) to accept.", GPN(playerid), price);
					SCM(playa, COLOR_WHITE, string);
					HealOffer[playa] = playerid;
					HealPrice[playa] = price;
				} else return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_GREY,"** You are not near that player");
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** Player is not connected");
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** Player is not connected");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You are not near an ambulance or in a hospital");
	LogCallback("heal");
	return 1;
}

CMD:take(playerid, params[])//602
{
	LogCallback("take");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
    {
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] < 2)
        {
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You need to be Rank 2 or Higher for this action !");
			return 1;
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are Banned from Cop Duty!");
			return 1;
		}
        new x_nr[24], giveplayerid, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params, "s[24]u", x_nr,giveplayerid))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|___________________ Take Items ____________________|");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /take [Item] [playerid/PartOfName]");
  			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Available names: Driverslicense, Flyinglicense, Boatlicense, GunLicense, Weapons, Drugs, Materials, Passport");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "|___________________________________________________|");
			return 1;
		}
		if(strcmp(x_nr,"GunLicense",true) == 0)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
					{
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have taken away %s's gun license.", GPN(giveplayerid));
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Officer %s has taken away your gun license.", GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pGunLic] = 0;
					}
					else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not near you !");
					    return 1;
					}
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
					
		}
	    else if(strcmp(x_nr,"driverslicense",true) == 0)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
					{
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have taken away %s's Drivers License.", GPN(giveplayerid));
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Officer %s has taken away your Drivers License.", GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pCarLic] = 0;
					}
					else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not near you !");
					    return 1;
					}
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"flyinglicense",true) == 0)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
					{
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have taken away %s's Flying License.", GPN(giveplayerid));
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Officer %s has taken away your Flying License.", GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pFlyLic] = 0;
					}
					else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not near you !");
					    return 1;
					}
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"boatlicense",true) == 0)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
					{
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have taken away %s's Boat License.", GPN(giveplayerid));
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Officer %s has taken away your Boat License.", GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pBoatLic] = 0;
			        }
			        else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not near you !");
					    return 1;
					}
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"weapons",true) == 0)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAdminDuty] >= 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You may not take away admin on duty's weapons!");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
					{
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have taken away %s's Weapons.", GPN(giveplayerid));
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Officer %s has taken away your Weapons.", GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        SafeResetPlayerWeapons(giveplayerid);
			        }
			        else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not near you !");
					    return 1;
					}
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"drugs",true) == 0)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pAdminDuty] >= 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You may not take away admin on duty's drugs!");
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
					{
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDrugGoods][7] = 0;
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDrugs][0] = 0;
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDrugs][3] = 0;
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDrugs][1] = 0;
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDrugs][6] = 0;
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDrugs][4] = 0;
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDrugs][2] = 0;
						PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDrugs][5] = 0;
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have taken away %s's drugs from them.", GPN(giveplayerid));
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Officer %s has taken away your all your drugs.", GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
			        }
			        else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is not near you!");
					    return 1;
					}
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "That player is Offline!");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"materials",true) == 0)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
			{
			    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
					{
					    format(string, sizeof(string), "* You have taken away %s's materials.", GPN(giveplayerid));
				        SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        format(string, sizeof(string), "* Officer %s has taken away your materials.", GPN(playerid));
				        SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pMats] = 0;
					}
			        else
					{
					    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is not near you !");
					    return 1;
					}
			    }
			}
			else
			{
			    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   That player is Offline !");
			    return 1;
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(x_nr,"passport",true) == 0)
		{
		    if(!IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid) || giveplayerid == INVALID_PLAYER_ID) return SCM(playerid, -1, "* Player is not connected or is an invaild playerid!");
		    if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
		    {
		        format(string,sizeof(string),"* You have taken away %s's passport.", GPN(giveplayerid));
		        SCM(playerid, -1, string);
		        format(string,sizeof(string),"* Officer %s has taken away your passport.", GPN(playerid));
				SCM(giveplayerid, -1,string);
				PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pPassport] = 0;
		    }
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Unknown Take name!");
			return 1;
		}
	}
    else
    {
       SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are not part of a police department!");
       return 1;
    }
	LogCallback("take");
    return 1;
}



CMD:copsuspend(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("copsuspend");
	new giveplayerid, string[128], Float:plPOS[3], y,m,d,h,mi,s;
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /copsuspend [playerid/PartOfName]");
	if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_NICERED,"Player is Already Cop Banned!");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
		        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDBanned] = 1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You Suspended %s From Cop Duty",GPN(giveplayerid));
				SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
				SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have been suspended from Cop Duty!");
	    		GetPlayerPos(giveplayerid, plPOS[0], plPOS[1], plPOS[2]);
   				PlayerPlaySound(giveplayerid, 1056, plPOS[0], plPOS[1], plPOS[2]);
   				SetPlayerSkin(giveplayerid, 167);
			 	SCM(giveplayerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, "You Are not allowed to do Cop Duty anymore, until you get unsuspended");
				getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s [CMD] -> /copsuspend %s",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),GPN(giveplayerid));
				CommandLog(string);
		    }
		}
	}
	else
	{
		format(string, sizeof(string), "** %d is not an active player.", giveplayerid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
	}
	LogCallback("copsuspend");
	return 1;
}
CMD:drag(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("drag");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] >= 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
	{
	    new playa, string[128], Float:x, Float:y, Float:z, newcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
	    if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/DRAG [PlayerID/PartOfName]");
		GetPlayerPos(playa,x,y,z);
		if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid, -1, "* You are currently duty suspended from the police department!");
		if(INVALID_PLAYER_ID == playa || !IsPlayerConnected(playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* Player is not connected or a valid ID!");
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,8.0,x,y,z))//if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 8, x, y, z));
		{
		    if(IsACopCar(newcar))
		    {
		        PutPlayerInVehicle(playa,newcar,3);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s drags %s to their cruiser.", GPN(playerid) ,GPN(playa));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			} else return SCM(playerid, -1,"*You are not in a cruiser.");
		}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"*You are not in range of this player!");
	}else return SCM(playerid, -1,"* You are not part of the police department!");
	LogCallback("drag");
	return 1;
}
CMD:copunsuspend(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("copunsuspend");
	new giveplayerid, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", giveplayerid)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /copunsuspend [playerid/PartOfName]");
	if(PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDBanned] == 0)
	{
		SCM(playerid,COLOR_NICERED,"Player isn't Cop Suspended!");
		return 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 3)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
		{
		    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		    {
		        PlayerInfo[giveplayerid][pDBanned] = 0;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You have Un Suspended %s From Cop duty",GPN(giveplayerid));
				SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTRED,string);
				SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, "You are now unsuspended from Cop Duty!");
				new Float:X, Float:Y, Float:Z;
	    		GetPlayerPos(giveplayerid, X,Y,Z);
   				PlayerPlaySound(giveplayerid, 1056, X, Y, Z);
			 	SCM(giveplayerid, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, "You can now proceed with regular duty activities");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			format(string, sizeof(string), "** %d is not an active player.", giveplayerid);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("copunsuspend");
	return 1;
}
CMD:createroadblock(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("createroadblock");
	new rb, string[128], Float:plocx, Float:plocy, Float:plocz, Float:ploca;
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
	    if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid, -1, "* You are currently duty suspended from the police department!");
	    if(sscanf(params, "d", rb))
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "USAGE: /crb [Roadblock ID]");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Available Roadblocks:");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "| 1: Small Roadblock | 2: Medium Roadblock |");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "| 3: Big Roadblock | 4: Cone | 5: Detour Sign |");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1, "| 6: Will Be Sign | 7: Line Closed Sign |");
		}
		if(rb < 1 || rb > 7) return SCM(playerid, -1, "*Roabblock ID can't be less then 1 or more then 7!");
		switch(rb)
		{
			case 1:
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy, plocz);
		        GetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,ploca);
		        CreateRoadblock(1459,plocx,plocy,plocz+0.51,ploca);
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Roadblock placed!");
			}
			case 2:
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy, plocz);
		        GetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,ploca);
		        CreateRoadblock(978,plocx,plocy,plocz+0.6,ploca);
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Roadblock placed!");
				return 1;
			}
			case 3:
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy, plocz);
		        GetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,ploca);
		        CreateRoadblock(981,plocx,plocy,plocz+0.9,ploca+180);
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Roadblock placed!");
		        SetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy+1.3, plocz);
				return 1;
			}
			case 4:
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy, plocz);
		        GetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,ploca);
		        CreateRoadblock(1238,plocx,plocy,plocz+0.2,ploca);
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Cone placed!");
				return 1;
			}
			case 5:
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy, plocz);
		        GetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,ploca);
		        CreateRoadblock(1425,plocx,plocy,plocz+0.6,ploca);
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Sign placed!");
				return 1;
			}
			case 6:
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy, plocz);
		        GetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,ploca);
		        CreateRoadblock(3265,plocx,plocy,plocz-0.5,ploca);
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Sign placed!");
				return 1;
			}
			case 7:
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1052, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
		        GetPlayerPos(playerid, plocx, plocy, plocz);
		        GetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid,ploca);
		        CreateRoadblock(3091,plocx,plocy,plocz+0.5,ploca+180);
		        SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Sign placed!");
				return 1;
			}
		}
		format(string,sizeof(string),"%s unfold's a object and lays it out on the ground.",GPN(playerid));
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);

	} else return SCM(playerid,-1,"You are not a member of a faction that can use this command or you are not on duty!");
	LogCallback("createroadblock");
	return 1;
}
CMD:crb(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_createroadblock(playerid, params);
}
CMD:removeroadblock(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("removeroadblock");
	new string[128];
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
    {
		if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
  		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid, -1, "* You are currently duty suspended from the police department!");
  		DeleteClosestRoadblock(playerid);
       	format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has picked up the object from the ground, folding it back up.",GPN(playerid));
        ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"You are not a member of a faction that can use this command or you are not on duty!");
	LogCallback("removeroadblock");
	return 1;
}
CMD:rrb(playerid,params[])
{
	return cmd_removeroadblock(playerid,params);
}
CMD:removeroadblockall(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("removeroadblockall");
	new string[128];
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] == 6 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] == 7 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 11)
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
        {
	        if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
	  		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are currently duty suspended from the police department!");
	  		format(string,sizeof(string),"%s %s: has removed all Roadblocks in the area!",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid));
	   		SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,string);
	   		DeleteAllRoadblocks(playerid);
		} else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You need to be on duty to use this command!");
	} else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are not a member of a faction that can use this command!");
	LogCallback("removeroadblockall");
	return 1;
}
CMD:rrball(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_removeroadblockall(playerid, params);
}
CMD:mir(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("mir");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
    {
        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
        {
			new string[128];
			format(string, sizeof(string),"%s reads out the Miranda Rights:",GPN(playerid));
            ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
            ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, "You have the right to remain silent, Anything you say can and will be used agaisnt you in a court of Law", COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
            ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, "You have the right to a Lawyer, If you cannot afford one, the state will appoint you one", COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, "You have the right to a Phone Call, but only to ONE. Do you understand your rights?", COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
        } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not on duty");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not a cop");
	LogCallback("mir");
	return 1;
}

CMD:drugtest(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("drugtest");
	new id, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", id)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /drugtest [playerid/partofname]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are banned from police duty!");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
		if(DrugStage[id] >= 1)
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "This person has tested positive.");
		}
		else
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "This person has tested negative.");
		}
	}
	format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s takes out a drug testing kit, inserting a cotton wool bud into %s's mouth.", GPN(playerid),GPN(id));
	ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
	LogCallback("drugtest");
	return 1;
}
CMD:givepassport(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("givepassport");
    new id, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params, "u", id)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /givepassport [playerid/partofname]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are banned from police duty!");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
	    format(string,sizeof(string),"* You have given %s a passport.",GPN(id));
	    SCM(playerid,-1,string);
	    format(string,sizeof(string),"* Officer %s has given you a passport.",GPN(playerid));
	    SCM(id,-1,string);
	    PlayerInfo[playerid][pPassport] = 1;
	}else return SCM(playerid, -1,"* You are not a member of the police department");
	LogCallback("givepassport");
	return 1;
}
CMD:m(playerid,params[])
{
    new result[128];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You are banned from Cop Duty");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You are not on duty");
		if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: (/m)egaphone [megaphone chat]");
		format(tstring, sizeof(tstring), "[%s %s:o< %s]", GetFactionRank(playerid), GPN(playerid), result);
		ProxDetector(60.0, playerid, tstring,COLOR_YELLOW,COLOR_YELLOW,COLOR_YELLOW,COLOR_YELLOW,COLOR_YELLOW);
	}else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You are not in a goverment faction that can use this command.");
	LogCallback("m");
	return 1;
}

CMD:wanted(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("wanted");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] != 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You are not a Cop!");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You are banned from Cop Duty");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"** You are not on duty");
	SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_ORANGE,"Generating a list of wanted suspects please use mdc to see their crimes.");
	new string[128];
	foreach(Player,i)
	{
	    if(WantedLevel[i] > 1)
	    {
			format(string,sizeof(string),"Name: %s | Wanted Level: %d", GPN(i),WantedLevel[i]);
			SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_ORANGE,string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("wanted");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ticket(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("ticket");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] != 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are not a Cop!");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are Banned From Cop Duty!");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are not on Duty!");
   	new giveplayerid, moneys, result[128], string[128];
   	if(sscanf(params, "uds[128]", giveplayerid, moneys, result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2, "USAGE: /ticket [playerid/PartOfName] [price] [reason]");
	if(moneys < 1 || moneys > 1500) { SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "Ticket Money can't be below 1 or higher then 1500 !"); return 1; }
	if(IsPlayerConnected(giveplayerid))
	{
	    if(giveplayerid != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
	    {
	        if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, giveplayerid))
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* You gave %s a Ticket costing $%d, reason: %s", GPN(giveplayerid), moneys, result);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* Officer %s has given you a Ticket costing $%d, reason: %s", GPN(playerid), moneys, result);
				SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				SCM(giveplayerid, COLOR_WHITE, "* Type /accept ticket, to accept it.");
				TicketOffer[giveplayerid] = playerid;
				TicketMoney[giveplayerid] = moneys;
				return 1;
			}
			else
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** That player is not near you !");
				return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
	    SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** That player is offline ");
	    return 1;
	}
	LogCallback("ticket");
	return 1;
}

CMD:clear(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("clear");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
		new playa,name[MAX_PLAYER_NAME];
		if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/clear [playerid]");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(playa) && playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
			new string[128];
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has cleared your current charges",GPN(playerid));
			SendClientMessage(playa,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has cleared %s of their charges",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa));
			foreach(Player,i)
			{
				if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] == 1)
				{
				    SendClientMessage(i,COLOR_BLUE,string);
				}
			}
		    new query[200];
		    PlayerInfo[playa][pWanted] = 0;
		    SetPlayerWantedLevel(playerid,0);
		    mysql_real_escape_string(GPN(playa),name);
		    format(query,sizeof(query),"DELETE FROM `samp_charges` WHERE `Felon` = '%s' WHERE `Active` = 'Yes'",name);
		    mysql_query(query,THREAD_SAVECHARGES);
		}
		    
	}
	LogCallback("clear");
	return 1;
}

CMD:showbadge(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("clear");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] >= 1)
	{
		new playa;
		if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/showbadge [playerid]");
		if(IsPlayerConnected(playa) && playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You have no badge as you are duty banned!");
		{
		    new string[128];
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s has shown you their badge",GPN(playerid));
		    SendClientMessage(playa,COLOR_PURPLE,string);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"* You have shown your badge to %s",GPN(playa));
		    SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_PURPLE,string);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"*|_______ %s_______|*",GPN(playerid));
		    SCM(playa,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
		    format(string,sizeof(string),"*|______ %s: %s______|*",GetFactionName(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember]),GetFactionRank(playerid));
		    SCM(playa,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pSwat] >= 1)
		    {
		        format(string,sizeof(string),"*|______ SWAT: %s______|*",GetSwatRank(playerid));
		        SCM(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
		    }
		}
	}else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You are not in a faction so you cannot use this command");
	LogCallback("clear");
	return 1;
}

{
