		    {
		        MoveDynamicObject(prmaindoor4,-1870.7177, 39.1144, 1054.6553,1);
	  		 	prmaindoor4s = 0;
			    return 1;
		    }
		}
		else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,-1848.3505, 65.8430, 1054.6553))
		{
		    if(prmaindoor5s == 0)
		    {
		        MoveDynamicObject(prmaindoor5,-1849.7545, 65.8430, 1054.6553,1);
		    	prmaindoor5s = 1;
			    return 1;
		    }
		    else if(prmaindoor5s == 1)
		    {
		        MoveDynamicObject(prmaindoor5,-1870.7177, 39.1144, 1054.6553,1);
	  		 	prmaindoor5s = 0;
			    return 1;
		    }
		}
		else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,-1839.4810, 68.3054, 1054.6549))
		{
		    if(prmaindoor6s == 0)
		    {
		        MoveDynamicObject(prmaindoor6,-1839.4810, 69.7054, 1054.6549,1);
		    	prmaindoor6s = 1;
			    return 1;
		    }
		    else if(prmaindoor6s == 1)
		    {
		        MoveDynamicObject(prmaindoor6,-1839.4810, 68.3054, 1054.6549,1);
	  		 	prmaindoor6s = 0;
			    return 1;
		    }
		}
			else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,-1839.4617, 71.6321, 1054.6549))
		{
		    if(prmaindoor7s == 0)
		    {
		        MoveDynamicObject(prmaindoor7,-1839.4617, 73.0321, 1054.6549,1);
		    	prmaindoor7s = 1;
			    return 1;
		    }
		    else if(prmaindoor7s == 1)
		    {
		        MoveDynamicObject(prmaindoor7,-1839.4617, 71.6321, 1054.6549,1);
	  		 	prmaindoor7s = 0;
			    return 1;
		    }
		}
			else if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,2,-1839.4888, 75.0129, 1054.6549))
		{
		    if(prmaindoor8s == 0)
		    {
		        MoveDynamicObject(prmaindoor8,-1839.4888, 76.4129, 1054.6549,1);
		    	prmaindoor8s = 1;
			    return 1;
		    }
		    else if(prmaindoor8s == 1)
		    {
		        MoveDynamicObject(prmaindoor8,-1839.4888, 75.0129, 1054.6549,1);
	  		 	prmaindoor8s = 0;
			    return 1;
		    }
		}
	}
	return 1;
}
CMD:togfaction(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("togfaction");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
    {
        if(TogFaction[playerid] == 0)
        {
	        SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREEN,"You have toggled off your faction chat off!");
	        TogFaction[playerid] = 1;
		}
		else if(TogFaction[playerid] == 1)
		{
		    SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREEN,"You have toggled on your faction chat on!");
	        TogFaction[playerid] = 0;
		}
    }
	LogCallback("togfaction");
    return 1;
}
CMD:togf(playerid,params[])
{
	return cmd_togfaction(playerid, params);
}
CMD:f(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("f");
	new msg[256],string[128];
	if(sscanf(params,"s[256]",msg)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/f [Text]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1) return SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR, "You cannot speak, you have been silenced!");
	if(TogFaction[playerid] == 1) return SCM(playerid, TEAM_CYAN_COLOR," You cannot speak as you have toggled your faction chat!");
	new year, month, day;
	new hour, minute, second;
	gettime(hour,minute,second);
	getdate(day,month,year);
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
		format(string, sizeof(string), "((%s, %s: %s )) **", GetFactionRank(playerid), GPN(playerid), msg);
		foreach(Player,i)
		{
			if(TogFaction[i] == 0)
		    {
				if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] == PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember])
				{
					SendCustomPlayerMessage(i,0x7BDDA5AA, string);
				}
			}
		}
		format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (Faction): (%s)",day,month,year,hour,minute,second,GPN(playerid),msg);
		FamilyChatLog(cstring);
	}
    else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember] < 255)
	{
		format(string, sizeof(string), "((%s, %s: %s )) **", GetFactionRank(playerid), GPN(playerid), msg);
		SendNewFamilyMessage(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFMember], 0x7BDDA5AA, string);
		format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s (Family): (%s)",day,month,year,hour,minute,second,GPN(playerid),msg);
		FamilyChatLog(cstring);

	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"*You are not in a faction or family so you cannot use this command...");
	LogCallback("f");
	return 1;

}
CMD:members(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("members");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] >= 1)
	{
        SCM(playerid, 0x808000AA, "**Members Online**");
		new string[128], bool:duty;
		foreach(Player,i)
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[i][pDuty] == 1){duty = true;}
			else if(PlayerInfo[i][pDuty] == 0){duty = false;}
	        if(PlayerInfo[i][pMember] == PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember])
	        {
                format(string, sizeof(string), "%s, Rank: %s, %s",GPN(i), GetFactionRank(i),(duty ? ("On Duty") : ("Off Duty")));
                SCM(playerid, 0xF5DEB3AA, string);
            }
		}
	}	else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You are not in a faction so you cannot use this command");
	LogCallback("members");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setunit(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
	    ShowServerDialog(playerid,SETUNIT_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Set Unit","Please type your unit bellow. (Example '2-A-2')","Okay","Cancel");

	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You cannot use this command!");
	return 1;
}
CMD:cct(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_copchecktruck(playerid, params);
}
CMD:copchecktruck(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("copchecktruck");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] != 1)
		return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not a cop");

	if(CarInfo[GetClosestVehicle(playerid)][cWcart] == 1)
	{
		new string[128];
		format(string, sizeof(string), "%s has opened the truck and is looking at the contents", GPN(playerid));
		ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "There are %d boxes of %s in this truck", TruckPackages[GetClosestVehicle(playerid)], tLoad[GetClosestVehicle(playerid)]);
		SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, string);
	}
	else
	{
		SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "There is no truck near you to search");
	}
	LogCallback("copchecktruck");
	return 1;
}
CMD:sur(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_surrender(playerid,params);
}
CMD:surrender(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("sur");
	new string[128];
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
	format(string,sizeof(string),"** %s slowly raises their hands up in the air.",GPN(playerid));
	ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
	SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
	SCM(playerid,-1,"You have given up and thrown you hands in the air, you can now be cuffed.");
	LogCallback("sur");
	return 1;
}
CMD:cuff(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("cuff");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
		new playa;
		if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/cuff [playerid]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are Banned From Cop Duty!");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0)return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You aren't on Duty!");
		if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playa][pMember] == 1) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You cannot cuff other cops...");
			if(PlayerCuffed[playa] > 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Player already Cuffed !");
			if(playa == playerid) return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You cannot cuff yourself");
			if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, playa))
			{
				new string[128];
			 	format(string, sizeof(string), "* You were cuffed by %s", GPN(playerid));
				SCM(playa, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* You cuffed %s", GPN(playa));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s hand cuffs %s, so they wont go anywhere.", GPN(playerid) ,GPN(playa));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
				TogglePlayerControllable(playa, 1);
				PlayerCuffed[playa] = 1;
				SetPlayerSpecialAction(playa, SPECIAL_ACTION_CUFFED);
				SetPlayerAttachedObject(playa,4,19418,5,-0.05,0.01,0,10,0,130,1,1,1);
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You aren't near this player.");
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* This player is not connected.");
	}else return SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You're not a cop so you cannot use this command.");
	LogCallback("cuff");
	return 1;
}
CMD:uncuff(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("uncuff");
	new playa, string[128];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
		if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/uncuff [playerid]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You are Banned From Cop Duty!");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0)return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* You aren't on Duty!");
		if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		{
			if (ProxDetectorS(8.0, playerid, playa) && PlayerCuffed[playa] == 1)
			{
			    PlayerCuffed[playa] = 0;
				SafeClearAnimations(playa);
				SetPlayerSpecialAction(playa, SPECIAL_ACTION_NONE);
				RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playa,4);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* You uncuffed %s", GPN(playa));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s removes %s's cuffs from their wrist.", GPN(playerid) ,GPN(playa));
				ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* Player isn't near you or isn't cuffed.");
		}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* This player isn't connected or is an invalid playerid!");
	}else return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You're not a cop so you cannot use this command.");
	LogCallback("uncuff");
	return 1;
}
CMD:invite(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("invite");
	new playa, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/invite [playerid]");
	if(playa == INVALID_PLAYER_ID || !IsPlayerConnected(playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Player Not Connected");
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember])
	{
	    case 1,2:
	    {
	        if(IsACopHC(playerid) || IsAEMSHC(playerid))
	        {
	        	PlayerInfo[playa][pMember] = PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember];
				PlayerInfo[playa][pRank] = 1;
				format(string, sizeof(string), "You have Joined the %s, you were invited by Leader %s", GetFactionName(PlayerInfo[playa][pMember]),GPN(playerid));
				SCM(playa, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				format(string, sizeof(string), "   You have Invited %s to join the %s.", GPN(playa),GetFactionName(PlayerInfo[playa][pMember]));
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Member`='%d', `Rank`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playa][pMember],PlayerInfo[playa][pRank],PlayerInfo[playa][pDBID]);
				mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playa);
			} else return SCM(playerid,-1,"**You are not a high enough rank to do that!");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("invite");
	return 1;
}
CMD:issueleader(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("issueleader");
	new playa, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/issueleader");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] == 14)
	{
		if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playa][pMember] == PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember])
		    {
				PlayerInfo[playa][pLeader] = 1;
				format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has issued you leader permissions you can now /invite /uninvite and /giverank");
				SendClientMessage(playa,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"You have issued %s leader permissions",GPN(playa));
				SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Leader`WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playa][pMember],PlayerInfo[playa][pRank],PlayerInfo[playa][pDBID]);
		    }
		}
	} else return SCM(playerid,-1,"**You are not a high enough rank to do that!");
	LogCallback("issueleader");
	return 1;
}
CMD:uninvite(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("uninvite");
	new playa, string[128];
	if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/uninvite [playerid]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pLeader] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] == 6 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] == 7 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 11)
	{
		if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		{
		    if(IsACopHC(playerid) || IsAEMSHC(playerid))
		    {
		        PlayerInfo[playa][pMember] = 0;
		        PlayerInfo[playa][pLeader] = 0;
		        PlayerInfo[playa][pRank] = 0;
		        PlayerInfo[playa][pSwat] = 0;
		        PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 0;
		        SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playa);
			    ClearWepVariables(playa);
			    PlayerInfo[playa][pTazerBullets] = 0;
				OnSwatDuty[playa] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playa][pDuty] = 0;
			    SafeSetPlayerArmour(playa, 0);
				SetPlayerSkin(playa, PlayerInfo[playa][pModel]);
				SetPlayerColor(playa,0xFFFFFF00);
		        format(string,sizeof(string),"%s has removed you from the faction",GPN(playerid));
		        SCM(playa,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
		        format(string,sizeof(string),"You have remove %s from the faction",GPN(playa));
		        SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
				format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Member`='%d', `Rank`='%d', `Leader`='%d', `Swat`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playa][pMember],PlayerInfo[playa][pRank],PlayerInfo[playa][pLeader],PlayerInfo[playa][pSwat],PlayerInfo[playa][pDBID]);
				mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playa);
		    } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You cannot do this to that player...");
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"That player is not connected");
	}else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You cannot do that right now");
	LogCallback("uninvite");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setleader(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("setleader");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
	{
		new playa,slot, string[128];
		if(sscanf(params,"ud",playa,slot))
		{
		    SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:setleader [playerid] [factionid]");
		    SendFactionList(playerid);
			return 1;
		}

		if(IsPlayerConnected(playa) && playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playa][pMember] > 0 || PlayerInfo[playa][pFMember] < 255)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** That player is in a Faction / Family !");
			    return 1;
			}
			PlayerInfo[playa][pMember] = slot;
			PlayerInfo[playa][pRank] = 14;
			PlayerInfo[playa][pLeader] = 1;
			new y, m, d,h,mi,s;
			getdate(y,m,d);
			gettime(h,mi,s);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've been promoted to leader of %s by Admin %s",GetFactionName(slot), GPN(playerid));
			SCM(playa, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR, string);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* You've given %s leader of %s", GPN(playa),GetFactionName(slot));
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
	   		format(string, sizeof(string), "[ADMIN]: %s has given %s control of %s",GPN(playerid),GPN(playa),GetFactionName(slot));
			ABroadCast(COLOR_LIGHTRED,string, 5);
			format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] %s Gave The Control of the faction %d to [%s]",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid),slot,GPN(playa));
			format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Member`='%d', `Rank`='%d', `Leader`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playa][pMember],PlayerInfo[playa][pRank],PlayerInfo[playa][pLeader],PlayerInfo[playa][pDBID]);
			mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playa);
			AdminLog(string);
		}
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"You're not allowed to use this command");
	LogCallback("setleader");
	return 1;
}
CMD:giverank(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("giverank");
	if(IsACopHC(playerid) || IsAEMSHC(playerid))
	{
	    new playa,rank, string[128];
	    if(sscanf(params,"ud",playa,rank)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/giverank [PlayerID/PartOfName] [Rank]");
	    if(rank == 0) return SCM(playerid, -1,"** You can't kick the member with this command!");
	    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] < rank) return SCM(playerid, -1,"** You can't give someone a higher rank then yourself!");
	    if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[playa][pMember] == PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] && PlayerInfo[playa][pRank] < PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank])
	        {
	            PlayerInfo[playa][pRank] = rank;
	            format(string,sizeof(string),"You have given %s rank: %s.",GPN(playa),GetFactionRank(playa));
	            SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE,string);
	            format(string,sizeof(string),"%s: %s has given you rank: %s.",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid),GetFactionRank(playa));
	            SCM(playa, TEAM_GROVE_COLOR,string);
	            format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Rank`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playa][pRank],PlayerInfo[playa][pDBID]);
	            mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playa);
         	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"ERROR: You cannot do that to this player!");
	    }else return SCM(playerid,-1,"ERROR:PlayerID not found!");
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"You're not allowed to use this command");
	LogCallback("giverank");
	return 1;
}
CMD:swat(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("swat");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pSwat] == 4 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
	    new playa,swat,string[128];
	    if(sscanf(params,"ud",playa,swat)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/swat [PlayerID/PartOfName] [SWAT Rank (0 - 4)]");
    	if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
    	if(swat < 0||swat > 4) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_RED,"[ERROR: You can't give the member less then 0 or more then 4!]");
    	if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
    	{
    	    if(PlayerInfo[playa][pMember] == PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember])
    	    {
    	    	PlayerInfo[playa][pSwat] = swat;
    	    	format(string,sizeof(string),"%s %s has given you rank: %s of SWAT!",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid),GetSwatRank(playa));
    	    	SCM(playa,TEAM_GROVE_COLOR,string);
    	    	format(string,sizeof(string),"You have gave %s %s SWAT rank: %s",GetFactionRank(playa),GPN(playa),GetSwatRank(playa));
    	    	SCM(playerid,COLOR_ORANGE,string);
    	    	format(string,sizeof(string),"UPDATE `samp_users` SET `Swat`='%d' WHERE `PlayerID`='%d'",PlayerInfo[playa][pSwat],PlayerInfo[playa][pDBID]);
    	    	mysql_query(string,THREAD_UPDATE,playa);
			}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"ERROR: You cannot do that to this player!");
	    }else return SCM(playerid,-1,"ERROR:PlayerID not found!");
	}else return SCM(playerid,-1,"You're not allowed to use this command");
	LogCallback("swat");
	return 1;
}
CMD:duty(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("duty");
	new string[128], eqpdlist[128], emslist[128];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 )
	{
		if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] || PlayerInfo[playerid][pWanted] == 1) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You are either duty banned or a wanted man/woman!");
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,1563.4287,-1661.0514,10001.0859))
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0)
			{
			    SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			    ClearWepVariables(playerid);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 1;
				format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s %s has taken a badge from their locker.",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
				strmid(eqpdlist,"Cadet\r\nOfficer\r\nDetective\r\nStandard SWAT\r\nMedium SWAT\r\nHeavy SWAT\r\nHigh Command\r\nHealth & Armour",0,sizeof(eqpdlist));
				ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_LSPDDEQ,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"LOADOUTS",eqpdlist,"Select","Cancel");
				return 1;
			}
			else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
			{
			    SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			    ClearWepVariables(playerid);
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pTazerBullets] = 0;
				OnSwatDuty[playerid] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 0;
			    SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 0);
				SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFFFFFF00);
			    SetPlayerSkin(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel]);
			    AttachWeaponCorrectly(playerid, 99);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s %s has put a badge back in their locker.",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
				return 1;
			}
		}
	}
	else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 )
	{
	    if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
	    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0, 881.2885,-1448.7205,1033.7234))
	    {
	        if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0)
			{
			    SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			    ClearWepVariables(playerid);
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 1;
				format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s %s opens their locker, reaching inside.",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
				strmid(emslist,"Firefighter\r\nMedic\r\nHigh Commission\r\nHealth & Armour",0,sizeof(emslist));
				ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSDEQ,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"LOADOUTS",emslist,"Select","Cancel");
				return 1;
			}
			else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
			{
			    SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			    ClearWepVariables(playerid);
		    	PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] = 0;
			    SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 0);
				SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFFFFFF00);
			    SetPlayerSkin(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pModel]);
			    format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s %s opens their locker, reaching inside.",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid));
				ProxDetector(30.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
				return 1;
			}
	    }
	}
	else return SCM(playerid, -1,"** You are not a member of this faction!");
	LogCallback("duty");
	return 1;
}
CMD:equip(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("equip");
	new string[128], eqpdlist[256], emslist[128];
 	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 )
	{
		if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You must be on duty to use this command");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] || PlayerInfo[playerid][pWanted] == 1) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You are either duty banned or a wanted man/woman!");
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,6,1563.4287,-1661.0514,10001.0859))
		{
			SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			ClearWepVariables(playerid);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pTazerBullets] = 0;
  			strmid(eqpdlist,"Cadet\r\nOfficer\r\nDetective\r\nStandard SWAT\r\nMeduim SWAT\r\nHeavy SWAT\r\nHigh Command\r\nHealth & Armour",0,sizeof(eqpdlist));
	    	ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_LSPDDEQ,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"LOADOUTS",eqpdlist,"Select","Cancel");
   			format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s opens their locker up, peering inside.",GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
		}
	}
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 )
	{
		if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You must be on duty to use this command");
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,6, 881.2885,-1448.7205,1033.7234))
		{
			SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			ClearWepVariables(playerid);
			strmid(emslist,"Firefighter\r\nMedic\r\nHigh Commission\r\nHealth & Armour",0,sizeof(emslist));
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSDEQ,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"LOADOUTS",emslist,"Select","Cancel");
   			format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s opens their locker up, reaching inside.",GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
		}
	}
	else return SCM(playerid, -1, "** You are not a member of this faction!");
	LogCallback("equip");
	return 1;
}
CMD:setuniform(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("setuniform");
	new string[128], uniformlist[256], unilist[258];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 )
	{
		if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] || PlayerInfo[playerid][pWanted] == 1) return SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREY,"* You are either duty banned or a wanted man/woman!");
        if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,5.0,1563.4287,-1661.0514,10001.0859))
        {
            strmid(uniformlist,"Cadet Uniform\r\nFemale Uniform\r\nMotorcycle Patrol\r\nOfficer Uniform 1\r\nOfficer Uniform 2\r\nOfficer Uniform 3\r\nOfficer Uniform 4\r\nOfficer Uniform 5\r\nNone\r\nSWAT\r\nHigh Command\r\nChief",0,sizeof(uniformlist));
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_LSPDDUNI,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"UNIFORMS",uniformlist,"Select","Cancel");
            format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s opens their locker up, peering inside.",GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
		}
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 )
	{
		if(!IsPlayerConnected(playerid)) return 1;
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You must be on duty to use this command");
		if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,6, 881.2885,-1448.7205,1033.7234))
		{
			SafeResetPlayerWeapons(playerid);
			ClearWepVariables(playerid);
   			format(string,sizeof(string),"* %s opens their locker up, reaching inside.",GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0,playerid,string,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE,COLOR_PURPLE);
			strmid(unilist,"Fire Fighter 1\r\nFire Fighter 2 \r\nFire Fighter 3\r\nMedic 1\r\nMedic 2\r\nMedic 3\r\nFemale Medic\r\nDoctor",0,sizeof(unilist));
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSDUNI,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"UNIFORMS",unilist,"Select","Cancel");
		}
	}
	else return SCM(playerid, -1, "** You are not a member of this faction!");
	LogCallback("setuniform");
	return 1;
}
CMD:radio(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("setradio");
	new text[128], string[128];
	if(sscanf(params,"s[128]", text)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/r(adio) [Text]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"**You are muted and cannot speak!");
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember])
	{
	    case 1:
	    {
    		format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)%s %s: %s, over.",PlayerInfo[playerid][pUnit],GPN(playerid),text);
     		SendRadioMessage(1,TEAM_RADIO_COLOR,string);
      		SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, TEAM_RADIO_COLOR, 20.0, 7000);
		}
		case 2:
	    {
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)%s %s: %s, over.",PlayerInfo[playerid][pUnit],GPN(playerid),text);
	        SendRadioMessage(2,TEAM_RADIO_COLOR,string);
	        SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, TEAM_RADIO_COLOR, 20.0, 7000);
		}
	}
	return 1;
}
CMD:r(playerid,params[])
{
	return cmd_radio(playerid, params);
}
CMD:departments(playerid,params[])
{
	new text[128], string[128];
	if(sscanf(params,"s[128]", text)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/r(adio) [Text]");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"**You are muted and cannot speak!");
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember])
	{
	    case 1:
	    {
    		format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)%s %s: %s, over.",PlayerInfo[playerid][pUnit],GPN(playerid),text);
     		SendRadioMessageAll(COLOR_ALLDEPT,string);
      		SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, TEAM_RADIO_COLOR, 20.0, 7000);
        }
		case 2:
	    {
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)%s %s: %s, over.",PlayerInfo[playerid][pUnit],GPN(playerid),text);
	        SendRadioMessageAll(COLOR_ALLDEPT,string);
	        SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, string, TEAM_RADIO_COLOR, 20.0, 7000);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("departments");
	return 1;
}
CMD:dr(playerid,params[])
{
	return cmd_departments(playerid, params);
}
CMD:mdc(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("mdc");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not on Duty!");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are Banned From Cop Duty!");
		if(GetPlayerInterior(playerid) == 10 || IsACopCar(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 20.0, 1794.2822,-1530.9763,5700.4287))
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
			{
				new string[128];
				SCM(playerid,TEAM_BLUE_COLOR,"|___________ LSPD Mobile Data Center(MDC)___________|");
				SCM(playerid,COLOR_WHITE,"Welcome Back to the LSPD Mobile Data Computer");
				format(string,sizeof(string),"Now logged in as %s",GPN(playerid));
				SCM(playerid,COLOR_GREEN,string);
				mdcStep[playerid] = 1;
				ShowServerDialog(playerid,MDC_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"MDC","Search a suspect\r\n911 Calls\r\nCheck Licenses","Continue", " ");
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You must be on duty to use this command");
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You are not near an MDC ");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You are not allowed to use this command");
	LogCallback("mdc");
	return 1;
}
CMD:emergencydispatch(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("emergencydispatch");
	new string[128];
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
    {
        SCM(playerid,-1,"|______________Emergency CALLOUTS______________|");
    	for(new i = 0; i < MAX_EMSCALLS; i ++)
	    {
     		if(EMSCall[i][EMSCallUsed] == true)
       		{
         		format(string,sizeof(string),"%s\r\n",EMSCall[i][EMSCallText]);
				SCM(playerid,-1,string);
				break;
    		}

		}
	}else return SCM(playerid,COLOR_RED," *You are not a part of the Los Santos Fire Department!");
	LogCallback("emergencydispatch");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ed(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_emergencydispatch(playerid, params);
}
CMD:respondtocallout(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("respondtocallout");
	new cid, string[128];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{

	    if(sscanf(params,"d",cid)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/respondtocallout(ac) [Dispatch ID]");
	    if(cid >= 0 && cid < MAX_PDCALLS)
	    {
	        if(PDCall[cid][PDCallUsed] == false) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* Dispatch ID is unfound.");
			format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)Dispatch Says: %s %s has accepted the Dispatch ID: %d",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid),pdcallID[playerid]);
			SendRadioMessage(1,COLOR_BLUE,string);
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)Dispatch Says:%s",PDCall[cid][PDCallText]);
	        SCM(playerid,COLOR_BLUE,string);
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)Dispatch Says:%s",PDCall[cid][PDCallLocation]);
	        SCM(playerid,COLOR_BLUE,string);
	        ClearThisPDCall(pdcallID[cid]);
	    }
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{

	    if(sscanf(params,"d",cid)) return SCM(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/respondtocallout(ac) [Dispatch ID]");
	    if(cid >= 0 && cid < MAX_EMSCALLS)
	    {
	        if(EMSCall[cid][EMSCallUsed] == false) return SCM(playerid,-1,"*emergency Dispatch ID is unfound.");
			format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)Dispatch Says: %s %s has accepted the emergency Dispatch ID: %d",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid),emscallID[playerid]);
			SendRadioMessage(2,COLOR_RED,string);
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)Dispatch Says:%s",EMSCall[cid][EMSCallText]);
	        SCM(playerid,COLOR_RED,string);
	        format(string,sizeof(string),"(Radio)Dispatch Says:%s",EMSCall[cid][EMSCallLocation]);
	        SCM(playerid,COLOR_RED,string);
	        ClearThisEMSCall(emscallID[cid]);
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("respondtocallout");
	return 1;
}
CMD:rtco(playerid,params[])
{
	return cmd_respondtocallout(playerid,params);
}
CMD:arrest(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("arrest");
	if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 6, 1572.1915,-1654.5251,10001.0859) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 6, 201.0256,168.3393,1003.0234) || IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 6, 222.2311,121.3434,999.0239))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
		{
			new playa;
			if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:arrest [playerid]");
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not on Duty!");
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are Banned From Cop Duty!");
			if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
			{
				arrestStep[playerid] = 1;
				arresting[playerid] = playa;
		    	//ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_LIST,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Please Fill out the following","Arresting Officer{FF0000}[Blank]{FFFFFF}\r\nSuspect Name{FF0000}[Blank]{FFFFFF}\r\nCharges{FF0000}[Blank]{FFFFFF}\r\nAddition Info{FF0000}[Blank]{FFFFFF}\r\nSubmit","Select","Cancel");
				SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"Time to fill out that paperwork.");
				ShowServerDialog(playerid,ARREST_REPORT_INPUT,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"What is your name?","Please type your full name to continue","Okay","Cancel");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("arrest");
	return 1;
}
CMD:su(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("su");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
		new playa;
		if(sscanf(params,"u",playa)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/su(supect) [playerid] [charge]");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 0) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "   You are not on Duty!");
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDBanned] == 1) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "** You are Banned From Cop Duty!");
		if(playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID && IsPlayerConnected(playa))
		{
			suIng[playerid] = playa;
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,CHARGE_DIALOG,DIALOG_STYLE_INPUT,"Charge","Please input the desired charge below","Continue","Cancel");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("su");
	return 1;
}
CMD:ta(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_tazer(playerid, params);
}
CMD:tazer(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("tazer");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1)
	{
	    new string[128];
	    if(Tazer[playerid] == 0)
	    {
	        Tazer[playerid] = 1;
			SetPlayerAmmo(playerid, 24, 0);
			SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 23, 6);
			SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_PISTOL_SILENCED, 500);
   			OnePlayAnim(playerid,"SWORD","sword_block",50.0,0,1,1,1,1);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s holsters their Desert Deagle and unholsters their Tazer.", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			return 1;
		}
        if(Tazer[playerid] == 1)
		{
			Tazer[playerid] = 0;
			SetPlayerAmmo(playerid, 23, 0);
			SafeGivePlayerWeapon(playerid, 24, 100);
			SetPlayerSkillLevel(playerid, WEAPONSKILL_PISTOL_SILENCED, PlayerInfo[playerid][pSilenSkill]);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s hostlers their tazer and Unhostlers their Deagle.", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			return 1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("tazer");
    return 1;
}
CMD:copcar(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("copcar");
    new dialog[128];
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
		if(pCopCar[playerid] != -1) return SCM(playerid, -1, "You already have a cop car out!, type /destroycopcar to before you get a new one!");
		if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, 1568.5933,-1689.9713,6.2188)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not at the LSPD Garage");
		else
		{
			strmid(dialog,"Regular Patrol\r\nTraffic Division\r\nHighway Division\r\nSWAT Divsion\r\nDetective Bureau\r\nHigh Commissioner",0,sizeof(dialog));
			ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_COPCARS,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Police Divison",dialog,"Select Division","Cancel");
		}
	}
	else  { SCM(playerid, -1, "You are not in the LSPD!"); }
	LogCallback("copcar");
	return 1;
}
CMD:dcc(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_destroycopcar(playerid, params);
}
CMD:destroycopcar(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("destroycopcar");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1)
	{
		DestroyVehicle(pCopCar[playerid]);
		CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cWcart] = 0;
		CarInfo[pCopCar[playerid]][cOID] = -1;
		pCopCar[playerid] = -1;
	}
	LogCallback("destroycopcar");
	return 1;
}
CMD:emscar(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("emscar");
    if(pEmsCar[playerid] != -1) return SCM(playerid, -1, "You already have a LSFD car out!, type /destroyemscar to before you get a new one!");
    if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 5.0, 2027.0111,-1445.7130,16.8882)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are not at the EMS Garage");
    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 )
    {
		new dialog[70];
  		strmid(dialog,"Ambulance\r\nRancher\r\nEMS Raindance\r\nFiretruck",0,sizeof(dialog));
		ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_EMSCARS,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"EMS Cars",dialog,"Okay","Cancel");
	}
	else { SCM(playerid, -1, "You are not in the LSMD!"); }
	LogCallback("emscar");
	return 1;
}
CMD:dec(playerid, params[])
{
	return cmd_destroyemscar(playerid, params);
}
CMD:destroyemscar(playerid, params[])
{
	LogCallback("destroyemscar");
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2)
	{
		DestroyVehicle(pEmsCar[playerid]);
		CarInfo[pEmsCar[playerid]][cWcart] = 0;
		CarInfo[pEmsCar[playerid]][cOID] = -1;
		pEmsCar[playerid] = -1;
	}
	LogCallback("destroyemscar");
	return 1;
}

CMD:gov(playerid,params[])
{
	LogCallback("gov");
	new result[128],y,m,d,h,mi,s;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	gettime(h,mi,s);
 	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMuted] == 1) return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are muted and can't talk at the moment!");
  	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pBanned] == 1) SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are banned from the force!");
  	if(sscanf(params, "s[128]", result)) return SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD2,"USAGE: /gov [text]");
  	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 1 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10)
  	{
        SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_WHITE, "|___________ Los Santos Police Department News Announcement ___________|");
	    format(tstring, sizeof(tstring),"%s %s: %s",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid),result);
	    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_BLUE, tstring);
		format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "[%d/%d/%d](%d:%d:%d) %s (/GOVLSPD): (%s)",d,m,y,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid), result);
		RadioChatLog(cstring);
  	}
  	else if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pMember] == 2 && PlayerInfo[playerid][pRank] >= 10)
  	{
  	    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_WHITE, "|___________ Los Santos Fire Department News Announcement ___________|");
 	    format(tstring, sizeof(tstring),"%s %s: %s",GetFactionRank(playerid),GPN(playerid),result);
	    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_RED, tstring);
		format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "[%d/%d/%d](%d:%d:%d) %s (/GOVEMS): (%s)",d,m,y,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid), result);
		RadioChatLog(cstring);
  	}
  	else { SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You cannot use this command"); }
	LogCallback("gov");
  	return 1;
}

	    SendClientMessageToAll(COLOR_RED, tstring);
		format(cstring, sizeof(cstring), "[%d/%d/%d](%d:%d:%d) %s (/GOVEMS): (%s)",d,m,y,h,mi,s, GPN(playerid), result);
		RadioChatLog(cstring);
	}
	else return SCM(playerid,-1,"* You are not a member of a goverment faction or a high enough level.");
	return 1;
}*/
/**** REPEATING TIMERS Y_TIMERS ****/

/**** PTASK Y_TIMERS ****/
ptask AFKCheck[300000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("AFKCheck");
	GetPlayerPos(playerid, PlayerPos[playerid][0], PlayerPos[playerid][1], PlayerPos[playerid][2]);
	/*if(PlayerPos[playerid][0] == PlayerPos[playerid][3] && PlayerPos[playerid][1] == PlayerPos[playerid][4] && PlayerPos[playerid][2] == PlayerPos[playerid][5])
	{
		if(AFKTimer[playerid] == 0)
		{
			if(LastTyped[playerid] >= 2)
			{
				AFKTimer[playerid] = 300; new afkstring[64];
				GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~You are now set as AFK",5000,1);
				format(afkstring, sizeof(afkstring), "AFK: %d seconds", AFKTimer[playerid]);
				SetPlayerChatBubble(playerid, afkstring, COLOR_PINK, 30.0, 1000);
			}
		}
	}*/
	PlayerPos[playerid][3] = PlayerPos[playerid][0];
	PlayerPos[playerid][4] = PlayerPos[playerid][1];
	PlayerPos[playerid][5] = PlayerPos[playerid][2];
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pFishes] >= 5) { if(FishCount[playerid] >= 3) { PlayerInfo[playerid][pFishes] = 0; } else { FishCount[playerid] += 1; } }
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayDayHad] < 6) { PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayDayHad] += 1; }  /*** PREVENT PAYDAY ABOOSE ***/
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pDuty] == 1 || JobDuty[playerid] == 1) { DutyTime[playerid] += 1; }     /*** PREVENT LEO PAYDAY ABOOSE ***/
	LogCallback("AFKCheck");
	return 1;
}



ptask FallCheck[750](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("FallCheck");
	new Float:HP;
	switch(GetPlayerAnimationIndex(playerid))
	{
		case 1129:
		{
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HP);
			SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HP - 15);
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
		}
		case 1208:
		{
			if(GetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid) < 4500)
			{
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HP);
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HP - 35);
				SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 5000);
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("Fallcheck");
	return 1;
}



ptask CheckCarHealth[10000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("CheckCarHealth");
	if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return 0;
	if(GetPlayerState(playerid) != PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER) return 0;
	new
		string[128],
		Float:health,
		E,L,A,D,H,T,O,
		id = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)
	;
	GetVehicleHealth(id,health);
	GetVehicleParamsEx(id,E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
	if(health <= 350 && !IsModelABoat(id) && !IsModelABike(id) && !IsAPlane(id) && !IsAHeli(id))
	{
		if(E == 1)
		{
			SetVehicleParamsEx(id,0,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE, "Your vehicle is broken, start the engine up or call a mechanic (/call 555)!");
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* Vehicle engine brakes down (( %s ))", GPN(playerid));
			ProxDetector(30.0, playerid, string, COLOR_FADE1,COLOR_FADE2,COLOR_FADE3,COLOR_FADE4,COLOR_FADE5);
			CanTurnEngine[playerid] = 9999;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("CheckCarHealth");
	return 1;
}

ptask StoppedVehicle[40000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("StoppedVehicle");
	LastTyped[playerid] += 1;
	if(!IsPlayerInAnyVehicle(playerid)) return 0;
	if(GetPlayerState(playerid) != PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER) return 0;
	new
		VID = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid),
		Float:SVPos[4],
		E,L,A,D,H,T,O,
		value
	;
	GetVehicleParamsEx(VID,E,L,A,D,H,T,O);
	if(E == 1)
	{
		GetPlayerPos(playerid, SVPos[0], SVPos[1], SVPos[2]);
		SVPos[2] = floatsqroot(floatpower(floatabs(floatsub(SVPos[0],SavePlayerPos[playerid][LastX])),2)+floatpower(floatabs(floatsub(SVPos[1],SavePlayerPos[playerid][LastY])),2)+floatpower(floatabs(floatsub(SVPos[2],SavePlayerPos[playerid][LastZ])),2));
		value = floatround(SVPos[3] * 3600);
		if(UpdateSeconds > 1)
		{
			value = floatround(value / UpdateSeconds);
		}
		if(value == 0)
		{
			Gas[VID] -= 1;
		}
		SavePlayerPos[playerid][LastX] = SVPos[0];
		SavePlayerPos[playerid][LastY] = SVPos[1];
		SavePlayerPos[playerid][LastZ] = SVPos[2];
	}
	if(E == 1)
	{
		if(Gas[VID] >= 1)
		{
			if(Gas[VID] <= 10)
			{
				PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1085, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
				if(gGas[playerid] == 0)
				{
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Fuel is low");
				}
			}
			if(IsAHeli(VID) || IsAPlane(VID) || IsModelABycicle(VID) || IsModelABoat(VID))
			{
				Gas[VID] = 100;
			}
			else
			{
				Gas[VID] -= 1;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			NoFuel[playerid] = 1;
			SetVehicleParamsEx(VID,0,L,A,D,H,T,O);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have run out of fuel");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("StoppedVehicle");
	return 1;
}

ptask OtherTimer[1000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("OtherTimer");
    new
		string[128],
		zone[MAX_ZONE_NAME]
	;
	if(GetPlayerPing(playerid) > MaxPing)
	{
		if(FirstSpawn[playerid] == 0)
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 1)
			{
				new d,m,y,h,mi,s;
				getdate(y,m,d); gettime(h,mi,s);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You have Been Kicked by The Anticheat For Exceeding the Maximun Ping");
				format(string,sizeof(string), "(%d/%d/%d)[%d:%d:%d] Anticheat Has Kicked %s for: Exceeding the Maximun Ping",d,m,y,h,mi,s,GPN(playerid));
				KickLog(string);
				ServerKick(playerid);
			}
		}
	}
	switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pInteriorNr])
	{
		case 0:
		{
			GetPlayer2DRadarZone(playerid, zone, MAX_ZONE_NAME);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"%s",zone);
			PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], string);
		}
		case 1:  { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "L.S.P.D"); }
		case 2:  { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "City Hall"); }
		case 3:  { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Bank"); }
		case 4:  { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "FBI HQ"); }
		case 6:  { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Yamaguchi HQ"); }
		case 7:  { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "La Vice HQ"); }
		case 8:  { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Bratva HQ"); }
		case 9:  { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Surenos HQ"); }
		case 10: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Regulars Lounge"); }
		case 11: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "DMW"); }
		case 12: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "24/7"); }
		case 13: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Ammunation"); }
		case 14: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Weapon Store"); }
		case 15: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Gym"); }
		case 16: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Binco"); }
		case 17: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Pig Pen");}
		case 18: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Alhambra"); }
		case 20: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Cluckin' Bell"); }
		case 21: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Burger Shot"); }
		case 22: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Pizza Shack"); }
		case 23: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Firemen HQ"); }
		case 24: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Hitmen HQ"); }
		case 25: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "DD Stadium"); }
		case 26: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Ten Green"); }
		case 28: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Los Santos Airlines"); }
		case 29: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Hospital"); }
		case 30: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Donut Store"); }
		case 31: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Le Signatra HQ"); }
		case 32: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "ABC Studio"); }
		case 33: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Yellow Cab HQ"); }
		case 34: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Sex Shop"); }
		case 35: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Sub Urban"); }
		case 36: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "ZIP"); }
		case 37: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Victim"); }
		case 38: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Restaurant"); }
		case 39: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "House"); }
		case 40: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Sons of Anarchy HQ"); }
		case 41: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Ministery of ~n~Defense HQ"); }
		case 42: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Grove HQ"); }
		case 43: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid], "Vagos HQ"); }
		case 44: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid,MapareaTD[playerid],"Crack Den");}
		default: { PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, MapareaTD[playerid], ""); }
	}
	if(CellTime[playerid] > 0)
	{
		if(CellTime[playerid] == cchargetime)
		{
			CellTime[playerid] = 1;
			if(Mobile[Mobile[playerid]] == playerid)
			{
				CallCost[playerid] = CallCost[playerid]+callcost;
			}
		}
		CellTime[playerid] = CellTime[playerid] +1;
		if (Mobile[Mobile[playerid]] == 255 && CellTime[playerid] == 5)
		{
			if(IsPlayerConnected(Mobile[playerid]))
			{
				format(string, sizeof(string), "* %s's phone rings.", GPN(Mobile[playerid]));
				RingTone[Mobile[playerid]] = 10;
				ProxDetector(30.0, Mobile[playerid], string, COLOR_CHAT1,COLOR_CHAT2,COLOR_CHAT3,COLOR_CHAT4,COLOR_CHAT5);
			}
		}
	}
	if(CellTime[playerid] == 0 && CallCost[playerid] > 0)
	{
		SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -CallCost[playerid]);
		format(string, sizeof(string), "The call cost $%d",CallCost[playerid]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, string);
		CallCost[playerid] = 0;
	}
	LogCallback("OtherTimer");
	return 1;
}

ptask OtherTimer2[1000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("OtherTimer2");
	new string[128];
	ALTTAB[playerid] += 1;
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularCount] > 0)
	{
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pRegularCount] -= 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmuTrainTime] > 0)
	{
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pAmmuTrainTime] -= 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] > 0)
	{
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pRobTime] -= 1;
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] > 0)
	{
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] -= 1;
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] == 1)
		{
			SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 0);
			SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTRED,"You have died of a drug addiction");
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pAddictTime] = 0;
		}
	}
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pConnectSeconds] += 1;

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0] != 0)
	{
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0] -= 1;
		format(string, sizeof(string),"Time Left in Jail: %d Seconds.",PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime]);
		PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid],string);
	}
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailed] > 0)
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0] == PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][1])
		{
			if(AllowedLawyer[playerid] == 1)
			{
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, " ** You may now /call 222 for a lawyer to come and release you");
			}
		}
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0] <= 0)
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][0] = 0;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailTime][1] = 0;
			switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailed])
			{
				case 1: { SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1545.2786,-1675.7449,13.5601); StreamPlayer(playerid); }
				case 2: { SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1175.3320,-1335.6504,17.3822); StreamPlayer(playerid); }
				case 3: { SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1518.5179,-1452.9224,14.2031); StreamPlayer(playerid); }
				case 4: { SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 2717.5845,-2399.2510,13.6328); StreamPlayer(playerid); }
				case 5: { SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 1782.7220,-1599.7756,13.5391); StreamPlayer(playerid); }
			}
			SafeSetPlayerInterior(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid, 0);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pJailed] = 0;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1,"Warden: You've been released from jail.");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1,"Warden: Think about the time, before you do the crime.");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD1,"Freedom! Try to be a better citizen!");
			if(gTeam[playerid] == 4) { gTeam[playerid] = 3; }
			ClearCrime(playerid);
			AllowedLawyer[playerid] = 0;
			SetPlayerColor(playerid,0xFFFFFF00);
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, Jailtimetd[playerid]);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("OtherTimer2");
	return 1;
}

/**** TASK Y_TIMERS ****/
task VIPCountdown[86400000]()
{
	LogCallback("VIPCountdown");
	new
		y, m, d,
		string[128]
	;
	getdate(y,m,d);
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[i][pVIPDays] >= 1)
			{
				PlayerInfo[i][pVIPDays] -= 1;
			}
		}
	}
	mysql_query("UPDATE `samp_users` SET VIPDays = VIPDays-1");
	format(string, sizeof(string), "[VIP UPDATE][%d-%d-%d] Daily VIP Update Complete", y,m,d);
	VIPLog(string);
	LogCallback("VIPCountdown");
	return 1;
}

task SaveAccounts[1080000]()
{
	LogCallback("SaveAccounts");
	foreach(Player, i)
	{
		if(IsPlayerConnected(i))
		{
			OnPlayerUpdateEx(i);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("SaveAccounts");
	return 1;
}

task SyncUp[60000]()
{
	LogCallback("SyncUp");
	SyncTime();
	DollahScoreUpdate();
	LogCallback("SyncUp");
	return 1;
}

task ClockTimer[1000]()
{
	LogCallback("ClockTimer");
	new string[128];
	if(SecondsTD < 59)
	{
		SecondsTD ++;
	}
	else
	{
		SecondsTD = 0;
		MinutesTD ++;
	}
	if(MinutesTD == 60)
	{
		MinutesTD = 0;
		HoursTD ++;
	}
	if(HoursTD > 23)
	{
		HoursTD = 0;
	}
	switch(MinutesTD)
	{
		case 0 .. 9: { format(string, sizeof(string),":0%d",MinutesTD); }
		default:     { format(string, sizeof(string),":%d",MinutesTD); }
	}
	TextDrawSetString(MinsTD, string);
	switch(SecondsTD)
	{
		case 0 .. 9: { format(string, sizeof(string),":0%d",SecondsTD); }
		default:     { format(string, sizeof(string),":%d",SecondsTD); }
	}
	TextDrawSetString(SecsTD, string);
	switch(HoursTD)
	{
		case 0 .. 9: { format(string, sizeof(string),"0%d",HoursTD); }
		default:     { format(string, sizeof(string),"%d",HoursTD); }

	}
	TextDrawSetString(HrsTD, string);
	LogCallback("ClockTimer");
	return 1;
}

/****** PLAYER TIMERS Y_TIMERS ******/

timer speedometer[100](playerid, vehicleid)
{
	LogCallback("speedometer");
	if(GetPlayerState(playerid) != PLAYER_STATE_DRIVER)
	{
		stop SpeedoTimer[playerid];
		return 1;
	}
	new
		Float:hp,
		hstring[36],
		sstring[36],
		fstring[36]
	;
	GetVehicleHealth(vehicleid,hp);
	switch(floatround(hp,floatround_round))
	{
		case 0 .. 400:    { hstring = "~w~HEALTH:     ~r~Call a Mechanic"; }
		case 401 .. 600:  { hstring = "~w~HEALTH:     ~r~Badly Damaged"; }
		case 601 .. 800:  { hstring = "~w~HEALTH:     ~y~Damaged"; }
		case 801 .. 1001: { hstring = "~w~HEALTH:     ~g~Good"; }
	}
	switch(GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true))
	{
		case 0 .. 80:     { format(sstring, sizeof(sstring), "~w~SPEED:       ~g~~h~%d ~w~KM/h", GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true)); }
		case 81 .. 120:   { format(sstring, sizeof(sstring), "~w~SPEED:       ~y~~h~%d ~w~KM/h", GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true));}
		case 121 .. 2000: { format(sstring, sizeof(sstring), "~w~SPEED:       ~r~~h~%d ~w~KM/h", GetPlayerSpeed(playerid, true)); }
	}
	switch(gGas[playerid])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			if(IsModelABoat(vehicleid) || IsModelABycicle(vehicleid) || IsAHeli(vehicleid))
			{
				format(fstring, sizeof(fstring), "~w~FUEL:         ~g~~h~N/A");
			}
			else
			{
				switch(Gas[vehicleid])
				{
					case 10 .. 110: { format(fstring, sizeof(fstring), "~w~FUEL:         ~g~~h~%d/~w~100",Gas[vehicleid]); }
					default: { format(fstring, sizeof(fstring), "~w~FUEL:         ~r~~h~%d/~w~100",Gas[vehicleid]); }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, CarHealthTD[playerid], hstring);
	PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, Speedometer[playerid], sstring);
	PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, Fueltd[playerid], fstring);
	LogCallback("speedometer");
	return 1;
}


timer PlayerPosSave[10000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("PlayerPosSave");
	if(gPlayerLogged[playerid] == 1)
	{
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pInt] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pVirWorld] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
		GetPlayerPos(playerid, PlayerInfo[playerid][pPos_x], PlayerInfo[playerid][pPos_y], PlayerInfo[playerid][pPos_z]);
		GetPlayerHealth(playerid,PlayerInfo[playerid][pHealth]);
		GetPlayerArmour(playerid,PlayerInfo[playerid][pArmour]);
	}
	LogCallback("PlayerPosSave");
	return 1;
}

timer StopAlarm[30000](vehicleid, playerid)
{
	LogCallback("StopAlarm");
	new engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective;
	GetVehicleParamsEx(vehicleid, engine, lights, alarm, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
	SetVehicleParamsEx(vehicleid, engine, lights, VEHICLE_PARAMS_OFF, doors, hood, trunk, objective);
	stop alarmtimer[playerid];
	LogCallback("StopAlarm");
	return 1;
}

timer accidentroll[100](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("accidentroll");
	stop accidenttimer[playerid];
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, "PARACHUTE", "FALL_skyDive_DIE",4,0,0,0,1,0);
	accidenttimer[playerid] = defer accidentrecovery(playerid);
	LogCallback("accidentroll");
	return 1;
}

timer accidentrecovery[2000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("accidentrecovery");
	stop accidenttimer[playerid];
	SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
	ApplyAnimation(playerid,"PED","WALK_DRUNK",4,0,1,1,1,0);
	accidenttimer[playerid] = defer accidentfinal(playerid);
	LogCallback("accidentrecovery");
	return 1;
}

timer accidentfinal[3600](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("accidentfinal");
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	stop accidenttimer[playerid];
	SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
	ApplyAnimation(playerid,"PED","KO_skid_front",4,0,0,0,1,0);
	LogCallback("accidentfinal");
	return 1;
}

timer DMVCutsceneEnd1[8000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("DMVCutsceneEnd1");
	stop cutscenetimer[playerid];
	SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen1TD);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen2TD);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, DMVInterTD);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, DMVscgTD);
	showalltds(playerid);
	LogCallback("DMVCutsceneEnd1");
	return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("DMVCutsceneEnd2");
	stop cutscenetimer[playerid];

	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen1TD);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen2TD);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, DMVrememTD);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, DMVscgTD);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, DMVCorrectTD);
	showalltds(playerid);
	LogCallback("DMVCutsceneEnd2");
	return 1;
}

{
	LogCallback("DMVCutsceneEnd3");
	stop cutscenetimer[playerid];
	SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen1TD);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, Widescreen2TD);

	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, DMVscgTD);
	TextDrawHideForPlayer(playerid, DMVremembitTD);
	showalltds(playerid);
	LogCallback("DMVCutsceneEnd3");
	return 1;
}

timer ReportReset[60000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ReportReset");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
	    if(JustReported[playerid] == 1)
	    {
			stop retimer[playerid];
			JustReported[playerid] = 0;
	    }
	}
	LogCallback("ReportReset");
	return 1;
}

timer ClearSus[2900](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ClearSus");
	if(IsPlayerConnected(playerid))
	{
		if(aSus[playerid] >= 1)
		{
		    aSus[playerid] = 0;
		}
		if(wSus[playerid] >= 1)
		{
			wSus[playerid] = 0;
		}
		stop wSusTime[playerid];
	}
	LogCallback("ClearSus");
	return 1;
}

timer RentalCars[3600000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("RentalCars");
	if(HireCar[playerid] != 299)
	{
		new idcar = GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid);
		if(idcar == HireCar[playerid])
	    {
	        TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	    }
	    SetVehicleToRespawn(HireCar[playerid]);
		SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
		HireCar[playerid] = 299;
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "Your rental vehicle has been returned");
		stop rentaltimer[playerid];
	}
	LogCallback("RentalCars");
	return 1;
}

timer TaxiMeter[2000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("TaxiMeter");
	if(CarInfo[GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid)][cWcart] == 2)
	{
		foreach(Player, i)
		{
			if(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid) == GetPlayerVehicleID(i))
			{
				new
					mtext[64],
					Float:drPOS[3],
					Float:distance = GetPlayerDistanceFromPoint(playerid, TaxiPOS[playerid][0],TaxiPOS[playerid][1],TaxiPOS[playerid][2])
				;
				switch(floatround(distance,floatround_round))
				{
					case 10 .. 39:   { TaxiFare[playerid] += 1; }
					case 40 .. 79:   { TaxiFare[playerid] += 2; }
					case 80 .. 149:  { TaxiFare[playerid] += 3; }
					case 150 .. 250: { TaxiFare[playerid] += 4; }
				}
				format(mtext, sizeof(mtext), "YOUR TOTAL FARE:     ~g~$%d.00", TaxiFare[playerid]);
				if(TaxiFare[playerid] > GetPlayerCash(playerid))
				{
				    RemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
				    return 1;
				}
				PlayerTextDrawSetString(i, TaxiFareCostTD[i], mtext); GetPlayerPos(playerid, drPOS[0], drPOS[1], drPOS[2]);
				TaxiPOS[playerid][0] = drPOS[0]; TaxiPOS[playerid][1] = drPOS[1]; TaxiPOS[playerid][2] = drPOS[2];
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("TaxiMeter");
	return 1;
}

timer BoxTrain[25000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("BoxTrain");
	switch(Training[playerid])
	{
		case 0:
		{
			Training[playerid] = 1;
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, 266.8890);
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 768.1064,14.3897,1000.6992);
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 765.4290,8.6809,1000.7123);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 768.1064,14.3897,1000.6992);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GYMNASIUM","GYMshadowbox",4.1,1,1,1,1,25000);
			SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
			ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "TRAINING BOXING");
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			BarType[playerid] = 3; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 25;
			jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		}
		case 1:
		{
			Training[playerid] = 2;
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			JobBarUpdate(playerid);
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 771.5601,11.3144,1000.7026);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 768.1064,14.3897,1000.6992);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GYMNASIUM","GYMshadowbox",4.1,1,1,1,1,25000);
			SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
			ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "TRAINING BOXING");
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			BarType[playerid] = 3; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 25;
			jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		}
		case 2:
		{
			Training[playerid] = 3;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pFS] = 1;
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			JobBarUpdate(playerid);
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 772.9484,-0.2051,1000.7241);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 768.1064,14.3897,1000.6992);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"GYMNASIUM","GYMshadowbox",4.1,1,1,1,1,25000);
			SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
			ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "TRAINING BOXING");
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			BarType[playerid] = 3; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 25;
			jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		}
		case 3:
		{
			stop TrainTimer[playerid];
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid); SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GRAD5, "Your Training Has Finished,Now, You are Skilled at Boxing Fight Style!");
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pBoxiSkill] = 1; SetPlayerSkills(playerid);
			Training[playerid] = -1; SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -15000);
			BizzInfo[14][bTill] += 4950; OnPropUpdate(2,14);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("BoxTrain");
	return 1;
}

			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 300.0852,-138.6679,1004.0625);

			ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);

			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			BarType[playerid] = 4; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 35;
			jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		}
		case 2:
		{
			Training[playerid] = 3;
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			JobBarUpdate(playerid);
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 276.2324,-143.4495,1004.0625);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 300.0852,-138.6679,1004.0625);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"COLT45","colt45_fire",4.0,1,1,1,1,35000);
			SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
			ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "TRAINING COLT45");
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			BarType[playerid] = 4; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 35;
			jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		}
		case 3:
		{
			stop TrainTimer[playerid];
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPistSkill] += 40;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Your Colt45 Training has Successfully Finished, Your skill is now 40+ Higher");
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1056,0.0,0.0,0.0); SetPlayerSkills(playerid);
			Training[playerid] = -1; SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -50);
			if(DoubleXP == true)
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pPistSkill] += 40;
			    SendClientMessage(playerid,0xFFFF00FF,"You have recieved 40 extra skill points due to double xp");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("TrainPistol");
	return 1;
}

			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			BarType[playerid] = 4; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 35;
			jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		}
		case 3:
		{
			stop TrainTimer[playerid];
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid);
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pSilenSkill] += 45;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Your Silenced Training has Successfully Finished, Your skill is now 45+ Higher");
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1056,0.0,0.0,0.0);
			SetPlayerSkills(playerid);
			Training[playerid] = -1;
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -75);
			if(DoubleXP == true)
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pSilenSkill] += 40;
			    SendClientMessage(playerid,0xFFFF00FF,"You have recieved 40 extra skill points due to double xp");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("TrainSilenced");
	return 1;
}

			if(DoubleXP == true)
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pUziSkill] += 40;
			    SendClientMessage(playerid,0xFFFF00FF,"You have recieved 40 extra skill points due to double xp");
			}
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pUziSkill] >= 800) {PlayerInfo[playerid][pUziSkill] = 800;}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("TrainUzi");
	return 1;
}

timer TrainAk47[45000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("TrainAk47");
	switch(Training[playerid])
	{
		case 0:
		{
			Training[playerid] = 1;
			stop TrainTimer[playerid];
			TrainTimer[playerid] = repeat TrainAk47(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
			SetPlayerFacingAngle(playerid, 93.0408);
			SafeSetPlayerPos(playerid, 300.2353,-133.9278,1004.0625);
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 293.5121,-136.3682,1004.0625);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 300.2353,-133.9278,1004.0625);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"RIFLE","RIFLE_fire_poor",4.0,1,1,1,1,45000);

			SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "TRAINING AK RIFLE");
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			BarType[playerid] = 5; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 45;
			jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		}
		case 1:
		{
			Training[playerid] = 2;
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			JobBarUpdate(playerid);
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 287.7752,-132.1296,1004.0625);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 300.2353,-133.9278,1004.0625);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"RIFLE","RIFLE_fire",4.0,1,1,1,1,45000);

			SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0); ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "TRAINING AK RIFLE");
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			BarType[playerid] = 5; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 45;
			jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		}
		case 2:
		{
			Training[playerid] = 3;
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			JobBarUpdate(playerid);
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 285.1598,-126.8113,1004.0625);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 300.2353,-133.9278,1004.0625);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"RIFLE","RIFLE_crouchfire",4.0,1,1,1,1,45000);

			SetPlayerProgressBarValue(playerid,JobBar[playerid],0.0);
			ShowPlayerProgressBar(playerid, JobBar[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawSetString(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid], "TRAINING AK RIFLE");
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDTextTD[playerid]); PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, JobCDBoxTD[playerid]);
			BarType[playerid] = 5; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 45;
			jobcdtimer[playerid] = SetTimerEx("JobBarUpdate", 1000, true, "i", playerid);
		}
		case 3:
		{
			stop TrainTimer[playerid];
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			SetCameraBehindPlayer(playerid); SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1); PlayerInfo[playerid][pAkSkill] += 30;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_GREY, "* Your AK-47 Training has Successfully Finished, Your skill is now 30+ Higher");
			PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1056,0.0,0.0,0.0); SetPlayerSkills(playerid);
			Training[playerid] = -1; SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -140);
			if(DoubleXP == true)
			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pAkSkill] += 40;
			    SendClientMessage(playerid,0xFFFF00FF,"You have recieved 40 extra skill points due to double xp");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("TrainAk47");
	return 1;
}

	LogCallback("TrainM4");
    switch(Training[playerid])
	{
		case 0:

			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 293.5121,-136.3682,1004.0625);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 300.2353,-133.9278,1004.0625);

			BarType[playerid] = 5; JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 45;

		}
		case 1:
		{
			Training[playerid] = 2;
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = 0;
			JobBarUpdate(playerid);
			SetPlayerCameraPos(playerid, 287.7752,-132.1296,1004.0625);
			SetPlayerCameraLookAt(playerid, 300.2353,-133.9278,1004.0625);

		}

			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1); PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4Skill] += 30;

			{
			    PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4Skill] += 40;
			    SendClientMessage(playerid,0xFFFF00FF,"You have recieved 40 extra skill points due to double xp");
			}
			if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4Skill] >= 800) {PlayerInfo[playerid][pM4Skill] = 800;}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("TrainM4");
	return 1;
}


timer NextPizzaBoyLocation[5000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("NextPizzaBoyLocation");
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	PizzaBoy[playerid] += 1;
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,1);
	switch(PizzaBoy[playerid])
	{
		case 1 .. 4, 6 .. 9, 11 .. 15:
		{
			new
				h = RandomEx(1,750),
				t = RandomEx(1,10),
				string[128]
			;
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 15;
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, t);
			SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, HouseInfo[h][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[h][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[h][hEntrancez],1.5,29,0);
			pizzabox[playerid] = CreateDynamicPickup(1582, 1, HouseInfo[h][hEntrancex], HouseInfo[h][hEntrancey], HouseInfo[h][hEntrancez],-1,-1,playerid,250.0);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "* $15 was added to your paycheck, and you were given a $%d cash tip. Head to the next customer's house.", t);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, string);
		}
		case 5, 10:
		{
			SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,JobIcons[7][0], JobIcons[7][1], JobIcons[7][2],2.0,29,0);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_ORANGE, "Head back to the resturaunt and pick up more pizzas");
		}
	}
	ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
	animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
	LogCallback("NextPizzaBoyLocation");
	return 1;
}

timer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ResetAnimation");
	switch(ClearAnims[playerid])
	{
		case 0:
		{
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
			ClearAnims[playerid] = 1;
		}
		case 1:
		{
			stop animreset[playerid];
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			ClearAnims[playerid] = -1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("ResetAnimation");
	return 1;
}

timer DeliverHarvest[5000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("DeliverHarvest");
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	if(Farming[playerid] == 40)
	{
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 50000; SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
		DPCP(playerid); RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1); StopWorking(playerid);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Your long day of farming is now over. You'll recieve $50000 in your paycheck on the next payday");
	}
	else
	{
		Farming[playerid]+=1;
		SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
		RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,1); HasHarvest[playerid] = 0;
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "/takebox the remaining boxes and bring them to this point");
	}
	ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
	animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
	LogCallback("DeliverHarvest");
	return 1;
}

timer NextGrassPatch[10000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("NextGrassPatch");
	switch(LawnMower[playerid])
	{
		case 1 .. 15:
		{
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			new mow = RandomEx(0,15);
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 2;
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, grassspot[playerid]);
			SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, MowerPoints[mow][0],MowerPoints[mow][1],MowerPoints[mow][2]+1.2, 5.0,19,0);
			grassspot[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid,874,MowerPoints[mow][0],MowerPoints[mow][1],MowerPoints[mow][2]+0.2,0.0,0.0,0.0,100.0);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "What a tough little patch of grass. Ok, time to move on!");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "* $2 was added to your paycheck. Keep up the good work!");
		}
		case 16:
		{
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 700;
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, grassspot[playerid]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Shift ended! Good job! You've mowed the entire park!");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "* $700 was added to your paycheck. LS Parks and Recreation thanks you for your service!");
			ResetJobVehicle(playerid);
			LawnMower[playerid] = 0;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("NextGrassPatch");
	return 1;
}

timer EndHarvest[10000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("EndHarvest");
	switch(Farming[playerid])
	{
		case 31 .. 35:
		{
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			HasHarvest[playerid] = 1;
			AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1220);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, crop[playerid]);
			ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,1,0,0,1,1,1);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "This part of the harvest ready for sale. /loadharvest in the back of the Walton");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("EndHarvest");
	return 1;
}

timer EndPlanting[10000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("EndPlanting");
	new string[64];
	switch(FarmSeeds[playerid])
	{
		case 0:
		{
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, "You have finished planting all the seeds. Now you must dust your crops! /getduster at the get crop duster point.");
			Farming[playerid] = 21;
		}
		case 1:
		{
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "You have planted a seed, you have %d left to plant", FarmSeeds[playerid]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
		}
		case 2:
		{
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "You have planted a seed, you have %d left to plant", FarmSeeds[playerid]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
		}
		case 3:
		{
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "You have planted a seed, you have %d left to plant", FarmSeeds[playerid]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
		}
		case 4:
		{
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
			format(string, sizeof(string), "You have planted a seed, you have %d left to plant", FarmSeeds[playerid]);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_YELLOW, string);
		}
	}
	LogCallback("EndPlanting");
	return 1;
}

timer MechCalls[10000]()
{
	LogCallback("MechCalls");
	stop CallTimer;
	if(IsPlayerConnected(MechCall))
	{
		SCM(MechCall, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "[LS Mechanic Co] No mechanics answered your request. Please call back.");
		SCM(MechCall, COLOR_LIGHTRED, " ** LS Mechanic Co has hung up");
	}
	MechCall = -1;
	LogCallback("MechCalls");
	return 1;
}
