timer EndCarRefuel[25000](vehicleid, playerid)
{
	LogCallback("EndCarRefuel");
	new string[128];
	Gas[vehicleid] = 100;
	SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -FuelPrice[playerid]);
	PlayerInfo[FuelMech[playerid]][pPayCheck] += FuelPrice[playerid];
	format(string, sizeof(string), "Your car has now been refueled for %d", FuelPrice[playerid]);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	format(string, sizeof(string), "You have finished fueling the car and earned %d, it was added to your PayCheck", FuelPrice[playerid]);
	SCM(FuelMech[playerid], COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
	FuelPrice[playerid] = -1;
	FuelMech[playerid] = -1;
	LogCallback("EndCarRefuel");
	return 1;
}

timer EndMechRepair[25000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("EndMechRepair");
	new Float:hp;
	stop RepairTimer[playerid];
	SafeClearAnimations(MechanicID[playerid]);
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	TogglePlayerControllable(MechanicID[playerid], 1);
	switch(RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]])
	{
		case 1: /** Mech finishes repair **/
		{
			HasParts[MechanicID[playerid]] = 0;
			RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]] = 0;
			RepairVehicle(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid));
			SetVehicleHealth(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), 1000.0);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Your vehicle has been repaired!");
			SCM(MechanicID[playerid], COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You are done with the repair!");
			SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]]);
			PlayerInfo[MechanicID[playerid]][pPayCheck] += MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]];
			TakeRepair[playerid] = 999; TakeRepair[MechanicID[playerid]] = 999;
			RepairID[MechanicID[playerid]] = -1; MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]] = -1;
			MechanicID[playerid] = -1;
		}
		case 2 .. 5:
		{
			if(PlayerInfo[MechanicID[playerid]][pMechParts] == 0)
			{
				HasParts[MechanicID[playerid]] = 0;
				SCM(MechanicID[playerid], COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You are out of parts for repair. You can't contiue this repair");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "The mechanic has run out of parts and cannot continue the repair");
				SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, -MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]]/ RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]]);
				PlayerInfo[MechanicID[playerid]][pPayCheck] += MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]] / RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]];
				RepairID[MechanicID[playerid]] = -1; MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]] = -1; RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]] = 0;
				TakeRepair[playerid] = 999; TakeRepair[MechanicID[playerid]] = 999; MechanicID[playerid] = -1;
			}
			else
			{
				HasParts[MechanicID[playerid]] = 0;
				SCM(MechanicID[playerid], COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "You'll need to /takeparts to get more parts in order to finish this repair");
				SCM(MechanicID[playerid], COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Once you grab the parts, you'll need to /keeprepairing to keep repairing.");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "The mechanic has finished this stage of the repair. However they need to grab more parts from the truck");
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_WHITE, "If at any point you wish to stop the repair, do /endrepair. You will be billed accordingly. Thank you.");
			}
			GetVehicleHealth(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), hp);
			SetVehicleHealth(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), hp + 100.0);
		}
		case 6:
		{
			HasParts[MechanicID[playerid]] = 0; RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]] = 0;
			TakeRepair[playerid] = 999; TakeRepair[MechanicID[playerid]] = 999;
			RepairID[MechanicID[playerid]] = -1; MechPrice[MechanicID[playerid]] = -1;
			RepairStage[MechanicID[playerid]] = 0; MechanicID[playerid] = -1;
			JobCountdownSeconds[playerid] = -1;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("EndMechRepair");
	return 1;
}

timer ProdDelivery[5000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ProdDelivery");
	new
		string[128];
	start:
	new b = RandomEx(1,53);
	if(BizzInfo[b][bSetted] == 0)
	{
	    goto start;
	}
	HasBox[playerid] = 0;
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
	RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 4);
	RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 3);
	switch(TruckerType[playerid])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			switch(TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					switch(Trucking[playerid])
					{
						case 12:
						{
							Trucking[playerid] += 1;
							DPCP(playerid); SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,-176.4218,-279.2499,1.4297,5.0,55,0);
							SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "Head to the other side of the factory to pick up the boxes of car parts");
						}
					    case 24:
						{
							tCarParts += 20; SaveTrucker();
							strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], "None", 0, strlen("None"), 255);
							Trucking[playerid] = 0; TruckerType[playerid] = 0; DPCP(playerid); IsTrucking[playerid] = false;
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "$600 was added to your Pay Check. Your truck is now empty. You should");
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "take it back to the truck depot and /gotrucking again to select what to deliver");
							format(string, sizeof(string), "[/join] \nMechanic \n[/towtruck]\n[/buyparts]\n[/returnveh]\n Available Parts:%d",tCarParts);
							UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(mechlabel,0x00FF00AA, string);
							PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 600;
						}
					}
				}
				case 1 .. 3:
				{
					Trucking[playerid]+=1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "There are %d boxes left in the truck. Unload the rest", TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				}
			}
		}
		case 2:
		{
			switch(TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					Trucking[playerid] = 0;
					IsTrucking[playerid] = false;
					TruckerType[playerid] = 0;
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 2500;
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "$2500 was added to your Pay Check. However, your truck is empty.");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Take it back to the truck depot and /gotrucking again to select what to deliver");
					strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], " ", 0, strlen(" "), 255);

				}
				case 1 .. 3:
				{
				    IsTrucking[playerid] = false;
					PlayerInfo[playerid][pPayCheck] += 250;
					BizzInfo[DeliveryBizz[playerid]][bProducts] += 20;
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "$250 was added to your Pay Check. Head to the next business.");
					format(string, sizeof(string), "This business now has %d total products in stock", BizzInfo[DeliveryBizz[playerid]][bProducts]);
					SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, BizzInfo[b][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[b][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[b][bEntranceZ], 2.0,19,0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
					DeliveryBizz[playerid] = b;
				}
			}
		}
		case 3:
		{
			switch(TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]])
			{
				case 0:
				{
				    IsTrucking[playerid] = false;
					gSupply += 5;
					DPCP(playerid);
					Trucking[playerid] = 0;
					TruckerType[playerid] = 0;
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "$4200 cash was given to you. This is off the books work, remember?");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Take it back to the truck depot and /gotrucking again to select what to deliver");
					strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], " ", 0, strlen(" "), 255);
					format(string,sizeof(string),"/smugglemats\r\nAvailable Mats:%d",gSupply);
					UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(GunSLabel, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, 4200);
					SaveGunDealer();
				}
				case 1 .. 3:
				{
					gSupply += 5;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Keep unloading the truck, you have %d boxes of mats left", TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				}
			}
		}
		case 4:
		{
			switch(TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]])
			{
				case 0:
				{
				    IsTrucking[playerid] = false;
					dCSupply += 5;
					DPCP(playerid);
					SaveDrugDealer();
					Trucking[playerid] = 0;
					SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid, 6000);
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Drug Dealer \n[/buycoke]\nRaw Coke Available: %d",dCSupply);
					UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(CokeLabel, -1, string);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "$6000 cash was given to you. This is off the books work, remember?");
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Take it back to the truck depot and /gotrucking again to select what to deliver");
					strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], " ", 0, strlen(" "), 255);
				}
				case 1 .. 4, 6 .. 10: { SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Keep unloading the truck"); }
				case 5:
				{
					dPSupply += 5;
					DPCP(playerid);
					SaveDrugDealer();
					Trucking[playerid] += 1;
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Drug Dealer \n[/buyseeds]\nSeeds Available: %d",dPSupply);
					UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(SeedsLabel, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
					SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, dCPos[0], dCPos[1], dCPos[2], 2.0,19,0);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Seeds delivered. Now go drop off the cocaine");
				}
			}
		}
	}
	ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
	animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
	LogCallback("ProdDelivery");
	return 1;
}

timer TruckLoad[5000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("TruckLoad");
	new string[128];
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	HasBox[playerid] = 0;
	LoadingTruck[playerid] = 0;
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,1);
	TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]] ++;
	switch(WrongOrder[playerid])
	{
		case 0:
		{
			switch(TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]])
			{
				case 0 .. 2:
				{
					switch(TruckerType[playerid])
					{
						case 3:
						{
							RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,4);
						}
						case 4:
						{
							RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,3);
						}
					}
					format(string, sizeof(string), "Box successfully loaded. Load up %d more packages before leaving", 3 - TruckPackages[TruckerVeh[playerid]]);
					SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
				}
				case 3:
				{
					switch(TruckerType[playerid])
					{
						case 1:
						{
							switch(Trucking[playerid])
							{
								case 2:
								{
									sMetal -= 10;
									SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 90.0587,-291.1825,1.5781, 2.0,19,0);
									format(string,sizeof(string),"Scrap Dropoff\r\nScrap Yards Metal:%d",sMetal);
									UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(ScrapperDropLabel, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
									format(string, sizeof(string), "Trucker \n[/getprods] \nScrap Yards Metal:%d",sMetal);
									UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(ScrapPartLabel,0x00FF00AA, string);
									SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "Truck loaded with scrap parts. Take them to the factory");
								}
								case 14:
								{
									Trucking[playerid] += 1;
									DPCP(playerid);
									SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, 2076.5798,-2026.5226,13.5469, 2.0,19,0);
									SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "Truck loaded with car parts. Take them to LS Mechanic Co's Garage");
								}
							}
							strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], "Car Parts", 0, strlen("Car Parts"), 255);
						}
						case 2:
						{
							start:
							new b = RandomEx(1,53);
							DeliveryBizz[playerid] = b; DPCP(playerid);
							if(BizzInfo[b][bSetted] != 0)
							{
								SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, BizzInfo[b][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[b][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[b][bEntranceZ], 2.0,19,0);
								strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], "Bizz Products", 0, strlen("Bizz Products"), 255);
								SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Truck has been fully loaded. Head to the delivery point");
							}
							else
							{
							    goto start;
							}
						}
						case 3:
						{
							sMetal -= tPackages;
							Trucking[playerid] = 2;
							SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, gPPos[0], gPPos[1], gPPos[2], 5.0, 42, 0);
							strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], "Materials", 0, strlen("Materials"), 255);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Truck has been fully loaded with Materials. Head to the delivery point");
							format(string,sizeof(string),"Scrap Dropoff\r\nScrap Yards Metal:%d",sMetal);
							UpdateDynamic3DTextLabelText(ScrapperDropLabel, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
							SaveScrapper();
						}
						case 4:
						{
							DPCP(playerid);
							Trucking[playerid] += 1;
							DestroyObject(DrugBag[playerid]);
							RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid,3);
							SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, dPPos[0],dPPos[1],dPPos[2], 2.0,19,0);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Your truck is loaded with drugs. Go deliver them");
      						strmid(tLoad[TruckerVeh[playerid]], "Drugs", 0, strlen("Drugs"), 255);
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		case 1:
		{
			start:
			new b = RandomEx(1,53);
			if(BizzInfo[b][bSetted] == 0)
			{
			    goto start;
			}
			DeliveryBizz[playerid] = b;
			SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, BizzInfo[b][bEntranceX], BizzInfo[b][bEntranceY], BizzInfo[b][bEntranceZ], 2.0,51,0);
			SCM(playerid, TRUCK_COLOR, "Truck reloaded with the box. Head to the next business.");
		}
	}
	ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
	animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
	LogCallback("TruckLoad");
	return 1;
}

timer CollectingScraps[10000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("CollectingScraps");
	new
		weight = RandomEx(1,100),
		string[128]
	;
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	sPWeight[playerid] += weight;
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1220);
	DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, ScrapObject[playerid][0]);
	DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, ScrapObject[playerid][1]);
	ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CARRY","crry_prtial",4.0,1,0,0,1,1,1);
	format(string, sizeof(string),"You have salvaged and boxed up %d lbs of scrap metal. Now /loadscrap into your truck",weight);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
	LogCallback("CollectingScraps");
	return 1;
}

timer StoreScraps[5000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("StoreScraps");
	new string[64];
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	if(sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]] + sPWeight[playerid] > MAX_SCRAPLOAD)
	{
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You have loaded %d lbs and are now full please go unload",sPWeight[playerid]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]] = MAX_SCRAPLOAD;
		SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, sDPos[0],sDPos[1],sDPos[2], 5.0, 38, 0);
		JobCP[playerid] = -1;
	}
	else
	{
		new scrap = random(sizeof(ScrapSpawns));
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		RemovePlayerAttachedObject(playerid, 1);
		sWeight[ScrapTruck[playerid]] += sPWeight[playerid];
		SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid,ScrapSpawns[scrap][0],ScrapSpawns[scrap][1],ScrapSpawns[scrap][2], 2.0, 38, 0);
		ScrapObject[playerid][0] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 952, ScrapSpawns[scrap][0],ScrapSpawns[scrap][1],ScrapSpawns[scrap][2]-0.3, 0.00, 0.0, 250.0);
		ScrapObject[playerid][1] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 952, ScrapSpawns[scrap][0],ScrapSpawns[scrap][1],ScrapSpawns[scrap][2]-0.5, 0.00, 0.00, 90.00, 250.0);
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You have loaded up %d lbs of scrap",sPWeight[playerid]);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, string);
		JobCP[playerid] = 1;
	}
	sPWeight[playerid] = 0;
	ClearAnims[playerid] = 0;
	animreset[playerid] = defer ResetAnimation[10000](playerid);
	LogCallback("StoreScraps");
	return 1;
}

timer DrugDrop[5000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("s");
	switch(DropWait[playerid])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			DropWait[playerid] = 2;
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			DrugPlane[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 10757, -1213.26, 282.91, 39.12, 11.00, 10.00, 130.00, 250.0);
			jobtimer[playerid] = defer DrugDrop[500](playerid);
		}
		case 2:
		{
			DropWait[playerid] = 3;
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			MovePlayerObject(playerid, DrugPlane[playerid], -1056.46, 436.27, 39.12, 37.0, 11.00, 10.00, 130.00);
			jobtimer[playerid] = defer DrugDrop(playerid);
		}
		case 3:
		{
			DropWait[playerid] = 4;
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			DrugBag[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 2903, -1063.68, 427.88, 41.17, 0.00, 0.00, 0.00, 250.0);
			MovePlayerObject(playerid, DrugPlane[playerid], -850.5649, 637.6624, 39.12, 40.0, 11.00, 10.00, 130.00);
			jobtimer[playerid] = defer DrugDrop[500](playerid);
		}
		case 4:
		{
			DropWait[playerid] = 5;
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			MovePlayerObject(playerid, DrugBag[playerid], -1063.68, 427.86, 20.67, 4.0, 0.00, 0.00, 0.00);
			jobtimer[playerid] = defer DrugDrop(playerid);
		}
		case 5:
		{
			DropWait[playerid] = 0;
			stop jobtimer[playerid];
			DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, DrugBag[playerid]); DestroyPlayerObject(playerid, DrugPlane[playerid]);
			DrugBag[playerid] = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 2919, -1063.70, 427.84, 13.65, 0.00, 0.00, 0.00, 250.0);
			SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, -1063.70, 427.84, 14.12, 2.0,24,0);
			SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,"Go to the bag and type /loadtruck to continue");
			Trucking[playerid] = 2;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("DrugDrops");
	return 1;
}

timer GettingDrugs[5000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("GettingDrugs");
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	HasBox[playerid] = 1; AttachObjectCorrectly(playerid, 1575);
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTBLUE, "Load the truck with the drugs until the bag is empty.");
	LogCallback("GettingDrugs");
	return 1;
}

timer PlantingWeed[11000](playerid)
{
	new wstring[64];
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	NeedsWater[playerid] += 1;
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][7] += 1;
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7] -= 1;
	SeedToPlant[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]] = 1;
	GetPlayerPos(playerid, PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][0],PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][1],PlantSpots[playerid][NeedsWater[playerid]][2]);
	format(wstring, sizeof(wstring), "Weed seed planted. You have %d seeds left",  PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugGoods][7]);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, wstring);
	ClearAnimations(playerid);
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	return 1;
}

timer WateringWeed[10000](playerid)
{
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	new nw = NeedsWater[playerid]-1;
	NeedsWater[playerid] = nw;
	if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2.0, PlantSpots[playerid][0][0], PlantSpots[playerid][0][1], PlantSpots[playerid][0][2]))
	{
		SeedToPlant[playerid][0] = 2;
	}
	if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 2.0, PlantSpots[playerid][1][0], PlantSpots[playerid][1][1], PlantSpots[playerid][1][2]))
	{
		SeedToPlant[playerid][1] = 2;
	}
	if(nw != -1)
	{
		ClearAnimations(playerid);
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		SafeSetPlayerCheckpoint(playerid, PlantSpots[playerid][nw][0], PlantSpots[playerid][nw][1], PlantSpots[playerid][nw][2], 1.5,46,0);
	}
	else
	{
		ClearAnimations(playerid);
		TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
		SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "All of your plants have been watered. Wait a bit while they grow.");
		switch(GrowStep[playerid])
		{
			case 0: { PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8] = 1; }
			case 1: { PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8] = 901; }
			case 2: { PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8] = 1801; }
		}
		GrowStep[playerid] += 1;
		SaveWeed(playerid);
	}
	return 1;
}

timer PlantsFates[120000](playerid)
{
	stop WaterTimer[playerid];
	new oc = random(2);
	switch(oc)
	{
		case 0 .. 1:
		{
			for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
			{
				if(SeedToPlant[playerid][W] == 2)
				{
					BabyDeer[playerid][W] = CreateDynamicObject(19315, PlantSpots[playerid][W][0], PlantSpots[playerid][W][1], PlantSpots[playerid][W][2]-0.7, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, -1, -1, -1, 250.0);
				}
			}
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Deer have begun to eat your weed! Go save it before its too late!!!");
			WaterTimer[playerid] = defer PlantDestroy(playerid);
			PlantFate[playerid] = 1;
		}
		case 2:
		{
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You plants have begun to dehydrate and are dying. Get to them now and water them!");
			WaterTimer[playerid] = defer PlantDestroy(playerid);
			PlantFate[playerid] = 2;
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

timer PlantDestroy[60000](playerid)
{
	stop WaterTimer[playerid];
	switch(PlantFate[playerid])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
			{
				if(SeedToPlant[playerid][W] == 2)
				{
					DestroyDynamicObject(BabyDeer[playerid][W]);
					DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][W]);
					SeedToPlant[playerid][W] = 0;
					PlantSpots[playerid][W][0] = 0.0;
					PlantSpots[playerid][W][1] = 0.0;
					PlantSpots[playerid][W][2] = 0.0;
					GrowStep[playerid] = 0;
					NeedsWater[playerid] = -1;
					WaterPlants[playerid] = 0;
					OrigNeWa[playerid] = 0;
					PlantFate[playerid] = 0;
					SaveWeed(playerid);
				}
			}
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Your plants have been lost. The deer ate them all, and there is nothing salvageable");
		}
		case 2:
		{
			for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
			{
				if(SeedToPlant[playerid][W] == 2)
				{
					DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][W]);
					SeedToPlant[playerid][W] = 0;
					PlantSpots[playerid][W][0] = 0.0;
					PlantSpots[playerid][W][1] = 0.0;
					PlantSpots[playerid][W][2] = 0.0;
					GrowStep[playerid] = 0;
					NeedsWater[playerid] = -1;
					WaterPlants[playerid] = 0;
					OrigNeWa[playerid] = 0;
					PlantFate[playerid] = 0;
					SaveWeed(playerid);
				}
			}
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "Your plants have been lost. They are all dried up, and there is nothing salvageable");
		}
		case 3:
		{
			for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
			{
				if(SeedToPlant[playerid][W] == 2)
				{
					DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][W]);
					SeedToPlant[playerid][W] = 0;
					PlantSpots[playerid][W][0] = 0.0;
					PlantSpots[playerid][W][1] = 0.0;
					PlantSpots[playerid][W][2] = 0.0;
					GrowStep[playerid] = 0;
					NeedsWater[playerid] = -1;
					WaterPlants[playerid] = 0;
					OrigNeWa[playerid] = 0;
					PlantFate[playerid] = 0;
					SaveWeed(playerid);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

timer DeerDestory[2000](playerid)
{
	stop DeerRun[playerid];
	for(new W = 0; W < 2; W++)
	{
		if(SeedToPlant[playerid][W] == 2)
		{
			DestroyDynamicObject(BabyDeer[playerid][W]);
		}
	}
	return 1;
}

timer PickingBuds[11000](playerid)
{
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	ClearAnimations(playerid);
	switch(GrowStep[playerid])
	{
		case 1 .. 2:
		{
			if(SeedToPlant[playerid][0] == 0)
			{
				DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][0]);
			}
			if(SeedToPlant[playerid][1] == 0)
			{
				DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][1]);
			}
			if(SeedToPlant[playerid][0] == 0 && SeedToPlant[playerid][1] == 0)
			{
				GrowStep[playerid] = 0;
				PlantFate[playerid] = 0;
				OrigNeWa[playerid] = -1;
				NeedsWater[playerid] = -1;
				WaterPlants[playerid] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][7] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8] = 0;
				SaveWeed(playerid);
			}
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][0] += 7;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You have been given 7 grams of weed. You must weigh it out before sale or use");
		}
		case 3:
		{
			if(SeedToPlant[playerid][0] == 0)
			{
				DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][0]);
			}
			if(SeedToPlant[playerid][1] == 0)
			{
				DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][1]);
			}
			if(SeedToPlant[playerid][0] == 0 && SeedToPlant[playerid][1] == 0)
			{
				GrowStep[playerid] = 0;
				PlantFate[playerid] = 0;
				OrigNeWa[playerid] = -1;
				NeedsWater[playerid] = -1;
				WaterPlants[playerid] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][7] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8] = 0;
				SaveWeed(playerid);
			}
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][0] += 14;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You have been given 14 grams of weed. You must weigh them out before sale or use");
		}
		case 4:
		{
			if(SeedToPlant[playerid][0] == 0)
			{
				DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][0]);
			}
			if(SeedToPlant[playerid][1] == 0)
			{
				DestroyDynamicObject(WeedPlant[playerid][1]);
			}
			if(SeedToPlant[playerid][0] == 0 && SeedToPlant[playerid][1] == 0)
			{
				GrowStep[playerid] = 0;
				PlantFate[playerid] = 0;
				OrigNeWa[playerid] = -1;
				NeedsWater[playerid] = -1;
				WaterPlants[playerid] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][7] = 0;
				PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][8] = 0;
				SaveWeed(playerid);
			}
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][0] += 28;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You have been given 28 grams of weed. You must weigh them out before sale or use");
		}
		default: return SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You can't pick weed right now");
	}
	return 1;
}

timer GetsStoned[15000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("GetsStoned");
	new Float:HPARM[2];
	SetPlayerTime(playerid,12,0);
	SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 3006);
	SetPlayerSpecialAction(playerid, 0);
	SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 3000);
	GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
	GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
	if(HPARM[0] < 100)
	{
		SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0] + 5);
		GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
		if(HPARM[0] > 100)
		{
			SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
		}
	}
	if(HPARM[1] < 100)
	{
		SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1] + 5);
		GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
		if(HPARM[1] > 100)
		{
			SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
		}
	}
	DoingDrugs[playerid] = repeat WeedEffects(playerid);
	DrugStage[playerid] = 1; PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][3]-=1;
	PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00336633);
	PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You are now stoned, and toss the roach away.");
	LogCallback("GetsStoned");
	return 1;
}

timer WeedEffects[300000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("WeedEffects");
	new Float:HPARM[2];
	switch(DrugStage[playerid])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
			GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
			if(HPARM[0] < 100)
			{
				SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0] + 5);
				GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
				if(HPARM[0] > 100)
				{
					SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			if(HPARM[1] < 100)
			{
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1] + 5);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
				if(HPARM[1] > 100)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			SCM(playerid, -1, "You are really high...");
		}
		case 2:
		{
			DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
			SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 3004);
			GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
			if(HPARM[0] < 100)
			{
				SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0] + 5);
				GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
				if(HPARM[0] > 100)
				{
					SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			if(HPARM[1] < 100)
			{
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1] + 5);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
				if(HPARM[1] > 100)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			SCM(playerid, -1, "You're coming down a bit, but you still feel good. However, your stomach is starting to rumble.");
		}
		case 3:
		{
			GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
			if(HPARM[0] < 100)
			{
				SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0] + 5);
				GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
				if(HPARM[0] > 100)
				{
					SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			if(HPARM[1] < 100)
			{
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1] + 5);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
				if(HPARM[1] > 100)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			DrugStage[playerid] += 1; Munchies[playerid] = 1;
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]); SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 3002);
			SCM(playerid, -1, "You've got the munchies. Go eat something to make them go away");
			SCM(playerid, -1, "You will slowly lose health until you get rid of the munchies.");
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
			PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00336622);
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
		}
		case 4:
		{
			new h, m, s;
			stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
			gettime(h,m,s);
			SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 1);
			SetPlayerTime(playerid,h,m);
			GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
			if(HPARM[0] < 100)
			{
				SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0] + 5);
				GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
				if(HPARM[0] > 100)
				{
					SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			if(HPARM[1] < 100)
			{
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1] + 5);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
				if(HPARM[1] > 100)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]); DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
			SCM(playerid, -1, "You're now sober. If you want to get high again, you will need to /smokeweed.");
			Munchies[playerid] = 0;
			Stoned[playerid] = 0;
		}
	}
	LogCallback("WeedEffects");
	return 1;
}

timer CutCoke[11000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("CutCoke");
	new string[64];
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][1] -= 1;
	PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][6] += 2;
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1); SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You have cut the coke into 2 weighable grams. Weigh them for sale or keep cutting");
	format(string, sizeof(string), "You have %d grams of raw cocaine left.", PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][1]);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, string);
	LogCallback("CutCoke");
	return 1;
}

timer CocaineHigh[300000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("CocaineHigh");
	new Float:HPARM[2];
	switch(DrugStage[playerid])
	{
		case 0:
		{
			DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
			stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1); SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 42); SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 4000);
			DoingDrugs[playerid] = repeat CocaineHigh(playerid);
			PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0xCC00FF44);
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
		}
		case 1 .. 2:
		{
			GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
			if(HPARM[0] < 100)
			{
				SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0] + 10);
				GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
				if(HPARM[0] > 100)
				{
					SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			if(HPARM[1] < 100)
			{
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1] + 10);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
				if(HPARM[1] > 100)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			switch(OverDose[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0xCC00FF33);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				}
				case 1:
				{
					DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
					SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 6000);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0xCC00FF55);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				}
				case 2:
				{
					DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
					SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 8000);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0xCC00FF55);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				}
				case 3:
				{
					DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
					SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 10000);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0xCC00FF55);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				}
				case 4 .. 999:
				{
					switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
					{
						case 1:
						{
							stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
							SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 15000);
							SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 5); DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
							SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 45); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
							ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK","crckdeth1",4.0,1,0,0,0,0);
							PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000099);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
							DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer OverDosing(playerid);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You snorted too much coke! You are now having an overdose");
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have two minutes before you die. You need a paramedic right away");
						}
						case 2:
						{
							stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
							SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 15000);
							SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
							SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 5); DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
							SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 45); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
							ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK","crckdeth1",4.0,1,0,0,0,0);
							PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000099);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
							DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer OverDosing(playerid);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You snorted too much coke! You are now having an overdose");
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have two minutes before you die. You need a paramedic right away");
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		case 3:
		{
			if(OverDose[playerid] >= 4)
			{
				stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
				SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 15000);
				DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer ODDeath(playerid);
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 5); SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 45);
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0); DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK","crckdeth1",4.0,1,0,0,0,0);
				PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000099);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You snorted too much coke! You are now having an overdose");
				OnCoke[playerid] = 0;
			}
			else
			{
				stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
				GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
				if(HPARM[0] < 100)
				{
					SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0] + 10);
					GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
					if(HPARM[0] > 100)
					{
						SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
					}
				}
				if(HPARM[1] < 100)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1] + 10);
					GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
					if(HPARM[1] > 100)
					{
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
					}
				}
				OnCoke[playerid] = 0; SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 1);
				PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]); DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
				SCM(playerid, -1, "You are now sober. If you want to get high again, you will need to /snortcoke.");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("CocaineHigh");
	return 1;
}

timer CrackEffects[300000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("CrackEffects");
	new Float:HPARM[2];
	switch(DrugStage[playerid])
	{
		case 0:
		{
			DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
			stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
			TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1); SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
			SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 45); SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 5000);
			DoingDrugs[playerid] = repeat CrackEffects(playerid);
			PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000066);
			PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
		}
		case 1 .. 2:
		{
			GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
			GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
			if(HPARM[0] < 100)
			{
				SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0] + 15);
				GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
				if(HPARM[0] > 100)
				{
					SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			if(HPARM[1] < 100)
			{
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1] + 15);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
				if(HPARM[1] > 100)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
				}
			}
			switch(OverDose[playerid])
			{
				case 0:
				{
					DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000066);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				}
				case 1:
				{
					DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
					SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 7000);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000077);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				}
				case 2:
				{
					DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
					SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 9000);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000088);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				}
				case 3:
				{
					DrugStage[playerid] += 1;
					SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 11000);
					PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
					PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000099);
					PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				}
				case 4 .. 999:
				{
					switch(GetPlayerState(playerid))
					{
						case 1:
						{
							stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
							SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 18000);
							SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 5); DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
							SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 45); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
							ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK","crckdeth1",4.0,1,0,0,0,0);
							PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000099);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
							DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer OverDosing(playerid);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You smoked way too much crack! You are now having an overdose");
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have two minutes before you die. You need a paramedic right away");
						}
						case 2:
						{
							stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
							SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 18000);
							SafeRemovePlayerFromVehicle(playerid);
							SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 5); DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
							SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 3006); TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0);
							ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK","crckdeth1",4.0,1,0,0,0,0);
							PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
							PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000099);
							PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
							DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer OverDosing(playerid);
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You smoked way too much crack! You are now having an overdose");
							SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have two minutes before you die. You need a paramedic right away");
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		case 3:
		{
			if(OverDose[playerid] >= 4)
			{
				stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
				SetPlayerDrunkLevel(playerid, 18000);
				DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer ODDeath(playerid);
				SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 5); SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 45);
				TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 0); DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
				ApplyAnimation(playerid,"CRACK","crckdeth1",4.0,1,0,0,0,0);
				PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				PlayerTextDrawBoxColor(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid], 0x00000099);
				PlayerTextDrawShow(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You smoked way too much crack! You are now having an overdose");
			}
			else
			{
				stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
				GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
				GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
				if(HPARM[0] < 100)
				{
					SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0] + 15);
					GetPlayerArmour(playerid, HPARM[0]);
					if(HPARM[0] > 100)
					{
						SafeSetPlayerArmour(playerid, 100);
					}
				}
				if(HPARM[1] < 100)
				{
					SetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1] + 15);
					GetPlayerHealth(playerid, HPARM[1]);
					if(HPARM[1] > 100)
					{
						SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 100);
					}
				}
				DrugStage[playerid] = 0; OnCrack[playerid] = 0;
				SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 1); PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
				SCM(playerid, -1, "You are now sober. If you want to get high again, you will need to /docrack.");
			}
		}
	}
	LogCallback("CrackEffects");
	return 1;
}
timer ODDeath[1500](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("ODDeath");
	stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
	ApplyAnimation(playerid, "CRACK", "crckdeth2", 4.0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have two minutes before you die.");
	LogCallback("ODDeath");
	DoingDrugs[playerid] = defer OverDosing(playerid);
}

timer OverDosing[120000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("OverDosing");
	stop DoingDrugs[playerid];
	OverDose[playerid] = 0;
	DrugStage[playerid] = 0;
	SetPlayerHealth(playerid, 0);
	SetPlayerWeather(playerid, 1);
	PlayerTextDrawHide(playerid, DrugScreenTD[playerid]);
	SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "You have died of an overdose.");
	LogCallback("OverDosing");
	return 1;
}

timer CookingCoke[26000](playerid)
{
	LogCallback("CookingCoke");
	stop jobtimer[playerid];
	SafeClearAnimations(playerid);
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid, 1);
	switch(Pryor[playerid])
	{
		case 1:
		{
			PlayerInfo[playerid][pDrugs][2] += 1;
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "You have sucessfully cooked up one gram of raw crack");
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIMEGREEN, "Be sure to /weigh crack before you try to sell it");
		}
		case 2:
		{
			new Float:exp[3];
			GetPlayerPos(playerid,exp[0],exp[1],exp[2]);
			CreateExplosion(exp[0],exp[1],exp[2],7,1);
			SCM(playerid, COLOR_LIGHTRED, "SOEMTHING WENT TERRIBLY WRONG AND YOU HAD A FREEBASING ACCIDENT");
		}
	}
	LogCallback("CookingCoke");
	return 1;
}

stock ResetHouseSafe(i)
{
	if(hInfo[i][hUsed] == 2)
	{
		new blist[128],list[512],sql[1024];
		new var[32] ="UPDATE `samp_housez` SET";
		for(new slot = 0; slot < 10; slot++)
		{
		    hInfo[i][hGun][slot] = 0;
		    hInfo[i][hAmmo][slot] = 0;
		    format(blist,sizeof(blist),"`safeWeapon[%d]`='0',`safeAmmo[%d]`='0',",slot,slot);
		    strcat(list,blist,512);
		}
		format(sql,sizeof(sql),"%s %s`safePot`='0',`safeCrack`='0',`safeCoke`='0' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",var,list,i);
		mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
	}
}

CMD:sellhouse(playerid,params[])
{

	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] != 9999)
	{
	    new housevalue = PlayerInfo[playerid][pHousePrice] / 100 * 75,i = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
	    ResetHouseSafe(i);
	    SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,housevalue);
        DestroyDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hIcon]);
        new var[8];
        var ="None";
        format(hInfo[i][hOwner],MAX_PLAYER_NAME,"%s",var);
        hInfo[i][hLocked] = 1;
        hInfo[i][hUsed] = 1;
		hInfo[i][hIcon] = CreateDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],31,0,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
		hInfo[i][hSign] = CreateDynamicObject(19471,hInfo[i][hsignPos][0],hInfo[i][hsignPos][1],hInfo[i][hsignPos][2],hInfo[i][hsignPos][3],hInfo[i][hsignPos][4],hInfo[i][hsignPos][5],-1,-1,-1,50.0);
		new sql[356];
		format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `owner`='None', `locked`='1', `used`='1' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",i);
		mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
		PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] = 9999;
		new string[128];
		format(string,sizeof(string),"You have sold your house for $%d",housevalue);
		SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,string);
	}
	return 1;
}

CMD:house(playerid,params[])
{
	new i = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey];
	if(i != 9999)
	{
	    new option[16],opt[8],opt2[8];
	    if(sscanf(params,"s[8]S[8]()S[8]()",option,opt,opt2))
		{
			SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"/house [option]");
			SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Valid Options: lock, safe, sell, furn");
			return 1;
		}
		if(strcmp(option,"slots",true) == 0)
		{
		    if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == i)
		    {
		        if(slots[playerid] == false)
		        {
					new varf,string[32];
					switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
					{
						case 0: varf = 20;
					    case 1: varf = 40;
					    case 2: varf = 60;
					    case 3: varf = 80;
					    case 4: varf = 100;
					}
			        for(new f = 0; f < varf; f++)
			        {
			            if(furnInfo[i][f][fUsed] == 1)
			            {
							format(string,sizeof(string),"%d",f);
							furnInfo[i][f][fTag] = CreateDynamic3DTextLabel(string,0x008080FF,furnInfo[i][f][fPos][0],furnInfo[i][f][fPos][1],furnInfo[i][f][fPos][2],30.0,INVALID_PLAYER_ID,INVALID_VEHICLE_ID,0,i,hInfo[i][hInt],playerid,30.0);
				        }
				    }
					SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"Enabled slot indicators");
					slots[playerid] = true;
				}
				else
				{
					SendClientMessage(playerid,COLOR_YELLOW,"Disabled slot indicators");
					slots[playerid] = false;
					for(new f = 0; f < 100; f++)
					{
					    DestroyDynamic3DTextLabel(furnInfo[i][f][fTag]);
					}
				}
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not in your house you cannot do that...");
		}
		else if(strcmp(option,"furn",true) == 0)
		{
            SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"test");
			if(GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid) == i)
			{
                SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"test");
				if(slots[playerid] == true)
				{
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,HOUSE_FURN,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"Furniture","Edit Furniture\r\nDelete Furniture","Continue","Cancel");
					SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"test");
				} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You must use /house slots to show your furniture slots before you can edit them");
			} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not in your house right now");
		}
		else if(strcmp(option,"sell",true) == 0)
		{
		    if(!opt[0] || !opt2[0]) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/house sell [playerid] [price]");
		    else
			{
				new playa = strval(opt), price = strval(opt2);
				if(IsPlayerConnected(playa) && playa != INVALID_PLAYER_ID)
			    {
			        if(price > 1)
			        {
			            if(PlayerInfo[playa][pPhousekey] == 9999)
			            {
							new Float:pPos[3];
							GetPlayerPos(playerid,pPos[0],pPos[1],pPos[2]);
							if(!IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playa,10.0,pPos[0],pPos[1],pPos[2]))
								return SCM(playerid,-1,"You are not near that player");
							BuyingHouse[playa] = playerid;
							BuyingHousePrice[playa] = price;
							new string[128];
							format(string,sizeof(string),"You have offered to sell your House to %s for $%d",GPN(playa),price);
							SCM(playerid,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
							format(string,sizeof(string),"%s wants to sell you their house for $%d, type /accept house to buy the house!", GPN(playerid), price);
							SCM(playa,COLOR_LIGHTBLUE,string);
			            } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"That player already owns a house");
			        }else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"That price is invalid");
			    } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"That player is not connected");
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(option,"lock",true) == 0)
		{
			new h = GetClosestHouse(playerid);
			if(h == i || HouseEntered[playerid] == h || PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin])
			{
					if(hInfo[h][hLocked] == 1)
					{
					    hInfo[h][hLocked] = 0;
					    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Door ~g~Unlocked", 5000, 6);
					}
					else
					{
					    hInfo[h][hLocked] = 1;
					    GameTextForPlayer(playerid, "~w~Door ~r~Locked", 5000, 6);
					}
					new sql[200];
					format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `locked`='%d' WHERE `houseID`= '%d'",hInfo[h][hLocked],h);
					mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
			}
		}
		else if(strcmp(option,"safe",true) == 0)
		{
			if(HouseEntered[playerid] == PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey])
			{
				ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_HOUSE_STORAGE,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"House Safe","Deposit\r\nWithdraw","Continue","Go back");
			}
		}
	}
 	else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You do not own a house...");
	return 1;
}

CMD:gotoh(playerid,params[])
{
	new i;
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] < 3 || ModDuty[playerid] == 0) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not allowed to do this");
	if(sscanf(params,"d",i)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"USAGE:/gotoh [houseid]");
	if(i > 0 || i < MAX_HOUSES)
	{
	    SetPlayerPos(playerid,hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2]);
	}
	return 1;
}

CMD:deletehouse(playerid,params[])
{
	new i;
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
	{
		i = GetClosestHouse(playerid);
		if(i != -1)
		{
			hInfo[i][hUsed] = 0;
			new sql[256];
			format(sql,sizeof(sql),"DELETE FROM `samp_housez` WHERE `houseID`='%d'",i);
			mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
			DestroyDynamicCP(hInfo[i][hCheckpoint]);
			DestroyDynamicObject(hInfo[i][hSign]);
			DestroyDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hIcon]);
			
		}
	}
}
CMD:movehouse(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 2)
	{
	    new i;
	    if(sscanf(params,"d",i)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"movehouse [houseid]");
	    if(i > 0 && i < MAX_HOUSES)
	    {
			new string[128],sql[256];
			GetPlayerPos(playerid,hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2]);
			format(string,sizeof(string),"You have updated the entrance of house id %d",i);
			SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,string);
			SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"{FF0000}You will need to{FFFFFF} update the for sale sign location");
			format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `entX`='%f',`entY`='%f',`entZ`='%f',`entVW`='%d',`entINT`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],i);
			mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
			DestroyDynamicCP(hInfo[i][hCheckpoint]);
			DestroyDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hIcon]);
			if(hInfo[i][hUsed] == 1)//for sale house
			{
   				hInfo[i][hIcon] = CreateDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],31,0,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
                hInfo[i][hCheckpoint] = CreateDynamicCP(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],1.5,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
			}
			else if(hInfo[i][hUsed] == 2)//bought house
			{
     			hInfo[i][hIcon] = CreateDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],32,0,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
                hInfo[i][hCheckpoint] = CreateDynamicCP(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],1.5,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
			}
			
	    }
	}
	return 1;
}
CMD:houseedit(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
	{
	    new item[32],opt[32],string[128],i = GetClosestHouse(playerid),sql[256];
	    if(sscanf(params,"s[32]S[32]()",item,opt))
	    {
	        SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"/edit [item]");
	        SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Available items, price, entrance, sign, level,interior");
	        return 1;
	    }
		if(i != -1)
		{
		    if(strcmp(item,"price",true) == 0)
		    {
				if(!opt[0]) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"Usage:/houseedit price [amount]");
				else
				{
				    hInfo[i][hPrice] = strval(opt);
				    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have edited the price of house id %d to $%d",i,hInfo[i][hPrice]);
				    SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,string);
				    format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPATE `samp_housez` SET `price`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",hInfo[i][hPrice],i);
				    mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
					return 1;
				}
		    }

		    else if(strcmp(item,"sign",true) == 0)
		    {
				if(hInfo[i][hUsed] == 1)
				{
					new Float:x,Float:y,Float:z;
					GetPlayerPos(playerid,x,y,z);
					editingSign[playerid] = i;
					if(hInfo[i][hSign] != -1)
					{
					    DestroyDynamicObject(hInfo[i][hSign]);
					}
					hInfo[i][hSign] = CreateDynamicObject(19471,x+0.5,y+0.5,z,0.0,0.0,0.0,GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid),GetPlayerInterior(playerid),-1,100.0);
	                Streamer_UpdateEx(playerid,x,y,z,GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid),GetPlayerInterior(playerid));
	                EditDynamicObject(playerid,hInfo[i][hSign]);
	            } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You cannot do this cause this house isn't for sale");
			}
			else if(strcmp(item,"level",true) == 0)
			{
				if(!opt[0]) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"/houseedit level [amount]");
				else
				{
				    hInfo[i][hLevel] = strval(opt);
				    format(string,sizeof(string),"You have set this houses level to %d",strval(opt));
				    SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,string);
				    format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `level`='%d' WHERE `houseID` = '%d'",strval(opt),i);
				    mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
				    return 1;
				}
			}
			else if(strcmp(item,"interior",true) == 0)
			{
			    if(!opt[0]) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"/hosueedit interior [interiorid]");
				else
				{
					new interior = strval(opt);
					if(interior > 0)
					{
						new bool:hEdited = false;
						switch(interior)
						{
							case 1:
							{
								hInfo[i][hExitx] = 235.3054;
								hInfo[i][hExity] = 1186.6835;
								hInfo[i][hExitz] = 1080.2578;
								hInfo[i][hInt] = 3;
								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Large/2 story/3 bedrooms/clone of House 9.", i);
								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);
								hEdited = true;
							}
							case 2:
							{
								hInfo[i][hExitx] = 225.756989;
								hInfo[i][hExity] = 1240.000000;
								hInfo[i][hExitz] = 1082.149902;
								hInfo[i][hInt] = 2;
								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Medium/1 story/1 bedroom.", i);
								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);
								hEdited = true;
							}
							case 3:
							{
								hInfo[i][hExitx] = 223.1929;
								hInfo[i][hExity] = 1287.0780;
								hInfo[i][hExitz] = 1082.1406;
								hInfo[i][hInt] = 1;
								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Small/1 story/1 bedroom.", i);
								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);
								hEdited = true;
							}
							case 4:
							{
								hInfo[i][hExitx] = 225.630997;
								hInfo[i][hExity] = 1022.479980;
								hInfo[i][hExitz] = 1084.069946;

								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: VERY Large/2 story/4 bedrooms.", i);
								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);
								hEdited = true;
							}
							case 5:
							{
								hInfo[i][hExitx] = 295.138977; hInfo[i][hExity] = 1474.469971; hInfo[i][hExitz] = 1080.519897;
								hInfo[i][hInt] = 15;

								hInfo[i][hExitx] = 1263.079956; hInfo[i][hExity] = -785.308960; hInfo[i][hExitz] = 1091.959961;

								hEdited = true;

								hInfo[i][hInt] = 1;
								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Sweet's House (South side of house is fucked).", i);
								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);
								hEdited = true;

								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Colonel Furhberger's House.", i);
								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);

								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);
								hEdited = true;
							}
							case 40:

								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Unused Safe House.", i);
								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);
								hEdited = true;
							}
							case 41:
							{
								hInfo[i][hExitx] = 446.5014; hInfo[i][hExity] = 507.0295; hInfo[i][hExitz] = 1001.4195;
								hInfo[i][hInt] = 12;
								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Budget Inn Motel Room.", i);
								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);
								hEdited = true;
							}
							case 42:
							{
								hInfo[i][hExitx] = 2216.3398; hInfo[i][hExity] = -1150.5099; hInfo[i][hExitz] = 1025.7969;
								hInfo[i][hInt] = 15;
								format(string, sizeof string, "House ID: %d - Description: Jefferson Motel. (REALLY EXPENSIVE)", i);
								SendClientMessage(playerid, -1,string);
								hEdited = true;
							}

						}
						if(hEdited == true)
						{
						    format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `exitX`='%f',`exitY`='%f',`exitZ`='%f',`exitInt`='%d' WHERE `houseID` = '%d'",hInfo[i][hExitx],hInfo[i][hExity],hInfo[i][hExitz],hInfo[i][hInt],i);
						    mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 1;
}
stock GetClosestHouse(playerid)
{
	new var;
	var = -1;
	for(new i = 1; i < sizeof(hInfo); i ++)
	{
	    if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid, 7.0,hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2]))
	    {
	        var = i;
	        break;
		}
	}
	return var;
}

CMD:createhouse(playerid,params[])
{
	if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pAdmin] >= 5)
	{
	    new price,level,sql[256],bool:houseCreated;
	    houseCreated = false;
	    if(sscanf(params,"dd",price,level)) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"/createhouse [price] [level]");
	    if(price > 0 && level > 0)
	    {
			for(new i = 1; i < sizeof(hInfo); i ++)
			{
			    if(hInfo[i][hUsed] == 0)
			    {
					hInfo[i][hUsed] = 1;
					GetPlayerPos(playerid,hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2]);
					hInfo[i][hPrice] = price;
					hInfo[i][hLocked] = 1;
					hInfo[i][hEnterVw] = GetPlayerVirtualWorld(playerid);
					hInfo[i][hEnterInt] = GetPlayerInterior(playerid);
					hInfo[i][hLevel] = level;
					strmid(hInfo[i][hOwner], "None", 0, strlen("None"), 255);
					hInfo[i][hCheckpoint] = CreateDynamicCP(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],1.5,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
                    hInfo[i][hIcon] = CreateDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],31,0,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
					SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"{FFFF00}House created{FFFFFF} YOU MUST now use /houseedit to set the interior and place a for sale sign!");
					format(sql,sizeof(sql),"INSERT INTO `samp_housez` SET `houseID`='%d',`used`='%d',`price`='%d',`level`='%d'",i,hInfo[i][hUsed],hInfo[i][hPrice],hInfo[i][hLevel]);
					format(sql,sizeof(sql),"%s,`entVW`='%d',`entINT`='%d',`entX`='%f',`entY`='%f',`entZ`='%f'",sql,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2]);
					mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
					houseCreated = true;
					break;
			    }
			}
			if(houseCreated == false) return SendClientMessage(playerid, -1, "Error max houses reached?");
	    }
	}
	return 1;
}


CMD:buyfurniture(playerid,params[])
{
	if(IsPlayerInRangeOfPoint(playerid,1.5,1006.5042,48.5292,1398.0150))
	{
		if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] != 9999)
		{
			new hid = PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey],varf,bool:canBuy;
			canBuy = false;
			switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
			{
				case 0: varf = 20;
			    case 1: varf = 40;
			    case 2: varf = 60;
			    case 3: varf = 80;
			    case 4: varf = 100;
			}
	        for(new i = 0; i < varf; i++)
	        {
	            if(furnInfo[hid][i][fUsed] == 0)
	            {
					furnSlot[playerid] = i;
					canBuy = true;
					ShowServerDialog(playerid,DIALOG_FURNITURE_TYPE,DIALOG_STYLE_LIST,"What kind of furniture","Bed and Bath\r\nCouchs/Tables/Chairs\r\nElectronics\r\nDecour\r\nKitchen","Continue","Cancel");
					break;
	            }
	        }
	        if(canBuy == false) return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You dont have any free furniture slots");
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You don't own a house you can't buy furniture...");
	}
	return 1;
}

CMD:buyhouse(playerid,params[])
{
	new i = GetClosestHouse(playerid);
	if(i != -1)
	{
		if(hInfo[i][hUsed] == 1)
		{
		    if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] == 9999)
		    {
				new item[8];
				if(sscanf(params,"s[8]",item))
				{
					new string[128];
					format(string,sizeof(string),"To purchase this house for $%d type /buyhouse confirm",hInfo[i][hPrice]);
					SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,string);
					return 1;
				}
				if(strcmp(item,"confirm",true) == 0)
				{
					if(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] == 0 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > hInfo[i][hPrice] || PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] == 1 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > hInfo[i][hPrice] /100 * 90 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] == 2 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > hInfo[i][hPrice] /100 * 75 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] == 3 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > hInfo[i][hPrice] /100 * 65 || PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP] == 4 && GetPlayerCash(playerid) > hInfo[i][hPrice] /100 * 50)
					{
						new escaped[MAX_PLAYER_NAME],sql[256],string[128];
				        mysql_real_escape_string(GPN(playerid),escaped);
				        PlayerInfo[playerid][pPhousekey] = i;
				        format(hInfo[i][hOwner],MAX_PLAYER_NAME,"%s",GPN(playerid));
				        DestroyDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hIcon]);
				        DestroyDynamicObject(hInfo[i][hSign]);
						hInfo[i][hIcon] = CreateDynamicMapIcon(hInfo[i][hEnter][0],hInfo[i][hEnter][1],hInfo[i][hEnter][2],32,0,hInfo[i][hEnterVw],hInfo[i][hEnterInt],-1,10.0);
						hInfo[i][hUsed] = 2;
						new housevalue = hInfo[i][hPrice];
						PlayerInfo[playerid][pHousePrice] = hInfo[i][hPrice];
						switch(PlayerInfo[playerid][pVIP])
						{
							case 0: { SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-housevalue); PlayerInfo[playerid][pHousePrice] = housevalue; }
							case 1: { new BronzeHouseValue = (housevalue / 100) * 90; SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-BronzeHouseValue); PlayerInfo[playerid][pHousePrice] = BronzeHouseValue; }
							case 2: { new SilverHouseValue = (housevalue / 100) * 75; SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-SilverHouseValue); PlayerInfo[playerid][pHousePrice] = SilverHouseValue; }
							case 3: { new GoldHouseValue = (housevalue / 100) * 65; SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-GoldHouseValue); PlayerInfo[playerid][pHousePrice] = GoldHouseValue; }
							case 4: { new DiamondHouseValue = (housevalue / 100) * 50; SafeGivePlayerMoney(playerid,-DiamondHouseValue); PlayerInfo[playerid][pHousePrice] = DiamondHouseValue; }
						}
						format(string,sizeof(string),"Congrats you just purchased house id %d for $%d",i,hInfo[i][hPrice]);
						SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,string);
						format(sql,sizeof(sql),"UPDATE `samp_housez` SET `owner`='%s', `used`='%d' WHERE `houseID`='%d'",escaped,hInfo[i][hUsed],i);
						mysql_query(sql,THREAD_SAVEHOUSEZ,i);
						return 1;
					} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You do not have the cash for this");
				}
				else
				{
					new string[128];
					format(string,sizeof(string),"To purchase this house for $%d type /buyhouse confirm",hInfo[i][hPrice]);
					SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,string);
					return 1;
				}
		    } else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You already own a house");
		} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"This house isn't even for sale");
	} else return SendClientMessage(playerid,-1,"You're not around a house");

}

public GateClose(playerid)
{
	MoveDynamicObject(pdgate1,1589.053344,-1638.123168,14.122960, 0.97);
	PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1589.053344,-1638.123168,14.122960);
	lspdg = 0;
	return 1;
}
public GateCloseFD()
{
	MoveDynamicObject(fdgate, 1702.8900, -1751.7600, 12.9000, 1.5);
	MoveDynamicObject(fdgate2, 1736.86, -1742.36, 12.72, 1.5);
	fdg = 0;
	fdg2 = 0;
	return 1;
}
public GateClose5(playerid)
{
	MoveDynamicObject(pdgate2, 1545.3225,-1627.8137,14.7720, 0.97);
	PlayerPlaySound(playerid, 1153, 1545.3225,-1627.8137,14.7720);
	lspdg2 = 0;
	return 1;
}

forward welcomespawn(playerid);
public welcomespawn(playerid)
{
	TogglePlayerControllable(playerid,1);
}
